tuv.seg: (PS：书城，手Q阅读中心的读者，书评真的不能顶到五千条吗？创世主站的读者们，推荐票顶起，7。1号上架爆发一个月……）
“……”(未完待续，如欲知后事如何，请登陆www.qidian.com，章节更多，支持作者，支持正版阅读！)
“……”一听这话，凯文真是连死的心都有了，一边掩饰着脸上尴尬的神色，一边将脸转到另一个方向，希望能装出不认识林立的样子……
"..." Kevin had given up all hope upon hearing his words. While trying to hide the embarrassment on his face, he turned to face the other side, hoping to pretend that he didn't know Lin Li...
“……”听着葛瑞安恐怖的描述，中年魔导士不由背心一阵发凉，不过他还在坚持。
"..." The middle-aged man felt chill in his body as he listened to Gerian's horrifying description. But he was still holding out.
“……”城主大人脸上的笑容忽然凝固了，魔法公会的费雷，自从葛瑞安跟老梅林一战之后，在加洛斯已是仿佛传说一样的人物，即便以艾萨克城主之尊，也没想过这次宴会他会亲自光临。他更没想过，这个传说中的药剂大师，以一人之力，导演了百万金币拍卖会的人物，会是这么一个穿着旧法师袍，看上去不过二十来岁的青年魔法师。

"..." The smile stiffened on the Castellan's face. Felic of the Guild of Magic had been a legendary figure in Jarrosus ever since the battle between Gerian and Old Merlin. Even though Isaac was the castellan, he had never thought Felic would come to this banquet in person. He did not even imagine that the legendary potion master, who alone supplied the million gold coin auction, would be a young mage who looked no more than 20 years old wearing an old mage robe.
“……”安度因从水晶球中看着这一切，忽然有些茫然了，这真是一个掌握神秘知识的魔法师？老头真是怎么看怎么觉得，这小子象是一个盗贼更多一点……

"..." Andoine was lost watching the scene from the crystal ball. Was he really a mage with a knowledge of the mystical? No matter how the old man looked, he thought the kid was more like a thief instead...
“……”对方的纠缠不休，已经让林立有些火气了，脸上的神色也冷了下来：“我要是不道歉会怎么样？”
"..." The other party's pertinacious behavior had rankled Lin Li, and his expression turned cold. "What if I don't apologize?"
“……”小梅林只觉眼前一黑，差点没一口血喷了出来，这家伙真的是个疯子，他现在真是连说话的力气都没了，只是勉强抬起手臂，抱着最后一丝侥幸的心理，艰难的报出了一个价格：“八……八十二万……”

"..." Little Merlin could see nothing but blackness, and blood almost spat out from his mouth. This fellow was really a lunatic. He didn't even have the strength to speak; he barely managed to lift his arm and with the idea of leaving things to luck at last, he quoted a price with much difficulty, "8... 820,000..."
“……”攀上了传奇境界的魔法师，早已经超越了这个职业本身的范畴，只要是在他精神力覆盖范围之内，他就能掌握他想要掌握的一切东西，林立这鬼鬼祟祟的悄悄话，又怎能瞒过老格林的耳目？

"..." A mage who had reached the legendary realm had already surpassed the scope of this profession itself. As long as it was within the range of his mental powers, he could learn of anything he wanted. How could Lin Li's furtive whispers escape the eyes and ears of Old Grimm?
“……”有了罗麦格雷尼教训，林立赶忙躲到一棵树后，以防那死猩猩又用椰子偷袭。
“…” With McGrenn's experience as a lesson, Lin Li hurried to hide behind a tree in case that darned gorilla made another sneak attack with the coconut again.
“……”林立也知道，凯文见了葛瑞安，就跟老鼠见了猫似的，怕这胖老头怕得要死，他既然说不知道，那肯定是真的不知道了，于是林立也不再继续纠缠，只是又问了一句：“那推迟到什么时候？”

"..." Lin Li knew that Kevin was as scared of Gerian as the mouse was of the cat whenever he saw the fat old man. Since he had said that he didn't know, then it had to be true. So, Lin Li did not pester further, but asked another question, "Then, until when is it postponed?"
“……”林立刚要开口，却忽然愣住了，因为一直到这个时候，他才想起件重要的事来——他没钱！连一分钱都没有！
“…” Lin Li was about to open his mouth when he suddenly stopped short, for it was not until then that he had remembered something important—he had no money, not even a penny!
“……”林立在一旁听得冷汗直流：“有你这么逼供的吗……”
"..." Lin Li was sweating cold sweat while listening at a side. "Is an extortion of confession like how you do it…?"
“……”林立在那发了足有一分多钟的呆，才有些不太肯定的问了一句：“你是不是气糊涂了？”
"..." Lin Li stood there in a daze for more than a minute, and asked unsurely, "Are you muddled from the anger?"
“……”林立太清楚这对父女的性格了，要不是真遇上了无法解决的事，他们绝对不可能找上门来，想到这一点林立有些焦急，匆匆忙忙的就出等级认证大厅，一边往会客室赶去，还一边抱怨着：“怎么不早点通知我……”

"..." Lin Li knew the father and daughter too well. If they had not encountered something that could not be solved, they would never have come for him. Lin Li was somewhat anxious at the thought of this. He rushed out of the level certification hall and hurried over to the reception room as he lamented, "Why didn't you tell me earlier..."
“……”林立差点一口气没喘上来，这么间烂房子，能跟交易所扯上关系？
“…” Lin Li almost choked in his breath. How could such a dilapidated house be associated with trade?
“……”林立心想你直说让我帮你鉴定不就完了，至于绕这么大个圈子？
"..." Lin Li thought, Just tell me straight up you want me to help in the authentication, was there a need to go around such a big circle?
“……”林立挠了挠头，心想老子招谁惹谁了……
"..." Lin Li scratched his head, wondering whom he had offended...
“……”罗琳是真的想学习药剂，她从小就学习医术，又曾受过药剂师指点，等到医术渐渐精深之后，才发现很多医术难以解决的问题，其实只需要一瓶小小的药剂，但安瑞尔世界药剂师如凤毛麟角，即便是以罗琳的尊贵身份，学习药剂也是一件虚无飘渺的事。

"..." Rowling really wanted to learn potion making. She had studied medicine from an early age and had been instructed by a pharmacist. After her medical skills gradually became profound, she discovered that the problems which couldn't be solved with medical skills could actually be solved with a small bottle of a potion. But pharmacists in Anril were rare; even with Rowling's noble status, to learn potion making was a purely imaginary matter.
“……”老梅林脸色铁青，心里更是把葛瑞安祖宗十八代都给问候遍了，重新打你妈个大西瓜，你现在手里拿着唤醒药剂，只有神经病才想跟你重新打过……

"..." Old Merlin's face turned purple with rage, and in his heart he'd paid greetings to all 18 generations of Gerian's family. A rematch? That son of a watermelon. He had the Awakening potion in his hands now, and only a lunatic would fight him once more...
“……”葛瑞安倒吸了一口凉气，曼尼斯家族富甲法兰王国，黑暗年代之后一千三百年，不知藏了多少好东西下来，任人挑选三件这种事，葛瑞安真是连想都没想过……

"..." Gerian gasped in surprise. The Mannes Family was the richest in all of Felan Kingdom. Who knew how much good stuff they had hidden in the 1300 years after the Dark Ages. Gerian had never once imagined such thing as getting to choose any three items...
“……”这样的小伎俩，又怎能瞒过灰袍法师，一时间老人不由又好气又好笑，不过以他的身份，自然不能去当面揭穿，只是面色有些尴尬的提醒林立：“这个……费雷，你能先把巴瑟罗尔给放了吗？他要是再这么继续流血，恐怕会有生命危险啊……”

"..." How could such a petty trick escape the eyes of the mage in gray robe? For a moment, the old man felt annoyed yet amused. However, in his capacity, he naturally could not expose him. He merely reminded Lin Li with a look of slight embarrassment on his face, "This... Felic, can you first let Bathrilor off? If he continues to bleed, I'm afraid his life will be in danger..."
“……”连一旁的林立都是听得摇头直下，环境真是可怕，连凯文这样的老实人，都被毒害得谎话张口就来。
"..." Even Lin Li was shaking his head as he listened from the side. Circumstance was a scary factor, even an honest person like Kevin was poisoned into lying as he opened his mouth.
“一万两！”
"Ten thousand taels!"
“一万五千金币第一次！”锤子落在台上，却象是落在小个子法师心里。
"15,000 gold coins going once!" The gavel had landed on the table, but it felt just like it had landed on the short mage's heart.
“一万五千金币第二次！”
"15,000 gold coins going twice!"
“一万五千金币！”亚伦－马齐斯却完全没有任何犹豫，小个子话音刚落，又是一万五千金币砸了出来。
"15,000 gold coins!" There was no hesitation from Aaron Matsis at all. The shorty's voice had just settled when a 15,000 gold coins was thrown out.
“一万金币！”
"10,000 gold coins!"
“一万！”凯文斩钉截铁的吐出一个数字。
"10,000!" Kevin spat out a figure resolutely.
“一两紫金一天啊！一两紫金那可是能在风月楼包个花魁玩上十天十夜了，可惜我武技不行啊，否则一定要进去混个金牌陪练玩玩。”

"A tael of purple gold a day! One tael of purple gold can allow me to book a courtesan at the Fengyue Brothel and have fun with her for ten entire days and nights! Sadly, my skills are not good enough, otherwise I would definitely go in and pass off as a good token-grade sparring partner and have some fun."
“一两紫金一天？拼了，去试试！”
One tael of purple gold a day? I'll risk it and go for broke!
“一两紫金？”
"One tael of purple gold?"
“一个月之后，我会邀请加洛斯所有势力的首脑，让他们作为这场决斗的见证，葛瑞安你觉得这样够不够公平？”
"A month later, I will invite the leaders of all forces in Jarrosus, and they'll be the witnesses of this duel. Do you think it's fair enough, Gerian?"
“一个月？”
"A month?"
“一定一定……”艾萨克城主又感觉太阳穴有些痛了，匆匆敷衍完葛瑞安，赶紧逃也似的出了翡翠高塔，走出门口之后，艾萨克呼吸着塔外的新鲜空气，在心里暗暗发誓，以后要是没必要的话，他打死也不会再到这见鬼的地方来！

"Sure, sure..." Castellan Isaac felt his temples throbbing again. He answered vaguely in a hurry and fled out of the Emerald Tower. After stepping out of the gates, Isaac took a deep breath of the fresh air outside and swore to himself that he'd never come to this darned place again if he didn't have to!
“一点虚空花，以及一点龙血草。”林立挠了挠头，神色间有些苦恼：“最近一段时间，我一直在尝试提高清醒药剂的浓度，为了让清醒药剂更加纯粹，我试过大概三十多种草药，最后发现，如果用虚空花混合龙血草的话，可以达到类似的效果，不过……”

"Some netherbloom, and a little dracaena grass." Lin Li scratched his head, his expression troubled. “Recently, I have been trying to increase the concentration of the Sobriety Potion. In order to make the Sobriety Potion possess a higher degree of purity, I've tried over 30 kinds of herbs. In the end, I realized that if I mix netherbloom together with the dracaena grass, I'll get a similar effect. But..."
“一瓶也是钱哪！”
"It's also money!"
“一百……一百套？”葛瑞安很吃力的咽了口口水。
"100... 100 sets?" Gerian swallowed his saliva with great difficulty.
“一种技巧，一种让力量更加强大的技巧。”如今的林立，早已不是初到异界时，那个一无所知的粼粼了，在安度因的熏陶下，他对魔法已经有了自己的理解。

"A kind of skill, a skill that will allow your strength to become more powerful." The Lin Li at present was not the piece of clear rock that knew nothing when he first came to this foreign world. He had developed his own understanding of magic under the influence of Andoine.
“一缕大半柱香时间，十缕差不多能坚持一个时辰！”
"If one wisp can last for more than two and a half minutes, ten wisps can last more almost two hours!"
“七万金币！”
"70,000 gold coins!"
“七十万！”喊出这个价格的时候，小梅林真是觉得肝都疼了……
"700,000!" Little Merlin felt his liver churn when he shouted the price out...
“三万金币第三次！”凯文手上的锤子重重落下，宣布了今天的第一笔交易完成：“成交！恭喜亚伦－马齐斯先生！”
"30,000 gold coins going thrice!" The gavel in Kevin's hand landed heavily on the table as he announced the first done deal of the day. "Deal! Congratulations, Mr Aaron Matsis!"
“三万金币！”
"30,000 gold coins!"
“三个月！只要马家三个月内找不到我，我境界最少能达到铸鼎境四五重，配合黑色元力综合战力应该达到铸鼎境八九重，到时候就算你们派人来刺杀，小爷就不怕了！难不成他们还会不要脸的派紫府境强者出手？”

"Three months! If the Ma Family did not manage to locate me by the end of three months, my attainment would reach the fourth or fifth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm at the very least. Combined with the black essence force, my powers should reach the eighth or ninth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. By that time, even if the Ma Family were to send their assassins, this young master would have nothing to fear! Would they even be so audacious as to sending a powerful martial artist who is at the Purple Mansion Realm?"
“三人铸鼎境二重，一人铸鼎境三重！”
"Three of them are at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. One of them is at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm!"
“三瓶魔能药剂，至于报酬么……”葛瑞安竖起三个指头，脸上的表情有些夸张：“由你在曼尼斯家族装备库内，随意挑选三件！”

"Three bottles of Magicka Potion. As for the rewards..." Gerian raised up three fingers and his expression was slightly exaggerated. "You get to choose any three items from the Mannes Family's equipment bank!"
“上善若水，水善利万脉而不争……天地浩浩，唯大道永恒，欲证天道，必先修自身……呃，错了……”

“Benevolent acts resemble water in character. Water benefits all and does not compete… In the vastness of the heaven and earth, only The Way is eternal. To obtain proof of heavenly law, one must first cultivate oneself… eh… no, wrong…”
"Attack!"
“上，将这个丧心病狂的疯子的腿打断，送去刑堂，等候我父亲发落，”江如狼也冷喝一声，从另外一边朝江逸冲去。
"Go, break this maniac's legs and send him to the Disciplinary Court. My father shall serve his punishment there," Jiang Rulang let out a shout and rushed at Jiang Yi from the other side.
“不……不能……不能告诉我爹……不能告诉家族！”
"No... Do not... Do not tell my dad... Do not tell the Family!"
“不不不，不是我……”林立摇了摇头，又伸手指了下正站在门口的希恩：“是我这位朋友，我打算帮他买套装备，不过不知道该买什么好，要不您给介绍介绍，看有没有适合他用的装备？”

"No, not me..." Lin Li shook his head immediately and pointed at Sheehan who was standing at the door, "it's my friend. I want to get him a set of gear but I am not sure what to buy. Could you please give us some advice on what is suitable for him?"
“不不不，我绝对绝对不是这个意思……”安东尼－罗林连连摆手，这可不是开玩笑的，对拍卖会有疑问，就等于是对葛瑞安的人品有疑问，就等于是在挑衅魔法公会，借他十个胆子，他也不敢去挑衅正如日中天的魔法公会。

"No, no, no, I definitely don't mean that..." Anthony Rolin waved his hands. This was not a joking matter, having doubts about the auction would mean having doubts about Gerian's character, and it'd be equal to challenging the Guild of Magic. He would not dare to challenge the Guild of Magic which was at the peak of its influence even if he was given ten more guts.
“不了！”
"Don’t bother!"
“不会不会不会……”
"No, no, no..."
“不关我的事？”林立忽然笑了：“麦格雷尼先生可是我的朋友，如果没有他的话，我可能到现在都还走不出落日山脉，你说这关不关我的事？再说了，你既然想负责治疗，那我问你，你知不知道麦格雷尼先生的问题出在什么地方？”

"None of my business?" Lin Li suddenly chuckled. "Mr McGrenn is my friend. If not for him, I would probably still be lost in the Sunset Mountains, and you said this is none of my business? Furthermore, since you'd like to be in charge of the treatment, let me ask you, do you know where the problem lies with Mr McGrenn?"
“不可能的！这次一点失误都没有，怎么可能还是失败？难道是材料有问题？恩，一定是材料有问题，好哇！玛那你个老不死的，卖假货居然卖到我老头上来了，回头非找你算帐不可！”

"Impossible! There was no mistake this time, how could it fail again? Is there a problem with the ingredients? Yes, there must be a problem with the ingredients. Great! This dang old man, selling counterfeit goods at my doorstep, l'll make sure you pay it back!"
“不可能，这……怎么可能？”
"No way, this... How can this be possible?"
This is bad!
“不好！”
"Damn it!"
“不如格林爷爷帮你出个主意？”
"Why won't Grandpa Grimm give you an idea?"
“不对不对，我听说是他们挖到了一个药剂大师，这回魔法公会真是可发了，听说那药剂大师不但人被挖来了，还从药剂师公会里带了一批药剂出来！”

"No, no, I heard they had poached a Potion Master. This time the Guild of Magic had hit the jackpot. It was said that the Potion Master had brought a pile of potions with him from the Pharmacists Guild!"
“不对！”
"No way!"
“不对！既然蓝色元力可以辅助疗伤，我这黑色元力这么变态，那也可以快速辅助疗伤啊？我何必还要去融合丹药的药力呢？”

"No, wait! Since blue essence force can help heal wounds and my black essence force is so obscenely powerful, surely it can speed up and facilitate my healing process? Why would I ever need to merge it with the elixir medical power?"
“不想你们虎哥死，立即给我退后！”
"If you don't want your Brother Hu to die, back away from me immediately!"
“不是有意的？”
"Did not mean to do it?"
“不是配不出，是材料太不好搞。”林立摇了摇头，又伸出一只手来，一样一样的给他数着：“水火两种元素精华，高等级恶魔的血液，十五级以上魔晶，这几件东西你有办法搞到吗？”

"Not that it can't be concocted, it's just that the ingredients are not easy to get." Lin Li shook his head and held out his hand, counting each and every one out for Gerian. "The essence of two elements, fire and water, the blood of a high-level demon, magical crystal above level-fifteen. Can you get all these items?"
“不死冥皇！”
"Undying Netherworld King!"
“不求最好，但求最多！”在庞大精神力的支持下，林立从来就不会担心自己魔力枯竭，更不用担心精神力无法负荷。

"I don't wish for the best, but I wish for the most!" With the support of an enormous mental strength, Lin Li never had to worry about exhausting his magical powers, much less being worried about his mental strength being unable to hold out.
“不用不用，我自己再研究研究……”安度因一脸尴尬的搓着双手，过了好半天才象起自己的目的，赶忙摆出一副严肃的神色：“呃……今天先不说这个，我有点事想跟你说说。”

“No need for it, I’ll study it myself…” Andoine rubbed his hands awkwardly. After a few moments, he seemed to recall his goal. Putting on a serious face, he said, “Umm… Let’s not talk about this today, I have something to tell you.”
“不用了！”
"That won't be necessary!"
“不用了，我回头再来好了。”
"No need. It's fine; I'll come back again."
“不用太麻烦了，小事一件而已，我不会跟他一般见识的。”
"No need to trouble yourself with it. It's a small matter, I won't take offense at him."
“不用客气，举手之劳而已。”林立将装了半瓶的飞龙血塞了起来，小心翼翼的放进法师袍口袋，这才笑咪咪的自我介绍道：“叫我费雷就可以了，对了，我能不能多嘴问一句，三位是怎么惹上这双足飞龙的？”

"You are welcome, it was an act of convenience." Lin Li put the stopper back on the glass bottle that was half-filled with the Wyvern's blood and gingerly put it away into the pocket of his mage robe. Grinning, he introduced himself, "You can call me Felic. By the way, may I ask how the three of you have came to provoke the Wyvern?"
“不用看了。”就在马森进退两难的时候，林立却从他身后站了出来，一双眼睛紧紧盯着霍伦的右手：“马迪亚斯是我打伤的，跟他们两个没什么关系，我可以跟您回去，不过霍伦先生，我能不能冒昧的问一句，您跟巴瑟罗尔怎么称呼？”

"There's no need to take a look." Just as Marson found himself in a dilemma, Lin Li stepped out from behind him. His eyes firmly stared at Hoeren's right hand: "I was the one who injured Mathias. It has nothing to do with them. I can follow you back, but Mr Hoeren, may I take the liberty to ask you one question? How do you address Bathrilor?"
“不用等葛瑞安回来了，这事我自己就能解决。”在众人眼中已是必死无疑的林立，此时却一翻身从地毯上站了起来。
"There's no need to wait for Gerian to come back. I can deal with it on my own." Lin Li, who was undoubtedly dead in the eyes of everyone, turned over and stood up from the carpet.
“不瞒葛瑞安会长，最近曼尼斯家族在现金上，确实有些吃紧。”年轻族长白净斯文的脸上笑容依旧温和，但说出来的话，却彻底让萨鲁曼家族陷入了绝望：“所以想用一百套这样的装备，换取十瓶奥法药剂，不知道葛瑞安会长意下如何？”

"To be frank, President Gerian, the Mannes Family is tight on cash recently." The smile on the young patriarch's fair face was gentle as always, but the words spoken sent the Saruman Family into complete despair. "Therefore we would like to use a hundred copies of this set to exchange for ten bottles of Arcane Magic Potion. What do you say, President Gerian?"
“不知道……”林立老老实实的点了点头。
"I don't know..." Lin Li nodded honestly.
“不知道。”林立答得倒也老实：“反正我对魔法一窍不通，你让我练习什么，我自然就练习什么，难道你还会害我不成？”
“No,” Lin Li replied honestly. “I know nothing about magic anyway. I’ll just practice whatever you asked me to, surely you won’t harm me?”
“不知道是吗？”葛瑞安脸色阴沉，一双眼睛更是仿佛要喷出火来：“那我猜你肯定也不知道阴影之巢，更不知道那一百二十五枚巫师之眼的位置，至于通过岗哨的路线，肯定也不是你卖给阴影之巢的吧？”

"You don't know?" Gerian's face was gloomy and his eyes looked as if they were about to be ablaze. "Then I guess you'd surely not know of the Shadow's Nest, or even the positions of those 125 Warlock's Eyes? As for the route that bypasses the sentry posts, it was surely not you who'd sold it to the Shadow's Nest?"
“不等了，随便打几场吧，你们这武殿待一天可要一两紫金，我来这可不是玩的。”少女冷哼两声，转身走进一个练功房内，杨总管连忙朝江逸这边的人群中喊道：“野猪！出战，上场。”

"I'm not waiting any longer. I'll just fight a few casual rounds with them. I need a tael of purple gold just to stay for a single day at your Martial Arts Hall. I did not come here for fun." The youth coldly snorted twice, before turning and walking into one of the technique-practicing rooms.
Manager Rong hurriedly shouted to the group of individuals in Jiang Yi's corner of the room. "Wild Boar! It's time to do battle, so get in the sparring room!"
“不管了，最后试一次，不行就回家吃饭了。”
"Forget about it, I'll try again for one last time. If I fail again, I'll just return home and have my meal."
“不管他了，以后再想办法吧，时间不早了，先把伤口疗养好，迟些还要上五号药田清点呢，可别被江如虎等人堵了……”

"Forget it, I'll think of a plan next time. It's not early anymore. Let me heal my wounds first. I have to go to Field Number Five to take stock later. Hopefully I won't be blocked by Jiang Ruhu and gang..."
“不行！绝对不行！”
"No! Definitely not !"
“不行，还不能睡。”葛瑞安躺了一会，却一骨碌从床上坐了起来：“屠魔山谷的事，我越想越不对，不把这件事搞清楚，我今天就不睡觉了！”

"No, I can't sleep yet." Gerian lay for a while and then sat up from the bed. "The more I think about what happened in the Demon Fall Valley, the more it feels wrong. I won't sleep today if I don't get to the bottom of it!"
“不过……”林立摇了摇头，神色间有些无奈：“加入虚空花跟龙血草之后，清醒药剂的浓度确实提高了，但也带来了很霸道的副作用，我上次试着喝了一点点，就导致精神力无比混乱，如果一整瓶喝下去的话……”

"But..." Lin Li shook his head helplessly. "After adding the netherbloom and dracaena grass, the concentration for the Sobriety Potion was indeed increased, but it also has potent side effects. I've tried drinking a little bit of it last time and it led to an extreme mental confusion. If it's the whole bottle..."
“不过什么？”听到这里的时候，老格林神色间已是有些急切了，他也是一名魔法师，他很清楚一瓶高浓度的清醒药剂，对魔法师来说究竟意味着什么，这意味着更长时间的越级施法，以及更加快速的魔力恢复。

"But what?" Old Grimm was anxious at this point. He was a mage, so he knew very well what a concentrated Sobriety Potion would mean to a mage—a longer time to cast a spell and a faster recovery of the mana.
“不过你也别高兴得太早。”望着有些不知所措的林立，老法师笑了笑：“天赋好是一回事，成就却是另一回事，在我看来你至少有两个方面不如格雷斯科，首先你不够专注，在魔法领域里，只有绝对专注的人才能取得真正的成功，太过博学有时候并不是优点，就拿药剂学来说吧，你小小年纪，懂的却比药剂师协会里那些老不死的还多，大量的精力花费在药剂学上，你又能有多少时间去研究魔法？”

"But don't get too excited just yet." Seeing how bewildered Lin Li looked, the old mage chortled. "Talent is one thing, but achievements are another. From what I see, you are inferior to Geresco in at least two ways. First of all, you are not focused enough. In magic, only people who are absolutely focused can achieve real success. Too much knowledge is sometimes not a virtue. Take pharmaceutics as an example, you know better than those old fellows from the Pharmacists Association at such a young age. A lot of energy is spent on pharmaceutics, how much time would you have to study magic?”
“不过我很快就后悔了，你的天赋实在太好，这样的天赋也许上千年都不会再出现了，我不忍心看你走上一条错误的道路，所以我不再教你任何法术，而是天天让你练习最基本的元素排列，你千万不要小看了这些枯燥的练习，任何世界都有自己的规则，魔法世界同样也不会例外，而元素排列，就是魔法世界最基本的规则，当你熟悉并且掌握了这种规则之后，你会发现一切都是如此的简单，不管多么强大的法术，都只不过是由规则所衍生出来的。”

"But I soon regretted it. Your talent is too great, such talent may not appear for thousands of years. I can't bear to see you going down the wrong path, so instead of teaching you new spells, I let you practice the most basic sequencing of elements everyday. Never underestimate the tedious practice. Every world has its own rules, and the world of magic is no exception."
“不过还好，今天早上我已经清点过了，大多数材料没什么麻烦，损失最严重的只有野钢花……”
"But, fortunately, I did an inventory count this morning. Most of the ingredients had no problems, only the wild steelbloom suffered the most loss..."
“不错不错，能看出这一点来，你也算是个不错的医生了。”林立笑眯眯的夸了两句，之后却话锋一转：“可惜就是眼睛不太好……”
"Not bad that you're able to see this, it means you're a decent doctor," Lin Li complimented her with a grin, but quickly changed the subject. "A pity your eyesight isn't good..."
"No!"
“不！不要！”
"No! Don't!"
“不，不对！”
“No! Wait! Hang on…”
“两万金币！”小个子法师额头上已经开始冒汗了，这是他所有的财产，本以为能弄到至少两瓶奥法药剂回去，可没想到却连一瓶都希望渺茫，想到来时的踌躇满志，他才终于有些明白，这拍卖会里的水究竟有多深。

“20,000 gold coins!" Cold sweat broke out on the short mage's forehead. It was all of his assets; he had expected to get at least two bottles of Arcane Magic Potion, but now, the hope of getting even a single bottle was slim. He finally realized how deep the water for the auction was when he recalled how he had arrived at the auction with high ambitions.
“中……中级铁匠？”安度因远远看了林立一眼，脸上的神色显得有些古怪，他真的很想问问，这世界上还有比这更妖孽的人吗？
"Mid... Mid-level forger?" Andoine gazed at Lin Li from afar. The expression on his face was slightly odd. He really wanted to ask, was there anyone in this world who was more demonic than Lin Li?
“丹纹没用，对丹药药效没有任何加成。”
"The elixir pattern is no use. The pattern does not add any addition ability to the elixir medical efficacy itself."
“为了梅林家族的尊严，我偶尔也会干些吃力不讨好的事。”交谈过程中，老梅林第一次占了上风。
"For the dignity of the Merlin's Family, I'd sometimes take on thankless tasks." Old Merlin had gained the upper hand for the first time in the conversation.
“为了让大家都能买到足够的奥法药剂，公会临时决定再拿出三瓶奥法药剂供大家竞拍，而接下来的拍卖，也将会是十瓶一拍！”所有人都没有想到，魔法公会会这么大胆，一下从三瓶涨到了十瓶，就算再加上临时拿出来的三瓶，他们可供竞争的机会，也就一共只有两次了。

"In order to get enough Arcane Magic Potion for everyone to buy, the guild has temporarily decided to take out another three bottles of Arcane Magic Potion for everyone to bid on. And the next auction will be a one-shot sale of ten bottles!" No one had expected the Guild of Magic to be this bold, going from three bottles to ten bottles at once. Even with the additional three bottles, there would only be two opportunities for them to contend.
“为什么不能，就因为你父亲奥德文？哼，我迟早要找那老家伙算帐，让他好好照顾的人，居然差点被他宝贝儿子给杀了！”
"Why not? Because your father is Odwin? Hmph, sooner or later I'll have to settle this with him. The person I entrusted him to take care of was actually almost killed by his precious son!"
“为什么？”
"Why?"
“为什么？”林立一愣，心想葛瑞安该不会吃错药了吧？这老家伙等了几十年，就等着魔法公会扬眉吐气的一天，三十瓶奥法药剂的拍卖，正好给了他这个机会，他怎么舍得把时间推迟？

"Why?" Lin Li was taken by surprise. Could Gerian have taken the wrong medicine? This old fellow had waited for decades for the day when the Guild of Magic could finally hold its head up high. That 30 bottles of Arcane Magic Potion had given him the opportunity, how could he be willing to postpone it?
“为什么？你有天赋又懂医术，这么好的弟子上哪里找去，那小伙子为什么不肯教你，告诉格林爷爷，我明天上魔法公会找他去。”

"Why? You have the gift and possess medicinal knowledge. Where can he find such a decent disciple like you? Why is that kid unwilling to teach you? Tell Grandpa Grimm, I'll go look for him at the Guild of Magic tomorrow."
“义务……除了承认你是加洛斯魔法公会成员之外，好象真没什么义务了，至少在加洛斯魔法公会，会长是不会勉强你去做什么事的，而且就算会长勉强，你也有权利不去，毕竟魔法公会是一种松散机构，魔法师与公会之间，并不是真正的上下属关系。”

"Obligations... Other than admitting that you are a member of the Jarrosus Guild of Magic, there seems to be no other obligation. At least in Jarrosus Guild of Magic, the President won't force you to do anything. Even if he does, you have the right to choose not to agree. After all, the guild is a loose organization, there's no subordinate relationship between the mage and the guild."
“九天锁星阵！”
"Empyreal Star Lock Array!"
“也好。”
"Might as well."
“也对……”葛瑞安挠了挠头：“不过要是万一……”
"Makes sense..." Gerian scratched his head. "But just in case..."
“也就是说，进行等级认证之后，我就算是加洛斯魔法公会成员了？”听凯文介绍完等级认证的一些常识之后，林立总算是明白了，那胖老头刚才为什么笑得这么猥琐，原来这等级认证背后，还有这么一层意义。

"That is to say, after the level certification, I'll be a member of the Jarrosus Guild of Magic?" After listening to Kevin's introduction of some general knowledge regarding the level certification, Lin Li finally understood the reason behind that fat old man's sheepish laugh earlier on. It turned out that there was another meaning behind having this level certification.
“乱我军心者，便是这厮下场！”
"This is what will become of you if you dampen our troops’ morale!"
“事实上，他确实是个铁匠……”麦德林耸耸肩膀，也是一脸迷茫。
"In reality, he is indeed a blacksmith...: Medellin shrugged. His expression was one of confusion.
“二十一万第一次！”
"210,000 going once!"
“二十一万第三次！”凯文手中的锤子重重落在台上：“成交！恭喜埃文先生！”
"210,000 going thrice!" The gavel in Kevin's hand dropped heavily on the table. "Deal! Congratulations, Mr Evan!"
“二十一万第二次！”
"210,000 going twice!"
“二十一万！”与她竞争的是梅林家族，那个身穿红色法师袍，被葛瑞安以“骚包”形容的梅林家族老三，连眉头都没皱一下，就报出了这个惊人的价格。

"210,000!" Contending with her was the Merlin Family. It was the mage in red robe whom Gerian described as "hussy", the third son of the Merlin Family. He had quoted the startling price without so much as wrinkling his brows.
“二十万第一次！”
"200,000 going once!"
“二十万第三……”
“二十万第二次！”
"200,000 going twice!"
“二十个魔法师？哈哈哈……”艾萨克却是气得都笑出了声来：“你可真大方，可惜别说是二十个，就算是五十个，也别不上人家一根头发，算了算了，你爱怎么样就怎么样吧，这事我不管了，再说就算想管我也管不了，你自己给你父亲写信，希望葛瑞安回来之前还来得及……”

"20 mages? Hahaha..." Isaac laughed in anger. "You're so generous. Unfortunately, not to mention 20, even if it's 50, it wouldn't be comparable to a strand of his hair. Forget it, do what you wish, I wash my hands off this. Besides, even if I wanted to help, I have no control over this as well. You write your own letter to your father, hopefully it's not too late before Gerian returns..."
“二十五万！”有了葛瑞安的承诺，安东尼－罗林毫不犹豫的将价格抬到了二十五万，这个恐怖的数字一出，顿时引得公会大厅中一阵窃窃私语。
"250,000!" With Gerian's promise in hand, Anthony Rolin raised the price to 250,000 without any hesitation. This astonishing figure immediately drew murmurs from the guild hall.
“二十八分钟……”葛瑞安目瞪口呆的望着林立，一脸呆滞的喃喃念叨着：“奇迹……奇迹！”
"Twenty-eight minutes..." Gerian stared at Lin Li with his eyes and mouth wide open. With a confounded look on his face, he mumbled to himself repeatedly, "Miracle... Miracle!"
“于是你就成了他叔叔了？”林立两眼发直神情呆滞，看看眼前的葛瑞安，又想想城主大人的年纪，不由仰天长叹，这个老不要脸的……

“So, you became his uncle?" Lin Li's eyes were glazed and expression dazed. He took a look at Gerian in front of him and thought of the Castellan's age. He looked up to the heaven and sighed heavily, This shameless old man...
“五万金币！”
"50,000 gold coins!"
“五十万！”所以凯文的锤子才刚刚落下，鲁本－萨鲁曼就报出了惊人的价格。
"500,000!" So, Kevin's gavel had just come down when Reuben Saruman had announced a startling figure.
“五十五万！”小梅林也是把心一横，彻底跟鲁本－萨鲁曼干上了。
"550,000!" Little Merlin said with utmost resolution, going completely head on with Reuben Saruman.
“五十银币买张荆棘兽毛皮，你他妈一大早没睡醒是吧？算了老子就当是做做好事，只要你八十银币，怎么样，八十银币要不要？不要就赶紧滚，别他妈挡着老子发财！”

“50 silver coins for a Thorned Beast fur? Are you still f*cking asleep? Forget it, I'll take it that I'm doing a good deed and sell it to you for 80 silver coins, how's that? If you don't want it, scram. Don't block my damn way to fortune!"
“五千金币！”就在葛瑞安肉疼的时候，大厅中已经有人开始出价了。
"5,000 gold coins!" Just as Gerian was grudging over it, someone in the hall had begun his bid.
“交代个屁！“
"Account my ass!"
“人没出事就好，有什么事等回来再说，等了你大半个晚上，累都快累死了，你慢慢补充巫师之眼，我先去睡觉了……”

"All's well as long as nothing happened to you. Other matters can wait till you come back. I'm deadbeat now after waiting for you for so long. You can restore the Warlock's Eyes slowly, I'll go sleep first..."
“人阶上品丹药十两银子一枚，我这丹药听这炼丹师的口气品阶不高，不过他们小姐都惊动了，显然也看出这丹药的不寻常了？价值怎么也比人阶上品丹药高吧？”江逸脑海飞快转动，很快咬牙道：“二，二十两银子一枚。”

"The Man-tier superior-grade elixirs are worth ten taels of silver per pill. According to your alchemist here, my elixirs are not of high-quality, yet they were able to trigger the Young Mistress their caln to settle this herself. Is it not evident enough that this elixir is extraordinary? Surely, the value would be higher than any Man-tier superior-grade elixir?" Jiang Yi's mind moved as fast as lightening. Very soon, he gritted his teeth and said, "Two, twenty taels of silver for each pill."
“人阶上品武技流星拳？江豹，你……”
“The Man-tier superior-grade martial art technique Shooting Star Punch? Jiang Bao, you…”
“人阶下品，应该不止吧？不说是地阶，最少也应该是人阶上品吧？”江逸暗暗琢磨了一下，就回道：“不是人阶下品。”

"Man-tier Inferior-grade - it surely can't be only at that level? To say nothing of being of earth-grade, but surely the elixirs should at least be of Man-tier superior-grade?" Jiang Yi hesitated for a while before replying, "They are not of Man-tier inferior-grade."
“什么不对？”
"What's wrong?"
“什么事情这么急？”林立有些愕然，胖老头上午才来过图书馆，有什么事怎么当时不说？
"What's so urgent?" Lin Li was all ears. The fat old man had just came to the library in the morning, why hadn't he said anything then?
“什么事？”林立微微一愣，回过头来时，却看见一个四十来岁的瘦高中年人，正从口袋中拿出几枚金币。
"What?" Lin Li was slightly stunned. When he turned around, he saw a lanky middle-aged man in his forties taking out a few gold coins from his pockets.
“什么人？”
"Who is it?"
“什么原因？”
"What is it?"
“什么地方？”
“What place is it?”
“什么好象，那根本就是神之金属，我的天！整整二十几块，这小法师是不是刚刚打劫过一头龙？”这家伙倒是猜对了一半，林立确实刚扫荡过一处龙穴，只不过在扫荡龙穴的同时，他还顺手干掉了毁灭之龙阿扎达斯而已。

"Look like? These are the divinity metals. Oh, God! More than twenty pieces, did this low-level mage just rob a dragon?“ The guy had guessed it half right, Lin Li had indeed raided a dragon's lair. But at the same time while raiding the dragon's lair, he had finished off the Dragon of Destruction Azardas.
“什么怪物？你说清楚一点！”事关自己亲生女儿，罗麦格雷尼时急红了眼，瞪着克伦威尔的眼神中，再无先前那种带着一丝疏远的客气。
“What monster? Say it clearly!” McGrenn's eyes turned red with anxiety as it concerned his own daughter. He glared feverishly at Cromwell, his eyes void of the distant courtesy he had previously.
“什么情况？”
"What's the situation?"
“什么？”
“What?”
“什么？”林立脚下一个踉跄，差点摔在厚厚的地毯上，一脸难以置信的回过头来，盯着罗琳看了好半天之后，才吃力的重复着：“你……你想跟我学习药剂？”

"What?" Lin Li stumbled and nearly fell on the thick carpet. He turned around with a look of disbelief and stared at Rowling for a long while before repeating what she said with much difficulty, "You... You'd like to learn potion making from me?"
“什么？你不做工了？要外出三个月？”
"What? You are quitting? And leaving for three months?"
“今天的事，就这么算了，不过麦德林，你可别怪我没提醒过你，如果费雷在奥兰纳出了什么事的话，可别怪我找这家伙麻烦，到时候就算奥德文亲自来也没得商量，你听明白了没有？”

"I'll let today's affairs slide. But Medellin, don't say I didn't warn you. If anything happens to Felic in Alanna, don't blame me if I settle things with Hoeren. Even if Odwin himself comes, I am not open to negotiation. Do you understand?"
“今天，半个小时之后，所以我刚才才说，你要是再晚半个小时回来，我可能会被葛瑞安叔叔给揍死。”凯文一张白净的脸上满是庆幸：“那天葛瑞安叔叔知道你把自己关在房里之后，他就说你会在今天完成最后的突破，所以新的拍卖日子就被定在了今天。”

"Today, half an hour later. That's why I said earlier on that if you'd returned half an hour later, I would have been beat to death by Uncle Gerian." Kevin's fair face was full of rejoice. "That day, when Uncle Gerian knew you had locked yourself in the room, he had said that you will complete your last breakthrough today. So, the new auction date has been set to today."
“今晚可就没办法了，只能先在附近将就一下。”罗麦格雷尼车熟路的带着众人往前走去，很快就找到了一座山洞。
“It'll be impossible to reach it tonight, we'll just have to make do with whatever we have nearby." McGrenn led them forward and very soon they found a cave.
“从这一次拍卖开始，奥法药剂的数量将会提高到三瓶。”凯文手上的锤重重落在台上：“底价五万，五千一加，竞价开始！”

"From this auction onwards, the number of Arcane Magic Potion will be increased to three bottles." The gavel in Kevin's hand landed heavily on the table. "The starting bid will be 50,000, and the minimum increment 5,000. Let the bidding begin!"
“他年纪还没凯文大吧？”
"He's not older than Kevin, right?"
“他是我亲叔叔……”凯文一脸苦笑：“别说踹我房门，就算打我一顿，我也只能忍着……”
"He's my uncle..." Kevin smiled bitterly. "Not just kicking my door, even if he beats me, I can only bear with it..."
“他没跟我说什么事，就光是叫你去一趟。”
"He didn't say why, just asked you to come."
“他被马迪亚斯打伤了？马森……你能不能告诉我，马迪亚斯打伤他什么地方了？”
"He was injured by Mathias? Marson... could you tell me where Mathias injured him?"
“令牌！”
The token!
“价格倒是不贵，大概三四百金币的样子，现在这个价格，很难买到象这样的法杖了。”
"It's not too expensive, around three to four hundred gold coins. It's hard to get a staff like this with this price nowadays."
“伊娜你别激动，有什么事慢慢说。”听到长腿美女的哭声，林立真是头都大了，连忙小心的安抚道：“你先告诉我，麦格雷尼先生究竟怎么了？”
"Calm down first, Ina. Tell me slowly." Lin Li was at a loss hearing the cries from the long-legged beauty. He hurriedly pacified her, "Tell me first, what exactly happened to Mr McGrenn?"
“伊娜！”毕竟是父女连心，罗麦格雷尼见女儿痛哭，站在树下更着急得不行。
“Ina!” They were father and daughter after all, and McGrenn was as anxious as ever watching Ina wailing from under the tree.
“伊娜！”见麦格雷尼父女安然无恙，热心魔法师大吃一惊，抓走伊娜那怪物实在太强大了，速度就象闪电一样，瞬间见自己打倒在地，同时抢走了伊娜，他怎么也想不到，三人竟能安然无恙的救回伊娜。

"Ina!" The zealous mage was surprised seeing McGrenn and his daughter came back in one piece. The monster that had taken Ina was too powerful. It had the speed of lightning, sending him to the ground and snatching Ina away in the blink of an eye. Never had he expected the two of them to bring Ina back to safety.
“伊娜，你乖乖听话，姐姐一定能想到办法治好麦格雷尼先生的。”红发美女有些无奈的哄完伊娜，一双秋水般的美目又望向了林立：“我警告你，不要打伊娜的主意，不然就算葛瑞安亲自来也不一定能保住你。”

"Ina, be good and listen. I will find the way to cure Mr McGrenn." The redheaded beauty turned her autumn-like eyes to Lin Li after coaxing Ina. "Let me warn you, don't try to hit on Ina. If not, even if Gerian comes, he may not be able to save you."
“伊娜，你先带我去看看麦格雷尼先生，现在我一时半会，也想不出什么办法来。”
"Ina, bring me to Mr McGrenn first. I can't think of any solution yet."
“会……会长大人？”那迟钝的魔法师终于是想起了，自己身边坐着的是什么人，一时间只觉得身上冷汗直冒，拼命扯着脸皮，挤出了一个比哭还难看的笑容：“呵……呵呵，你们怎么这么紧张？开……开个玩笑而已……”

"P-President?" That slow-witted mage finally remembered whom he was sitting nearby. All at once he felt cold sweat breaking out all over his body, and tried to pull his face into a smile that was uglier than crying. "Heh... Heh heh, why are all of you so nervous? It was just... just a joke..."
“会不会……他们也有魔法师出手？”
"Could it be... They, too, have mages helping them?"
“会长大人，我们发誓，我们真的不认识他！”
"President, we swear we really don't know him!"
“伯恩塞……”老法师话刚出口，就知道自己上当了，不过这老家伙也是一个人才，眼珠子一转，就生生把这句话给扭了过去：“恩……伯恩塞德给我提了一点意见，我觉得还不错，就勉强采纳了。”

"Burnside..." Once the old mage finished speaking, he realised that he had been tricked. However, he was also shrewd. In a blink of an eye, he twisted his sentence: "Mmm... Burnside gave me some suggestions which I thought were pretty good, so I took his advice."
“住手！”
"Stop!"
“你……”中年冒险者怎么也没想到，自己最担心的问题，竟然如此简单的就得到了解决，再想起林立这一路上的帮助，这个拙于言辞的中年人，一时间都不知道该说什么才好了，只是一直不断重复着：“谢谢，谢谢……”

"You..." The middle-aged adventurer had not expected that the problem he was so worried about could be solved so easily. Thinking of all the help Lin Li had rendered them along the way, the middle-aged man who was bad at words didn't know what else to say for a long while. He merely repeated, "Thank you, thanks..."
“你……你……你究竟是人还是魔兽？”凯文问得小心翼翼，好象生怕林立忽然变成一头魔兽扑上来似的。
"You... You... Are you a human or a monster?" Kevin asked cautiously, as if afraid that Lin Li would turn into a demonic beast and pounce on him.
“你……你在干什么？”看着这古怪的一幕，眼中还带着泪花的红发美女，又忍不住怯怯的出声询问。
Looking at the bizarre scene in front of her, the redheaded beauty, with tears still in her eyes, could not help but ask timidly, "What... What are you doing?"
“你……你真的是费雷？”
"Are... Are you really Felic?"
“你不用认识我。”巴瑟罗尔神色间依旧充满了优越感：“当然——你也没资格认识我，象你这样的小魔法师，有机会走进这间宴会大厅已经是天大的荣幸，为什么还不懂得自重？在纠缠罗琳小姐之前，你就没有先照照镜子，看清楚自己是什么身份吗？”

"You don't have to know me." Bathrilor's expression was still full of superiority. "Of course, you're not qualified to know me as well. A small mage like you should feel utterly honored to be able to step foot into this banquet hall. Why do you not know what is self-respect? Do you not look at the mirror to see what your status is before you pester Miss Rowling?"
“你不能冤枉我……葛瑞安……你没有证据……”
"You can't malign me... Gerian... You have no proof..."
“你不要紧吧，这都学不会？”林立一副恨铁不成钢的表情，更是让安度因无地自容：“那你还不赶紧回药剂室去，在这磨磨蹭蹭的干什么，难道你还想让我再演示一遍？”

“Are you alright? Why haven't you been able to master it yet?” Lin Li’s expression that clearly expected better from Andoine made him wish he had a hole to crawl into. “So, what are you waiting there for instead of going back to the lab? Do you need my demonstration again?”
“你不觉得自己应该向罗琳小姐道个歉吗？”
"Don't you think you should apologize to Miss Rowling?"
“你也对那块谜蓝宝石有兴趣？”葛瑞安微微一愣，他对这小子实在是太了解了，他一直以为，就算全世界的魔法师都需要谜蓝宝石，这小子也绝不会用到，等级认证大厅里的一幕，给他留下的印象实在是太深刻了，长达二十八分钟的全力输出，这完全已经超越了怪物的范畴，只能以妖孽来形容！

"You're also interested in the Enigma Sapphire?" Gerian was slightly taken aback. He knew the kid too well. He had always thought that even if all the mages in the world would need the Enigma Sapphire, this kid wouldn't have a use for it. The scene at the level certification hall had left too deep an impression on him. A magic output of 28 minutes long was absolutely beyond the scope of a monster, and could only be described as a demon’s!
“你也感觉到了？”看见林立脸上的疑惑，葛瑞安笑着说道：“真要严格说起来，这家伙其实算不上是一个真正的魔法师，他是一个咒术师！”
"You felt it too?" Gerian chuckled as he saw the bewildered look on Lin Li's face. "Strictly speaking, this fellow is not really a real mage. He's actually a conjurer!"
“你们……”林立张了张嘴，想要劝劝马森跟欧灵，这毕竟是跟一个十七级大魔导师作对，一个不慎就会有粉身碎骨的危险。
"You guys..." Lin Li opened his mouth to warn Marson and Orrin that since they were up against a level-seventeen archmage, one careless mistake could have disastrous and fatal effects.
“你们两个……”走到半路，葛瑞安似乎又想起来了，不过犹豫了一下，还是有些无奈冲那两个倒霉法师挥了挥手：“算了，赶紧有多远给我死多远……”
"You two..." Halfway in his strides, Gerian seemed to recall, but after a moment of hesitation, he waved to the two unlucky mages. "Forget it, scram as far as you can..."
“你们两个，是洛特丹的欧灵，和千帆城的马森吧？”霍伦脸上露出了一丝轻蔑的笑意：“怎么，你们也想跟他一起住进地牢吗？”
"The two of you are Orrin from Rotterdam and Marson from the City of Sails, right?" A contemptuous smile appeared on Hoeren's face. "What's wrong, do you want to enter the dungeon with him?"
“你们快看，那东西好象是传说中的神之金属啊！”
"Look, these look like the legendary divinity metals!"
“你们怎么全都这表情？”
"What's with the expression?"
“你们身上还有多少钱，要不我们大家凑一凑，把这项链买下来算了，到时候大家轮流着用……”
"How much do you guys have? Why don’t we gather our money and acquire the necklace for ourselves, then everyone can take turns using it..."
“你们还真看得起自己……”林立瞟了一眼那几个如临大敌的玩家，心想老子吃饱了撑的才会拿许愿术卷轴来对付你们，也不称称自己几斤几两，你们值这个价钱吗？

"You think too highly of yourselves..." Lin Li glanced at the players who looked as if they met their mortal enemy. Did he have nothing else to do other than using the scroll of Wishes on them? Couldn't they weigh themselves and decide if they were worth the price?
“你们都这么看着我干嘛……另外凯文，你要失望的话，应该是对那老家伙失望。”林立有些无奈的摇了摇头，慢腾腾的从口袋里摸出一只天蓝色的瓶子：“要是脑子没被打坏的话，早就该找人帮忙了，真以为大魔导士就能通吃加洛斯城啊……”

"Why are you all looking at me like that... Also Kevin, if you're to be disappointed, you should be disappointed in that old fellow." Lin Li shook his head resignedly, and slowly pulled out a sky-blue bottle from his pockets. "If his brain wasn't damaged, he would have asked for help long ago. Does he really think that he could take the whole of Jarrosus City being an archmage..."
“你先坐下来，听我慢慢给你说……”林立硬是把葛瑞安拉回座位，这才又继续开口说道：“你说你也是一把年纪的人了，怎么火气还这么大，太容易激动很伤身体的……老实跟你说吧，这笔生意不划算。”

"Sit down first, I'll explain to you slowly..." Lin Li pulled Gerian back to his seat and continued, "Say, you're an old man, how could you still have such a big temper? It'll hurt your health if you get too agitated easily... To tell you the truth, it doesn't pay for this business."
“你凭什么带走费雷？”马森往前一站，将林立护在身后，脸上的神色竟是异常坚定。
"What evidence do you have to arrest Felic?" Marson stepped forward to protect Lin Li behind him. His expression was unusually firm.
“你到底有没有教养？我跟凯文魔法师的谈话内容，属于梅林家族与魔法公会之间的机密，你是什么身份？刚刚混进魔公会没几天，就不知道自己姓什么了是吧？连这样的机密都敢偷听，还不马上滚开？”最让凯文头大的是，克伦威尔完全不知道自己在干什么，仍在不知死活的叫嚣着。

"Do you have manners at all? The things I’ve discussed with Mage Kevin were top secrets that belonged to the Merlin Family and the Guild of Magic. What's your status now? Have you forgotten your name after worming your way into the Guild of Magic, having the guts to eavesdrop on our top secrets? Won't you scram yet?" What made Kevin troubled was Cromwell not knowing what he was doing as he continued his reckless clamor.
“你只有十分钟的时间，如果等我完成这瓶蛮力药剂之后，发现你还没收拾好东西离开的话，那你可就别怪我这老家伙赶人了。”林立这边还没做出决定，门外的老头却毫不客气的赶起人来。

"You only have ten minutes. If I find that you're still not packed and gone by the time I complete this bottle of Bull's Strength potion, don't blame me for chasing you out." Lin Li had yet to come to a decision on his part, but the old man outside the door was not at all polite, directly chasing him out.
“你听我慢慢跟你说……”麦德林把安度因拉到一个僻静的角落，这才慢慢说起林立的锻造天赋，又说起魔法公会跟冒险者公会之间的赌约。
"Listen to me..." Medellin pulled Andoine to a quiet corner before slowly talking about Lin Li's forging talent. He also told him about the bet between the Guild of Magic and the Adventurers Guild.
“你在这里等我一下。”
"Wait a second for me here."
“你对那个年轻魔法师知道多少？”从老梅林脸上的神色看来，倒是没有太多责备的意思。
"How much do you know about that young mage?" There was not much reproach from the look on Old Merlin's face.
“你少做梦了！就我们几个这点钱，加起来还不够买只瓶子的，恩，买个瓶盖可能够了……”
"Dream on! With that little money we have it's not enough to buy a bottle. Hmm, probably enough to buy a bottle cap..."
“你就吹吧，魔法公会这几年是个什么光景，大家谁不知道？药剂师公会那些家伙，可个个都是眼睛长在头顶上的，他们要能挖来药剂师，我就能把翡翠高塔塔尖给啃掉！”

"Brag all you want. Who doesn't know what the Guild of Magic have been like these years. The fellows from the Pharmacists Guild have their eyes on top of their heads; if they could poach a pharmacist from them, I can chew off the spire of the Emerald Tower!"
“你帽子歪了……”
"Your hat is tilted..."
“你应该感谢我才对。”林立说着，从口袋里掏出信封递了过去：“你看，要不是我躲在外面，又哪有机会帮你收情书？”

"You should thank me." Lin Li took out the envelope from his pockets as he spoke, "Look, if it weren't for me hiding at a side, how would I have the opportunity to receive this love letter on your behalf?"
“你得了吧，虽然陪练对战时双方封印了元力，但里面那群公子小姐，哪个不是铸鼎境五六重以上？就算不动用元力，凭借反应速度和武技也可以轻松把你揍成猪头。昨天我那个铸鼎境三重的表哥就去陪练了一天，最后却是爬着出来了，此刻还在家里养伤呢。那群公子小姐下手太狠了，这钱不好赚啊……”

"Alright, that's enough. Although both sparring parties have their essence force sealed off from use during sparring practice, that group of young masters and young mistresses... which one of them does not have a power level at the fifth or sixth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, or even higher?
"Even if they don't use any essence force, they can easily beat you to a pulp just by relying on their reaction speed and martial arts techniques alone. Yesterday, my cousin, whose power level is at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, went to be a sparring partner for a day, but in the end, he left the place crawling.
"At this moment he is still healing his injuries at home! Those young masters and young mistresses are too ruthless in their combat actions! This money is not easy to earn at all..."
“你忍了这么多年，早就想教训我了吧？”身处巨大的压力之下，葛瑞安脸上的神态却依旧从容。
"You had long wanted to teach me a lesson after putting up with me for so many years, right?" Gerian's manner was calm as before even in the midst of immense pressure.
“你怎么会让他进来的？”红发美女语气间有些不满，只是看见伊娜那无辜的眼神，那一丝不满也就变成了无奈：“伊娜……姐姐跟你说过好多次了，麦格雷尼先生的病，不是一般人能治好的，如果魔法师有用的话，姐姐早就帮你去找了……”

"Why did you let him in?" The redheaded beauty had some discontent in her tone, but when she saw Ina's innocent eyes, that trace of discontentment turned into a helpless one. "Ina... I've told you many times, Mr McGrenn's illness cannot be cured by an average person. If mages are of use I would have looked for one for you..."
“你想要证据？”葛瑞安想了一下，不得不承认：“好吧，老子确实拿不出证据来，不过没关系，老子这是寻仇，寻仇是不需要证据的……”
"You want proof?" Gerian pondered for a while and had to admit, "Alright. I really don't have any proof. But it's okay. I am seeking revenge, and seeking revenge does not need any proof..."
“你才想找刺激，你全家都想找刺激！”林立望着虚掩的房门，悻悻的在心头骂了一句，只是骂完却又犯起愁来，穿越已经成了事实，可自己对这个完全陌生的世界，却是连一点最基本的概念都没有，从哪里来回哪里去，我倒是想回去，可是怎么回去？

You're the one looking for thrill, your whole family is looking for thrill! Lin Li stared at the unlatched door as he cursed bitterly in his heart. It was only after cursing that he felt sorrowful again. Time travelling had became his reality, but this was an entirely foreign world and he had not grasped even the most basic concepts of it. To go back where he had came from... He'd like to go back indeed, but how?
“你把人带走吧……”
"Bring him away..."
“你拿着这封信，到加洛斯城魔法师协会，找一个叫葛瑞安的人，他会帮你安排好一切。”安度因将那厚厚的信封递给林立：“对了，你的身份似乎也有些问题，不过不要紧，如果你不想在使用原来的身份，你可以使用我帮你准备好的这个，资料放在信封里，你自己抽空背熟就行了。”

“Take this letter to the Jarrosus City’s Guild of Magic and look for someone by the name of Gerian. He will help you to arrange everything.” Andoine handed the thick envelope to Lin Li. “By the way, there seems to be some problem with your identify. It won’t matter, because if you don’t wish to use your original identity, you can use the one I have prepared for you. The information is in the envelope. You just have to take time to memorize it.”
“你教他的？”林立有些奇怪的看了葛瑞安一眼，这老头什么时候学得这么聪明了，居然还会玩二桃杀三士的把戏。
"You taught him?" Lin Li glanced at Gerian strangely. When did the old man learn to be so clever, knowing to play the game of killing three warriors with two peaches.
“你有什么愿望？”
"What is your wish?"
“你有内幕？”一看葛瑞安那表情，林立就知道这老头肯定有一些内幕消息。
"You have insider information?" Lin Li knew the old man had to have some insider information judging from the look on his face.
“你有毛病……”林立暗自抹了把汗，这种借口大概也只有葛瑞安才想得出来……
"You're sick..." Lin Li wiped his sweat off secretly. Only Gerian could come up with this kind of excuse...
“你有种！”葛瑞安一声怒吼，那水蓝色光幕瞬间被撑到了极限，紧接着一双胖手结出一个奇异的手势，刹时间就是一股魔法元素从地下涌出。

"You've got guts!" Gerian let out a furious bellow, and the blue water curtain was instantly stretched to its limit. He made a strange gesture with his fat hands, and all at once magical elements came pouring out from the ground.
“你有线索了？”
"You have a clue?"
“你没纠缠罗琳小姐？难道你还想告诉我，是罗琳小姐来纠缠你不成？”巴瑟罗尔对林立的狡辩嗤之以鼻，英俊白皙的面容上，更是充满了不屑的笑容。
"You didn't pester Miss Rowling? Are you going to tell me that Miss Rowling was the one pestering you?" Bathrilor scoffed at Lin Li's excuse, and his handsome face was full with a disdainful smirk.
“你用什么保证？”
"How are you going to keep your secret?"
“你用的什么借口？”
"What excuse did you give?"
“你病得还不轻，要不我给你开点药？”
"You're very ill, do you want me to prescribe some medicine for you?"
“你看清楚外面的字没有？这里是私人仓库，你一个小号跑来凑什么热闹？”说话的是个四十来级的战士，身后跟着四五名玩家，看上去似乎是某个小团体的头头。

"Didn't you see the words outside clearly? This is a private warehouse, what is a low-level player like you doing here?" The words came from a level forty-something warrior who was followed by a group of four or five players. He seemed to be the leader of their small team.
“你确定？”老梅林一只脚踏上台阶，克伦威尔就躺在离他不远的地方，但此时老梅林却连看都没看他一眼，一支青色法杖遥遥指着葛瑞安，杖头上镶嵌的硕大魔晶正散发出蒙蒙的青色火焰。

"You sure?" Old Merlin placed a foot on the step. Cromwell lay not far from where he stood, but Old Merlin did not even look at him. He pointed his green staff at Gerian, the huge magical crystal that was embedded at the tip of the staff emitting a misty green flame.
“你站住！冒犯了罗琳小姐，你就想这么走掉？”巴瑟罗尔义愤填膺，一伸手拦住了正准备离去的林立。
"Stop there! You're leaving after having offended Miss Rowling?" Bathrilor was filled with just anger, and he stretched out his hand to block Lin Li who was ready to leave.
“你笑什么笑！”克伦威尔那白净的面庞扭曲得厉害，一双通红的眼睛死死盯着林立，那神态那表情，就好象是想把林立生吞活剥一样。

"What are you laughing at!" Cromwell's fair face was badly contorted, and a pair of gleaming red eyes were fixed on Lin Li in a glare. That bearing and expression looked as though he was about to devour Lin Li alive.
“你觉得，给他五万金币怎么样？”
"What do you think of giving him 50,000 gold coins?"
“你认为魔法是什么？”安度因没有解释，而是问了这样一个问题。
"What is magic to you?" Andoine did not explain, but instead posed a question.
“你说我是庸医！”红发美女杏目圆睁，绝美的面容上带着一丝难以置信的神色，她出身本就显赫，又有一身强大的实力，从小到大除了老师之外，谁敢对她说一句重话？自从开设医馆之后，更是救了不知多少人的性命，从来只有夸她医术高超的，又有谁曾说过她是庸医？

"You called me a quack!" The redheaded beauty's apricot eyes were wide open, and a look of disbelief came across her face. She was born illustrious and possessed strong abilities. Since young, no one had dared to say a single harsh word to her except her teachers. Since the opening of the hospital, countless lives had been saved by her. There had only been words praising her superb medical skills, and no one had ever told her she was a quack.
“你赢了。”
"You win."
“你还别嫌贵，要不是老梅林还算有点面子，这价格就算再加一倍，他都还不一定能买到。”葛瑞安趁着这个机会，赶紧给林立扫起盲来，免得这小子总是大惊小怪的，伸出胖手指了指身旁的几名魔法师：“你再看看这几个废柴，谁身上的装备脱下来不值个十万八万的，魔法师这个职业就是这样，全靠金钱砸出来，当然——你这怪物除外，妈的老子就没见你买过装备！”

"Don't feel that it's too expensive yet. If not for Old Merlin's reputation, he might not even get it for double the price." Gerian took advantage of the opportunity to educate Lin Li lest the kid was always making a fuss about small things. He stretched out his chubby hand and pointed to the few mages beside. "And look at these useless bums, the gear they wear is worth at least 80,000 or even 100,000. A mage is such a profession, it all depends on spending money. Of course, except for a monster like you. Damn it I have never seen you buy a piece of equipment before!"
“你还敢问我是什么意思？”安度因的声音中充满了愤怒，刚才要不是自己凑巧赶到，霍伦一个十五级魔法轰下去，费雷又哪还可能有命在？
"You still have to guts to ask what does this mean?" Andoine's voice was full of anger. If it were not for his timely arrival, how would Felic still survive under the force of level-fifteen magic?
“你还有什么事吗？”
"Anything else?"
“你还来？”林立吓了一跳：“再被你搞两下，这家伙就得吓死了……”
"You're still going to do it?" Lin Li gave a start. "Another trick by you and this guy will die of scare..."
“你还真打算去？”安度因不由一愣，难道自己说得还不够明白，自己已经在那地方呆了两三天了，就算有龙安眠晶，也早被自己找出来了，这小子怎么还急冲冲的打算赶过去？

"Are you really planning to go?" Andoine could not help but be dumbfounded. Did he not understand that he spent two to three days searching for the crystal? Even if there were any more crystals, he would have already found them. Was he really desperate to go there?
“你连这里是什么地方都不知道？”平平常常的一个问题，却让白袍老人瞪大了眼睛。
"You don't even know this place?" The question was nothing out of the ordinary, but the old man stared with eyes wide open.
“你错了，易剑！”
"You're wrong, Yi Jian!"
“你难道没发现吗，这两次她都是在十几万的时候，突然将价格提到二十万，这应该是想吓退对手，可惜吓得不太成功，如果我没猜错的话，她手上的现金，应该是刚好二十万金币，这一点我能看出来，其他魔法家族一样能看出来，你看着吧，如果她接下来再参与竞争的话，肯定有人直接二十万秒她。”

"Didn't you realize? Both times when the price was at tens of thousand she would raise it to 200,000 all of a sudden. She should be trying to scare off the opponent, but to little avail. If my guess is correct, she only has exactly 200,000 gold coins with her. If I can see this, the other mage families can see it as well. Just look, if she participates in the next contest again, someone would surely second-kill her with a direct 200,000."
“你！”巴瑟罗尔的脸色僵住了，那种高高在上的笑容，在忽然之间变得有些狰狞，林立的话就象一记耳光，狠狠的抽在了他脸上，一生处于顺境的巴瑟罗尔，还从未试过如此狼狈，短暂的愕然之后，怒火瞬间吞没了他仅有的理智。

"You!" Bathrilor's expression froze; that high and mighty smile turned hideous at once. Lin Li's words were like a slap, smacking severely on his face. Bathrilor, who had lived in prosperity all his life, had never been so discomfited before. After a brief stupor, anger instantly engulfed his reason.
“修炼速度？”
"Refining speed?"
“修炼！修炼！”
"Cultivate! Cultivate!"
“修炼！修炼，我要不断练出黑色元力，把这封印完全破开！”
"Refine! Refine! I want to continuously refine black essence force, so that I can completely break this seal!"
“修炼！试验！再修炼一些，一定要多试几次。”
"Cultivate! Experiment! I must cultivate and try a few more times."
“修炼，继续破解封印！明日清点药田后，再去城中转转，看看怎么赚钱还债。”

"I have to continue cultivation practice, and continue breaking my seal! Tomorrow, after I take stock in the medicinal plantations, I will stroll around the city and see if there are any more ways to make money to pay off my debts. "
“像，像，和昨日的两枚地品丹药很像啊！啧啧，地品丹药，这得多少钱一枚？或许……我将这三枚丹药卖了，就能值十两紫金？”

"Similar, similar, they looks very similar to the two earth-grade elixirs from yesterday! Tsk, Tsk! Earth-grade elixirs, how much does one pill cost? Perhaps...if I sell these three elixir pills, would they be worth ten taels of purple gold?"
“元魂丹、灵神丹、黑参丹、元力丹、黄参丹……”
"Essence Soul Pills, Spirit Pills, Black Ginseng Elixirs, Essence Force Pills, Yellow Ginseng Elixirs..."
“先前我记得葛瑞安先生说过，如果现金不足的话，允许用同等价值的物品代替，现在我想请葛瑞安先生鉴定一下，这件东西究竟值多少金币。”

"I remembered Mr Gerian had said that if cash is not enough, we will be allowed to replace it with items of equivalent value. Now, I would like Mr Gerian to evaluate how much gold coins this item is actually worth."
“先生们女士们！加洛斯有史以来最为盛大的一次拍卖会即将开始！”平日里木讷老实的凯文，第一次冒充拍卖师竟是丝毫不显怯场，言语间充满了直指人心的煽动性：“下面将要拍卖的，将是一个不折不扣的奇迹，一个由本公会药剂大师费雷先生创造的奇迹！”

"Ladies and gentlemen! The biggest auction ever held in Jarrosus is about to commence!" Kevin, who was usually stoic and honest, showed no signs of stage fright acting as an auctioneer for the first time and his words were full of incitement. "What will be auctioned next will be nothing less than a miracle, a miracle created by the guild's potion master, Mr Felic!"
“克伦威尔先生……”刚刚还心情愉快的凯文，怎么也没有想到，事情竟会在忽然之间发展到这个地步，等到他反应过来想要阻止时，却根本来不及了，克伦威尔目光凶恶，神情扭曲，激动的唾沫，甚至已经喷到了林立脸上……

"Mr Cromwell..." Kevin was just feeling elated earlier on, and had never imagined this was how things would progress in the blink of an eye. When realization finally hit him and he was about to step in as a prevention, things were already too late. Cromwell's eyes were fiendish, his expression contorted. His agitated outburst rained spittle on Lin Li's face...
“八万吧。”林立在心里算了一下，最后还是决定再提点价格：“那家伙手里，估计也就二十万金币，给得太少了，我怕他争不过小偷头子，这条项链我志在必得！”

"80,000." Lin Li did some calculations in his heart and decided to raise the price. "I reckon that fellow only has 200,000 gold coins in his hands. If we give too little to him, I'm afraid he won't have a chance against the thief leader. I have to get this necklace!"
“八万金币！”
"80,000 gold coins!"
“八十万！”
“八千金币？”林立有点茫然，身为一名穿越者，他对安瑞尔世界的金钱实在没什么概念，只得扭过头去，向凯文投去求助的目光。
"8000 gold coins?" Lin Li was bewildered. Being a time traveller, he had no idea about money in the world of Anril. He had to turn his head around and ask Kevin for help.
“六十五万！”
“六大地下势力就不说了，几乎全加洛斯赚钱的生意，都控制在他们手上，不过比起十一魔法家族来，他们只不过是一群暴发户，老梅林你是见过的，知道他手上那根法杖用了多少钱吗？”提起老梅林那根法杖，葛瑞安眼中满是羡慕：“一百万金币！”

"We won't talk about the six underground forces. Almost all the lucrative businesses in Jarrosus are in their hands. But compared to the 11 mage families, they are merely a group of nouveau riche. You've seen Old Merlin; do you know how much the staff he was holding cost?" At the mention of Old Merlin's staff, Gerian's eyes were full of envy. "A million gold coins!"
“关你叉事……”正全神贯注的林立压根就不理她，毫不客气的骂了一句之后，又将梦境花放进烧杯之内。
"None of your damned business..." Lin Li, who was completely absorbed, paid no attention to her. After cursing rudely, he added the dreampetal into the beaker.
“关我叉事！”葛瑞安两眼一瞪，答得毫无责任心：“等你把公会败光的时候，说不定老子都已经挂掉了，我死后管他洪水滔天……”

"None of my damned business!" Gerian's eyes were wide open as he answered with no sense of responsibility at all. "By the time you lose the guild I'll probably already be dead. Why would I still care about whatever flood there is after I die..."
“其实也不是什么大事……”安度因有些尴尬的搓了搓手：“你也知道的，我这几天运气不怎么好，药剂实验一连发生了好几次事故，这几次事故虽然不是很严重，却让我损失了相当多的材料。”

"Actually, it's not a big deal..." Andoine rubbed his hands embarrassedly. "You know, I've been unlucky these days. There have been many accidents in the lab for a few days in a row. Although the accidents weren't serious, it had cost me a lot of ingredients."
“其实也算不上什么内幕，这事大半个加洛斯城都知道。”葛瑞安声音中透出几分忌惮：“在这加洛斯城里，除了马修斯那老贱人之外，我最忌惮的其实就是鲁本，不过这家伙小时候其实真没什么魔法天赋，都二十几岁了还只是四级学徒，那时候别说我们这些外人，就连他老爹都已经放弃他了。”

"Actually, it's not really an insider information, almost half of Jarrosus City knows about it." There was some fear in Gerian's voice. "In Jarrosus City, other than Matthew, that old bastard, Reuben is the one I fear most. But this fellow didn't have any magical gift when he was young. He was still a level-four apprentice at 20. At that time, not to mention us, even his father had given up on him.

“其实原因太简单了。”林立满意的笑了笑，这才老实不客气的坐到藤椅上开讲：“蛮牛之力药剂一共四种主要材料，龙血草，千结藤，噩梦花，巨魔之血，这四种材料虽然有着很强烈的药性冲突，但相互间却又可以维持微妙的平衡，稍稍添加一些辅助材料增强药性并不是不可以，但是加入智慧之树树叶这种东西，我就只能说你太天才了，智慧之树树叶虽然常常用平衡药物冲突，但它的另一个作用却是稳定心神，你把稳定心神的药材放进身体强化药剂里，跟把一只猫放进老鼠笼子有什么区别？”

"Actually, the reason is too simple." Lin Li smiled in contentment. He took a sit on the vine chair and began, "There are four main ingredients for the Bull's Strength potion. They are the Dragon's Blood, Thousand-knot Vine, Nightmare Flower, and the Troll's Blood. The medicinal properties of the ingredients clash with one another, but there is a delicate balance between them. It is not wrong to add some supplementary ingredients to improve its medicinal properties, but something like the leaves of Wisdom Tree... I can only say you're too smart for your own good. Although the leaves are usually used to balance the conflict between ingredients, its other effect is to calm the mind. Putting a herb with calming effects into a potion that strengthens the body is like putting a cat into a rat's cage.
“内奸！”葛瑞安咬牙切齿的下了判断：“绝对是出了内奸！”
"Mole!" Gerian made his judgment with clenched teeth. "There’s definitely a mole!"
“再来！”
"I'll try it again!"
“再等等看。”林立稍稍犹豫了一下：“如果明天早上还没有消息的话，我们就必须去一趟屠魔山谷。”
"We'll wait and see." Lin Li hesitated slightly. "If there is still no news by tomorrow morning, we’ll have to make a trip down to Demon Fall Valley."
“再见伊娜。”
“Goodbye, Ina."
“再试试！”
"Let me try this again!"
“凯文先生，请稍等一下。”伊瑟拉－曼尼斯没有继续出价，而是向凯文申请了暂停：“我记得葛瑞安会长曾经说过，如果现金上有困难的话，是可以用东西来代替的，是这样吗凯文先生？”

"Mr Kevin, please hold for a moment." Ysera Mannes did not continue his bid, but requested for a break instead. "I remembered President Gerian said that if we’re tight on cash, we could use items to replace it. Is that right, Mr Kevin?"
“凯文可以。”
"Kevin."
“凯文哥哥！宴会上可一定要请人家跳第一支舞哦……”偏偏这阿姨还一个劲的往他身上挤，直挤得凯文寒毛都要竖起来了，他现在真是连肠子都快悔青了，为什么要答应来参加这个宴会……

"Brother Kevin! You have to invite me for a dance at the banquet later..." The aunty was still pushing herself on him so hard that Kevin felt the hair on his body rise. He was utterly regretful that he had agreed to attend the banquet now...
“凯文哥哥，你怎么这么久都不来找人家……”凯文口中正客气的敷衍着胖商人，却不防一个又娇又嗲的声音从身后传来，惊吓之余回头望去，正看见一名三十多岁的贵妇，正挺着丰胸往自己身上挤。

"Brother Kevin, why have you not visited me for so long..." Kevin was politely playing along with the businessman when suddenly an affectedly sweet voice rang out from behind. He turned around in shock and saw a lady in her thirties pressing forward with her full bosom.
“凯文魔法师，好久不见！”
"Mage Kevin, long time no see!"
“凯文魔法师，您不认识我了？我是你罗德叔叔啊，就是十几年前还来过魔法公会的那个罗德，那时候我还抱过你呢，想不到这才十几年没见，你都长这么高了……”一名圆滚滚的商人望着凯文，目光中充满了慈祥与欣慰。

"Mage Kevin, you don't recognize me? I'm your Uncle Rode. I came to the Guild of Magic about ten years ago. I even carried you in my arms then. To think you've grown so tall after not having seen you for more than a decade..." A chubby businessman looked at Kevin with kindness and relief.
“凯文！”胖老头一上楼，就扯开嗓子喊了起来：“凯文你个懒货，赶紧给我死出来！有事情做了！”
"Kevin!" the old man screamed as he got to the second floor. "You lazy punk, get out here! There are things to do!"
“凯文，你被葛瑞安传染了，这么八卦……她现在人呢？”
"Kevin, you're infected by Gerian's nosiness... Where is she now?"
“刚……刚才……刚才我跟伊娜去打水的时候，旁边忽然冒出一只怪物！它它它……它把伊娜给……”
“Just… just now… just now when I went with Ina to fetch the water, a monster suddenly emerged from the side! It... it... it took Ina..."
“刚刚指点安度因大师的那个家伙，真的是费雷？”
"Is the one who was instructing Master Andoine really Felic?"
“刚去了会客室，他本来让我通知你，从等级认证大厅出来之后就去找他，可是我把这事给忘了……”
"He just went to the reception room. He had wanted me to tell you to look for him after you came out of the level certification hall, but I've forgotten about it..."
“刚才……刚才屠魔山谷那边传来消息，阴影之巢对屠魔山谷发动了一次偷袭，死了十几个魔法师，连葛瑞安叔叔都受了些伤。”凯文喘了两口气，总算是把事情说清楚了。

"Just now... Just now, there was news from Demon Fall Valley that Shadow's Nest had launched a sneak attack, killing a dozen mages and even injuring Uncle Gerian.“ Kevin gasped for breath, finally making things clear.
“刚才你出去得太急，有件事我忘了告诉你。”两人一路往翡翠高塔内走去，凯文在路上将事情交代了一遍：“奥法药剂的拍卖被推迟了！”

"You went out in a hurry just now so I had forgotten to tell you something." As they walked toward the Emerald Tower, Kevin explained the matter to Lin Li. "The auction for Arcane Magic Potion has been postponed!"
“刚才屠魔山谷那边传来消息，有重要的事情要叔叔过去一趟，现在差不多已经出加洛斯了吧。”
"News just came from the Demon Fall Valley, there's something important and they want Uncle to go over. He should almost be out of Jarrosus by now."
“刚才那个魔法师，究竟是什么人，你们又怎么会认识的？”罗琳擦去眼角的泪花，却忍不住对林立的身份有些好奇。
"That mage earlier on, who is he and how did you two meet?" Rowling wiped away the tears from the corner of her eyes, but couldn't contain her curiosity with regards to Lin Li's identity.
“刚醒刚醒……”知道这老家伙正在火头上，林立赶紧一翻身从床上爬了起来。
"I just woke up..." Lin Li knew that the old man was fuming, so he hurriedly turned over and climbed out of the bed.
“利维坦猩猩！”林立相信自己没有看错，这绝对是八级魔兽利维坦猩猩的脚印，早在山上的时候，他就曾经在安度因的小屋外见过一两次，只不过这种时候，老家伙总会轻描淡写的说，几个小痞子想来捣乱，被我给赶走了……

"Leviathan Gorilla!" Lin Li believed what he saw. These were definitely the footprints of level-eight magical beast, the Leviathan Gorilla. Back when he was living in the mountains, he had seen them once or twice outside Andoine's cabin, only that old man would always make light of them as a couple of little ruffians looking for trouble that were driven away by him.
“利维坦猩猩？”
“Leviathan Gorilla?”
“别开玩笑了，凯文见了我连腿都发软，公会谁能够服他？等你坐上我这个位子之后，让凯文给你帮帮忙倒是可以，这小子打下手还算是不错……”

"Don't kid me. Kevin turns weak in the legs whenever he sees me, how will the guild listen to him? After you've taken over my position, you can ask Kevin to help you out. He's pretty good at running errands..."
“别急别急，反正也不是现在就让你坐，只是我有这个想法而已，你先考虑考虑，要是过几年，你还不想坐，咱们到时候再说……”葛瑞安也知道不能逼他太紧，连连安慰了两句，眼珠一转又把话题转移开来：“除了这件事之外，其实还有一个原因……”

"Don't be anxious, it's not like I'm asking you to take over now. It's just my idea. You can think it over first, if in a few years' time you're still reluctant to take over, then we'll talk again..." Gerian knew not to push him too hard. He comforted him repeatedly and with a roll of his eyes he changed the subject. "Other than this, there's another reason..."
“别怪我不提醒你，你时间可不太多了，等那小子从药剂室出来，我真怕你哭都来不及……”
"Don't blame me for not reminding you. You don't have much time left. When that kid comes out of the potion lab, I'm really afraid that it'll be too late for you to cry..."
“别打了，大爷别打了……你就算打死小奴，我也不会签卖身契的……大爷别打了，我会想办法赔钱的……”
"Please stop beating me! Master, please stop… Even if you beat me to death, I won't sign the indenture contract… Master, please stop beating. I will think of a way to pay you back…"
“别担心，麦格雷尼先生会没事的。”林立安慰了伊娜两句，目光又挪到了麦格雷尼身上。
"Don't worry, Mr McGrenn will be fine," Lin Li consoled Ina before shifting his attention back onto McGrenn.
“别提了……”凯文挺清秀的一张脸憋成一团：“你都不知道这两天我是怎么过来的，从早到晚就没闲过一分钟，不停的有人来找葛瑞安叔叔，不停的有人来问他的病怎么样了，那个什么传染病的谎话，我说了没有一千次至少也有八百次了，我都怀疑我今晚做梦的时候，说的梦话会不会也是这一句……”

"Don't even mention..." Kevin's pretty face was smothered into a ball of worry. "You don't know how I managed to pull through these two days. I haven’t taken a break since morning. The people coming for Uncle Gerian were unceasing, everyone was asking how his illness was. I've told the lie about that infectious disease at least eight hundred times, if not a thousand. I've even come to suspect if I'll say the same things in my dreams..."
“到了加洛斯城之后，如果有什么事需要帮忙的话，可一定要跟我说一声，这次的事要不是多亏了你，我们父女两个可就……”对于林立的救命之恩，罗麦格雷尼旧是念念不忘。

“After we have reached Jarrosus City, feel free to contact me if you require any form of help. If it hadn’t been for you, my daughter and I would most likely have been…” McGrenn was immensely grateful to Lin Li for his life-saving grace.
“到底怎么回事？”林立急都快急死了，哪还有心情跟他问好。
"What exactly happened?" Lin Li was worried sick; he was not in the mood for any greetings.
“到底是什么原因？”
"What exactly is the reason?"
“到底是谁封印了我的丹田？这封印该如何破解？”
"Who on earth sealed my dantian? And how can I break this seal?"
“到时候你就知道了……”巴瑟罗尔的笑容中，似乎又浮起了那种毫不掩饰的优越感：“也许会被人揍一顿，然后赶出这场宴会，也许还会被踢出魔法公会，我想你的主人凯文魔法师，应该还不至于为了一个随从和艾萨克城主闹翻……”

"You'll know then..." The undisguised sense of superiority seemed to return in Bathrilor's smile. "You might get beaten up and then thrown out of this banquet. You might even get kicked out of the Guild of Magic. I think your master, Mage Kevin, would not choose to fall out with Castellan Isaac for an attendant..."
“前几天就已经找过了，可他们都说父亲的身体很健康。”伊娜眼中泪光闪烁，却拼命忍着不让它流下来。
"I've called for them a few days ago, but they all said that father is very healthy." Tears were brimming in Ina's eyes, but she fought hard not to let them fall.
“力量果然是增大不少，否则绝对砸不裂这青石板，至少有两马之力的加成！”
"My strength has indeed increased greatly. If not, I would be unable to split up the limestone slab. For me to split it means that my strike carries the force of two horses!"
“办好了。”
"Yes, it's done."
“加洛斯城城主艾萨克……”葛瑞安很是有些头大，又指了指他身后的那两名随从：“看到这两个家伙没有，艾利奥特，加洛斯最强战士，去年就已经突破了十四级，现在连我都没把握搞定他，还有那个，城主府首席魔法师安德鲁，除了老梅林跟我之外，这加洛斯魔法师里，估计就数他最狠。”

"The Castellan of Jarrosus City, Isaac..." Gerian's head began to throb. He pointed at the two attendants behind him. "See those two guys? One is Elliot, the strongest warrior in Jarrosus. He had made a clear breakthrough to level-fourteen last year, and till now I don't even have the confidence that I can win against him. And the other one is Andrew, Chief Mage of the Castellan Mansion. Besides Old Merlin and I, he's probably the most ruthless out of all mages in Jarrosus."
“十一万金币！”
"110,000 gold coins!"
“十万金币！”
"100,000 gold coins!"
“十万！”
“十两紫金？”
"Ten taels of purple gold?"
“十二万！”
“十五级以上魔晶我倒是有一枚，至于其他的……”
"I have a level-fifteen magical crystal, as for the others..."
“十四万！”
“十大天才？哪十个？”江逸好奇的问了一声。
"Top ten geniuses? Which ten?" Jiang Yi asked out of curiosity.
“十天！”
"Ten days!
“十瓶奥法药剂，底价十万金币，一万一加，竞价开始！”
"Ten bottles of Arcane Magic Potion, starting bid 100,000 gold coins. Let the bidding start!"
“十缕？这么少能干什么？”
"Ten strands? What can I do with so little?"
“千真万确。”
"Absolutely."
“千真万确！“
"It's the absolute truth!"
“卖东西滚一边去！也他妈不照照镜子，加洛斯交易所也是你能随便乱进的？”说着就把林立给推到了门外。
"Selling? Scram to the side! Take a look at the damn mirror, is Jarrosus Exchange a place for you to enter at your own wish?" With these words, Lin Li was pushed out of the door.
“厉害……”即便林立已是铭文宗师，看见这两道魔纹的时候，也是不禁暗自吃了一惊，高级魔纹本就相当复杂，居然还有人同时布下两道，这中间的难度，可不象一加一等于二这么简单。

"Impressive..." Despite being an Inscription guru, Lin Li could not restrain a start of surprise when he saw the mageweath. High level mageweath was complicated by itself, but there was someone who could actually set up two mageweath at the same time. The difficulties faced in the process were not as simple as a basic mathematical equation.
“原因很复杂，等我有空的时候，再慢慢向你解释好了……”
"The reason is very complex. Wait till I have time to slowly explain everything to you..."
“原来丹药回炉需要一味中性药剂地黄粉，只有将丹药恢复中性才能再次回炉凝造……”

"So, the elixir reheating process requires the addition of a simple neutral medicinal ingredient like rehmannia powder. One only needs to restore the elixir to a neutral state, to be able to once again reheat and form the elixir..."
“原来是做梦啊……”
“Oh... Thankfully, it was all a dream…”
“原来是这样！”
"So this is how it is!"
“原来是这样，我还以为……”大师级的药物知识讲起这些东西来，自然是旁征博引信手拈来，洋洋洒洒的一段话，听得老家伙心悦诚服之余，也不由用一种怪异的眼光打量起林立来，眼前这小子他是越来越看不透了，拥有近乎完美的魔法天赋，本身实力却弱得不行，顶多不过是一阶法师的水准，说他是个菜鸟吧，却又敢一个人跑到落日山脉上来。

"So this is it, I thought..." A master's knowledge of medicine meant one could speak of these easily as if having all the words at hand. The old man was completely convinced by Lin Li's eloquence, but at the same time, he couldn't help but size up Lin Li with an odd eye. He couldn't quite figure out the kid in front of him anymore. He possessed an almost perfect talent in magic but was extremely weak. He'd figure Lin Li was at the standard of a level one mage at most. But, coming to the Sunset Mountains alone, he had too much guts to be called a rookie.
“去告诉梅林家的蠢货，让他们立刻给我滚，如果再敢提这种白痴要求，老子就一把火把他们的窝给烧掉！”正骂骂咧咧的胖老头见林立过来，总算稍稍收敛怒气，暂时放过了那可怜的中年魔法师：“现在就去！”

"Go and tell that fool from the Merlin Family to scram this instant. If they dare to make such requests again, I'll burn their nest down with a torch!" The swearing old man showed a slight restraint in anger when he saw Lin Li approaching, and spared the poor middle-aged mage for the time being. "Go now!"
“去看看怎么样？”
“Shall we go take a look?”
“又废了一炉，蠢猪都是因为你……”
"Another cauldron is ruined! Stupid swine, it's all because of you again..."
“又是翊家的人……”
"Someone from the Yi Family again..."
“又有人偷药！”
“Someone’s trying to steal the herbs again!”
“又没路走了……”
"I've run out of options once again..."
“又错！”谁知葛瑞安却摇了摇头：“公会并不穷，光是屠魔山谷三条稀有矿脉，每年就可以为公会带来稳定的三百万金币收入。”

"Wrong again!" Unexpectedly, Gerian shook his head. "The guild is not poor. Just the three rare mineral veins in Demon Fall Valley alone bring in a steady income of three million gold coins every year."
“反正揍都揍了，等他找上门来再说吧。”
"I've beaten them up anyway, we'll talk about it again when they come calling on the doorstep."
“反正这件事，肯定有问题，一百二十五枚巫师之眼，几乎同时被破坏，之后阴影之巢的人就来了，一眨眼就杀了十几个魔法师，要不是老子及时出手，这事还不知道要闹到什么时候……”

"Anyhow, something must be wrong. 125 Warlock's Eyes were destroyed almost at the same time and the Shadow's Nest arrived soon after, killing a dozen of our mages in the blink of an eye. If it hadn't been for my timely action, who knows how long the situation would have dragged on..."
“反正那三十瓶奥法药剂还在魔法公会手里，他们有什么不满也只能把嘴巴闭着，谁敢上门来说三道四……”

"Anyway, those 30 bottles of Arcane Magic Potion are still with the Guild of Magic. They could only watch with their mouths closed even if they have any dissatisfaction. Who would dare to talk about it in front of us..."
“发生什么事了？”这几天林立就一直觉得，老法师的情绪有些不对，此时听他说出这样的话来，林立才忽然意识到了什么，仓促之间竟是有些呆住了，连那几瓶迅捷药水也忘了放进包里。

“What happened?” For the past few days, Lin Li felt that Andoine’s attitude was weird. Now that he heard the old mage utter such a thing, Lin Li hastily became aware and was so stunned that he even forgot to keep those Hastening Potions that he had made.
“叔叔，我也去睡了……”
"Uncle, I'll go to sleep too..."
“受教了！”
"I thank you for your advice!"
“另外，他还是一个药剂大师……”
"Furthermore, he is a Master of Potions..."
“只有你跟我。”
"Only you and me."
“只能算任务失败了，估计要赔些钱才行。”林立这话题倒是转得不错，听他说起这次的任务，金发美女总算没有继续追问，只是俏脸上露出几分无奈：“狮蝎是群居魔兽，遇上落单的几率实在太低了，我们跟踪了好几天才遇上这么一头，想不到最后却被两只双足飞龙破坏了。”

"It would be considered a failure, and I'll have to compensate some money." The topic that Lin Li had chosen wasn't bad at all. The blond beauty finally stopped asking her questions after Lin Li had mentioned the quest. Her pretty face revealed a hint of helplessness. "The Manticores live in groups, so the probability of encountering a lone one is extremely low. We had followed them for a few days before coming across one, but it was ruined by the two Wyverns."
“叫我费雷就可以了……”林立有些头大，一路上也不知道提过多少次了，罗麦格雷尼旧是先生长先生短的叫着。
“Just call me Felic, it will do…” Lin Li was rather troubled. He had mentioned it several times on the way, but McGrenn still insisted on calling him with honorifics.
“可惜了，太可惜了！这可是一位可能成为……”姬听雨满脸的失望，摇了摇头，再次看了江逸两眼，一句话没说朝外面走去，打开大门后径直离开，没有再回头一次。

"What a pity, what a huge pity! He could have been..." Ji Tingyu was filled with disappointment. Shaking her head, she gave Jiang Yi one last look before heading outside wordlessly. She opened the doors and left straight away, without another backward glance.
“可是……”克伦威尔完全没有想到，老梅林这次竟会下这么大的决心：“这三十瓶奥法药剂对我们梅林家族来说，真的有那么重要？就算没有这些药剂，我们也已经拥有了四十名五级以上的魔法师了，这样的实力，除了魔法公会之外，放眼加洛斯无人可及，我们为什么还要拼命争夺这三十瓶奥法药剂？”

"But..." Cromwell had no idea that Old Merlin would be so determined this time. "Are that 30 bottles of Arcane Magic Potion really so important to our family? Even without the potions, we already have 40 mages level-five and above. Other than the Guild of Magic, no one else in Jarrosus has this kind of power. Why do we need to fight so hard for that 30 bottles of Arcane Magic Potion?"
“可是费雷先生他……”伊娜神色间有些委屈，扑闪扑闪的大眼睛向林立投去了求助的目光。
"But, Mr Felic, he..." Ina was somewhat aggrieved, her big eyes blinking at Lin Li asking him for help.
“右手！马迪亚斯用奥术飞弹打断了他的右手！”
"His right hand! Mathias used an arcane missile to break his right hand!"
“名义上是这样的。”凯文点了点头，又继续说道：“不过魔法公会其实是一种比较松散的机构，严格说起来，魔法师在公会的权利要远远多过义务，进行等级认证之后，你将有权使用各种公会设施，比如图书馆，比如实验室，比如冥想地，如果你在某项研究上有突出贡献的话，公会还将为你提供一大笔资金。”

"On paper, at least." Kevin nodded and continued, “But the Guild of Magic is a relatively loose organization. Strictly speaking, mages have far more rights than obligations in the guild. After the level certification, you will have the right to use all the guild's facilities like the library, laboratory, and the meditation spot. If you make a significant contribution to an area of study, the guild will also provide you with a large amount of money."
“听朋友说加洛斯交易所收购各种魔法材料，我手上又正好有几枚魔晶，就想拿过来看看能不能换点钱周转周转。”对方毕竟上了年纪，不象门外那两个倒霉鬼身强力壮，林立就算心里再怎么不爽，也只能强自按捺着怒气。

"I heard from my friend that the Jarrosus Exchange buys in all kinds of magic materials. I have a few magical crystals at hand, and was thinking of bringing them here to see if I could exchange for some money to tide me through." He was an old man after all, and was not as strong as the two unlucky morons at the door. Even if he was unhappy, he'd have to suppress his anger.
“听起来倒是不错……那我有什么义务？”
"Sounds pretty good... Then, what obligations do I have to fulfil?"
“听雨你先忙着，迟些我再来找你好了。”马黑旗长相很英俊，和江恨水有的一比，不过肤色有些偏黑，此刻穿着一身黑色花边锦袍，也像一个黑马王子，他看出了姬听雨的不喜，很是识趣的转身离开了。

"Tingyu, I'll leave you to your business and look for you later," Ma Heiqi was a handsome man, his looks on par with that of Jiang Henshui, albeit with a darker skin tone. In silken robes with black trimmings, he looked, in this moment, suitably like a dark-skinned prince charming. Sensing the displeasure in Ji Tingyu, he wisely turned and left.
“听雨没这意思，只是我们这的一些规矩，易公子别见怪……”
"I didn't mean that! It's just that there are some rules here that we have to follow. Young Master Yi, please don't get offended..."
“呀？令牌！”江小奴一看满脸惊讶，开心的叫道：“少爷，你赎回令牌了？你怎么来的十两紫金呢？”
"Ah? It's the command token!" Xiaonu cried out in pleasant surprise, "Young Master, you've managed to redeem it? But how did you procure ten taels of purple gold?"
“呃……好久不见，克伦威尔先生。”一看来的是克伦威尔，凯文顿时就只觉一阵头大，如果可能的话，他真想把那句问候改成：“最好别见！”
"Uh... Long time no see, Mr Cromwell." Upon seeing Cromwell, Kevin's head began to ache. If possible, he wished he could say "Better not see!" instead.
“呃……有时间，有时间……”老格林暗暗抹了把冷汗，已经开始怀疑起安度因的眼光了，不过话是他自己说出来的，倒也不好当场收回去，只是在心里暗暗打定主意，等一下一定要出几个难点的问题考考他，看他能不能提出一些有建设性的想法，如果回答让自己满意的话，就好好指点他一下，如果回答不满意，那就干脆借这个借口走人算了……

"Uh... I have time..." Old Grimm wiped his cold sweat off secretly. He was beginning to doubt Andoine's vision. However, he had already said the words and it wasn't good to take them back on the spot. He made up his mind to test Lin Li with a few difficult questions to see if he could come up with some constructive ideas. If he was satisfied with the answers, he would guide him; if he was not satisfied, then he'd use this as an excuse to leave...
“呃，还没有……”被问到清晰药剂，安度因顿时老脸一红，比起这小子惊人的魔法天赋来，自己在药剂学上的天赋就实在有些拿不出手了，一个简单的清晰药剂，林立还反反复复的演示了十几遍，可到今天自己都还没弄出个明白，这几天里起码糟蹋了上百份材料，昨天甚至差点没把药剂室给炸掉，如今再被揭了创疤，就算安度因脸皮再厚，也终于是忍不住有些脸红了。

“Uh, not yet…” Andoine turned red in embarrassment when asked about the Clarity potion. Indeed, when compared to Lin Li’s extraordinary gift in magic, he had nothing to show in regards to his talent in pharmaceutics. Lin Li had demonstrated over ten times for a simple Clarity potion, but he still could not get a grasp on it till this day. In fact, he nearly caused an explosion in the lab just the day before. No matter how thick-skinned Andoine was, he blushed involuntarily at the mention of the topic.
“告诉过你多少次了，太过于依赖药水，对你来说没有任何好处，你为什么就是不听？”说完这句话，老法师却微微叹了口气：“不过算了，以后我也不能再天天用水晶球监视你了，你万一遇上什么危险，说不定还真要靠这几瓶药水救命。”

”How many times have I told you that too much reliance on medication will only bring you more damage than benefits? Why are you not listening to my advice?” Upon saying that, Andoine heaved a sigh. “Forget it. In the future, I will not be able to supervise you over the crystal ball everyday. Perhaps the medication will be able to save your life when you meet with some trouble.”
“呜个毛……”林立不耐烦的踹了利维坦猩猩一脚，目光顺着它所指点的方向望去：“你该不会是在那里藏了个利维坦猩猩美女，准备献给我吧？”

"Wooo? For what?" Lin Li kicked the Leviathan Gorilla in annoyance, his eyes following the direction of its finger. "Surely you didn't have a pretty Leviathan Gorilla hiding there, now preparing to offer her to me?"
“呜呜呜……”
"Woooo..."
“呜呜呜……”一声声惨叫听上去异常凄惨，鲜血不断的从伤口中渗透而出，只是眨眼之间，利维坦猩猩一身皮毛就染成了红色。
"Wooo..." The cries were exceptionally tragic. Blood was seeping out endlessly from the wounds, and just in the blink of an eye, the Leviathan Gorilla's fur was tainted red.
“呜呜呜呜呜！”
"Wooo wooo!"
“呜呜呜！”
"Woooo..."
“呜呜呜！”惨叫声中，利维坦猩猩终于是一头栽了下来。
"Wooo!" Finally, the Leviathan Gorilla fell head-first down the giant net amidst the screaming.
“呜呜！”
"Wu! Wu!"
"Wu!"
"Ping!"
“呵呵……”尽管罗琳心事重重，听到老格林这么有趣的说法，也是不由得笑出声来，只不过笑完之后，神色间却又露出几分扭捏：“那格林爷爷您觉得，我有成为一名药剂大师弟子的天赋吗？”

"Heh heh..." Though Rowling was upset, she could not help giggling when she heard Old Grimm put it in such an interesting way. But after the giggle, there was a look of bashfulness on her face. "Then, Grandpa Grimm, do you think I have the gift to become the disciple of a potion master?"
“呵呵……”林立干巴巴的笑了两声，希望能借此掩饰自己的无知，安度因确实没跟他提过格林－伯恩塞德这个人，再说当初在落日山脉之上，老头天天被自己逼着背各种药剂公式，而自己也天天被他逼着去搏杀各种魔兽，一天下来两个人都累得快散架了，又哪来时间聊什么格林－伯恩塞德……

"Heh heh..." Lin Li laughed dryly, hoping to conceal his ignorance with it. Andoine indeed did not mention Grimm Burnside. Besides, he had made the old man memorize all kinds of potion formulas back in the Sunset Mountains, and he was also forced by the latter to fight all kinds of magical beasts. Both were about to fall apart from exhaustion at the end of the day, where would they have the time to talk about some Grimm Burnside...
“呵呵……”林立笑了笑，希恩的关心，多多少少让他有些感动。
"Heh heh..." Lin Li smiled. Sheehan's concern more or less made him feel touched.
“呵呵……差不多，前几天在奥兰纳的时候，他还提起过你的事，我觉得你这小伙子很有意思，就专程跑到加洛斯看看。”灰袍法师笑容和蔼，望向林立的目光中，带着一丝明显的赞赏。

"Heh heh... Just about so. A few days ago in Alanna, he mentioned you. I thought you were interesting, so I specially came to Jarrosus to have a look." The mage in gray robe smiled amicably. The eyes that were looking at Lin Li had a glimmer of admiration.
“呵呵。”
"Hehe."
“呵呵！”
"Hehe!"
“呵呵，以前不喜欢修炼，而且在这武殿内修炼速度加快啊，武殿内还提供灵神丹……”
"Hehe, I was not very into cultivating in the past, but here at the Martial Arts Hall, the cultivation speed is not only faster, there is even a supply of Spirit Pills... "
“呵呵，会长的性格……呃……比较直爽，你以后会慢慢习惯的。”年轻法师从地上扶起两片门板，又笑着向林立解释。

"Heh heh, the President's character... Uh... He's more straightforward, you'll slowly get used to it in the future." The young mage lifted the two broken pieces of door from the ground as he explained to Lin Li with a smile.
“呵呵，原来是小罗琳。”老格林笑容和蔼，望向罗琳的目光亲切而又慈祥：“来，告诉格林爷爷，你怎么会一个人坐在这里？”
"Heh heh, so it's little Rowling." Old Grimm's smile was amiable, and the eyes that looked at Rowling were affectionate and kind. "Come, tell Gramps, why are you sitting here alone?"
“呵呵，那干脆过来跟格林爷爷一起坐吧。”因为跟罗琳爷爷有些交情的缘故，老格林曾经教过她一些药剂学上的知识，只不过后来又被其他事情给缠上了，就一直没什么时间再继续教她，但对这个精通医术的小姑娘，老格林一直是很喜欢的，甚至还动过将她发展进药剂师公会的念头。

"Heh heh, then come and sit with Grandpa Grimm." Old Grimm had taught Rowling some knowledge of pharmacy because of his friendship with her grandfather, but he was caught up with something else and did not have the time to teach her anymore. Nevertheless, he had always liked this little girl, who was proficient in medicinal skills. He had even had the idea of bringing her into the Pharmacists Guild.
“呸！把费雷踢出公会……真亏他想得出来。”
"Pff! Kicking Felic out of the guild... Hats off to him for thinking about it."
“呼……不打了，苍狼你越来越变态了，你好像快铸鼎境三重了吧？你修炼速度怎么那么快？既然有如此快的速度，为何现在才铸鼎境二重？”

"Hah... I call quits. Lone Wolf, you are getting more and more obscenely powerful. Are you almost at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm? How is your cultivation speed so fast? And why are you still just at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm if you can cultivate at such a speed?"
“呼……这才修炼了多久，都能比以前修炼半月的积累了。”
"Huh... I cultivated for such a short duration, yet the power I have accumulated is on par with what I used to cultivate in half a month."
“呼呼！”
"Hu Hu!"
“呼呼，不打了！”
"Hah... Hah... I'm not fighting any more!"
“呼呼，不打了，你太变态了……”
"Huh, huh, I'm not fighting any longer, you're too obscenely power..."
“呼，呼……不打了！”
"Huh, huh... I'm not fighting any longer!"
“呼，应该没错吧？”
"Eh... this should be correct, I think?"
“和他们拼了？”
"Fight with them to the death?"
“咒术师？”林立听得心头一惊，想起了麦格雷尼父女：“你的意思是说，他擅长的是诅咒法术？”
"Conjurer?" Lin Li was startled by that word, and thought of McGrenn and his daughter. "You mean, he's skilled in curse spells?"
“咔嚓！”
"Crack!"
"Crack!" "AHH!"
“咕隆！”
Gulp!
“咦……”林立一脸好奇的走了过去，才发现那丝魔法波动，似乎是从一套套装上传来的，这套套装是由一把双手巨剑一件红色皮甲组成，当林立走近的时候，可以很清晰的感觉到一丝火系魔法元素在四周缭绕。
