"Eh..." driven by curiosity, Lin Li approached the source of the wave, which turned out to be a set of equipment. It consisted of a two-handed giant sword and a red color leather jacket, which exhibited a clear tinge of fire magical elements in close proximity.
“咦……居然融合了？”
“Eh… They actually merged together?”
“咦！”这一次林立却忽然发现了一些不同的东西。
"Eh?" This time, Lin Li had found something different.
“咦，这武技很玄妙啊，竟可以无限变招，根本预算不出对方的轨迹啊！”
"Eh? This martial art technique is quite abstruse. It allows infinite permutations, I can't predict the trajectory at all!"
"Huh?"
“咦？少爷，今天你怎么这么早就回来了？你不是去武殿了吗？”
"Huh? Young Master, why did you return so early today? Did you not go to the Martial Arts Hall?"
“咦？这妞进步很大嘛，这暴雨拳明显比那一天强多了。”
"Eh? This girl has improved grealty. Her Thunderstorm Fist is obviously more powerful than that day."
“咦？这边有一些书册？”
"Eh? Are there any manuals over here?"
"Cough, cough!"
“咻咻！”
"Swish! Swish! "
"Swish!"
"Haha--"
“哈哈哈……”
"Hahaha......"
“哈哈哈哈……”葛瑞安笑得毫无风度，那嚣张的声音传得整条街都能听见：“这还用得着你说？你也不会去照照镜子，他妈的连都快被老子打肿了……”
"Ha ha ha ha..." Gerian laughed with no manners at all, and even the people on the streets could hear his arrogant voice. "Need you say? Go and look in the mirror, you're beaten all swollen by me..."
“哈哈哈哈，苍天有眼啊！老天爷，你终于开了一次眼了！”
"Hahahaha, the heavens have eyes! Heavenly father, you've finally come to help me for once!"
“哈哈哈！”
"Hahaha!"
“哈哈哈，宝贝呀，这真的是宝贝，老天有眼啊……”
"Hahaha, yeah! This is a treasure, a real one. The Heavens do favor me…"
“哈哈哈，成了？”
"Hahaha, does that count as a success?"
“哈哈！”
"Haha!"
“哈哈！怎么？还想动手？你打我啊！来啊，我绝不还手。”
"Ha ha! What, you want to fight? Strike me then! Come on, I promise I will not hit back."
“哈哈！江逸就你这实力，还想和我战？”
"Haha! Jiang Yi, with power like yours, you still think of sparring with me?"
“哈哈，听雨小姐，你实力冠绝全雄，都已经是铸鼎境八重了，这群陪练哪是你的对手？要不在下陪你战一场？”

"Haha, Miss Tingyu, your power is top-class and a head above the rest. With your power level already at the eighth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm,which sparring partner here could ever be a worthy opponent? How about I join you for a match?"
“哈哈，地阶丹药？这一炉灵神丹竟然炼出地阶丹药？这其中莫非有什么玄妙不成？不行我得好好研究研究……”

"Haha, Earth-tier elixirs? This cauldron of Spirit Pills could actually refine Earth-tier elixirs? Could there perhaps be something mysterious behind it? No, I have to carefully examine and research this..."
“哈哈，希恩，你怎么会在这里？”突然见到希恩，林立心里其实是有些内疚的，毕竟是自己把他带来奥兰纳的，可到了魔法公会之后，却一直把人丢着不管，这实在有些说不过去。

"Haha, why are you here, Sheehan?" Lin Li was actually a bit guilty to meet Sheehan so suddenly. After all, it was he himself who brought Sheehan to Alanna and left him alone after they reached the Guild of Magic, which was not very kind of him.
“哈哈，我还以为是谁？江逸，又是你这个废物？”
“Hah! And I was just wondering who it was! It’s just Jiang Yi, the good-for-nothing boy!”
“哈哈，骂得好！”一向对这两个字深恶痛绝的马森，今天终于是难得的赞同了一次。
"Ha ha, what a good scolding!" Marson, who was usually deeply hurt by this word, finally showed rare agreement.
“哎……”毕竟是自己的亲生儿子，劈头盖脸的骂了一顿之后，马修斯的火气也稍稍消了一些，老人有些无奈的叹了口气：“你为什么就不想想，如果不是因为时间太紧的话，我又怎么会卖掉城中心的产业？难道你以为，我们梅林家族还会缺钱吗？我们现在缺的是时间！留给我们的时间实在是太短了，只有两天，两天之后那三十瓶奥法药剂就要开始拍卖，要是再晚几天就好了，这样我还可以多处理几处房产，这样在拍卖时，胜算也会更大一些……”

"Aye..." It was his own son after all. After the scolding, Matthew's anger had subsided a little. The old man sighed helplessly. "Why do you not think over it, if I hadn't been pressed for time, how could I have sold the properties in the center of the city? Did you really think us, the Merlin Family, would be lacking in money? What we are lacking is time! The amount of time left for us is too short, only two days. After two days that 30 bottles of Arcane Magic Potion will start appear on the auction. It'd be better if they could delay a few more days and I could dispose of some more properties. This way, our odds would be better during the auction..."
“哎……”灰袍法师完全来不及出手，只是轻轻叹了口气，有些无奈的望着林立：“这又是何苦？”
"Ai..." It was too late for the mage in gray robe to intervene. He sighed slightly and looked at Lin Li helplessly. "Why bother?"
“哎……老子真是太英明了！”想起自己当初的决定，葛瑞安又忍不住暗暗陶醉，正是因为这个决定，才有了加洛斯魔法公会的今天，三十瓶奥法药剂，就让魔法公会成了整个加洛斯城的焦点，若是让那些争破头的家伙知道，这地下室里还放了足有上百瓶之多时，他们脸上又会是一副什么表情……

"Aye, I am too brilliant!" Thinking back to his decision, Gerian couldn't help but revel in it. It was all because of this decision that the Guild of Magic had became what it was today. 30 bottles of Arcane Magic Potion had put the guild in the focus of the entire Jarrosus City. If these fellows who were fighting crazily were to know there were another hundred-plus bottles in the cellar, what expressions would they have on their faces...
“哎呀！”
"Oh no!"
“哎哟！”
"Ouch!"
"Wow! "
“哦……”林立很小心的把水晶卡收了起来，又从口袋里摸出了那条深邃之银项链。
"Oh..." Lin Li carefully put away the crystal card and took out the deep silver necklace from his pocket.
“哦……”林立点了点头，又有些疑惑的问道：“那魔法公会，算是最高议会的下属机构了？”
"Oh..." Lin Li nodded, but asked again doubtfully, "So the Guild of Magic is considered a subsidiary of the Supreme Council?"
“哦……”葛瑞安点了点头，开始看起手上的信来。
"Oh..." Gerian nodded, and began to read the letter in his hands.
“哦……”葛瑞安闻言一愣，赶忙伸手扶了扶法师帽，可刚扶到一半，却又想起自己发火的原因：“妈的不要转移话题，老子问你话呢，你是不是有毛病？曼尼斯家族珍藏，这是多少人做梦都梦不到的东西，让你任选三件你还没兴趣，你个小王八蛋是不是想气死老子？”

"Oh..." Gerian was taken by surprise at his words, and quickly straightened his mage hat. But halfway through, he remembered the reason for his anger. "Damn it, don't change the topic. I'm asking you a question, are you sick? The Mannes Family's hoard is something that many people could not dream about. You get to choose any three items from them and you're still not interested? Are you trying to piss me off, you little bastard?"
“哦……刚刚沸腾，我记住了。”安度因听得很认真，连连点头的同时，还又把这句话重复了一遍。
"Oh... just boiling. I've remembered." Andoine was listening very seriously. As he nodded his head, he repeated this sentence once more."
“哦……原来是这么回事。”林立答应得很干脆，毫不犹豫的就收回了那丝精神力：“小事一件而已，就照您说的，这件事就这么算了。”
"Oh... So this is it," Lin Li answered coolly. He recalled his mental strength without hesitation. "It's only a small matter, I'll do as you said and forget about this matter."
“哦……心情不好。”葛瑞安一脸的无所谓：“我跟他们说了，老梅林打上门来，让老子的心情很不愉快，所以将奥法药剂的拍卖时间推迟了。”
"Oh... Bad mood." Gerian was indifferent. "I've told them, Old Merlin had come fighting at our doorstep and it has made me very unhappy. So I had delayed the auction for the Arcane Magic Potion."
“哦……那他现在在哪？”
"Oh... Where is he now?"
“哦……麻烦你了。”
"Oh... Sorry to trouble you."
“哦。”林立点了点头，没再继续追问，他还记得那天刚来的时候，达利安好象就说过，公会已经帮希恩准备了住处，现在想起来，应该就是那个什么魔法师先生带希恩去的地方吧……

"Oh," Lin Li nodded and did not question further. He still remembered on their first day of arrival there, Dalyan had mentioned that the Guild had already prepared accommodation for Sheehan. Thinking back, the mage must have brought Sheehan there...
“哦哦……原来是罗德叔叔，真是好久不见好久不见……”
"Oh, oh... So it's Uncle Rode. Long time no see indeed..."
“哦哦。”
"Oh okay."
“哦哦！少爷好厉害，少爷加油哦。”心思单纯的江小奴立即不再多问，小鸡啄米的点头，大眼睛眯成月牙儿，都是崇拜之色。

"Oh! Oh! Young Master is so powerful! You can do it, Young Master!" The simple and pure-of-heart Jiang Xiaonu quickly stopped asking questions. She merely nodded her head rapidly and her eyes grew to twin moons. It was clear that she looked up to him.
“Oh!”
“哦！对对对……我想起来了！那地方，是属于咱们魔法公会的？”
"Oh! Yes, yes... I remember! That place belongs to our Guild of Magic?"
“哦，江逸！”柳长老点了点头，一挥手道：“你立即去准备二十钱茯苓，三十钱白矾，十五钱车前草，四十钱……老夫立即要炼丹，今日一定要炼制出地阶丹药！”

"Oh, Jiang Yi! " Elder Liu nodded his head and waved his hand and instructed, "You go prepare these immediately: one hundred grams of china root, one hundred and fifty grams of alum, seventy-five grams of plantago seed, two hundred grams of ... I want to start refining elixirs immediately! I must successfully refine some earth-grade elixirs today!"
"Oh?"
“哦？”不知道为什么，一听到屠魔山谷，林立就会想起自己第一次来魔法公会的时候，就会想起那个感觉象一条毒蛇的中年人：“那边出了什么事？”

"Oh?" For reasons unknown, Lin Li would recall the first time he came to the Guild of Magic and the middle-aged man who felt like a poisonous snake whenever the name of the Demon Fall Valley came up. "What happened there?"
“哦？”相处了一个多月，林立还从来没见安度因这么严肃过，心头也不由多了几分好奇。
“Oh?” They had been together for more than a month, and this was the first time Lin Li saw Andoine serious. He could not help but be curious.
“哦？”虽然一番谈话，依旧未能解决清醒药剂的问题，但从这谈话当中，林立却也能感觉出，老格林确实当得起药剂大师的称号，毕竟是几十年积累下来的经验，有些东西听来，就连已达宗师级水准的他也不由觉得新奇，此时听老格林提出疑问，林立也不由来了兴趣：“您先说来听听，说不定可以一起研究研究。”

"Oh?" Although the discussion failed to help solve the problems of the Sobriety Potion, Lin Li could feel from their conversation that Old Grimm really deserved the title of a master pharmacist. After all, it was decades of accumulated experience. There were some things that sounded new to a guru like him as well. Hearing that Old Grimm had come up with a question, Lin Li's interest was piqued as well. "Tell me about it, maybe we can study about it together."
“哦？您认识安度因？”离开落日山脉之后，林立还是第一次听到安度因的消息，一时间不由多看了灰袍法师几眼：“他现在什么情况，脾气是不是还象以前那么倔？”

"Oh? You know Andoine?" It was the first time Lin Li had heard of news about Andoine after leaving the Sunset Mountains. He couldn't resist taking another few looks at the mage in gray robe. "How's he like now? Is he still stubborn as ever?"
“哦？是你啊！”
"Huh? It's you! "
“哦？果然是江家的人！”
"Oh? You are indeed a member of the Jiang Clan!"
“哦？果然！”
"Oh? True enough..."
"Tsk, tsk "
“哭什么？”林立刚一进门，就听见葛瑞安在诋毁自己。
"Cry what?" Lin Li heard Gerian slandering him upon entering the door.
“哼……”老梅林翻了个白眼，看着克伦威尔的目光中，带着几分恨铁不成钢的怒意：“我早叫你不要跟家族里那些老家伙走那么近，你为什么就是不听？看看他们都教了你些什么，这些鼠目寸光的东西……四十名五级以上魔法师……看着很美而已！有了这三十瓶奥法药剂，我们拥有的将会是七十名真正的魔法师，而不再是什么可笑的魔法学徒！”

"Hmph..." Old Merlin rolled his eyes. He shot an exasperated look at Cromwell, a look that also expressed that he’d expected better from him. "I've long told you not to hang out with those old fellows in the family, why won't you listen? Look at what they've taught you, all these short-sighted geezers... 40 mages above level-five... It only looks nice! With these 30 bottles of Arcane Magic Potion, what we will come to have are 70 real mages, and not some ridiculous mage apprentices!"
“哼哼！三个月，只要给我三个月时间，我一定让整个江家刮目相看！可惜……干爷爷看不到！”
"Hmph! Three months! Just give me three months, and I will definitely make the entire Jiang Clan take notice of me! Too bad, though... God-Grandfather will not be able to see me at this moment!"
"Hmph!"
“哼！”老梅林终于还是没能憋住，在葛瑞安嚣张的笑声中，带着克伦威尔拂袖而去。
"Hmph!" Old Merlin could not keep it in at last. With a flick of his sleeves, he left with Cromwell in the midst of Gerian's arrogant laughter.
“哼！我还以为你有什么本事……”提到了自己的专业领域，红发美女秀丽的眉毛一挑，绝美的面容上露出了自信的笑容：“身上没有任何伤口，也从未受过魔法攻击，麦格雷尼先生现在这种情况，只有两种可能，一是精神攻击，一是诅咒攻击！”

"Hmph! Still thinking you're capable..." Speaking of her professional field, the redheaded beauty lifted her fine eyebrows and a confident smile appeared on her face. "There are no wounds on his body, and there was no magical attack. There are only two possibilities for Mr McGrenn's current situation. It can either be a mental attack or a curse!"
“哼！暴雨拳，看招！”
"Hmph! Thunderstorm Punch, take that!"
“哼！江逸当众行凶，我等劝说之后依旧一意孤行，所有人听令，一起上拿下江逸！”
"Hmph! Jiang Yi is committing crimes in public. We have tried to advise him but he continues to be stubborn. Everyone listen to my orders and take down Jiang Yi!"
“哼！真是瞎了他的狗眼，也不看看自己威胁的是谁”葛瑞安果然义愤填膺，怒不可遏的宣布：“加洛斯魔法公会这几年虽然维持得很艰难，却还没落魄到受人威胁的地步！既然是我把你弄进公会的，我就必须对你负责，谁要是想动你，就得先问问我葛瑞安同不同意！”

"Hmph! He must be blind, not even looking at whom he's threatening." Sure enough, Gerian announced in a towering rage, "Although Jarrosus Guild of Magic has been facing some difficulties these few years, we are not that down-and-out to be threatened by others! Since I was the one who got you into the guild, I will take responsibility for it. Whoever dares to touch you will have to ask for my permission!"
“哼！还想逃？江如虎，受死！”
"Hmph! Still trying to escape? Jiang Ruhu, accept your death!"
“哼！还愣着干什么？全部给我上！”
"Hmph! What are you guys waiting for? Everyone, attack!"
“哼！雕虫小技。”
"Parlor tricks," the third-stage guard bellowed.
“哼，九阳老儿，你枉自拥有绝世天资，最终却没能成仙，就是因为这种无聊的感情！区区庸碌众生，不过是天地间的刍狗罢了，若是看不穿这点，又如何能够做到寿与天齐，成就仙班？如果你的废话只有这些，本座可没兴趣继续听下去了，拔出你的火龙剑，本座这就送你一程！”冥皇手中凭空出现一把数丈长的镰刀形兵器，随手一挥，冥气和死气泾渭分明，缭绕两边。

"Hmph! Fogey Nine Yang, you possess peerless talent, but ultimately you failed to become immortal, solely because of this pointless attitude! Mere mortals are nothing but dogs in this world.
“If you can't overlook this, how can you expect to enjoy a lifespan equal to the world and ascend to the ranks of the immortals? If rubbish is all you can spew, I have no reason to continue listening. Draw your Fire Dragon Sword. I am going to send you on your way!"
A long sickle-like weapon appeared out of thin air and floated into the hands of the Netherworld King. With a flick of his hands, the smell of death and hell arose, lingering on both sides.
“哼，九阳老儿，几千年没见，没想到你的废话还是这么多，脸皮还是这么厚！”
"Hmph! Fogey Nine-Yang, I haven't seen you for a few thousand years, yet you are still full of crap and as thick-skinned as ever!" the Netherworld King retorted coldly.
“哼，幻影拳，我也会！”
"Hmph, Phantom Punch. I know it too!"
“哼，迟了……看我的暗器，万毒穿心粉！”
"Hmph, it was too late... taste my hidden weapon - the Heart-Pierce Million-Poison Powder!"
"Sigh"...
“唉……好汉不提当年勇，回忆再多也无用，就不知我这惨状待会被小奴看到，又会担心成什么样子。”

Jiang Yi sighed. “Worthy men do not dwell on past glories. It’s useless no matter how much I look back. Come to think of it, I have no idea how much Xiaonu would start worrying about me if she saw me in this pitiful state…”
“唉……这陪练果然不是人干的活啊，难怪如此高价还是缺人，这群公子小姐完全不把陪练当人看。”

Sigh... this sparring partnership job is definitely not a task that humans should do. No wonder why there is still a shortage of personnel even with an offer of high pay: these young masters and mistresses don't even treat their sparring partners as fellow human beings.
“唉，我总是说不过你！不过爱好和平的我既然死到临头，也就没心情再打上一场了……”
Wu Ming sighed. "I can't win a war of words against you! Now that the peace-loving me is at hell's gate, I’m in no fighting mood…"
“唔……这个……算不上是吧……”林立只觉一阵头大，幸亏这家伙想起件事来，赶紧把话题转移开：“对了伊娜，你们这次的任务，不是需要猎杀一头狮蝎吗？刚才我好象听麦格雷尼先生说，你们才刚刚布下陷阱，就被双足飞龙给发现了，现在没有猎到狮蝎，回去后任务该怎么办？”

“Erm… This… I guess not really…” Lin Li was fretting over it when, fortunately, he thought of something else and hurried to change the topic. "Oh, right, Ina, don't you need to kill a Manticore for this quest? I heard Mr McGrenn mention just now that you both had just laid down the trap when the Wyverns discovered it. What will happen to the quest now that you had not managed to hunt down the Manticore?"
“唔……这些你别管，相信我！小奴，或许……要不了多久，我就能让你过上好生活了，再也不用出去做工了。”
"Huh... You don't have to worry about these things, believe me! Xiaonu, perhaps... very soon, I will be able to provide a good life for you. You will no longer need to go out and work anymore."
“唔……这小子好快的反应速度，这是铸鼎境二重吗？”
"Huh... this brat has such a swift reaction, is he at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm?"
"Oh."
"Swish! Swish! Swish!"
“Ah—”
"Ah... Ah!"
"Ah!"
“啊！”林立目瞪口呆的接过信来，一看信封居然是暧mei的粉红色，右下处还印着一个鲜红的唇印……
"Ah!" Lin Li took the letter, dumbfounded. The envelope turned out to be an equivocal pink with a bright-red lip print on the bottom right side...
“Ah!” “Ah!” “Ah!”
“啊，啊……江逸你完了，你他妈竟敢打断我的手，你完了，你这次死定了！”
"Ah… ah… Jiang Yi, you are a goner! You bloody bastard! How dare you break my arm!? You are a dead duck this time!"
“啊，啊！小野种，我要杀了你，杀了你！”
"Ahh, Ahh! Little bastard, I'm going to kill you, kill you!"
“啊，啊，不要——”
“Ah… Ah… No!”
“Ah!” “Ah!” “Ah!”
“啊，我杀了你这野种！”
"Ahh! I will kill you, bastard!"
“Ah?”
“啊？”林立正在那心不在焉的想着心事，却忽然听见有人跟自己说话，而且从那声音听来，好象还是一个陌生人，林立不由有些疑惑的转过头望去，却看见一名面容英俊的青年正站在自己面前，神色间带着某种林立很不喜欢的东西……

"Ah?" Lin Li was distracted with his own thoughts when he suddenly heard someone talking to him. From the voice, it seemed to be coming from a stranger. Lin Li turned around in doubt, only to see a handsome young man standing in front of him carrying an expression that Lin Li didn't like...
"Ah? It's broken..."
“啊？坏了！我要走火入魔了……”
Shit! I'm about to suffer a Qi deviation…
“啪——！”等待他的，是一记结结实实的耳光，盛怒之下的艾萨克，神色间已再无平日的雍容。
"Clap...!" What awaited him was a solid slap in the face. Isaac had lost his usual grace in his fury.
"Pow!"
Pow! Pow! Pow!
Pow! Pow!
“喀嚓喀嚓！”在一阵阵刺耳的声响当中，只见漫天冰屑飞舞。
"Snip!" The air was filled with ice flakes in the midst of jarring sounds.
“喂！喂！我还没说完呢……你们两个小兔崽子，太不象话了！”
"Hey! Hey! I've not finished... You two little rascals, this is too much!"
"Gulp!"
“喝！看我大成的暴雨拳，苍狼你小心了！”
"Hoo! Take me Phenomenal-Stage Thunderstorm Fist! Lone Wolf, you watch out!"
“喝！看招，流云散手！”
"Hah! Take this, Cloud-Spin Free Hand!"
"Buzz—"
"Buzz!"
“嗤嗤！”
"Tsk Tsk!"
“嗯……不管了，先清点药田，完成任务后回去好好研究一番！”
"Eh… whatever, I'll finish up here first and do a thorough study of it once I complete the mission!"
“嗯……药力已经环绕丹田了，得快点用黑色元力增幅药力，否则这点药力很快就消散了。”

"Eh... the medicinal power is already revolving around the dantian. I should quickly apply some black essence force to increase this power, otherwise this little bit of medicinal power will quickly dissipate."
“嗯……试试膝盖！”
"Oh… time to try my knee!"
“嗯……这黄参丹的药力开始发作了，自动在滋补伤口了，可惜药力太弱了……”
"Eh... The medicinal power of this Yellow Ginseng Elixir is starting to take effect and is automatically healing the wound—it's just too bad that the medicinal efficacy is too weak..."
“嗯……都是虚招！”
"Oh... it was all an empty trick!"
“嗯嗯！”江小奴接过金叶子重重的点头，又咧嘴一笑，露出两个可爱的小虎牙：“少爷放心吧，我不出大院的。”
"Mm-mm!" Taking the gold leaf, Xiaonu nodded emphatically and cracked a toothy grin, revealing two adorable little canines, "Don't worry, Young Master. I will not go out of the courtyard."
“嗯，先去荣管事那说一声。”
"Yes, I should go inform Chief Rong first."
“嗯，嗯，少爷最厉害了！”
"Uh huh, uh huh, Young Master is the best!"
“嗯，少爷最厉害了，少爷加油！”
"Yea, Young Master is the best! Young Master, you can do it!"
“嗯，少爷最好了！”小奴感动得稀里糊涂的，泪水更如雨水般落下。
"Uh huh, Young Master is the best!" Xiaonu was so touched that she muddleheadedly cried even harder. Her tears streamed down like rainwater.
“嗯，差不多了，试试！”
"Yeah, almost there! I shall keep trying!"
“嗯，看看消耗之后是否能继续提炼出？”
"Hmm... Let's see if I can continue extracting after consuming them."
“嗯，这个是茯苓，二十钱……”
"Yes, this is china root, one hundred grams..."
“嗯，这名江家子弟本性不错，不贪心！”
"Uh huh, this Jiang Clan son has a good personality, he's not at all greedy!"
"Huh?"
“嗯？果然有点意思！”
"Mm? How fascinating indeed!"
“嗯？这位少爷好强的气势，最少有铸鼎境六重吧？这是哪家的少爷，为何要点名找我？”

"Oh? What a powerful aura coming off of this young master, I'd reckon the power level is at least at the sixth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Which family does this young master belong to, and why has he ordered me?"
“嘎嘎嘎嘎嘎！”利维坦猩猩可不管那么多，报以一阵怪笑之后，一支画笔在伊娜脸上画得更欢乐了。
“Kakakaka!” The Leviathan Gorilla could not care less. After a fit of cackles, it resumed drawing on Ina's face with more joy.
“嘎嘎嘎嘎！”一椰子砸倒了地上的人类，那利维坦猩猩更是兴奋得不行，一边跳着一边怪笑，甚至还转身对两人扭了扭屁股。
“Kakakaka!” The Leviathan Gorilla was greatly excited seeing the coconut fall onto the human. It cackled as it hopped around, and it even wiggled its bottom at the two men.
“嘎嘎嘎！”利维坦猩猩只是傻笑，看上去倒是挺高兴的，也不知道是高兴林立收下了戒指，还是高兴自己终于可以送走这个瘟神。
"Kya kya kya!" The Leviathan Gorilla giggled looking glad, though it was not known if it was because Lin Li had accepted the ring or because it could finally send the pestilence away.
"Hiss..."
“嘿……没什么没什么，药剂配得怎么样了？要是没配好的话，你干脆再去研究研究，逼供这种事，我来也是一样的……”
"Heh... Nothing, nothing. How did the concoction go? If it's not done yet, you can go and study it over again. Such a thing like extorting a confession I can do it as well..."
“嘿嘿……这事真要说起来也是运气，前几天去了趟冒险者公会，正好碰到个交任务的冒险者，那家伙交完任务之后，又拿出半块安眠水晶碎片在那叫卖，冒险者公会那帮蠢货，又哪知道安眠水晶是什么东西，卖了一下午也没卖掉，到时候让我捡了个便宜……哈哈，一百金币买了块碎片，几句话就把这地方给套出来了……”

"Heh heh... This is really luck. A few days ago when I went to the Adventurers Guild, I bumped into an adventurer who was turning in his quest. After he had turned in his quest, he started selling half of a Hypnotic Crystal. How would the idiots at the Adventurers Guild know what a Hypnotic Crystal is? He didn't manage to sell it for a whole afternoon, till then I grabbed myself a deal... Ha ha, I bought a shard with 100 gold coins, and found this place in a short time..."
“嘿嘿，刚才我用心灵传讯悄悄通知他的……”葛瑞安笑得一脸得意：“三大家族，却只有两个机会，我看他们怎么争……”
"Heh heh. I used telepathy to inform him just now..." Gerian laughed in a gratified manner. "Three big families, but only two chances. I'll see how they're going to compete..."
“嘿嘿，那天我听人说，为了拍到奥法药剂，有些家族已经开始卖传家之宝了，当时我就想，与其便宜别人，不如便宜魔法公会，于是我就跟他们说，钱不够也行，可以用东西折算，不管是材料还是装备，只要能用得上的，咱们公会统统接受。”

"Heh heh, I heard that some families are already starting to sell their family hoards in order to get the Arcane Magic Potions. So I thought, rather than benefiting others, why not benefit the Guild of Magic instead. So I told them, It's alright if the money's not enough, they can convert it with items. Regardless of ingredients or equipment, as long as it can be of use the guild will accept it."
“噗……”忽然间听见这话，林立差点没被口水呛到，跟葛瑞安谈细节？凯文这不是把人往火坑里推么……
"Pft..." Lin Li nearly choked on his saliva hearing the words out of the blue. Discussing the details with Gerian? Kevin was trying to push him into the pit of fire...
"Pop!"
“四十五万。”鲁本－萨鲁曼身上，似乎总带着一股阴气森森的寒意，每次听见他报价，林立都感觉身上有些发冷。
"450,000." Reuben Saruman always seemed to have a gloomy chill around him. Everytime Lin Li heard him bid, he'd feel a chill creeping over his body.
“四十八万！”伊瑟拉－笑容温和，让人感觉如沐春风，但在报价上却是果断而又迅速，几乎是鲁本话音刚落，他就又将价格提了三万上去。
"480,000!" Ysera's smile was gentle like a breath of fresh air. But his bid was firm and quick; he had raised the price by 30,000 almost as soon as Reuben's voice fell.
“四马之力，铸鼎境四重！”
"The strength of four horses... Fourth stage of Cast Tripod Realm!"
“回去修炼！”
"I'll go back home to practice cultivation!"
“回长老，我知道什么回事！”
"Report to Elder, I know what exactly happened!"
“因为我？”
"Because of me?"
“在什么地方？”
"Where is it?"
“在他二十五岁生日后不久，老萨鲁曼就宣布了自己的继承人，也就是他同父异母的亲弟弟索萨，在老萨鲁曼宣布这个消息的当天，鲁本就从加洛斯城消失了，这一消失就是五年，没人知道他去了哪里，也没人知道这五年中他都干了些什么，一直到三十岁那年，鲁本才回到加洛斯。”

"Not long after his 25th birthday, Old Saruman announced his successor, who was Reuben's half-brother Sosa. On the day Old Saruman announced the news, Reuben disappeared from Jarrosus City. His disappearance lasted for five years. No one knew where he went, and no one knew what he did in that five years. He did not return to Jarrosus until he was 30."
“在历史上承载过九任天帝的天庭并不适合你，我就不留下来让你破坏了。还是将它留给今后适合的继任者吧……”

"The Heavenly Court, the responsibility of nine generations of Celestial Thearchs throughout history, does not suit you. I shall not leave it for you to destroy. It'd be better to leave it to future successors…"
“在奥兰纳的时候，安度因曾经跟我说过，你除了魔法天赋之外，还是一个难得一见的药剂学天才。”于是老格林不得不主动找些话题：“凑巧我也算是个不错的药剂师，如果你愿意的话，说不定我们可以一起探讨探讨药剂学方面的问题。”

"When we were in Alanna, Andoine has mentioned to me that other than your magical gifts, you are also a rare genius in pharmaceutics." Hence, Old Grimm had to find something to talk about. "Coincidentally, I'm quite a decent pharmacist myself. If you like, maybe we can discuss pharmaceutics issues together."
“地阶丹药？”
"Earth-tier elixirs?"
“坚决不行！”林立打死不干，他真是不想当什么公会会长，这位子可不是那么好坐的，想干好肯定要被累死，胡搞一气倒是不累，可多半会被人骂死，林立不想累死也不想被骂死，所以不当会长是最好的选择。

"Definitely no!" Lin Li would not do it no matter what. He really didn't want to be the President of any guild. This was not an easy position. If you wanted to do it well, you'd be exhausted to death; it would not be tiring fooling around, but you'd probably be criticized to death. Lin Li did not want to be exhausted to death nor criticized to death, so not being the President would be the best choice.
“城中心那几处房产，处理得怎么样了？”马修斯－梅林今年五十三岁，担任梅林家族这一代的族长已经十年，可他却很少象今天这么激动过，今天之内，他已经在客厅里走了不知道多少个来回，踩在那柔软的地毯上，心情却久久无法平复。

"How are the properties in the city center handled?" Matthew Merlin was 53 years old this year. He had been the head of the Merlin Family for a decade, but he had never been as agitated as today. He paced back and forth in the living room, stepping on the soft carpet, but his mood could not be calmed for a long time.
“城主大人……”三人出了翡翠高塔，黑袍法师有些犹豫的低声请示道：“这次没能找到那人，格林先生那里会不会有些不好交代？”

"Master Castellan..." The three men walked out of the Emerald Tower, and the mage in black robe asked with some hesitation in a low voice, "We didn't find the person this time, will it be difficult to answer to Mr Grimm?"
“城主大人说笑了，罗琳小姐的医术高明，又哪需要我来指导……”林立打着哈哈，打算随口把这事敷衍过去。
"You must be joking, Master Castellan. Miss Rowling has superior medical skills, how could she need my guidance..." Lin Li joked lightly, planning to play this matter off.
“城主大人过奖了。”
"You flatter me, Master Castellan."
“基本上，是这么回事……”
"Basically, that is so..."
“基本上，是这么回事。”说完这句话，安度因从法师袍中掏出一只厚厚的信封：“反正你继续留在落日山脉，也学不到什么东西，还不如我推荐你去一个地方，在那里你可以继续学习，也可以干一些你自己想干的事。”

“Basically, that is the case.” After finishing what he had to say, Andoine pulled out a thick envelope from his mage robe. “In any case, by continuing to stay in the Sunset Mountains, you will not be able to learn anything useful anymore. Why don’t you let me recommend you to another place? There, you can choose to continue to learn something more or do the things you have always wanted to do.”
“外面太吵了，我想一个人静一静……”罗琳神色复杂的望了林立一眼，这才脸蛋红红的低声说道。
Rowling glanced at Lin Li with a complex expression on her flushed face and said softly, "It's too noisy outside, I wanted to be alone..."
“多谢杨管事。”
"Thank you very much, Manager Yang."
“够了！”就在这个时候，一个声音从台阶下传来。
"Enough!" Just then, a voice came from below the steps.
“大事……少爷？狗屁的少爷！哈哈哈哈……”
“Great things? Young Master? Young Master my ass! Hahahaha…”
“大事！”
"'Great things'!"
“大概六级左右。”
"About level-six."
“大概半个小时之后。”老法师笑了笑，拍了拍林立的肩膀：“不过没关系，这件事不会耽搁我太多的时间，估计一两周之后，我就可以回加洛斯城了，到时候我带你去我的私人药剂室，我在那里藏了一套紫水晶烧杯，那可是我花大价钱弄来的珍品……”

“About half an hour later.” The old mage laughed and gave Lin Li a pat on his shoulder. “It wouldn’t matter as this will not delay me too much. I guess I will probably be able to head to Jarrosus City after a week or two. When that happens, I will bring you to my private pharmacy. I had hidden a purple set of crystal beakers; it’s a treasure that I have gotten at a great value…”
“大爷爷，你没事真的太好了……”睡梦中的江逸满脸泪痕地唤了一声。
Tears streaming down his cheeks, the still-dreaming Jiang Yi whispered, “Grandfather, you’re back, and completely fine! This is great news…”
“大爷，进去玩玩吧！我们风月楼的姑娘可是最会疼人的！”
"Sir, come in and enjoy yourself! Our Fengyue Brothel's ladies are best at pampering you!"
“大魔导士果然厉害……”自从穿越之后，林立第一次遇到了无法抗衡的对手，一种深深的挫败感不由从心头涌起。
An archmage is indeed impressive... It was the first time Lin Li had met an adversary impossible to overcome ever since he had time travelled. A profound sense of frustration sprung from his heart.
“天地浩浩，唯大道永恒，欲证天道，必先修自身……”
“In the vastness of the heaven and earth, only The Way is eternal. To obtain proof of heavenly law, one must first cultivate oneself…”
“太好了！”葛瑞安面露喜色，也不等林立多问，急急忙忙的就带着两人到了三楼大厅。
"Great!" Gerian's face beamed with delight. Without any further questions from Lin Li, he hurriedly brought the two of them to the hall on the third level.
“失败的任务同样要交，不然我们就不能再接其他任务了。”
"We have to turn in failed quests as well, or we won't be able to receive new ones."
“她没机会了。”林立看了达芙妮一眼，低声说出了自己的判断。
Lin Li took a glance at Daphne and concluded in a low voice, "She has no chance anymore."
“好……好久不见……”克伦威尔下意识的往后缩了缩，因为鼻子受伤的关系，断断续续的声音中还带着一丝鼻音。
"Long... long time no see..." Cromwell backed down subconsciously. Due to his wounded nose, there was a faint twang in the broken voice.
“好。”一看老家伙脸上的神色，林立就知道他在想些什么，一时间倒也不好再继续留他。
"Sure," Lin Li knew what he was up to upon a mere look of the old man's face. For a moment, it was not so nice to insist he stayed.
“好丹药！”
"What a good elixir!"
“好了小子，虽然我不知道你为什么会来到这里……”白袍老人看了一眼床头的苍穹之杖，这才带着几分不耐烦的神色对林立说道：“当然我也没兴趣知道！总之落日山脉不是一个适合郊游的地方，如果你只是想找点刺激，或者闲得无聊想锻炼自己，那我倒是可以奉劝你一句，从哪里来回哪里去，不要跑到落日山脉来干这种找死的事。”

"Alright kid, though I don't know why you came here..." The old man took a glance at the Celestial Cane placed on the side of the bed, and with an impatient look on his face, he turned to Lin Li. "And of course I have no wish to know why! In any case, the Sunset Mountains are not a place for excursions. If you're looking for some thrill or would like to train yourself out of boredom, then I'll offer you one advice. Go back where you come from and don't ever come seeking death in the Sunset Mountains."
“好了，易公子，我先回去了！”
"Alright, Young Master Yi, I'll be leaving!"
“好了，相信少爷，我会有办法的，先进去吧。”
"Alright, trust in your young master; I will come up with a plan. Head on in."
“好刺激！”双足飞龙刚一现身，林立两只眼睛顿时直了。
"Exciting!" Lin Li stared at the Wyvern fervently as it appeared.
“好吧好吧……既然你这么有诚意，那我就不客气了……”林立逗小孩似的拍了拍利维坦猩猩的脑袋，大概是因为弄了个戒指心情不错的缘故，此时再看利维坦猩猩，倒也不象先前那般面目可憎了。

"Alright... Since you're so sincere, then I shall gladly take it..." Lin Li patted the Leviathan Gorilla's head in a way that looked like he was teasing a child. He was in a fairly good mood, probably due to the acquisition of the ring, and the Leviathan Gorilla did not seem to look that repulsive as it did.
“好吧！”
"Alright then!"
“好吧，费雷，你这是第一次去加洛斯城？”
”Alright. Felic, is this your first visit to Jarrosus City?”
“好啊！在这炼丹房才做事一天，你都装起来了？”
"Good! You've only been working in the alchemy lab for a day, and you're already protecting yourself?"
“好嘞，来人取十枚灵神丹来。”
"Right away, sir. Servants, fetch me ten Spirit Pills."
“好多丹药……”
"So many elixirs..."
“好机会！”
"That was such a good opportunity!"
“好的爸爸。”
“Yes, Father.”
“好的，城主大人。”
"Yes, Master Castellan."
“好的，我马上去办！”
"Okay, I'll get right down to it!"
“好的，请两位到这边看看。”
"Sure. Please follow me."
“好的，麻烦您稍等一下。
"Sure, please wait."
“好神奇……”
"How weird..."
“好神奇，这黑色元力竟能让丹药的药力增强？”
"How weird! To think that this black essence force could actually increase the medicinal power of an elixir..."
“好象是跟阴影之都有点冲突，当时时间有点紧，葛瑞安叔叔也没跟我细说，只是让我告诉你宴会的事。”
"Seems like there's a conflict with Shadow City. Time was tight so Uncle Gerian did not tell me the details. He only told me to inform you of the banquet."
“好象是这样，怎么了，女朋友？”
"Seems like it. Why, is it your girlfriend?"
“好险！”
"What a close shave!"
"Alright!"
“好！”小奴对于江逸的话从不怀疑，顿时憨笑个不停，跟着江逸快步朝自家小院走去。
"Good!" Jiang Yi had never questioned Jiang Yi's words. She immediately smiled naively as she followed Jiang Yi with quick steps towards the small courtyard of their home.
"Alright! I will crawl..."
“好，不变招了你就等着输吧！缠丝手！迷幻步！”
"Great, prepare to lose if you weren't going to change your technique! Silk Hand! Psychedelic Step!"
“好，不错！小子你很不错！”
"Nice, well done! Well done, you brat!"
“好，中计了！”
Good, he fell for my trick!
“如今的你，不过区区孤家寡人罢，现在死到临头了，你不垂死挣扎一番，莫非还有什么遗言要留？”
"You are now just a lonely man in your final moments, and yet you are not putting up a struggle. Hmph, don't tell me that you still have a dying wish?"
“如果你也拥有一枚强能水晶的话，我想你现在也会笑得跟我一样……”虽然在回答葛瑞安的问题，但老梅林的眼睛，却始终盯着手中的水晶，那七彩斑斓的光晕让他有些陶醉，也有些不舍。

"If you had the Strong Energy Crystal, you'd probably be smiling like me now..." Though he was answering Gerian's questions, his eyes were fixated on the crystal on his hand. He was somewhat enchanted by the colorful halo, and also somewhat unwilling to shift his eyes away from it.
“如果能跟他学习药剂知识……”罗琳又神色复杂的望了林立一眼，先前那个已经被放弃掉的想法，却又在她心中悄悄滋生了，而且这一次，比先前更加坚定。

If I could learn potion knowledge from him... Rowling took another glance at Lin Li with a complex expression. The idea that had been abandoned earlier bred quietly in her heart once more, and this time, it was firmer than before.
“妈的，你讲不讲道理？”马森气得满脸通红，一只手指着霍伦：“马迪亚斯打伤欧灵的时候，怎么没人把他抓进地牢？现在轮到费雷，就成了伤害同僚了？”

"Damn, can you think rationally?" Marson turned red with anger and pointed at Hoeren. "When Mathias injured Orrin, why did no one send him to the dungeon? When it comes to Felic, it becomes injuring a fellow mage?"
“妈的，真以为穿着长袍的就是斯文人？”林立笑得一脸阳光，围观群众怎么也想不明白，这个看似无害的少年法师，怎么下起手来却出奇的毒辣，两条大汉连爪子都还没来得及递出去，就一人一发奥术飞弹给轰出了十几米远，此时正躺在地上发出一阵阵痛苦的呻吟。

"Damn. You'd really thought anyone wearing a long robe would be a cultured person?" Lin Li was beaming. The crowd of onlookers couldn't understand how this seemingly harmless young mage could be so vicious in his strikes. The two burly men had yet to deliver their claws when they were each sent a dozen meters away by an Arcane Missile, and were groaning in pain on the ground at the moment.
“妈的，老子要疯了……”
"Hell, I'm going crazy..."
“妖孽，妖孽……”人群中一名花白胡子的魔法师神情呆滞。
"Demon, demon..." A grey-bearded mage in the crowd looked on with a glazed expression.
“姬听雨？这聚珍阁果然是姬家的商号，这位看来是城主家的小姐了。”
"Ji Tingyu? This Pearl Gathering Pavilion is certainly the business establishment of the Ji Family, and this lady must be the daughter of the City Lord's family.
“姬小姐实力强大，在下佩服。”江逸苦涩一笑，铸鼎境八重的武者战力果然彪悍，如果不是元力被封印，怕是他一招都接不下。

"Young Mistress Ji's power is enormously great, I truly admire it and admit being weaker." Jiang Yi smiled with some bitter agony. The combat ability of a martial artist with a power level in the eighth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm was indeed formidable. If not for both their essence forces being sealed off from use, it was likely that he would not even be able to withstand a single attack technique.
“娘亲，干爷爷，孩儿，孩儿的封印终于有希望破开了……”他睁开眼睛，轻声的喃喃一声，满脸都是狂喜和落寞！
"Mum, God-Granddad, your son... your son finally has hope of breaking his seal..." he muttered in a low voice as he opened his eyes, his face filled with ecstasy and loneliness!
“孺子可教，这名江家子弟果然比江松聪明多了……”
"This boy is promising and worthy of being taught. This son of the Jiang Clan is definitely much smarter than Jiang Song..."
“安……安度因大师……”霍伦怎么也没有想到，这个老家伙居然说翻脸就翻脸，完全不给父亲奥德文一点面子，眼看着无穷无尽的魔法元素涌起，霍伦整个人都已经被吓傻了，他完全想不明白，这个叫费雷的年轻法师，究竟是什么来头，竟然能让安度因发这么大的火。

"Ma-Master Andoine..." Hoeren had never thought that he would suddenly turn hostile, showing no consideration for his father Odwin's feelings. Looking at the endless spurt of elemental magic, Hoeren was completely terrified. He could not comprehend how on earth where this young mage called Felic came from, and how he had made Andoine so furious.
“安东尼先生，你认识这个魔法师吗？”青年看上去二十多岁，面容英俊白皙，一头华丽的金发，在水晶灯下阳光般耀眼，他身上穿着一件剪裁得体的礼服，从那精细的做工看来，想必是出自名师之手，身上没佩带什么饰物，只是右手无名指上戴有一枚镶着红宝石的戒指。

"Mr Anthony, do you know this mage?" The young man looked to be in his twenties. He had a handsome, fair face and gorgeous blond hair, dazzling like sunshine under the crystal chandeliers. He wore a well-tailored dress suit which, judging from the fine craftsmanship, had been made by a famous designer. He had no other accessories except for a ruby ring on the fourth finger of his right hand.
“安度因大师，你这是什么意思？”霍伦脸色苍白，就好象刚刚大病过一场，这是魔力反噬的结果，高达十五级魔法被人打断，可不象低级魔法那么轻松，即便是以他高阶大魔导士的实力，也几乎是用尽了所有力量，才终于控制住了混乱的魔力。

"Master Andoine, what does this mean?" Hoeren's face turned pale, as if he had just contracted a severe disease. This was the result of the counter-reaction of mana. Cutting off magic as high as level-fifteen was not as easy as performing low level magic. Even if he used the strength of a high-level Archmage, he would also have had used almost all of his power to control the chaotic mana.
“安度因法师说他还有些事情要办，大概要过一两周才能回加洛斯城。”
"Mage Andoine said he had something to see to, and he'll only return to Jarrosus City in a week or two."
“安度因真没说错，你这小家伙真是属狼的，谁要是惹了你，非要咬一口回来不可……”灰袍法师摇了摇头，神色间有些好笑也有些无奈：“算了，反正都已经断了一根手指，多断一根正好平衡一下……”

"Andoine was really right. You, little fellow, are a wolf. You must bite back at anyone who provoked you..." The mage in gray robe shook his head, his expression amused yet helpless. "Forget it. He had already lost a finger anyway, losing one more would balance it out..."
“安度因这老混蛋……”林立咬牙切齿的骂了一句，心里更是早将安度因祖宗十八代都给问候遍了，这老不死的实在有些不负责任，连山洞里还有没有狮蝎都不搞清楚，就敢放放心心的把自己往里面送。

"Old bastard Andoine..." Lin Li cursed between clenched teeth, and had paid greetings to all eighteen generations of Andoine's family in his heart. How irresponsible of the old fellow, sending him to the cave in assurance without having any idea if there were any Manticores in it.
“安度因，你……你不能杀我！”
"Andoine, you... you can't kill me!"
“安眠水晶？”曾经在药剂上下过一番苦功的林立，又怎么会不知道这东西的来头，当初在无尽世界的时候，林立手上就曾经有那么一枚，只可惜当初为了寻找适合的珠宝匠雕刻，这枚水晶就一直放在猎人身上，以至于穿越的时候，竟没能一起带来。

"The Hypnotic Crystal?" How could Lin Li, who had worked hard learning pharmaceuticals, not know where this crystal came from? Lin Li possessed one of these when he was at the Endless World, only it was a pity that while finding a suitable jeweler to carve it, the crystal kept landing in the hands of hunters. He could not bring it with him when he travelled through time.
“完了……”想起加洛斯交易所外那两个倒霉鬼，凯文就知道要坏事了，两人相处了这么久，他也算是摸清了林立的性格，这个年轻魔法师跟葛瑞安的性格简直一模一样，只要不把他惹毛，什么话都好说，可一旦惹毛了这家伙，下起手来绝对是不留情面，不动就不动，一动绝对是往死里动。

This is the end... Kevin knew things were bad as he recalled the two unlucky men outside Jarrosus Exchange. He had figured out Lin Li's character after being together for a long time—his character was almost like Gerian's. As long as he wasn't provoked, everything could be talked about nicely. But once the fellow was provoked, he would not show any mercy to anyone he laid hands on. He would not move unnecessarily, but once he did move, he would definitely move in the direction of death.
“完了完了……”看到林立仍是一脸微笑，凯文心头就直打鼓。
It's the end... it's the end... Kevin's heart was thumping as he watched Lin Li, who was still smiling away.
“完了！”
"I'm done for!"
“完美！”想到精彩之处，克伦威尔脸上露出了矜持的笑容。
"Perfect!" A reserved smile came to Cromwell's face at the thought of that exciting moment.
“宝石送你好了，我只要那条链子。”林立的眼睛一直盯着那条细细的银质项链，那项链上透出的气息，他实在是再熟悉不过了，当初在无尽世界附魔宗师手上，他就曾感受到过相同的气息。

"I'll let you have the stone, I only want the necklace." Lin Li's eyes were glued to the thin silver necklace. He was too familiar with the aura that was emitting from the necklace. He had once felt the same aura from the enchantment guru back in the Endless World.
“实力如何？”
"What about his strength?"
“实力！”
“Strength!”
“实在很抱歉城主大人，因为公会里出了点事，需要葛瑞安会长去处理一下，今天这个宴会恐怕是赶不上了。”
"I'm really sorry, Master Castellan. Something has cropped up in the guild and requires President Gerian to deal with it. He's unable to make it for the banquet today."
“客气什么，反正这东西我拿着也没什么用……”林立笑了笑：“我还有点事情要办，就不继续跟你们一起走了，如果你们以后有什么事，可以去魔法公会找我，要是不出意外的话，我可能会在那里待上一段时间。”

"You're welcome, I've got no use for it anyway..." Lin Li smiled. "I have things to do, so I won't be going with you anymore. If anything happens to you in the future, you can find me at the Guild of Magic. I should be staying there for some time if nothing else happens."
“对……禀报大总管，禀报刑堂，将江逸处死……”
"Right... report this to the Chief Supervisor, report to the Disciplinary Court, and punish Jiang Yi by giving him the death penalty..."
“对不起……”两人谁也不说话，一直到红发美女率先打破沉默。
Both of them did not speak at all until the redheaded beauty broke the silence. "Sorry..."
“对了……武殿！去武殿内做陪练去！这样不仅可以赚些银钱，还说不定能遇见姬小姐！”
"Right... The Martial Arts Hall! I should go to the Martial Arts Hall and be a sparring partner! Like that, not only can I make some money, I might even be able to meet Young Mistress Ji!"
“对了凯文，你对加洛斯比较熟，你知不知道，冒险者弄到的魔法材料，比如魔晶什么的，一般都在什么地方处理？”
"Kevin, you're familiar with Jarrosus. Do you know where the adventurers usually go to sell magic materials like the magical crystals they've gotten?"
“对了费雷，我听公会的人说，昨天好象有人来找过你。”从等级认证大厅出来之后，凯文有突然想起件事来。
"Oh right, Felic, I heard people from the guild say someone came looking for you yesterday." Kevin had suddenly remembered after they had walked out from the level certification hall.
“对了费雷，这个人你可一定要认识，全加洛斯城，乃至全法兰王国的首富，曼尼斯家族族长——伊瑟拉－曼尼斯！”
"Right. Felic, you must know this person. The richest man in the whole of Jarrosus City all the way till Felan Kingdom, the patriarch of Mannes Family, Ysera Mannes!
“对了费雷，这是凯文，加洛斯魔法公会有名的老好人，你先跟他去办手续，我等下会过来找你们。”
"Oh right. Felic, this is Kevin, the famous nice guy in Jarrosus Guild of Magic. You'll follow him to handle all the paperwork, I'll come and find you later."
“对了！”
"Oh, that's right!"
“对了，你怎么找到这里来的？”
"Oh yes, how did you find this place?"
“对了，先去丹药房领丹药！”
"Right, off to the Elixir Room to retrieve an elixir!"
“对了，有件正事。”走到半路，凯文突然想起件事来：“刚才城主府派人送来了请柬，邀请葛瑞安叔叔去参加一个宴会。”
"Oh, right. Proper business at hand." Kevin suddenly recalled halfway through the journey. "The Castellan has sent someone with an invitation, inviting Uncle Gerian to a banquet."
“对了，武器也要换一把……”但林立根本不去理他，上上下下的打量了一番之后，又自顾自的说道：“你那把双手巨剑倒是不错，可惜你不是魔武双修，没办法发挥它的最大威力，一会我带你去武器店转转，先搞一把称手的用着好了，等过一段时间，我再帮你想想其他办法……”

"Oh yes, you'll need a new weapon too..." ignoring his comments, Lin Li surveyed him up and down and talked to himself, "Your two-handed giant sword is not bad, but it's a pity that you are not trained in both magic and force, so you can't unleash its maximal power. I'll bring you to the arsenal shop later to get you something handy. Then next time, I will help you figure out a way..."
“对了，黑色元力全消耗完了，我得赶紧提炼一些，随时备用。还有昨日回炉蓝色元力也消耗的太多了，得补上一些。”

"Oh yes, I have consumed all of my black essence force. I have to hurry and refine more, so I can use it at any time. Additionally, I consumed too much blue essence force during the reheating yesterday—I have to make up for that loss."
“对！江逸立即放了虎哥，否则虎哥出了事，你绝对死路一条！”
"Right! Jiang Yi, let Brother Hu go immediately, otherwise, should something bad happen to Brother Hu, you would definitely only have one end-result - death!"
“对！没错！不能告诉家族！”
"Right! That's right! We can't tell the family clan!"
“封印元力对练？”
"Sparring with your essence force sealed off?"
“封印符文已经破解了四百枚了，修炼速度达到原先的十五倍，都可比家族的普通子弟修炼速度了！呼……按这速度增幅下去，等全部封印破解掉，我的修炼速度能增幅到何等恐怖的地步？”

"I've already broken four hundred runic patterns on my seal; my cultivation speed is now 15 times as fast as before, on par with an average descendant in the family! Hah... at this rate, just how terrifyingly fast would my cultivation speed become once the seal breaks completely?"
“封印！”
"The seal!"
“尊严？”
"Dignity?"
“尊敬的魔法师先生，请问您需要点什么吗？”
“Greetings to you, Mr. Mage, is there anything I can help you with?”
“小伙子，你是叫费雷吧？”而就在这个时候，宴会大厅的一个僻静角落里，却传出了一个苍老的声音。
"Little kid, you're Felic?" At this time, an aged voice was heard in a quiet corner of the banquet hall.
“小兄弟可以放心，刚才那点小意思算不了什么，等事情办成之后，我一定会重重的酬谢！”中年人红光满面，一口一个小兄弟叫得无比亲热。

"Little buddy, you can rest assured. The small token earlier on was nothing much. When it's done, I'll reward you handsomely!" The middle-aged man was flushed, addressing Lin Li as a "little buddy" ever so affectionately.
“小奴！”
"Xiaonu!"
“小奴，你一定要坚持住！”
"Xiaonu, you need to hang in there!"
“小奴，你的仇……少爷帮你报了！”
"Xiaonu, young master... has avenged you!"
“小奴，我去去就回。”
"Xiaonu, I'm just heading out quickly and will be back in a jiffy."
“小奴，我在这！”
"Xiaonu, I am over here!"
“小奴，走！”
"Let's go, Xiaonu!"
“小子，我知道你醒着，别装睡了，赶紧起来。”老人推开房门，气呼呼的在藤椅上坐下，心里惦记的多半还是那瓶失败的蛮牛之力药剂。

"Kid, I know you're awake. Stop pretending you're asleep and get up quickly." The old man pushed the door open and sat on the vine chair in a huff, in his mind he was probably still thinking about the failed Bull's Strength Potion.
“小小意思。”还没等林立明白过来，那瘦高中年人已将金币塞到了他手里，完了还亲热的拍着他的肩膀：“小兄弟年纪轻轻就进了魔法公会，又跟着凯文魔法师，以后可绝对是前途无量！”

"A small token." Lin Li had yet to grasp the situation and the lanky middle-aged had already stuffed the gold coins into his hand. Then, he patted Lin Li's shoulders affectionately. "Little buddy, you have joined the Guild of Magic at such a young age and have followed Mage Kevin. Your future is definitely promising!"
“小杂碎，哪里跑！”
"Little rascal, where do you think you are going!"
“小杂种，你找死！”
"You bastard, you clearly want to die!"
“小罗琳怎么了？”老格林脸上露出一丝笑意，以他的阅历，又如何看不出罗琳心里藏着心事？
"Why, little Rowling?" A hint of smile appeared on Old Grimm's face. With his experience, how could he not see what was on Rowling's mind?
“小罗琳想拜师了？”老格林笑得有些狡猾：“不知道谁这么幸运，能做小罗琳的老师，让我猜猜……反正肯定不是我这老家伙，对了，是不是刚才出去那个费雷魔法师？”

"Little Rowling is thinking of taking someone as your teacher?" Old Grimm laughed slyly. "I wonder who's the lucky one, getting to teach little Rowling. Let me guess... Anyway, it sure isn't me. Oh right, is it Mage Felic who has just left?"
“小野种，你好卑鄙！”
"Little bastard, you are so despicable!"
“小野种，你，你竟敢用虎哥当武器？”
"You little bastard, you, how you dare to use Brother Hu as a weapon?"
“小野种，看招……”
"Little bastard, take this..."
“少年？”
"A young man? "
“少爷加油！”
"Young Master, all the best!"
“少爷！您有什么吩咐？”刘管事连忙掉头望着马飞，却看到一双阴冷得让人不寒而栗的眸子。
"Young Master! Do you have any instructions?" Housekeeper Liu hastily looked aback at Ma Fei, and was met with a pair of cold and cruel eyes that sent shudders down his spine.
“少爷，你别冲动呀，我可是听说风月楼背后势力很强大的，你不是他们对手！”
"Young Master, please don't be impulsive! I heard that the forces behind the people of Fengyue Brothel are very powerful—you're not their match at all!"
“少爷，你在哪？”
"Young Master, where are you?"
“少爷，你要去哪啊？”
"Young Master, where are you going?"
“少爷，少爷，你没事吧！”
"Young Master, Young Master, are you alright?"
“少爷，春芽说南街那边有个饭庄需要人洗碗，我想和她……”江逸回到家中扒着饭菜，江小奴坐在一边突然诺诺低声说道。

"Young Master, Chunya mentioned that someone is needed at the restaurant at South Street to wash dishes, I am thinking of going with her to..." Jiang Yi had returned home and was having his meal when Jiang Xiaonu, who was sitting beside him, suddenly spoke in a low voice.
“少爷，这真的是紫金吗？我不是在做梦吧？还有……少爷你的封印真的能破开吗？”
"Young Master, is this real purple gold? I'm not dreaming, am I? And... Young Master, can your seal really be broken?"
“少说废话葛瑞安！”
"Cut the crap, Gerian!"
“就一瓶？”林立翻了个白眼，这算什么大事，还以为抢鸡蛋呢……
"Only one bottle?" Lin Li rolled his eyes. What was the big deal about it, he thought they were robbing eggs...
“就他妈这东西还做件皮甲？拿回去给你儿子当尿布还差不多，别他妈跟我废话，五十银币卖不卖？不卖老子买别家的去！”

“You want to make a leather armor with this damn thing? Go back and make a diaper for your son with that. Stop talking rubbish with me, I'll take it for 50 silver coins. If you're unwilling, I'll go to another store!"
“就你这实力，还想杀我？小爷还没认真打呢！”
"With your strength and you want to kill me? I have not yet begun to fight!"
“就因为你那可笑的怀疑，麦格雷尼先生却可能送掉性命，你把你当成了什么，又把病人的生命当成了什么？你说你不是庸医，那你是什么东西，侩子手么？”说到最后林立已是脸色铁青，语气间更是充满了无穷的怨气，就好象他眼前站着的不是一个千娇百媚的美女，而是那个害得父亲终生残疾的庸医。

"It was your ridiculous doubt that nearly caused Mr McGrenn to lose his life. What do you treat yourself as, and what do you treat your patients as? You say you're not a quack, then what are you, a killer?" By the end Lin Li was livid and his tone was filled with endless resentment. It was as if the one standing in front of him was not a charming beauty but the quack who had crippled his father for life.
“就在森林北边，离这不远的地方，你要是真想去的话，我倒是可以带你过去，不过我觉得没什么必要，水晶肯定是没有了……我在那找了两三天，也就找到这么一块，刚才正打算回奥兰纳，谁知道从这里路过的时候，居然看到有人在找你麻烦……”安度因将安眠水晶揣进口袋，一张老脸上满是得意的神色。

"Just at the north of the forest, not far from here. If you really want to go, I can bring you there, but I feel there's no need to do so since the crystal would have definitely run out... I searched for two or three day before finding just this one piece. Just when I was planning to return to Alanna, who knew that when I passed by here, I would see people causing you trouble...: Alanna hid the crystal into his pocket with an expression of delight.
“就是有点可惜了，这么大一块谜蓝宝石，居然镶在条银质项链上，最起码也该弄条秘银项链啊，不然怎么对得起这宝石……”

"But it's a little bit of a pity for such a big Enigma Sapphire to be set into the silver necklace. He should get a mithril necklace at the very least. It doesn't do any justice to the gem the way it is now..."
“就是这里了。”凯文喘着粗气，在一间小屋前停下了脚步。
"Here it is." Kevin panted heavily. He stopped in front of a small hut.
“就是，江逸，再敢动手，别怪我们出手了！”
"That's right. Jiang Yi, if you dare make another move then don't blame us for being harsh!"
“就没有别的可能了？”艾萨克揉着太阳穴，神色间显得有些痛苦。
"Are there no other possibilities?" Isaac massaged his temples, a pained expression seemed to come across his face.
“就这家吧。”今天一天折腾下来，林立也走得有些累了，一看这装备店还开着门，也就懒得再找下家，直接就带着希恩走了进去。

"This one it is," Lin Li himself was a bit exhausted after the long, tiring day. Since the shop had yet to close, he was too lazy to look for the next one. Thus, he walked in with Sheehan without hesitation.
“居然是宝器！这人看来在马家地位不低啊。”
"An actual Treasured Artifact! It seems that this man has quite a high status in the Ma Family."
“居然是这东西！”心头猜测得到证实，林立顿时只觉一阵头大。
"It's actually this thing!" Lin Li felt troubled all of a sudden as his speculation was confirmed.
“巫师之眼。”大概是因为太过疲惫的关系，葛瑞安的声音听上去有些沙哑：“妈的那么多巫师之眼，连老子都不一定能清楚记得它们每一个的位置，阴影之巢的人又怎么知道？”

"Warlock's Eyes." Perhaps it was due to him being over-exhausted, but Gerian's voice sounded slightly hoarse. "Damn it, there were so many Warlock's Eyes; even I can't remember clearly where they are. How did the people from Shadow's Nest know?
“差不多。”林立应了一句，心思却不在这句话上，他很奇怪的望着安度因，发现老法师今天的神色似乎有些疲惫。
“About there,” Lin Li answered distractedly. He curiously stared at Andoine as he realized that the old mage looked pale and tired today.
“差不多就是这样，不过最高议会一般不会直接参与管理。”
"Sort of. But the Supreme Council is usually not directly involved in management."
“差不多算是吧。”林立答得有些含糊：“有个家伙让我去加洛斯城找人……”
"I guess so,” Lin Li answered vaguely. “Some fellow had told me to go to Jarrosus City to look for someone…”
“已经处理得差不多了，只是有两处比较麻烦，买家始终咬着价格不肯松口，我正派人跟他们谈判着，估计再过一会就有好消息传来了。”

"It's almost done, there are two places which are a bit of a trouble. The buyers are biting on to the prices and not willing to compromise. I've sent someone to negotiate with them, we should be expecting some good news soon."
“巴瑟罗尔——住手！”此时艾萨克正低声跟一名中年人说着什么，谁知道刚一抬头，却看见了这令人惊骇欲绝的一幕，在那一刹那间，艾萨克真是心头凉了，那可是魔法公会镇会之宝，若是让他在自己的宴会上出了什么事的话，自己那个便宜叔叔葛瑞安怕是连城主府都会拆掉……

"Bathrilor, stop!" Isaac was talking in a low voice with a middle-aged man, and who knew that when he looked up, he'd witness this horrifying scene. At that instant, Isaac was crushed. That was the treasure of the Guild of Magic. If anything happened to him at the banquet, that convenient uncle Gerian would probably tear down his Castellan Mansion...
“帮个忙如何？”
“How about helping me?"
“干什么的？”林立抹了把冷汗，正要往小屋里走，却不料两条大汉走过来，抬手就把他给挡在了门外。
“What are you doing?" Lin Li wiped the cold sweat off. He was about to enter the hut when two burly men came up and blocked him with raised arms.
“干嘛？”
"What?"
“干它们。”
“Finish them."
“幻影拳！”
"Phantom Punch!"
“应该不会。”林立摇了摇头，否定了葛瑞安的猜测：“奥法药剂这东西局限性太大，你又不是不知道，只有五级以下的魔学徒喝了，才能永久提升魔力，需求量最大的只能是十一魔法家族，他怎么说也是加洛斯名义上的最高长官，怎么可能把这种东西放在眼里……”

"Probably not." Lin Li shook his head, disapproving of Gerian's speculations. "The Arcane Magic Potion has too many limitations. You know it too, only mage apprentice below level-five who has drank it can permanently enhance their mana. The biggest demand can only come from the 11 mage families. He's Jarrosus' highest official in name, how would this stuff interest him..."
“应该是吧……”这一次，就连欧灵都不敢肯定了。
"He should be..." Now, even Orrin was hesitant to confirm.
“应该是罗琳医生来了，费雷先生，你先稍等一下，我去帮她开门。”伊娜有些羞涩的擦去眼中泪水，这才轻快的往楼下跑去。
"It should be Doctor Rowling. Mr Felic, please wait while I get the door." Ina shyly wiped away the tears in her eyes, then ran briskly down the stairs.
“应该还没走远！”
“They shouldn't be too far away!”
“废丹？”
"Useless elixirs?"
“废物！”
"Useless boy!"
“废物，麻利点！”
"Good-for-nothing, be quicker and more efficient!"
“废话少说葛瑞安，今天的事情，你必须给我一个交代。”
"Cut the crap, Gerian. You've got to give me an explanation for what happened today."
“废话！”林立翻了个白眼，决定不再理他，只是在心中暗想，这人可能是心理上有些问题，改天应该建议他去看看医生才是……

"Duh!" Lin Li rolled his eyes and decided not to pay anymore attention to him. In his heart, he thought, This person might have some psychological issues, I should suggest him to see a doctor some other day...
“强能水晶。”凯文有些心不在焉，他很担心葛瑞安的处境，但在林立的一再追问之下，他还是简单的将强能水晶的来历说了一遍：“除了镇定心神与强化冥想效果之外，它还拥有完全恢复魔力的力量，虽然这种力量只能使用一次，但眼下这样的情况，葛瑞安叔叔恐怕……”

"Strong Energy Crystal." Kevin was distracted. He was worried about the circumstances Gerian was in. But after the repeated questioning from Lin Li, he explained the origin of the Strong Energy Crystal in a simple way. "Other than the effects of calming the mind and strengthening meditation, it also has the power to restore mana. Although such power can only be used one, under this situation, I'm afraid Uncle Gerian..."
“当初发现你的时候，我可真没有想到，自己会捡回一个足以媲美格雷斯科的魔法天才。”老法师笑了笑，苍老的声音中带着几分感慨：“到现在我都无法相信，你以前居然从来没接触过魔法。”

”When I first found you, I have not thought that I have found a mage genius.” The old mage laughed, his husky voice tinged with emotion. “Until now, I still don’t believe that you have never learnt magic before.”
“当时我跟爸爸正被一只双足飞龙追杀，就是费雷先生突然出现救了我们，还有还有……之后我又被一头大猩猩给抓去了……”
"Father and I had been pursued by a Wyvern. It was Mr Felic who had appeared suddenly and saved us. And, and... Afterwards I was captured by a large gorilla..."
“当时我还没空理他，只是让科林去带了个话，警告这蠢货最好别打你的主意。”说到这里，葛瑞安闷哼一声：“想不到这白痴居然这么不知进退，今天下午又派了人来，这一次他甚至还敢威胁起我来了，说要是不照他意思办的话，他将说服家族终止与公会的生意合作。”

"I didn't have the time to care about it, and only sent Colin to warn them that they had better not find any trouble with you." At this, Gerian let out a muffled groan. "But this idiot doesn't know where to stop. This morning, he sent someone else here again, and this time, he dared to threaten me, saying that if I don't do according to his wishes, he'll convince his family to terminate all business contracts with the guild."
“当然了，象加洛斯交易所这样的地方，怎么可能不受某支势力保护。”说起这个凯文就有点头疼：“保护这里的是老奥丁，加洛斯最大的地下势力——不过这不是重点，关键是老奥丁跟魔法公会关系一向良好，跟葛瑞安会长更是从小就认识的朋友，你这么不声不响的把人给揍了，葛瑞安会长不好跟老奥丁交代……”

"Of course. How can a place like Jarrosus Exchange not have the protection of some sort of force?" Kevin's head throbbed at the mention of this. "The one who protects this place is Old Odin, the largest underground force in Jarrosus. The important thing is, Old Odin has always maintained a good relationship with the Guild of Magic, and has been friends with President Gerian since young. You've beaten them up without a word, it'll be hard for President Gerian to explain it to Old Odin..."
“当然有问题……”林立很无力的看了他一眼，都不知道该怎么说才好了，丢了西瓜捡了芝麻，这老家伙居然还在那沾沾自喜。
"Of course there's a problem..." Lin Li weakly looked at him, not knowing what to say. Andoine had thrown the watermelon and picked up its seeds, yet he was still so pleased with himself.
“当然！”
"Of course!"
“当然，不信你问问你学生去。”反正麦德林脸皮也厚，被老家伙蠢货蠢货的叫着，也只当是被蚊子咬了两口，硬着头皮承认之后，又赔着笑脸，小心翼翼的劝道：“要不，你就看在奥德文的面子上，把这小子给放了吧……”

"Of course. If you don't believe me you can ask your student." Medellin was also thick-skinned Being called an idiot over and over again by this old man was no more than a few mosquito bites. After cheekily admitting this, he smiled and very cautiously warned: "Otherwise, just think about Odwin's reputation, let this one go..."
“很简单！”
"Very easy!"
“很遗憾，我确实猜到了……”林立笑了笑，伸手拿出了自己的法杖。
"It's a pity that I have indeed guessed correctly..." Lin Li chuckled and took out his staff.
“快三更了，拖了这么久，得尽快把伤口处理好，免得小奴回来唠叨！”
“Damn, it’s almost midnight! Why did I dilly-dally for so long? I’d better deal with my wounds quickly before Xiaonu returns home and starts nagging me!”
“快去禀报家族刑堂，禀报大总管！”
"Quickly go and report it to the family clan Disciplinary Court! Report this situation to the Chief Supervisor!"
“快天黑了，再坐一会就回家吧，迟些小奴又会担心了。”
"The sky is about to turn dark. I'll stay here for just a bit longer before heading home. If I stay for too much longer, Xiao Nu will get worried again."
“快注入元力，回炉……”
"Quick, add some essence force! Melt them down..."
“快，快！背上虎哥！”
"Quick, quick! Carry Brother Hu!"
“怎么不能增幅下我的修炼速度？修炼速度还是慢如蜗牛，而且这黑色元力只能提炼出十缕太少太少了，就算这黑色元力再变态，我以后也只能对付铸鼎境界二三重的武者，还是个废物……”

"Why can't it increase my cultivation speed? My growth is still as slow as a snail. Additionally, I can only refine ten strands of black essence force, which is simply too little. No matter how obscene the power of this black essence force, I can only deal with an opponent at the second or third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. I'm clearly still useless..."
“怎么不见小奴？”
"Where is Xiaonu?"
“怎么个不划算法？”葛瑞安一听生意，满肚子火气一下就没了踪影，特别是听到不划算的时候，更是一下就呆住了，在那带着满脸的狐疑望着林立。

"How does it not pay?" As soon as Gerian heard the word 'business', all his anger was gone. In particular, he was dumbfounded when he heard that it would not pay, and looked at Lin Li with confusion on his face.
“怎么了，艾萨克叔叔？”巴瑟罗尔似乎是对自己这一击相当满意，悠闲的将一块餐巾从头上拿开，又拍了拍手，这才露出了一脸轻松的笑意，只是当他转过头来时，却又看见了艾萨克脸色铁青的站在那里，一时间巴瑟罗尔不由有几分疑惑。

"Why, Uncle Isaac?" Bathrilor seemed to be satisfied with his strike. He leisurely removed a napkin from his head and clapped his hands, displaying a relaxed smile on his face. But when he turned around, he saw Isaac standing there with an ashen face, and couldn't help but feel puzzled by it.
“怎么了？”
"What happened?"
“怎么了？你别急……慢慢说。”一句话听得林立心头一紧，凯文行事向来沉稳，很有些泰山崩于前不形于色的风范，在魔法公会这么长时间，林立还从未见他如此慌张过，特别是张口说出的第一句话，竟然是“出事了”！

"What happened? Don't rush, speak slowly." Lin Li's heart tightened at his words. Kevin had always acted with poise, possessing a demeanor that wouldn't flip even if a mountain collapsed before his eyes. Lin Li had never seen him so flustered after being in the Guild of Magic for so long, especially when the first thing that he said was actually "something has happened"!
“怎么会这样？没道理啊！”
"How can this be? This doesn't make sense!"
“怎么会？”
"Why would that be so?"
“怎么办？”在公会大厅里等了一个小时，凯文脸上的神色已经有些不自然了。
"What do we do now?" Kevin‘s face was already strained after waiting for an hour in the guild's hall.
“怎么办？回头再来？”
"What should I do? Come back later?"
“怎么可能，一个真正的药剂大师，一生中最值得骄傲的事永远只有两件，一件是配出新的药剂，另一件就是找到一个可以传承知识的弟子，就好象你格林爷爷我，都一百多岁的人了，还天天为收个好徒弟忙前忙后……”

"How could it be? There are only two things that a true potion master is proud of in his whole life. One is concocting a new potion, and the other is finding a disciple who can inherit his knowledge. Just like Grandpa Grimm. I am over a hundred years old but I'm still busying myself everyday with trying to find a good apprentice..."
“怎么回事？”
"What happened?"
“怎么弄啊？”
"How on earth do I make these?"
“怎么是你这蠢货？”
"What are you, this idiot, doing here?"
“怎么样，没受什么伤吧？”老人神色之间，带着浓浓的关切。
"How was it, you're not injured, are you?" The old man's expression carried great concern.
“怎么样？”
"How was it?"
“怎么研究呢？下午拳头、腿、手肘、眼睛都试过了，要不试试耳朵？”
"How should I research? This afternoon, I've already tried it with my fists, legs, elbows, and eyes. How about I try with my ears?"
“怎么这么年轻？”林立有些意外，微微愣了一下。
"Why is he so young?" Lin Li was rather surprised, and was slightly stunned for a moment.
“怎么这表情？”葛瑞安这两天安排凯文干的那些破事，林立比谁都清楚，一看凯文那愁眉苦脸的表情，这家伙就不厚道的笑了起来：“怎么样，这两天收了不少好处吧？”

"What's with the expression?" Lin Li knew best the kind of crap Gerian had arranged for Kevin to do these two days. The fellow smirked unkindly upon seeing Kevin's sorrowful face. "How was it? I bet you've reaped in some profits these few days?"
“怎么？”林立笑咪咪的随口问了一句：“有后台？”
"Why? They have backing?" Lin Li asked casually with a grin.
“怎么？怕了？”
"What's the matter? Are you scared?"
“怒焰之袍！”他身上穿着的，竟然是怒焰之袍！
The Robe of Wrath! He was actually wearing the Robe of Wrath!

“怕不光是运气差这么简单吧……”林立心里嘀咕着，在这住了一个多月，他也算是看出来了，老安度因在魔法上的造诣确实无与伦比，可在药剂学上，却比一个刚入门的学徒更加糟糕，刚入门的学徒至少还知道循序渐进，安度因可完全不管这一套，上手就要挑战高难度，如今又有了林立这个药剂大师在身边，出了什么事有大师收拾，老家伙干起这种事来也就更加肆无忌惮了，弄得个药剂室里天天都象是在过春节，要是哪天不炸上几次，那一定是老家伙吃错药了。

"Afraid it's not just bad luck..." Lin Li muttered to himself. After living here for more than a month, he could see that old Andoine's attainments in magic were truly unparalleled. But in pharmaceutics, he was worse than an apprentice who had just started out. An apprentice would at least learn how to do it gradually, but Andoine completely ignored the proper steps and chose to take up challenging tasks from the beginning. Now that there was a potion master around to clean up whatever trouble was caused, the old man became more brazen in his actions, making it seem as if there was Spring Festival celebration everyday in the lab. If there were no explosions someday, it would be because the old man had taken the wrong medicine.
“怪物……怪物……怪物把……把伊娜抓走了！”克伦威尔的样子看上去异常狼狈，一身华贵的法师袍上沾满了泥砂和树叶，说起话来也是一副上气不接下气的样子。
“Monster… monster… monster took… took Ina away!” Cromwell looked extremely wretched, his luxurious mage robe covered with mud and leaves as he gasped for breath between words.
“总之就是这么回事，黄昏诅咒这东西算不上什么大麻烦，不过不是你们医生能碰的，我说红头发小妹妹，你还是安心回去当你的庸医好了，没事别跑出来害人。”林立可不管她什么心情，一番长篇大论之后，毫不客气的做出了结论，只是跟葛瑞安相处太久，一张嘴巴也不由变得毒辣起来。

"Anyway, this is what happened. This Twilight Curse is not a big problem, but it is not something you doctors can touch. I say, redheaded little sis, go back and be the quack doctor you are, don't come out for nothing and harm others." Regardless of her emotions, Lin Li was not at all polite to come to a conclusion after the long speech. But he had spent too much time with Gerian, and had become unforgiving in his words.
“总之，你就放心好了，今天只是个意外，伤害费雷？别说我麦德林不允许，就连奥德文，也绝不会允许霍伦这么胡来！”最后麦德林用这样一句话做出总结。

"In short, you can rest easy. Today was only an accident. Injuring Felic? No need to mention that I, Medellin, will not allow it; even Odwin would never allow Hoeren do fool around like this!" In the end Medellin concluded with this sentence.
“恢复魔力？”林立不由愕然，葛瑞安那老家伙看起来挺聪明的一个人，平时也很懂得压榨老子的剩余价值，怎么今天看到一块破水晶，居然就这么被吓傻了？莫非是跟老梅林一战，把他脑子给打坏掉……

"Restore mana?" Lin Li was astounded. That old fellow Gerian looked to be a smart person, and knew how to exploit his own surplus value usually. How could he see a broken crystal today and be scared silly by it? Was it possible that the battle with Old Merlin had damaged his brain...
“恩……”林立点了点头，没再继续说话。
"Mm..." Lin Li nodded and spoke no more.
“恩……”老格林接过玻璃瓶，打开瓶盖凑到鼻前，轻轻吸了口气。
"Mm..." Old Grimm took the glass bottle. He removed the cap and brought the bottle close to his nose, taking in a slight whiff.
“恩。”伊娜很乖巧的点了点头，自从父亲倒下之后，小姑娘一颗心已经完全乱了，此时在林立的不断安抚之下，才稍稍恢复了一些先前的生气。
"Yes." Ina nodded obediently. Since her father collapsed, the girl's heart had been at sixes and sevens. Under Lin Li's constant reassurance, she had recovered some of her previous vigor.
“恩。”老梅林脸上的神色有些沉重：“这三十瓶奥法药剂对梅林家来说，可能是一次机遇，也可能是一场灾难……”
"Yes." Old Merlin's expression was serious. "The 30 bottles of Arcane Magic Potion may be an opportunity or a disaster for our Merlin Family..."
“恩恩……差不多是这么回事……”
"Mm, mm... Something like that..."
“Alright!"
“恩，就这么办。”葛瑞安点了点头，正打算找个魔法师委以重任，却又犹豫了一下：“干脆还是我亲自去一趟好了，这样显得比较尊重……”
"Mm, we'll do just that." Gerian nodded. He was going to entrust a mage with this important task but hesitated. "I shall just do it personally, it'll seem more respectful this way..."
“恩，这次我听你的。”葛瑞安目送林立离去，又幸灾乐祸的恐吓那倒霉魔导士：“弱智，刚才给过你机会了，自己不懂得好好把握，现在好了，把那小子给惹了出来，你别看他斯斯文文，下手可比老子凶残多了，逼得他亲自动手，还不知道要弄出什么变态药剂出来，说不定就是那种一瓶喝下去，就会浑身发痒溃烂，并且要痛够一年才死的东西……

"Mm, I'll listen to you this time." Gerian watched Lin Li leave, and threatened the unlucky Magic Shooter in a gloating manner, "Retard, you were given a chance just now but didn't know how to grasp it. Now you've roused that kid out. He may look gentle, but his strikes are more savage than mine. You've forced him to take action in person; who knows what kind of sick potion he'll concoct this time. Maybe it's the kind that itches and festers all over and takes a year of pain before dying..."
"Hm?"
“您不知道？”克伦威尔心头又骂了一句乡巴佬，只是脸上却依旧保持着笑容：“最高议会明文规定，五级以上魔法师新到一座城市，必须在该城市魔法公会报道。”

"You don't know?" Cromwell swore silently at the country bumpkin, but kept the smile on his face. "The Supreme Council has made it clear that all mages above level five must report to the city's Guild of Magic upon their first arrival."
“您先看看这瓶清醒药剂。”林立从口袋中摸出一只兰色玻璃瓶，递给了对面的格林－伯恩塞德。
"Please have a look at this bottle of Sobriety Potion." Lin Li pulled out a blue glass bottle from his pocket and passed it across to Grimm Burnside.
“您太客气了。”林立牙关紧咬，瞬间激发出变态的精神力，勉强与老梅林立维持着差距悬殊的较量。
"You're too polite." Lin Li clenched his jaws, sparking an abnormal mental strength all of a sudden, barely enduring the battle with Old Merlin where he faced too huge a gap in the first place.
“您太过奖了……”林立笑得很谦虚，却说出了一句所有人都想不到的话来：“不过我最近确实遇到了不少问题，如果能跟您探讨探讨的话，那自然是再好不过了，您现在有时间吗？不如我们去那边喝一杯怎么样？”

"You flatter me..." Lin Li smiled modestly. No one had expected to hear the words that followed. "But I've indeed encountered a lot of problems lately, so it would be great if I could talk to you about it. Do you have time now? Why don't we go over there for a drink?"
“您太过奖了。”林立笑得谦虚，目光却一直盯着灰袍法师：“现在您能不能告诉我，您除了是安度因的老朋友之外，还有其他别的什么身份？”
"You flatter me." Lin Li grinned modestly, but his eyes were fixed on the mage in gray robe. "Now, can you tell me, other than being Andoine's friend, do you have other identities?”
“您就是葛瑞安会长吧？”林立赶紧翻了翻口袋，从里面掏出安度因的信递了过去：“我叫费雷，是安度因法师叫我来找您的，这是他给您写的一封信。”

"You're President Gerian, right?" Lin Li hastily turned over his pockets. He took out Andoine's letter and handed them over. "I am Felic. Mage Andoine had told me to look for you. This is a letter he wrote to you."
“您是说……克伦威尔？”
"You mean... Cromwell?"
“您有什么事？安东尼先生。”凯文心头一喜，脸上却挤出几分为难：“您是对拍卖过程有什么疑问吗？”
"What's the matter, Mr Anthony?" Kevin was inwardly delighted, but managed to put on a troubled expression on his face. "Do you have any doubts regarding the auctioning process?"
“您有办法？”罗琳听见这话，一双美目亮了起来。
"You have an idea?" Rowling beautiful eyes lit up at those words.
“您真是太过奖了。”林立神色谦虚恭谨，一双眼睛却一直鬼鬼祟祟的瞄着巴瑟罗尔，一边分出一丝精神力对他进行压制，一边还悄悄在心里计算着他双手流血的时间……

"You really flatter me." Lin Li's expression was modest and respectful, but his eyes were furtively glancing at Bathrilor. He was silently calculating the time Bathrilor's hands were bleeding while repressing him with a hint of mental strength.
“您认识巴瑟罗尔？”暗地里动的手脚被人揭穿，林立却是一点也不觉得尴尬，只是装出一脸惊讶的表情：“那这么说，先前那层魔力是您放出的？”

"You know Bathrilor?" The dirty tricks he did in secret were exposed, but Lin Li was not the least embarrassed. He pretended to give a look of surprise. "So that's to say, the layer of magic previously was released by you?"
“您说得没错，伊瑟拉族长……”
"You are right, Chief Ysera..."
“您连最高议会都不知道？”林立的无知让克伦威尔大开眼界，虚荣心极大满足之余，忍不住又在心骂了句乡巴佬：“最高议会成立于黑暗年代之后，全称是安瑞尔魔法公会最高仲裁议会，成立的目的，是为了更好的对魔法公会进行监督和管理，当然——魔法家族不在管理之例，比如我们梅林家族。”

"You don't even know of the Supreme Council?" Lin Li's ignorance had been an eye-opener for Cromwell. Feeling his vanity greatly satisfied, he couldn't help but swear inwardly at the country bumpkin again. "The Supreme Council was established after the Dark Ages, and its full name is the Supreme Council of the Anril Guild of Magic. The purpose of its establishment is for the better supervision and management of the guild. Of course, the mage families are not included in the management, like the Merlin Family."
“想清楚了吗？”见林立久久不语，巴瑟罗尔神色间更是有些得意，他仿佛已经看到了对方屈辱的认错，又被自己赶到罗琳小姐面前道歉时的情景……

"Have you thought it through?" Seeing Lin Li did not respond for a long while, Bathrilor looked even more pleased. He seemed to already see the other party's humiliating admission of guilt and the apology to Miss Rowling after being pushed by him...
“想清楚了，简单点说，就是我不道歉的话，可能会很惨很惨……”林立很老实的点了点头，他确实是想清楚了：“可想清楚之后，我还是决定不道歉。”

"I've thought it through. Simply put, if I don't apologize, I would be very, very miserable..." Lin Li nodded earnestly. He had indeed thought it through carefully. "But after thinking through, I've still decided not to."
“想笑就笑吧，憋得这么辛苦，也不怕憋出内伤来……”林立撇了撇嘴，也有些好奇的凑了过去：“来来来，跟我说说到底怎么回事，城主大人怎么会叫你叔叔的？难道你真认识他老爸？”

"Laugh if you want, why try so hard to hold it in. Aren't you scared you'll suffer internal injuries from holding it in..." Lin Li pouted and moved closer out of curiosity. "Come, come, tell me what exactly happened. Why did the Castellan address you as uncle? Could it be that you really know his father?"
“想要我的命？凭你也配？”
"You want my life? With what army?"
“想逃？”
"Planning to run?"
“愿望术！那是愿望术卷轴！”卷轴刚一过手，就有识货的玩家叫了出来。
"The Wishes Spell! That is the scroll of Wishes!" Only players who knew their stuff exclaimed as the scroll was passed.
“成交！”
"Deal!"
“成交！恭喜埃文先生！”
"Deal! Congratulations, Mr Evan!"
“成色不对，又废了一炉，不炼了……他娘亲的问题出在哪？难道是药剂添加的不对？我昨日到底不小心添加了什么药剂才炼出地阶丹药？”

"It's the wrong color. I've made yet another useless pot. I'm not refining any longer... Where on earth does the problem lie at? Could it be that medicinal compounds were added incorrectly? What did I accidentally add in yesterday that allowed me to refine that Earth-tier elixir?"
“我……”听他这么一问，希恩那张黝黑的脸上，却浮起了一丝尴尬，犹豫了好半天之后，才有些扭捏的说道：“我……我只有这一件皮甲。”
"This..." a tinge of embarrassment appeared on Sheehan's swarthy face upon hearing the question. After a long hesitation, he replied bashfully, "This... This is my only leather armor."
“我……”罗琳长这么大，还从来没有人对她这么不客气过，一时间又是委屈又是恼怒，一双美目雾气朦胧，晶莹的泪珠在眼眶中打着转，眼看就要滴了下来。

"I..." Rowling had never been treated so unkindly by others before. She was aggrieved and angry in that instant; her beautiful eyes fogged and tears were glistening in her eyes, looking as if ready to fall anytime.
“我……我只是想道歉……”被人一眼看穿心思，罗琳俏脸上红晕更甚。
"I... I only wanted to apologize..." Being seen right through at once, Rowling blushed even brighter.
“我……我能不能请问一下，这里究竟是什么地方？”林立的声音干涩得连他自己都有些诧异，他很害怕白袍老人会说出一个熟悉的地名，一堆数据出现在现实世界并不可怕，真正可怕的是自己也变成了一堆数据，就好象恐怖片里经常出现的情节，一缕怨魂寄居在网络当中，靠着各种杀人网站来寻找替身……

"May... May I ask where in the world is this place?" Lin Li's voice was so hoarse that it surprised him. He was afraid the old man would mention a place he was familiar with. A load of data appearing in the real world was not frightening, what was really frightening was him becoming a load of data—just like the plot that often appeared in horror movies. A wisp of resentful soul sojourning in the network, relying on various killing websites to find a substitute.
“我不会。”林立摇了摇头，在口袋里摸了摸，找出一只玻璃瓶来：“不过它会。”
"I don't know." Lin Li shook his head. He fumbled about in his pockets and pulled out a glass bottle. "But it knows."
“我不是说了吗，因为你不在。”葛瑞安脸上第一次露出了严肃的神色：“这一次拍卖会，将会吸引加洛斯所有的势力，如果你不在的话，我怎么把这些势力介绍给你？”

"Didn't I tell you, because you're not here." Gerian's expression was serious for the first time. "This auction will attract all the forces in Jarrosus. How can I introduce all these forces to you if you're not present?"
“我不知道你在说什么……”
"I don't know what you are talking about..."
“我不能容忍他从背后偷袭我，不过您是安度因的朋友，我也不想看着您为难。”林立依旧笑容满面，就好象刚才的一切都没有发生过：“所以，这是最好的办法。”

"I can't tolerate him sneaking in an attack from behind. But you are Andoine's friend, I don't want to put you on the spot too." Lin Li was all smiles as if nothing had happened. "So, this is the best way out."
“我买装备干什么……”林立低声嘀咕了一句，心想老子堂堂五系宗师，还去买别人的装备，这要传出去了我脸往哪放？

"Why do I need to buy equipment..." Lin Li mumbled softly. In his heart, he thought, I am a guru well-versed in all five series and I'm still buying equipment from others? If this goes out where should I put my face?
“我什么我？”
“I? What I?!”
“我什么我？你是不是想说，你一定能想出办法来？好吧好吧，我就当你迟早能想出办法，但请你张大眼睛看清楚点，看看麦格雷尼先生现在是个什么情况，想想他到底还能不能等你想出办法！”

"What I? Are you going to say you'll find a way for sure? Alright, alright. I'll take it as saying you'll come up with a way sooner or later. But please open your eyes and look closely at Mr McGrenn's condition now and think if he has the time to wait till you've found a solution!"
“我什么时候找过你了！”凯文一听这话，当真是半条命都给吓掉了。
"When did I go to you before!" Kevin was almost half-dead from the scare at her words.
“我什么时候纠缠她了？”林立一听这话，顿时急得眼睛都睁圆了，心头更是满腹委屈，他很想问问罗琳，老子纠缠过你吗？
"When did I pester her?" Lin Li's eyes widened with anxiousness at his words, and in his heart he was filled with injustice. He'd like to ask Rowling, did I ever pester you?
“我介绍过了啊，他是费雷先生，我跟爸爸在落日山脉的时候认识的，他是一位很厉害的魔法师，帮过我跟爸爸很多的忙，可惜我都没机会报答他……”

"I've introduced him, he's Mr Felic. I met him when Father and I were in the Sunset Mountains. He's an impressive mage and helped me and Father many times. Unfortunately I haven't had the chance to repay him..."
“我们再看看其他的……”
"Let's take a look at something else..."
“我估计到时候，拿来的东西肯定是五花八门……”说到这里，葛瑞安恬不知耻的往自己脸上贴起金来：“我虽然学识渊博，可也不能保证什么都认识呀，这公会里除了我之外，也就你眼光还将就了，到时候你多帮我留意一下，看我有没有看漏什么……”

"I reckon that when the time comes, there will be a variety of things brought to us..." At this point, Gerian was shameless enough to flatter himself. "Although I am knowledgeable, I can't guarantee to know everything. In this guild, you, too, have a good eye for things besides me. You can help me keep an eye to see if I missed out anything..."
“我保证，绝对不会！”麦德林狠狠的瞪了霍伦一眼，他真是怎么也想不明白，奥德文这样的人物，怎么会生出这么蠢的儿子来？
"I promise that it will never happen!" Medellin sternly galred at Hoeren. He could not understand how such a great man like Odwin could have such a foolish son!
“我倒是想通知你……”凯文翻了个白眼：“你刚把自己关进房间，会长大人就发下话了，谁要是敢来打扰你，他就把谁的头给拧下来，你说我还敢不敢来？”

"I'd like to tell you..." Kevin rolled his eyes. "As soon as you had locked yourself in your room, the President warned that anyone who tries to disturb you will have their heads screwed off by him. Do you think I'd still dare to come?"
“我去一下药剂室，你暂时先别动他。”离开地下室前，林立又叮嘱了葛瑞安两句。
"I'll make a trip to the potion lab for a while, don't touch him for now," Lin Li reminded Gerian before he left the basement.
“我告诉你，别以为装死就能混过去，你还等着阴影之巢的人来救你是吧？别他妈做梦了，你就是一件工具，一件只能用一次的工具！用过一次之后，你就再也没有利用价值了，你以为他们会来救一件没有利用价值的东西？”

"Let me tell you, don't think that you can muddle through this by playing dead. You're still waiting for the people of Shadow's Nest to save you, right? Dream the hell on. You're merely a tool, a tool that can only be used once! After they've used it once, they'll never be able to use it again. Do you think they will come and save something that is worthless?"
“我告诉你，我就是这个意思！”
"I'm telling you, this is what I mean!"
“我在这里等您回来……”希恩挠了挠头，向来不善言辞的他，有些不知道该怎么表达：“我听别人说，这次来的魔法师，都会去很危险的地方完成试炼任务，我担心您的安全……”

"I am here to await your return..." inarticulate, Sheehan scratched his head, at a loss of how to phrase his sentences, "I heard that all mages who came this time will go to very dangerous places to complete trial tasks. I am worried about your safety..."
“我完不完不知道，不过……江豹今天你是肯定完了！”
"It doesn't matter whether I am a goner or not. Either way, you, Jiang Bao, are definitely not going to make it past today!"
“我就是格林－伯恩塞德。”
"I am Grimm Burnside."
“我已经这么穷了？”林立挠了挠头，有些不敢相信。
"I've become so poor?" Lin Li scratched his head in disbelief.
“我干了什么，不就是一个小魔法师吗？艾萨克叔叔你要是觉得可惜，我明天就让家里给你送二十个魔法师来。”巴瑟罗尔长这么大，还从来没被人当众打过，此时挨了艾萨克一耳光，虽不敢当面反抗，但语气间却已是多多少少有了些怨气。

"What have I done? Isn't it just a small little mage? If Uncle Isaac feels that it's a pity, I'll have someone send you 20 mages tomorrow." Bathrilor had never been slapped in public before. Isaac had slapped him now; and although he did not dare to confront him, his tone was more or less resentful.
“我年纪大了，虽然以前一直不想承认，但那天跟老梅林干了一架之后，我知道我真的是老了，要是再年轻十岁的话，我根本用不着你那个什么唤醒药剂，一只手就能把他给捏爆！”葛瑞安似乎有些意兴阑珊：“你想想，我今年都六十多岁了，到了我这个年纪，还能再管公会几年？公会迟早要换人领导，如果新的会长连加洛斯有些什么势力都搞不清楚，还怎么管理公会？”

"I'm getting on age. I didn't want to admit it, but after the battle with Old Merlin that day, I knew I was really old. If I were ten years younger, I wouldn't need your Awakening Potion. I could crush him with one hand!" Gerian seemed to be a little dispirited. "Think about it, I am 60 year old this year. At my age, how long can I continue to manage the guild? Sooner or later, the guild will have to change its leadership. If the new President doesn't know what kind of forces Jarrosus has, how can he manage the guild?"
“我忘记记录他的精神力强度了！”这一下，凯文真是连死的心都有了，刚才看得太专心，负责记录的他竟是忘了自己的本职工作，凯文真想一头撞死在墙上，完了完了，这么大的事竟然出了差错，以葛瑞安叔叔的性格，自己这回就算不死，恐怕也得脱层皮了。

"I had forgotten to record his mental strength!" At the moment, Kevin wanted to drop dead. It was his responsibility to record the data, but he had been so engrossed in watching that he had forgotten about doing his job. Kevin wanted to hit his head against the wall. He was so doomed, something so important had gone wrong in his hands. With Uncle Gerian's character, even if he didn't die this time round, he'd probably still have to get skinned.
“我数三声还不滚，你就准备……用手爬着回去吧！”
"If you don't leave on the count of three, get ready... to crawl back on your hands!"
“我无意和你们为敌，你们别逼我！滚！”
"I have no intention to make all of you my enemies. Don't force my hand! Get lost!"
“我明白了父亲！”
"I get it, Father!"
“我是安度因的老朋友。”
"I am Andoine's old friend."
“我是巴瑟罗尔的父亲。”
"I am Bathrilor's father."
“我是认真的。”罗琳的目光异常坚定，甚至带着一丝狂热。
"I am serious." Rowling's eyes were resolute, with a hint of enthusiasm.
“我最恨的，就是有人从背后偷袭。”林立一双眼睛死死盯着巴瑟罗尔，手上却已结出了一个手印，不等惊慌失措的巴瑟罗尔明白过来，一记风刃已是呼啸而出：“因为我自己就喜欢干这种事！”

"What I detest most is someone sneaking in an attack from behind." Lin Li's eyes were fixed on Bathrilor, but on his hand he had already produced a handprint. Not waiting for the flustered Bathrilor to grasp what was going on, a shot of wind blade came whistling out. "Because I myself like to do it!"
“我有个屁的天赋啊。”
"I have talent my ass."
“我正打算去买些材料……”
“I was just planning on buying some materials from there too...”
“我没事。”林立摇了摇头，示意凯文放心。
"I'm alright." Lin Li shook his head, reassuring Kevin.
“我没开玩笑！”葛瑞安两只眼睛紧紧盯着林立，神色间显得前所未有的认真：“公会无人可用你又不是不知道，你看看公会里那些废柴，老的老小的小，老的是庸才，小的是蠢材，没一个能成气候的，为了这些混蛋，老子头发都多愁白了几根，幸亏后来把你挖进了公会，传奇法师安度因的弟子，魔法天才，药剂大师……除了你之外，公会里谁有资格坐这个位子？”

"I'm not joking!" Gerian fixed his eyes on Lin Li, and he looked more serious than ever. "You know the guild has no one of use. Look at those useless bums in the guild, the old are too old and the young are too young. The old are mediocre and the young are fools, none of them will come to work out. My hair is all worried white for these bastards. Luckily we brought you into the guild. The disciple of the legendary mage Andoine, a magic genius, a potion master... Other than you, who else is qualified for the position?"
“我看到了！”
"I see it!"
“我真的是……”看到马森这呆滞的表情，林立就很想拿头撞树。
"Really, I am..." the sight of Marson's stupefied expression made Lin Li very frustrated.
“我知道你身上藏着一些秘密，这些秘密你既然不打算说，我也不打算知道。”大概是将林立的实话当成了托词，安度因摆了摆手，示意他不用解释，然后又自顾自的说道：“一开始的时候，我只是单纯的不忍心看你浪费天赋，当时我可想不到，你会做得这么出色，一直到前两天，我才忽然发现，我居然再没有什么可教你的了！”

“I know that you carry some secret and you have no intention to share it; I have no intention to probe, either.” He brushed off Lin Li’s true reply as an excuse with a wave of his hand, indicating that Lin Li did not need to explain anything. Andoine then said to himself, “In the beginning, I just could not bear to see you waste your talent. At that time, I did not expect that you could have done so well. It wasn’t until the last two days that I realized I have nothing more to teach you!”
“我知道错了，格林爷爷。”罗琳神色间有些委屈：“可是我后来已经道歉了……”
"I know that I'm wrong, Grandpa Grimm." Rowling's expression was aggrieved. "But I've apologized after that..."
“我给你个叉……”葛瑞安两眼一瞪,毫不客气的喷了回去：“我说马修斯，你也一大把年纪了，该懂点事了吧？欺负了我魔法公会的人，还要我给你个交代，你是不是真觉得我这两年长胖了就比较好欺负？”

"Give you a f*ck..." Gerian retorted with a glare. "I say, Matthew, you're old enough now, shouldn't you be more sensible? Demanding an explanation when you'd bullied someone from my guild, do you really think I'm easy to bully now that I've gained weight in these two years?"
“我要是你，就会赶紧把那两片树叶捞出来，不然别说十分钟，估计十秒钟都要不了，你手上的烧杯就会再一次炸开。”林立的笑声听上去异常恶劣。

"If I were you, I'd be in a hurry to scoop those two leaves out. Otherwise not to mention ten minutes, the beaker in your hand will explode once again in less than ten seconds." Lin Li's laugh sounded unusually nasty.
“我要杀了你，杀了你……”
"I'm going to kill you, kill you..."
“我要疯了……”
"I'm going crazy..."
“我要的只是公平一战的机会，只有他们两个，谁也不许插手！”
"All I want is a chance for a fair match. Only the two of them, and no one can interfere!"
“我认识你吗？”对于优越感这种东西，林立一向是很讨厌的，所以言语之间，自然也谈不上多么客气，只是拿眼角瞄了巴瑟罗尔一眼，那神态就象是在看一件东西，又或者是在看一团空气。

"Do I know you?" Lin Li had always detested the idea of superiority, so it was natural that there was no politeness in his words. He merely took a glance at Bathrilor from the corner of his eyes. It looked like he was looking at something or a mass of air.
“我让人先安排她在会客室等着，也不知道走了没有……”
"I had someone settle her down in the reception room, wonder if she's still there..."
“我说过只要江如虎江豹江松的腿，其他人不想被误伤，请让开！”江逸不带一丝情绪波动的声音响起，让很多江家子弟自动后退几步，江逸敢在演武殿动手，很明显已经豁出去了，和一个疯子斗不值得。

"I said I only want the legs of Jiang Ruhu, Jiang Bao and Jiang Song. Those that do not want to be mistakenly injured, please stand aside!" Jiang Yi's voice echoed without any emotions. Majority of the descendants of Jiang Clan took a few steps back. If Jiang Yi dared to make a move in the Martial Arts Demonstration Hall, it meant that he was taking all risks. It wasn't worth it to fight it out with a madman.
“我跟他们说，不如我请葛瑞安会长出来，跟大家好好谈谈细节？”
"I told them, why don’t I ask President Gerian out to discuss the details with them?"
“我输了。”老梅林声音有些干涩，却依然让所有人都听得清清楚楚。
"I lost." Old Merlin's voice was dry, but everyone had heard it clearly.
“我输给了你吗？”狠狠的瞪了葛瑞安一眼，老梅林才把目光挪到了林立身上：“我输给的是这位年轻的药剂师！”
"Did I lose to you?" Old Merlin shot Gerian a glare, and shifted his focus onto Lin Li. "The one I have lost to is this young pharmacist!"
“我还能教他什么？”安度怔怔的盯着水晶球，想了半天也没想出来，自己究竟还能再教林立些什么。
"What else can I still teach him?” Andoine stared at the crystal and pondered for a long time, asking himself what other skills he was able to teach Lin Li.
“我这也是为了他好！”老家伙还要恬不知耻的吹嘘几句，林立却已经拿着玻璃瓶子走到了那魔导士身前。
"I'm doing this for his own good!"
“我需要一个解释！”
"I need an explanation!"
“我靠！”
"Damn!"
“我靠！”林立往那树洞里看了一眼，顿时觉得，这死猩猩太有才了，生生把个树洞弄成了百宝箱，看看里面都藏了些什么，锈迹斑斑的武器盔甲，闪闪发亮的玻璃珠子，一堆五颜六色的颜料，甚至还有一块被涂得乱七八糟的画布……

"Woah!" Lin Li glanced into the tree hole and suddenly felt that the darned gorilla was indeed a genius. It had turned the tree hole in a treasure chest. What was in there included a weaponed armor covered in rust, glistening glass beads, a pile of colorful dyestuff, and even a canvas that was coated with mess.
“我靠！”林立怎么也没有想到，自己藏身的树下，竟然藏着一根藤条，那藤条一端打了一个活结，另一段却在利维坦猩猩手中，只见那死猩猩将藤条一拉，林立整个人就被吊了起来。

“Damn!” Lin Li had not expected there to be a hidden rattan underneath the tree he was hiding. One end of the rattan was tied into a slipknot, while the other was in the hands of the Leviathan Gorilla. It only took the darned gorilla one pull and Lin Li was hung upside down.
“我靠！”葛瑞安一句脏话脱口而出，这小子算得也太准了点。
"Damn!" Gerian blurted out a swear. This kid was too accurate.
“我靠！”葛瑞安一看那中年男人，顿时两只眼睛都瞪圆了。
"Damn!" Gerian's eyes were wide open at the sight of the middle-aged man.
“我靠！”葛瑞安只觉脚下一软，差点没把老毛病吓出来，好不容易扶着椅子站稳，歪着的法师帽都没来得及去扶，老头就已是气急败坏的吼了起来：“你没兴趣？”
