"F*ck!" Gerian felt his legs turn weak and his old illness almost relapsed from the scare. The old man barely managed to steady himself by holding on to the chair and didn't even have the time to straighten his tilted hat; he was utterly discomfited and roared, "You're not interested?"
“我靠！我靠！活人！”向来以斯文人自诩的林立，却在片刻间连说了两个“我靠”，因为他实在太激动了，他居然真的看见了三个活人。
"Damn! Damn! Living humans!" He had always bragged about what a refined person he was, but he had blurted two "damns" within moments. He was just too excited that he actually saw three living humans.
“我靠！这加洛斯城够大的……”住惯了都市里的高楼大厦，此时走进这座充满异域风情的城市，林立只觉得一切都是如此新奇，跟在麦格雷尼身后一路走来，两只眼睛就没休息过，东瞧瞧西看看，忙得不亦乐乎。

"Damn! This Jarrosus City is huge..." Being accustomed to the tall buildings in the metropolis, Lin Li felt a wave of novelty as he entered the exotic city. His eyes had not taken any rest at all as he followed behind McGrenn, busy with taking in his surroundings.
"Me?"
“或者说，又有哪些人对你不满？”话说到这里，林立已经有些明白了。
"Or, who are the people unhappy with you?" Lin Li had understood at this point.
“所以你不告诉我，那山洞里还有其他的狮蝎？”
"So you didn't tell me there was a Manticore in the cave?"
“所以你准备赶我走了？”
”So you are ready to chase me off?”
“所以你想让我……”安度因想说些什么，林立大概已经猜到了，想想这也不是什么大事，帮他弄点野钢花而已，反正除了练习元素排列之外，自己也没什么事情可做，所以林立回答得很干脆：“没问题，你要是暂时走不开的话，我去帮你采点也是一样。”

"So, you want me to..." Lin Li had guessed what Andoine was about to say. Thinking it was not a big deal picking wild steelbloom for him, and since there was nothing else he could do but practice elemental sequencing, Lin Li answered coolly, "No problem. If you can't excuse yourself for the moment, it'll be the same if I go and pick some for you."
“所以，别想了。”
"So, don't think about it."
“扑哧！”听他说得有趣，伊娜也忍不住笑出声来。
"Tee hee!" Ina could not help but laugh at his funny remarks.
“扑通！”
“Crash!”
“打一场？”
"Spar in a match?"
“打就打吧……”林立有些无所谓，虽然他并不象葛瑞安一般乐观，但对克伦威尔的实力，他实在是太清楚不过了，只要老梅林不直接插手，就一切好办，随便他搞什么阴谋诡计，也很难让克伦威尔对自己构成威胁。

"We'll just battle..." Lin Li was somewhat indifferent. Although he wasn't that optimistic like Gerian was, he knew very well Cromwell's strength. So long as Old Merlin did not interfere, all would be well. No matter what schemes he came up with, it would be hard for Cromwell to pose a threat to him.
“找不到？”等到艾萨克再抬起头来的时候，神色间已再无一丝尴尬，取而代之的是一阵凝重与威严：“你是说，你找不到那个人？”
"Can't find?" When Isaac lifted his head, there was no trace of embarrassment at all; instead, his expression was serious and dignified. "You mean, you can't find the person?"
“找人？”
"Get help?"
“找姬听雨？”
"Search for Ji Tingyu?"
“找我？”林立微微一愣，除了魔法公会的人外，自己在加洛斯还有熟人吗？
"Looking for me?" Lin Li was slightly confounded. Other than people from the Guild of Magic, did he have other acquaintances in Jarrosus?
“找死！”
"You must be tired of living!"
“找过医生了吗？”
“Have you called for a doctor?"
“承您吉言。”林立挠了挠头，有些明白这家伙想干什么了。
"Thank you for the kind words." Lin Li scratched his head, somewhat understanding what this fellow was trying to do.
“抓走伊娜的应该是利维坦猩猩。”
“Ina should’ve been taken by a Leviathan Gorilla.”
“报道？”正四处张望的林立不由一愣。
"Report?" Lin Li was just looking around when he did a double take at the word.
“抱歉抱歉，会长前段时间实在是太过操劳了，以至于身体有些不太舒服，现在正在翡翠高塔内静养。”在说出这句话的时候，凯文的心情无比激动，就好象黑暗年代末期时，那些被奴役了上千年的种族，忽然间看到了胜利的曙光一样。

"I'm so sorry, the President has been overly exhausted recently, and so he has not been feeling very well. He's resting in the Emerald Tower at the moment." Kevin was awfully agitated when he delivered the sentence. It was as if the race that had been enslaved for thousand of years suddenly saw the dawn of victory at the end of the Dark Ages.
“抱歉抱歉，是我太激动了。”老头讪讪笑了两声，有些尴尬的将手松开，末了还陪着笑脸帮林立整理好弄皱的衣领：“现在可以说了吧？”
"Sorry, I was too agitated." The old man laughed embarrassedly. He released his hand somewhat awkwardly and smiled as he helped Lin Li straighten his crumpled collar.
“担心什么？傻丫头，少爷是修炼忘记了时间！”
"What is there to worry about? Silly girl, your young master was just so busy practicing essence force refinement that he forgot the time!"
“拉倒吧你……”林立笑了笑，将蛮牛之力塞好，又重新递到安度因手上：“这瓶蛮牛之力配得不错，除了温度掌握得不够精确之外，基本上没什么问题，我记得我好象跟你说过，加热泰罗果汁液的时候，温度必须控制在刚刚沸腾的程度，不能太热也不能太凉，不然很可能让龙血草药效发生突变，这可不是什么好玩的事，轻则让蛮牛之力变成毒药，重则释放出剧毒气体，吸进去一点的话，管你什么传奇剑圣传奇法师，全都得一起完蛋！”

泰罗"Forget it..." Lin Li smiled. He closed the Bull's Strength Potion and passed it to Andoine: "This botle of Bull's Strength Potion is not bad. There are no problems besides the lack of accuracy in temperature control. I remember telling you that when you heat the terocone juice, the temperature needs to be just boiling, not too hot but not too cold. If not, it might cause the Dracaena grass pesticide to suddenly change. This is not a laughing matter. You could cause the Bull's Strength Potion to turn into a poison. It could give off toxic gas, which if inhaled will cause death, even if you are a legendary Sword Sage or mage!"
“拼了！”到了这种时候，也没时间让林立去细想了，就只看这办法行不行得通都不重要，反正行也要上，不行也同样要上。
"Let's do this!" There was no time for Lin Li to dwell on it in this situation; it didn't matter whether the idea would work or not, he had to do it in any case.
“损个屁！”
"At stake, my ass!"
“捡到宝了捡到宝了……”葛瑞安眼睛虽然还在信上，心里却早已乐开了花，他现在真恨不得能拿起信来亲上几口，加洛斯魔法公会落魄了几十年，终于有翻身的机会了！

I've found a treasure... I've found a treasure... Gerian eyes were still on the letter, but his heart was bursting with joy. He wished he could pick up the letter and give it a few kisses. Jarrosus Guild of Magic had been down and out for decades, and now the opportunity had presented itself for them to turn things around!
“据说前不久的时候，加洛斯魔法公会发现了一个高等精灵遗迹，从里面弄到了很多的大师级药水！”
"I heard that not long ago, Jarrosus Guild of Magic discovered a High Elves relic and had obtained many master potions from it!"
“据说是一位很漂亮的女冒险者。”
"Apparently it's a beautiful female adventurer."
“探病？哎呀……实在对不起，葛瑞安会长这次真是病得很严重，而且还是恶性传染病，万一把您也给传染了，我们会良心不安的，要不您还是先回去，等过几天再来吧？”

"Visitation? Well... I'm really sorry, President Gerian is seriously ill this time, and it's a malignant infectious disease. If you're infected, it will lie heavy on our conscience. Why don’t you go back first and come back again a few days later?"
“接下来再试试融合！”
"Next, I'll attempt to fuse it!"
“接下里再试哪里，要不试试脑袋？可人阶中品武技铁头功我还没学啊，没事，要不本少爷就随便来一发头槌吧……”
"Next, I could try other spots. Should I try my head? I have not yet grasped the Man-tier medial-grade Iron Head Technique fully. But that's fine. Why don't I try out a head blow…"
“推迟奥法药剂拍卖的借口！”
"The excuse to delay the Arcane Magic Potion auction!"
“提炼黑色元力！”
"Time to extract more black essence force!"
“搞了半天，你就是为了这个？”葛瑞安一时间心情大好，现在才明白，老头威胁了自己半天，为的就是要让他那个废物儿子跟林立决斗。
"After so long, just for this?" Gerian's mood lit up immediately. Only then did he understand that the old fellow had threatened him just to let his good-for-nothing son fight it out with Lin Li.
“摔碑手！”
"Wrestling Hand!"
“敢咬老子，就得有被打死的觉悟！”林立越想越觉得自己委屈。
"He dares to bite me, then he'd better be prepared to be beaten!" The more Lin Li thought about it, the more aggrieved he felt.
“无关紧要的小人物而已。”老梅林摇了摇头：“你错就错在，不该让葛瑞安知道，你这一次去，先试试能不能拉拢他，如果拉拢不了你就……”

"Small character of little significance..." Old Merlin shook his head. "Your fault is that you shouldn't have let Gerian know about it. Try to see if you can rope him in this time when you go; if you can't, then..."
“无所谓，反正你儿子就是一盘菜……”
"Doesn't matter. Your son is a piece of cake anyway..."
“早上好凯文。”打过招呼之后，林立二话没说，又拉着凯文去了一趟等级认证大厅。
"Good morning, Kevin." After the greetings, Lin Li dragged Kevin to the level certification hall without another word.
“早上好费雷。”
"Good morning, Felic."
“时候不早了，大家早点休息吧。”
"It's late, everyone should rest early."
“时间，只要再给我一些时间，任何问题都不是问题了！”
Time! If only I had more time, whatever problems I have would not be problems anymore!
“明天晚上。”
"Tomorrow night."
“明白明白……”麦德林连连点头，心里却是早就打定了主意，只要一回到奥兰纳魔法公会，就立刻让奥德文把他这个混蛋儿子给关起来，妈的小王八蛋，你闯下的祸，却要老子来帮你背黑锅……

"I understand, I understand..." Medellin nodded his head, but inside he had already come up with a plan. Once he returned to the Alanna Guild of Magic, he would let Odwin lock up his bastard son. Hell, this little bastard, you cause trouble and yet let others take the blame...
“明白！”
"Understood!"
“春芽，你先回去，记住，这事和任何人都不要说！”
"Chunya, return first,” he instructed quickly. “Remember, don't breathe a single word of this to anyone!"
“是吗……”巴瑟罗尔点了点头，没再继续多问，只是说了声失陪，就端着一杯红酒走到了林立面前。
"Is it..." Bathrilor nodded and did not question further. He excused himself and walked to Lin Li with a glass of red wine in his hand.
“是啊，这位大爷快进去吧，我们家烟火姑娘最近可是学会了一种新的玩法，叫吹箫弄月，可舒坦了……”
"Yes, Sir, come on in! Our Lady Yanhuo has just learned a new trick called Flute Blowing Bosom Moons. It's very enjoyable…"
“是啊，这群低贱的陪练怎么能有幸和小姐对战？马某最近感悟了一种地阶武技，正好陪小姐练练！”

"Yes, how could these lowly sparring partners ever have the good fortune of sparring in combat with the Young Mistress? I, Young Master Ma, recently developed a new earth-tier martial arts skill, just perfect to be used in a practice round with you, Young Mistess!'
“是安度因那老家伙！”胖老头一听安度因的名字，顿时双眼一亮，刚刚皱起的眉头也随之舒展开来，一张胖脸上笑容可鞠，看上去倒还真象个和气生财的商人：“那老家伙人呢？怎么只有你一个人过来？”

"It's Andoine, that old chap!" The fat old man's eyes lit up at the mention of Andoine's name. The frown that was on his face dissipated, his chubby face radiant with smiles, and he looked just like an amiable businessman. "Where's the old chap? Why are you here alone?"
“是的！”
"That's right!"
“是的！”罗琳布满红晕的俏脸上，此时的神色竟是如此坚定：“我想跟你学习药剂！”
"Yes!" Rowling's flushed face was masked with a look of determination now. "I'd like to learn from you!"
“是的，一百套。”
"Yes, 100 sets."
“是的，城主大人，我已经按照格林先生所说的办法试过了，可是我完全找不到那个人。”
"Yes, Master Castellan. I've tried using the way Mr Grimm has mentioned, but I can't find the person completely."
“是的，霍伦先生。”
"Yes, Mr Hoeren."
“是这么回事……”
"It's like that..."
"Yes!"
“晚上好凯文魔法师！”艾萨克脸上的笑容很亲切，跟凯文打过招呼之后，又微微有些疑惑：“怎么葛瑞安会长没来？”
"Good evening, Mage Kevin!" The smile on Isaac's face was cordial. After greeting Kevin, he was slightly befuddled. "Why didn't President Gerian come?"
“晚上见。”
"See you tonight."
“暂时不麻烦你了，那家伙给了我地址，应该不难找才对……”安度因走的时候也没说清楚，魔法师公会究竟是什么地方，林立怕那万一是什么秘密组织，自己贸贸然带着罗麦格雷尼上门去，被人灭口了可怎么办？

“Won't have to trouble you for now. My friend has given me an address, so it shouldn’t be too difficult to find…” Andoine had not really specified what the Mage Association was like. Lin Li was afraid it might be a secret organization—what would he do if they decided to kill him for bringing McGrenn along?
“曼尼斯家族？”听到这个名字，林立不由想起了开遍加洛斯的镀金玫瑰，当初若不是在镀金玫瑰里看到一根法杖都卖几千金币，自己又怎么会想到配药剂弄钱，只是有些搞笑的是，转了一圈之后，这钱到是弄到了镀金玫瑰头上……

"Mannes Family?" On hearing the name, Lin Li couldn't help but think of the Gilded Rose that had bloomed over Jarrosus. If he hadn't seen the staff selling for thousands of gold coins in the Gilded Rose, he would not have thought of concocting potions to make money. But the funny thing was that after circling a round, that money would be made on Gilded Rose...
“有了！”
"Got it!"
“有什么事赶紧说，别耽误老人家休息。”老头的声音有气无力，听起来就好象快断气了似的。
"Hurry up and state your business, don't hold up an old man's rest." There was no energy in the old man's voice, and it sounded as if he was on his deathbed.
“有什么办法，他爹死得太早，又偏偏没多生几个儿子。”
"What can he do? His father died too early and he didn't have many sons."
“有什么好感谢的，当初要不是你们帮忙，我可能现在都还没走出落日山脉，真要说感谢，倒是应该由我来说了。”林立的性格就是这样，恩怨分明，受人恩惠一生都会记住，麦格雷尼父女虽只是无意间帮了个忙，但林立却一直牢牢的记在了心里。

"What's there to thank for. If it weren't for your help in the begging, I could still be stuck in the Sunset Mountains. I should be the one thanking you both." Such was the character of Lin Li—clear about kindness and enmity. He would remember for life the kindness and grace he had received from someone. McGrenn and his daughter had helped him unintentionally, but Lin Li had kept it firmly in his mind.
“有前途！”中年人又是拇指一竖，从兜里摸出一封信：“等下宴会的时候，能不能请小兄弟帮个忙，把这个交给凯文魔法师，就说小女很仰慕他，希望改天请他到家里来做客。”

"Bright future!" The middle-aged man stuck his thumb up and took a letter out from his pocket. "When we get to the banquet later, can I ask you to do me a favor and pass this to Mage Kevin? Tell him that my little girl admires him very much and would like to invite him for a dinner at our place another day."
“有种你们就来！只要敢动屠魔山谷，老子就敢把你们的爪子砍掉！”谁知道还有火气更大的，中年人都已经走出了老远，胖老头还在那喋喋不休的叫骂着，骂了好一阵子，才算是注意到大厅里还有人在，只见胖老头眉头一皱，盯着林立问道：“你是谁？”

"Come if you dare! As long as you dare to lay a finger on Demon Fall Valley, I'll chop the claws off your hands!" Who knew there'd be another even more fiery-tempered one? The middle-aged man had already gone far, but the fat old man never stopped berating. After some time, he finally noticed a presence in the hall. With a frown, he glared at Lin Li and asked, "Who are you?"
“有这样一条吗？”
"Is there such a rule?"
“本周日，魔法公会将在翡翠高塔内拍卖三十瓶奥法药剂！”
"This Sunday, the Guild of Magic will be auctioning 30 bottles of Arcane Magic Potion in the Emerald Tower!"

“本来一切都很顺利，经过几天的搜索，我们很快就在森林北边发现了一只落单的狮蝎，于是今天早上，我们在它巢穴附近布下了一个陷阱。”麦格雷尼脸上露出一丝苦笑：“然后我们就藏在树林里等它上勾，可谁知道那个陷阱没有引来狮蝎，却引来了两头双足飞龙，天知道这究竟是怎么回事，原本只是为狮蝎设下的陷阱，却彻底激怒了这两头双足飞龙，它们向树林里发起了攻击，我杀死了其中一头，却被它临死前的反扑重伤，克伦威尔先生不得不带着我跟伊娜逃出树林……最后很幸运的遇上了您，如果没有您出手，我真是不知道该怎么办才好了……”

"Everything was going well in the beginning. After a few days of search we soon found a lone Manticore, so this morning we'd deployed a trap near where it nested." A bitter smile came across McGrenn's face. "And then we hid in the forest waiting for it to fall into the trap. But who knew the trap would attract two Wyverns instead of the Manticore? God knows what happened, a trap that was meant for the Manticore had provoked the Wyverns’ attacks on us in the forest. I'd killed one of them, but was badly hurt by it before it died. Cromwell had no choice but to bring Ina and I out of the forest... And then, fortunately, we met you. If it hadn't been for you, I really wouldn’t have known what to do..."
“杀人！”林立忽然有些明白了。
"To kill!" Lin Li suddenly understood some of it.
“材料没什么问题。”只是稍稍一闻，林立就很轻易的分辨出来，安度因这瓶蛮牛之力，确实比以前强了不少，材料方面没有一点问题，四种材料严格按照比例分配，最难得的是，这一次，他竟然没往里面加什么乱七八糟的东西。

"There's no problem with the ingredients." With just a smell, Lin Li was able to easily tell that Andoine's bottle of Bull's Strength Potion had indeed become stronger than before. There was no problem with the ingredients, and the four ingredients strictly followed the required ratio. What was most surprising was that this time, he had not added random ingredients into the potion.
“来人，去把苍狼给我请来！”
"Servants, go and fetch Lone Wolf! Bring him to me!"
“来人，立即去通报家族，算了……你们看好少爷，我亲自去请罪！”
"Servants, go notify the family clan immediately, oh forget it... the lot of you take good care of Young Master, I will personally go and make apologies!"
“来来来，大家都凑凑，我这好象还有三万，你们有多少？”一群人拼命的冲他使眼色，这家伙却是一点都没看见，还在那不知死活的凑钱。

"Come, come, everyone gather our money. I think I have 30,000 here, how much do you all have?" The group of mages tried desperately signal him with their winks, but the guy was utterly oblivious to it and still gathering money without knowing what death was like.
“来的好，黑色元力！”
"What a great move! Black essence force!"
“来，我给你介绍一下，这是新来的费雷法师，他已经决定在加洛斯魔法公会进行等级认证了，你先带他去办下手续，我去找人安排等级认证，这些小兔崽子一个个胆子越来越大了，大清早的就躲房间里偷懒，害得老子刚才想揍阴影之城那混蛋都找不到帮手……”

"Come, let me introduce you. This is Mage Felic, a new mage. He has decided to go through the level certification in Jarrosus' Guild of Magic. Bring him down to process the documents, I'll look for someone to arrange the certification. These little rascals are getting more brazen, hiding themselves in the room early in the morning. I had wanted to teach that bastard from Shadow City but couldn't find any helpers to back me up...
“杨管事您找我？”
"Manager Yang, did you ask for me?"
“杨管事，杨管事！”
"Manager Yang, Manager Yang!"
"Indeed..."
“果然……”林立点了点头，脸上露出一丝了然的神色。
"As expected..." Lin Li nodded his head with a knowing expression on his face.
“果然……又完美融合了！”
"Sure enough… another perfect fusion!"
“果然是黑莲花！”林立赶紧放下手中的烧杯，生怕一个不小心，将那一片黑莲花花瓣全掉进去了。
"It is indeed the black lotus!" Lin Li placed the beaker in his hands down on the table, as if he was afraid he'd drop all the black lotus petals into it.
“果然有效！”
"It was indeed effective!"
“果然能封印元力，好神奇！”
My essence force has indeed been sealed off! How magical!
“果然还是老不死你明白我心，知道我有话说……”
"You really do understand me, Old Fart Undying. You know I have words to say…"
“柳长老。”
"Elder Liu."
“格林先生为人宽厚，不会因为这些小事跟我们计较的，况且以格林先生的实力，想要找人的话，又怎么可能找不出来？看来这一次，我们真是有些多事了……”自从出了翡翠高塔之后，艾萨克神色间显得异常轻松，在他看来，再怎么糟糕的事，也比不过面对葛瑞安那老贱人了。

"Mr Grimm is magnanimous and won't haggle over such trifles with us. Besides, with Mr Grimm's ability, how can he not find someone if he sets his mind to it? Looks like this time, we were too meddlesome..." Since leaving the Emerald Tower, Isaac's expression was unusually relaxed. To him, no matter how bad things were, they couldn't be worse than facing Gerian, that old jerk.
“格林爷爷……”罗琳俏脸绯红，声音中却又透出几分幽怨：“可是人家不愿意教我……”
"Grandpa Grimm..." Rowling's pretty face was beaming red, but her voice was somewhat bitter. "But he doesn't want to teach me..."
“格雷斯科？”林立知道自己很有天赋，但却没想到竟强到这种程度，格雷斯科是什么人，从老家伙口中他多多少少也算知道一些，黑暗年代最强大的魔法师，凡人中最接近神祗的强者，曾经以一己之力击溃整个高等精灵魔法军团的法师之神，林立怎么也想不到，自己的魔法天赋竟然能强到这种程度。

"Geresco?" Lin Li knew he was gifted, but he had never imagined he'd be this powerful. He knew more or less from the old man who Geresco was. He was the most powerful mage in the Dark Ages, the strongest of mortals nearest to the divine. The God of Mages who single-handedly defeated the entire Magic Legion of the High Elves. Lin Li could never have imagined his own magical gifts to be this strong.
“桀桀！”
"Charge! Charge!"
“梅林家族？”这已经是林立第二次听葛瑞安提起这个名字了，上一次是在前几天进行等级认证的时候，他记得当时胖老头好象发了很大的火，扬言要将这个梅林家族如何如何来的……

"The Merlin Family?" It was the second time Lin Li heard Gerian mentioning the name; the previous time was a few days ago when he was going through the level certification. He remembered the fat old man throwing a huge tantrum, threatening to do something to the Merlin Family..
“梅林家？”林立皱了皱眉头，觉得这名字好象有些耳熟，只是想了半天，却又想不起在什么地方听过。
"The Merlin Family?" Lin Li frowned at the mention of the familiar name. But after thinking for long, he couldn't recall where he had heard that name.
“欢迎光临。”这间装备店的老板，是个看上去挺老实的中年人，将两人迎进店里的时候，脸上的笑容显得很诚恳，对林立身上那件又皱又旧的法师袍，居然一点也没有冷眼相看的意思。

"Welcome," the store owner welcomed them into the shop with a sincere-looking smile. The middle-aged man had a rather honest appearance and surprisingly, did not scorn Lin Li for his crumpled, threadbare mage robe.
“欧灵，我……我没看错吧？”马森的声音，就好象梦呓一样。
"Orrin, I... I'm not seeing things, am I?" Marson's voice was as if he was sleeptalking.
“欧灵，能让我看看你的右手吗？”
"Orrin, could you let me take a look at your right hand?"
“正事要紧，你先去忙你的，叔叔就不多留你了，不过以后有时间的话，可一定要来魔法公会看看叔叔哦。”葛瑞安笑得温和而又慈祥，仿佛真是一位和蔼的长者。

"Important things come first, go and do what you need to do. Uncle will not make you stay any longer. But if there's time in the future, you must come to the Guild of Magic to visit Uncle." Gerian's smile was gentle and amiable, jus like an affable senior’s.
“此地不宜久留。”
"I cannot stay here for too long. "
“武技又进步了？难道这黑色元力真的那么邪门，问题是黑色元力在我身上，我不过是和他们对战而已，他们的武技怎么可能有所感悟？邪门，太邪门了……”

"His technique improved too? The black essence force is so bizarre. But the thing is, the black essence force is within me; all I did was to battle them, so how could their technique improve? Bizarre indeed... "
“武殿给的！”
"The Martial Arts Hall gave them to me!"
“武殿？”
"The Martial Arts Hall?"
“武殿？铸鼎境九重？”
The martial arts hall? The ninth grade of the Cast Tripod Realm?
“毒龙钻！”
"Venom Dragon Drill!"
“比凯文还小两岁，不过人家可比凯文那小子出息多了，接掌曼尼斯家族的时候，这小子才刚满二十岁，当时我们这一群老家伙都以为，这回曼尼斯家族怕是要元气大伤了，谁知道这几年下来，曼尼斯家族不但没伤着元气，反倒是比在他爹手里更加兴旺。”葛瑞安说着，又有些不爽的瞪了林立一眼：“想起来老子就有气，这他妈到底什么世道，加洛斯怎么尽出这种妖孽，前几年出了个伊瑟拉还不够，现在又出了你这个更妖的小王八蛋……”

"Two years younger than Kevin, but he's much more promising than him. The boy was only 20 when he took over the Mannes Family. At the time, us old fellows thought that the Mannes Family would be weakened this time. But who knew that, for all these years, not only did the Mannes Family not decline, it was more prosperous than in his father's hands." As Gerian spoke, he shot a discontented glare at Lin Li. "It makes me angry just thinking about it. Damn it, what kind of world are we living in? Why is Jarrosus full of this kind of demons? A few years ago it was Ysera, and now there's you, a little bastard even more demonic..."
“比武技？你们这群酒囊饭袋……什么时候比得过我？”
"Competing martial arts? You bunch of good for nothings... When did you think you can win against me?"
“江如虎……”
"Jiang Ruhu..."
“江如虎今日我必须要废，谁敢拦我，后果自负！”
"Today I will cripple Jiang Ruhu. Anyone who obstructs me shall face the consequences!"
“江如虎受死？”
"Jiang Ruhu, accept your death?"
“江如虎果然派人盯梢！”
"Jiang Ruhu has indeed sent people to tail behind me!" Jiang Yi murmured
“江如虎说不定明天就会找来，还是先研究一下黑色元力吧，这内伤反正已经暂时压制了，迟些再疗养好了……”

"Who can say for certain that Jiang Ruhu won't come tomorrow? I think I should start researching that black essence force for a bit; after all, this inner injury has temporarily been suppressed. I think trying to heal it later would be better..."
“江如虎，不过劝你一句罢了，你们竟下这种狠手……哼，总有一天小爷会连本带利向你们讨回来！”
“Jiang Ruhu,” Jiang Yi muttered bitterly, “all I did was nag you a little, yet you guys attacked me?! Hmph! One day I’ll get my revenge against you!”
“江如虎，我就知道你不会放过我，所幸小爷……也从没奢望你会高抬贵手。”
"Jiang Ruhu, I knew you would not let me off so easily. Thankfully, this young master... has never had excessive hopes that you would ever be magnanimous."
“江如龙？”
"Jiang Rulong?"
“江如龙？哼哼！我现在最缺的就是时间，如果江如龙在武殿闭关一两个月，到时候对上小爷，谁赢谁输还不一定呢！”

"Jiang Rulong? Hmph! What I'm lacking the most is time. If Jiang Rulong stays in seculsion at the Martial Arts Hall for one to two months, by the time he fights against this Young Master, no one can say for certain who would win and who would lose!"
“江家小贼，你敢……”
"Jiang Clan scoundrel, how dare you..."
“江家杂碎！”
"Jiang Clan rascal!"
“江家？”
"The Jiang Clan?"
“江恨水！”
"Jiang Henshui!"
“江松？他还来干什么？”
"Jiang Song? What is he doing here?"
“江豹！”
“Jiang Bao!”
“江逸住手！”
"Jiang Yi, stop!"
“江逸参见武堂长老！”
"Jiang Yi pay his greetings to the Martial Court Elder!"
“江逸快放了虎哥，否则要出大事的……”
"Jiang Yi, quickly release Brother Hu, otherwise you'll have a big problem on your own hands..."
“江逸，今日你竟敢断虎哥的手脚？你死定了！”
"Jiang Yi, how could you dare to break Brothe Hu's hands and legs? You're done for!"
“江逸，你完了，你死定了！你有种杀了我，否则我发誓要把你撕裂成碎肉！”
"Jiang Yi, you're finished, you're done for! If you have the guts, just kill me here and now, otherwise I swear I will rip you to shreds!"
“江逸，你敢！”
"Jiang Yi, how dare you!"
“江逸，你疯了吗？”
"Jiang Yi, have you gone mad?"
“江逸，快给我出来！”
“Jiang Yi, hurry up and report to me now!”
“江逸，放了虎哥，饶你一死！”
"Jiang Yi, let Brother Hu go, and we'll all spare you from death!"
“江逸，滚出来！”
"Jiang Yi, come out here now!"
“江逸，识相的就立即滚下山去，什么也不要多说，更别在这碍眼。否则坏了大爷的好事，老子让你好看！”江逸不想找事，可对方却明显没有善罢甘休的意思，江豹一双阴狠的眸子内都是凶光，冷冷盯着江逸。

“Jiang Yi, if you know what’s good for you, get off the mountain right now! Don’t bother saying anything, and don’t stay here and irritate me! If you dare to meddle in my work, I will get my revenge on you!”
Jiang Yi had no desire to stir up trouble, but Jiang Bao clearly had no desire to let him be. Jiang Bao gave off an intimidating air of ferocity and ruthlessness as he eyed Jiang Yi coldly.
“江逸，还敢伤人，今日没人能救你！”
"Jiang Yi, you dare continue hurting people? No one can save you today!"
“沙沙沙……”
“Shh-shh-shh…”
"No...no, you're not."
“没事了伊娜，大概半个小时之后，麦格雷尼先生就会醒过来。”
"Everything's fine, Ina. Mr McGrenn will wake up in about half an hour's time."
“没事了伊娜，我已经想到办法了。”
"It's okay, Ina. I've found a way."
“没事的罗琳姐姐，你也是好心，想救爸爸。”伊娜又温言安慰了一番，才哄得红发美女止住哭声。
"It's alright, Sister Rowling. You were kind enough to want to save Father," Ina comforted her gently, and the redheaded beauty stopped crying.
“没什么事的话，我就先回去了，不然等你爸爸醒来，估计又要谢个没完没了……”林立收拾了一下，就准备回魔法公会了。
"If there's nothing else, I'll get going. If not, when your father wakes, he's going to thank me without end again..." Lin Li packed his stuff, getting ready to return to the Guild of Magic.
“没什么可万一的，你一会悄悄派个人去，跟他私下接触接触，先探探口风再说……”一旦涉及到利益，林立就变得活跃起来：“退一万步说了，他就算真对奥法药剂感兴趣，那需求肯定也不会太大，最多几瓶而已，到时候你悄悄从地下室弄几瓶给他，也别什么钱不钱的，就当是送个人情给他，以后说不定还能落点好处，反正只要他不公开参与竞争，就没什么太大问题。”

"There's nothing like just in case. Send someone to get in touch with him quietly later and find out what's going on first..." Lin Li became active once interests were involved. "Taking a million steps back, even if he's interested in the Arcane Magic Potion, the demand won't be high, at most a few bottles. When the time comes, you will get him a few bottles from the basement secretly. And don't talk about money, just give it to him as a personal favor. We might come to some gains in the future; as long as he doesn't compete openly, it shouldn't be a problem."
“没什么爸爸，你先去忙吧，我在这里休息一下就好了。”
"It's nothing, Father. Go on without me, I'll be fine after taking a short rest here."
“没办法，不处理掉这几个家伙，我怕还有更大的祸事。”
"Can't be helped. I'm worried there will be a greater disaster if I don't get rid of these guys."
“没办法，谁让这小子不肯说。”葛瑞安答得理直气壮：“不肯说就算了，反正这件是只能是他们几个干的，除了他们几个，公会里谁肯干这样的事？”
"I can't help it. He won't talk," Gerian answered boldly. "It's alright if he won't talk. Anyway, this can only be done by the few of them. Other than them, who else in the guild would do that?"
“没意见……”既然老人都已经开口，林立自然不会去驳他面子，再说也不是什么机密要事，让罗琳听听也算不了什么。
"Okay..." Since the old man had already spoken, Lin Li would not refute him in his face. Furthermore, it was not a secret matter; there was no harm letting Rowling listen to it.
“没有强大的实力！我江逸一辈子都会被江如虎这样的杂碎给踩在脚下，百般凌辱！这不是我想要的生活，绝对不是！”回想着晨时的一幕幕，江逸脸上条条青筋爆起，拳头紧握，连指甲都深深陷入了掌心。

“With my lack of strength, I, Jiang Yi, am doomed to be trampled under the feet of swine like Jiang Ruhu and fated to endure countless humiliations! This is not the life I want—neither now, nor in the future!”
Jiang Yi recalled the sequence of events that had taken place in the morning. His face burning with rage and indignation, he clenched his fists tightly, letting his fingernails pierce deep into his palms.
“没这么邪门吧……”林立几乎是胆战心惊的抬起右手，心想老子肯定是眼花了，大白天的不可能这么见鬼！
It can't be this odd... Lin Li raised his right hand nervously, thinking he must have seen it wrong. There couldn't be a ghost in broad daylight!
“没道理啊，看速度这小子的确是铸鼎境二重啊，怎么会有那么变态的反应能力？”
"This does not make sense. Seeing the speed of this boy, his power level is indeed at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. How could he have such obscenely powerful ability to react?
“没错！”
"That's right!"
“没错！”安度因笑得很欣慰：“在世人眼中，魔法是神秘而幽雅的艺术，但在一个真正的魔法师看来，魔法的唯一目的就是为了战斗，只有活着的魔法师，才是一个成功的魔法师！这一个多月来，你已经掌握了足够多的低级法术，同时也拥有了一定的技巧，但这还远远不够，没有经历过生死存亡，没有经过鲜血的洗礼，永远也成不了一个真正的魔法师。”

"That's right!" Andoine smiled, feeling pleased. "In the eyes of the mortals, magic is a skill that is mysterious yet elegant. But to a real mage, the only purpose of magic is to battle. A mage that lives is a mage that's really successful! You have learnt enough low-grade spells this past month, and have possessed a certain degree of skills. But it's far from enough. Without the experience of life and death, and the shower of fresh blood, you will never become a true mage."
“没错！”心情大爽之余，葛瑞安回答起问题也就更有耐心了：“魔法公会之所以到今天还是加洛斯第一势力，就是因为我们拥有屠魔山谷的控制权，那地方有三条稀有矿脉，漫山遍野的各种草药，最重要的是，还盛产各种高级魔晶，等奥法药剂卖完，我带你过去看看你就知道了。”

"That's right!" Gerian answered with greater patience in light of his good mood. "The reason why the Guild of Magic is still the number one force in Jarrosus today is that we have the control of the Demon Fall Valley. There are three rare mineral veins there and a great variety of herbs in that valley. Most importantly, it also abounds in all kinds of high-level magical crystals. When the auction for the Arcane Magic Potion is over, I'll bring you there and you can see for yourself."
“没错！”老梅林神色凝重，手中法杖一指人群中的林立：“既然这位药剂师先生有胆量侮辱梅林家族的继承人，那么我想他也应该有胆量接收被侮辱者的挑战！”

"That's right!" Old Merlin's expression was serious, he pointed his staff towards the crowd where Lin Li stood. "Since this pharmacist had the guts to humiliate the heir of Merlin Family, then I guess he'd have the guts to take on the humiliated's challenge!"
“没错，就是他。”葛瑞安点了点头：“还记得你刚来那天吗？
"That's right, it's him." Gerian nodded. "Do you still remember the day you came?"
“没错，就是这样！”
"That's right, that's exactly what happened!"
“没错，是不是很奇怪，魔法家族族长，却是一个咒术师……”
"That's right. Isn't it weird, the leader of a mage family is in fact a conjurer..."
“没错，没错了，这的确是……”
"That's right, that's right, this is indeed..."
“没问题。”林立清点了一下口袋里的草药，很肯定的点了点头。
"No problem." Lin Li counted the herbs in his pockets and nodded affirmatively.
“没问题，我也正想去加洛斯城看看。”
“Sure! I wanted to take a look around Jarrosus City too."
“深邃之银，一种你不明白的东西。”
"Deep silver, something you don't understand."
“混账东西，这一炉丹药几乎全炸了，你是怎么做事的？”
"You darned brat, this cauldron full of elixirs has been completely destroyed! What the hell did you do?"
“混账！”
"Bastard!"
“灵神丹！”
"Spirit Pills!"
“炸丹了？”
"The elixir exploded?"
“爱拿多少拿多少？”
"Take as much as I want?"
“父亲……”克伦威尔完全呆住了，老梅林的愤怒，就好象一根黑暗中的棍子，完全把克伦威尔给打蒙了，一时间委屈涌上心头，只是怔怔的站在那里，半天也说不出话来。

"Father..." Cromwell was completely dumbfounded. Old Merlin's anger was like a stick in the dark, beating him into bafflement. For a moment, the feeling of injustice welled up in his heart and he just stood there speechless for a long time.
“爸爸他……爸爸他就快要死了……”伊娜哭得一双美目红肿，在林立的不断安抚之下，这才勉强忍住了心中的悲伤，断断续续的说起了事情的经过。

"Father... Father is dying..." Ina's pretty eyes were red and swollen from all the crying. Under Lin Li's constant reassurance, she managed to hold back the sadness and began to speak intermittently, describing what’d happened.
“爸爸小心！”长腿美女的声音还没来得及落下，林立就忽然听见一阵破空之声传来，紧接着就是一声闷响，刚刚还呼喊着女儿名字的罗麦格雷尼连躲都没来得及躲，就被一只从天而降的椰子给砸得晕了过去。

“Father, be careful!” The long-legged beauty's voice had yet to settle when Lin Li heard a deafening sound followed by a muffled thud. McGrenn, who was just calling out his daughter's name, was knocked unconscious by a coconut that fell from the sky before he could avoid it.
"Great!"
“狠！”这是林立对萨鲁曼－鲁本唯一的评价。
"Ruthless!" This was Lin Li's only comment on Reuben Saruman.
“狮蝎……嗜血蜥蜴……雷兽，我靠！怎么还有双足飞龙的！”只见老头两眼放光，趴在柜台上一枚接一枚的数着，或是轻声低语或是大声惊呼，那神情那眼色，真是要多变态就有多变态。

"Manticore... Bloodsucking Lizard... Thunder Beast, damn! There's also a Wyvern!" The old man lay on the counter and counted them with his eyes lit, occasionally whispering or shouting. His facial expressions could not be more perverted.
“猜的！”
"I simply guessed!"
“现在你可以说了，是谁让你这么干的？”魔法公会地下室里，葛瑞安一张胖脸铁青。
"Now you can speak, who made you do it?" In the basement of the Guild of Magic, Gerian's chubby face was livid.
“现在开始帮你进行等级认证，你什么都不用管，只要往水晶球里输入魔力就好了。”走进大厅里，葛瑞安已经有些迫不及待了：“不用怕水晶球坏掉，你只要尽力输出就行了，其他的事我会处理。”

"From now on, we will begin the level certification. You don't have to care about anything else, just transmit your powers into the crystal ball." Gerian could hardly wait once they entered the hall. "Don't be afraid of breaking the crystal ball. Just focus on the output, I'll deal with the rest."
“现在的年轻人，果然比我们这些老家伙有出息多了，哈哈……”中年人突然笑了起来，，只是一双眼睛却始终盯着林立：“奥兰纳魔法公会明文规定，公会魔法师之间严禁私斗，费雷魔法师，难道没人告诉过你吗？”

"Young people nowadays, really yield more interest than us old folks, ha ha..." The middle-aged man suddenly burst out laughing, but his eyes relentlessly gazed at Lin Li: "The Alanna Guild of Magic has explicitly stated that private conflict among guild magi is strictly prohibited. Mage Felic, has no one ever told you before?"
“现在，你知道我是什么意思了吗？”一个瞬发击退术重创霍伦之后，安度因仍不打算罢休，只见他一边说着，一边慢慢向树下的霍伦逼近，一双眼睛当中，正透出森森的杀意。

"Now, do you know what I mean?" After inflicting heavy damage on Hoeren with an Instant Repel spell, Andoine showed no signs of stopping. He spoke as he slowly approached Hoeren under the tree, his eyes glistening with ghastly murderous intent.
“现在，我可以进去卖东西了吗？”林立笑咪咪的走了过去，弯下腰去向正痛苦呻吟的两人问道。
"Can I go in and sell my items now?" Lin Li approached with a grin and bent down to ask the two men who were still groaning in pain.
“现在？老子刚刚带人把他们干回去，估计又能消停个十几天了，埃斯霍尔这贱人，真是不知道死字怎么写，看着吧，老子迟早要把阴影之巢给他掀了……”

"Now? I just brought a bunch of people with me to fight back. I guess things will quiet down for the next ten or more days. Eiserhol, that jerk, really doesn't know how the word death is spelled. Just watch, I'll flip the Shadow's Nest over sooner or later..."
“用这个交任务没问题吧？”林立将半截狮蝎尾刺递给麦格雷尼。
"Is it alright to turn in this for your quest?" Lin Li handed the half piece of Manticore's hook to McGrenn.
“Ouch, Ow…”
“白痴。”欧灵冷冷的吐出两个字。
"Idiot," Orrin coldly spat a single word.
“白痴！都是因为你，这炉丹药又废了，快去取刚才一样的药材，继续炼……”
"Idiot! It's because of you that this cauldron of elixirs is ruined! Quickly retrieve the same ingredients as before and continue refining..."
“目前还没有，不过这事查起来不难，能够接触到巫师之眼秘密的，除了你我凯文三个，其他至少都需要魔导士级别，你再仔细想想，在公会众多魔导士当中，又有哪些人最可能背叛公会？”

"Not currently. But it's not hard to look into. Apart from me, you, and Kevin, anyone that has access to the secret of the Warlock's Eyes has to be at least a Magic Shooter. And then, think again, among the Magic Shooters, who is most likely to betray the guild?"
“看你今天打得这么精彩，再多送你一瓶好了……”
"Let me give you another bottle on account of how exciting you fought..."
“看你以后还敢不敢乱嚣张……”林立过足了手瘾，这才神清气爽的丢掉手中藤条，有朝四周看了一眼,准备招呼麦格雷尼父女闪人.

"Let's see if you dare to be arrogant again." It was only when Lin Li had been satisfied with the lashings that he cast away the cane in his hand. After taking a glance at his surroundings, he motioned to McGrenn and Ina for them to flee the scene.
“看到没有，前面那个穿黑色法师袍，用兜帽把头遮住的家伙，就是萨鲁曼家族这一代的族长——鲁本－萨鲁曼。”这个时候唯一不紧张的，大概也只有躲在后面的这一老一少了，葛瑞安神色悠闲，一边伸出胖手指向前排，一边耐心给林立介绍着。

"See, the guy in front wearing a black mage robe and covering his head with a hood is the patriarch of the Saruman Family, Reuben Saruman." The only people who were not tense would probably be the old and young hiding behind. Gerian looked relaxed, stretching his chubby fingers out toward the front row and patiently introducing to Lin Li.
“看到没有，罗林家族出手了，先前那些都是小打小闹，从现在开始才是重头戏，看着吧，这三瓶的成交价要是少于二十万，我就把自己的头给拧下来！”葛瑞安在旁边笑得一脸得意。

"See, the Rolin Family has shown their hand. The previous ones were all on the small scale. From now on, it is the highlight. Just watch, if the final bid for these three bottles of potion is less than 200,000, I'll screw my own head off!" Gerian laughed pompously at a side.
“看招！流星拳！”
"Take this! Shooting Star Punch!"
“看招！缠丝手！”
"Take this! Silk Hands!"
“看来不再给你点教训，你这个废物的脑子永远不会灵光！”
“Looks like I’m going to have to teach you a lesson, or your good-for-nothing brain will never learn!”
“看来你已经猜到了……”霍伦的笑容中，隐隐带着一丝快意，自从巴瑟罗尔从加洛斯回来之后，他就无时无刻不想着为儿子报仇。
"Seems like you had already guessed it..." Hoeren's smile hid a tinge of pleasure. Ever since Bathrilor returned from Jarrosus, he had incessantly wanted to help his son take revenege.
“看来你病得还不轻，找人给你开点药吧……”林立不敢直视那狂热的目光，只是嘟嘟囔囔的骂了一句，就准备脚底抹油开溜，那种狂热的目光让他有些怕了，不敢再跟这丫头继续纠缠下去。

"Looks like it's not mild. I'll have someone prescribe some medicine for you..." Lin Li did not dare to look into those fervent eyes. He mumbled a curse and was ready to slip away. That fervent look had frightened him, and he did not dare to continue hanging around this wench anymore.
“看来你的记性不太好，不过不要紧，等你住进公会地牢之后，你有足够的时间回忆，现在——我以奥兰纳魔法公会仲裁者的身份宣布，以伤害同僚的罪名逮捕你，你有什么话，可以留到公会地牢里说，因为……你可能会住上很长一段时间。”

"It looks like your memory is fuzzy. But it won't matter, just wait until you land in prison, then you will have plenty of time to recall. Now - with my authority as Arbitrator of the Alanna Guild of Magic, you are under arrest for injuring a fellow mage. If you have anything to say, you can wait until you land in the Guild dungeon, because... you might be there for a very long time."
“看来是我达到了铸鼎境二重，蓝色元力凝练了，这黑色元力也被凝练了，所以消耗的速度变慢了很多。”

"Looks like I've reached the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. The blue essence force is more condensed; the black essence force has also become more condensed, thus its consumption speed has become much slower than before."
“看来真是年纪大了，脑子也开始不好使了……”林立悄悄嘀咕了一句，在葛瑞安愕然的目光中，将那只天蓝色的玻璃瓶塞进了他手里。

"Looks like you're really getting on age that even your brain's stopped working..." Lin Li whispered quietly. In the midst of Gerian's astounded stare, he stuffed the sky-blue glass bottle into his hand.
“看来这个世界真心对自己好的，只有娘亲，大爷爷和小奴吧？”
"Are Mother, Grandfather, and Xiaonu the only ones in this world who would show real kindness to me?"
“看来这几天要仔细观察柳长老炼丹，先把这炼丹的手法学会再说……”
Looks like I should carefully observe how Elder Liu refines elixirs for the next couple of days. I must first learn the art of refining elixirs before I can think of doing anything else...
“看来这里就是陪练的地方了，这小房间是练功房？这最少有二十间吧？难怪陪练不够。”

It seems like this is the place where sparring practice occurs. Is this small room the technique-practicing room? Surely there must be at least twenty rooms here, no? No wonder there are not enough sparring partners available.
“看看我刚才找到了什么……”
"Look at what I found just now..."
“看见那个小胡子没有，就是第二排中间，穿红色法师袍，看起来很骚包那家伙。”葛瑞安躲在一群魔法师中间，很猥琐的伸手朝前排指了一指：“那就是梅林家的老三埃文，马修斯的亲弟弟，梅林家三兄弟里，就数这家伙最没出息，到现在都还只是个魔导士……”

"See the little moustache, the one in the middle of the second row wearing a red mage robe and looking all hussy?" Gerian hid among the group of mages, stretched his hand and pointed pettily at the front row. "That is Evan, the third son of the Merlin Family and Matthew's younger brother. Among the three brothers in the Merlin Family, he's the good-for-nothing one, merely a Magic Shooter now..."
“看起来有些面生，不过好象是跟凯文魔法师一起来的，应该是他的随从或学徒之类的……”虽然不知道这青年的真正身份，但安东尼在交谈中，却始终保持着恭敬的态度，因为这个青年是城主大人介绍来的，说是来自法兰王都，而且从两人言谈举止之间，安东尼可以很清楚的看出，他们绝不是一般的关系。

"Looks a little unfamiliar, but he came with Mage Kevin, so he should be his attendant or apprentice of sorts..." Although he did not know the true identity of this young man, Anthony had maintained a respectful attitude throughout the conversation. This young man was introduced by the Castellan, who said that he had come from the capital of Felan Kingdom. From the way they talked and behaved, Anthony could clearly see that they were in no ordinary relationship.
“看起来，你是打算抵抗到底了。”霍伦看了林立一眼，目光又落到了马森跟欧灵身上：“你们呢？也打算跟他一起抵抗？”
"It seems like you plan to resist to the very end." Hoeren looked at Lin Li, then his gaze fell on Marson and Orrin. "What about you two? Are you going to resist with him?"
“真不幸……”林立一脸遗憾，心里却暗自庆幸，还好你们遇上了双足飞龙，不然我上哪找人带路去，这见鬼的森林可比双足飞龙难对付多了……

"How unfortunate…" Lin Li looked regretful, but rejoiced secretly in his heart. Luckily they had encountered the Wyverns, if not, where would he have gone looking for people to lead the way? This cursed forest was much trickier to deal with than a Wyvern...
“真不知道他们是怎么想的，那可是大师级的药剂，不自己藏着悄悄喝也就算了，居然还拿出来卖！妈的……你们几个别走，把钱都拿出来先借给我，老子也买一瓶去！”

"I really don't know what they were thinking. Those are potions of the mastery level, they should be keeping them and drinking them in secret, but instead they decided to sell them! Damn... You few, don't leave! Lend me some money, I should buy a bottle for myself too!"
“真不知道安度因怎么教你的……”葛瑞安一脸的鄙夷：“闪金的水晶卡，全安瑞尔世界通用，一般城市都有闪金银庄，要用钱你直接去取就行了，难道你还想背着金币到处跑？那可是一百多万，熔成金球有房子那么高，你带得走么你……”

"I really don't know how Andoine has taught you..." Gerian was full of despise. "Glittergold's crystal card can be used anywhere in Anril. There's a Glittergold Bank in every city in general; if you need money, you can withdraw it directly. Surely you wouldn't want to carry the gold coins around? That's over a million we're talking about. If melted into a golden ball, it'd be as tall as a house, can you even carry it…?"
“真是不好意思葛瑞安叔叔，我手上还有点事需要处理，恐怕就不能等拍卖会结束了。”艾萨克城主神色间有些遗憾。
"I'm so sorry, Uncle Gerian. I have some urgent matters on hand to deal with and I'm afraid they can't wait until the auction is over." Castellan Isaac's face was regretful.
“真是遗憾……”林立一边庆幸，一边暗下决心，等到了加洛斯城之后，自己一定要编个毫无破绽的来历才行，不然被美女问到，自己却不敢放心搭讪，这实在是太没面子了……

“That was a pity..." Lin Li rejoiced while he came to a decision. When they reached Jarrosus City, he would definitely have to come up with a flawless background. Otherwise, it would be a loss of face when he was asked by the beauty and couldn't easily strike up a conversation with her.
“真有这种运气？”林立望着手上的花瓣，再也压抑不住心头的激动。
"Could I be this lucky?" Lin Li gazed at the petal in his hand, and couldn't suppress his excitement any longer.
“真的一点都没有了？帮帮忙……再挤一点，只要一点点就好了，好歹让我弄一瓶狂暴药剂试试啊……”
"Is there really no more? Please… Squeeze a little more, just a little bit more. At least let me make a bottle of Rampage Potion…"
“真的，那真的是愿望术卷轴！”
"It really is, that is really the scroll of Wishes!"
“真的？”伊娜眼中带着泪花，一张俏脸上满是惊喜的笑容。
"Really?" Ina's eyes were full of tears but there was a smile of surprise across her pretty face.
“知道一些。”克伦威尔稍稍安了些心，这才开口说道：“这个魔法师叫费雷，是我在落日山脉的时候认识的，当时他遭遇了一头双足飞龙，是我出手救了他，可是这个人不但不知感恩，还一再的想对付我，后来我听说他加入了魔法公会，就想让葛瑞安给他点教训……”

"I know a little." Cromwell was slightly relieved and went on, "This mage is called Felic, I got to know him when I was in the Sunset Mountains. He had encountered a Wyvern and I was the one who saved him. But this person did not know of gratitude and wanted to deal with me again and again. Then I heard he had joined the Guild of Magic, so I wanted Gerian to teach him a lesson..."
“知道这叫什么吗？”
"Do you know what is this?"
“知道错了就躲一边哭去，别在这碍手碍脚，让人看着讨厌。”林立冷冷的看了她一眼之后再不理会。
"If you know you're wrong then go hide in a corner and cry. Don't get in the way here, it's tiresome." Lin Li shot a cold glance at her and paid no more heed to her.
“砰砰砰！”
"Pong, Pong, Pong....!"
“Bang!”
"Bang!" "Crack!"
"Pong, Pong, Pong....!"
“确实很直爽……”林立笑了笑，这胖老头可比安度因有意思多了。
"Straightforward indeed..." Lin Li laughed. The fat old man was much more interesting than Andoine..
“神奇功能，对，快吃饭，继续尝试，昨天又试出一个能增幅药力的能力，说不定这黑色元力还有其他的功能呢。”

Magical powers... right! I shall quickly finish my food and continue testing it! Yesterday, I managed to discover its ability to improve healing. Perhaps this black essence force has other abilities too!
“立刻收拾好你的东西，从我家里滚出去！”
"Pack your stuff immediately and get out of my house!"
“笨丫头！”
"Silly girl!"
“笨蛋！”谁知道，葛瑞安却并未大发雷霆，只是气急败坏的骂了一句：“记录个屁！能支持二十八分钟输出的精神强度，你就算记录下来也没人相信……”

"Fool!" Gerian, however, did not throw a fit—not physically. Instead, he scolded him in a fit of rage. "Record for what! A mental strength that can support an output of twenty-eight minutes... Even if you do record it, no one would probably believe it."
“笨蛋，黑石多了…”
"Stupid, you've added too much coal..."
“等等……”克伦威尔刚要出门，老梅林却又把他叫住了：“前几天我好象听说，你因为一个年轻魔法师，跟魔法公会闹得有些不愉快？”
"Hold on..." Cromwell was just about to leave when Old Merlin called him. "A few days ago, I seemed to hear that you were having a bit of a bad time with the Guild of Magic because of a young mage?"
“等等……我需要商量一下。”
"Hold on... I need to have a discussion."
“等等……最高议会又是什么？”
"Hold on... What's the Supreme Council?"
“等等……现在不行，时间太早了，必须等到太阳下山的时候。”
"Wait... now's no good. It's too early, we need to wait until the sun sets."
“等等！”
"Wait!"
“等等！武堂副长老？”
"Hold on! Deputy Elder of the martial arts training court?"
“等级认证？”
"Level certification?"
“简单的说，就是确认你的魔法等级，我个人觉得，对你来说，这很有必要，因为只有进行过等级认证之后，你才能够从魔法公会获得相应等级的咒语。”

"Simply put, it is to certify your magic level. In my opinion, this is necessary for you, because it is only after being certified that you will be able to receive spells corresponding to your level from the Guild of Magic."
“算了葛瑞安，我承认你是加洛斯城最强大的魔法师。”为了忍下这口怒气，老梅林就差把牙齿咬出血来了，只听他一字一泪的说道：“不过这又有什么意义？就算你是加洛斯最强法师又怎么样，最强法师就能包庇纵容？所有人都看得清清楚楚，这位药剂师先生，侮辱了梅林家族的继承人，如果魔法公会不能给出一个交代的话，我保证加洛斯最强大的两支势力之间，将会有一场真正的战争！”

"Forget it, Gerian. I'll admit that you are the most powerful mage in Jarrosus City." In order swallow the fury, Old Merlin had almost chewed his teeth till they bled. He said with tears for every word, "But what's the point? Even if you are the most powerful mage in Jarrosus City, does this mean you can shield and connive? Everyone has clearly saw Mr Pharmacist here humiliating the heir of the Merlin Family. If the Guild of Magic is unable to give an explanation for this, I will make sure there's a battle between the two most powerful influence in Jarrosus City!"
“算了，你先睡一觉，床让给你好了……”
"Forget it, take a nap first. I'll let you have the bed..."
“算了，做人不能太贪心……”
"Forget it, I should not be too greedy..."
“算了，这事交给我来……”林立对葛瑞安的性格，实在是太清楚不过了，生怕这倒霉魔导士几句话没说对，惹得老家伙一个火球轰过去，那可就什么都没有了。

"Forget it, let me handle this matter." Lin Li knew Gerian's character too well. He was afraid this unlucky Magic Shooter wouldn't say things right, getting Gerian all riled up to the point of blasting a fireball at him, and then they'd have nothing left at all.
“算你小子还有点良心。”安度因满意的点了点头，老脸上带着几分欣慰的笑容：“我安度因活了一百多岁，还从来没见过谁的天赋象你这么好过，你小子根本就是个怪物，我想就算是传说中的格雷斯科，在天赋上也不可能比你更强了。”

"You kid have some conscience at least." Andoine nodded with satisfaction, a relieved smile on his aged face. "I have lived for over a hundred years and have never seen anyone as gifted as you. You are a monster, kid. I think even the legendary Geresco couldn't have been more gifted than you are."
“管他了，先拖着，能拖一天是一天！”
"Forget about it! I'll just drag dealing with the problem first! I'll see how long I can put it off!"
“管他的呢，修炼速度那么慢，就算是颜色是九彩的也没用啊！再厉害的元力心法，练不到一定境界，那也是没有任何意义的。”

“Forget about it! The cultivation speed is so slow that this skill is useless! What’s the point even if it can produce rainbow-colored essence force!? An essence force cultivation technique, no matter how powerful, is practically useless and meaningless so long as it cannot help me practice up to a specific level of ability!”
“管他的，以后的事情以后再说，先突破到铸鼎境四重再说。”
"Whatever, I'll cross that bridge when I come to it. First, I have to make a breakthrough to the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm."
"Oh no..."
“糟了！”
"Oh no!"
“糟了，这江如虎竟继承了他父亲战斗的精髓，谨慎如鼠，阴险如蛇，唉……只能拼了，黑色元力！”

"Oh no, this Jiang Ruhu has actually inherited his father's genes in combat prowess! He's cautious like a mouse and trecherous like a snake! Sigh... looks like I can only stake my life in it all! Black essence force!"
“糟糕！”
"Oh no!"
“糟糕！”确定眼前的七级魔兽已经死去，林立才忽然想起件事来：“太浪费了！这么多血全流到了地上，这可能做不少狂暴药水呢……”

"Oh no!" After confirming the level-seven magical beast was dead, Lin Li was suddenly reminded of something. What a waste! All this blood that have been spilled could make a substantial amount of Rampage Potion...
“糟糕！出事了！”那是伊娜的声音，罗麦格雷尼上神色一变，抓起身旁的武器就跑出了山洞。
“Something terrible has happened!” It was Ina's voice. McGrenn's expressions changed as he grabbed the weapon beside him and dashed out of the cave.
“糟糕！忘记把这事跟他说了……”林立已经出了翡翠高塔，凯文才忽然想起件重要的事来，可等他想要追出门去时，却发现两人早就走得不见了踪影。

"Oh no! I forgot to tell him about this..." Lin Li had already stepped out of the Emerald Tower when Kevin suddenly recalled something important. But when he wanted to chase after them, he found that both of them had long gone out of sight.
“系统发生未知故障，请所有在线玩家立刻下线！”
"An unknown failure occurred in the system. All players are requested to go offline immediately!"
“紫金，一两紫金，我竟然赚了一两紫金？”
"Purple gold! A tael of purple gold! I actually earned a tael of purple gold..."
“红熊，出战！”杨管事无奈一叹，只能招手让另外一名陪练上场，此刻所有的白银陪练都在其余练功房内，他唯有先找青铜陪练顶上了。

"Red Bear, it's time for combat!" Manager Yang sighed helplessly, as he had no option but to beckon another sparring partner to head out for combat. At the moment, all of the silver-token-grade sparring partners were in the other remaining technique-practicing rooms. As such he could only find bronze-token-grade sparring partners to fill in the gaps.
“缠丝手！”
"Silk Hand!"
“罗林家族一向行事低调，没想到关键时候，居然也能拿出这样的好东西来，看来这十一魔法家族的水，可真不是一般的深。”
"The Rolin Family has always been low profile, but they can actually bring out such a good stuff like this. Looks like the water is not regular deep for the 11 mage families..."
“罗琳……罗琳？你怎么了，是不是身体不舒服？”城主大人发现女儿神色有异，不由关切的问道。
The Castellan noticed his daughter's odd expression and asked out of concern, "Rowling... Rowling? What happened, are you feeling unwell?"
“罗琳姐姐，我知道，我知道……”伊娜扶着红发美女的香肩，温言安慰着。
"Sister Rowling, I know, I know..." Ina held the redheaded beauty's shoulders and comforted her.
“罢了罢了……要不就试试吧，虽然大爷爷经常告诫我功法在没确认可靠程度前不要乱练。”

“Forget it, forget it! Hmmm… How about I give it a try? Grandfather always chides me not to practice any random cultivation technique before I have fully confirmed the potential of my abilities, but this is a special situation…”
“老不死，你是知道我的寿命无多，所以心急火燎地赶来要送我一程么？”无名笑眯眯地问。
"Old Fart Undying, are you that anxious to send me to my death?” Wu Ming asked smilingly. “Is it because you learned that I don't have much longer to live?"
“老二法里奥，梅林家三兄弟里我最看不透的一个，说起来，这家伙一直不显山不露水的，小时候我还揍过他几次，一直觉得他是个废柴，可没想到后来，这家伙越爬越高，现在竟爬到了法兰王国财务大臣的位置，总管着王国经济命脉，不过听说他跟马修斯有些矛盾，已经好几年没回过加洛斯了。”

"The second son is Fario, the one I couldn't figure out among the three brothers. Speaking of which, this fellow has always kept silent and low-key. I've beaten him up a few times when we were young and have always thought he's a useless bum. But unexpectedly, this fellow has climbed higher and higher, and now he has climbed to the position of the Minister of Wealth of the Felan Kingdom. He is in charge of the economic lifeblood of the kingdom, but I heard he has some problems with Matthew and has not been back in Jarrosus for several years."
“老子把你这鸟网给拆了，看你还笑不笑得出来！”自从走出木屋之后，林立第一次从空间戒指中拿出了自己的法杖，这是安度因送给他的唯一一件东西，一根镶嵌着冰霜巨兽魔晶的魔法杖，林立给它取了一个名字——寒冬。

"I'll tear down your lousy net and see if you can still laugh!" It was the first time Lin Li took out his own staff from the Space Ring since leaving the log cabin. It was the only thing Andoine had gifted him—a magic staff embedded with the magical crystal of the Frost Troll. Lin Li had named it Winter.
“老子补充完巫师之眼后，就连夜赶回来了，一路上真是累得眼睛都睁不开……”葛瑞安走进门来，二话不说就往林立床上一躺，压根不管房间主人如何抗议：“躺着可真舒服……”

"I hurried back after I've restored the Warlock's Eyes. I was so tired I could barely keep my eyes open on the road..." Gerian walked into the room and lay down on Lin Li's bed regardless of his protests. "It's so comfortable lying down..."
“老子让你再笑！”林立一边帮伊娜解开身上的束缚，一边还没忘记继续射出风刃。
"That'll teach you to laugh again!" Lin Li helped Ina loosen the restraint on her body, all the while not forgetting to deliver the wind blades.
“老朋友，今生没能带你进入仙域，我很抱歉……”
"Old friend,” Wu Ming muttered, “my apologies, but I cannot bring you to the immortal realm today…”
“而真正致命的却是第二个方面，你接触魔法实在太晚了，根据黑暗年代的资料记载，格雷斯科出身于魔法师世家，父母都是黑暗年代著名的大法师，他一出生就开始接触魔法，到你这个年纪的时候，格雷斯科早就已经突破了魔导士的水准，而你却才刚刚开始学习最低级的法术。虽然时间可以靠天赋来弥补，但天赋却不能帮你打下足够坚实的基础，魔法的世界里没有捷径可走，在打下足够坚实的基础之前，一切的强大法术都只不过是空谈。”

"What's really deadly is the second aspect, that is you've been exposed to magic too late. According to the records of the Dark Ages, Geresco was born into a family of mages. His parents were famous mages of the Dark Ages. He had been exposed to magic from birth and by the time he got to your age, he had already surpassed the standards of a Magic Shooter, and you're just beginning to learn the lowest level of magic.While a late start can be compensated for by talent, it does not give you a solid enough foundation. There are no shortcuts in the world of magic, and all powerful spells are nothing but talk until a solid foundation is laid.”
“聚珍阁果然不凡！”
"The Pearl Gathering Pavilion is definitely special!"
“聚珍阁！”
"The Pearl Gathering Pavilion! "
“能强能水晶差不多的东西，我记得好象是叫唤醒药剂来的。”说完又小声的补充了一句：“其实我还是比较喜欢叫它红牛饮料。”
"This is similar to the Strong Energy Crystal. I remembered it was called the Awakening Potion or something," Lin Li added softly, "but I prefer to call it the Red Bull drink.
“自然！”杨管事看出了江逸的担忧，笑道：“我们武殿最重声誉，做事情也绝对公平公正，说一不二，这一点你放心。”

"Of course!" Manager Yang had spotted Jiang Yi's concerns and, smiling, he replied, "Our Martial Arts Hall takes our reputation most seriously, and when we do things we're definitely fair and impartial. We keep our word - that, you can be rest assured about."
“至少是十七级……”身处这种压力之下，林立对对方的强大，有着最直观的感受，奥德文的儿子，果然不是一般厉害，跟葛瑞安老梅林之流比起来，简直就不是一个级别。

"He should be at least level-seventeen..." Under such pressure, Lin Li felt his opponent's power in the most direct way. Odwin's son was not just powerful. Compared to the likes of Gerian and Old Merlin, his power could not be measured simply by levels.
“艾……艾萨克叔叔……您为什么打我？”这一记耳光抽得巴瑟罗尔连连后退，他用手捂着左脸，神色间有些发蒙。
"Un... Uncle Isaac... Why did you hit me?" The slap had Bathrilor stumbling a few steps back. He covered his left cheek with his hand and his expression was glazed.
“艾萨克城主来了！”正胡思乱想的时候，却又听见花园外一阵喧闹。
"Castellan Isaac has arrived!" Just as he was letting his thoughts run wild, he heard another clamor coming from outside the garden.
“艾萨克，既然你叫我一声葛瑞安叔叔，那我这个做叔叔的可不能小气，几瓶奥法药剂而已，你如果有需要的话尽管开口，叔叔我虽然没什么本事，可是这点主还是能做的。”

"Isaac, since you address me as Uncle Gerian, then I can't be that petty as an uncle. It’s only a few bottles of Arcane Magic Potion, if you need them just tell me. I may not have much ability but I can still make the call for such a small matter."
“苍狼！”
"Lone Wolf!"
“苍狼，你去哪？”
"Lone Wolf, where are you going?"
“苍狼，出战吧！”杨管事咧嘴一笑，朝江逸招了招手，这翊凌雪本就是他通知的，否则怎么会来得那么快？
"Lone Wolf, head out for combat!" Manager Yang grinned widely and waved his hand towards Jiang Yi. He was the one who informed this Yi Lingxue, after all, otherwise how could she arrive so soon?
“苍狼，出战！”
"Lone Wolf, it's time to do battle!"
“苍狼，出来对战了！”
"Long Wolf, come out and battle!"
“苍狼？怎么还不进来？”
"Lone Wolf? Why are you not coming inside?"
“药剂大师……开什么玩笑！”葛瑞安拼命揉着眼睛，以为是自己看错了。
"Master of Potions... You must be kidding!" Gerian rubbed his eyes as hard as he could, thinking he had seen wrong.
“药力的确增强了很多！”
"Their medical efficacy did indeed increase by a lot!"
“落日山脉中的另类，一种并不太热中于杀戮的魔兽，如果我没猜错的话，伊娜现在可能在哭，但应该没有生命危险。”林立望着地上那杂乱的脚印，又低声补充道：“从脚印上看，应该只有一只。”

“An oddity in the Sunset Mountains, a magical beast that are not keen on killing. If I'm right, Ina should be crying now, but she's not in any danger for the time being." Lin Li stared at the cluttered footprints on the ground and added softly, "From the looks of the footprints, there should be only one."
“葛瑞安会长……”废墟般的房间里，只有一名看上去有些瘦弱的年轻法师,大约二三十岁，此时他正目瞪口呆的望着房门，刚想要说话，却又被胖老头瞪了一眼，生生把半截话给咽回了肚子里。

"President Gerian..." The room was in ruins, and inside it was a thin, young mage who looked to be about twenty or thirty years old. He stood dumbfounded, looking at the door. He was about to say something but the fat old man shot him a fiery glare, and he could only swallow the words back down his throat.
“葛瑞安会长！”旁边一群魔法师刚一转身，就看见来的竟然是葛瑞安，顿时只觉背心发凉，这老家伙怎么坐过来了……
"President Gerian!" The group of mages at the side turned around to see Gerian, and all of a sudden they felt chills on their backs. Why did the old fellow come to sit here...
“葛瑞安会长，听说您正在找我？”见这两个家伙实在可怜，林立摇了摇头，还是先出声跟胖老头打了个招呼。
"President Gerian, I heard you were looking for me?" Lin Li shook his head seeing those two poor fellows, but he had began by greeting the fat old man.
“葛瑞安会长，您太不理智了……”而正被那个身影赶出房门的，是一名四十多岁的中年人，这中年人穿着一件黑色紧身皮甲，浑身上下透出一股浓浓的血腥气，当他回过头来的时候，林立忽然觉得，自己就好象是被一条毒蛇盯上了一般。

"President Gerian, you're too irrational..." The man who was driven out of the door by the round figure was a middle-aged man in his forties. He wore a tight black leather jacket and emitted a thick smell of blood from his body. When he turned around, Lin Li suddenly felt as if he was being targeted by a venomous snake.
“葛瑞安会长，您真的是太不理智了，拒绝阴影之城的友谊，只会给加洛斯魔法公会带来灾难。”中年人丢下这么一句话，头也不回的出了翡翠之塔，只是在擦身而过之时，又望了林立一眼，那种仿佛被毒蛇盯上的感觉，让林立没来由的心头一紧。

"President Gerian, you are too irrational. Rejecting the friendship of Shadow City will only bring disaster to Jarrosus Guild of Magic." The middle-aged man dropped the sentence on him and left the Emerald Tower without another look back. He only took another look at Lin Li when he passed by, and the feeling of having been targeted by a venomous snake tightened Lin Li's heart.
“葛瑞安会长，我还有个小小的要求。”在跟葛瑞那握手的时候，年轻族长轻声说道：“不知道能不能为我引见一下贵公会那位年轻的药剂师？”
"President Gerian, I have a small request," the young patriarch spoke in a soft voice as he held Gerian's hand. "I wonder if you can introduce me to the young pharmacist in your guild?"
“葛瑞安叔叔的意思，是由我们两个替他去……”
"Uncle Gerian's intention is for the two of us to go in his place..."
“葛瑞安叔叔说笑了，我对奥法药剂没什么野心，今天来魔法公会，也只是想见识见识传说中的药剂大师。”艾萨克也算是个人才，突然冒出的便宜叔叔，他却是叫得比谁都顺口，就好象葛瑞安真跟他家是世交一样……

"Uncle Gerian must be joking. I have no desire for the Arcane Magic Potion. I've come to the Guild of Magic today to have a look at the legendary potion master." Isaac was somewhat of a genius, he had gotten a convenient uncle out of the blue but addressed him so easily as if Gerian was really an old family friend...
“葛瑞安，我已经不是魔法公会的人了，你有什么权利囚禁我？”
"Gerian, I don't belong to the Guild of Magic anymore. What right do you have to keep me in captivity?"
“虎哥！”
"Brother Hu!"
“虚空花除了用于提纯之外，还有刺激精神力增长的效果，特别是通过加热之后，这种效果还会进一步放大，但清醒药剂中本身就有结灵草，它同样可以刺激精神力增长，加入虚空花之后，会导致各种药性间失去平衡，所以我加入了龙血草，当药剂达到沸腾状态之后，龙血草产生的宁神效果，就可以很好的遏止住虚空花的药性……”说着林立用手蘸了一些红酒，在桌上列下了几条公式，以便将整个过程解释得更清楚一些。

"Besides being used for purifying, the netherbloom also has the effect of stimulating the growth of mental strength, and the effect can be further amplified after heating. But the Sobriety Potion itself has the knot elixir which can also stimulate the growth of mental strength. The addition of netherbloom will cause a loss in balance of the medicinal properties, so I added the dracaena grass. When the potion reaches its boiling point, the calming effects of the dracaena grass will curb the medicinal properties of the netherbloom..." Lin Li said as he dipped his hand in the red wine and listed down a few equations on the table to explain the whole process more clearly.
“蛇鞭腿！”
"Snake Whip Leg!"
“蛮牛之力药剂？不过这味道又好象有点不对……”林立吸了吸鼻子，回忆了好一阵子才明白过来：“我靠！原来是失败品，难怪我总觉得这味道不对，不过谁这么天才，居然往蛮牛之力药剂里加智慧之树树叶，难道他还嫌四种材料间的冲突不够激烈？”

"The Bull's Strength Potion? But it doesn't smell quite right..." Lin Li took a few sniffs and pondered for a long time before he finally understood. "Damn! It's a failed one, no wonder it didn't smell right to me. But who's the genius adding leaves from the Wisdom Tree into the potion? Was he not satisfied that the conflicting smell of the combination of the four ingredients was not strong enough?
“蠢货！”但等待他的，却是老梅林愤怒的咆哮，老人手中的酒杯又一次摔到了地板上，急促的呼吸声中，指着克伦威尔的手指正轻轻发抖：“谁让你跟他们谈判的？是谁给你权利，让你去跟他们谈判的？你知不知道，这是关系到梅林家族生死存亡的大事！在这样的事情里，你居然还敢擅做主张，你到底还有没有把我这个老头子放在眼里？”

"Fool!" But it was Old Merlin's angry outburst that awaited him. The wine glass in the old man's hands fell to the floor again, and the fingers pointing at Cromwell were shaking slightly in the sound of rapid breathing. "Who told you to negotiate with them? Who gave you the rights to negotiate with them? Do you know that this is a matter of life and death for the Merlin Family! You actually have the liberty to make your own decisions, do you still have any regard for me?"
“蠢货！你们还敢再蠢一点吗？这么简单的元素排列都无法完成，你们一天到晚究竟都往脑子里装了些什么东西？”当然——他的指点方式，一向是比较特别的。
"Fools! Can't you all be any dumber? You couldn't even complete such an easy elemental sequencing, what is in your minds all day?" Of course, his approach was always out of the ordinary.
“蠢货，快去取黑石，生火！”
"Idiot, quickly get me some coal and start the fire!"
“要不随便加点药粉试试？”
"Why don't I just add some medicinal powders and experiment?"
“要是我没猜错的话，小兄弟应该是凯文魔法师的助手吧？”本来他是想说学徒的，不过一看林立身上那件怒焰之袍，又把话给收了回去，以魔法公会的财力，凯文的学徒怎么会穿得这么落魄？

"If my guess is correct, you must be Mage Kevin's assistant?" He had wanted to say mage apprentice, but took back his words after seeing the Robe of Wrath Lin Li was wearing. With the Guild of Magic's financial resources, how could Kevin's apprentice be so underdressed?
“要是看奥德文的面子，倒也不是不可以……”安度因点了点头，老实说，他也确实不想跟奥德文闹僵，那毕竟是二十一级的传奇法师，又是奥兰纳魔法公会会长，虽然自己不怕他，但真要弄成不死不休的仇恨，倒也没多大意思。

"If I were to think about Odwin's reputation, it's not impossible..." Andoine nodded his head. Honestly speaking, he also did not want to create a deadlock with Odwin. He was a legendary mage at level- twenty one, and was the President of the Alanna Guild of Magic. Although he wasn't scared og him, but he also did not want to create a meaningless but unending hate.
“要钱怎么不去拍卖行？那里可都是财主，要是碰上谁心情好，扔你几十金币，你这升级的药钱可就不用发愁了。”

"Why not go to the auction house for money? That's where all the rich men are. If anyone happens to be in a good mood and throw some gold coins your way, you will never have to worry about not getting enough money for the level-up potion."
“见过城主大人。”城主大人的出现，让水深火热的凯文喘了口气。
"Master Castellan." The appearance of the Castellan gave Kevin a breather from the misery.
“见过荣管事！”
“Greetings, Chief Rong!”
“见鬼！”
"Holy cow!"
“让让，让让……”胖叔叔刚刚说了没几句话，就一时不慎被人挤到了旁边，他哪里肯甘心，赶忙凭着身体的优势将林立挤开，又凑到了凯文跟前：“凯文魔法师，宴会完了之后一起吃个饭怎么样？罗德叔叔手上正好有笔生意想跟魔法公会谈谈！”

"Excuse me, excuse me..." The chubby uncle had only said a few words and was accidentally squeezed to a side. How was he willing to take it lying down? He hurriedly pushed Lin Li away with his physical advantage and moved up to Kevin again. "Mage Kevin, how about having a dinner with me after the banquet? Uncle Rode has a business deal to discuss with the Guild of Magic!"
“记住，要做，就要做得干净一点。”
"Remember, if you do, do it in a clean way."
“记得。”
"Yes."
“试试手肘！”
"Time to try my elbow!"
“试试！”
"I'll give it a try!"
“说什么混账话？我不管你，谁管你？”
"What kind of rubbish are you saying? If I stop caring about you, who else will?"
“说什么连累不连累的？”
"Don't say that—this isn't a matter of burden or not!"
“说句心里话凯文大哥，小弟对你是真佩服，以前父亲就跟我说，这加洛斯城里，凯文大哥是唯一一个魔法天赋比我强的年轻人，那时候我还不太相信，一直等到去年，凯文大哥突破八级的时候，我才知道父亲的眼光果然没错……”

"Brother Kevin, to be honest, I really admire you. Father once told me that you are the only young man in the whole Jarrosus City with a stronger gift in magic than me. I had not believed him then; only last year when you had surpassed level-eight in the mage certification did I realize Father's vision was not wrong..."
“说来也是奇怪，这小子执掌曼尼斯家族七年，居然连一次手都没出过，谁也不知道他究竟什么实力，老奥丁你知道吧，前几年因为有些生意上的冲突，老家伙就派了几个杀手，想去摸摸人家的底，结果派出去的人一个都没回来不说，没过几天，还在睡觉的时候被人把胡子给剃了，老家伙半夜醒来一看，当场就被吓成了弱智，连夜跑到曼尼斯家，又是求饶又是道歉，才总算把这事给了结了。”

"Speaking of which, it's odd. The boy has been in charge of the Mannes Family for seven years but has not fought even once. No one knows what his actual strength is. You know Old Odin. A few years ago, due to some business strife, the old fellow sent a few assassins to sound him out. In the end, none of the people he sent returned, and a few days later his beard was shaved while he was asleep. The old fellow woke up in the middle of the night and was scared silly on the spot. He ran over to the Mannes' house overnight, begging for mercy, and apologized for what he did. Only then was the matter finally settled.”
“谁他妈有空虐待这些废柴……”葛瑞安两眼一瞪，害怕引火烧身的几个魔法师赶紧往后缩去，这才听胖老头继续说道：“你第一次来魔法公会的时候，我不是正跟阴影之都的人谈判么，当时我们谈的就是屠魔山谷的控制权，估计你就是那时候记下的……”

"Whoever has the damn time to abuse these useless bums..." Gerian shot them a glare and the mages shrank back immediately, afraid that they might draw fire to themselves. Gerian then continued, "The first time you arrived at the Guild of Magic, wasn't I talking to someone from Shadow City? We were talking about the control of Demon Fall Valley at that time, I guess you remembered it from there..."
“谁他妈管你是不是魔法公会的人？”葛瑞安神色凶恶，咆哮声在地下室内久久回荡：“老子现在是寻仇——寻仇你懂吗？你现在就出去喊喊看，就说魔法公会囚禁了你，看有没有人敢为你出口，还他妈有什么权利，老子需要权利吗？”

"Who the f*ck cares whether you belong to the Guild of Magic?" Gerian's expression was ferocious, and his angry roar echoed in the basement for a long while. "I am seeking revenge now. Seeking revenge, you understand? Go out and scream that the Guild of Magic has kept you captive, see whether anyone dares to speak up for you. Still talking about what damn rights... do I need them?
“谁知道，估计人家以为这里的都是有钱人，想来讨点钱买药升级呢。”
"Who knows. Maybe he thinks the rich are here, and would like to get some money for a potion to level up."
“谁这么下流，居然在我家里藏了个黑洞！”在最后一丝意识被黑暗吞噬前，林立心头冒出的居然是这么个疑问……
"Which despicable fellow hid a black hole in my house!?" The question popped up in Lin Li's head before his last stream of consciousness faded into the darkness...
"Who goes there?"
“谜蓝宝石归你，这条项链归我。”
"The Enigma Sapphire is yours, the necklace is mine."
“谢天谢地……”老安度因如释重负，有些不好意思的解释道：“这几天我在等一个很重要的消息，确实抽不出时间去采，你愿意帮忙可真是太好了！”

"Thank God..." Old Andoine heaved a sigh of relief and explained rather embarrassedly, "I am waiting for some very important news these few days and it's really hard to find the time to go. It's great that you're willing to help!"
“谢谢。”听着老法师絮絮叨叨的叮嘱，林立忽然觉得眼眶有些湿润，为了不让气氛太过尴尬，他很勉强的挤出几分笑容，用一种很随意的语气问道：“打算什么时候走？”

“Thank you.” After listening to the old mage’s gentle and thoughtful exhortation, Lin Li suddenly felt that his eyes were moist. In order to lighten the atmosphere, he gave a reluctant smile and asked casually, “When are you planning to leave?”
“谢谢会长！”
"Thank you, President!"
“谢谢你，费雷先生……”一时间伊娜只觉惊喜交加，小嘴一扁眼看就要哭出声来
"Thank you, Mr Felic..." Ina was pleasantly surprised, her lips were pursed as if she was about to cry.
“谢谢葛瑞安会长。”安东尼－罗林听到这个数字，一颗悬起的心终于落了下去，自己手上一共有二十万，再加上这八万金币的话，应该足以吃下三瓶奥法药剂了。

"Thank you, President Gerian." When Anthony Rolin heard the figure, his suspended heart finally descended into place. He had a total of 200,000 on hand; adding in the 80,000 gold coins, it would be enough to acquire the three bottles of Arcane Magic Potion.
“败家子！”这种浪费行为落入安度因眼中，直将老法师气得跳脚大骂。
The action fell into the eyes of Andoine, who deemed it as a waste of power. He stomped his feet in anger and chided, "Wastrel!"
“贵倒是不贵……”林立点了点头，这价格确实不贵，精铁锻造的双手巨剑，若是放在镀金玫瑰里，至少会卖到两百金币以上，象这间店里的价格，已经算是很公道了。

"Reasonable indeed..." Lin Li nodded his head. For a two-handed giant sword made out of indurium, the price quoted was not high. At Gilded Rose, it would be priced at at least 200 gold coins. 100 gold coins was a rather fair price.
“费……费雷先生……”长腿美女声音哽咽，眼看已是泣不成声：“求求你救救我爸爸……”
"Mr... Mr Felic..." The long-legged beauty choked in between sobs. "Please help my father..."
“费雷……出事了。”
"Felic… Something has happened."
“费雷……费雷！”四周一片喧闹，凯文说话的时候，必须凑到林立耳边大吼才能听见：“再往前面挤挤！”
“Felic… Felic!” It was a ruckus all around. Kevin had to shout into Lin Li's ears for him to hear. "Squeeze to the front a little more!"
“费雷你来了。”这确实替两个法师解了围，见林立过来，葛瑞安也没空再继续训他们了：“来来来，我跟你谈点事情。”
"Felic, you've come." It had indeed helped the two mage out of their predicament. Gerian had no time to lecture them seeing that Lin Li had came. "Come, come, I have something to discuss with you."
“费雷你没事吧？”而就在这个时候，凯文也终于从围观人群中挤了进来，神色关切的询问着林立的伤势。
"Felic, are you alright?" Right then, Kevin finally squeezed in from the crowd and inquired on Lin Li's injury with concern.
“费雷先生……”
“Mr Felic…”
“费雷先生……我……”伊娜白皙的小手紧握，不断在心里为自己打气，可“我”了半天，最后说出的却是：“费雷先生再见……”
"Mr Felic... I..." Ina's small, fair hands were clenched, and she was cheering for herself mentally. But after a few stammers of "I", all she said at last was, "Goodbye, Mr Felic."
“费雷先生怎么一个人坐在这里，是不是在怪艾萨克招呼不周？”
"Mr Felic, why are you sitting here alone? Are you blaming Isaac for the poor reception?"
“费雷先生！”林立刚走到冒险者公会门外，却看见伊娜追了出来，长腿美女金发飞扬，一张俏脸却是涨得通红，神色间七分羞涩三分不舍：“费雷先生……”

"Mr Felic!" Lin Li had just stepped out of the Adventurers Guild when he saw Ina running after him. The long-legged beauty's blond hair flew in the air and her pretty face was flushed, her expression one of bashfulness with a hint of reluctance to say goodbye.
“费雷先生！”林立正张望着，却忽然听见一个熟悉的声音从身后传来。
"Mr Felic!" a familiar voice came from behind when Lin Li was still looking about.
“费雷先生，不用了……真的不用了，我这件皮甲还可以穿很久的……”一路上希恩死活不肯，结结巴巴的就要推辞，他从小家境就不好，早就养成了勤俭节约的好习惯，一件皮甲除非破得不成样子，否则根本就舍不得换，在这个憨厚青年的眼里，购置一件皮甲可是要花一大笔钱的。

"Mr Felic, it won't be necessary... really. My leather armor is very durable. I can still wear it for a long time..." along the way, Sheehan was stubbornly reluctant, stammering to decline. He had come from a humble background, which cultivated a good habit of diligence and frugality. This made him unwilling to change his leather armor unless it was completely worn out. To this good-natured young man, the purchase of a leather armor would cost a large sum of money.
“费雷先生，你是加洛斯城的人吗？”就好象现在这个问题，你说林立该怎么回答？
“Mr Felic, are you from Jarrosus City?” How should Lin Li answer this kind of question?
“费雷先生，我能问你一个问题吗？”正要埋头赶路，那位有着一头金色长发的美女，却从队伍最后赶了上来。
"Mr Felic, can I ask you a question?" Just as he was about to push on with the journey, the beauty with the long blond hair hurried up to him from behind.
“费雷先生，谢谢你，如果不是你的话，我真不知道该怎么办才好了。”伊娜目光中充满了感激：“你帮了我们这么多次，伊娜却没什么可以报答你的……”
"Mr Felic, thank you. If not for you, I wouldn't know what to do." Ina's eyes were filled with gratitude. "You've helped us so many times, but I have nothing to repay your kindness..."
“费雷法师是吗？”整封信看完，胖老头已经完全抽风了，望向林立的目光更是绿幽幽直勾勾的，让林立没来由的背心一阵发凉：“你的事情，安度因在信上都跟我说了，据他说，你好象还没进行过等级认证吧？”

"Mage Felic?" The old man was utterly out of breath after finishing the letter. His fixed gaze on Lin Li was a glimmering green, sending a chill down Lin Li's spine. "Andoine has told me all about you in his letter. According to him, you have not gone through a level certification?”
“费雷法师，我现在正式代表公会欢迎你的加入，从今天开始，你就是加洛斯魔法公会的一员了，有什么不明白的地方，你可以问问凯文这小子。”收起等级认证记录，葛瑞安带着一脸心满意足的笑容宣布。

"Mage Felic, on behalf of the guild, I officially welcome you as one of us. From now on, you are a member of the Jarrosus Guild of Magic. If there are things you don't understand, do ask Kevin," Gerian announced with a smile of satisfaction on his face as he gathered the level certification records.
“费雷魔法师……”艾萨克想为巴瑟罗尔求情，但一句话到了嘴边，却听见了林立低沉的咒语吟唱声。
"Mage Felic..." Isaac tried to mediate for Bathrilor, but when he was about to speak, he heard a low rumble of recitation from Lin Li.
“费雷魔法师，我这几天有个想法，您看能不能行得通。”随着谈话内容深入，老格林的语气，也从先前的探讨变成了请教。
"Mage Felic, I've a few ideas these few days. Do you think it will work?" As the conversation went on, Old Grimm's tone changed from one of discussion to one of asking for advice.
“费雷魔法师，谢谢您帮我教训儿子。”老梅林神色诚恳，向着林立微微弯腰行了一礼，但等他再抬起头来的时候，眼中已是带着一丝杀意：“但有些事情，还是应该交给我这个做父亲的，年轻人，厚道一点总是没错。”

"Mage Felic, thanks for disciplining my child on my behalf." Old Merlin looked sincere and bowed slightly to Lin Li. But when he looked up, his eyes divulged a hint of murderous intent. "But some things should be left to me, the father. Young man, it never hurts to be a little kinder."
“费雷魔法师，这是小女罗琳，她从小就很喜欢钻研医术，对药剂学也感兴趣，如果费雷魔法师以后有空的话，不妨指点指点她，也算是卖我这老家伙一个面子。”

"Mage Felic, this is my daughter, Rowling. She has been very fond of studying medicine since young and is also interested in potion making. If Mage Felic ever has the time, you might as well guide her along. Take it as giving me some face."
“费雷魔法师，这是真的吗？”霍伦神色之间，多了一丝严厉。
"Mage Felic, is this true?" Hoeren's expression was faintly stern.
“费雷！”凯文从背后追上，跟林立打了声招呼。
"Felic!" Kevin caught up from behind and greeted Lin Li.
“费雷！”这一次罗琳终于听清楚了，她怎么也没想到，刚才那个看起来很年轻的魔法师，竟然就是最近加洛斯传得沸沸扬扬的药剂师费雷！

"Felic!" This time, Rowling had finally heard it clearly. Never had she expected that the young-looking mage from just now was actually Felic, the pharmacist who had been the subject of heated discussions in Jarrosus recently!
“费雷！到处都找不到你，原来你躲到这里来了……”正寻思着要不要找个地方躲起来看好戏，却听见凯文的声音从大厅里传来。
"Felic! I can't find you anywhere, so that's where you're hiding..." Lin Li was contemplating whether to hide in a corner and watch the upcoming show when he heard Kevin's voice coming from the hall.
“费雷，你先在这里坐一下，我跟伊娜去交任务，很快就回来。”
"Felic, take a seat here first. Ina and I are going to turn in our quest, we'll be back soon."
“费雷，你可算是回来了……”凯文一边擦去额头上的冷汗，一边心有余悸的说道：“你要是再晚半个小时回来，葛瑞安叔叔非揍死我不可！”

"Felic, you're finally back..." Kevin wiped the cold sweat off his forehead as he continued with a lingering fear in his heart. "If you had come back half an hour later, Uncle Gerian would have beat me to death!"
“费雷，你抄完咒语了？”凯文进门时，正看见林立在收拾书本：“正好，葛瑞安会长让我跟你说一声，他在一楼大厅等你，让你抄完咒语之后就去找他，他好象有什么事情要跟你说。”

"Felic, are you done with copying the spells?" Kevin saw Lin Li packing up the books just as he entered. "Just right. President Gerian wanted to me tell you that he's waiting for you at the hall on the ground floor and would like you to go to him once you’re done with copying the spells. He looked like he had something to tell you."
“费雷，快看，有消息了！”
"Felic, look, there's news!"
“费雷，有空吗？”凯文笑着走过来，跟林立打了个招呼：“要是没什么事的话，能不能陪我去城里逛逛，我打算买点东西。”
“Felic, are you free?" Kevin advanced with a smile and greeted Lin Li. "If there's nothing to do, can you accompany me to town? I have some things to buy."
“费雷，有空吗？帮我看看这支法杖怎么样？”
“Felic, are you free? Help me take a look at this magic staff. What do you think?”
“费雷，这里就是加洛斯城了。”走在熙熙攘攘的街头，麦格雷尼热心的给林立介绍着这座繁华的城市：“前面不远的地方，就是冒险者公会，在没接到任务的时候，我一般都会待在这里，如果你有什么事需要帮忙的话，可以在旁边的翡翠酒馆找到我。”

"Felic, this is Jarrosus City." McGrenn was enthusiastically introducing the bustling city to Lin Li as they walked along the lively streets. "Not far ahead is the Adventurers Guild. I usually spend my time there when there are no quests. If you need any help, you can find me at the Emerald Tavern."
“赔了瓶奥法药剂。”葛瑞安一屁股坐在椅子上，脸上的表情分外肉疼：“妈的这个亏吃大了……”
"Lost a bottle of Arcane Magic Potion." Gerian plopped down on the chair with a resentful expression on his face. "Damn, this is such a big loss..."
“走了。”
"He left."
“走了？哎呀！”
"He left? Oh no!"
“走开！你这个怪物……给我走开呀！”哭喊声中，伊娜正拼命的挣扎着。
“Go away! You monster… stay away from me!” Ina was struggling desperately in between cries.
"Leave!"
“走，我带你出去买件新的。”内疚之下，林立也忘了自己还饿着肚子了，跟两个室友说了一声，就带着希恩出了魔法公会。
"I'll buy you a new one. Let's go," due to guilt, Lin Li also forgot about his food search. After informing the two roommates, he led Sheehan out of the Guild of Magic.
“赶快滚！”
"Scram immediately!"
“起码值十万金币呀……”
"It's worth at least 100,000 gold coins..."
“轰隆轰隆轰隆……”刹时间只听闷响之声不绝于耳，无数条火龙冲撞之下，炽热的火元素疯狂肆虐，整个大厅之中充满了灼热的气息，在巴瑟罗尔绝望的目光中，无数火龙一拥而上，瞬间用一片烈焰将他彻底吞没。

"Boom, boom, boom..." In an instant, only muffled explosions could be heard without end. Under the collisions of countless fire dragons, the blistering fire elements raged wildly and the whole hall was bathed in a scorching atmosphere. In Bathrilor's desperate eyes, numerous fire dragons swarmed up and swallowed him whole in a flash.
“轰隆！”双方又是一次惊天动地的碰撞，两股庞大魔力造成的余波辐射开来，将林立生生推得往后退了几步，一点点灼热的火星散落，在天空中划出道道华丽的轨迹。

Boom! Both sides had collided again. The aftershock brought on by the collision of two enormous lumps of mana radiated off, and pushed Lin Li a few steps back. Sparks of scorching meteors fell from the sky, leaving behind a glamorous trail.
“轰隆！”宴会大厅中，猛然传出一阵巨响。
"Boom!" An awful rumbling was heard in the banquet hall.
"Boom!"
“轰！”随着最后一段咒语落下，无数条火龙呼啸而过，比起巴瑟罗尔手上那枚红宝石戒指来，林立召唤出的火龙更多更强，就仿佛一片滔天烈焰燃起，眼看着就要将巴瑟罗尔彻底吞没。

"Boom!" Countless fire dragons roared past as the last spell fell. Compared to Bathrilor's ruby ring, the fire dragons summoned by Lin Li were greater in number and strength, like a torrential flame that was about to devour Bathrilor completely.
“还不是听了安度因那老东西教唆，想收刚才那个年轻魔法师当弟子，谁知道到了这里一看，人家那水平估计给我当老师都够了……”提起这件事，老格林胡子都气得翘起来了。

"Isn't it all because of Andoine, that old fellow's instigation. I was planning to take that young mage as my disciple. But who knew I'd arrive here to see that he was at the level high enough to be my teacher..." At the mention of this, Old Grimm's beard curled with anger.
“还不肯说？算了，你现在就算想说，老子也不想听了，反正等一会那小子的药剂配出来了，你肯定连几岁梦遗都会交代清楚。”

"Still won't talk? Forget it, even if you want to speak now, I won't want to listen to it. Anyway that kid would be concocting the potion in a moment. You'd even come clean about the age you had your first wet dreams."
“还好……暂时没发现什么不良影响。”
Jiang Yi let out a pent-up sigh. “Thankfully… well… at least for now, I haven’t discovered any negative impacts.”
“还愣着干什么？滚出去，别影响老夫炼丹……这江松看来是活腻了，上个茅房也上那么久？这回火竟还要老夫亲自动手……”

"What are you still standing here for? Get out! Don't disturb me from refining elixirs... This Jiang Song evidently wants to die—why is he taking so long in the toilet? I even have to temper the flames myself..."
“还愣着干什么？耽误了大少爷去武殿修炼，你这废物担待得起？”
"What are you still standing here for? You good-for-nothing, can you bear the responsibility of delaying Great Young Master's training at the martial arts hall?"
“还愣着干什么？还不抬着我和虎哥下山治疗，虎哥死了，我们都要死！哎哟，江逸，我要把你碎尸万段……”

"What are you waiting for? Hurry up and carry Brother Hu and I off the mountain for medical treatment! If Brother Hu dies, we would all have to die with him! Ouch... Jiang Yi, I am going to rip you to shreds..."
“还是不要这么麻烦了吧。”
"There’s no need to go through this much trouble."
“还是用江水诀疗伤吧！咦——”
“Might as well use the Jiang Water Art to heal up! Huh…?”
“还真有这么邪门的事情？难道是黑色元力的缘故？”
"Could such a bizarre thing really happen? Is it due to the black essence force?"
“还真藏着好东西？”林立不由愣了一下，能够散发出微弱魔法波动的，绝不会是一般的东西，就连老法师送给他的那根法杖，也够不上这样的资格。

"There really is good stuff hidden here?" Lin Li was stunned. Something that could give off a faint spell of magic was definitely something that was not ordinary. Even the staff that old mage had given him was not qualified enough for it.
“还真跟来了……”林立回头望了一眼，不由得乐了，杀人越货也不看看人来，你们最好跟得紧一些，等老子忙完手上的正事，少不了要换猎人号上来跟你们好好谈谈。

"They really came along..." Lin Li glanced back and couldn't help but feel excited. Playing bandits without looking into whom they'd be dealing with. They had better follow closely. Just wait till I settle the business on hand, I'll be putting on my hunter form for a good talk with them.
“还能怎么样……”葛瑞安翻了个白眼：“还不是阴影之巢那群小兔崽子找麻烦，非要跑到屠魔山谷来搞事。”
"What else can it be..." Gerian rolled his eyes. "It's all because of that rascal from the Shadow's Nest looking for trouble in the Demon Fall Valley of all places."
“这……好吧。”林立犹豫了一下，还是点头答应了下来。
"This... Alright." Lin Li paused for a while, but nodded in response.
“这……这不关你的事！”
"This... This is none of your business!"
“这……这些都是你的？”两人在那等了足有大半个小时，老家伙才从一堆魔晶中抬起头来，望向林立的目光，就好象是大灰狼见了小白兔一样。

"These... these are all yours?" The two guys had waited there for half an hour before the old man finally looked up from the pile of magical crystals.The way he looked at Lin Li was one of a big gray wolf looking at a small white bunny.
“这……这他妈究竟是什么情况？”其实早在刚才醒来的时候，林立就隐隐约约猜到了，自己身上恐怕发生了一些比较离奇的事情，但是他怎么也没想到，事情竟会离奇到这个地步。

What... What kind of damned situation is this? In fact, he had vaguely guessed that something bizarre must have happened to him when he had woken a while back. But he would never have guessed it was strange to this point.
“这……这就三万金币了？”林立目瞪口呆，这钱也来得太容易了。
"This... this... It's 30,000 gold coins just like that?" Lin Li was agape, the money had come too easily.
“这一位是公会的费雷魔法师。”
"This is Mage Felic from the guild."
“这不可能，这真的是清醒药剂？”老格林眼睛睁得很大，望向林立的目光已是充满了疑惑：“这在里面加了什么东西？”
"This is impossible. Is this really the Sobriety Potion?" Old Grimm's eyes were wide open and he looked at Lin Li with a face full of doubt. "What's added in it?"
“这东西怎么用？”林立神色间有些发蒙，他倒是知道水晶有记忆功能，通过魔法手段处理之后常常用于记录，比如魔法咒语，比如声音影像，但这么一张薄薄的水晶卡，他倒是一时有些弄不明白……

"How do I use this stuff?" Lin Li was a little perplexed. He knew that the crystal had a memory function and was often used for recording after being processed by magical means, such as magic spells and sound image. But he was puzzled by a thin crystal card like this...
“这两天我一直在想，我究竟还有什么可以教给你的，一直到今天早上，这个问题才不再继续困扰着我……因为我今天早上收到一封信，是一个老朋友发来的，他在信里告诉我，有一件很重要的事情需要我去处理。”

”For the past two day, I have been pondering what else I could teach you. It wasn’t until this morning that these questions could no longer trouble me… This morning, I received a letter from an old friend. In his letter, he stated that there is a very important thing that he requires my help in.”
“这两天，你除了要尽快把房产处理掉之外，最好能多去魔法公会转转，如果能问出这批奥法药剂的来历，那自然是再好不过，就算问不出，你也必须先跟魔法公会搞好关系，这一次，他们恐怕真是挖来了一个药剂大师，你去的时候，就把家族里那几条十四级咒语带去吧，葛瑞安应该能明白我的意思……”老梅林的声音听起来有些失落：“从今以后，魔法公会也不在是以前的魔法公会了……”

"These two days, other than disposing of the properties as soon as possible, it'll be better to hang around the Guild of Magic as well. It'll be good if you can get to know the origin of this batch of Arcane Magic Potion. Even if you can't, you'll first have to establish a good relationship with the Guild of Magic. This time, they had most likely gotten themselves a potion master. When you go, bring those few level-fourteen spells from the family with you. Gerian will likely understand my intentions..." Old Merlin sounded a little dejected. "From now on, the Guild of Magic is not the Guild of Magic of the past..."
“这个……”听到这话，灰袍法师似乎有种被人反咬一口的感觉，不过林立既然已经问到了，他也只能开口劝解：“刚才的事我都看到了，确实是巴瑟罗尔的错，不过谁让我倒霉，正好认识他爷爷，为了不让那老家伙说我见死不救，我刚才才不得不出手帮他一个小忙，再说你刚才也已经教训过他了，能不能给我一点面子，这件事就这么算了吧……”

"This..." The mage in gray robe felt that he seemed to be bitten in the face at these words. However, since Lin Li had already asked, he could only try to mediate. "I saw what happened just now, it was indeed Bathrilor's fault. But I'm unlucky to know his grandfather. In order not to let that old fellow blame me for not doing anything to save his grandson from ruin, I had to intervene just now to help him. Besides, you've already taught him a lesson. Can you give me some face and forget about this matter..."
“这个……原来您就是大名鼎鼎的格林－伯恩塞德魔法师！真是久仰久仰……”在老格林矜持的目光下，林立面露惊骇之色，一边拼命在脸上挤出惊喜交加的表情，一边却已悄悄的捅了捅身旁的凯文，以极隐蔽极隐蔽的声音悄悄问道：“格林－伯恩塞德到底是谁？”

"Uh... So you are the famous mage Grimm Burnside! I've heard so much about you..." Under Old Grimm's reticent gaze, Lin Li looked appalled. He tried hard to squeeze out a pleasantly surprised expression on his face while secretly nudging Kevin, and asked in a very quiet voice, "Who is Grimm Burnside?"
“这么严重？”老格林微微一惊，一点点就导致精神力混乱，那若是喝下一整瓶去，岂不是要让精神力直接崩溃？
"So serious?" Old Grimm was slightly startled. A little of it would cause mental confusion; then, if one were to drink the whole bottle, wouldn't it cause a complete mental breakdown?
“这么做对你可没什么好处！”葛瑞安语气虽然强硬，脸色却有些变了。
"It will not do you any good!" Though Gerian's tone was tough, his facial expression had changed.
“这么大一块，估计十万都不止吧……”
"Such a big piece, I reckon it's more than 100,000..."
“这么早？”昨天等了大半个晚上消息，今天林立一觉睡到中午都还没醒，给葛瑞安开门的时候，还带着一脸惺忪的睡意。
