"So early?" Lin Li had waited almost the whole night for news the day before and didn't wake up until noon today. He opened the door for Gerian with a sleepy face.
“这事……说起来可就话长了，来来来，找个安静的地方，我慢慢跟你说。”一说起这事，老家伙顿时兴奋起来，也不管旁边有人没人，直接拉了林立就走。

"This... If we talk now it'll take too long. Come, let's find a quiet place where I can slowly tell you what happened." The old man was instantly excited. He dragged Lin Li away, not caring if there were people around them.
“这事说来可就话长了，要不等改天有时间，我再慢慢跟你说？”林立倒是没撒谎，这事真要说起来，可就不是一时半刻能说清楚的，更何况……就算能说清楚，也要他敢说才行，穿越者是什么概念，完全来自另一个世界，几乎就等于异位面生物，比如深渊恶魔之流，这种事真要说了出去，估计林立立马就得被人抓起来烧死。

"It's a long story. How about I tell you slowly another day?" Lin Li was not lying-it would take a while to explain it clearly, let alone... Even if he could, he must muster enough courage to talk about time travelers. As someone totally from another world, his identity was almost equivalent to alien creatures, for example, abyss devils. If this was made known by others, Lin Li would probably be arrested and burned alive at once.
“这些你别管了，还有这些事别和外人说，你就等着过好日子吧。”
"Don't you worry about that! Additionally, don't tell anyone else about these things. Just wait for the good times to come."
“这些家伙，怎么这么有钱？”
"How come these fellows have so much money?"
“这人怎么走路一点声音都没有，难道是鬼上身？”林立这厮本来就不是个肯吃亏的性格，被那目光看得很不舒服，心里自然要骂上两句。

How does that man walk without a sound? Could he be possessed by a ghost? Lin Li's character was not that of one who was willing to lose out. He had been unsettled with the gaze and so naturally he had to curse in his heart.
“这人是个疯子。”葛瑞安摇了摇头，语气间带着几分挫败感：“马修斯虽然厉害，但至少还有弱点可抓，比如他儿子他弟弟，可萨鲁曼家这个疯子，我还真拿他没什么办法，除非有绝对的实力，可以在翻手之间将他杀死……可这疯子又偏偏很懂得隐忍，在没有绝对把握之前，他根本不会去挑衅无法战胜的敌人……”

"This guy is a lunatic." Gerian shook his head. here was a sense of frustration in his tone as he said, "Although Matthew is formidable, at least he has a weakness we can grasp, for example his brothers and his son. But this lunatic from the Sarumans, there's really nothing I can do with him. Unless you have an absolute power that can kill him with a flip of your hands... But this lunatic knows how to endure, and he will not provoke an invincible enemy unless he is absolutely confident."
“这什么情况……”
"What kind of situation is this..."
“这什么鸟毛理由，我不在就推迟？”
"What bird-crap reason is this? He delayed it because I wasn't here?"
“这件事……这件事我可以解释……”背地里干的事，被老梅林当场揭穿，克伦威尔神色间不由有些慌张。
"About this... I can explain..." What was done secretly was exposed on the spot by the Old Merlin, and Cromwell's expression was now a flustered one.
“这位小兄弟，帮个忙如何？”林立正躲在一边幸灾乐祸，却不防有人悄悄凑了过来。
"Little buddy, how about doing me a favor?" Lin Li was hiding at a side gloating at Kevin's misfortune when someone had leaned in on him unwittingly.
“这位我没资格认识的先生，你能不能简单一点告诉我，你到底想干什么……”林立问得很无力，他已经快被这家伙给搞疯了，自己从头到尾都不知道他是从哪里冒出来的，也不知道他到底想干些什么，甚至连他叫什么名字都不知道，结果却一直被他指责纠缠和冒犯了罗琳，林立完全搞不明白，就算自己纠缠冒犯罗琳，这又跟他有一毛钱关系吗？

"Mr I-am-not-qualified-to-know-who, can you tell me in simple terms what you want to do…?" Lin Li asked in a faint voice. He was about to be driven crazy by this fellow. He didn't even know where the fellow came from, or what he wanted to do, or even what his name was. However, he had been accused of pestering and offending Rowling. Lin Li couldn't understand at all; even if he did pester and offend Rowling, did it even have anything to do with him?
“这你都不知道？”翊凌雪白了江逸一眼，眉眼中不经意流露出来的妩媚，加上惹火的娇躯大汗淋漓衣袍贴肉，看得江逸浑身燥热不已。

"You don't know?" Yi Lingxue rolled her eyes at him, her features a picture of unconscious seduction and allure, and with her sensual body hugged tightly by sweat-dampened robes, made Jiang Yi feel hot and bothered.
“这倒是有点可能，阴影之巢这几年确实扩张得很凶猛，多半也能招揽到几个败类……”葛瑞安想了想，又摇头否定了这个猜测：“不过还是不对，那可是一百二十五枚巫师之眼，就算我自己出手，都不一定能同时破坏掉，如果阴影之巢真有这么厉害的人物，那还搞什么偷袭，直接上来把我灭掉不就完了？”

"That's possible. The Shadow's Nest has been expanding ferociously these few years, and could have recruited a few scums..." Gerian pondered, then shook his head and dismissed the speculation. "But it still isn't right. There were 125 Warlock's Eyes. Even I myself couldn't have possibly destroyed all of it at the same time. If the Shadow's Nest really has such a formidable character, why would they still do a sneak attack? They could just kill me directly.
“这元力丹药力也太弱了吧？咦……”江逸无语了，正准备把黑色元力撤回来的时候，却发现了一丝不对。

"The medicinal power of this essence force elixir can't be this weak, can it? Huh..."
Jiang Yi was rendered speechless, as he found something wrong with a strand of blank essence force right when he was prepared to withdraw it.
“这可不怨我，是他自己非要套交情的，既然他想套，我就给他这个机会，再说他这么热情,我要是不当他叔叔的话，说不定他会很失望……”

"You can't blame me. He was the one who wanted to pull strings. Since he wants it, then I'll give him the chance. Besides, he's so enthusiastic. If I don't become his uncle, he might be very disappointed..."
“这可不行！你好不容易来一趟魔法公会，我这个当叔叔的，怎么好意思让你空手回去。”听出对方并不打算竞争奥法药剂，葛瑞安高兴得心花怒放，只是脸上却是丝毫不露，死活要给城主大人点见面礼，倒真象是一位疼爱晚辈的叔叔。

"That won't do! It wasn't easy for you to come to the Guild of Magic. How can I, your uncle, let you return empty-handed?" Gerian was overjoyed hearing that he did not have the intention to compete for the Arcane Magic Potion, but he did not display it on his face. He wanted to give him a gift on their first meeting no matter what, and seemed just like an elder who doted on his juniors.
“这大概是我唯一不能做主的事了，我必须问过他之后才能做决定……”葛瑞安脸上的表情有些无奈，这件事他确实不能做主，如今的林立可以说是魔法公会最特殊的人，包括葛瑞安在内，没人能逼他做自己不想做的事，所有人都知道，没有了这个年轻的魔法师，也就没有了公会的未来。

"This is perhaps the only thing I can't decide, I'll have to ask him before I can make a decision..." Gerian's expression was helpless. Indeed, he couldn't call the shots in this matter. Lin Li could be said to be the most unique member in the Guild of Magic. No one could force him to do the things that he didn't want, including Gerian. Everyone knew that without this young mage, there would be no future for the guild.
“这家伙想干什么？”愿望术卷轴的威力实在太过恐怖，林立这才刚一拿出来，身后几名玩家就如临大敌的做好了戒备，毕竟这家伙看起来就不象正常人，手里又拿着愿望术卷轴这种变态东西，万一他一个想不开，许愿让系统主神来一场大屠杀什么的，自己站在这里岂不是自寻死路？

"What is he trying to do?" The power of the scroll of Wishes was almost terrifying. Lin Li had just taken the scroll out when the players behind him had finished all preparations for a formidable enemy. After all, this fellow did not seem normal from the start, and he was holding the scroll of Wishes, the freakiest gear of all. Should he take things too hard and ask the System Lord for a huge massacre, they'd be digging their own graves standing here.
“这小子……”安度因挠了挠头，他怎么也想不明白，一个人怎么可以妖孽成这样？一个精通锻造的魔法天才，这跟一头活着的恐龙有什么区别？更何况，安度因可清清楚楚的记得，这小子还拥有深不可测的药剂知识，老头实在无法理解，一个人怎么敢变态到这种程度？

"This boy..." Andoine scratched his head. He could not understand how one could be so demonic. What difference was there between a magic genius skilled in forging and a living dinosaur? Moreover, he had an immeasurable amount of pharmaceutical knowledge. It was impossible to comprehend how one could become such a freak!
“这小子居然还敢来魔法公会！”远远看见克伦威尔走进翡翠高塔，林立吓得是虎躯一震，这家伙前几天不是刚威胁过葛瑞安要如何如何么，怎么这才一转眼就跑魔法公会来了？现在的葛瑞安，可不是前两天那个葛瑞安了，老家伙自从掌握了奥法药剂之后，就跟老年那啥遇到了老军医似的，哪天要是不抖上几抖，那真是浑身上下都不自在。

This fellow actually dared to come to the Guild of Magic! Lin Li was unnerved watching Cromwell enter the Emerald Tower in a distance. Didn't he just threaten Gerian a few days ago about what to do? And the next minute, he came calling on the Guild of Magic, right? The Gerian today was not the Gerian of yesterday. Ever since he had got ahold of the Arcane Magic Potion, it was as if an old man had met an old army doctor. Without a few smokes of the cigarette everyday, he'd not be at ease.
“这就是我先前说的地方了，大家今晚可以放心休息，我在这里住过好几十次了，还从来没遇见过什么危险。”罗麦格雷尼练的燃起一团篝火，又吩咐身旁的长腿美女：“伊娜，这森林北边有一处水源，离这里大概两三百米左右，你拿水袋去装点水回来。”

“This is the place I mentioned earlier. Everyone can rest at ease for the night. I have stayed here for a dozen times, and not once have I encountered any danger." McGrenn skillfully lit up a bonfire and instructed the long-legged beauty beside him, "Ina, there is a water source in the north of the forest about two to three hundred meters away from here. Take the water bag and fetch some water back."
“这就是紫金？”
"This is purple gold?"
“这应该不太可能，除了药剂师公会之外，怎么可能还有人能配出奥法药剂来……”
"I don't think it's possible. Other than the Pharmacists Guild, who else is able to concoct the Arcane Magic Potion..."
“这怎么可能！你是不是看错了?”
"How is that possible! Did you see it correctly?"
“这才刚开始而已。”葛瑞安对他的大惊小怪很是有些不屑：“六大地下势力虽然经营着各种赚钱生意，但比起十一魔法家族千百年积累下来的财富，还差得太远，你好好看着吧，等他们出手的时候，才是真正的拍卖高潮！”

"This is just the beginning." Gerian was dismissive of his reaction. "Although the six underground forces are running various lucrative businesses, they are still far from boasting the wealth accumulated by the 11 magic families over the past thousand years. Look on carefully, when the time comes for them to show their hands, it will be the real highlight of the auction!"
“这才是我为什么不教你新法术的原因。”说到这里，安度因有些惭愧的笑了笑：“其实一开始我只是想做个交换，你在药剂学上指导我，而我在魔法上为你提供一些帮助，虽然这些帮助并不会太大，但让你在十年内达到魔导士境界应该是不成问题。”

"That is why I stopped teaching you new magic." At this point, Andoine laughed guiltily. "Actually, at the beginning, I just wanted to make an exchange. You’d guide me in pharmaceutics, and I’d help you in magic. Though it might not be much help, it shouldn't be a problem for you to reach the level of a Magic Shooter within ten years."
“这是……”葛瑞安先是微微一愣，但他很快就感觉到了一股魔力正在玻璃瓶中滚动，那种纯粹而又干净的感觉，一如老梅林手中的强能水晶。
"This is..." Gerian was slightly confounded, but very soon sensed a magical mana tumbling in the glass bottle. It was pure and clean, just like the Strong Energy Crystal in Old Merlin's hands.
“这是什么鬼功法？这是老天爷故意在玩我吗？”
"What kind of stupid cultivation technique is this? Are the heavens trying to mess with me?"
“这是你的水晶卡，一百二十四万金币全在这上面，你自己可千万收好了，别一不小心弄丢就麻烦大了。”葛瑞安丢过来一张晶莹剔透的水晶薄片，上面用星辰沙蚀刻出几个小小的字母，林立一看，原来是自己在安瑞尔世界的名字。

"This is your crystal card, that 1,240,000 is in it. You must keep it well. It'll be big trouble if you lose it." Gerian tossed him a translucent crystal chip with a few small letters etched on it with star sand. Lin Li took a look and realized it was the name he used in Anril.
“这是怎么回事？”
"What is going on here?"
“这是艾萨克城主办的宴会，我不想把事情闹大，但我奉劝你一句，最好还是立刻向罗琳小姐道歉！”
"This is Castellan Isaac's banquet, I don't want to blow things up. But I would advise you to apologize to Miss Rowling immediately!"
“这是葛瑞安叔叔的原话，至于究竟是什么原因，他没跟我说过，我也不敢去问……”
"That's what Uncle Gerian said. As for the reason, he did not tell me and I was too scared to ask..."
“这有什么区别？”葛瑞安笑得无比嚣张：“反正你现在也恢复魔力了，要是不服的话，你可以再跟我打过啊，看到底谁才是这加洛斯城最强的魔法师！”

"What's the difference?" Gerian laughter was unbelievably pompous. "You have restored your mana anyway. If you're indignant, you can still fight me and see who is the most powerful mage in Jarrosus City!"
“这有什么好奇怪的……”林立的笑容依旧恶劣，开了个头却不继续往下说，只是用手指了指自己被抓住的衣领。
"What's so strange about it..." Lin Li maintained his nasty smile and broke off mid-sentence. With his finger, he pointed at his collar where the old man was grabbing.
“这柳长老也真是的，我消耗了那么多元力，也不给我一两枚高级的灵神丹补充下元力……”
"Elder Liu can be so mean," he grumbled in a low voice. "I used up so much essence force, yet he refused to give me one or two high-grade Spirit Pills to supplement my essence force..."
“这样啊……”
"In that case..."
“这死猩猩，居然还知道打不过就投降？”林立看得是眼界大开，难怪安度因说，它们只是一群喜欢捣乱的小痞子，打得过就在人脸上画圈圈，打不过就趴地上求饶，这真是一头八级魔兽吗？

"This darned gorilla actually knows to surrender seeing that it can't win the fight?" It was an eye-opener for Lin Li. No wonder Andoine had said they were merely a bunch of troublemakers, drawing circles on faces if they won and begging for mercy on the floor if they lost. Was this really a level-eight magical beast?
“这江家少年力量竟比我还要大一些，不好公子危险了！”
"This youth of the Jiang Clan is even more powerful than me. This is bad, the Young Master is in danger!"
“这炼丹师好厉害！”
"This alchemist is so powerful!"
“这老头，还真是一点都没变……”林立有些无奈的笑了笑，从他手中接过了一只深红色的玻璃瓶子，然后又伸手打开瓶塞，凑到鼻间轻轻吸了口气……
"This old man, there's no change..." Lin Li couldn't help but smile. He took a deep red glass bottle, opened the bung, brought it to his nose and took a whiff.
“这老家伙……”林立嘟囔着抱怨了一句，心中却是微微有些感动，葛瑞安这老家伙倒是想得周到，生怕自己在突破的关键时刻受到打扰。
"This old fellow..." Lin Li grumbled but in his heart he was slightly touched. Gerian, that old fellow, was thoughtful, afraid that Lin Li'd be disturbed at the critical moment of his breakthrough.
“这速度……”
"This speed..."
“这黑色元力真是太难练了，两个时辰也才勉强提炼出六缕……”
"These black essence force strands are too difficult to extract. I barely obtained six wisps after four hours of extraction…"
“这黑色元力竟然如此神奇，还能让视力增强！”
"This black essence force is just miraculous; it can even enhance one's vision!"
“This… this…”
“这，这丹药……”
"This... this elixir..."
“迷幻步！”
"Psychedelic Steps!"
“退……别伤了虎哥！”
"Retreat... Don't you dare hurt Brother Hu!"
“退不退？”
"Retreat or not?"
"Retreat!"
"Retreat, fall back! We retreat!"
“道歉就不必了，反正我跟你也不算太熟，如果你只是想求个心安的话，就把道歉留给麦格雷尼先生吧，差点被你害死的人是他而不是我。”对差点害死麦格雷尼的红发美女，林立心头始终耿耿于怀，此时听见对方道歉，心头竟没来由的一阵烦躁，冷着脸放下手中酒杯：“要是没什么事的话，你能不能先离开一下？我这人不太习惯跟美女独处，怕万一忍不住又兽性大发，干出点什么事来就不好了……”

"There's no need for an apology, we don't know each other well anyway. If you're looking for peace of mind, save your apology for Mr McGrenn. The one who was nearly killed in your hands was him, not me." Lin Li always felt unsettled at the redheaded beauty who had nearly killed McGrenn. At her apology, he suddenly felt irritated for no reason, and put down his wine glass with a cold expression on his face. "If there's nothing else, can you please leave? I'm not used to being alone with a pretty girl lest I can't help my animal instincts from acting up and do something bad..."
“那……我就先替巴瑟罗尔那小子谢谢你了。”灰袍法师大概也没有想到，林立会答应得这么干脆，想想估计也是觉得有些对不起林立，于是又带着几分歉意保证：“不过你放心，今天这件事，我一定会让他家那个老家伙给你一个交代。”

"Then... I'll thank you on Bathrilor's behalf." The mage in gray robe probably did not expect Lin Li to agree so readily. He supposed it was unfair to Lin Li, so he gave his guarantee apologetically, "But you can rest assured. I will definitely make the old fellow from their family give you an explanation for what happened today."
“那……那你怎么会认识安度因大师？”马森还是不信，又带着几分狐疑的神色问道。
"Then... Then how did you know Master Andoine?" still skeptical, Marson questioned with confusion on his face.
“那么拍卖继续进行。”凯文手中的锤子又落到台上：“达芙妮女士出价二十万金币，还有没有比达芙妮女士出价更高的？”
"Then, let the auction continue." Kevin's gavel landed on the table again. "Madam Daphne had offered 200,000 gold coins. Anyone else with a higher bid than Madam Daphne?"
“那么，我想请葛瑞安会长鉴定一下，这样一套魔法师装备，大概能值多少金币。”
"Then, I would like President Gerian to evaluate how much this set of mage equipment is worth."
“那也得你有时间睡觉才行。”林立没心没肺的打击着凯文，还伸手指了指翡翠高塔外那熙熙攘攘的人群：“你看看，这么多人，等你一个个敷衍完他们，估计天都亮了。”

"Then you'd have to get the time to sleep." Lin Li dropped another blow on Kevin heartlessly. He stretched out his hand and pointed to the noisy crowd outside the Emerald Tower. "Look at the number of people. By the time you play them off it'll probably be morning."
“那今天晚上？”林立有些担心，这落日山脉危机四伏，随时可能遭遇凶猛的魔兽，特别是到了晚上，许多白天难得一见的魔兽，也会从自己的巢穴中走出，在丛林沟壑之间，捕杀那些熟睡的猎物。

“Then what about tonight?” Lin Li was somewhat worried. The Sunset Mountains were a dangerous place, and they could encounter ferocious magical beasts anytime, especially in the night when many magical beasts that were rarely seen in the day would leave their nests, lurking in between the ravines, waiting to pounce on the sleeping prey.
“那任务失败会不会有什么麻烦？”
"Then, do failed quests give you any trouble?"
“那你先去问问……”林立对这事真没什么兴趣，只是看葛瑞安这么热心，倒也不太好扫他的兴。
"Then you go and find out first..." Lin Li was really not interested in this deal. But Gerian was so enthusiastic it didn't seem nice to cast a damp over it.
“那你先忙，我找他去。”
"Go and do what you have to do, I'll go look for him."
“那你好好休息。”艾萨克犹豫了一下，又有些担心的请林立帮忙：“费雷魔法师，能不能麻烦你暂时看着一下小女？今天人来得太多，我实在脱不开身，罗琳这孩子从小身体就不怎么好，我怕她万一……”

"Then, take a good rest." Isaac hesitated for a moment, and then, still slightly worried, asked Lin Li for help. "Mage Felic, could you help keep an eye on my daughter for the time being? There are many guests today and I really can't excuse myself. Rowling has not been in good health since young, I'm afraid just in case..."
“那你跑来干什么？这里可是落日山脉，安瑞尔大陆北方最凶险的地方之一，就连我这老家伙都只敢在每年七月的时候来这里住几天，你这小子胆子倒是挺大，连这里是什么地方都不知道，就敢一个大摇大摆的闯进来！”

"Then what are you here for? This is the Sunset Mountains, one of the most dangerous places in the south of the Anril Continent. Even an old fellow like myself would only dare to come here for a few days’ stay every July. You little kid, you have guts, swaggering into the place without even knowing where this is!"
“那关我什么事？”
"What has it got to do with me?"
“那去一次好了，什么时候的宴会？”
"Then, let's go just this once. When is the banquet?”
“那地方……该不会有什么问题吧？”安度因试探着问了一句。
"That place... shouldn't have any problems, right?" Andoine probed a question.
“那多谢您了格林魔法师。”
"Then I'll thank you in advance, Mage Grimm."
“那天你刚跟凯文去办手续，克伦威尔的人就找上门来了，哼哼，这蠢货居然要求我把你踢出公会，真是瞎了他的狗眼！”

"That day, after you went with Kevin to process the documents, someone working under Cromwell had come calling. Hmph, this fool had put in a request for me to kick you out of the guild, he must be blind!
“那天的事情是我错了，我不该怀疑你对伊娜有什么企图，更不该在没有把握的情况下，阻止你为麦格雷尼先生治疗……”罗琳自小性格就如天鹅般骄傲，此时虽已认识到了自己的错误，但让她道起歉来，依旧是憋得一张俏脸通红，声音更是有如蚊呐。

"I was wrong the other day. I shouldn't have doubted your intentions towards Ina, and even more so I shouldn't have stopped you from treating Mr McGrenn when I wasn't even confident..." Rowling was as proud as a swan since a young age. Although she had recognized her mistake now, when it came to apologizing, her pretty face was still flushed and her voice quiet like a mosquito.
“那太好了。”林立点了点头，没再继续说什么。
“That would be great.” Lin Li nodded and said nothing more.
“那好，你去吧，安心在炼丹房做事，家族不会亏待你的，我会上报大总管的，给你的月例提高一倍。”
"Alright then, off you go. Work at the alchemy lab in peace. The family will not treat you unfairly either—I will report this to the chief supervisor and grant you a salary increase of one fold."
“那小子想找你谈笔生意，有没有兴趣？”
“That kid wants to discuss a business deal with you, are you interested?"
“那就照你的意思办……”听林立这么说，葛瑞安只是点了点头，并未去追问那条项链有什么出奇之处。
"We'll do as you wish..." Gerian only nodded after hearing what Lin Li said and did not ask what was so extraordinary about the necklace.
“那您今天来……”
"Then you've come today..."
“那您看看这个怎么样？”老板也不介意，又从武器架上拿下一根长枪：“同样是马拉顿锻造坊出产，跟法兰三大禁卫军之一，天空骑士团所用的武器出自同一个锻造师之手，不过价格有点贵，可能要收您五百个金币才行。”

"Then what do you think about this?" the owner did not mind at all and proceeded to withdraw a lance from the racks, "also crafted by Malaton Forging Workshop and was made in the hands of the same forger who produced weapons used by the Sky Knights, one of the Three Great Felan Lifeguards. But it's a bit pricey and will cost you 500 gold coins."
“那我什么时候可以进行等级认证？”林立回答得很干脆，因为他自己也很想知道，自己现在究竟是什么等级。
“Then, when can I get certified?" Lin Li reply was straightforward. Because he'd also like to know which level he was currently at.
“那我们赶紧过去，刚刚我离开的时候，好象已经有人往那边去了！”一听真有问题，安度因顿时眼前一亮，一时间催得比林立还急。

"Then let's hurry up and go there. Just when I was about to leave, it seemed like someone was already heading in that direction!" Once Andoine heard that there was a problem, his eyes lit up. Momentarily, he was even more desperate than Lin Li.
“那我就不耽误你办正事了，万一……”老格林稍稍犹豫了一下，又继续说道：“万一你有什么需要帮忙的地方，可以让人到城主府来找我，这几天我都会在这里，虽然这几年年纪大了，不象前几年那么中用，不过一般的小事，我应该还是能帮你办到的。”

"Then I shall not hold you up anymore. In case..." Old Grimm hesitated slightly, then continued, "In case there's anything you need help with, you can send someone to look for me at the Castellan Mansion. I will be here these few days. Although I'm getting on in years and am not as useful as compared to a few years ago, I should still be able to help you with trivial matters."
“那我怎么感觉，你好象很怕葛瑞安会长似的？”
"Then, why do I feel that you seem to be afraid of the President?"
“那我怎么看着，他们一个个都面黄饥瘦的，你平时虐待他们了？对了对了，屠魔山谷这名字，我怎么听着好象很熟悉似的？”
"Then why does it seem to me that all of them are emaciated and sallow, do you abuse them usually? Why do I feel like the name Demon Fall Valley sounds familiar?"
“那是因为条件有限，没人能教我而已……”
“That was due to limited conditions, because nobody could teach me…”
“那是当然！”葛瑞安一脸得色：“这可是城主大人自己说的，他老爸二十年前见过我一面，据说还指点过我，妈的二十年前那么多魔法师指点过我，我哪记得哪个是他老爸？”

"That's of course!" Gerian's face was boastful. "The Castellan had said it personally. His father saw me 20 years ago, and apparently he had instructed me. Damn it, so many mages had instructed me 20 years ago, how would I know which one was his father?"
“那现在呢？”
"What about now?"
“那真是太遗憾了……”伊瑟拉有些遗憾，不过很快又露出了笑容：“那麻烦您转告那位药剂师先生，我手上正好有一笔大生意，需要三瓶魔能药剂，如果他愿意帮忙的话，报酬绝对会让他满意，曼尼斯家族的珍藏，可以任由他挑选三件！”

"Then that's too bad..." Ysera was regretful, but quickly regained his smile. "Then, could I trouble you to tell the pharmacist that I happen to have a big deal on hand and am in need of three Magicka Potions? If he's willing to help, the reward will be absolutely satisfactory for him. He can choose any three items from the collection of the Mannes Family!"
“那真是太遗憾了……”克伦威尔表情沉痛：“那我能去看看他吗？正好早上出门的时候，父亲让我给他带了一点小礼物。”
"That's too bad..." Cromwell's expression was aggrieved. "Then, can I see him? My father had told me to bring him a small gift when I left home this morning."
“那真是太遗憾了。”城主大人表情沉痛，心里却是在暗爽，那老家伙不来，自己就不用尴尬的喊他葛瑞安叔叔了，从魔法公会回来之后，艾萨克都不知道后悔了多少次了，当初跟那老家伙说点什么不好，非要说父亲见过他一面，这简直就是自寻死路……

"Then that's too bad." The Castellan's expression was pained but in his heart he was secretly delighted. He would not have to address the old fellow awkwardly as Uncle Gerian now that he was not here. After returning from the Guild of Magic, Isaac had felt regretful countless times. He could have talked about any other things, but he had to mention that his father had met Gerian before. This was like digging his own grave...
“那让力量更加强大的目的又是什么？”
"Then, what is the purpose of making your powers stronger?"
“那还有个老二呢？”
"Then what about the second son?"
“那这一位是……”
"And this is..."
“邪门了，再看招……”
"This is so strange... Try to take this!"
“邪门了，这易公子难道深藏不露？”
"This is so strange, could it be that this Young Master is secretly concealing his great power?"
“采药？”
"Harvest herbs?"
“金发，长腿？”林立先是一愣，但很快又反应过来，这全加洛斯城，自己认识的漂亮女冒险者，大概也只有伊娜这么一个了。
"Blond hair, long legs?" Lin Li was surprised at first, but quickly recovered himself. The only beautiful female adventurer he knew in this Jarrosus City would probably be Ina.
“金牌陪练？”
"Gold token-grade sparring partner?"
“钻！钻过去！”
"Crawl! Crawl through it!"
“铸鼎境七重果然强大！”
"The seventh stage of Cast Tripod Realm is indeed formidable!"
“铸鼎境三重？这实力也如此傲气？”
"Only the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm? Yet she was so arrogant?"
“铸鼎境八重果然强大！凭借肉体的力量，速度就能达到铸鼎境三四重了吧？”

"The power of the eighth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm is indeed enormously great! If such a person were to relying on his or her bodily strength and abilities alone, surely that person's natural speed would reach a level on par with someone using their third or fourth stage power in the Cast Tripod Realm?"
“铸鼎境八重？还是姬家的小姐，掌管聚珍阁？如此绝色！难怪江恨水和这两人如苍蝇般粘着。”

"Eighth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm? And even the young mistress of the Jiang Clan, the one who is managing the Pearl Gathering Pavilion? Such remarkable beauty! No wonder Jiang Henshui and these two men were sticking to her like flies."
“锅里有窝头和肉粥，小奴去亲戚家了，明天回来，勿念！少爷加油！”字体很丑，歪歪斜斜的，江逸看后心头一酸。

There is wotou and meat porridge in the pot! Xiaonu has left for a relative’s house and will return tomorrow! Don’t worry about me! Do your best, Young Master!
Jiang Yi’s heart ached as he read Xiaonu’s ugly, spider-like handwriting.
“错觉，一定是错觉，这废物一定是在装腔作势。”
"Wrong perception! This must be a wrong perception... this good-for-nothing must definitely be faking it."
“闭嘴！你还嫌自己不够丢脸？”老梅林立从人群中走出，他身上穿着一件黑色的法师袍，右手紧紧握住一根青色法杖，强大的气息从他身上透出，连远在台阶之上的林立，也感觉到了一股无可抵抗的压力。

"Shut up! Don't you find yourself embarrassing enough?" Old Merlin emerged from the crowd. He wore a black mage robe, his right hand clutching a green staff. He exuded an aura so powerful that even on the step a distance away, Lin Li could sense an irresistible pressure.
“闭嘴！都好好坐着看你们的，谁也别出声，谁要是敢把老子卖了，等拍卖完有他好果子吃……”葛瑞安两眼一瞪，一群魔法师吓得全把嘴闭上了。

"Shut up! All of you sit properly and watch, no one should make a sound. If anyone dares to sell me out, I'll let him know what's to come after the auction..." Gerian's eyes were glaring and all the mages shut their mouths in fear.
“问题不大。”麦格雷尼神色笃定：“我知道一处很安全的地方，我们只要加快速度，应该可以在天黑之前赶到。”
"Not a big problem.” McGrenn looked calm. “I know of a safe place. We just need to speed up and we should be able to reach it before dark.”
“问题出在……我这黑色元力身上！哼哼，我回炉的时候不注入黑色元力，你一辈子都别想炼出地阶丹药！”

"The problem... lies in my black essence force! Hmph, if I don't inject some black essence force when I'm conducting the reheating process, you can forget about ever producing more earth-tier elixirs again for the rest of your life!"
“阴影之城想要屠魔山谷的控制权？可以！不过你们最好有流血的准备！”怒不可遏的吼声从楼上传来，林立抬头望去，正看见一个圆滚滚的灰色身影。
"Shadow City wants the control of Demon Fall Valley? Sure! But you'd better be prepared to bleed!" The furious roar came from upstairs. Lin Li saw a round gray figure just as he looked up.
“阴影之巢？”林立眉头一皱，低声向凯文问道：“这件事公会里还有谁知道？”
”Shadow's Nest?" Lin Li knitted his brows and asked Kevin in a low voice, "Who else in the guild knows about this?"
“陛下，我们还要不要杀进去……”
"Your Majesty, do we still attack?"
“除了巫师之眼外，还有件事也很不正常……这几年因为阴影之巢的关系，我在屠魔山谷可以说是下了大力气，除了一百二十五枚巫师之眼外，还另外布置了差不多二十处岗哨，可昨天晚上，这二十处岗哨就跟没有一样，阴影之巢的人一路潜行进来，我居然连一点消息都没收到……”

"Other than the Warlock's Eyes, there was something else that's abnormal too... These few years, because of the Shadow's Nest, I've spent a great deal of effort on the Demon Fall Valley. Apart from the 125 Warlock's Eyes, about 20 additional sentry posts were set up as well. But last night, these 20 sentry posts were as if nonexistent. The people of the Shadow's Nest had sneaked in all the way but I didn't even receive any news…”
“除呜呜呜呜，你还会不会点别的？”
"Do you not know something else other than sobbing?"
“随便你吧，白痴！”
"Up to you, stupid fool!"
“随时可以！”葛瑞安拉着林立就往楼上走，一张胖脸因为憋得太过辛苦，已经完全扭曲掉了，他现在真想抱着安度因亲上几口，这老家伙实在太可爱了，等他回来一定要好好谢谢他才行。

"Anytime!" Gerian pulled Lin Li up the stairs. His chubby face was completely distorted from trying so hard to hold back his emotions. He wanted to pull Andoine into his arms and give him a few pecks on his cheeks. The old chap had been too lovely, he had to thank him when he returned to Jarrosus City.
“难怪你一大早就赶回来了……”
"No wonder you rushed back early in the morning..."
“难怪有钱天资绝世的公子修炼速度如此之快，人比人气死人啊！”

"No wonder wealthy young masters with exceptional talent can cultivate essence force at such high speeds! I feel so jealous, yet constantly comparing myself to others like that will only make me even more angry!
“难道格林先生猜错了？”城主大人神色凝重，目光从大厅中众人脸上一一扫过，又压低声音向黑袍法师问道：“你说有没有可能，这个人其实不属于药剂师公会？”

"Could it be that Mr Grimm had guessed it wrong?" The castellan's face was serious; his eyes swept over all the faces in the hall. Once again he lowered his voice and asked the mage in black robe, "Do you think it's possible that this person does not belong to the Pharmacists Guild?"
“难道这黑色元力的能力，也随着境界提升再次增幅了？”
"Could it be that the powers of this black essence force would also follow my uplift in realm stages and once again increase further?
“需要帮忙吗？我们一家在加洛斯城住了几十年，帮忙找个人应该还是没什么问题的。”中年冒险者很热心的问道。
“Do you need any help? My family have been living in Jarrosus City for decades. It would not be a difficult task to help you find someone,” the middle-aged adventurer asked enthusiastically.
“霍伦导师，就是这小子打伤马迪亚斯的！”一看试炼导师脸色难看，两个善于见风使舵的家伙，顿时就猜到了一些什么，当下摇身一变，从昨天的点头哈腰，变成了现在的义愤填膺，要不是昨天亲眼目睹过他们的丑态，说不定林立还真会以为，这两个家伙真是讲义气，想为马迪亚斯出头。

"Teacher Hoeren, this is the one who injured Mathias!" The two fellows, who were adept at sailing with the wind, saw the smelting mentor's face turn dark and immediately guessed something. They abruptly changed at once, from the obsequiousness of yesterday to the righteous indignation now. If it were not for witnessing their buffoonery yesterday with his own eyes, Lin Li might even believe that these two were loyal to Mathias and were willing to stand up for him.
“霍伦，你过分了。”
"Hoeren, that's enough."
“霜结！”最后一句咒文被林立喝破，杖头上的水晶散发出耀眼的光亮，一股寒流以林立为中心辐射开来，在那一片巨网当中席卷而过。
“Frost!” The last of the spell was broken by Lin Li, and the crystal at the tip of the staff glowed brilliantly. A wave of cold current radiated from Lin Li and swept through the giant net.
“靠你妈的死猩猩……”林立躲在一棵树后，一边喘着粗气，一边拼命想着对策。
“F*ck you darned gorilla..." Lin Li hid behind a tree, panting heavily as he desperately tried to come up with a strategy.
“靠你妈老梅林！”一阵气急败坏的怒吼声从塔内传出，其中还带着葛安愤怒的质问：“你妈贵姓？你个老王八蛋是不是想把翡翠高塔给拆了？”

"Damn you Old Merlin!" An angry roar came out of the tower, accompanied by Gerian's furious interrogation. "What does you mother do? You son of a b*tch, are you trying to tear down the Emerald Tower?"
"F*ck!"
“靠！”林立差点没把舌头给咬断，一百万金币就买一根法杖？难怪能生出克伦威尔这种儿子来……
"F*ck!" Lin Li almost bit his tongue off. A million gold coins for a staff? No wonder he had a son like Cromwell...
“靠！”林立忽然觉得，这利维坦猩猩真是有些变态，身为一头魔兽，抓了人类不撕不咬，却偏偏用笔在人脸上画圈圈，这不是变态是什么？

“F*ck!” Lin Li suddenly got a sense of what a freak this Leviathan Gorilla was. As a magical beast, it had caught a human not to tear or chew her apart, but to draw circles on her face with a brush. How was that not a freak?
“靠！”林立怎么也没想到，这样一场经典而完美的对决，竟是以双方魔力耗尽而告终……
"Damn!" Lin Li had never imagined a classic and perfect battle like this would end up with both parties exhausting their mana.
“靠！”林立扔下一句粗话，再不顾不得去管这个软蛋，又是一记迅捷术补在自己身上，如风一般穿过了茂密的丛林。
“F*ck!" Lin Li dropped a swear and couldn't care less about the weakling anymore. He cast another Hastening Spell on himself and cut through the dense forest with the speed of wind.
“靠！他人呢？”林立一听这话就知道，老家伙没安好心，他还是想让自己干公会会长，不然干嘛死活要自己去参加城主府的宴会？

"Damn! Where's he?" Lin Li knew the old fellow was up to no good upon hearing what Kevin said. He was still thinking about making Lin Li the president of the guild; if not, why would he want him to attend the castellan's banquet?
“靠！你选别人行不行，我干点别的还将就，让我当会长？搞不好几年就把你的家底给败光了……”
"F*ck! Can you choose someone else? I can make do with something else, but the President? Maybe in a few years I'll lose all your money..."
“靠！长没长眼睛？这他妈可是正宗的荆棘兽毛皮，一百银币你还嫌贵？拿回去随便做件皮甲就够你穿一辈子的了，妈的这什么世道，一百银币买条命还不值得……”

"Come on! Are you blind? This is a damn authentic Thorned Beast fur and you find it expensive for a hundred silver coins? You can make a leather armor out of it and it'll last you forever! What goddamn world we are in, a hundred silver coins for a life and it's still not worth it..."
“领个屁丹药！”
"Retrieve elixirs my ass!"
“风月楼！”
"Fengyue Brothel!"
“飞少，退！”
"Young Master Fei, stand back!"
“马上回去！”林立拉开椅子，有些抱歉的跟老格林说了一声：“不好意思格林魔法师，公会里出了点事，我必须马上回去一趟，如果您改天有兴趣一起研究药剂，可以到魔法公会找我，相信如果葛瑞安会长知道您来了的话，一定会很高兴的。”

"Return immediately!" Lin Li pushed his chair aside and said to Old Grimm apologetically, "I'm sorry, Mage Grimm. Something has cropped up in the guild and I have to return immediately. If you're still interested in studying potions together, you can find me at the Guild of Magic. I believe President Gerian will be very happy if he knows you're coming."
“马勒戈壁，怎么弄？”
"Damn it! How on earth do I do this?"
“马森，你的意思是不是说……马迪亚斯先用奥术飞弹，打断了欧灵的右手，然后费雷才出手，用奥术飞弹打断了马迪亚斯的四肢？”
"Marson, do you mean... Mathias first used an arcane missile to break Orrin's right hand, before Felic used arcane missiles to break Mathias' arms and legs?"
“高等精灵文！”林立当时就吓了一跳，安度因那间小木屋里，藏了不少的魔法书，其中有一部分正是用高等精灵文书写，只是因为林立刚刚接触魔法，基础还打得不太牢靠，安度因从来不让他碰这些东西罢了。

"The High Elves Print!" Lin Li was taken aback. Andoine had hidden a significant number of spellbooks in that small log cabin of his. Some of were written in the High Elves print, but because Lin Li had just been exposed to magic and his foundation was not solid enough, Andoine had never allowed him to touch the stuff.
“高级丹药收的。”
"Ofcourse we accept them, so long as they are high-quality elixirs."
"Brilliant!"
“魔法公会的费雷先生……”
"Mr Felic from the Guild of Magic..."
“魔法师先生，您需要点什么吗？”
"What can I get you, Mr. Mage?"
“魔法师这个职业就是这样，需要大量的金钱支持，你以后会习惯的。”看林立脸上的表情，凯文大概也猜到了他在想些什么，一边叫来制服小妹结帐，一边低声向他解释着：“象这样一根法杖，在别的魔法商店至少要卖五百金币。”

"This is what being a mage is, a lot of money is needed. You'll get used to it in the future." Kevin had probably guessed what was on Lin Li's mind looking at his expression. He motioned for the uniformed lady to give him the bill as he explained in a low voice, "A staff like this would go for at least five hundred gold coins in other magic stores."
“魔法材料？一般来说，都是交给镀金玫瑰这样的魔法商店，委托他们代为处理，不过成交之后会扣除一部分的费用，如果不想付这笔费用的话，也可以去冒险者公会背后，那里有个黑市，小到各种草药，大到魔兽魔晶，都可以在那里进行交易。”

“Magic materials? Usually, they'll hand such things to magic stores like the Gilded Rose and entrust them with selling them, but part of the fee will be deducted after the transaction. You can also go behind the Adventurers Guild if you don't want to pay the fee. There's a black market there, you can trade small items like herbs for bigger items like magical crystals from magical beasts there."
“魔能药剂这东西，可没你想象中那么好配。”
"The Magicka Potion is not that easy to concoct as you think it may be."
“麦格雷尼先生没事了，你应该高兴才是，哭什么哭……”林立将烧杯放进口袋，又细心的提醒伊娜：“不过人虽然没事了，身体还会很虚弱，我估计可能还要修养好一段时间才能恢复，你最好多劝劝他，两三个月之内，就不要再去接什么任务了。”

"McGrenn is fine now, you should be happy. Why are you crying..." Lin Li kept the beaker into his pocket, then carefully reminded Ina, "Although he's fine now, his body will still be extremely weak. I reckon it might still take some time for him to recover. You had better persuade him not to take on any quests for the next two to three months."
“麻烦了……”
"This is going to be troublesome..."
“麻烦你了。”
"Sorry to trouble you."
“麻烦帮我把……”林立好不容易挤到索兰面前，正打算让这位美女管理员帮他取出邮寄物品。
"Could you please help..." Lin Li finally made his way to Suo Lan, and was about to ask the pretty administrator for help in getting his mail item.
“黑色元力怎么会颜色变浅？”
"Why did the colour of the black essence force become lighter?"
“黑色元力！”
"Black essence force!"
“黑色元力，一定又是黑色元力搞的鬼！”
"It’s the black essence force! It must be due to the black essence force!"
“黑色元力，一定是黑色元力！”
"Black essence force, it must be the black essence force!"
“黑色元力，出来！”
"Black essence force, I summon you!"
“黑色元力，就看你的了！”
"I'm counting on you, black essence force!"
“黑色元力，融合！”
"Black essence force, merge!"
“黑色元力？”
"Black essence force?"
“黑色？两枚？”
"Black? Two pills?"
“龙哥？”
"Brother Long?"
一万金币在很多人眼里，可能都算是一笔庞大的数目，但对林立来说，这只是一个开始。
10,000 gold coins might seem like an enormous amount in the eyes of others. But to Lin Li, it was just a beginning.
一万金币毕竟是个很大的数目，老头也不敢独自拿主意，只是跟两人说了一声之后，就匆匆忙忙的出了柜台，两人又在那等了很久之后，才看到老头一脸喜色的回来，这一次他没有半点犹豫，直接就把那数十枚魔晶给收了起来：“成交！”

10,000 gold coins was a huge amount after all, and the old man couldn't make the decision by himself. He hurried out from behind the counter after informing them. The two guys waited there for long before they saw the old man return with glee on his face. This time, there was no hesitation from him as he kept those dozens of magical crystals away. "Deal!"
一个“咱们魔法公会”让葛瑞安心情大爽，这说明林立已经渐渐将自己当成魔法公会的一员了，这才葛瑞安看来绝对是一个好现象，他相信只要自己再加把力气，肯定能把魔法公会会长的帽子戴在这小子头上。

A "our Guild of Magic" had lifted Gerian's mood tremendously. This meant that Lin Li was gradually seeing himself as a part of the Guild of Magic. This was definitely a good sign to Gerian. He believed that as long as he put in a little more effort, he'd be able to fit the Guild of Magic President's hat onto the fellow's head.
一个“请问”弄得林立心情大爽，就好象三伏天里一杯冷饮下肚，从头顶一直双到了脚下，这家伙很是在那摇头晃脑的陶醉了一会，才老气横秋的指点道：“看清楚了，象这样一条黑线从手臂一直往心脏延伸的，就叫做黄昏诅咒，不管多么强大的生物，一旦中了黄昏诅咒，就会难以避免的陷入沉睡当中，并在沉睡中日渐衰弱……直到死亡。”

Lin Li was highly satisfied with "may I ask". It was like having a cold drink in the dog days, the satisfaction going down from the top of his head to his feet. The fellow was dizzily immersed in it for a while before pointing out in a self-important way as if he was the senior. "Look carefully, a black line like this extending from the arm to the heart is called the Twilight Curse. No matter how powerful a creature is, once the Twilight Curse has fallen upon him, he will inevitably fall into a deep slumber and be gradually weakened in the slumber... until his death."
一个不到二十岁的药剂大师，葛瑞安光是想想就已经激动得浑身发抖，从此以后，药剂师公会算什么，老子再也不用为了几瓶破药水求上门去，更用不着跟那些眼睛望天的药剂师打交道，妈的一个个水平不高架子倒是挺大，老子现在有药剂大师了，还用得着再看你们脸色？

A Master of Potion under the age of twenty... Gerian was trembling with excitement at the thought of it. From now on, the Pharmacists Guild was nothing to him! He would not have to go begging on their doorstep for a few bottles of potions, and would not even have to make contact with those pharmacists who had their eyes on the ceiling! Hell, what big shoes they wore when they didn't even have large feet! He had a potion master here with him now, there was no need to face their terrible attitudes anymore!
一个多时辰后……
About two hours later…
一个希望将药剂大师带来的利益最大化，而另一个则希望尽可能的利用公会资源给自己办事，这两个贱人就没一个是好东西。
One wished to maximize the benefits of pharmacists, while the other wished to maximize the use of guild resources for his own work. Neither of the two jerks was good.
一个打二十个？
One person fighting twenty others?
一个能够随手拿出无数极品材料，敲敲铁锤摇摇药瓶就是上百万金币砸出去的人，又岂是他们能够招惹得起的？别的不说，随便拿个几十万金币出来，就够雇人把他们杀得删号了，杀人越货？自杀还差不多……

Someone who could produce numerous top-graders at hand and spend millions of gold coins by the knock of a hammer and a shake of the medicinal bottle was not someone they could afford to mess with. Other things aside, he could simply employ someone with a few thousand gold coins to wipe them off their accounts. Banditry? More like committing suicide.
一个身着朴素长袍，双手拄着一把华丽狭长的七彩神剑，很随意地坐在石梯上的老人。
Decked in a simple long robe, an old man wielded an opulent, narrow rainbow-colored longsword in his hands. He was seated casually on the stone steps.
一些家族子弟暗暗放松警戒大笑不停，在他们看来江逸这个废物怎么敢反抗，就算反抗他凭什么反抗？凭他铸鼎境一重的实力吗？对于江豹和江松被江逸伤了之事，众人原本就不相信，此刻更是彻底不信了。

Some of the familial descendants sliently let their guard down and started laughing uncontrollably. In their eyes, how could a useless good-for-nothing like Jiang Yi ever dare to resist; and, even if he chose to resist, on what basis could he rely on to fight back? Could he just rely on his power level alone, being only at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm? Regarding the events in which Jiang Bao and Jiang Song were injured by Jiang Yi - everyone had initially disbelieved the stories, and at the moment they were even more so in completely disbelief that such events even happened.
一些江家子弟被吓到了，对付江逸这样的小角色，还需要如此高级的武技？江如鹰这铸鼎境三重的武者全力一击，确定不会活活把江逸劈死？有两个胆子小的甚至把眼睛闭上了，避免看到血肉模糊内脏横飞的场面。

Some of the Jiang Clan descendants were shocked. Surely one did not need such high-grade martial arts skills to deal with a small character like Jiang Yi? Was Jiang Ruying certain that, being a martial artist with a power level at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm and applying all this power in a single attack, he would not simply chop and split Jiang Yi to death? Two of the descendants, both having very little courage, even closed their eyes, to avoid seeing the spectacle of bodily mutilation and bloody splatter being inflicted.
一代无敌天帝的传奇历史自此终结，新的轮回缓缓拉开了序幕……
The legend of a generation, the invincible Nine-Yang Celestial Thearch, had come to an end. The cycle of Samsara slowly pulled opened the curtains of a new beginning…
一众宾客可不管他吓没吓坏，好不容易有了跟魔法公会攀交情的机会，一个个只是拼命的往里挤，就只想跟葛瑞安的亲侄子多说上两句话。

The guests did not care whether he was frightened or not; they finally had a chance to befriend the Guild of Magic and were trying desperately to squeeze through the crowd just to have a word or two with Gerian's nephew.
一众宾客因为离得稍远，先前也没能听清凯文的介绍，此时虽发现艾萨克热情超乎寻常，却也没怎么往心里面去，只当是城主大人也跟自己一样，希望跟魔法公会攀上交情，这才对魔法公会派来的两个年轻魔法师异常看重。

The other guests were slightly further away and so they were unable to hear Kevin's introduction. Although they found Isaac to be overly enthusiastic, they did not take it to heart. They merely thought that the Castellan was like themselves, hoping to befriend the Guild of Magic, and hence had regarded the two young mages sent by the Guild of Magic as important.
一切都不同了！
the condition had changed completely!
一切都已经完了……
Everything was over...
一到树下才看见，伊娜正被绑在巨网当中，藤条缠了一层又一层，仿佛一只大粽子似的，而那利维坦猩猩，却不知从什么地方搞来一只画笔，此时正一边在伊娜脸上画着圈圈，一边发出“嘎嘎嘎嘎”的怪笑声。

As soon as they were under the tree, they saw Ina being tied up in the giant net. The rattan was entwined in several layers, like a Chinese rice dumpling. The Leviathan Gorilla, who had somehow gotten a paintbrush from somewhere, was drawing circles on Ina's face as it made weird gaggling sounds of laughter.
一名带着野猪面具的武者，立即起身朝练功房内走去，很快房门关闭，里面隐约响起打斗声，还有那少女的娇喝声。

A martial artist wearing a mask of a wild boar immediately stood up and walked towards that technique practicing room. It was not long before the doors to the room sealed shut. The sounds of combat and the teenage girl's delicate voice vaguely rang out from inside.
一听这低沉的声音，城主大人顿时心头一紧，先前那一记迅捷无比的风刃，外加两支霸道的冰锥，从头到尾没听他念过什么咒语，此时却忽然念起了咒语，那接下来他要放出的魔法岂不是……

The Castellan's heart tightened when he heard the rumble of recitation. He had not once heard Lin Li recite any spell when he had unleashed that awfully fast shot of wind blade and the two tyrannical icicles. At this point, he had suddenly recited a spell. Then, the spell that he was about to release, wasn't it...
一听这话，连凯文这么老实的人，都忍不住想骂人了，你妈个大西瓜，打人不打脸都不懂？

Upon hearing this, an honest person such as Kevin himself could hardly restrain from cursing. You son of a watermelon—one should avoid the face of the person he was beating up! Didn't he know about that?
一听那价格，小梅林只觉得头皮都在发炸，偏偏还不得不硬顶上去，出门之前马修斯就交代过，至少要弄到十瓶奥法药剂，如今手上那可怜巴巴的三瓶，连一半都还不到……

Little Merlin felt his scalp bursting at that price, but he had no choice except to shore up his offer. Before he left the house, Matthew had instructed him to at least get ten bottles of Arcane Magic Potion back. There was only a pitiful three bottles with him now, not even half of ten bottles...
一声“蠢货”叫得麦德林心里别提多憋屈了，在奥兰纳魔法公会里，可向来都只有他叫别人蠢货的时候，又何曾被别人这么叫过？但面对安度因，他却是半点也不敢辩驳，从天上降下来之后，还不得不赔着笑脸：“嘿嘿……谁让我运气好，成了你学生的试炼导师呢……”

The word "idiot" made Medellin extremely dejected. In the Alanna Guild of Magic, all along it was him who called other people idiots. Now, he was the one being called an idiot? But in the face of Andoine, he did not even dare to refute. When he descended from the sky, he even compensated with a smile: "Heh heh... Lady Luck is sure smiling on me, allowing me to be the trial teacher of your student..."
一开始他只是没时间去想这个问题，但在凯文的提醒之下，他很快就想起了自己在无尽世界中的经历，如果没有那近乎无限的金钱，自己根本就不可能拥有那么多极品材料，更不可能将所有生活技能练到顶级。

Initially, he did not have the time to think about it. But after a reminder from Kevin, he recalled his experiences in the Endless World. If he did not have that near-infinite amount of money, he wouldn't have possessed so many top-grade materials, much less trained all his life skills to the highest level.
一开始的时候，林立倒没怎么放在心上，毕竟草药采集是件很麻烦的事情，除了象他这种大师级草药知识的人物，一般人采集草药总是难免带起一些杂草，他这几天配奥法药剂的时候，不知道从中挑出了多少的杂草来。

In the beginning, Lin Li did not take it to heart. After all, gathering herbs was a troublesome task. Other than a herb master like him, an average person would inevitably pick up some weeds while gathering the herbs. Who knew how many weeds he'd picked out from the herbs while he was concocting the Arcane Magic Potion the past few days.
一开始的时候，红发美女心中还有些羞怒，觉得这年轻法师编些谎言来哄骗自己，这世界上根本就没有什么黄昏诅咒。
At the beginning, the redheaded beauty was slightly miffed, thinking that this young mage had made up some lies to deceive her and that there was no such thing as Twilight Curse in the world.
一念至此，江逸脸上露出一丝狠色，既然把对方打伤了，那么一不做二不休，他也就干脆光棍起来。
With that, a ruthless expression suffused Jiang Yi's face. Since he’d already thrashed Jiang Bao, he might as well stick it out to the end and act like a hoodlum.
一想到小奴，江逸脸上狰狞的表情终于平和下来，似乎身上也没那么痛了。日子虽然艰苦，但他一直没有放弃，一直觉得自己还有继续搏下去勇气的最重要原因，便是这个和他一道长大，情同兄妹，对他始终不离不弃，平日里各种鼓励打气的小侍女了。

When Xiaonu came into his mind, Jiang Yi’s ferocious glare finally lost its edge, and his body seemed to stop throbbing for a moment. The days might have passed painfully with much difficulty, but he never gave up completely.
He always felt that the greatest motivation for him—the reason why he could endure day after day of torment—was this little servant girl. Xiaonu had grown up with him, and they were as close as peas in a pod. Despite his situation, she had neither given up on him nor left him behind. Instead, she tried all methods to motivate and encourage him daily.
一方是加洛斯城首富，一方是加洛斯最强法师，在众人神色各异的表情中，两只手紧紧的握在了一起。

It was the richest man in Jarrosus City on one side, and the most powerful mage in Jarrosus City on the other. Before the faces that carried a variety of expressions, two hands were clasped tightly together.
一旁的凯文看得目瞪口呆，过了好一会才有些无奈的叹了口气，这少年法师跟葛瑞安叔叔的性格倒真是挺象，都是一样的睚眦必报下手狠辣，难怪葛瑞安叔叔这么看重他……

Kevin watched from the side, dumbfounded. After some time, he let out a sigh in resignation. This young mage's character was rather similar to Uncle Gerian's, both ruthless in their revenge. It was no wonder Uncle Gerian thought so highly of him...
一旦林立出了什么差错，或者葛瑞安无法拿出足以让人信服的理由，这些声音就会又一次从暗处冒出来，而且会比上一次更加响亮。
Once there was a slip from Lin Li, or if Gerian could not come up with a convincing reason, these voices would come out from the shadows again, louder than before.
一旦突破了十五级，达到了大魔导士境界，对整个魔法世界的理解，就完全进入了另一种层次，就算林立的精神力再强，魔力再怎么近乎无限，也无法跨越这种等级上的差距。

Once you had surpassed level-fifteen to reach the realm of an archmage, your understanding of the entire world of magic would completely be on another level. No matter how strong Lin Li's mental strength was, or how near-infinite his mana was, he could never overcome such disparity in level.
一时间两人都有了精神，葛瑞安也不睡觉了，一老一少就在卧室里密谋起抓内奸的事情来，两人这一商量，就一直商量到差不多傍晚的时候，等到葛瑞安都有些顶不住了，林立才帮他拉好毛毯，悄悄的从卧室里走出来。

In that instant, both of them were invigorated. Gerian did not sleep; the old and the young conspired in the room to catch the mole. The discussion between the two men lasted until the evening. When Gerian was unable to hold out, Lin Li helped him pull up the blanket and quietly walked out of the bedroom.
一时间克伦威尔只觉得脸上有些发烫，整个人就这么僵在那里，站也不是坐也不是，最后还是林立帮他解了危。
For a moment, Cromwell felt his face burn as he stood rooted to the ground. It felt wrong to stand or sit; finally, Lin Li came to his rescue.
一时间凯文的脸色变得异常难看，望向林立的目光中有些愤怒也有一些不屑：“费雷魔法师，您真让我失望……”
Kevin's face turned unusually surly as he looked at Lin Li with some rage and contempt in his eyes. "Mage Felic, you really disappoint me..."
一时间凯文真是满头的包，想要落荒而逃，却发现前后所有全是人，根本连一丝缝隙都没有，偏偏他还不敢乱动，生怕一动就碰到什么不该碰的东西，比如刚刚管他叫“凯文哥哥”的阿姨……

For a moment Kevin was swarmed. He wanted to flee, but realized he was surrounded by people front and back, without even the slightest gap. He did not dare to move as well for fear that he would touch something that he shouldn't, for example the aunty who had addressed him as "Brother Kevin"...
一时间大厅内静得惊人，除了众人急促的呼吸声外，只有林立轻微的脚步声从台阶上传来。
For a moment, the hall was alarmingly quiet. Except for the rapid sounds of breath, only Lin Li's light footsteps could be heard coming from the step.
一时间林立有些犹豫，老实说他不是很想看见这个叫罗琳的女人。
In that instant, Lin Li hesitated; to be honest, he wasn't keen on seeing this Rowling woman.
一时间红发美女心中百味杂陈，有些惊讶也有些钦佩，可再一看到林立脸上那小人得志的神态时，却又没来由的感觉一阵羞怒。

The redheaded beauty had a mix of emotions in her heart, somewhat surprised and somewhat filled with admiration. But when she saw how cocky Lin Li looked, she felt a sense of shame and anger once more.
一时间翡翠高塔内闹得不可开交，各种流言更是传得如火如荼，有猜测两人关系是否正常的，也有质疑葛瑞安处事是否公正的，甚至还有几个性格暴躁的，以退出公会威胁葛瑞安收回这个决定。

For a moment, Emerald Tower was in chaos and all kinds of rumors were in full swing. There were speculations about whether the relationship between them was normal or not, and questions about whether Gerian was being fair. There were even a few petulant ones who threatened to pull out from the guild if Gerian did not rescind his decision.
一时间这几个心思敏锐的人，都被自己的猜测给吓住了。
In that moment, those with keen minds were astounded by their own guess.
一枚人阶上品丹药十两银子，十枚就是一百两，也就是一两紫金。要是能在一个月内炼制出一百枚人阶上品丹药，他欠下风月楼的巨额债务不就可以轻松还上了吗？万一再炼制出一枚刚才这种地阶丹药，那说不定只要几枚就能变卖十两紫金了……

A Man-tier superior-grade elixir pill was worth ten taels of silver. Ten pills were worth a hundred taels—or one tael of purple gold. If he could produce a hundred Man-tier superior-grade elixirs within a month's time, wouldn't he be able to easily return the enormous debt to the people of Fengyue Brothel?
一枚水晶球放在大厅中央，而在水晶球的四周，又布下了两道魔纹。
A crystal ball was placed in the middle of the hall. Around the crystal ball lay two kinds of mageweath.
一根小小的点金棒，却几乎用遍了他掌握的所有专业。
Creating a small gold rod had utilized almost all the professions he acquired.
一次完全的魔力恢复，在关键时刻几乎就能改变一切。
A full restoration of the mana could change almost everything at the critical moment.
一次次挤出笑容示好，换来的是一双双冷眼。
Each time he was forced to show a friendly smile, all he received in exchange were several cold shoulders.
一步，两步，三步！
One step, two steps, three steps!
一波又一波的精神冲击之下，他已经到了崩溃的边缘。
After waves and waves of mental strike, he was on the brink of collapse.
一炷香之后，他来到了天羽城的城中心广场内，广场内人来人往，车水马龙很是热闹，江逸全身笼罩内黑袍内，引起了一些人注意，不过城内人多嘈杂，大家倒是没怎么在意。

After five minutes, he arrived in the City Plaza in the middle of Skyplume City. People came and went in and around the plaza, with much heavy traffic that made the square bustling with activity. With his entire body enveloped in pitch-black robes, Jiang Yi did attract the attention of some people; however, as the city was crowded and noisy, most people did not seem to take notice.
一炷香时间后，江逸抵达了丹药房，在门口他有些畏缩的朝内堂望去，想看看丹药房的长老在不在？这个负责给江家炼丹的外姓柳长老脾气可是异常古怪的。

After five minutes, Jiang Yi arrived at the Elixir Room. He flinched at the door, cowering as he looked into the room, wondering if the elder of the Elixir Room was there. This man in charge of producing elixirs for the Jiang Clan, Elder Liu, had a bizarre temperament.
一点点星辰沙，在烧杯中泛起湛蓝色的光晕，透过烧杯的折射，更是仿佛梦境般柔和，只是林立却不敢陶醉，星辰沙必须用紫水晶盛放，否则其中蕴涵的魔力将会很快消失，他也是被逼得没有办法，才暂时弄了个玻璃烧杯充数。

An azure blue halo appeared in the beaker with that little bit of star sand. Through the refraction of the beaker, it looked as gentle as if in a dream. But Lin Li did not dare to get immersed in it. The star sand had to be held in amethyst, otherwise the mana contained in it would disappear. He was forced, having no other way but to use a glass beaker for the time being.
一片耀眼的火光飞溅开来，无数星星点点的火花落在地毯上，在那厚厚的地毯上烧出一个个黑色的小点，两股魔力激起的气浪之下，四周的桌椅被掀得东倒西歪，十几张洁白的餐巾在水晶灯下飞舞，几名离得稍近一些的宾客，更是被气浪推得跌倒在地。

A blaze of fire spattered and countless sparks fell on the thick carpet, burning black dots on it. Under the blast of the two magic waves, the tables and chairs were thrown upside down and a dozen white napkins danced around under the crystal chandeliers. Several guests who were closer were pushed to the ground by the blast.
一番话听得林立心悦诚服：“您是一个人才……”
Lin Li felt a heartfelt admiration at his words. "You are a genius..."
一百五十四万金币被分成了两份，魔法公会拿了其中三十万，剩下的一百二十四万全归了林立，毕竟这一次拍卖，不管草药还是手工，都是林立一手包办，说到底魔法公会只是借了个地方出来，他拿大头自然是天经地义的事。

One million five hundred and forty thousand gold coins were divided into two shares. The Guild of Magic would take 300,000 and the remaining 1,240,000 would all go to Lin Li. After all, for this auction, the herbs and work were all done by Lin Li alone. The Guild of Magic had merely lent him the space, so it would be perfectly justified to give him the bigger portion of the pie.
一直以来他都在猜测，加洛斯魔法公会里，究竟谁才是那个神秘的药剂师。
All along he had been guessing, who exactly was that mysterious pharmacist in the Jarrosus Guild of Magic?
一直修炼到黄昏时分，江逸才停了下来，内视了一下丹田内的元力，他眼中都是火热。只是修炼了一下午，他积累的元力就可比以前的一个月，武殿内修炼速度的增幅，加上黑色元力丹药，还有他本身封印符文的破解，让他修炼速度呈火箭般快速增长。

Jiang Yi continued power cultivation until dawn, when he finally decided to stop. Using his inner vision to observe the essence force in his dantian, his eyes were filled with fiery passion. He had only done power cuultivation for an afternoon, yet the amount of essence force he had collated was equivalent to what he used to produce in an entire month. With the increase in the speed of his essence force cultivation in the Martial Arts Hall, plus the effects of the black essence force and the medical efficacy of the elixir, on top of the gradual removal of more runic patterns on the seal on his person, allowed his power cultivation speed to to become faster and fast longer, akin to a flying fire arrow.
一直到凯文宣布交易完成的时候，小梅林都还目瞪口呆的愣在那里，那种感觉实在是太复杂了，就好象两个大魔导士之间的战斗，一个眼看着已经魔力枯竭，在最后关头垂死挣扎似的放出一发冰锥，结果这一发冰锥，却生生把对手捅了个透心凉……

Until Kevin announced that it was a done deal, Little Merlin still stood there, dumbfounded. The feeling was too complicated; it was like a battle between two archmages: one saw that his mana was exhausted and struggled to unleash an icicle at the last moment, but as a result, the icicle had stabbed the opponent right in the heart...
一直到刚才那一刻，林立才忽然明白过来。
Until that moment, Lin Li suddenly understood.
一直到刚才，他终于看到了凯文。
Until a moment ago, when he finally saw Kevin.
一直到刚才，凯文终于亲口承认了。
Until just now, when Kevin finally admitted it personally.
一直到大概中午的时候，一众势力才忽然发现，自己根本就是虚惊一场。
Until around noon, all the forces suddenly realized that it was a false alarm.
一直到将花丛中的幽灵草采完，林立才勉强压抑住了心头的激动，这大概是他穿越之后，最值得高兴的一件事了，林立心里很清楚，一个全职业的大师意味着什么，这几乎就等于是一个无所不能的超人，有了这样的背景，他在这个陌生世界的未来，似乎也渐渐变得清晰起来。

It was not until the ghostskins had been gathered that Lin Li was able to suppress his excitement. This was probably the best thing that made him happy since he had time travelled. Lin Li knew very well what it meant to be a master of all professions. It was almost like being an omnipotent superman. With a background like that, his future in this unfamiliar world seemed to become clearer.
一直到现在安度因都还没弄清楚，这小子的精神力极限究竟在什么地方，他只知道平日里那种高强度的元素排列练习，如果换个魔法师来的话，恐怕用不了一个小时就会累得回房冥想，可林立就是没事，这小子的精神力就好象是永远也用不完似的，进行多长时间的练习，完全看他心情如何，安度因只听他叫过烦，却从来没听他叫过累……

It was still unclear to Andoine where the limit of the kid's mental strength was. All he knew was, if another mage were to practice the highly intensed elemental sequencing daily, it would probably take him less than an hour to tire out and return to his room to meditate. But Lin Li was perfectly fine. The kid's mental strength seemed to be endless. To go through how many hours of practicing all depended on his mood. Andoine had only ever heard him protest in annoyance, but never did he protest out of exhaustion.
一直到第二天破晓时分，江逸才停止了修炼！
It was only until the break of dawn the next day that Jiang Yi stopped his cultivating practice!
一直到第四天早上，他才从房间里走出来。
It was not until the fourth morning that he came out of the room.
一直到这个时候，林立才忽然明白，在落日山脉上的时候，安度因为什么会说，再没什么能教给自己的了，有些东西，确实没法用语言描述，明白就是明白，不明白怎么说都不会明白，当魔法实力达到某种程度之后，语言就仿佛变得苍白无力，再多的说教，都不如真正的打一架来得实在。

It was only then that Lin Li suddenly understood why Andoine had said he had nothing more to teach him back in the Sunset Mountains. Some things just couldn't be described in words. If you understand, you'll understand, and if you don't, you'll still not understand no matter how much was said. When the magic power reached a certain level, language seemed to become pale and powerless, and no amount of preaching would be as real as fighting one another.
一直到这个时候，林立才有机会看清，这个从身后袭击自己的怪物，究竟长得什么样子。
It was only then did Lin Li have the chance to see the appearance of the monster who had attacked him from behind.
一直到这个时候，林立才突然记起，那天在黑山镇的时候，希恩就说过他没有其他皮甲，自己当时似乎还说过，等到了奥兰纳之后，一定帮他买件新的，结果这两天试炼任务安排得太紧，又被麦德林那老家伙抓去打铁，一来二去之间，居然就把这件事给忘了……

Only until then did Lin Li suddenly remember that at Black Hill Town, Sheehan had already mentioned that he had no other leather armors. Lin Li could also vaguely recall to have promised to buy Sheehan a new one once they reached Alanna. However, in the end, he was too caught up with the trial tasks these few days and was then ordered to forge metals for Medellin. Gradually, he had actually forgotten about it...
一直到这个时候，麦德林才渐渐明白，落魄了数十年的加洛斯魔法公会，这一次究竟培养出了一个什么样的家伙……
It was at this moment when Medellin slowly understood that the Jarrosus Guild of Magic, which had been low-lying for decades, had actually nurtured such a talent...
一直到那几瓶迅捷药水完工，老法师才仿佛是忽然回过神来。
The old mage only returned back to his normal state when the few bottles of Hastening Potions were completed.
一直到那天在伊娜家中，一场可笑的误会之后，却发现被自己误会的人，居然是自己一直想寻找的药剂师，当时罗琳心里真是又羞愧又悔恨，羞愧的是自己险些害了最好朋友的父亲，悔恨的却是与一位药剂师失之交臂，有好几次她都想亲自去魔法公会道歉，却又被心中的那一丝矜持所阻。

Until that day at Ina's place—after the ridiculous misunderstanding, she realized that the person she had misunderstood was actually the pharmacist she had been looking for all along. At that moment, Rowling had been utterly ashamed and regretful. She had been ashamed for she had almost killed her best friend's father, and regretful for she had let slip a pharmacist. Many times she had wanted to visit the Guild of Magic to apologize in person, but was held back by the hint of reserve in her heart.
一直到长谈之后的第七天，始终完整的倔老头才又把林立叫到了木屋外。
It was not until the seventh day after the long talk that the stubborn old man, who was still in one piece, called Lin Li out of the log cabin.
一直到鲁本－萨鲁曼转身离去，小梅林也没意识到有什么不对。
Little Merlin did not realize what was wrong as Reuben Saruman turned around to leave.
一直走到今天早上，林立终于听见了一些声音。
It continued until this morning, when Lin Li finally heard some voices.
一看之下，江逸傻眼了，小树林一个满脸横肉的胖少年缓缓走出，满脸都是凶光和戏谑之色，不是江如虎是谁？而他身后却不断冒出人头，密密麻麻的，最少有二十人！

After one look, Jiang Yi was completely dumbstruck. A fierece-looking plump youth slowly walked out of the small forest, his face giving off an expression of feorcity, animosity and a desire to ridicule - who else could it be but Jiang Ruhu? On top of that, an endless number of heads appeared behind his back. This densely packed group had at least twenty people!
一看林立疑惑的目光，葛瑞安就知道自己说了句废话，不由郁闷的拍了自己一巴掌，暗骂一声真是笨蛋，这小子才接触魔法两三个月，一直跟着安度因学习，又哪知道什么等级认证？

Gerian knew he had said something nonsensical upon seeing Lin Li's confused eyes. He had slapped himself out of dismay and cursed himself silently. What a fool I am! This kid had just been exposed to magic three months ago and had been learning from Andoine, how would he know of any level certification?
一群魔法师已经开始窃窃私语了。
A group of mages were whispering among themselves.
一群魔法师真想扑上去把他给掐死，当着葛瑞安的面你还敢起这种心思，你这跟把手伸进会长大人口袋拿钱有什么区别？还到时候大家轮着用……葛瑞安不找人轮你大米就算你运气了……

The group of mages had really wanted to jump on him and strangle him to death. You actually dared to come up with such a thought in front of Gerian, how was it different from putting your hand into the President's pocket and taking money from it? Moreover, you had even mentioned everyone taking turns to use it... You'd be lucky if Gerian didn't find someone to tread you over...
一老一少正在那窃窃私语，大厅里却又完成了一宗买卖。
As the old and the young were whispering away, another deal was completed in the hall.
一股庞大无比的魔力，猛然之间释放出来。
A large wave of incomparable energy was suddenly released.
一股无可抵抗的气息从老梅林身上散发出来，比起先前与林立对峙时，这股气息更加狂暴更加强大。
A compelling aura was felt from Old Merlin. It was different from the confrontation with Lin Li earlier on, this time the aura was even more violent and powerful.
一股纯正的魔法气息正从水晶上缓缓透出，气息中完全没有一丝杂质，纯粹而又干净，温和而又柔软，就如同乡间的小河潺潺流淌，无声无息的滋润着大地。

A pure magical aura was emitted from the crystal. There were no traces of impurity in the aura at all. It was authentic and clean, gentle and soft, like a flowing river from the countryside, moistening the earth without a sound.
一行四人只用了半天时间，就穿过了那片茂密的森林。
It only took half a day for the party of four to walk through the dense forest.
一行四人各怀心事，就这么一路往加洛斯城方向走去。
The party of four set off in the direction of Jarrosus City, each carrying their own secrets.
一记迟缓术之后，紧接着就是光亮术。
After unleashing the Delaying Spell, he quickly recited the Illuminating Spell.
一记霜结术之后，又是一记风刃。
After the Frost Spell, he cast another Wind Blade Spell.
一记风刃之后，林立仍不罢休，又是两手各凝出一根冰锥，众人只听“嗖嗖”两声轻响，两根又细有长的冰锥已是呼啸而出。
Lin Li was unwilling to stop after that shot of wind blade. An icicle was formed on each of his hands; the crowd heard a swish and two long, thin icicles tore through the air.
一身白衣胜雪，面容如刀削，脊背如剑，嘴角含着淡淡笑意，风度翩翩，这是一个能让所有花痴少女尖叫的美少年！

One was dressed in a shirt whiter than snow. His face was sharp like a knife, his back straight like a sword, and the corners of his mouth shaped in a faint smile. This was a youthful man so handsome that he would make any girl scream!
一连几天将自己关在房间里，满脑子都是葛瑞安与老梅林的战斗。
He had locked himself in his room for several days, his mind full of the battle between Gerian and Old Merlin.
一连十几发风刃术射上去，那一片巨网竟生生被林立割出一个缺口。
After a dozen shots of wind blades, Lin Li had managed to carve a hole in the giant net.
一道充满怨毒的声音将江逸的思绪拉了回来，他目光一扫看到江豹一边痛嚎，一边恶狠狠的盯着他，那肥嘟嘟的胖脸一片狰狞之色，清晰地写着仇恨二字。
An enraged roar pulled Jiang Yi back from his thoughts. He looked at Jiang Bao and saw him howling in agony; his eyes met with Jiang Bao’s dark, furious gaze.
一道冰冷的声音惊醒了众人，江逸的身子如利箭般从地上射去，直冲江如虎而来。
A cold voice roused the group of people from their shock, as Jiang Yi's figure shot up from the ground like a sharp arrow and rushed straight for Jiang Ruhu.
一道冷哼声响起，两名护卫倒飞出去，反而把路让开了，那名铸鼎境三重的武者化作一道残影冲了进来，抬手对着江逸的胸口就是一掌！
The two guards who were sent flying out opened up a path for the third-stage guard to dash in. He raised his palm and aimed at Jiang Yi's chest!
一道如炸雷般的声音响起，十多人鱼贯而入，一名穿着黑色锦袍中年人虎目森森率先走了进来，身上狂暴的气势瞬间笼罩了整个演武殿，他目光如电一眼锁定江逸，爆喝一声双手元力环绕，很明显……江逸再不停手他就要出手了。

An exploding voice resonated as a dozen individuals penetrated into the Martial Arts Demonstration Hall. A black robed middle-aged man walked in with severe eyes. His violent and imposing aura shrouded the entire Martial Arts Demonstration Hall. His sights locked on Jiang Yi like lightning, the sound of essence force circulating could be heard from his hands. It was obvious... if Jiang Yi didn't stop, he would have made his move.
一道惨绝伦寰叫声响起，江豹在地上不断的翻滚起来，他刚才击出的右手以一种奇怪的形状软绵绵的耷拉着，好像……被他的左手那一格挡，给反推得手肘脱臼了？

An extremely tragic scream pierced the air as Jiang Bao rolled around the ground in severe agony. The right hand he had used to attack was pushed away by a mysterious force. He had used his left hand to block the attack that came after, but the sheer force dislocated his elbow.
一道惨绝伦寰的尖叫声很快响起，马飞全身都颤抖起来，不是因为小腹传来的剧痛，而是因为惊恐，这江家杂碎竟敢废了他，竟真的废了他？

A harrowing scream soon spilled out. Ma Fei's body shook all over, not because of the agonizing pain coming from his stomach, but because of the panic and fear that filled him: the Jiang Clan rascal dared render him useless... he actually, really did it?
一道沉声的声音响起，却不是江豹击中了江逸，而是江豹那矮壮的身躯竟如破麻袋般倒飞了出去四五丈，这才重重砸落在地上。

A loud, low sound rang through the air. It was not that Jiang Bao successfully hit Jiang Yi, however, but Jiang Bao’s stocky body flying a full fifty feet, like a broken cloth bag. After landing, he crashed heavily onto the ground.
一道清脆的骨头碎裂声响起，他融合了黑色元力力量增大两三倍，只比这铸鼎境护卫弱上一份，这全力一记实实在在的手刀，劈裂对方的腕骨也是正常之事。

A crisp sound of bones breaking rang out. The combined black essence force increased Jiang Yi's strength by two to three times, such that he was weaker by this Cast Tripod Realm guard by just a bit. It was thus a normal phenomenon that this knife hand strike, in which he literally applied all his power to, was able to split open his opponent's wrist bone.
一道焦急的呼声，让修炼中的江逸惊醒过来，他举目一望，发现四周一片漆黑天已经完全黑了。他拍了一下脑袋，暗暗责怪自己一心修炼竟然忘记时间了，连忙把炼丹房大门一关，朝声音的源头快步走去。

An anxious cry roused Jiang Yi from his refining practice. He lifted his head and looked around, quickly realizing the sky around him was already completely dark. He slapped himself in the head, silently blaming himself for being focused entirely on refining and ending up actually forgetting the time. He hurriedly closed the main doors of the alchemy lab, before walking speedily in the direction of the cry.
一道破坏气氛的冷哼声响起，接着一个让江逸很不爽的声音传来：“江逸，你算什么东西？大少爷的名字也是你能叫的？遇到大少爷你不行礼就罢了，还敢直呼其名？你有这个资格吗？废物！”

A cold snort rang through, breaking the atmosphere. This was followed by a voice that left Jiang Yi disgruntled.
"Jiang Yi, who do you think you are? You think you can say Great Young Master's name? Nevermind that you don't bow to greet Great Young Master, you dare to call him by his name directly? Do you have that privilege? Useless idiot!"
一道褐色的身影从偏厅内爆射而出，身上暴戾的气息压得江逸透不过气来，柳长老一双鼓起牛眼内都是怒意，狠狠瞪了江逸一眼，单手一抓把丹炉的丹盖揭开，立即查探起来。

A brown-colored figure explosively shot out from within the side room, the violent air surrounding that figure bearing down on Jiang Yi so much that he could not breathe. Elder Liu's large, bull-like eyes were filled with rage as he stared viciously at Jiang Yi. With one hand, he grabbed the cauldron lid and lifted it up, revealing the contents of the cauldron. He immediately started investigating the dregs.
一道道人影横飞出来，全躺在地上“哎哟”叫个不停，眼中却都是惊愕，他们自然不是全受了重伤，而是佯装受伤不敢继续上了。他们很多人根本没看清楚江逸的招式，就被击飞出去，还敢冲上去只有自找苦吃。

One by one, bodies were thrashed all over and they were all constantly crying "Ouch!", but their eyes were actually filled with fear instead. Not because they were injured but because they were acting injured so they wouldn't need to attack anymore. Majority of them couldn't even discern the technique used by Jiang Yi and got blown away by him. To carry on rushing him would be to seek trouble for themselves.
一道道清脆的声音响起，江逸的右腿如毒蛇附骨般不断抽打在江松的小腿上。江松哪料到江逸反应的这么快？还没等醒悟过来，小腿已经被抽打了三腿了，一阵剧烈的痛苦传来，他暗道不妙连忙抽回右腿，准备暂时先退后避其锋芒再反扑。

Crisp sounds rang out one after another, as Jiang Yi's right leg continuously whipped Jiang Song's lower leg like a poisonous snake. How could Jiang Song know that Jiang Yi would respond so quickly? Before he realized, his lower leg had already been hit three times, releasing a burst of severe pain. Sensing something was wrong, he hastily moved his right leg back, ready to temporarily retreat and evade attacks first before counter-attacking.
一道重重的冷哼声响起，此刻本弯下腰的江逸似乎早就料到了般，猛然抬起了头，一直藏在衣袖中的拳头上蓝色元力流转，傲然不惧的对着江如鹰破空而来的那条重腿砸去。

A deep and cold snort rang out. Jiang Yi, who at the moment had his waist bent downwards, suddenly raised up his head, as though he had already anticipated the incoming attack. The fists he had hidden within his long robe sleeves had been circulating blue essence force. He proudly and without fear smashed his fists onto Jiang Ruying's incoming heavy leg.
一道长笑声打破了四周原本无比诡异的气氛，在其中一条虚空裂缝消失之前，一名全身笼罩在黑红长袍内的老者从中缓缓走出。这老者面色苍白，没有一丝血色，同时还褶满了皱纹。他的两条长眉垂落到耳际，一双阴鸷的眸子内呈现出一种最深最彻底的红。

Shrill laughter pierced through the abnormally strange ambiance, and out of the closing cracks emerged an elder, shrouded in blackish-red robes. His face was pale white without a tinge of blood and covered in wrinkles. His long brows drooped down to his ears, and his eerily piercing eyes glowed a deep cherry red.
一道骨头断裂的声音响起，江逸这一腿全力劈下，没有半点留情面，轻松把铸鼎境二重的江松双手劈断，还重重的把他砸飞出去。

The snapping sound of the bone could be heard. Under the full force of Jiang Yi's kick, he left no mercy and easily broke both the arms of Jiang Song who was second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. At the same time, Jiang Song got blasted off by the heavy forces from Jiang Yi.
七岁开始修炼江水决，他修炼到十五岁才铸鼎境一重，此刻只是花费了不到十天就突破到铸鼎境二重，尽管有丹药的辅助，但也足够让江逸激动不已了。最重要的是，他的封印能不断破解，修炼速度能不断增加，这让他看到了希望，有希望的人生才能让人充满斗志。

He had started practising the Jiang Water Art technique at age seven, and it was only when he was fifteen that he managed to cultivate his power up to the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Even though this was achieved with the help of elixir pills, it was good enough to leave Jiang Yi feeling endlessly excited. Most important of all was that his seal could be continously broken and his power cultivation speed could be continously increased - this allowed him to see a ray of hope, a hope that allowed one to be filled with fighting spirit and the will to endure.
三个半时辰之后，天还没亮，江逸却停止了修炼。他睁开眼睛时，眸子都是不解和郁闷。因为——这黑色元力在修炼出十缕之后，无论他怎么运转无名决，丹田内竟不再产生黑色元力……

Six hours later, while the sky was still dark, Jiang Yi stopped the extraction process. He opened his eyes, revealing a look of non-comprehension and melancholy. Because... after extracting ten strands of this black essence force, no matter how much he circulated the nameless cultivation technique, his dantian no longer produced any more black essence force...
三人一怔讪讪的退了回来，他们中实力最强的就是刘管事，他都不是江逸的对手他们追去也没用，一群人立即手忙脚乱的把马飞抬进了房间止血疗伤。

The three men was startled slightly and retreated in embarrassment. Out of all of them, Housekeeper Liu was the strongest. If he was no match against Jiang Yi, it was pointless for anyone else to give chase. A bunch of them carried Ma Fei post-haste into a room to staunch the bleeding and heal his wounds.
三人同住在一间屋里，他又怎么会不知道，欧灵的右手，早在喝下那瓶药剂之后，就已经恢复了，此时再给这个霍伦看，又怎么可能看出什么来？

The three of them lived under the same roof, yet how could he not know? As soon as he had drunk that bottle of medicine, Orrin's right hand had recovered. And now if he were to let Hoeren have a look, how would Hoeren be able to tell?
三人回到山洞的时候，克伦威尔正盯着篝火发呆。
Cromwell was staring at the bonfire, dazed, when the three of them had returned to the cave.
三十瓶奥法药剂虽然关键，但老梅林更加看中的，其实还是拥有了药剂师的魔法公会，毕竟瘦死的骆驼比马大，落魄了几十年的魔法公会，依旧能在加洛斯城与梅林家族分庭抗礼，若是让他们拥有了一个药剂师，那又将是一副什么样的景象？

Those 30 bottles of Arcane Magic Potion were important, but what Old Merlin was more interested in was the Guild of Magic that had its own pharmacist. After all, a starving camel was still bigger than a horse. The Guild of Magic, which had been down and out for decades, could still stand against the Merlin Family in Jarrosus City. How would it look like if they were to have a pharmacist of their own?
三十瓶奥法药剂，对于梅林家族来说，简直就是天赐的良机。
That 30 bottles of Arcane Magic Potion was a godsend opportunity for the Merlin Family.
三名护卫顿时大怒就要追去，刘管事却爆喝起来：“追什么，你们这点实力想去送死？”

Three of the guards were instantly enraged and about to give chase. Housekeeper Liu however, yelled, "There's no use in chasing. With so little power, aren't the three of you digging your own graves?"
三大家族的人都坐在最前排，相互间的位置离得也不远，拍卖刚开始的时候，大家还偶尔交谈几句，但随着这个惊人的消息抛出，三人间就好象突然竖起了一道看不见的墙壁，谁也没有心思再交谈，目光全都落到了凯文身上，只等着那小小的木锤落下……

The three families were sitting at the first row, not far away from one another. They had occasionally exchanged a few words at the start of the auction. But as the alarming news came out, each of the three parties seemed to have erected an invisible wall around them. No one was in the mood for talk anymore; their eyes fell on Kevin, waiting for the small wooden gavel to drop...
三天时间学会了三个低级魔法，安度因看着这见鬼的进度，就不禁又想问问，这世界上究竟还有没有天理？想自己当初光是进入冥想状态就花了一个月，而且这进度还被老师称赞为天才中的天才，那眼前这小子又该算什么？怪物中的怪物还是变态中的变态？

Lin Li had mastered three kinds of elementary magic in three days. This unbelievable progress got Andoine doubting if there was any justice in this world. He had spent a month getting into meditation and was praised by his teacher for being a genius at that. Then, what would become of the guy in front of him? Was he a monster or a maniac?
三种廉价草药，加上并不复杂的工序，就能产生越级施法效果，外加少量的魔力恢复。
Three kinds of inexpensive herbs and an uncomplicated concoction process could produce an overstepping effect, plus a small amount of mana restoration.
三种都是难得一见的魔法金属，只要能得到其中一种，恐怕就足以让这世上大多数魔法师高兴得睡不着觉了，大概也只有林立这种禽兽，才能一次拿出三种来，而这带来的后果，也是让他陷入了幸福的烦恼当中。

All three were rare magical metals, and getting even one of them would be enough to keep a mage awake at night. Perhaps only a beast like Lin Li could take out all three at once; and this had led him to face a blissful problem.
三种魔法金属都是如此优秀，手上的深邃之银却只够镀上一根。
All three magical metals were so excellent, but only one could be coated with the deep silver he had on hand.
上百块秘银哗啦哗啦的被倒进熔炉，林立站在旁边稍等了两分钟，也不管秘银是否融化，夹出一块就放到铁砧上猛敲，身后数十玩家只见一阵火花四溅，价值数百金币的秘银瞬间被敲成一块废铁。

Over a hundred pieces of mithril poured noisily into the furnace. Lin Li waited on the side for two minutes, then, disregarding whether the mithril was melted, he took one out and began hammering once it was on the anvil. The players behind him saw in between fits of sparks mithril valued over a hundred gold coins hammered into a piece of scrap iron in an instant.
下一瞬间让他更加吃惊的是，那无名口诀修炼的出来的黑色元力，和江水决修炼出来的蓝色水系元力碰撞在一起，却没发生他想象中的絮乱，反而水乳交融般完美融合到了一起，在经脉内自由游走。

in the next instant, he was astonished to see that the black essence force cultivated from the nameless chant collided with the blue essence force cultivated from the Jiang Water Art. However, instead of throwing his body into disorder as he imagined, the two types of essence force mixed perfectly together like water and milk. They freely circulated through his arteries without even a tussle.
不仅仅是药剂炼金锻造这样的职业，就连草药知识这种，更多是属于知识层面上的东西，他也同样拥有大师级水准！
It included not just professions like pharmacy, metallurgy, and forging. It was more on the knowledge aspect, like the knowledge of herbs—he also had a mastery level in it!
不出江逸的意料之外，丹炉又是一声炸响，而在他不抱任何希望揭开炉盖的时候，却意外发现有三枚丹药竟然没炸，安静的躺在丹炉内。上面黑光流转，隐隐还有纹路，看起来异常漂亮。

As Jiang Yi expected, an explosive sound rang out of the elixir cauldron. Yet when he lifted the cauldron lid without any prior expectations, he unexpectedly discovered three of the elixir pills had actually not exploded at all, but were instead lying silently in the cauldron. The top of the pills had black light circulating about, with the pills having a faint vein-like pattern - the pills looked strangely pretty.
不出江逸的意料之外，风月楼的刘管事很快得到了他和江小奴的资料，马飞的父亲也暴怒无比，下令让刘管事派人探查江逸行踪，一有机会直接做了他。

Just as Jiang Yi expected, Housekeeper Liu of Fengyue Brothel had soon obtained his and Jiang Xiaonu's information. Also as Jiang Yi predicted, Ma Fei's father was livid and ordered Housekeeper Liu to send someone on Jiang Yi's trail, and to take him out at the first opportunity.
不出江逸的意料之外，黑色元力融合元力丹药力后，他提炼江水决的速度果然快了数倍。感受这丹田内的蓝色元力不断快速产生，江逸暗暗激动起来。如果他有大量的丹药，依靠着黑色元力增幅，就算有这鬼封印，他依旧可以快速修炼了。尽管他未来的成就还是有限，但最少修炼到铸鼎境四五重什么的不是难事。

As expected, after the black essence force merged with the medicinal power of the essence force pill, the speed at which he was refining with the Jiang Water Art did indeed increase severalfold. Jiang Yi grew excited as he felt the blue essence force in his dantian continuously and speedily get produced.
If he had a large number of elixirs and continued relying on black essence force to expand the power of the elixirs, even with this stupid seal, he could continue to speedily refine essence force. Even though his future accomplishments were limited, at least it would not be difficult for him to reach the fourth or fifth level of the Cast Tripod Realm.
不同人体之间，力气难免会有误差，但在元力的绝对优势面前，这种差距一般是微不足道的。
Between two individuals, there would no doubt be some difference in strength but the difference would normally be negligible.
不同系别，不同颜色的元力之间要想融合，有着苛刻的条件。至少在铸鼎境这种境界，不同系别的元力之间就算轻轻碰触一下都会出大问题，轻则元力絮乱走火入魔，重则经脉断裂受重伤，丹田爆裂成废人，这是天星大陆人尽皆知的常识。

there were strict criteria in order for two different techniques or two different colored essence force to fuse. At least within the Cast Tripod realm, different essence force clashing lightly was enough to create a big problem. The repercussions spanned from the minor problem of having a Qi deviation due to chaotic essence force to the major problem of being seriously injured due to cracked meridians. The explosion of a dantian might even reduce a person into a cripple. This was common knowledge for all on the Stellarsky Continent.
不对……这小子不是一般人，他肯定知道一些自己不知道的东西。
But... he was not an ordinary person. He definitely knew something Andoine did not know.
不知过了多久，有个身长数十丈的猪首冥将终于忍不住问。
After a long while, a Netherworld general in the form of a dozen-foot-tall pig-man could not help but ask,
不知过了多久，院外突然响起一声怒意十足的大喊，江逸听到那个声音立刻心头一震，从打坐中清醒过来，暗道不妙。

He had no idea how long had passed when he heard an enraged roar ringing from the courtyard outside. Upon hearing that voice, Jiang Yi was immediately startled awake from his meditation. His heart beat rapidly; he knew something was amiss.
不等林立吩咐，利维坦猩猩已是三下两下拨开树下的落叶，露出一个又深又大的树洞来。
Not waiting for an instruction from Lin Li, the Leviathan Gorilla swept the fallen leaves aside and revealed a hole in the tree that was huge and deep.
不等林立细想，葛瑞安已是迎了过来，这胖老头也不知道是属什么的，变脸变得比谁都快，刚刚还骂骂咧咧，一副怒气冲天的样子，这才一转身，胖脸上却又堆满了可鞠的笑容：“怎么样费雷，手续办好了吧？”

Lin Li had yet to recall the name when Gerian had stepped forward to meet him. He wondered which year the old man was born as his mood changed from one moment to another. A while ago, he was still swearing in a towering rage, and with a turn, he reverted to the amicable smile on his chubby face. "How was it, Felic? Have you processed the documents?"
不等那条红影扑近，林立已是猛的往后退出了几步，与此同时飞快的吟唱着迟缓术的咒语。
Lin Li had pulled back before the red shadow came close and begun reciting the Delaying Spell in haste.
不管怎么说，魔法公会确实欠了萨鲁曼家族一个人情，虽然仔细一想，会觉得这个人情有些廉价……
Regardless, the Guild of Magic had indeed owed the Saruman Family a favor. Though upon careful thought, it would seem that this favor was a rather cheap one...
不管是怒焰法袍，还是无尽风暴之戒，都只是无尽世界中的装备，说到底它们只是一堆数据，但如今这一堆数据，却实实在在的出现在现实世界，一切都是如此的真实，怒焰法袍正不断散发着它特有的温度，无尽风暴之戒静静的套在拇指上，林立完全可以感觉得到，只要自己一个念头，就能够打开戒指中那近乎无限的空间。

Both the Robe of Wrath and the Ring of Endless Storm were equipment of the Endless World. They were only statistics, but now these statistics were present in the real world. Everything felt so real. The Robe of Wrath was constantly emitting its peculiar warmth, and the Ring of Endless Storm lay quietly on his thumb. Lin Li could totally feel that he could open up the near infinite space that was in the ring with just a thought.
不管是想将女儿介绍给凯文的胖子，还是挺着丰胸的阿姨，又或者对巴瑟罗尔阿谀奉承的安东尼－罗林，在这一瞬间，他们望向格林－伯恩塞德的目光，都是充满了发自内心的景仰。

At that moment, whether it was the fat man who wanted to introduce his daughter to Kevin, the aunty with the full bosom, or even Anthony Rolin trying to get Bathrilor's favor by flattery, the looks they gave to Grimm Burnside were full of heartfelt admiration.
不紧不慢的走到贸易区，林立在铁匠铺门口停下了脚步。
Lin Li took his time to walk to the trade zone. He stopped in front of the blacksmith shop.
不能炼制丹药，他的黑色元力怎么注入丹药内？
If he could not even refine any elixirs, how could he inject any black essence force into the elixirs?
不过……这件事不能太急，必须等今晚之后。
But... he must wait until after tonight.
不过三位公子很快醒悟过来，认为这是姬听雨在在刻意躲开他们，也不好多说讪讪的站在原地。

However, the three gentlemen quickly woke up from their astonished trances. They all thought that it was Ji Tingyu's attempt to deliberately avoid them and as such was unwilling to comment any further. Instead, feeling embarrassed, they stood around at their original spots.
不过今天的老法师，似乎有些心不在焉。
However, today he noticed that the old mage, Andoine, seemed to be distracted.
不过他倒是不敢出声，老老实实的站着，内心期望这柳长老心情大好，可以放他一马。
However, he did not dare to make a sound. Instead, he merely stood there like he was well-behaved, hoping in his heart that with his excellent mood, Elder Liu would let him off the hook.
不过他倒是很聪明，知道此地不宜久留，否则伤的将会更加严重。他惦着一条腿朝外面艰难逃去，走到外面见江逸没有追来，才满眼怨毒的咬牙切齿说道：“江逸，你竟然敢伤我？你死定了，我一定会让虎哥打死你的，你有种一辈子不出江家大院，嘶……”

Nonetheless, he was very smart. He realized that it was imperative to leave, otherwise his injuries would worsen. He thought of relying on one leg alone to escape, and did so with much difficulty.
When he reached the door and saw that Jiang Yi wasn't pursuing him, he gritted his teeth in bitter resentment. "Jiang Yi, how dare you injure me? You're dead. I will definitely let Brother Hu beat you to death. If you have the balls, don't think of leaving the central court! Hiss..."
不过他当时可没想到，克伦威尔追求伊娜不成，会把火发到自己头上。
But he had not expected Cromwell would vent his frustration of not winning Ina's heart on him.
不过他转念想到江小奴那瘦弱的身躯，他很快摇头道：“姬小姐，你是高高在上的小姐，你永远不会了解我们这种人的生活，嗯……长不说这些了，你找我是有什么事吧？”

However, once he thought of Jiang Xiaonu and her scrawny figure, he shook his head quickly, "Young Mistress Ji, you stand high above the masses and will never understand the lives of people like us. Mm... let's not dwell on this topic any more. You must be looking for me for some reason?"
不过以老格林显赫的身份，自然不可能象丰胸阿姨一般主动凑上前去，他身为加洛斯最富盛名的传奇魔法师，自然也有着传奇魔法师自己的矜持，所以在简短的自我介绍之后，他就一直在等林立开口。

But with Old Grimm's eminent status, it was impossible for him to step forward like the aunty with full bosom. He was the most famous mage of Jarrosus, so he naturally had the reserve of a legendary mage. Hence, after the brief self-introduction, he waited for Lin Li to speak.
不过再一想想，也就没什么好奇怪的了。
But on the second thought, there was nothing strange about it.
不过再仔细想想，自己这一个月来，吃人家的住人家的，完了还要找人家学魔法，这要是一点忙都不肯帮，似乎也太说不过去了，所以他不得不硬起头皮应到：“说来听听，要是能做到的话，我一定尽力帮忙。”

But thinking it over, he had been living as a freeloader for the past month and still had magic to learn from him. It was hardly justifiable if he couldn't even offer a little help. Hence, he braced himself and replied, "Tell me about it. I'll do my best to help if it's within my means."
不过在怒焰之袍的强大抗魔属性之下，这一两道火龙并未给他造成任何伤害，只是稍一接触，就瞬间湮灭在抗魔力场当中。

However, with the strong magical resistance attribute of the Robe of Wrath, that one or two fire dragons did not cause any harm to him. They disappeared in the magical resistant field upon contact in an instant.
不过在目前看来，安度因虽然每天都会弄出点动静，但至少身体还是很完整的。
But for now his body was still intact, despite being subjected to various accidents everyday.
不过在确定是利维坦猩猩的同时，林立也微微松了一口气。
But Lin Li had heaved a sigh of relief when he identified it as the Leviathan Gorilla.
不过姬听雨这次却并没有内疚之色，反而摇头轻笑，一双如宝石般的眸子内都是慑人光芒，她款款而谈：“易公子，不遭人妒是庸才，这个世界有很多美好的东西，值得我们去追求。而这些东西人人都想要，那势必会有竞争，麻烦肯定也会不断，没有追求的人生，那是不完美的人生。人的一辈子匆匆数十载，红颜易老，刹那芳华！你想庸庸碌碌过一辈子，还是想轰轰烈烈，风风光光的过上十年？”

However, Ji Tingyu did not express any remorse this time. With her gem-like orbs shining with startling beauty, she shook her head and smiled, speaking slowly but pointedly, "Young Master Yi, only the mediocre does not attract the jealousy of others.
