There are so many wonderful things in this world that are worth pursuing, things that everyone wants. Certainly, it creates competition and incessant trouble, but imagine how imperfect life would be without a cause. A lifetime lasts but a fleeting handful decades; beauty and youth fade away in an instant! Do you prefer a lifetime of mediocrity, or a zealous, glorious decade?"
不过对于这个年轻魔法师的药剂水准，老格林依旧抱着某种程度的怀疑。
But Old Grimm still had some degree of doubt about the young mage's level in pharmaceutics.
不过对于这些他倒是并不在意，那群公子小姐和他的人生太过遥远，他也不想和她们有什么交集，他目光投向翊凌雪道：“翊小姐也不错，这段时间我感觉你战力是飞快提升，你所有的武技都大成了吧？境界也快提升到铸鼎境五重了吧？”

Nevertheless, Jiang Yi did not care too much about any of that. Those young masters and young mistresses were living a life far different from his, and he did not wish to cross paths with them. He cast a look at Yi Lingxue, "Young Mistress Yi is not doing too bad yourself. I can feel your powers rising fast during this period, haven't all of your martial art techniques attained phenomenal success yet? You must be elevating to the fifth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm too?"
不过对林立来说，这其实并不是什么大事。
But to Lin Li, this was not a big deal.
不过林立一点也没把他们放在心上，伸出两根手指，轻轻夹出愿望术卷轴往背包里一放，就这么招摇过市的出了私人仓库。
But Lin Li heeded them not. He stretched out two fingers and lightly picked up the scroll, put it in his bag, and strode out of the private warehouse.
不过林立不在乎这些，他根本不缺那几个钱，也没打算买太好的装备，能暂时把希恩武装一下就行了，想要真正把他武装起来，还是要自己亲自动手才行，这一般的武器店里，又哪能买到宗师级别的装备？

But Lin Li could not care less about that. Neither was he short on money, nor did he intend on buying something of high standard. As long as Sheehan could get some temporary armor, it would be good enough. Lin Li would have to build the gear by himself if he really wanted to arm Sheehan well. After all, how could one possibly find guru-level equipment in those average arsenal shops?
不过林立只是把这件事记在心里，并没有跟伊娜多说什么。
But Lin Li kept it to himself and said nothing to Ina.
不过比起胖老头来，这年轻法师可就老实多了，进门跟林立打过招呼之后，就老老实实的蹲在墙角画圈圈，遇到有事的时候，还能帮林立打打下手，所求的也不过是见识一下药剂大师的技艺。

But the young mage was much more restrained than the fat old man. After greeting Lin Li at the door, he would squat in the corner and draw circles. When something happened he could also help Lin Li; all he wanted was to witness the skills of a potion master.
不过江逸既然开口了，她也不好抹他的面子，而且进了练功房不随便对练一场也会引起别人怀疑的。江逸能带来拥有丹纹的丹药这事，姬听雨可不想别人知道，于是含笑道：“易公子请放手一战！”

However, since Jiang Yi offered, she did not feel it was right to be so impolite and let him lose face that way. Besides, having already entered the Technique Practising Room, not having a martial arts combat match with a sparring partner would raise suspicions over what happened. Ji Tingyu had no wish to let others know the circumstance that Jiang Yi could bring in elixirs with vein patterns. As such, she smiled and replied, "Young Master Yi, please do not spare me either, and let's fight!"
不过穿了这么久，一直觉得挺合身，林立也没想过另换一件，反正大多数法师袍都是这样，在卷轴空间上做文章。
But Lin Li had always felt it to be fitting after wearing it for so long, and had never thought of replacing it. Most mage robes were as such anyway, making an issue out of the scroll space.
不过老格林毕竟是活了一百多岁的人物，虽然被林立一句话问得有些尴尬，脸上倒也没露出多少异色，只是带着几分自我解嘲的表情笑了笑：“呵呵……看来安度因这老家伙，倒也没在你面前说我什么坏话嘛……”

But Old Grimm was someone who had lived for over a hundred years after all. Although he was embarrassed by Lin Li's question, he did not show it on his face. He merely chuckled with a self-deprecating expression. "Heh heh... Looks like Andoine, that old fellow, didn't speak ill of me in front of you..."
不过艾萨克毕竟是久居城主高位的人物，心头虽然有些小小的不快，脸上却还是堆起了热情温和的笑容。
But Isaac was, after all, a man of high rank as a castellan. Even though he was slightly unhappy, he still displayed a warm and gentle smile on his face.
不过葛瑞安可不管这些，出卖也好报复也好，总之就是损害了魔法公会的利益，损害魔法公会利益，就等于是损害他的利益，损害了他的利益，就必须人道毁灭——这就是葛瑞安的理论……

However, Gerian would not care about these. Whether it was betrayal or revenge, it had dealt damage to the interests of the Guild of Magic. Damaging the interests of the Guild of Magic would be equivalent to damaging his own interests, and the one who damaged his interests had to be destroyed—such was Gerian's logic...
不过被忽略了也好，免得他一张笑脸的凑上来，自己以后还不好意思找他麻烦。
But it was better to accept being ignored lest he should be approached with a smiling face and be too embarrassed to make trouble for him in the future.
不过转头想到，在这做事似乎就不用外出上西山了？江如虎等人也不敢明着来这或者去他院子内动手吧？他正好有时间可以好好研究下黑色元力了。

However, he switched his thinking. If I take this job, I no longer have to go out to the Western Hills? Additionally, Jiang Ruhu and his gang would not dare to come here or go to my house and fight me, right?
He had just the right time to carefully research the black essence force.
不过转念江逸就明白了，这翊龙宇既然是翊家年轻一代的最强者，对于江家的武技显然也很是了解，轻松看出他用了江家的武技也正常。

Jiang Yi mulled it over for a moment before comprehension dawned: as the strongest martial artist among the younger generations in the Yi Family, he obviously would know a thing or two about the Jiang Clan's martial art techniques, and it would be easy for him to tell that the techniques Jiang Yi used belonged to the Jiang Clan.
不过这事林立倒是没怎么推辞，他本来就是五系宗师，外加各种杂学大师，只要是涉及到专业的东西，眼光自然是要比葛瑞安之流强上许多，再说他对各大势力拿出的东西，其实也很感兴趣，这对他来说就好象寻宝一样充满了乐趣。

Lin Li did not decline. He was a guru well-versed in all five series plus a master in general skills. When it came to professional stuff, he would naturally have a better eye than Gerian. Besides, he was also very interested in what the major forces were offering, and it seemed to him as much fun as a treasure hunt.
不过这家伙倒是很快接受了现实，谁让自己当初棋差一着，没尽早把猎人身上的魔晶转来。
However, this fellow quickly accepted the reality. He had miscalculated his steps and failed to transfer the magical crystals from the hunter at an earlier time.
不过这无关紧要，魔晶只是为点金棒提供魔力，以后若是能猎杀到更加强大的魔兽，完全可以更换掉这枚十五级的。

But this was not important. The magical crystal was just to provide the gold rod with mana. If he could kill an even more powerful magical beast in the future, he could always replace the level-fifteen magical crystal.
不过铸鼎境二重突破三重需要的元力是原先的一倍，他原来停留在铸鼎境一重也有一年多了，此刻要想突破铸鼎境三重，就算有如此恐怖的修炼速度，没有大半个月也是不可能的。

However, the amount of essence force needed to break through from the second to the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm was double that of the original. His power-level had already been stuck at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm for over a year. To be able to break through to the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm there and then, even if he had such obscenely fast essence force cultivation speed, it would be impossible to accomplish this breakthrough without spending more than half a month in cultivation practice.
不过铸鼎境前四重好突破，要想突破后面的境界就非常困难了，铸鼎境五重是道坎，需要的元力差不多是前面所有境界的总和。所以很多纨绔子弟，天资不行的武者境界都停留在铸鼎境四重，毕竟他们家族再富有也不可能用无尽的丹药让他们强行突破到铸鼎境五重，比如江如虎，又比如马飞。

On the other hand, while it was easy to achieve the first four stages of the Cast Tripod Realm, making a breakthrough to each of the subsequent stages was much more difficult. The fifth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, in particular, was a bottleneck, the essence force needed was roughly the sum of all the previous stages. As such, many wastrel playboys and inept martial artists like Jiang Ruhu and Ma Fei, were permanently held up at the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. After all, it would be impossible for their families, however rich they might be, to keep supplying them with elixirs to forcibly elevate to the fifth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
不过！
However!
与它一起落下的，还有被绑成粽子的伊娜。
Falling with it was Ina, who was wrapped like a rice dumpling.
与林立一番长谈之后，安度因似乎就把这件事给忘了。
After the long talk with Lin Li, Andoine seemed to have forgotten about the matter.
与此同时，整座天庭剧烈摇晃起来，在天庭所有建筑上浮现出无数与刚才那九天锁星阵七彩符文截然不同的另一种金色符文，整座天庭仿佛披上了一层金色的外衣。

At the same time, the whole Heavenly Court also shook violently. The countless runes that surfaced on the buildings of the Heavenly Court were completely unlike the rainbow-colored Empyreal Star Lock Array runes. They were golden in color and made it seem like the entire Heavenly Court was draped in a golden cloak.
丛林之后，是一条潺潺流动的小溪，这大概就是罗麦格雷尼说的水源，在小溪的旁边，一只水袋正静静的落叶上，里面的清水尚未流尽，正咕咚咕咚的往外冒着。

Behind the forest was a gentle stream, probably the water source that McGrenn had mentioned. Beside the stream, a water bag lay quietly on the fallen leaves. The water in it was not yet drained, flowing out with a gurgle.
东西倒是好东西，三件装备无一不是精品，特别是那一根秘银项链，寻常魔法师见了多半会眼红一会。
The stuff was good stuff, all three pieces of equipment were excellent products, in particular the mithril necklace. Normal mages would be envious should they even get a look at it.
丢下这么句话，林立转身就走，他实在不想跟一个神经病太过接近。
Lin Li turned around to leave after tossing the words out. He was really reluctant to be near a wacko.
两个加洛斯最强的魔法师，只是一瞬间就碰撞出了耀眼的火花。
It would only take a moment for two of the most powerful mages in Jarrosus to collide with a dazzling spark.
两个大魔导士的直接对话，甚至比传奇法师的言传身教更有效果。
The direct dialogue between the two great archmages was even more effective than a legendary mage's precepts and examples.
两个年轻法师被训得满头是包，可偏偏还不敢为自己辩解，只能一脸委屈的低着头，老老实实的听胖老头训话，看到林立下来的时候，两人就好象找到了救星似的，赶紧朝林立投来求助的目光。

The two young mage were bruised from all the lecturing, but they had not the courage to speak up for themselves. They could only lower their heads in grievance and listen earnestly to the lecture of the fat old man. They seemed to have found a savior when they saw Lin Li coming down, and quickly threw him glances that called for help.
两个时辰之后！
Two hours later...
两个贱人在会客室里一番商议，出来的时候都是两眼放光，谁见了都有种被狼盯上的感觉。
The two jerks had a discussion in the reception room. When they came out, their eyes were shining—anyone who saw them would have the feeling of being targeted by wolves.
两个魔力回路分别通往尾端魔晶，从那里源源不断的吸取着魔力，二十六个魔力节点分别包围着一红一绿两块宝石，就仿佛众星拱月一般，将两道魔纹的力量，通过一红一绿两块宝石彻底激发出来。

The two magic circuits led to the end of the magic crystal, from which magic was continuously absorbed. 26 magic nodes encircled the ruby and the emerald like a myriad of stars surrounding the moon. The power of the two mageweaths was thoroughly activated through the ruby and the emerald.
两人一前一后跑出山洞，正看见克伦威尔如丧家之犬般狂奔回来。
The two men ran out of the cave back to back, just in time to see Cromwell sprinting back like a rabid dog.
两人从魔法公会出来的时候，天色已经有些晚了，此时的奥兰纳街头虽然依旧繁华，但行人却大多是行色匆匆，街边店铺也差不多已经歇业，这个时候出来买装备，其实并不是太好的时间，一时不一定能买到称心如意的，二是容易被人狮子大开口的乱宰。

It was already a bit late when the two exited from the Guild of Magic. At this hour, despite the bustling Alanna streets as usual, most passers-by were in a hurry and many street-side stalls had closed shop too. Actually, it was not a good idea to buy gear at this timing. This is because on one hand, the limited time might not permit them to find something satisfactory while on the other hand, the equipment could very well be priced exorbitantly and unreasonably high.
两人再不去管克伦威尔，只是沿着小溪旁的脚印一路往前找去。
The two men paid no more heed to Cromwell as they began their search by following the footprints along the stream.
两人几乎同时扑了过去，正看见葛瑞安那张胖脸。
Both of them rushed forward almost at the same time, only to see Gerian's chubby face.
两人几乎是不约而同的选择了走中庸路线，短暂急促的咒文快速的手势，造就了这场场面宏大却又瞬息万变的战斗。
Both had chosen the middle course almost undesignedly. Short and rapid recitation of spells together with swift gestures had created a magnificent and ever-changing battle.
两人出了木屋，安度因想了很久，才出声问林立：“知道我为什么不教你新的法术，反而一直让你练习元素排列吗？”
They stepped out of the log cabin. Andoine thought for long while before asking Lin Li, “Do you know why I stopped teaching you new spells, and instead had you practice elemental sequencing?”
两人又说了会话，林立却突然发现，希恩身上的皮甲，好象还没有换过，仍然是在黑山镇是所穿的那件：“对了希恩，你怎么不换件皮甲？”

The two continued the conversation for a while longer when Lin Li suddenly realized it seemed that Sheehan had not changed his leather armor since he was at Black Hill Town, "Oh yes, Sheehan, why have you not changed your leather armor?"
两人啃完肉干，江逸再次给小奴检查了一遍伤势，确定没有伤到骨头后，让她自己回房找春芽帮她敷上药膏，还交代几句，今日之事千万别给家族的人知道了。

Both having finished their jerky, Jiang Yi once again checked Xiaonu's wounds. Confirming that she did not have any injured bones, he got her to return home to find Chunya to help her apply ointment, while instructing her not to let any of the family members know what happened that day.
两人在武器架前转了一圈，实在没什么太好的货色，就在林立打算闭着眼睛，先买一件将就将就的时候，却忽然在一片货架上，感受到了一丝轻微的魔法波动。

The two men paced another round around the racks but nothing in particular caught their attention. When Lin Li decided to make do with whatever item picked at random, a faint magical wave in somewhere among the racks suddenly captured his interest.
两人在水晶球旁，等到大概凌晨时分，就在两人都心急如焚的时候，一直没有动静的水晶球，终于亮了起来！
The two of them waited by the crystal ball till the wee hours. Just as the two of them were in a state of extreme anxiety, the crystal ball, which had been silent, lit up finally!
两人在街上看了一圈之后，走进了一间叫镀金玫瑰的魔法商店中。
After taking a look around the street, they walked into a magic store called Gilded Rose.
两人在那一番推辞，最后艾萨克终于还是没能拗过葛瑞安，硬是被他把一瓶奥法药剂塞进了手里。
After a round of declining from each side, Isaac couldn't win Gerian at last, and a bottle of Arcane Magic Potion was stuffed into his hand.
两人在那闲扯了几句，正打算往宴会大厅里走，却被眼尖的城主大人给认了出来。
The two talked for a little while and were about to enter the banquet hall when they were recognized by the eagle-eyed Castellan.
两人很快到了会客室外，林立刚一推开门，就看见一张正哭得梨花带雨的俏脸。
The two of them reached the reception room promptly. As soon as Lin Li pushed open the door, a weeping beauty came into sight.
两人性子很稳重，站在门口不远的一名铸鼎境三重的旁系子弟脾气却很是火爆，不等江如虎开口，伸手指着江逸鼻子骂道：“你算什么东西？滚出去！”

The two of them remained calm, but at the door, the collateral descendant who was of third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm had a fiery temper. Before Jiang Ruhu had the chance to speak, he pointed at Jiang Yi's nose and berated, "Who do you think you are? Get out of here!"
两人找了个僻静角落密谈，旁边一群人，却早已经看得目瞪口呆……
The two of them sound a quiet corner for a private discussion. The people around them were dumfounded.
两人正在那窃窃私语，却听见一阵喧哗声从翡翠高塔外传来，抬眼望去，正看见一名衣饰华贵的中年男人走进塔内，远远望去这人大约四十多岁，面色略显苍白，神色间却又透出一股威严。

The two of them were whispering when a clamor was heard outside the Emerald Tower. Looking up, they saw a middle-aged man in luxurious clothing entering the tower. From a distance, he looked to be about 40 year old; his face was slightly pale, but he exuded an air of authority.
两人正有一句没一句的闲聊着，却忽然听见远处一声惊叫传来。
The two men were chatting away when, suddenly, a scream broke out in the distance.
两人用尽了全身的力气，终于是在人群中挤出了一丝缝隙。
With all their strength, they finally squeezed out into a gap in the crowd.
两人的目光，都是同样呆滞，远远望着树林中的一老一少，半天也没能说出一句话来，刚才那一幕实在是太诡异了，年纪轻轻的费雷，指点起安度因这位传奇法师来，却是显得无比自然，就好象这一切都是天经地义似的。

All life had been drained from both of their eyes. They gazed at the old and young together at a distance, not being able to speak fro a while. The scene they had just witnessed was simply too bizarre. The young Felic was instructing Andoine, a legendary mage, but this seemed hardly strange, as if it were perfectly justified.
两人的魔力几乎是同一时间耗尽，从空中缓换落下，靠的仅是漂浮术的缓冲。
They had exhausted their mana almost at the same time. The slow descend was merely a buffer with the Levitation Spell.
两人说话的时候，十瓶奥法药剂的价格，已经被人抬到了四十万。
While the two men were talking, the price for the ten bottles of Arcane Magic Potion was raised to 400,000.
两人走进黑市，就象走进了斗兽场中。
Walking into the black market was like walking into a Colosseum.
两人跟葛瑞安打过招呼之后，就出了翡翠高塔，沿着冷清的街道一路往加洛斯城内走去。
The two guys left the Emerald Tower after informing Gerian. They walked along a deserted street towards Jarrosus City.
两人这么一问一答，一路上倒也不算无聊。
The way one questioned and another answered had kept the journey away from boredom.
两人都受了伤，好在毒打江小奴的那个壮汉没有动用元力，江小奴只是受了些皮外伤，并没有伤筋动骨，否则怕是江逸都不知道怎么回去了。

Both of them were injured, but thankfully the strongman who brutally beat Jiang Xiaonu did not use any essence force, so all Jiang Xiaonu received were some surface wounds. She thankfully hadn’t sustained any muscular or skeletal injuries, otherwise Jiang Yi would have no idea how to bring her back home.
两人都是铸鼎境五重，在他们看来，江逸虽然实力进步得诡异但还不足为虑。两人一开始没出手，只是不想搅入江如虎的破事中，但此刻怎能眼睁睁看着江如虎被打断双腿？

Both of them were at the fifth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. In their eyes, Jiang Yi wasn't of any threat even though he had a drastic progression in strength. They initially didn't want to get involved with the matters of Jiang Ruhu, but how could they witness the breaking of Jiang Ruhu's legs?
两位大魔导士都有瞬发低级魔法的能力，甚至比林立更加精通，但是他们从头到尾，却从未瞬发过任何一个魔法，因为他们心里很清楚，自己能够瞬发的魔法，根本就无法给对方造成任何威胁。

The two archmages here possessed the ability to unleash low-level magic instantaneously, and were even adept at that as compared to Lin Li. But they had never had any instantaneous outburst of magic since the start of the battle. For they knew clearly that the instant magic outbursts they could unleash would never pose as a threat to the other.
两名英俊公子陪着姬听雨一路走来，豪气干云的大笑声响彻大殿内，江恨水倒是没有开口，不过目光一直锁定姬听雨小姐，眸子内都是炙热。

With their heroism and bravery reaching the heavens, the loud laughter coming from two of the handsome gentlemen who followed Ji Tingyu walk into the hall rang throughout the Great Hall. Jiang Henshui, on the other hand, did not open his mouth. Nonetheless, his gaze had always been locked onto Young Mistress Ji Tingyu, with his pupils revealing a look of fiery passion.
两大势力一旦撕破了脸，加洛斯立刻就会陷入混乱当中。
Once the two powers turned against each other, the whole of Jarrosus would fall into a turmoil.
两条大汉都打着赤膊，神色凶狠一脸横肉，一看就是在打打杀杀中厮混出来的，林立摸了摸鼻子，带着几分怯意小声答道：“卖东西的……”

The burly men were shirtless, their expressions ferocious and ugly. At a glance, they seemed to have came from knocking around places fighting and killing. Lin Li touched his nose and replied timidly, "I came to sell items..."
两相比较之下，精通医术的罗琳，其实更适合成为林立的学生，医术与药剂，有着太多共通之处，林立甚至可以肯定，只要自己愿意尽心尽力指导的指导她一下，年纪轻轻就医术高明的罗琳，恐怕还用不了一年的时间，就可以在药剂学上取得不错的成就。

By comparison, Rowling, who was proficient in medicinal studies, was actually more suitable to become Lin Li's student. Medicinal studies and potion making had too much in common. Lin Li could even be sure that as long as he was willing to guide her with all his heart, Rowling, with her superior medical skills at such a young age, would be able to achieve good results in pharmaceutics within a year.
中午起来的时候，因为麦德林催得急，林立连饭都没来得及吃，在噩梦山脉上一番折腾，早就已经饿得前胸贴后背了，这家伙一路走进公会大厅，就在那一路四处张望，想看看有没有什么能吃的东西，可以拿来先垫垫肚子。

When they got up at noon, Lin Li had yet to have his lunch as Medellin hurried them to move. Thus, he had been starving for hours after a long, tough journey through the Nightmare Mountains. This fellow was looking around along the way to the guild's hall, hoping to find something edible to relieve his hunger momentarily.
中年人从树丛间走出，目光直直的盯着林立：“你是不是叫费雷？”
The man emerged from the bushes. He stared Lin Li straight in the eye and asked: "Are you Felic?"
中年人手中的元力隐入身体，满脸怒容四处一扫，沉喝道：“还愣着干什么？还不把伤者带去疗伤？其余所有人全部带去刑堂，你们这群王八羔子无法无天了？”

The essence force went back into the body of the middle-aged man, looking around with an furious expression, he shouted, "What are you all still standing there for? Why aren't you bringing the injured to recuperate? Everyone else is to be sent to the Disciplinary Court. You bunch of bastards are truly lawless uh?"
中年人点了点头，没有多说什么，只是望向林立的目光，却是越发的凌厉。
The middle-aged man nodded his head. He said nothing more, but his gaze towards Lin Li instead was more intense than ever.
中年人神神秘秘的重谢，弄得林立心里有些七上八下，心头还在那暗自揣测，该不会是凯文在外面搞下了什么风liu债，又不敢告诉葛瑞安，现在人家找上门来了吧……

The mysterious gratitude of the middle-aged man made Lin Li feel a little anxious. In his heart he was speculating that Kevin might have run up to some romantic debt and didn't dare to tell Gerian, but now the person had come looking for him...
中年人老板的态度，让林立多多少少有些好感，他看得出来，这是一个正正经经的生意人。
The shop owner, who was a decent businessman as far as Lin Li could tell, left a somewhat good first impression.
中年男人没有想到，这个看起来强大而神秘的少年魔法师，竟是如此的平易近人，一时间多多少少有些受宠若惊，当下又是一番诚恳的致谢，然后才为他介绍起一行三人来。

The middle-aged man had not expected the seemingly powerful yet mysterious young mage could be this amiable and easy to approach. He was rather flattered and expressed his sincere gratitude all over again before introducing his party of three to him.
中间葛瑞安又过来关心了几次，在看到这一瓶瓶奥法药剂的时候，胖老头差点没把舌头给咬掉，本来不看都已经惦记上了，这下看到了就更不得了了，老家伙就象是饥渴了几十年的久旷怨妇似的，死活赖在药剂室里不肯走，非要林立给他弄两瓶尝尝不可。

Gerian had come to watch a few times. When he saw the bottles of Arcane Magic Potion, the fat old man nearly bit his tongue off. It had been on his mind even without looking at them, but now that he had seen them, he was behaving like an aggrieved woman who hadn't been satisfied for decades, refusing to leave the potion lab and insisting on getting two bottles for him to have a taste.
丹田内还有一缕刚刚提炼出来的黑色元力，江逸立即调集过来，继续开始冲击封印。结果他又成功让封印上的一枚符文消融了……

There was still a strand of recently refined black essence force in his dantian. Jian Yi hastily summoned that strand over and used it to continue battering the seal. Once again, he successfully caused yet another runic character on his seal to dissipate...
丹药是江逸自己炼制的，江逸自然毫不在意的点头道：“知道的，如果不知道，那不是变成我偷的吗？”

The elixirs were developed by Jiang Yi himself, so he naturally nodded without minding about the question. He replied, "Yes, of course he knows! Would it not be considered that I was stealing if he doesn't know?"
为了冲击附魔专业，林立几乎动用了所有的关系，就为了在点金棒上镀上一层深邃之银，可这东西实在是太稀有了，全无尽世界似乎都没人见过，那段时间林立天天都蹲在拍卖行，佣兵公会的私人委托更是常年挂着，报酬一天一小加三天一大加，可就是没见谁把这东西给拿出来过。

In order to jolt his magical enchantment profession, Lin Li had used all his connections just to coat the gold rod with one layer of deep silver. But this stuff was just too rare, almost no one had seen it in the Endless World. For that period of time, Lin Li spent his days squatting at the auction house. The Mercenary Guild's private commission was hung all year round, and the reward was increased by a small amount every day and then saw a huge increase every three days, but no one had ever brought the stuff out.
为了跟老格林探讨，他甚至可以容忍罗琳旁听，以林立那倔强的性格，这可是相当难得的一件事……
In order to discuss with Old Grimm, he could even tolerate Rowling's presence, which was a very rare thing with his obstinacy.
为了这个机会，他甚至不惜让自己暴露在狮蝎的利爪之下。
He'd even exposed himself to the claws of the Manticore for this opportunity.
为了追求这个长腿美女，克伦威尔用尽了一切的手段。
Cromwell had used all kinds of means to win the heart of this long-legged beauty.
为了避免金发美女又问到自己的来历，林立干脆主动找些话题跟她聊了起来，对林立来说聊的内容其实不重要，重要的是不能让她有时间发问！

To avoid another questioning of his background from Ina, Lin Li took the initiative to bring up some topics to chat with her. For Lin Li, the content of the conversation was not important, what was more important was not to let her have the time to raise questions.
为什么会觉得这个中年人眼熟，原来竟是因为他跟巴瑟罗尔长得有七八分相似，特别是手上戴的那一枚红宝石戒指，林立的印象实在是太深刻了，当初在城主府宴会上，自己就差点伤在这枚红宝石戒指下面。

Why he had felt that his middle-aged man looked familiar, was because he looked largely similar to Bathrilor, especially the ruby on his ring finger. Lin Li's impression of this was just too vivid. At that time during the banquet, he had almost injured himself due to the bottom of this very ruby.
为自己赢得了暂时的喘息机会之后，林立再不敢耽搁任何时间了，打开无尽风暴之戒，从里面摸出了一瓶蓝色药水。
After earning a temporary respite for himself, Lin Li dared not hesitate any longer. He opened up the Ring of Endless Storm and pulled out a bottle of blue potion.
之后他又打开了无尽风暴之戒，而这一次拿出的，是一支由水晶雕琢而成的水晶笔。
Then, he opened up the Ring of Endless Storm and this time took out a crystal pen carved from crystal.
之后安度因又说了些什么，林立已经有些不太记得了，一直到老法师的背影在视线中渐渐模糊，林立才忽然想起件重要的事来。
Subsequently, Lin Li could no longer remembered what Andoine had said. It was only when Andoine’s back disappeared into the distance that Lin Li suddenly recalled an important matter.
之后就是等待冷却，与一般金属不同，魔法金属不能强行冷却，否则会导致金属中的魔法属性大量流失，林立现在能做的就是耐心等待。

Then, he waited for it to cool. Unlike ordinary metals, magical metals could not be forced to cool down, otherwise, it would cause a huge loss of magical properties in the metal. What Lin Li could do was only to wait patiently.
之后数十年过去，格林－伯恩塞德在药剂学上已有大师级水准，即便是在药剂师公会内部，也绝对算是能说上话的重要人物。

Decades had passed since then and Grimm Burnside was already at the mastery level in pharmaceutics. Even within the Pharmacists Guild, he was definitely an important person who had a say in the guild.
之后的一个多月里，安度因缺草药的时间越来越多。
For the following few months, Andoine frequently lacked in herbs.
之后的一个月，林立就一直住在落日山脉，除了偶尔在药剂学上指点一下安度因之外，他绝大部份的时间都用到了学习魔法上，因为他发现自己确实很有魔法天赋，就连老安度因也不得不承认，自己活了一百多岁，还从来没见过这么出众的魔法天赋。

Lin Li stayed in the Sunset Mountains for the following month. Other than occasionally guiding Andoine in pharmaceutics, he spent most of his time learning magic. He discovered he had a gift in magic, and even old Andoine, who had lived for over a hundred years, had to admit he had never seen someone with such an exceptional talent in magic as Lin Li.
之后的一切对他来说，简直就是一场噩梦。
All that followed was simply a nightmare to him.
之后的几天里，他再没出过房门半步，就连奥法药剂的拍卖都没空去关心，只是将自己锁在房里，静心思索着那一场战斗中的点点滴滴，两人的每一句咒语每一个手势，都被林立拿出来反复研究。

For the subsequent few days, he had not stepped out of his room. He did not even have the time to care about the auction of the Arcane magic potions. He'd locked himself up in the room and calmly pondered over every bit of the battle. Lin Li had studied repeatedly each spell and gesture that both of them had used.
之后的几天里，老法师有些苦恼，因为他完全不知道，自己还有什么能教给林立的。
The following few days, Andoine was troubled as he was completely clueless what else he could teach Lin Li.
之后的几天，一切风平浪静，姬听雨再也没有出现过，江恨水和江如龙也没露面，江逸每天在武殿和西山江家大院三个地方转圈，除了陪翊凌雪对练外就是修炼，日子倒是过得充实惬意。

All was peaceful and calm over the next few days. Ji Tingyu did not appear again, Jiang Henshui and Jiang Rulong did not show their faces either. Jiang Yi spent every single day running between the Martial Arts Hall, the Western Hills and the Jiang Residence Central Courtyard, only either sparring in combat with Ji Tingyu or conducting power cultivation. His days passed by rather substantially and satisfactorily.
之后的几天，林立忙得不可开交。
For the next few days, Lin Li was up to his ears in work.
之后魔力输出缓慢增加，林立手上的火苗也是越烧越旺，在那熊熊的烈火之下，附在点金棒上的深邃之银开始慢慢融化，这中间需要的是无比精确的控制，任何一丝失误，都可能会导致价值连城的深邃之银化为乌有，就连向来镇定的林立，此时额头上也是不由冒出了细密的汗珠……

Thereupon, the mana output was slowly increased, and the flame on Lin Li's hand burned more vigorously. The deep silver adhered on the gold rod began to melt under the blazing flame. Precise control was required. Any slight mistake could turn the valuable deep silver into nothing. Even Lin Li, who had always been calm, couldn't stop fine beads of sweat from breaking out on his forehead...
九阳天帝！
Nine Yang Celestial Thearch!
也不知道今天是什么日子，城主府内张灯结彩灯火通明。
There seemed to be some celebration today; the Castellan Mansion was brightly lit with lights.
也不知道究竟是为什么，林立总是觉得，老头脸上的笑容有些居心叵测。
For reasons unknown, Lin Li constantly felt that the smile on the old man's face was somewhat sinister.
也不知道那死猩猩从哪里搞来这么多椰子，一通*般的乱砸，至少弄了数百个椰子下来。
Who knew where the darned gorilla got the coconuts from—at least hundreds of them came smashing down in a mess.
也只有这三种魔法金属，才会让林立伤透脑筋。
Only these three magical metals would task Lin Li's mind.
也就是说，这道诡异的封印，才是小江逸元力修行速度上不去的罪魁祸首！
In other words, this bizarre seal was the culprit behind the young Jiang Yi’s abysmally slow cultivation speed!
也幸亏林立在安度因木屋里住了一个多月，在这一个多月的时间里，虽然只学会了十个低级法术，但在施法手段上却远比一般法师娴熟。

It was a fortunate thing that Lin Li had been living in Andoine's log cabin for more than a month. In this past month, though he had only learnt ten low-level spells, he was far more adept in his execution of the spells than an average mage.
也幸亏这个时候，葛瑞安正忙着跟林立说话，压根没注意到他大逆不道的心思。
Luckily for him, Gerian was too busy talking to Lin Li to notice his rebellious thoughts.
也幸亏这炼金室里没什么人，这话若是说了出去，多半是要挨雷劈的……
Fortunately, there was no one in the alchemy lab. If these words went out he would most likely be struck by lightning...
也正是因为这个原因，葛瑞安现在才没有轻举妄动，虽然他已经占据了绝对的上风，只要他愿意，完全可以凭着一瓶唤醒药剂的优势，将老梅林父子杀死在翡翠高塔外，但这又怎么样，梅林家族不是魔法公会，他们的实力来源于财富与权势，失去了老梅林这个大魔导士，对他们来说并不致命，而之后的报复，则会让加洛斯城陷入混乱当中。

It was for this reason that Gerian had not acted rashly. He had gained a definite upper hand, and if he was willing, he could always rely on one bottle of Awakening Potion to kill Old Merlin and his son outside the Emerald Tower. But what for? The Merlin Family was not the Guild of Magic, their strength came from wealth and authority. Losing Old Merlin, an archmage, would not be fatal to them, yet the revenge that'd come later on would plunge Jarrosus City into a chaos.
也正是因为这样，林立才有些奇怪，冷不丁的问了一句：“谁教你的？”
It was because of this that Lin Li felt something was strange. He suddenly asked: "Who taught you to make this potion?"
也许……
Perhaps...
也许一些十级以上的魔法师，可以凭借着自己数十年来积累的经验，勉强瞬发两个一二级法术，但对更多的魔法师来说，瞬发只是一个遥不可及的梦境。

Perhaps some mages above the level ten could unleash two level-one and level-two spells in an instant with their decades of accumulated experience, but for many mages, instantaneous outburst was nothing but a distant dream.
也顾不得去跟伊娜解释，猛的抓住麦格雷尼的衬衣袖子，只听“嗤啦”一声脆响，整条衣袖都被他给撕开了。再一看那条手臂上，果然有一条细细的黑线往胸口处蔓延……
Without bothering to explain to Ina, he grabbed McGrenn's shirt’s sleeve and with a sniffle, he tore it apart.Taking another look at the arm, there was indeed a thin black line spreading to chest...
买好了灵神丹，他揣着仅剩下的十两银子匆匆离开，却径直朝广场南边的聚珍阁走去。

After buying the Spirit Pills, he kept the remaining ten taels of silver in his pocket and hastily left. However, he walked directly towards the Pearl Gathering Pavilion, which was situated at the south side of the city plaza.
事关魔法公会命脉，林立也不敢再继续耽搁，只是跟艾萨克说了一声，就带着凯文回魔法公会去了。
As this involved the lifeblood of the Guild of Magic, Lin Li dared not tarry further. After informing Isaac, he set off for the Guild of Magic with Kevin.
事实上他之所以来到加洛斯城，就是为了要看一看这个年轻的魔法师，在王都奥兰纳的时候，安度因将他吹得是上天入地无所不能，年纪尚不到二十，就已经在药剂学上取得了深不可测的天赋，本身更是足以媲美法师之神的魔法天才。

In fact, the reason why he came to Jarrosus City was to have a look at this young mage. At the capital Alanna, Andoine had lauded the latter to the skies like there was nothing impossible for him. At the age below 20, he had already had a profound gift in pharmaceutics and was a magic genius comparable to that of the God of Mages.
事实上林立的猎人号，此时就停在明月城拍卖行内，那可是手持神话武器星辰之怒的超级猎人，法师不过是仓库小号而已。只不过也不知道是不是因为林立运气太好，当初只打算用来当仓库才建的法师小号，却神奇的分到了智力精神双满的极品属性，以至于后来林立总是很烦恼，这么极品的小号，究竟该用来干点什么才好……

In reality, Lin Li's hunter form was stationed in the auction house at the moment. He was a super hunter holding the legendary weapon, Stars of Fury. The mage was just a smurf account he used in the warehouse. However, he seemed to have an extraordinary luck. He had created a mage smurf intending to use it as a warehouse, but he had gotten one with top levels of mental and intellectual abilities, a mage of the highest grade. Lin Li always had trouble deciding what to do with such an exceptional smurf.
事实上，他也想过将他封印正在破解，还有无名功法的事情告知家族，引起家族重视，那样所有问题都能迎刃而解。但想到这数年来江家没有人待见他，加上柳长老的事情，他又生怕江家迁怒于他，所以决定等实力突飞猛进实在瞒不住再说。

The truth was that he had also thought of revealing the fact that he was in the process of breaking his seal as well as the nameless cultivation technique to the family.
He hoped to gain the respect of the clan and solve all his problems in one fell swoop. However, he had realized that no one in the Jiang Clan had ever liked him. When he took into account, the incident with Elder Liu, Jiang Yi was afraid that the Jiang Clan would take their anger out on him.
As such, he decided to keep the fact that his power was improving by leaps and bounds as a secret, and only reveal it when he could no longer conceal it anymore.
事实上，武装希恩这件事，林立早就有了打算。
Actually, Lin Li had long thought of a plan on arming Sheehan.
事实就是这样，多放几个低级魔法，对林立来说根本没有任何影响。
That was the truth. Unleashing a few more low-grade spells had no effect on Lin Li at all.
事情到了这个地步，话已经不用说了，这一个简单的动作就可以说明一切。
With such a progression, there was no need to say any further. One simple action could explain everything.
二十五万买三瓶奥法药剂，平均价格已经远远超出了先前成交的几瓶，在很多人看来，这已经不是拍卖，而是在赌气了。
250,000 for three bottles of Arcane Magic Potion; the average price had far exceeded the previous few bottles that were sold. To many, this was no longer an auction, but a fit of pique.
二十五万这个数字，确实有些太狠了，富如达芙妮这样的小偷头子，也没敢再继续跟进。
250,000 was indeed a ruthless bid. Even a wealthy thief leader like Daphne did not dare to follow through.
二十人早早的分散开来，将他围在中间，所有人身上的元力都悄然运转，他无论朝哪边逃都会被缠住，继而陷入无穷无尽的围攻中。

The twenty persons had dispersed early on, leaving him surrounded in the centre. The essence forces on all of the persons' bodies were quietly being circulated. In whichever direction he thought of escaping, he would always remain trapped within, thereafter getting stuck in the middle of a neverending barrage of attacks from all sides.
二十人！
Twenty people!
二十八分钟的持续输出，这意味着数千个低级魔法，就算是换成传奇法术，也够他放出十几个来了，葛瑞安真的很想问问林立，你真的是人类吗？

Twenty-eight minutes of continuous output meant a few thousands of low-level magic spells. Even if they were legendary spells, this would be enough to unleash a dozen of them. Gerian had really wanted to ask Lin Li whether he was truly a human.
二十几块神之金属刚一现身，整个私人仓库就顿时沸腾了。
The entire private warehouse seethed with excitement at the sight of these divinity metals.
二十分钟的时候，两人已经冲动得想撞墙了，这究竟是人还是怪物？
At twenty minutes, both of them had the impulse to hit the wall. Was this a human or a monster?
二品炼丹师，鹤大师就是其中一个。
Master He, second-grade alchemist, was one such individual.
于是他应了声，随手拿了桌上古籍中的一本，才翻开第一页，眼前却是一花，只见那古籍书第一页中的数十个黑色小篆字体竟然依次从书中飞了出来，在半空中排列成整齐的一串，绕着他的脑袋旋转个不停。

Nodding at her encouragement, Jiang Yi picked up one of the books from the stack of ancient texts on the table. However, as soon as opened the first page, his vision was attracted by a dazzling blur. The tiny black font on the page flew out of the book and formed a circular-shaped sentence in midair, which began to orbit his head.
于是他很放心的打开了无尽风暴之戒。
Feeling assured, he opened up the Ring of Endless Storm.
于是他派出了克伦威尔，并让他带来了四条十四级咒语。
Therefore, he had sent Cromwell along with the four level-fourteen spells.
于是克伦威尔少见的放下了矜持，拼命的在脸上挤出笑容，主动向翡翠高塔内的魔法师示起好来。
So, Cromwell put on his best behavior, something that he rarely did, and tried his best to force a smile on his face, taking the initiative to befriend the mages in the Emerald Tower.
于是几乎所有成功的附魔师，都会选择永恒精金锻造的点金棒。
Hence, almost all successful magical enchanters would choose the Eternal Adamantine to forge the gold rod.
于是她去了魔法公会，事实上去的时候，就连她自己都知道希望渺茫，想了那么多的办法，父亲依然在沉睡当中，费雷先生虽然是一个很厉害的魔法师，可是他真的就能救醒父亲吗？

So, she went to the Guild of Magic. In fact, she knew that hope was slim even when she went there. She had thought of so many ways but her father was still in deep slumber. Although Mr Felic was an impressive mage, could he really wake her father up?
于是枯燥的练习持续了近一个月之久，一直到一天早晨……
The tedious training continued for a month, until one morning…
于是谁也没有注意到，他带出来的那一群魔导士中，不知什么时候，又多出了一张陌生的面孔……
Hence, no one had noticed that there was an unfamiliar face among the group of Magic Shooters he led...
于是麦格雷尼很干脆的就把任务接了下来，当天也没在加洛斯城休息，稍微补给了一下之后，就带着伊娜去了低语森林。
So, McGrenn coolly took the quest. He did not rest in Jarrosus City that day. After a little restocking of the supplies, he took Ina and set off to the Forest of Whispers.
亏他前两天还信誓旦旦的告诉自己，那个叫费雷的年轻魔法师只不过五六级的实力，甚至才刚刚加入魔法公会不到十天。
Just two days ago, he had even sworn to him that the young mage named Felic was merely at a level of five or six, and had just joined the Guild of Magic for no more than ten days.
五分钟过去了，林立丝毫没有停手的意思。
Five minutes had passed, and Lin Li had no intention of stopping.
五千金币是什么概念，换成冒险者公会的任务，麦格雷尼父女要猎杀一百只狮蝎，在低语森林里找出五十座黑色古堡，才能换到一个竞争奥法药剂的机会。

What was the concept of 5,000 gold coins? If he were to think of it as a quest from the Adventurers Guild, then McGrenn and his daughter would have to kill 100 Manticores and look for 50 black castles before they could get the chance to exchange for a bottle of Arcane Magic Potion.
五级对大多数魔法师来说，都是一道难以跨越的鸿沟。
For most mages, level-five was a difficult gap to cross.
亚伦－马齐斯毫不犹豫的出价，对小个子法师来说简直就是致命的打击，一万五千金币并不是极限，但对方的语气，却让他有一种绝望的感觉，就好象那不是一万五千金币，而是十五个银币一样。

Aaron Matsis bidding without hesitation was a fatal blow to the short mage. 15,000 gold coins was not the ceiling, but the other party's tone had made him feel despair as if it was not 15,000 gold coins but only 15 silver coins.
亚伦－马齐斯眼都没眨一下，就给小个子法师判了死刑，这是一个让人绝望的价格。
Aaron Matsis had sentenced the short mage to death without even blinking his eyes. This was a price that would send someone into the depths of despair.
亲戚？这个笨丫头……
Relatives? This silly girl…
人体修炼，靠的是运转奇妙的修炼法门，吸收天地中的灵气进入身体，再汇聚入丹田内转化成元力。所以丹田和经脉才对武者那么重要，尤其是丹田一旦破坏，没有圣品丹药几乎都不可能修复，再强大的武者都只能变成废人。

Using the human body for essence force refinement depended on practicing a strange cultivation method. It meant absorbing the spiritual aura of the earth and sky into the body, which would in turn be converged within the dantian and converted into essence force. Thus, the dantian and the meridians were very important to martial artists. Should the dantian in particular receive damage, one could not heal it without saint-grade elixirs, which meant that even the most powerful martial artist would become completely useless.
人体的丹田就像一个炼丹炉子，天地灵气就像药草，能否快速的炼制出丹药，就看丹炉够不够好，炼丹人的手法高不高明。

The dantian of the human body was like an elixir-refining cauldron, while the spiritual aura of the earth and sky were like medicinal herbs. One had to see the strength of the cauldron, as well as the skill level of the elixir refiner, to know if one could speedily produce elixirs.
人体的平衡性非常重要，一个人重心不稳的时候会本能的慌乱，再强大的战力都无法施展。比如此刻江如龙整个人被江逸抡在半空转圈，他脑袋自然也慌乱眩晕起来。

A body's sense of balance was extremely important. When a person lost his center of gravity, he would instinctively fall into a state of panic and be unable to utilize any of his combat strength. Just like Jiang Rulong who was being whirled around by Jiang Yi, his mind naturally began to panic and fall in to a dazed state.
人体的眼睛是最重要的器官之一，眼睛中的神经异常密集，一旦眼睛受伤武者战力绝对大打折扣，甚至完全失去战斗力。

The human eye was one of the most important organs in the human body. The nerves in the eyes were abnormally concentrated. Once the eyes were injured, any martial artist would definitely experience a great reduction in his or her combat ability, or even completely lose his or her fighting strength.
人体神经最为密集的地方，一个是脑袋，另外一个就是下身！所以一直以来“撩阴腿”“猴子偷桃”这类招数虽然被人所不齿，但却是最实用的。

The brain and the crotch were the two areas where nerves were the most concentrated in the human body. Thus, even though techniques like "Leg to Provoke the Nether Regions" and "Monkey Stealing the Peach" had always been held in contempt, they were nonetheless moves that achieved the best results.
人吓人，能吓死人！
When you want to be frightening, you might frighten somebody to death!
人品中阶武技，蛇鞭腿！
Man-tier medial-grade martial art technique, Snake Whip Leg!
人的丹田最好只运转一种元力，否则容易引发元力冲突絮乱，这是天星大陆人人皆知的常识，不过当江逸将通过无名口诀修炼出来的元力排出丹田，准备改练江水诀时，突然发现那缕新修炼出来的元力竟是黑色的？

It was common knowledge on Stellarsky Continent that one should only transfer of one type of essence force through the dantian, otherwise difference essence force could very easily clash and get mixed up. However, when Jiang Yi transferred the essence force produced from this nameless formula through his navel in preparation for practicing the Jiang Water Art instead, he quickly realised that the newly distilled essence force was black!
人阶上品武技，劈山腿。
This was the Man-tier superior-grade martial arts technique, Mountain-Splitting Leg.
亿万冥界大军每一个的心中都感到强烈震撼，那人虽然没有发出一丝威严强悍的气势，那人虽然看起来红光满面，剑眉星目，脸如刀削，但其实外表很老，白须飘飘，然而……那人带给他们的心灵震慑感，丝毫不亚于，甚至还要隐隐超过自己的主人，不死冥皇。

Every one of the hundreds of millions of Netherworld soldiers were astounded. Although he did not manifest an air of majestic might, he looked to be in good health. He had a chiseled face, ruddy cheeks, a long white beard, sword-like eyebrows, and star-like eyes. Despite the fact that he looked very old on the surface, he sent reverberations down their souls for he was in no way inferior to their master. It was even possible that he surpassed their master, the Undying Netherworld King.
什么马迪亚斯，什么伤害同僚，不过是个借口而已……
Mathias, injuring a fellow mage, these were all simply excuses...
仅仅三天时间，公会内部的流言就被强行镇压下去，那几个威胁退出的魔法师，更是在当天下午就被赶出了魔法公会。
Within three days, rumors in the guild were forcibly suppressed. The mages who threatened to quit were kicked out of the Guild of Magic that afternoon.
仅从战斗力方面看，清醒药剂无疑是林立所知配方中，性价比最高的。
In terms of combat effectiveness alone, the Sobriety Potion was the most cost-effective among the formulas Lin Li knew.
仇人见面，分外眼红！
When the two enemies spotted each other, they locked eyes in mutual fury.
今天任务开始得有点晚，等到三人从噩梦山脉回来的时候，已差不多是吃晚饭的时间了。
It was a little late when the day's task began. By the time the trio returned from the Nightmare Mountains, it was almost dinner time.
今天的葛瑞安似乎特别谨慎，就算是身处公会最安全的会客室里，他还是不太放心，又放了一个生命感知魔法，确定周围再无其他活人之后，这才压低声问道：“告诉我，你是什么时候惹上梅林家族的？”

Gerian was looking extremely cautious today; even in the reception room, which was the safest of all places, he couldn't seem to be at ease. He cast another Life Sensor Spell, and after making sure that there were no living people around, he started whispering, "Tell me, when did you offend the Merlin Family?"
今日给这马家公子一闹，他已经没有退路了，亦如在西山遭遇江如虎般，没有退路他唯有不退，杀出一条血路！

This fiasco caused by the Ma Family young master had left Jiang Yi with no other option. Yet, just like the time when he encountered Jiang Ruhu at the Western Hills, he would stand firm if there was no other way to turn; he would fight his way out and leave a blood path in his wake!
今晚的宴会对这一众宾客来说，实在是刺激得有些过分。
The banquet tonight was a real thrill for all the guests.
今晚这宴会实在是太辛苦他了，先前巴瑟罗尔出手偷袭，就已经将他吓掉了半条命，生怕林立有个好歹会引来葛瑞安的报复，但是紧接着形势急转直下，林立一翻身从地上站起，两个瞬发魔法重创巴瑟罗尔，甚至放出了怒焰风暴杀人。

Tonight's banquet had been too tiring for him. The previous surprise attack by Bathrilor had already scared half his wits off; he was so afraid something would happen to Lin Li and draw Gerian's revenge. But then the situation had plummeted; Lin Li had stood up with a turn and dealt a heavy blow to Bathrilor with two instantaneous spells, and had even unleashed the Flaming Storm to kill.
仍然是那种无力可使的感觉，就好象一座大山横在面前，任你怎么走都绕不过去。
It was still the feeling of impotence. It was like there was a mountain in front of you which you could not get around in any way.
从一开始只知道拉开距离，象个弓箭手似的躲在远处射风刃，到之后会用魔法进行控制，再让敌人在绝望中死去，这样的转变林立只花了一个多月，要知道就算在如今的魔法师协会里，也仍然有着相当一部分人，顶着魔导士的帽子，却干着弓箭手的勾当。

From the beginning, Andoine believed that inexperience could be overcome; just like an inexperienced archer hiding in the distance becoming an experienced mage using magic to control the situation to make the enemies die in despair and helplessness. This transformation took only a month for Lin Li. It should be known that, in today’s Guild of Magic, there were still quite a few who wore the hat of the wizard but were doing the work of an archer.
从一开始派出克伦威尔示好，到最后凭着强能水晶挑战葛瑞安。
From the beginning where he had sent Cromwell to convey their good intentions, until finally he'd relied on the Strong Energy Crystal to challenge Gerian.
从会客室出来之后，林立多多少少也有些意外。
Lin Li was more or less surprised when he came out of the reception room.
从会客室出来之后，林立连气都没来得及喘上一口，就一头扎进了公会炼金室。
After coming out from the reception room, Lin Li dived into the guild's alchemy lab before he could catch a breath.
从催动精神力到完成分解，整个过程只是瞬息之间，比起以前用的那些点金棒来，确实不可同日而语，一时间林立不由心情大爽，手中点金棒更是点得飞快，将一枚枚魔晶分解为纯粹的魔法精华。

It only took the twinkling of an eye from the stimulation of the mental strength to the completion of dissolution. It was indeed different compared to the gold rods that were used in the past. Lin Li's mood was lifted at once; the gold rod in his hands moved swiftly, dissolving the magical crystals into pure magic essence.
从公会魔法师手里接过奥法药剂之后，安东尼－罗林神情激动，将三只玻璃瓶紧紧的捂在怀里半天也舍不得松开。
After receiving the Arcane Magic Potion from the guild 's mage's hands, Anthony Rolin was so agitated that he held the three bottles tightly in his arms for a long time, reluctant to let go.
从加洛斯交易所回来之后，他就一直很忙，忙得根本就没时间去关心这些东西。
He had been so busy since he’d returned from the Jarrosus Exchange that he did not have the time to care about such matters.
从十一家魔法家族，到六支地下势力，几乎所有人都在拼命的筹集资金，黄金地段的房产，高级魔兽的魔晶，稀有的魔法材料，罕见的魔法装备，这些往日里难得一见的东西，仿佛在一夜之间就涌进了市场，而价格更是一天一跌，就好象高台跳水一般。

From eleven mage families to six underground forces, almost everyone was struggling to raise money. Prime real estate, top-grade magical crystals, rare magic materials and magic equipment... All these uncommon items seemed to have flooded the market overnight. Prices were dropping day by day as if taking a dive from a high platform.
从大门走进翡翠之塔，里面同样是一间宽敞的大厅。
Walking in through the gates of the Emerald Tower was likewise a spacious hall.
从安度因手上那枚安眠水晶就可以看出，这条永恒精金矿脉多半不是富矿，而且分布得也肯定很零散，不然这块安眠水晶不会小成这样。当初林立手上那块安眠水晶，就是从千针石林的富矿里采出来的，足足有人头那么大一块，让珠宝匠雕刻一整套药剂瓶都够了……

He could tell from Andoine's Hypnotic Crystal that the Eternal Adamantine mineral vein in question was likely to be barren and dispersed, which then explained the pathetic size of the Crystal. Thinking back to his own Hypnotic Crystal which was mined from the rich ore in Thousand Pinnacles, that piece, as big as a human head, was more than enough for a jeweler to craft out an entire set of potion bottles...
从宴会中抽出身来，躲进僻静的角落里之后，他反倒有了观察一众宾客的兴趣。
After he had withdrawn himself from the banquet and hid in the secluded corner, he found some interest in observing the company of guests.
从当初面对一头被重创的狮蝎依旧陷入苦战，到如今轻而易举的杀死一头六级雷兽，林立所掌握的依旧只是那十种低级法术，但林立心里很清楚，自己正变得更加强大，用老安度因的话来说，自己更象是一个真正的魔法师了。

From struggling in a battle with a highly invasive manticore initially, now, Lin Li could easily kill a level-six beast. Lin Li only possessed the ten low-level magic spells, however, he was clear that he had become stronger. In the opinion of Andoine, Lin Li had begun to feel more like a real mage.
从找到黑色城堡那天开始，一直到两人回到加洛斯城，麦格雷尼已经睡了七天了，在这七天时间里，他没有醒来过一次，也没有吃过任何东西，就这么一直处于沉睡当中，身体正一天天的憔悴下去。

From the day the castle was found to the day the two returned to Jarrosus City, McGrenn had slept for seven days. He did not wake up once or eat anything in those seven days. He was in deep slumber and his body was languishing day by day.
从昨天到现在，发生的事情太多太多了，让他脑袋都变成了一团浆糊，他摇头摇头，准备迟些疗伤后要好好理一理。

From yesterday until now, an overwhelming number of things had happened to the point that his brain had become a melted mess. He shook his head and prepared himself to fix himself mentally after healing his wounds.
从某种程度上来说，这两个魔法师有许多共同之处，比如两人都出自加洛斯城，又比如两人都已攀上了魔法师梦寐以求的传奇境界，还比如……两人都醉心于药剂学。
To some extent, the two mages had a lot in common. For example, both were from Jarrosus City, both had reached the legendary realm every mage had dreamed of, and both were immersed in pharmaceutics.
从根本上来说，林立其实是一个性格内向的人，他更喜欢把事情藏在心里，除非象克伦威尔一样，反复的激怒他，甚至直接将口水喷到他脸上，不然林立一般不会有什么过激的表现。

Lin Li was essentially an introvert who preferred to keep things to himself. Unless someone—like Cromwell, who repeatedly provoked him and even spat directly in his face—picked a fight with him, Lin Li would not show any extreme behavior in general.
从江家大院南门走了出来，江逸确定背后没人跟踪后，戴上斗篷直奔城中广场而去。小半个时辰后，他来到了广场东边一家很大的丹药店铺内。

Walking out from the south gate of the Jiang Residence, after confirming that no one was tailing him, he put on his cloak and ran non-stop all the way to the city plaza in the middle of the city. After an hour, he arrived at a large elixir store on the eastern side of the plaza.
从狮蝎到三眼血狼，再从雷兽到嗜血蜥蜴，一个多月的时间里，林立几乎杀遍了落日山脉所有七级以下的魔兽。

From Manticore to a Three-eyed Blood Wolf, then from Thunder Beast to a Bloodthirsty Lizard. In slightly over a month, Lin Li literally killed all the magical beasts of the Sunset Mountains that were of level-seven and below.
从绝世天才到废物，还连带让家族的最强供奉失踪，让江家实力大损。
The fate of Jiang Yi—from an incredible genius to a completely useless person who had directly caused the strongest member of the family clan to disappear—led to his reputation plummeting.
从药剂室出来之后，林立又第一时间找到了葛瑞安，一老一少再次躲进会客室里，谈了差不多有大半个下午，两人才带着一脸的奸笑从里面出来。

Lin Li went to Gerian the first thing after he came out of the potion lab and the old and young hid in the reception room once again. Their discussion took almost the whole afternoon, and both emerged with sly smiles on their faces.
从落日山脉回来之后，克伦威尔的心情还从来没这么愉快过，积蓄已久的怨恨，在今天突然爆出来，憋在胸口的那口恶气，终于有了宣泄的出口，每一句话都无比恶毒，极尽挖苦嘲讽之能事，从林立身上那件旧法师袍，到他连根法杖都买不起的落魄，一直骂到不清楚自己的身份，居然敢参与到这么重要的谈话中来……

Ever since returning from the Sunset Mountains, Cromwell had not felt this joyful before. The resentment that had been amassed for a long time exploded today, and the fury he had held in his chest finally found an outlet to vent it. Every word was vicious to the core and full of sarcasm, from the worn mage robe Lin Li was wearing to his inability to afford even a magic staff, to his unawareness of his own status yet participating in such an important conversation...
从被安度因捡回小木屋开始，一直到加入加洛斯魔法公会，前前后后三个多月时间，林立居然连一分钱都没用过，身为一个一穷二白的穿越者，没用钱的机会，自然也不会想到去挣钱，以至于一直到今天走进镀金玫瑰，林立才忽然发现，自己身上竟然连一分钱都没有。

From when Andoine had picked him back into the cabin till he had joined the Guild of Magic, a whole three months had passed and Lin Li had not spent a penny. As a poor time traveller, he had no need to use money, and therefore did not think of earning it. It was only this day when he walked into the Gilded Rose that Lin Li suddenly found himself without even a penny on him.
从西山回来和荣管事复命后，江逸溜出了江家大院，开始在城内转悠，寻找赚钱的办法。

Returning from the Western Hills and having reported to Chief Rong, Jiang Yi secretly slipped away from the Jiang Residence Central Courtyard and started wandering around the city in the search for ways to make more money.
从这铸鼎境三重的武者冲进来，到现在被江逸踹出去，其实只是短短十几息时间。
Only a short duration of several seconds had passed, from the time the martial artist at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm rushed in, to the time Jiang Yi kicked him out.
从那间所谓的加洛斯交易所出来，林立的心情很愉快，当初在落日山脉的时侯，安度因天天逼着自己出去杀魔兽，当时压根就没想过魔晶可以卖钱，只是觉得就这么乱丢乱放有些浪费，次次杀了魔兽都收捡起来，想不到一两个月之后，自己可以靠这些魔晶挣到第一笔收入。

Lin Li was in a bright mood when he walked out from the so-called Jarrosus Exchange. Back when he was in the Sunset Mountains and forced by Andoine to kill magical beasts, it had never occurred to him that he could sell the magical crystals for money. He had thought it was a waste to just leave them there, so he had picked them up each time he killed a magical beast. Who would have thought that two months later, he could earn his first income from these magical crystals.
从马黑旗和柳河的目光中，他心里再次产生一种危机感。对于这种朝不保夕，时刻都可能被打死的日子他受够了，他很清楚要想过上安逸的日子，要想再也没人敢招惹自己，那唯有变强，变得比他们任何人都要强……

He had sensed danger from the way Ma Heiqi and Liu He looked at him. He had had enough of such a precarious life, in which he could be beaten to death at any moment. It became clear to him that in order to live a peaceful life that no one dared to disturb, the only way was to become strong, stronger than anyone could ever be...
仓促间回过头去，正看见一道暗红色的影子。
He turned his head in a hurry, just in time to see a dark-red shadow lurking there.
仔细想想，林立觉得自己运气真是不错……
Thinking it over, Lin Li felt that he was really pretty lucky...
仔细辨认之下，才发现那画布上，似乎有些弯弯曲曲的的符号。
After a detailed examination of it, Lin Li realized there seemed to be some squiggly symbols on the canvas.
他一夜没睡，天一亮匆匆吃了两个窝头就朝炼丹房跑去，昨日他忘记看《药草简录》了，万一今日柳长老要炼其他丹药，需要别的药草，他取药草的速度还是如此之慢，肯定会被训斥的。

He did not sleep for an entire night. Upon daybreak, he hastily ate two wotous before running in the direction of the alchemy lab. He had forgotten to read the "Record on Medicinal Herbs" yesterday. In the untimely event Elder Liu wanted to refine other medicinal elixirs and needed other medicinal herbs, should the speed at which he collected the required medicinal herbs still be extremely slow, he would definitely be scolded.
他一直以为，葛瑞安与老梅林一战之后，那三十瓶奥法药剂就被卖掉了，刚才回翡翠高塔的路上，他还在想什么时候去找葛瑞安分红，怎么也没想到，老家伙居然把拍卖时间给推迟了！

He had always thought that after the battle between Gerian and Old Merlin, those 30 bottles of Arcane Magic Potion would be sold. He was still thinking about when to ask for his bonus from Gerian on his way back to the Emerald Tower. Never did he expect the old fellow to delay the auction!
他一直认为，安度因口中的天才药剂师，只是一个很有药剂天赋的年轻人，也许会比罗琳强一些，但也绝不会强得太多，毕竟罗琳也是难得一见的天才。

He had always thought that the genius pharmacist in the words of Andoine's mouth was merely a young man with a gift in pharmaceutics; perhaps a little more gifted than Rowling, but definitely not by much, since Rowling was a rare talent after all.
他七岁那年，家族照惯例调教年满七岁的子弟们修炼元力，其中还专门赐给江逸只有直系子弟才能修炼的人阶上品水系心法，“江水决”。

When they were seven, the clan typically taught descendants how to cultivate essence force, and the seven-year-old Jiang Yi was no exception. Jiang Yi was even specifically trained in the superior-grade Jiang Water Art, a Man-tier water-element technique usually taught only to direct bloodline descendants.
他不敢置信的喃喃一声，再次闭上眼睛内视了一遍又一遍，他的身体颤抖的越来越厉害，眼泪开始无声无息的从他眼角淌下，滑过他清秀的小脸，打湿了他的衣裳……

he muttered to himself in complete disbelief.
Jiang Yi shut his eyes again and looked inward. He trembled more and more violently as tears silently trickled from the corners of his eyes, rolling down his delicate face and splattering onto his robes...
他五岁那年，和族里的其他孩子一样锻炼基础武技。那时候的他显露出惊人的武学悟性，各种复杂繁琐的基础招式一看便会，打得还有模有样，这让他一跃成为江家声名远播的天才童子。

At the tender age of five, Jiang Yi began basic training in martial arts, just like the other children in the family clan. Back then, he demonstrated astonishing prowess in martial arts; he was capable of learning and accurately replicating any technique with frightening ease, no matter how intricate or complex it was. It was this ability that instantly propelled him to fame, and people dubbed him “the Jiang Clan’s genius child”.
他从小瓷瓶内取出一枚黄色的小药丸对着清水吞服下去，这是江家自己炼制的最低级的疗伤药，人阶下品，黄参丹。

He took out a new yellow tablet from the small porcelain vase and gulped it down with some water. This was the lowest-grade healing medicine the Jiang Clan refined and produced themselves—the Man-tier inferior-level product Yellow Ginseng Elixir.
他从药材房内随便取了一些药粉就洒落进去，然后丢进去三枚废丹，等加温足够后再注入蓝色元力，最后一狠心注入了两缕黑色元力。

He retrieved some randomly-chosen medicinal powders from the ingredient storage room and sprinkled them into the cauldron, before throwing in the three useless elixir pills. After heating them to the right temperature, he injected blue essence force. Lastly, he callously injected two wisps of black essence force.
他们两在那两眼放光，小梅林埃文却是连肠子都悔青了。
Both their eyes were glowing, but Little Merlin Evan was utterly regretful.
他们传承自高等精灵王朝的技艺，本身就是这世界上最珍贵的财富，如果一个药剂大师愿意的话，他翻手之间就能轻易让一个魔法家族覆灭，这世界上有太多的强者愿意为一瓶药剂赴汤蹈火。

The skill they inherited from the High Elves Dynasty was in itself the most precious wealth in the world. If a potion master wished so, he could easily destroy a magic family with a flip of his hands. There were too many strong people in the world willing to go through fire and water for a bottle of potion.
他们完全没有想到，这个看似有些不修边幅的老人，竟会是法兰王国六位传奇法师之一，加洛斯魔法公会的安度因！
They had never expected that this slovenly old man was actually Andoine from the Jarrosus Guild of Magic, one of six legendary magi of the Felan Kingdom!
他们怎么也没想到，那个叫费雷的家伙，竟然连传奇法师都认识，而且看上去，还不是一般二般的交情。
They had never thought that the legendary mage knew Felic, and it seemed as if it was more than a normal friendship.
他们更没有想到，格林－伯恩塞德竟会对一个年轻魔法师说出——“一起探讨探讨”这种话来。
More so, they had never expected that Grimm Burnside would say such words as "discuss together" to a young mage.
他们比拼的就是绝对力量，谁的魔法威力更大，谁的魔力更加充足，谁就能获得最终的胜利。
What they were battling with was absolute power. The one that had a stronger magical power and a more abundant level of mana would eventually emerge as the winner.
他们甚至已经在脑海中勾勒出了一个场景——恢复魔力之后的葛瑞安大战老梅林，双方再一次耗尽魔力，再由翡翠高塔众人一拥而上，将老梅林彻底打爆，当然，除葛瑞安会长和费雷法师之外，那个最光辉的位置，可一定要留给自己……

They had even outlined a scene in their minds—Gerian taking on Old Merlin again after recovering his mana. When both sides exhausted their powers once again, the crowd at the Emerald Tower would rush forth and knock Old Merlin out completely. Of course, other than President Gerian and Mage Felic, the most glorious position must be left for oneself...
他们甚至已经开始妒忌起林立的好运了。
They had even gotten jealous of Lin Li's good luck.
他们神色间充满了同情与怜悯，望向克伦威尔的目光，就好象在看一个先天残疾的白痴。
Their expressions were full of sympathy and compassion at first. Then they turned to one of watching an idiot with a congenital disability when they looked at him.
他们达成的协议，自然也充满了功利气息。
The agreement was, of course, full of the spirit of utilitarianism.
他佯装打扫炼丹房，等了一会见柳长老没有回来，利马动手了。取出三枚丹药丢进一个小丹炉内学着用黑石加温，等了一会才缓缓注入蓝色元力，并且通过元力感应丹炉内的情况。

He pretended to clean up the alchemy lab. After waiting for some time, and seeing that Elder Liu had not returned, he immediately took action. He retrieved three elixir pills and threw them into a small cauldron, before copying Elder Liu by heating up the small cauldron with coal. He slowly injected blue essence force after waiting for a while and, through this essence force, sensed the conditions in the cauldron.
他依旧是整天泡在药剂室里，时不时弄出些让林立胆战心惊的动静。
As usual, he spent his time in the potion lab, making Lin Li's blood run cold with the things he did from time to time.
他倒是不怕水晶球会坏掉，有了这两道高级魔纹的保护，别说是他，就算是安度因来，恐怕也没本事把水晶球弄坏。
He was not afraid that the crystal ball would break. With the protection of the two mageweath, even if Andoine had been here, he probably wouldn't have been able to break the crystal ball as well.
他倔强地高扬着他那隐隐觉得越来越沉重的头，无视旁人怪异的眼神，一步一挨、一瘸一拐地往家里走。一路上巨大的疼痛让他原本清秀稚嫩的脸庞痛得无比扭曲，眼中满是怨恨……

Despite feeling even more lightheaded, he stubbornly kept his head held up high. Step by step, Jiang Yi limped back home, ignoring his surroundings. All throughout the long, painful journey, his dark eyes smoldered with fire and fury, and the immense agony left his delicate, supple face distorted in a frightening grimace.
他内心暗暗叫苦，虽然对方认出他是江家的子弟，今日绝对不敢打死他的。但这事要是闹开了，被家族刑堂知道了，他被责罚一顿是小事，小奴败坏家族声誉怕是要被活活打死啊……

He grumbled bitterly in his mind. Although the housekeeper recognized that he was a member of the Jiang Clan and was certainly didn't dare to beat him to death; however, should the incident that day get publicized, and should the Jiang Clan Disciplinary Court find out... It was a small matter for him to get punished, but he was afraid that Xiaonu would be beaten to death for damaging the family's reputation...
他内心沉喝一声，下意识的去调集黑色元力，让他震愕的是，一缕黑色元力瞬间从丹田内运转出来，流转到经脉。

he shouted loudly in his heart, setting his mind to summon and assemble his black essence forces.
What left him excited and bewildered was that a wisp of black essence force circulated out of his dantian in an instant, and flowed towards his meridians.
他内视了一下伤口，心情很快多云转晴。就这么一点时间，伤口恢复的速度已经赶上了他打坐运功疗伤两三个时辰了。如果此刻有足够的黑色元力，估计半炷香时间就能把伤势恢复个七七八八……

He used his inner vision to check on his wound and his emotions quickly improved. In such a short amount of time, the wound-recovery speed had already overtaken the amount he had healed through meditation by four to six hours. If at that moment he had enough black essence force, he estimated that within two and half minutes he would be able to heal his wounds by seventy to eighty percent...
他再次奔走了数十丈距离，速度一下慢了下来，那黑色元力已经消耗完毕了，他刚想调动一丝黑色元力，继续加快速度却很快醒悟过来。

after running a few hundred feet, his speed rapidly dropped. The black essence force was exhausted. He wanted to use another wisp of the black essence force to boost his speed again, but he came to his senses quickly.
他再次睁开了眼睛，感受着丹田角落内的存放的六缕黑色元力，他是越“看”越可爱，这可是他的宝贝呀，如果不是这黑色元力，今日绝对要坏事了。

He opened his eyes once again and could feel, in the corner of his dantian, the six strands of black essence force currently stored there. The more he "looked" at them, the cuter they seemed. After all, they were his babies, and if not for this black essence force, there would be much worse things happening today.
他分明看见，击飞自己的是一道水柱。
He had clearly saw what struck him was a waterspout.
他刚想上去帮忙，却又看到捧着一大堆古籍，一名身材修长高大的白发老人走进了屋子，将怀中的书堆到桌上，表情严肃地告诉他，这些秘籍里面绝对有一本适合他修炼。

Just as he made to assist her, a white-haired old man with a lanky frame entered the house carrying a large stack of ancient texts. Placing the books onto the table, the elderly man told Jiang Yi with a serious look on his face that these secret manuals were sure to have a martial art style he could practice.
他刚才只修炼了一个多时辰，黑色元力只提炼出五缕，现在已经消耗了一缕，万一在风月楼发生冲突，他拿什么护身？

He had only cultivated for slightly more than two hours and had only extracted five wisps of black essence force. Now that he had expended one wisp, how was he to protect himself when conflict arose in Fengyue Brothel?
他午饭都顾不上吃了，先是把十几枚废丹收集起来，上午由于是试验，柳长老倒是没有过多浪费药草，所以每一炉丹药也就三四枚。

Without eating his lunch, he decided to first gather the ten or so pills of the useless elixirs. As Elder Liu had been doing trials all morning, he did not waste too much of his medicinal herbs; thus every cauldron contained just three of four elixir pills.
他又把丹田内唯一剩下的一缕黑色元力运转去了右手，他今天后面修炼出来的五缕黑色元力已经全部用完，如果这次还不能击退这铸鼎境三重的护卫，那么他和小奴只能等着受罪了……

he once again transferred black essence force, the last remaining strand in his dantian, towards his right hand.
He had consumed all five strands of black essence force he had previously cultivated that day. If he still could not beat back that guard with power at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, there was nothing Xiaonu and himself could do but to endure more incoming attacks...
他双眼如电，死死锁定成扇形朝他掠来的三人，根据对方的动作，提前预算出对方要出的招式，要攻击的轨迹和速度，先一步踩着奇异的步法，朝左边绕去。

His two eyes were like electricity, firmly locking on to the three people who were sweeping towards him in a fan-shaped formation. Based on his opponents' actions, he predicted in advance the martial arts techniques to be taken by his opponents, their attack trajectories and their attack speeds. He then used a few fantastic foot movements in advance, moving towards the left to bypass their attacks.
他双腿元力灌注，全力朝西门奔去同时侧耳聆听，背后那人果然快步追来。江逸狂奔一阵身形一转，陡然进了旁边的一个小巷内隐藏起来，等到身后的那人如一道狂风朝前方掠去，才快速转头朝江家南院狂奔而去。

Concentrating his essence force in his two legs, he raced towards the western gate with all his strength. At the same time, he strained his ears to listen for it. Sure enough, the person behind him had started chasing after him with quick footsteps.
Jiang Yi ran like a madman for some time, before changing his direction and turning his body to abruptly enter a small alleyway to the side. He hid inside the alleyway. He waited for the person behind him to race past him like a strong gale, before hastily turning around and running crazily towards the southern courtyard of the Jiang Residence.
他取出一个白色的小瓶，浑身都兴奋起来，这灵神丹可是人阶上品丹药，能辅助人快速修炼元力。而他的黑色元力能增幅药力，和药力融合后这灵神丹绝对可比地品丹药，把这十枚灵神丹全部炼化，足够他修炼到铸鼎境二重。

His entire body quivered with excitement, as he retrieved a small white bottle. The Spirit Pills inside were Man-tier superior-grade elixirs, after all, and could help one speed up the cultivation of essence force. On top of that, his black essence force could increase medical efficacies of any elixir - once it was merged with the medical efficacy of the Spirit Pill, that elixir would definitely be on par with an earth-tier elixir. Melting down all ten Spirit Pills would definitely be enough to help him cultivate his power level up to the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
他只是伸出一支右手，有些轻佻的指着林立，那红宝石在水晶灯光下，更是折射出纯净而耀眼的光亮。
He merely held out his right hand and pointed pettily at Lin Li. The ruby reflected a pure and dazzling light under the crystal chandeliers.
他只是沉默了一会，果断的拒绝道：“多谢翊公子好意，在下身份低微怎么配得上凌雪小姐？”

After a moment of silence, Jiang Yi firmly turned him down, "I'm grateful for Young Master Yi's kindness, but as someone of humble birth, I couldn't possible be a good match for Young Mistress Lingxue."
他只能咬牙死撑着，冷喝道：“你管我是谁家子弟？你们今日敢毒打我的侍女，这道理就算说到哪去我都不怕。”

He could only clench his fist and restrain himself. Instead, he coldly retorted, "Why do you care whose son of which family I come from? You people viciously beat up my maidservant today—anywhere you go to seek any justice, I will not be afraid to counter you."
他只能疯狂的运转蓝色元力，咬牙全力朝风月楼冲去，一路上因为奔走得太快，都差点撞到几个人。
He could only crazily circulate the blue essence force as he clenched his teeth and rushed towards Fengyue Brothel. He nearly collided into a few passersby due to his hurry.
他只花了三千年便成就帝位，号称史上耗时最短，同时也是最具武学智慧的大帝。
He only spent three thousand years to attain the throne. He experienced the shortest rise to power in history, and at the same time, he was the thearch with the best martial intelligence.
他唯一的选择，只有安排好江家的事情，然后去武殿内潜伏数月，在武殿内虽然也有马家子弟，但他带着面具，本身还是江家一位不足轻重的子弟，谁能认出他？

His only choice was to sort out his affairs in the Jiang Clan, before hiding for a few months in the Martial Arts Hall. The fact that there were Ma Family descendants in the Martial Arts Hall notwithstanding, who could have recognized him, an insignificant member of the Jiang Clan, especially when he had a mask on?
他回来的路上已经想清楚了，他必须安排好所有事情，然后潜伏数月，等实力强大了有自保之力才能四处行走。江家大院内很安全，但他和武殿有过约定，必须在那做陪练五年，一旦违约后果可比得罪马家严重多了……

He had thought things through on the way back: he had to get his affairs in order and go into hiding for several months. Once he had become strong enough to protect himself, only then would he be able to go wherever he pleased. Although he would be safe in the Jiang Clan courtyard, he had an agreement with the Martial Arts Hall and had to work as a sparring partner for five years. Turning back on that agreement would result in consequences far more severe than offending the Ma Family...
他在江逸那呼啸而来的六个拳影上感受到危险，马飞就在身后，他不敢乱来只能先抵挡一下。等所有护卫围上来，江逸就再也无法伤到马公子了。只要马公子安全，他们就能全力对付江逸。

He had sensed danger from the six fist silhouettes that Jiang Yi hurtled at them. As Ma Fei was behind him, he dared not act impulsively and could only try to temporarily ward off the attack. When all the guards came forth, Jiang Yi would no longer be able to harm Young Master Ma, and when Young Master Ma's safety was secured, they could then give their all to deal with Jiang Yi.
他坐镇天庭，统治诸界长达七千年，只因天帝无名，故世人根据他的武学境界至阳至极，在他的晚年尊称他为九阳天帝。

He presided over the Heavenly Court, ruling the various worlds for as long as seven thousand years. As the Celestial Thearch was nameless, people eventually addressed him as the Nine-Yang Celestial Thearch in his twilight years due to his extreme attainment in the martial realm of Yang.
他大摇大摆的走进去，取出身上唯一的一片紫金叶子，在柜台上一拍，沉喝起来：“店家，给我来十枚灵神丹！”

He swaggered boldly into the store. Retrieving the one and only piece of purple gold leaf on his person, he slammed his hand on the counter-top and ordered loudly, "Storekeeper, bring me ten Spirit Pills!"
他审问的对象，是一名看上去四十多岁的中年人，虽然眼睛已经肿了起来，不过在场魔法师中记性不错的，大多都还认得这中年人是谁。
He was interrogating a middle-aged man who appeared to be in his forties. His eyes were swollen, but the mages present who had good memory mostly recognized this middle-aged man.
他家院门被一名穿着粗布长裙的少女跌跌撞撞的撞开了，那少女满脸的惊慌，一冲进来就大叫起来：“江逸少爷，江逸少爷！快出来，你家小奴被人打了，你还不去，怕是她命都没了……”

His yard's door had been slammed open by a young lady wearing a dress made of rough sackcloth. Her face was panic-stricken and the moment she charged in, she shouted, "Young Master Jiang Yi, Young Master Jiang Yi! Quick, come out, your Xiaonu is being beaten up! You had better come quickly before she loses her life…"
他小心翼翼的将这丝黑色元力运转到左手的手少阴心经内，再缓缓运转丹田内的江水诀元力，朝左手涌去。
He carefully transferred the black essence force to the Shaoyin meridian in his left hand before slowly circulating the Jiang Water Art in his dantian and also sending it to his left hand.
他屈身将小奴背上就大步朝屋子外冲去，准备直接从后院逃走。只要回到江家，这风月楼的人就算胆子再大也不敢去闹事的，怎么说江家是天羽城五大家族之一。

He bent down, lifted Xiaonu onto his back and charged out of the room with wide strides. He planned to escape from the backyard. Once he returned to the Jiang Clan, the people from Fengyue Brothel would not dare to cause a fuss in the family grounds no matter how gutsy they were. After all, the Jiang Clan was one of the top five great family clans in the Skyplume City.
他左眼中黑光一闪，这个世界再次变样了，一切都变得那么清晰，而且……似乎时间真的变慢了。他看到眼前那只手掌还在拍来，不过速度明显慢了几倍，他还看到那护卫察觉到脚上的小奴，左脚一动正准备运转元力一把将小奴踹飞出去。

A flash of darkness flickered in his left eye as everything in his vision became very clear and vivid, as though the world had changed once again. On top of that… it seemed as though time had indeed slowed down.
He observed the palm in front of his eyes still in the midst of slapping downwards, but moving at a speed several times slower than before. He also witnessed that guard realizing that Xiaonu was on his leg, and that his left leg was in the process of moving as he got ready to transfer his essence force there for a strong kick that would send Xiaonu flying.
他左眼此刻视力变得恐怖，连带时间似乎也变慢了几分，所以他能轻松的看清楚对方手掌扫动的轨迹。也就能提前判断躲避开去，并且……寻找角度攻击！

The vision of his left eye changed an obscene amount, to the point that even time seemed to have slowed by several moments. As such, he was able to see clearly and with much ease the trajectory of the sweeping motion of his opponent's palms. This meant that he could determine in advance how to avoid the blow and, on top of that, even find the right angle to counter-attack!
他已经不记得，加洛斯魔法公会有多久没这么热闹过了，最近二十年来，魔法公会虽然还是加洛斯城第一势力，但明眼人都知道，这只不过是因为最高议会的存在，如果失去了最高议会的支持，这个第一势力在瞬间就会分崩离析。

He no longer remembered how long it had been since the Jarrosus City had been so astir. For the last twenty years, the Guild of Magic had been the top influence in Jarrosus City. But those with discerning eyes knew that it was only because the Supreme Council still existed. Without the support of the Supreme Council, the guild would have fallen apart in an instant.
他强烈抑制内心的激动，运转那缕丹田外的黑色元力环绕在龙形封印上。让他狂喜的不能自己的是——黑色元力开始缓缓消失，在龙形封印上的一枚符文也缓缓的消融，最终在黑色元力完全消耗后，符文再次少了一枚！

He strongly controlled the excitement in his heart and tried to circulate the strand of black essence force outside his dantian to surround the dragon seal. What left him in complete ecstasy was that as the black essence force gradually disappeared, a runic character on the dragon-shaped seal slowly dissipated as well. In the end, when the black essence force was completely consumed, the runic pattern had once again lost a single character!
他强装的镇定，很快在黄裳小姐走进来后消失殆尽了，他扫了一眼这少女后目光立即移不开去了。江家有很多漂亮小姐，大小姐二小姐也长得人比花俏，但此刻和这黄裳小姐相比就感觉鲜花绿叶般，根本不是一个档次。

The calm demeanour he put on quickly disappeared to nothingness after the young lady dressed in yellow walked into the booth. Upon giving this young lady a glance, his gaze froze immediately. There were many pretty ladies in the Jiang Clan. The Eldest Young Mistress and the Second Young Mistress were as beautiful as flowers. However, at that moment, in comparison with this young lady wearing yellow robes, it was akin to comparing between fresh flowers and green leaves - they were at two completely different levels.
他很后悔自己为什么要追进落日山脉，如果不追进落日山脉的话，就不会遇到利维坦猩猩，不遇到利维坦猩猩，自己就不会丢下伊娜一个人落荒而逃，追求伊娜的方法有很多，可自己却偏偏选了最笨的一条路。

He had utterly regretted chasing into the Sunset Mountains. He would not have encountered the Leviathan Gorilla if he had not entered the Sunset Mountains, and he would not have fled without taking Ina with him. There were many ways to win Ina's heart, but he had chosen the stupidest one.
他很快就反应过来，顿时恼羞成怒，他竟被一个小孩子吓到了？当下抬手就是一拳，朝江逸冲去。

He responded very quickly to Jiang Yi; his shame immediately turning to rage. How could he be frightened off by just a small child? He raised his hand at once, posed in the shape of a fist, and swung it in the direction of Jiang Yi.
他很清楚今日要想安然无恙的下山，只有拿下江如虎威慑众人，他的黑色元力已经用了三缕，一旦完全消耗干净就只能坐以待毙了。

He was well aware that if he wanted to come out of the Western Hills completely unscathed that day, he had no other option but to take down Jiang Ruhu and thereby deter the rest from attacking. He had already used up three wisps of his black essence forces. Once he completely consumed all of his black essence forces, he would have no other ending but be resigned to being hit to death.
他很清楚的记得，自己第一次瞬发低级法术，是三十岁，刚刚成为一名魔导士的时候。
He remembered very clearly; when he first performed his low-levelled spell, he was thirty years old and had just became a mage.
他心神一动，立即快速运转一缕黑色元力和经脉内的蓝色元力融合，朝左眼角的经脉运转而去。

With that thought, he hastily transferred a wisp of black essence force to his meridians, merging it with the blue essence force within them before circulating them towards the meridian at the corner of his left eye.
他忘记了一点，他的双手此刻被江逸的缠丝手缠住了，他脚步一退双手又被缠住的，身体重心自然就不稳了，身子一晃差点摔倒，这下心神完全慌了。

He forgot that both his hands were entangled in Jiang Yi's Silk Hands. He tried to take a step back but his hands were still entangled, resulting in him being thrown off his center of gravity and losing his balance, almost falling down with a shake of his body. At this moment his mind was completely flustered.
他快速转身，不退反进，双腿朝前方滑去，身子却突然后仰，双手如两根海藻般朝江松的双手缠去。有这黑色元力辅助，他能轻松判断出对方的攻击轨迹和速度，从而提前判断，躲避，回击。

He hastily turned around, not retreating but moving forward instead. With both legs aimed to the front, he slipped forward. However, his body suddenly bent back while both his hands moved in the direction of Jiang Song's hands and coiled around them like two pieces of seaweed. With the aid of black essence force, he could easily determine the opponent's attack trajectory and speed, and in turn use this information to judge, avoid or counter-attack in advance.
他怎么也想不明白，事情为什么是这个样子……
He could not comprehend how things had become like this...
他怎么也没有想到，让麦格雷尼陷入沉睡的，竟然是黄昏诅咒。
Never had he thought that it was the Twilight Curse that had put McGrenn to sleep.
他怎么也没有想到，这世界上竟然有林立这种怪物。
He would never have imagined there'd been such a monstrous character like Lin Li in the world.
他想弄清楚，自己以往的经验，在这个世界是不是同样适用。
He wanted to find out whether his past experiences could be applied in this world.
他想起这个月丹药还没领，连忙爬起来胡乱整理了一下衣裳朝外面走去，一边走一边活动了左臂，发现伤势虽然没昨天那么严重了，不过还在隐隐作痛。

He remembered that the elixir for that month had not been received. He hurriedly got out of bed and absent-mindedly tidied up his robes before heading outside. As he walked, he moved his left shoulder, noticing that, while the conditions of his wound were not as serious as the day before, it was still stinging with pain.
他慌忙爬起来，揭开炉盖一扫却苦笑不停，里面的两枚废丹……全炸了！

He hastily got up and opened the cauldron lid, giving the interior a glance. However, he could not help but laugh bitterly without stopping. The two useless elixirs in the cauldron... had complextely exploded to smithereens!
他放下灵神丹盘坐入定，三个多时辰后准时清醒过来，立即吞服了一枚灵神丹，开始转修江水决。

He put down his Spirit Pills, sat cross-legged and started meditating. After more than six hours, he woke up punctually and, after immediately swallowing a Spirit Pill, started to practice the Jiang Water Art technique.
他整整图谋了六千六百年，只为进入天庭的这一天！
He had conspired for 6600 years just for this day, the day he would enter the Heavenly Court!
他无论如何也没想到，在葛瑞安最危险的时候，林立说出的竟然是这么一句话。
Never had he expected Lin Li to say such a thing when Gerian was at the most dangerous of times.
他既然主动提起了这件事，那心里面肯定早就有了打算。
Since he had brought this up voluntarily, he had to have a plan in mind.
他早早运转一缕黑色元力去了眼中，马飞那把剑刺来的速度和轨迹他预算得清清楚楚，自然不会傻乎乎的朝他拳头砸去。

Jiang Yi had already transferred a wisp of black essence force to his eyes earlier, and could hence clearly predict the speed and trajectory of Ma Fei's sword. He certainly was not foolish enough to take it on with his fist.
他是江家子弟，万一给人看到他进出聚珍阁，还是去卖丹药！这很容易给人怀疑他偷炼丹房内的丹药出来卖的，所以他不得不小心些。

He is a descendant of the Jiang Clan. What if someone spotted him going into the Pearl Gathering Pavilion and, moreover, going to selling elixirs! This would easily raise people's suspicions of him stealing the elixirs from the alchemy lab and selling them outside. As such, he had to be more careful.
他暗暗告诉自己要镇定，抬头望着那管事，漠然说道：“你要什么说法？”
He silently told himself to remain calm. He raised his head to look at the housekeeper and coldly asked, "How do you want to settle this?"
他曾经想过是葛瑞安自己，也想过是年近三十的凯文，甚至还想过翡翠高塔内众多年纪老迈，却始终表现平庸的魔法师，可是他却绝没有想过，那人竟会是这个看起来还不满二十岁的年轻魔法师！

He had once thought it might be Gerian himself, or Kevin who was near his thirties. He had even thought it might be the mages outside the Emerald Tower, those who were well stricken in years but were average in their performance. But he had never expected it would be a young mage not even over the age of 20!
他最近确实在烦这件事，自从配出奥法药剂之后，葛瑞安就一直在缠他，要他无论如何，也要弄出一些药剂来增强公会魔法师的实力，当时林立考虑了一下，也觉得很有点必要，如今魔法公会虽然已经彻底崛起，但影响力也只在加洛斯城内。

He had been really vexed by it lately. Ever since he had concocted the Arcane Magic Potion, Gerian had been pestering him to come up with some other potions no matter how to enhance the strength of the mages in the Guild of Magic. Lin Li had given it some thought at that time and felt it necessary as well. Although the Guild of Magic had ultimately risen, its influence was contained only in Jarrosus City.
他有些奇怪的四处张望，却看见刚刚还跟他聊得分外投机的同僚，此时却一个个都离自己远远的，看那提心吊胆的表情，就好象生怕被瘟疫传染上了似的……

He looked around in puzzlement, only to see his colleagues who had been chatting amicably with him just a moment ago were all far away from him now. The expressions of fear on their faces were as if they were afraid of getting infected by the plague...
他此刻经脉内的元力全是由江水诀形成的蓝色，再无一丝黑色存在。
At this moment, his meridians were all filled with blue essence force from the Jiang Water Art; not a sliver of black essence force remained.
他沉吟一会，放下江如虎的腿，抬腿对着江如虎血肉模糊的脑袋踩去，身子凑过去，压低声音说道：“江如虎，你可知道我现在是什么境界？你可知道我为何能一拳砸飞江如鹰？你可知道为何我敢如此对你？实话告诉你把，我就是想把事情闹大，让整个江家都知道……我江逸不是废物！你们才是废物！”

He muttered deeply to himself for a moment, before letting go of Jiang Ruhu's leg. He raised his own leg and stepped down onto Jiang Ruhu's badly mutilated head. Moving his body close to Jiang Ruhu, he lowered his voice and quietly said, "Jiang Ruhu, do you know what power level in the Cast Tripod Realm I am at right now? Do you know how I was able to sned Jiang Ruying flying with just a single punch? Do you know why I dare to do this to you? To tell you the truth, I want to make things big, and let the entire Jiang Clan know that... I, Jiang Yi, am not a useless good-for-nothing! You guys are the good-for-nothing wastrels!"
他沉吟了一阵，最终下定决心弄一弄，抵押在风月楼那块令牌，如一把悬浮在他头上的利剑般压得他透不过气来……

He heaved a deep sigh for a moment before finally making up his mind to give it a shot. The command token he had given to the Fengyue Brothel as collateral was etched in his mind like a sharp sword floating over his head, pressuring and stressing him out until he could not breathe...
他沉吟了一阵，调集了一缕黑色元力去辅助疗伤，等那缕黑色元力消耗完后，他才连忙打坐运转无名功法。

He muttered to himself for a short moment before collecting a strand of black essence force to facilitate the healing of the wound. Only after consuming that strand of black essence force did he hastily sit cross-legged to work on the nameless cultivation technique again.
他沉喝一声，拳头幻化出三个拳影，分别朝江如虎的脑袋，左肩，小腹砸去。
He shouted deeply and loudly as his fists transformed into three fist-like silhouette images, with each individually hitting in the direction of Jiang Ruhu's head, left shoulder and lower abdomen.
他沉默了很久，再次问道：“杨管事，如果我和你们合作，是否就……失去了自由之身？”
He remained silent for a very long time, before finally asking once again, "Manager Yang, if I work with you, will I... lose my freedom?"
他爆喝一声，元力从掌心运转而出，那把青色的短剑立即青光大盛，寒意逼人，他化掌为爪，那把短剑竟在他手心快速旋转起来，朝江逸拳头直刺而去。

Ma Fei roared, essence force flowing out from his palm. The teal-colored sword immediately shone even brighter, emitting a chilling aura. He drew his hand into a claw; the short sword began spinning rapidly on his palm before piercing through the air, aiming directly at Jiang Yi's fist.
他爽是爽了，可就在他爽到极点的时候，却忽然看见林立抬起了右手。
He was satisfied, but just as his satisfaction reached the fullest, he saw Lin Li lifting his right hand.
他猛然醒悟过来，吓得差点魂飞魄散。在他现在这个阶段，不同属性的元力是绝对不能同时运转的，否则一旦冲撞起来，不同属性元力在体内絮乱暴动的话，他全身经脉和血脉都有可能因此爆掉……

He abruptly realised his mistake and was scared out of his wits. In the condition he was in right now, essence force of different elements couldn’t be circulated together at the same time, otherwise they would clash and create disorder in the body. The meridians and blood vessels in his body would simply explode from the collisions…
他猜测自己绝对不是什么狗屁灵体，自己修炼如此之慢是因为那个鬼封印的缘故。他能拥有如此变态的反应能力，也不是灵体之缘故，而黑色元力能让他视力变得极其恐怖，能让和他对练的武者武技快速大成，也很有可能是因为这黑色元力的缘故。

He guessed that he himself was certainly not some silly superpower soul, and he knew that the reason why his own cultivation speed was that slow was due to that damned seal. The fact that he possessed such obscenely powerful ability to react was not caused by his soul, but his black essence forces that allowed his ability of sight to become horrendously powerful; that the combat abilities of the martial artists that sparred with him were able to improve so quickly, was also very likely a result of using that black essence force.
他现在关心的，是揣在安度因怀里的那块安眠水晶。
Instead, that piece of Hypnotic Crystal in Andoine's arms was all that he cared about now.
他现在恨不得每时每刻都修炼，恨不得一天之内就把那封印解开了，看看他的修炼速度是否能如大长老估计般，比大少爷江恨水还要快？不说比江恨水快，就算比他慢上一丝，江逸也有信心凭借黑色元力，让自己实力突飞猛涨。

He itched to spend every available second of his time refining essence force and wished with all his heart that he could break that seal within a single day. He wanted to see if his refining speed was indeed faster than that of Great Young Master Jiang Henshui, as the grand elder predicted?
To say nothing of being faster than Jiang Henshui, even if he were slower than Jiang Henshui by just a smidgen, Jiang Yi was confident that he could borrow the power of the black essence force and allow his own abilities to advance by leaps and bounds.
他现在正小心的计算着药剂分量，自从掌握恐惧药剂配方之后，他这还是第一次真正配制，操作起来难免会更加谨慎一些。
