He was meticulously calculating the dose of the potion now. This was the first time he’d actually concocted the Fear Potion since he had gotten hold of the formula, so he was naturally more prudent in the process.
他现在正蹲在狮蝎尸体旁，很有兴趣的研究着那支倒勾。
He was crouching next to the body of the Manticore, studying its inverted hook with interest.
他现在的心情很复杂，有懊悔也有不甘，但更多的，却是对林立的憎恨。
His emotions were complicated as he was remorseful yet indignant. But more than that he felt hatred towards Lin Li.
他现在能做的，仅仅是勉强坚持。
What he could do now was to hang on and persevere.
他甚至可以理解这种性格，自以为是本来就是美女的专利，更何况罗琳身为城主千金。
He could even understand that such character was a privilege of a beauty, not to mention that Rowling was the daughter of the Castellan.
他甚至觉得这一切都是林立计划好的，这个该死的魔法师早就有了跟自己争夺伊娜的心思，所以才会在那个时候出现在落日山脉。

He had even come to believe that these were all part of Lin Li's plan. This damned mage already had the thoughts of competing for Ina, and that was why he had appeared in the Sunset Mountains at that very moment.
他的意思很明显，江逸在这，他不方面下手偷药……
His intentions were obvious: with Jiang Yi around, it was not convenient for him to grab the herbs as he pleased…
他的感觉果然没错，在将那块五颜六色的画布扯开之后，林立很快就在一堆玻璃珠中，找到了一枚戒指。
His feeling was right. After tearing the colorful canvas away, Lin Li quickly found a ring among the pile of glass beads.
他的拳头又一次没入到青石板下面的土里。
His fist did not reach the ground below the limestone slab again.
他的拳头顷刻间化作三道残影，给人感觉他的拳头这一刻分成了三个般，每个都无比真实，分别对着冲进来的那护卫的左肩，右肩，脑门砸去。

His fist instantly transformed into three phantom shadows, giving an illusion that his fist had split into three, each no different from the real one. He smashed the fists into the attacking guard's left shoulder, right shoulder, and forehead.
他的话完全代表了在场众人的心神，除了妖孽这个词之外，他们再想不出其他词来形容这个年轻魔法师了。
His words were a complete representation of the crowd’s thoughts. Other than a demon, no one could come up with another word to describe the young mage.
他目光一冷，朝左边的小树林内扫去，暗道难道是江如虎等人来堵他了？
He froze his gaze and swept his gaze towards the small forest to his left. He muttered to himself and wondered if it were Jiang Ruhu and his gang of cronies who had come here to block him.
他目光在偏厅内一扫，看到左边墙边书柜上有很多书册，连忙走过去查看起来。很快他找到了一本关于药草简介的书籍，里面竟还有简易的图画，立即大喜的捧着书册朝药材房内走去，准备对着书册取出柳长老所需的药草。

He swept a glance across the side room and saw many booklets on the bookshelf next to the left-side wall. He quickly walked over to check them out. He quickly found a book containing summaries and brief introductions to various medicinal herbs, as well as some simple-to-understand pictures inside. Delighted, he immediately carried the book over to the ingredient storage room, prepared to cross-reference with the book and retrieve the medicinal ingredients required by Elder Liu.
他目光在广场上一扫，突然被广场北方的一座宏伟大殿吸引了，主要是此刻大殿外围满了人，很是热闹，让他有些好奇。

He swept his eyes across the city plaza and was suddenly attracted by a huge, imposing grand hall to the north of the plaza. What caught his eye was that the grand hall was surrounded by throngs of people. This atmosphere was very noisy and exciting, which made him somewhat curious.
他看了看屋子里已经变得惨不忍睹的地面，失笑着摇摇头转身跃出屋门，来到后院站定，将一丝黑色元力输送到右脚的足少阴肾经处，对着地面一块青石板踩下。

Looking at the terrible state of the room, Jiang Yi shook his head and walked out to the back yard. He channeled a sliver of black essence force into his right foot and stomped down on a limestone slab on the ground.
他看到江恨水虽然面色微微变幻了一下，却没有出声阻拦，更别说训斥了，内心更加黯然了。原本孩童时和江恨水结下的一丝情谊也烟消云散了，他自嘲的笑了笑，弯身拱手道：“江逸拜见大少爷。”

Jiang Yi sighed in his heart. When he saw Jiang Henshui's face slightly change color, yet say absolutely nothing to stop Jiang Ruhu or even chide him, Jiang Yi felt sad.
The threads of friendship he had formed with Jiang Henshui when they were children seemed to have disappeared completely. Smiling in self-mockery, he bent down in a bow, cupped his hands and said, "Jiang Yi greets Great Young Master."
他看到江逸当着他的面断了江如虎的腿，顿时睁目欲裂，浑身杀气如虹，双腿一瞪整个人如一头疯牛般横冲直撞而来。

Witnessing Jiang Yi breaking Jiang Ruhu's leg, his eyes instantly broke wide opened as a killing aura cloaked his body. With a burst of his leg muscle, his entire body rushed towards Jiang Yi like a frenzied bull.
他睁开眼睛大笑起来，笑着笑着又开始流泪，整个人疯子般完全不能自己了。多年的压抑，多年的苦闷，在这一刻似乎完全发泄了出来。

He opened his eyes and started laughing aloud. Despite this, he shed tears as he laughed. It was as if he had gone mad. So many years of cruel oppression, so many years of bitter depression. At that moment, he could finally and completely release it all.
他知道自己已经输了，而且还输得无比憋屈。
He knew that he had lost, and he had lost utterly.
他确实没受什么伤害，但其中的过程细细想来，却是不由有些暗自心惊。
It was true he was unhurt. But the thought of the whole process unnerved him.
他终于静下心来，聚精会神地运转江水诀疗伤。
He was finally able to calm himself down enough to focus all his attention on circulating essence energy with the Jiang Water Art to heal his injuries.
他绝不能死，也不能伤，否则在床上躺上半月，风月楼找上门来，小奴就危险了。所以今日他必须赢，至少要毫发无损的走下西山。

He must not wind up dead or severely injured; otherwise should he end up lying in bed for half an entire month, Xiaonu would be in danger should people from the Fengyue Brothel come to find them directly. As such, he had to win that day at all cost, or at least leave the Western Hills completely unscathed.
他老人家现在怀揣一块安眠水晶，正巴不得立刻飞回奥兰纳，找个珠宝匠帮他雕刻出一只药剂瓶来，又哪还有心思在树林里浪费时间？

With a Hypnotic Crystal in his arms, the old man was itching to fly back to Alanna immediately to ask a jeweler carve for him a potion bottle. How would he have the mood to waste his time away in a forest?
他脑海一转，内心已经猜到了几分，估计这几天他没出江家大院，所以江如虎没办法截他，这才怂恿江恨水来炼丹房。有江恨水在，他就算动手了，刑堂也会给江恨水面子当做不知道的……

His mind raced as he guessed what had happened in his heart. He estimated that, as he had not left the central courtyard over the past few days, Jiang Ruhu was unable to intercept him and had no choice but to encourage Jiang Henshui to go to the alchemy lab with him.
With Jiang Henshui around, even if he did attack Jiang Yi, the disciplinary court would give Jiang Henshui face and pretend to not know what had happened...
他脑海内又浮现那个美丽得让人窒息的黄裳少女，却很快摇了摇头，那个什么学院招生在即，姬听雨既然和江恨水般去武殿闭关了，短时间内肯定不会出来的。

That breathtakingly beautiful young girl in a yellow dress emerged in his mind again. However, he quicly shook his head, rememebering that with that college imminently about to recruit new students, since Ji Tingyu would have gone into seclusion at the Martial Arts Hall like his relative Jiang Henshui, she would certainly not be out and about in the near future.
他脑海内莫名出现一部无名功法，修炼出变态的黑色元力，如此诡异的事情他根本就不想所有人知道。最重要的是柳长老的死，让他有种淡淡的忧虑，生怕家族牵连重罚他，一名炼丹师对于一个小家族可是至关重要的。

That a nameless martial arts technique mysteriously appeared in his mind, a technique which could refine the obscenely powerful black essence force - such a bizarre circumstance was something he had absolutely no desire of letting everyone find out. Most importantly, Elder Liu's death had left him with a stinge of anxious concern. He was scared that the Family clan would implicate and severely punish him. After all, an aclhemist was vitally important to a small family clan.
他脚步一滑，快速朝后面退去，但对方是铸鼎境六重武者速度何等的快？身子一闪已经贴了上来，那掌刀划破长空朝江逸的脖子切来。

Jiang Yi's steps quickly swept backwards, but the speed of a martial artist at the sixth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm was unbelievably fast. Yi Longyu's figure flickered and the materialized near Jiang Yi in an instant, his knifehand sliced through the air and about to strike Jiang Yi's neck.
他脸上虽然没有任何情绪波动，但内心苦涩不已——这管事算是戳中了他的死穴了，一个月他要是拿不出钱，这风月楼一上门，江家刑堂肯定会打断他和江小奴的腿……

His face revealed no great emotional change, but inside he felt extremely bitter—this housekeeper had hit him right on his Achilles' heel. If he could not deliver the money in a month's time, should the people from Fengyue Brothel pay the family a visit, the Jiang Clan’s Disciplinary Court would undoubtedly break both his and Jiang Xiaonu's legs...
他苦苦等待了六千六百年，只为坐在帝位上的那个人！
6600 years of bitter waiting, just for that man who sat on the throne!
他落寞的是，如此时刻他的娘亲却不能看到，大长老也生死未卜，如果能亲眼看到他封印有希望解开那该有多少好啊。

What made him feel lonely was that at this moment his mother could not see him, while Grand Elder remained missing. He thought how good would it be.
If only they could see for themselves that there is hope of breaking the seal.
他被那铸鼎境三重护卫拍了一掌，尽管他用“摔碑手”挡了一下，但估计骨头被拍裂了，后面又强行动武加上走了这么长一段路伤口被触动，此刻痛得他额头冷汗直冒。

He was slapped by the guard at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Even though he blocked the attack with his Wrestling Hand, one could guess that his bones were shattered by the slap. Furthermore, he had to forcefully conduct martial arts techniques, not to mention the long route he had to walk home—all these irritated his wound, leaving him in so much agony that cold sweat kept rolling down his forehead.
他要继续修炼那梦中得到的无名口诀，提炼更多的黑色元力来研究！
He wanted to continue cultivating the nameless formula from his dream and extract more black essence force for research!
他要见姬听雨其实没特别重要的事，那一日他感觉姬听雨对他似乎有些看重？所以冒然的前来，想看看能不能找她借十两紫金先去风月楼赎回令牌！在他想来，身为姬家的小姐，聚珍阁如此富有，十两紫金对于她来说肯定是九牛一毛，却没想到她竟然不在。

In truth, he did not have any particularly important reason for wanting to meet Ji Tingyu. That day, he felt that Ji Tingyu regarded him with some importance.
As such, he risked coming here, in the hopes of seeing if he could possibly find her and loan ten taels of purple gold so that he could return to the Fengyue Brothel and redeem his command token. From his point of view, being the young mistress of the Ji Family, and with the Pearl Gathering Pavilion being so successful, ten taels of gold would certainly be worth peanuts to her.
他走出练功外，却看到所有陪练看他的目光都如看怪物般，似乎很惊疑他能毫发无损走出来。

He walked out of the technique-practicing room, yet all he saw were the gazes of all the other sparring partners who were staring at him as if they had just seen a monstrous creature. It was as though they were truly shocked to see him walk out without a single injury.
他走进屋子内取出上次购买的那身黑袍，套在身上就匆忙出了院子，刚走出去数十丈，他脚步一顿猛然回头，看到远处一个拐角内一道身影一闪后，立即冷笑起来。

He walked into the house to retrieve the black robes he bought the previous time. Putting the robes on, he hastily dashed out of the courtyard of his house.
He had only left his house and walked for several tens of feet when he froze and suddenly turned his head around to look behind his back. Seeing the flash of a figure dart around a corner at a long distance away, he immediately gave a cold laugh.
他踏着迷幻步，不退反进朝前方冲了三尺距离，双膝猛然弯曲，身子后仰，整个人朝左前方滑去，轻松避过了翊凌雪的攻击。

He used his Psychedelic Step technique and, instead of retreating, ran in a forward direction for a metre before suddenly bending his knees and bending his back backwards. This allowed his whole body so slide in the direction of his forward left-hand side, easuly avoiding Yi Lingxue's incoming attacks.
他身子从地上一跃而起，一个箭步就朝江豹冲去，人在半路一条腿如蛇鞭般扭动，化作残影朝江豹的身子重重的扫去。
He jumped up from the ground and pounced at Jiang Bao. His leg slithered like a snake whip and swept towards the pathetic figure of Jiang Bao, leaving behind various afterimages.
他身子应声被拍飞出去，重重的撞在了墙上，还连带着把小奴也给推到在地。
Jiang Yi’s body flew up and slammed heavily into the wall, taking Xiaonu down to the floor with him.
他运转了黑色融合元力的右手提前朝左上角移动了一丝，轻松避过了对方的手掌，化爪为手刀，对着他的腕骨狠狠切去！

He moved a thread of the combined black essence force, circulating around his right hand, towards the direction of his upper left corner. As such he easily avoided his opponent's palm. Manifesting his fingers like claws and using them in a knife-hand strike, he viciously moved his right hand downwards in a chopping move towards his opponent's wrist!
他还从来没有见过，有哪个势力一次拿出这么多的奥法药剂，就连药剂师公会，也从来没这么大手笔过，在听到这个消息的时候，向来喜怒不形于色的马修斯－梅林，当场就激动得将手里的酒杯给摔了。

He had never seen any force taking out so many bottles of Arcane Magic Potion at once. Even the Pharmacists Guild had never been so generous. When he’d first heard the news, Matthew Merlin, who had never let his feelings show, was so excited that he dropped his wine glass on the spot.
他这也是无奈之举，没有高级丹药依靠他的修炼速度，短时间内根本不可能修炼到铸鼎境二重，敢上西山只有爬着回来。那一日他和江如虎约定十天后西门外见，就是打定主意准备借助高级丹药配合黑色元力快速修炼的……

However, he committed his act without any other options. Without high-quality elixirs and depending solely on his cultivation speed, he could never practice and reach the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm within a short amount of time.
Should he ever dare to head up the Western Hills, he would have no other future than crawling back home. He arranged to face Jiang Ruhu ten days later at the Western Gate with the predetermined intention of borrowing the power of high-quality elixirs coupled with the black essence force to speedily increase his power...
他这倔脾气一上来，哪管你红发美女黑发美女，一脚蹬开椅子就往宴会大厅中央走去。
As soon as his obstinacy acted up, he had no care whether it was a black-haired beauty or a red-haired beauty. He kicked his chair aside and walked towards the center of the banquet hall.
他连忙从怀中掏出一个绿色的小瓷瓶，倒出一枚绿色元力丹吞服下去，立即盘坐入定起来。

He hastily retrieved a small green porcelain vase from within his robes. He poured out a single green essence force pill, which he swallowed. Upon doing this, he immediately sat cross-legged to begin meditating.
他连忙闭上眼睛，再次睁开，眼前的画面却依然清晰。换个角度，只见远处昏暗的角落内，一只米粒大的爬虫，它的背上有七个黑点，它爬走的动作缓慢如蜗牛……

He quickly shut his eyes and opened them again; the scene in front was just as distinct and clear as before. Turning his head, he gazed at the dark corner far away. A bug as big as a grain of rice was crawling slowly like a snail. It had seven black spots on its back…
他连续不停的质问起来，每问一声就抡起江如虎的身子朝地面砸一下，这几轮乱砸之下，江如虎顿时头破血流，脑袋也被砸晕了，惨叫声都没有了，口鼻也只有入气没有出气了……

He continuously questioned without stopping, with each question being followed by him swinging Jiang Ruhu's body and smashing it onto the ground. As a result of these few rounds of random ground-smashing, Jiang Ruhu immediately started bleeding from the wounds on his head. He had also fainted from the multiple crashes onto the ground - the cries of agony had stopped, while there were only acts of breathing-in through his mouth and nose, without any act of breathing-out at all...
他选择魔法的标准，往往只有两个要求，第一是咒语长度要短，第二是元素结构要简单。
He had only two criteria when it came to choosing the magic books. One, the spell had to be short; two, the magical elements had to be simple.
他遇见熟人了，而且还是两个！
He met people he was familiar with, and not just one person but two!
他需要一点时间去验证，看看这个年轻魔法师是不是真象安度因所说的那样，在药剂学上同样是一个天才。
He needed some time to verify whether this young mage was really a genius in pharmaceutics as what Andoine had said.
他，真的不是废物。
He, was not a good-for-nothing.
以上几个条件，是绝对的缺一不可，若是稍有偏差，黑莲花就算勉强长出来，也会在极短的时间内枯萎掉。
All the conditions mentioned above were indispensable. Should there be any slight variance, the black lotus would wither away in the shortest of time even if it barely managed to grow.
以他在无尽世界中的财富地位，可以说是呼风唤雨无所不能，偏偏一个黑莲花，一个深邃之银，他是想方设法都弄不上手。
With his wealth and status in the Endless World, he could do anything he wanted. But it was the black lotus and deep silver that he couldn't get even after trying everything possible.
以前怎么没看出来，葛瑞安还有当交际花的天赋，刚刚还说自己跟这位城主大人没什么交情，这才转了一圈回来，就升级成“葛瑞安叔叔”了！

How could he not have seen before that Gerian had the talent of being a social butterfly? Earlier on, he had said that he had no relations with the castellan, but after turning a circle back, he had been upgraded to "Uncle Gerian"!
以前的林立虽然天赋超人，更拥有药剂师这一隐藏的身份，但当他站在自己面前的时候，凯文却从未有过无法抗衡的感觉，甚至在某些方面，凯文还觉得自己比这个年轻魔法师要稍胜一筹。

Although Lin Li was a gifted superman and possessed the hidden identity of a pharmacist, Kevin never felt unable to contend with the former when he stood in front of him. Kevin even felt he was better than the young mage in some ways.
以前跟凯文打过几次交道的克伦威尔知道，如果说加洛斯魔法公会还有一个老实人的话，那这个人必定就是眼前的凯文，在克伦威尔想来，老实人总是比较好说话的。

Cromwell, who had dealings with Kevin several times before, knew that if there was an honest person left in the Jarrosus Guild of Magic, it would definitely be Kevin. In Cromwell's mind, it was much easier to talk to an honest person.
以后？什么以后？
Future? What future?
以宁神花为主要材料配出的奥法药水虽然效果不错，但这种草药其实生长环境并不苛刻，说白一点完全就是随便乱长，只要是有山有水的地方，就一定有宁神花的影子。

Although using peacebloom as the main ingredient of the Arcane Magic Potion produced fairly good effects, the growing environment of these herbs was not at all harsh. Simply put, they could grow anywhere. As long as there were mountains and water, there would be peacebloom.
以往他遇到江恨水都会远远的躲开，避免尴尬，此刻既然遇到了，也只能勉强笑道：“恨水，好久不见。”

Usually, when he saw Jiang Henshui, Jiang Yi would try to hide or move far away from him to avoid awkwardness between them. At that moment, since the two had met eyes, Jiang Yi had no choice but to force a smile and greet him by saying, "Henshui, long time no see."
以愿望卷轴那近乎无穷无尽的力量，都没能让他直接进入神匠领域，就是因为这个境界本身就已经超越了知识与技术的范畴，这更多的是一种玄妙的境界，所谓的“技近乎道”，大概就是指的这样一种境界。

The near-infinite power of the Scroll of Wishes hadn't allowed him to enter directly into the realm of the Divine Smith, because the realm itself transcended the scope of knowledge and skills. This was more of an abstruse realm, and the phrase "a skill approaching the practice of Tao" was most likely referring to such a dimension.
以林立的经验，野钢花长得最茂盛的地方，多半就能找到幽灵草。
Lin Li's experience told him that the ghostskins were more likely to be found where the wild steelbloom flourished best.
以梅林家族如今的势力，若是再突然多出三十名五级以上的魔法师来……想到这里，马修斯仿佛看到了家族辉煌的未来……
With the Merlin Family influence now, should there be another 30 mages beyond level-five… At the thought of this, Matthew could almost see the glorious future of the family...
以梦境之铁锻造点金棒，可能会为装备带来魔法驱散效果。
Forging the gold rod with dream iron might bring magical dispelling effects to the equipment.
以永恒精金的元素稳定性，用来给希恩这个野蛮人锻造一套装备，那可真是在适合不过了……
It could not be more suitable to forge a set of gear for barbarian Sheehan with elementally stable Eternal Adamantine.
以深渊秘银锻造点金棒，能让装备拥有更高的魔法抗性。
Forging the gold rod with the abyss mithril would allow the equipment to possess a higher resistance to magic.
以符文精金锻造点金棒，能够大幅度强化元素属性。
Forging the gold rod with rune's adamantine would greatly enhance the element attributes.
以罗琳在药剂学上的造诣，已经完全无法跟上两人的思维，桌上列出的那一条条公式对她来说，简直就仿佛天书一般，但罗琳却知道格林爷爷是什么人，那可是大师级水准的人物，甚至在药剂师公会内部，也绝对可以算得上是最重要的人之一。

Rowling's pharmaceutical attainments had completely failed to keep up with their thinking. The equations listed down on the table were like Greek to her. But Rowling knew what kind of figure Grandpa Grimm was. He was someone of a mastery level, and even within the Pharmacists Guild, he was considered one of the most important members.
以老梅林大魔导士之尊，依旧派出了克伦威尔低调示好，甚至不惜送上了家族秘藏的四条十四级咒语。
For an archmage like Old Merlin, he had sent Cromwell to convey their good intentions, and had even presented four level-fourteen spells that had been in their family hoard.
以老梅林的睿智，又如何看不出来，拥有了药剂师的魔法公会，必将一统加洛斯城，未来的加洛斯众多势力中，绝对是魔鬼法公会一家独大的局面。

How could Old Merlin not see with that wisdom of his that the Guild of Magic with its own pharmacist would eventually unify the whole of Jarrosus City? Of the many forces in Jarrosus City, the Guild of Magic would definitely be dominating in the future.
以至于一根镀上了深邃之银的点金棒，竟还只能用十二级魔晶这种低级货色。
As a result, he could only use materials as low-grade as level-twelve magical crystals even for his deep silver-coated gold rod.
以至于当林立掌握的低级魔法达到十个之后，安度因就再不敢教他任何新的魔法了，他开始让林立不断的练习那十种元素排列方式。
Andoine ceased teaching any new magic skills when Lin Li had mastered the tenth elementary magic. Instead, he got him to practice the sequencing of the ten elements.
以葛瑞安为中心辐射开来的，是一股丝毫不逊色于老梅林里的强大气息。
A powerful aura—as powerful as that of Old Merlin—radiated from Gerian.
以赤练毒蛇为药引，在黑砂中磨练，练成后中招者心脉滞涩如中赤练剧毒，肉体溃烂如被铁砂贯穿，是一门可以速成的人阶中品功法。

The attack used red-band poisonous snakes as a medicinal ingredient, which was subsequently tempered in black sand. After tempering, anyone who received the attack would suffer from slow blood circulation and lag like one had received red-band poisoning. Their physical body would fester like it was penetrated through by multiple metallic pellets. This was a Man-tier medial-grade attack that could be achieved instantly.
以麦格雷尼的身体素质，居然也衰弱到了这种程度，要知道麦格雷尼可是六级以上的战士，身体素质比一般人强了十倍还不止。
McGrenn's physical condition had actually weakened to this extent. He was a warrior above level-six, and his physical quality was ten times stronger than an average person’s.
任何一个药剂师，都拥有藐视这一切的资格。
Every pharmacist had the rights to look down upon all of these.
任何一个魔法师都知道，持续时间常达二十八分钟的魔力输出究竟意味着什么，除了少数引导类法术之外，大多数魔法需要的都只是瞬间爆发力，也就是说，只就在施法的瞬间，才需要输出魔力，一分钟的持续输出，换成瞬间爆发至少有上百次之多，凡人的精神力毕竟有限，就算是葛瑞安这样顶尖的魔法师，在晋阶大魔导士时，也仅仅保持了五分钟的持续输出。

Any mage would know what it meant to have a magic output that lasted up to twenty-eight minutes. Most spells, with the exception of a few guidance spells, required only an instantaneous burst of energy. In other words, it was only at the moment of unleashing spells that magic output was needed. A minute of continuous output could be converted into at least a hundred times instantaneous bursts of power. The mental strength of a human was limited after all, even a top mage like Gerian could only maintain five minutes of magic output at the time he had been advancing to the Archmage.
任何人内心深处都藏着一些负面情绪，而恐惧药剂的作用，就是彻底引发这些负面情绪，并将它们无限度的放大，三种材料当中，梦魇草和恶魔之泪，都有着类似的效果，进行混合之后，这种效果更是会极大提升，而为了避免过度恐惧导致精神崩溃，又加入了一定分量的宁神花以镇定心神。

Any person would have some negative emotions hidden in his heart. The effect of the Fear Potion was to completely trigger these negative emotions and magnify them indefinitely. Among the three ingredients, the nightmare seed and devil's tears possessed a similar effect. After mixing them, the effect would be greatly enhanced. In order to avoid excessive fear leading to a mental breakdown, a certain amount of peacebloom was added to calm the mind.
任务内容也很简单，只需要找出城堡的准确位置。
The quest was also simple—they only had to find out the exact location of the castle.
伊娜回忆着落日山脉上的日子，罗琳却是连一句都没能听进去，她依旧沉浸在震撼当中。
Ina recalled the days in the Sunset Mountains, but Rowling could not hear a thing she said. She was still reeling in shock.
伊娜跟自己说话的时候，可从来没笑得这么灿烂过。
Ina had never laughed so brightly when she was talking to him.
众人仿佛已经看见，葛瑞安的眉头已经皱起来了。
Everyone seemed to see Gerian's frown.
众人内心一凛，暗暗点头，这龙哥是江如虎的亲哥江如龙，实力在家族年轻一代排名第二，已达到铸鼎境七重，最近和大少爷江恨水去武殿闭关了。要是他出关听说江如虎被打成这样，肯定会暴怒出手弄死江逸的。

The hearts of all the people around turned coldly stern as they silently nodded their heads. That "Brother Long" was none other than Jiang Ruhu's older brother Jiang Rulong. Positioned second in the list of most powerful persons within the young generation of the Family, his power level had reached the seventh stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Recently, he had left for seculsion and training with the Great Young Master Jiang Henshui at the Martial Arts Hall. Should he return and find out that Jiang Ruhu had been beaten to this terrible state, he would definitely intervene in a fit of rage and kill Jiang Yi.
众人哪肯退去？谁敢退日后被江如虎知道了，还不得扒了皮啊？而且全部人看到江如虎样子惨不忍睹都有些害怕了，纷纷相劝，生怕出大事。

How could that group of opponents even consider retreating? Each of them was discouraging one another from taking action, all of them fearful of making a big mistake.
众人就这么眼睁睁的，看着林立将二十块神之金属扫进背包，那眼神简直就象是看到自己老婆跟别的男人进了宾馆……
The players could only watch as Lin Li swept the twenty pieces of divinity metals into his bag, their expressions ones of those who had witnessed their wife entering a hotel with another guy...
众人手慌脚乱的抬起江如虎和江如鹰朝山下走去，全都义愤填膺的叫嚣不停，恨不得将江逸这个穷凶极恶的狂徒千刀万剐才能解恨。

In a flurry, the large group of people carried Jiang Ruhu and Jiang Ruying as they left the Western Hills. All of them clamoured incessantly as they felt indignant with the injustice just inflicted on them, each of them itching to make mincemeat out of that viciously evil and violent criminal Jiang Yi so that they can be relieved of their bitter hatred.
众人的目光还没来得及从大量矿锭上移开，美女管理员又从仓库里拿出了一堆东西，那是上百张被码得整整齐齐的黑龙皮，细密的龙鳞在魔法金属的光泽下反射出动人心魄的光亮，这可是真正的黑龙皮，魔法防御物理防御的完美结合体，用它们制作出来的装备，每一件都至少是传说级别，这上百块黑龙皮，几乎就意味着上百件传至少传说级别的装备！

The players had yet to shift their gaze away from the bulk number of mine ingots when the pretty administrator took out another pile of stuffs from the warehouse—over a hundred pieces of black dragon skin stacked neatly together. The fine and closely woven dragon scales were breathtakingly lucent under the sheen of the magical metals—this was genuine black dragon skin. It was the perfect combination of magical defense and physical defense. Gear made from the dragon skin was of a legendary scale at the very least. Hundreds of black dragon skin pieces meant hundreds of pieces of legendary gear at the very least!
众人神情呆滞的望着那一片火光，所有人心中都充满了震撼，这个看上去还不到二十岁的年轻魔法师，展现出来的实力竟已经无限接近魔导士，他们心中都有些好奇，除了凯文跟克伦威尔之外，加洛斯城什么时候又多了这么一个年轻天才？

Everyone stared at the flame in daze, their hearts filled with shock. 会长大人积威之下，一群贱人谁还顾得上平日交情，很干脆的就把他给卖了。
Under His Excellency's influence, the group of jerks couldn't care less about friendship and simply sold the clueless guy off.
传奇境界的魔法师，大师级水准的药剂师，在这两个无比耀眼的光环之下，格林－伯恩塞德俨然已是加洛斯城最具代表性的人物，声望甚至超过了同为传奇魔法师的安度因。

传奇法师的愤怒，又岂是一个大魔导士可以抗衡，安度因一句话刚刚说完，一股庞大的压力就已经覆盖了整片林间空地，强大无比的精神力压迫之下，霍伦一张面庞更是苍白得就好象白纸一样。

The legendary mage's anger triumphed over whatever an Archmage could contend with. As Andoine finished speaking, a wave of enormous pressure covered the entire surroundings. Hoeren's face turned as pale as a sheet under the oppression of the powerful, unparalleled energy.
传奇级别的力量，霍伦又怎么可能抵抗，只听“啊”的一声惨叫，中年人就整个人都被击飞出去，紧跟着就是“砰”的一声撞到了树上。
It was impossible for Hoeren to resist the legendary level of power. "Ah!" With a terrible shriek, the middle-aged man was sent flying, followed by thud as he hit a tree.
传奇魔法师的言传身教，早为他打下了最坚实的基础，得天独厚的魔法天赋，更是让他拥有了远超常人的领悟能力，这样一场战斗落入众人眼中，只是觉得精彩纷呈场面宏大，却绝不象林立看来那么发人深省。

The teachings and influence of a legendary mage had laid the most solid foundation for him. His extraordinary talent had also given him a higher ability in comprehension than ordinary people. 传奇魔法师要跟林立单独谈谈，谁还敢不识趣的凑上前去？一众宾客虽是有些好奇，却也不得不慢慢散去，在城主大人的吩咐下，很快就有仆人过来，将仍处于昏迷中的巴瑟罗尔扶起，并很快将宴会大厅恢复了先前的样子。

传说中萨拉曼达的后裔，十四级魔兽火炎蝾螈，它们是天生的火焰精灵，能够在烈火中散步，在熔岩中洗澡，天生精通各种火系魔法，以火炎蝾螈皮制成的皮甲，除了强大的魔法抗性之外，还会在被攻击的时候，自动释放出一个火焰护盾，对攻击者造成很严重的魔法伤害。

Flaming salamanders, which were the descendants of the legendary Salamander, were level-fourteen magical beasts. Born fire elves, they could wander in blazing flames, bathe in molten lava and were proficient in various forms of fire magic by nature. Leather armor made from the skin of flaming salamanders not only had powerful magical resistance, but would also release a fire shield automatically when attacked, causing magical damage of high severity to the attacker.
伦威尔神色恭敬，但眼神中却还是透出了几分得意，他一直很想证明，自己除了魔法天赋之外，同样是一个不错的家族管理者，所以在这一次的房产处理中，他已经尽可能的做到完美了，仅仅一天时间，就处理掉了五处总共价值十八万金币以上的房产，而且在如此急迫的情况下，依然没让家族蒙受太多的损失。

Cromwell's expression was respectful, but there was something triumphant in his eyes. In just one day, five properties worth more than 180,000 gold coins were disposed of, and in such an urgent situation, he made sure the family did not suffer much loss.
伴随着一道骨头断裂声，一道沉闷的元力爆炸声乍起，元力对撞引得四周空气一震，吹起了地面的烟尘，迷了众人的眼。但这一刻所有人都忘记了闭眼，全部眼眸睁得滚圆，不敢置信的望着江如鹰身子如断线的风筝般朝远处飞去……

Alongside the sounds of bones breaking rang aloud the deep noise of essence forces exploding. However, at that moment, all the members had forgotten to close their eyes. Instead, their eyes were bulging out and opened wide, as they simply could not believe what they were seeing - the figure of Jiang Ruying being sent flying out in a faraway direction, akin to a kite with a broken string...
伴随着冥皇的命令，阴兵、骸骨巨人、尸人、尸兽和尸将们全部仰天狂吼，无数暴虐、凶残、邪恶、腥臭和腐臭的气息顷刻便全部释放了出来。

Following the orders of the Netherworld King, the skeleton giants, zombies, zombie-beasts, and zombie generals surged forward with a crazy roar. Immense amounts of violent, brutal, and festering smells were all released instantly.
伸手摸了摸额头上那个肿得如鸡蛋一般的夸张肉包，江逸心中顿时充满了难以抑制的愤怒。今天一大早，当他赶去清点家族西山药田的收成时，正好遇到江如虎等几个家族旁系少爷偷药，想换零用钱花。这种纨绔子弟的行为一般只要不太严重，家族管事都是睁一只眼闭一只眼，权当没看见。

Jiang Yi was overwhelmed by uncontrollable rage when his hand brushed over the large, egg-shaped swelling on his forehead. That morning, he’d rushed to check on the plantation’s herb harvest. Unfortunately, he ran into Jiang Ruhu and some other members of a side branch. They were looting the fields of their medicine, which they planned to sell for some extra money. Normally, the family would turn a blind eye to what these wastrel playboys did, as long as their activities were not irredeemable.
但……他有退路吗？
However... did he have any way to retreat or escape?
但不知道为什么，老梅林那张苍白的面庞上，一直带着一丝若有若无的笑意。
But, for some reason, Old Merlin's pale face carried a hint of smile.
但不管多么虚弱，老梅林的脸上，却始终带着一丝成竹在胸的笑容。
However, regardless how weak he was, Old Merlin's had a confident smile on his face all this while.
但不管怎么说，黑莲花可遇而不可求，光是这几片花瓣，就足以让绝大多数药剂师疯掉，况且这几片花瓣还意味着一条线索，通过这条线索，林立很有机会摸到一个药剂师们梦寐以求的地方——黑莲花生长点。

Anyhow, the black lotus could only be met but not asked for. Just these few petals would drive most pharmacists crazy. Moreover, these petals provided a clue for Lin Li to figure out the place pharmacists dreamed of—the growing spot of the black lotus.
但不管是松了一口气的林立也好，还是正暗自垂泪的罗琳也好，他们谁也没有留意到，这僻静角落里发生的一幕，已落入了一名青年眼中。

However, whether it was Lin Li who had breathed a sigh of relief or Rowling who was secretly weeping, none of them had noticed that the scenario at the secluded corner had fallen into the eyes of a young man.
但也只有到了他这个境界才明白，这两种最基本的魔法技巧，对于一个魔法师有多么重要，这就好象是在修房子之前，打下足够牢靠的地基一样，没有足够牢靠的地基，再高大再华丽的房子，也可能在一夕之间崩塌。

But it was only in his state that he understood how important these two fundamental skills were to a mage. It was like laying a solid foundation before building a house. Without a solid foundation, however tall and gorgeous the house might be, it could still collapse overnight.
但也正因为这种净化力量太过强大，所以才必须辅以梦境花和泰罗果，梦境花用于镇定心神，泰罗果用于保护身体，以避免那过于强大的神圣力量对饮用者造成伤害。

But it was also because the purifying power was overly strong that it had to be accompanied with the dreampetal and terocone. The dreampetal was used to calm the mind while the terocone was used to protect the drinker's body from harm due to the overly strong divine power.
但仔细想起来，这种冒险其实就好象魔术表演，看似在钢丝上跳舞，其实并没有冒太多风险。
But on further thought, this was like a magic show. It looked like dancing on a tightrope, but in actual fact, it didn't involve much risk.
但他们全都猜错了，葛瑞安这一次不但没有妥协，还罕见的采取了强硬手段。
However, they were all wrong. Gerian was not only unwilling to compromise this time, he had also taken an unusually tough approach.
但他们意识到这一点的时候，几乎所有魔法师脸上，都露出了深深的恐惧，所有人都知道，魔法公会其实就是葛瑞安一个人的魔法公会，之所以能在如此艰难的环境中一撑就是二十年，还始终与法兰第一魔法家族梅林家分庭抗礼，所依靠的根本就只有葛瑞安一人。

But as soon as realization hit them, almost all the mages had an expression of vivid fear on their faces. Everyone knew that the Guild of Magic actually belonged to Gerian alone. It was all because of Gerian that the guild was able to survive such a difficult time for 20 years and was able to stand against the number one mage family, the Merlins.
但他们的心情依旧紧张，这一场奥法药剂的拍卖，很可能会改变整个加洛斯城的走势，哪怕只是其中一个很小的细节，也可能会决定成千上万人的生死。

But they were still feeling nervous. The auction of the Arcane Magic Potion would likely change the currents in Jarrosus City. Even a small detail might decide the life and death of thousands of people.
但他并没有采，而是举着火把继续往前摸索。
But he did not pick them, and instead continued to explore with the torch in his hands.
但他的脸色却是异常的苍白，就好象没有一丝血色，眼眶也深深的陷了下去，整张脸瘦得有些不成样子，若不是先听了伊娜的话，林立还真没法把他与自己认识的那个麦格雷尼联系起来。

But his face was unusually pale, as if without a trace of blood. His eyes were deeply sunken and his face was ghastly thin. If it hadn't been for Ina's words, Lin Li wouldn't have been able to connect him with the McGrenn he knew.
但以他药剂大师的实力，就算只是一些低级药水，也足以让安度因两眼放光了，天知道翡翠高塔里的魔法师们，已经多少年没闻过宁神药剂的味道了……

But with his ability as the potion master, even if it were some low-level potions, it'd be enough to make Andoine's eyes lit up. Heaven knows how many years had passed since the mages in the Emerald Tower had a smell of the Calming Potion...
但克伦威尔始终觉得，这个落魄魔法师的实力不如自己。
But Cromwell had always thought that this low-life mage was never his rival.
但十五级大魔导士与八级魔法师之间，差距的悬殊远不是精神力可以弥补。
But between a level-fifteen archmage and a level-eight mage, mental strength alone would be far from enough to compensate for the huge disparity in power.
但她却不该将这种自以为是用在病人身上，这才是林立真正无法容忍的地方，一个自以为是的医生，就算掌握了再高深的药剂学，给病人带来的也将永远是不幸和灾难。

But she should never use this kind of self-righteousness on her patients. This was what Lin Li really could not tolerate. A self-righteous doctor, even if he had mastered an advanced pharmaceutics, would still be bringing lifelong misfortune and disaster to the patients.
但如果可能的话，他其实并不想走上这一步。
But if possible, he wished he would not have to go that far.
但对方毕竟是试炼导师，林立心头虽是不满，却也强自压住火气，很恭敬的回答道：“是的先生。”
But after all, he was a trial teacher. Lin Li was discontent, but suppressed his anger and answered respectfully， "Yes sir."
但对林立来说，威力大小其实并不重要。
But to Lin Li, the intensity of power was not important at all.
但就在今天，所有人都看见了，一个二级魔法在瞬间爆发出来。
But everyone had witnessed how a level-two spell was unleashed instantly today.
但就算是在这个领域里，老梅林凭着他对规则的理解，仍然是赢得毫无悬念。
But even in this field, Old Merlin, with his understanding of the rules, had won without a doubt.
但就算是林立，此时也有些绝望了。
However, even Lin Li was starting to lose heart in this situation.
但强能水晶真正强大的地方，还在于它可以完全恢复魔力。
But the real power of the Strong Energy Crystal was that it could completely restore the mana.
但心中的那一丝好奇，却是怎么也按捺不住，如天鹅般骄傲的红发美女，不得不暂时放下了自己的骄傲：“请问，这是什么诅咒？”
However, she could not hold back her curiosity. The redheaded beauty, who was as proud as a swan, had to put down her pride temporarily. "May I ask, what is the curse?"
但想象中的碾压，最后竟成了眼下的局面，就连老梅林也是忍不住暗暗心惊。
But the crush that was expected eventually came to such a situation at present. Even Old Merlin could not help but be startled.
但才刚一掀开被子，林立脸上的神色就变了。
However, the look on Lin Li's face changed the moment he uncovered his quilt.
但拇指上的戒指却又一次证明，他真的没有眼花，无尽风暴之戒，属性唯一的神话级空间戒指，拥有近乎无穷无尽的空间，而且据说这个戒指里，还藏着一个很大的秘密，当初深入太阳之井，林立一共获得了两件神话级装备，一件是猎人手上的星辰之怒，而另一件，就是眼前的无尽风暴之戒。

However, the ring on his thumb proved yet again that his vision was fine. The Ring of Endless Storm, with mythical space being its most singular attribute, possessed an almost infinite space in it. It was said that there was a big secret in the ring. Lin Li attained two mythical equipment pieces when he went into the Well of Sun—the Stars of Fury held by the hunter and the Ring of Endless Storm right in front of him.
但是他的目光，却一直望着林立。
But he kept his gaze on Lin Li.
但是就连这种坚持，也无法持续太长时间了。
But even so, he could not hold on for too long.
但是想来想去，林立又始终想不出其中原因，麦格雷尼父女只是一般冒险者，论势力不过五六级左右，论财富论权势更是完全谈不上，以鲁本－萨鲁曼的身份，又有什么理由打他们主意？

But after much deliberation, Lin Li could not figure out any possible reason behind it. McGrenn and his daughter were merely ordinary adventurers, their strength was only at a level-five or six. Wealth and power were far from the answer as well. With Reuben Saruman's status, there was no reason he'd want anything from them.
但是没有浑厚的元力，身上的伤势也没好，在相差了一倍的巨大力量面前，应该极为勉强才对。更何况这仓促的一招就把江豹的手肘给推得脱了臼？

But Jiang Yi was injured and lacking essence force, so there was no need to stress the vast difference in strength between them. Despite this, the unexpected blow managed to dislocate Jiang Bao's elbow.
但是现在说什么都已经晚了，事实上就连老梅林也没有想到，这个叫费雷的年轻魔法师，下手竟会如此的狠辣，完全不打招呼不通商量，抬手就是一记冲击水幕。

But it was too late for anything. In fact, even Old Merlin had not imagined this young mage Felic would be so ruthless in his strikes. There were no greetings or negotiation, only a direct Waterfall Strike with the lift of his hand.
但是！
However!
但林立一点也不想教她，因为麦格雷尼家里那件事，给他留下了太坏的印象。
However, Lin Li had no intention to teach her at all. What happened at McGrenn's house had left too bad an impression on him.
但林立身为一名药剂宗师，却绝不能就此满足，他需要考虑的东西，远比一般魔法师来得多。
However, Lin Li, a pharmaceutics guru, would never be content with it. He had much more to consider than ordinary mages.
但此时的林立，却是下笔如飞。
However, Lin Li was swiftly penning away at that moment.
但江逸却不敢动手，因为这江豹虽然天资不行，也无心修炼，但毕竟修炼了那么多年，资质再怎么普通也有铸鼎境二重的实力。而他自己只有铸鼎境一重的实力，昨日还受了伤，此刻若是逞强，恐怕又会打输。

However, Jiang Yi did not dare to take action against Jiang Bao. Even though Jiang Bao had neither the talent nor the spirit to focus on his essence force training, he had nonetheless practiced for so many years that he was—despite slow progress—at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Jiang Yi, on the other hand, was only at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm; furthermore, he was still injured. If he had chosen to stubbornly lock horns with Jiang Bao at that moment, Jiang Yi was afraid he would lose the ensuing struggle.
但爽这种事，其实是很奇妙的，就好象那什么一样，爽到极点，往往是要射的……
But satisfaction was intriguing. It was like that very thing, coming when the satisfaction was to the fullest...
但现在是什么情况，这可是奥法药剂的拍卖。
However, it was the auction for Arcane Magic Potion now.
但真正引起林立注意的，却是那略微有些黯淡的剑身上，似乎有一道若隐若现的红色痕迹，如果林立没记错的话，这应该是融入了深渊魔铁的象征，在魔法金属当中，深渊魔铁向来以沉重著称，只需要一丁点的深渊魔铁，就足以把武器重量提升好几个等级。

But what really arrested Lin Li's attention was the fleeting red marks on the slightly dull blade. If Lin Li remembered correctly, this feature signified the infusion of Abyss Fiend Iron, which was well known for its heaviness among magical metals all along. The weight of a weapon could be upped by a few grades with only a tiny bit of Abyss Fiend Iron.
但真正让他看不透的是，这小子竟然能深入浅出的讲述蛮牛之力药剂的原理，要知道他自己虽然不是什么真正的药剂大师，但蛮牛之力，却是他深入高等精灵遗迹，从里面弄出来的古代药剂配方，别说一般的药剂师，就算是安瑞尔药剂师协会里，也不可能找到蛮牛之力的资料，可到了这小子口中，却是青菜萝卜一般讲得通俗易懂，想到这里，老头就不禁想问问，这世界上究竟还有没有天理？

But what really eluded him was the kid’s ability to explain the principles of the Bull's Strength potion. He was not really a master in potion crafting himself, but the Bull's Strength potion was an ancient potion recipe he got from the High Elves Relics. Not to mention average pharmacists, it was impossible to find information on the power of the Bull's Strength potion even in the Anril Pharmacists Association. But coming from the kid's mouth, it sounded like it was common and easy to understand, just like buying vegetables from the market. At the thought of this, the old man could not help but wonder if there was any justice in this world.
但真正让林立吃惊的，却是他带来的两名随从。
But what really surprised Lin Li were the two attendants he brought along.
但短暂的沉寂之后，凯文却用一个消息，将整个拍卖会推到了高潮。
However, after a brief silence, Kevin pushed the auction to a climax with a message.
但等到林立一句话说完，老格林就意识到自己错了，而且是错得无比离谱。
However, when Lin Li had finished his sentence, Old Grimm had realized that he was wrong, and he was ridiculously wrong at that.
但等到那张卷轴被交到林立手上时，众人依然是立刻就崩溃掉了。
However, everyone had a breakdown the time the scroll was handed over to Lin Li.
但结果却让他很失望，麦格雷尼身上没有一丝残留的魔法波动，也就是说，他的沉睡与魔法袭击没有任何关系。
But the result was disappointing—McGrenn had no residual magical wave on him. That was to say, his slumber had nothing to do with magical attacks.
但老格林毕竟不象一般年轻人，他已经活了一百多岁，很多事情早就已经看开了，那无尽的尴尬很快就被他抛到了脑后，转而专心致志的与林立讨论起清醒药剂来。

But Old Grimm was not like those young people in general. He had already lived for a hundred years and learnt to take things easy. That endless embarrassment was soon forgotten by him, and he turned his attention to discussing the Sobriety Potion with Lin Li.
但艾萨克毕竟稳重，心头虽是惊涛骇浪，脸上却是毫不失态，笑容微微一僵，便又热情的伸出手来：“欢迎欢迎，真没想到，竟能请到费雷魔法师这么尊贵的客人。”

However, Isaac was a staid person. Although his heart was pounding, he managed to keep his emotions in control. His smile froze for a moment, and then he held out his hand amicably. "Welcome, welcome. I've never expected to have such a distinguished guest like Mage Felic."
但艾萨克的惊叫，已是来得有些晚了。
But Isaac's shriek came too late.
但艾萨克能在加洛斯城主的位置上一坐就是十年，也不是一般的人物，这加洛斯可是各大势力混战，乱得不可开交的地方，若是没点手段的话，他这个城主早就被人给吃掉了。

But Isaac had been sitting in the position of the castellan for a decade and was no ordinary character. Jarrosus was a place where all the major forces were tangled in warfare and chaos. He would have been devoured alive if he had no means to cope with it.
但说者无心听者却是有意，一句“医术高明”落入罗琳耳中，一张俏脸顿时变得煞白，虽然伊娜一直没怪过她，但她对那天的事却始终耿耿于怀，若不是眼前的年轻魔法师坚持，自己竟险些害了最好朋友的父亲，这个念头就象一条毒蛇，始终盘踞在罗琳心里，让她无时无刻不陷于自责与懊悔当中。

However, the speaker had no intention in his words but the listener read her own meanings into it. The phrase "superior medical skills" fell into the ears of Rowling, and at once her pretty face turned ghastly pale. Although Ina had never blamed her, what happened that day still weighed heavily on her mind. If it had not been for the young mage's insistence, she would have nearly killed her best friend's father. The thought was like a viper, lodging itself in Rowling's heart, and kept her in constant self-reproach and remorse.
但谁都知道，这是不可能的，老梅林只有这一个儿子，克伦威尔是他唯一的选择。
But everyone knew it was impossible. Old Merlin had only one son, and Cromwell was his only choice.
但这东西根本无法解释，他也不会傻乎乎的告诉杨管事。最终他想了一个办法，请假五天，然后找杨管事求助，想在武殿学习几种武技。

However, he had no idea how to explain this thing, nor was he going to blindly tell Manager Yang about it. Finally he came up with a plan - to ask for a leave of absence for five days, before asking Manager Yang for some help in the hopes of learning some martial arts techniques at the Martial Arts Hall.
但这也仅是想想，且不说这疯女人的实力不比自己差，扑上去多半也掐她不死。光是扰乱拍卖这一条，恐怕就够让他吃不了兜着走了，这可不是以前的翡翠高塔，如今的魔法公会如日中天，连梅林家族都不敢正面抗衡，正面挑衅魔法公会，简直跟找死没什么区别，以葛瑞安那老家伙的性格，自己恐怕还没扑到那疯女人身上，就已经被他一火球给轰下来了。

But this was merely a thought, not to mention this mad woman was no less strong than him and he probably wouldn't be able to strangle her to death even if he did jump on her. Just disrupting the auction alone would be enough to put him on the spot. This was not the Emerald Tower of the past. The Guild of Magic today was at the height of their influence; even the Merlin Family dared not compete with or challenge the Guild of Magic head-on. That was no different than seeking their own death. With Gerian's character, he would probably be blown down by his fireball before he could get to jump on the mad woman.
但这实在是太难了……
But it was just too difficult...
但这小兔崽子，却把一切都办砸了。
But this rascal had ruined everything.
但这并不意味着，他心头不感到惊讶。
But this did not mean that he was not surprised.
但这样的努力，带来的效果却实在让人有些沮丧。
But the effect of such effort was rather frustrating.
但那道坎，却依然存在……
But that ridge was still there...
但随着林立将起黄昏诅咒的过程时，红发美女终于有些动容了，她毕竟是受过药剂师指点，知道这世界上有些东西，是不能凭空编造的。

But as Lin Li talked about the Twilight Curse, the redheaded beauty was finally moved. After all, she had been instructed by a pharmacist and knew that there were some things in the world that could not be invented out of thin air.
但随着老梅林脸上的笑容逐渐放大，一只枯瘦的右手伸进口袋里的时候，葛瑞安脸上的神色忽然僵住了。
But as Old Merlin's smile gradually expanded and an emaciated right hand reached into the pockets, Gerian's expression stiffened all of a sudden.
但麦格雷尼这一觉，却实在是睡得太长了。
But McGrenn had slept for too long.
低语森林的详细地图，冒险者公会内部就有卖，十个金币而已，城堡的特征在任务里也描述得清清楚楚，那是一座只在黄昏之后出现的黑色城堡，有了这两条线索，完成任务只不过是时间问题，况且奖励还高达一百金币，比起在落日山脉中猎杀狮蝎可划算多了。

A detailed map of the Forest of Whispers was sold in the Adventurers Guild for a mere ten gold coins. The features of the castle were also clearly described in the mission—a black castle that appeared only after dark. Completing the quest was only a matter of time with these two clues. Moreover, the reward was as high as 100 gold coins, which was much more cost-effective than hunting for Manticores in the Sunset Mountains.
作为亿万位面中最为强大，强者最为集中的天界，作为整个辽阔天界中最神圣最强大，平素里总是显得无比威严神圣的天庭，今夜竟然如此的漆黑？如此的安静？

As the most powerful dimension among the hundreds of millions dimensions where the formidable convened, the Heavenly Court was exceptionally quiet. How could the Heavenly Court, which was usually the most divine and stately in the Heavenly Realm, be so dark and silent on this night?
作为家族的三公子，江顾水不得不出声了，否则江松的一条腿将会活活劈得骨头碎裂，很有可能变成残废。江如狼的老子就是刑堂副长老，以前他经常用刑堂压家族子弟，现当着那么多人的面也不好沉默了。

As the family's Third Young Master, Jiang Gushui had to step in, if not Jiang Song's leg would be forcefully shattered and possibly crippled. Jiang Rulang's father was the Deputy Elder of the Disciplinary Court. He used to frequently bring up the Disciplinary Court to oppress other clan descendants, which was why he couldn't stay silent in front of so many people.
作为罪魁祸首的江逸自此不再受到江家高层待见，即便他始终坚持修炼，在大长老失踪这六年里将自己的元力从零苦苦提升到铸鼎境一重，他在族里的地位依旧是一降再降。不但在两年前被挤兑搬出江家后院，住进家将仆人所在的西院，甚至前些天还让他提早半年就接手只有年满十六周岁，最终确认不能修炼到铸鼎境三重的家族废材子弟才会负责的比如清点家族药田收成这样的杂活工作。

As the “main culprit” behind these unfortunate circumstances, Jiang Yi was no longer favored by the elders of the Jiang Clan. Even though he continued to persevere and cultivate throughout the six years of the Grand Elder’s disappearance and had painstakingly boosted his cultivation from nothing up to the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, his position in the family continued to deteriorate.
Two years ago he was forced to move out from the Jiang Residence’s rear court into the servants’ complex situated in the west court. Just a few days ago, he was also made to take up the responsibility of handling the family's herb plantations half a year earlier than normal. This was a job that sixteen-year-old descendants who were deemed useless for not being able to cultivate to the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm would usually take on.
你们太厉害了，下午打个滚，晚上就上榜了。
修炼了一会，江逸觉得太慢太慢索性停了下江水决，转练无名决。准备趁着药力还没完全消融，再次提速修炼一番，他刚才虽然仅仅是提速了片刻，但提炼出来的蓝色元力可是能比以往修炼两个时辰了……

After refining for a while, as he felt the refining was getting too slow, he simply decided to stop practicing the Jiang Water Art and shifted to practicing the nameless technique. Prepared to take advantage of the time before the medical power dissipated fully, he wanted to speed up the refining process by another notch. Even though he would likely only speed up the process by a few seconds, the blue essence force that would be refined was as much as what he could refine within four hours...
修炼了两个时辰，提炼了六缕黑色元力，时间已是日上三竿了。他连忙爬了起来，匆匆抓起两个窝头，朝江家东院管事房走去。

It was already late morning, by the time Jiang Yi finished cultivating for four hours and refining six wisps of black essence forces. He hastily crawled up, hurriedly grabbed two wotous and walked in the direction of the Housekeeping Chamber in the Jiang Residence Eastern Courtyard.
修炼了这么多年，江逸从没有这一刻那么痛快过，他全神贯注的沉寂在修炼中，连晚饭都没有去吃，一直盘坐修炼，黑色元力没了提炼黑色元力，灵神丹药力没了吞服灵神丹。

Not once had Jiang Yi experienced such a high level of thrill and delight throughout his many years of practising cultivation until that very moment. With his full attention focused, he was alone in his power cultivation - sitting cross-legged in meditation and cultivating essence force throughout, refining black essence force once it had been consumed and consuming Spirit Pills once the medical efficacy of the pills had run out, without even bothering to eat dinner.
修炼，修炼！
Cultivate, cultivate!
倒不是觉得安度因在说话，只是老格林觉得，理论上不应该有这样的人存在。
It wasn't because he felt that Andoine was lying; it was just that Old Grimm thought that, theoretically, such a person shouldn't exist.
倒勾上依旧闪动着幽幽的蓝光，凑近一闻更是只觉一股腥甜直冲脑门。、
The inverted hook was still shimmering with blue light, and a rush of sweet stench shot through his brain as he went closer.
偌大的演武殿数十人，除了江松江豹江如虎还在惨叫个不停外，唯有江如龙暴怒的大吼不断的响起，那如雷的声音震得所有人耳膜作痛，也让所有人感觉是……那么的嘲讽！

In the massive Martial Arts Demonstration Hall, apart from Jiang Song, Jiang Bao and Jiang Ruhu who were screaming miserably, there was only Jiang Rulong who continually roared with wrath. His thunderous voice hurt everyone's eardrums and at the same time caused everyone to feel... the irony!
偏厅内的书架上可是有不少关于炼丹的书籍，说不定能找到丹药回炉再造的方法。
There were many books on elixir-refining on the bookshelf in the side room. Perhaps he could find the method on how to reheat and refine elixirs.
偏厅里面柳长老侧对着江逸盘坐在地上，手中冒出火红色元力将剩下那枚黑色丹药包陇，全神贯注研究着，完全没有理会江逸。

Elder Liu sat on the ground in the side chamber, his back facing Jiang Yi. He wrapped the remaining black elixir pill in the red essence force released from his hand. With his full attention on research, he completely ignored Jiang Yi.
做完这一切之后，林立还落井下石的放出了一记迟缓术。
After all these, Lin Li unleashed a Delaying Spell to make matters worse for the magical beast.
元力刚刚融合，两个拳头就对撞而上，江逸身子一震倒退了三四步，没事！
No sooner had the essence force merged did the two fists collided. Jiang Yi jolted and retreated about three to four steps back, but was fine!
先前一连两次惊吓，巴瑟罗尔出手偷袭，林立紧跟着进行报复，虽然异常惊险，却也幸好没出什么问题，但跟着就爆出了林立的身份，这个穿着旧法师袍的年轻人，竟然是魔法公会那个神秘的药剂师！

They were startled twice in a row previously when Bathrilor launched the sneak attack, which was followed by Lin Li's retaliation. It was extremely risky, but fortunately there were no problems. Then Lin Li's identity was exposed—the young man in the old mage robe was actually the mysterious pharmacist from the Guild of Magic!
先前的混乱仿佛从未有过，一切的一切又回到了开始的时候。
It was as if the prior chaos had never happened before, and everything was back as it used to be at the beginning.
先前那一记烈焰风暴倒也就罢了，以他接近魔导士的境界，放出一记九级魔法并不奇怪，但之前的风刃与冰锥，却给老格林留下了无比深刻的印象。

The previous Flaming Storm was nothing. It was not surprising that he had unleashed a level-nine magic with his proximity to the realm of a Magic Shooter. But the wind blade and icicle had instead left a deep impression on Old Grimm.
先是一百套由曼尼斯家族提供的魔法装备，那可是价值两三万金币的精良装备，葛瑞安就这么大手一挥，全部发给了公会内部的魔法师，只要达到魔导士级别，就可以提出申请拥有一套。

First, there were the 100 sets of magical equipment gifted by the Mannes Family. They were excellent equipment that were worth 20 to 30,000 gold coins. With a wave of his hands, Gerian sent it all to the mages in the guild. As long as they'd reached the level of a Magic Shooter, they'd be qualified to apply for a set.
光看老板那吃力的神色就知道，这根长枪的重量肯定是够了，只可惜希恩却小声的说了一句：“费雷先生，我不会用长枪……”
The lance was apparently heavy enough, as the owner had great difficulty in simply lifting it from the racks. However, Sheehan said softly, "Mr Felic, I don't know how to use a lance..."
克伦威尔一边笑着，心里就一边在滴血。
Cromwell smiled as his heart bled.
克伦威尔不明白，那个看起来有些落魄的魔法师，究竟有什么地方比自己强。
Cromwell could not understand how that abject-looking mage could be better than him in any way.
克伦威尔只觉得，身上又凉又湿，脑子里昏昏沉沉的，就好象刚被人用门板夹过一样，鼻梁也似乎是断了，一股热流正顺着鼻孔往外流出，混着脸上的水渍，也不知道究竟是血还是水……

Cromwell felt nothing except coldness and dampness. His head was heavy and spinning, as if someone had just clamped the door on him. His nose seemed to be broken as well, a gush of warmth flowing out from his nostrils. It mingled with the water stains on his face, with him not knowing if it was blood or water...
克伦威尔回头一看，只觉得头皮一阵发麻。
Cromwell looked back and felt nothing but a tingling on his scalp.
克伦威尔始终认为，魔法公会有资格跟他相提并论的年轻人，只有一个凯文，这个年纪比自己大三岁，同时也比自己早三年达到八级的魔法师，才是自己在加洛斯城唯一的对手。

Cromwell had always believed that Kevin was the only young man in the Guild of Magic worthy enough to be mentioned in the same breath as him. He had believed that the mage—three years older than him and three years ahead of him to be certified level-eight—was his only rival in Jarrosus City.
克伦威尔就是这样。
Cromwell was as such.
克伦威尔已经不记得，这一个上午自己是怎么过来的了。
Cromwell could not remember how he’d managed to pull through that morning.
克伦威尔并不傻，他知道这意味着什么，这意味着自己已经彻底失去了追求伊娜的希望。
Cromwell was not dumb and knew what this meant. It meant that he had lost all hope in winning Ina's heart.
克伦威尔现在的心情，就好象是被刀绞着一样。
Cromwell's felt as if he was being cut by a knife.
克伦威尔脸上的笑容僵住了，他完全没有想到，自己精心准备说辞，赔尽笑脸阿谀奉承，最后等来的竟然是这么一个结果，一时间克伦威尔呆呆的站在那里，望向凯文的目光已是隐隐有些发直。

The smile froze on Cromwell's face. This was not the result he had expected after all the meticulously prepared pleas, smiles, and flattery. For a moment, Cromwell stood at a loss, staring blankly at Kevin.
克伦威尔被人用冲击水幕扫出翡翠高塔，葛瑞安凭着一瓶唤醒药剂再次站了起来，这一切都是因为那个叫费雷的魔法师，在不知不觉之间，这个年轻人竟已经成了梅林家族最可怕的敌人，甚至比加洛斯最强魔法师葛瑞安更加可怕。

Cromwell being swept out of the Emerald Tower by a Waterfall Strike, Gerian being able to stand again with a bottle of Awakening Potion... All these were because of the young mage named Felic. Unwittingly, this young man had became the most fearful enemy of the Merlin Family, even more so than the most powerful mage of Jarrosus, Gerian.
克伦威尔觉得，自己几乎就要成功了。
Cromwell felt that he was nearing success.
克伦威尔！没错，就是克伦威尔！
Cromwell! That's right, it's Cromwell!
八级魔兽的力量，实在是太强大了，也幸亏现在遇到的是利维坦猩猩这个另类，若是换了其他凶残嗜杀的八级魔兽，他现在恐怕早就已经被撕成了碎片。

The strength of level-eight magical beasts was just too powerful. It was luck that they had encountered the Leviathan Gorilla, an oddity. If it had been other brutal and savage level-eight magical beasts, he would probably have been torn to pieces by now.
八级魔兽的抗打击能力，比起狮蝎支流有着天壤之别，对林立来说，这些法术的作用，恐怕也只能是激发利维坦猩猩的怒气，让它将椰子砸得更猛一些。

The resistance ability of a level-eight magical beast was poles apart from that of a Manticore. For Lin Li, the effects of these spells would only provoke the Leviathan Gorilla's rage, causing it to smash the coconuts on him a little harder.
八级魔法师与十五级大魔导士，完全是两个不同的世界。
It was totally two different worlds for a level-eight mage and a level-fifteen archmage.
公会大厅里坐着的各大势力首脑，脸上神色各异，心里所想的却是想差不远，有机灵一些的已经开始盘算起，以后该怎么抱上魔法公会这条大腿，就算迟钝一些的，也在心里暗暗提醒自己，回去之后一定要约束手下，以后再加洛斯城看到穿长袍的家伙，绝对不要上去招惹他们……

The leaders of the forces sat in the guild hall with different expressions on their faces but the same thought in their minds. Some of the clever ones were already planning in their heads how to hold on to the Guild of Magic. Even the slightly slow-witted ones were reminding themselves to control their men when they got back. They were not to approach and provoke any guys in Jarrosus City who were wearing long robes...
公会大厅里坐着的，至少也是一方势力的首脑，以他们的眼光，又如何看不出小梅林已是强弩之末，从先前气势如虹的十万一加，到最后垂死挣扎的二万一加，所有人都知道，这已经是梅林家族能拿出的全部现金了。

Sitting in the hall were leaders of the city's forces; how could they not see that Little Merlin was already a spent bullet? From the previous unstoppable momentum of a 100,000 increment to the last dying struggle of a 20,000 increment, everyone knew that this was all the cash the Merlin Family could offer.
六千六百年！
6600 years!
六缕黑色元力能干什么？或许他可以重创几人，但一旦黑色元力没了，他必会被恼羞成怒的众人痛殴，运气好打断几根骨头，运气不好在混乱中被活活打死也不是没可能。他太了解这群纨绔子弟了，一旦冲动起来，绝不会在意后果的。

What could he possibly do with just six wisps of black essence forces? Perhaps he could inflict serious damage on some people, but once he ran out of black essence force, he would surely be severely beaten up by the crowd of people who would definitely be flying into a rage out of humilitation. If he were lucky, he would only have a few bones broken; if he were unlucky, it was not impossible that he would be beaten to death amidst the chaos. He knew too well that bunch of wastrel playboys - once they got rash and impulsive, they would definitely not care about the consequences of their actions.
关键时刻，马飞终于醒悟过来，手一抖一把青色短剑从他袖中滑落下来，上面青光流转，明显是一把高级的神兵利器。

At this crucial juncture, Ma Fei finally came to his senses. A teal-colored short sword fell down from within his sleeve with a light jerk of his hand. Judging by its gyrating teal radiance, this was clearly a high-rank divine weapon.
其中一人穿着一件黑色法师袍，整张脸都被兜帽盖得严严实实，让人无法看清他的长相，但从他身上透出的气息，却绝对可以用强大来形容，在林立所见过的魔法师中，除了安度因葛瑞安老梅林等寥寥数人之外，恐怕就要数这人最厉害了。

One of them was wearing a black mage robe, his whole face covered with a hood, making it impossible to see his face clearly. But the aura that was emitted from him could definitely be described as strong. Among the mages Lin Li had seen, besides Andoine, Gerian, and Old Merlin, this person had to be the most formidable of them all.
其中十七支势力的人，明显成了宴会的主角。
Among them, the 17 forces were obviously the main characters of the banquet.
其中有一个任务，是找人去低语森林搜索一座古代城堡，当时麦格雷尼一眼就选中了这个任务，低语森林比起落日山脉来，简直就是一个天上一个地下，那里最强大的魔也不过十级，而且数量少得可怜，要不是运气真的好上天的话，在低语森林转上两三年你都不一定能撞见。

One of the quests was to go to the Forest of Whispers in search of an ancient castle. McGrenn had chosen this task at first glance. The Forest of Whispers was heaven compared to the Sunset Mountains. The most powerful magical beasts there were no higher than level-ten, and they were pitifully few in number. If you were lucky, you wouldn't run into one even if you stayed there for two or three years.
其余人也醒悟过来，跟着弯身行礼道：“参见武堂长老。”
Everyone awoke from the realization and followed up with a respectful bow, "Greetings Martial Court Elder."
其余的冥将也不敢多言，纷纷发出最强大的神通，督促手下的尸兵尸兽阴兵等全力开始进攻。

The other Netherworld generals did not dare utter another word. They pumped themselves up and ordered their subordinate zombie soldiers, zombie-beasts, and yin soldiers to begin attacking at full force.
其实从本质上来说，这一老一少的性格都差不多，都是一样的市侩，只不过一个市侩的嚣张，一个市侩得低调罢了。

As a matter of fact, the two men—young and old—did not differ much in their core personality traits. Both were philistine, only that one was arrogantly philistine, while the other had kept it low-key.
其实在走进洞穴不久，林立就看见了一片片的野钢花。
In fact, Lin Li saw a sea of wild steelbloom not long after entering the cave.
其实早在双方魔力耗尽的瞬间，葛瑞安心头还有一丝窃喜，现在大家都不是什么大魔导士了，老子身后还站着好几十个人，待会一拥而上，随便搞搞就够你喝一壶的了，更别说老子还占着身体优势，想想吧，两三百斤的壮男扑上来，光压都能把你压扁……

In fact, Gerian felt a tinge of joy as soon as the mana was exhausted on both sides. Neither had the strength of an archmage now, and he had dozens of people standing behind him. It would be a challenge in a moment when they'd rush forward and surround the Merlins. Not to mention he had a physical advantage. Just think, a two or three hundred pound man pouncing could easily crush him flat...
其实还有个原因他没说，主要是说出来怕吓着葛瑞安，老头今年也六十好几了，万一下出个好歹来良心上过不去。

Actually, there was another reason that he did not reveal, mainly because he was worried it might frighten Gerian. The old man was 60-something this year, and if anything happened to him, it would lay heavy on Lin Li's conscience.
其实这个时候，老梅林的心情丝毫不比林立平静。
In fact, at this time, Old Merlin was feeling no more peaceful than Lin Li.
其实这根本就是自己吓自己……
This was simply a case of scaring oneself.
内视了一阵，江逸生怕元力丹的药力挥散过多，连忙不敢多看，让黑色元力融合绿色药力包裹整个丹田，然后收回心神，一心一意的运转江水决提炼元力。

Observing for a moment, Jiang Yi started feeling worried that the medical power of the essence force pill was overly disseminated. He anxiously decided to stop observing any further, and instead allow his black essence force to merge with the green medical power and envelope his entire dantian. Subsequently, he focused his mind, putting all his thoughts and attention towards circulating the Jiang Water Art to refine more essence force.
内视到丹田外被淡淡的绿色药力环绕，江逸收回思绪，运转一缕黑色元力出了丹田，通过经脉朝丹田之外的绿色药力流转而去。

Observing a faint green light revolving around his dantian, Jiang Yi cut off his stream of thoughts. He circulated a thread of black essence force out of his dantian and transferred it through his meridians out to the exterior of the dantian in the direction of the green medical power.
再三保证三月内绝对回来，江逸告别了荣管事，从江家南院快速出门，一走出江家大门他立即带上了斗篷，快步朝武殿内走去。

Jiang Yi bid Chief Rong farewell after repeated promises to return in three months' time. He swiftly exited the Jiang Clan from the north gates and wrapped himself up with a cloak the moment he was out the door, striding briskly towards the Martial Arts Hall
再加上不时有宾客上来打招呼，不是拉着城主大人谈些机密要事，就是想跟魔法公会攀上交情的，这么一来二去也弄得林立有些无聊，干脆找了个借口跟艾萨克说了一声失陪，从侍女盘中端着一杯红酒就躲到了僻静之处。

In addition, guests would approach from time to time to greet them, either asking the Castellan to discuss some confidential matters or trying to befriend the Guild of Magic. Lin Li gradually become bored, so he made up an excuse to leave, took a glass of red wine from a waitress, and went to hide in a secluded corner.
再加上林立口才也是不错，讲起故事来风趣幽默，偶尔涉及到一些专业知识的时候，又显得渊博而又权威，连安度因在他面前都没什么发言权，更何况是伊娜这般只会与魔兽搏斗的冒险者？

In addition, Lin Li was also eloquent, and he told the stories with fine sense of humor. Occasionally, when it came to professional knowledge, he appeared profound and authoritative. Even Andoine had little to say in front of him, let alone Ina, an adventurer who only knew how to fight magical beasts.
再强大的附魔效果，如果没有稳定性支撑，最后也只不过是一句笑话。
No matter how powerful the enchantment effect was, if it was not supported by stability, it would only be a joke in the end.
再想试，才注意到体内已经没剩有黑色元力了——辛辛苦苦修炼了两个时辰才积攒的六丝黑色元力，已经被他在半柱香的时间里挥霍完了。

He wanted to try again but realized that he no longer had any black essence force within his body. The six slivers of black essence force that he painstakingly took four hours to cultivate were gone in minutes.
再想起麦格雷尼曾经跟自己说过，在落日山脉中猎杀五级魔兽狮蝎的报酬也才几十金币，林立对他们父女的处境多多少少也有了一些了解。

He remembered McGrenn telling him that the reward for hunting level-five magical beasts like the Manticores in the Sunset Mountains was only a few dozen gold coins, so Lin Li more or less understood the father and daughter's situation.
再次摸了摸小奴的脑袋，江逸起身道：“行了，我先和荣管事去说一声，小奴，等我回来。”
With another stroke of Xiaonu's head, Jiang Yi got up and said, "All right, I'll go inform Chief Rong. Xiaonu, wait for my return."
再次过了小半个柱香时间，翊飞儿气鼓鼓的朝大门外走去，打开大门快速消失在走廊内。
After several minutes, Yi Fei-er petulantly headed towards the doors and disappeared swiftly down the hallway.
再看看凯文在他面前是什么表情？那可是葛瑞安的亲侄子，魔法公会不折不扣的第二号人物，连他都要看人脸色行事，那还是无足轻重的人物？

And look at Kevin's expression standing before him. He was Gerian's nephew, and undoubtedly the second-in-command in the Guild of Magic. Yet he had to do things as he pleased, how could he be an insignificant character?
再看看地上的脚印，却是异常杂乱，有大有小有深有浅，小的应该是伊娜和克伦威尔留下的，而那大的脚印，却是让林立倒抽了一口凉气！

Then he took a look at the footprints on the ground, which were all in a jumble. There were footprints of all sorts—big, small, deep, shallow. The small ones should have been left by Ina and Cromwell, but the big footprints made Lin Li gasp in surprise.
再翻看了五六本书册之后，他终于找到一本炼丹术简录，翻看了几页找到了丹药回炉的方法。

After scanning through five or six manuals, he finally found a simplified manual on the alchemy-refining process. Flipping through a few pages in the book, he found the correct method for the elixir reheating process.
再跟着是附魔……
...and magical enchantment...
冒险者公会旁边有一条又深又黑的小巷子，两人从镀金玫瑰出来之后，沿着小巷子一路往前走，没走几步就听见一阵喧哗声传来。
There was a deep, dark alley beside the Adventurers Guild. After the two guys came out of the Gilded Rose, they walked along the small lane. A few steps later, some clamor reached their ears.
写完一章马上传了，容我先喘口气……大家手上要是有推荐票的话，能先支援支援么？现在那位置实在是太要命了！
冥皇冷冷道：“如今四皇大军远在天边，而且各怀鬼胎，百万天庭神兵神将也随着这场战争的继续，军心涣散，死的死，散的散。”

"The four imperial troops are now deployed in remote places. Besides, each of them has their own evil schemes. Millions of Heavenly Court troops will perish, scatter, or lose their morale because of this long war."
冥皇冷然训斥了一句，那红眸在四周将领身上一扫，看得他们浑身一颤，才冷幽幽的说道：“九天锁星阵不过是九阳老儿花了三千年研究，再花两千年才布置出来的新阵。成阵距今也就一千六百年。它再能吸纳，又能吸纳多少星辰能量转化为护阵法力？本座给你们十二个时辰，此刻天庭内外只剩下九阳老儿一个人，一天之内无视伤亡，不计数量，不惜代价，给本座攻破此阵！”

The Netherworld King then swept his cold, red-eyed eyes across the surrounding generals. Upon seeing them tremble, he uttered coldly, "The Empyreal Star Lock Array is just an array which took Fogey Nine-Yang three thousand years to research.
“He spent another two thousand years setting it up. Ever since it was successfully set up, it has only been 1600 years. How much energy can it absorb from the stars to turn them into an array formation forcefield? Now that Fogey Nine-Yang is the only one left inside the Heavenly Court, you will be given twenty-four hours to destroy this array formation regardless of the cost or number of casualties we suffer!"
冥皇手中的镰刀微微一动，但还是没有出手，因为他明白无名垂死一击的意念已经锁死了自己，倘若自己想要出手拦下那些碎片的话，无名的亡命攻击会让他付出足够惨痛的代价。

The sickle in the Netherworld King's hands jolted a little, but he chose not to attack. This was because he knew Wu Ming's dying intention had shackled him. If he took action to shield off the numerous shards, Wu Ming's final attack would make him pay a tragic price.
冥皇没有理会部下的狂热，只将目光凝视着下方这座宏伟的巨城，暗红的眸子内闪过一丝火热的亮意。
The Netherworld King ignored his fanatical subjects. Instead, his vision was fixed on the grand city in front, his dark red eyes burning bright.
冥皇没有看这冥将一眼，只是一声冷哼，那冥将的身子立即了飞出去，身上血肉甚至黑甲尽数化为飞灰。

Not batting an eye at the Netherworld general, the Netherworld King gave a cold snort. The Netherworld general immediately flew into the air as his flesh and blood, as well as his black armor, disintegrated into flying ash.
冥皇身边一名全身笼罩在华丽黑甲中的冥将发出一声无奈的叹声，随即朝冥皇拱手禀道：“陛下，这九天锁星阵平素吸收九天星辰散发出来的能量，沉淀在天庭中的每一处角落，其容纳力据说没有上限。只怕是在这些长年累月积攒下来的能量消耗殆尽前，我军很难攻入其中。”

A Netherworld warrior with ornate armor let out an exasperated sigh.
He turned to the Netherworld King next to him and said, "Your Majesty, this Empyreal Star Lock Array absorbs the energy from the Ninth Heaven Star, scattering it throughout every corner of the Heavenly Court. Its capacity is limitless. I am afraid our army is unable to penetrate the barrier before the energy which has accumulated for eons wears off."
冥皇那头灰色的长发无风自动，阴鸷的眸子内红光时明时暗，无不显露出他此刻内心再也压抑不住的的情绪。蓦然，从冥皇的身体内腾起无尽的杀气，随后他将手缓缓抬起，食指指向天庭。

The Netherworld King's long grey hair fluttered despite the lack of wind. Red light flickered in his lifeless eyes, unable to conceal the brimming emotions that were running through his heart. Suddenly, boundless killing intent arose from the Netherworld King's body. Following which, he slowly lifted his hands and pointed at the Heavenly Court with his index finger.
冥皇，不，现在应该称之为冥帝的存在，在没好气地留下一句话后，撕裂虚空，转身离开了天界。
The Netherworld King—no, he was now an existence worthy of the name Netherworld Emperor, delivered those words in a peeved manner. He then tore open the void and turned to leave the Heavenly Realm.
冲击附魔专业的时候，这家伙也不知道冲废了多少根点金棒，此时干起这种事来，简直是轻车熟路。

When he was trying to jolt the magical enchantment profession, he had washed away countless amounts of gold rods. To do such a thing now was as facile as driving along a familiar road in a light carriage.
决定了点金棒材料之后，其他东西就没什么可烦的了。
After deciding on the material for the gold rod, there was nothing else to worry about.
况且安东尼－罗林是真的很需要这三瓶奥法药剂，他三个儿子最小的都已经十六岁了，可至今都还只是四级魔法学徒的实力，离五级只有一步之遥，仅仅是一步，可那一步却怎么也跨不出去。

Moreover, Anthony Rolin really needed these three bottles of Arcane Magic Potion. Out of his three sons, the youngest was already 16 year old, but was still a level-four mage apprentice. There was only one step away from level-five, just one step, but it couldn't be overcome no matter how.
况且这么几枚低级魔晶，还真翻不起什么浪来，全浪费掉也不会让人觉得心疼……
Besides, a few low-level magical crystals like these couldn't really turn over any waves, so it wouldn't hurt at all to waste them away...
况且这众多势力首脑也不是笨蛋，一开始的荒谬感过去之后，他们很快就明白了过来，曼尼斯家族不会平白无辜做亏本生意，拿出一百套精品装备之后，他们肯定会跟魔法公会展开一系列的合作，想到这两个庞然大物之间的合作，所有人心里都不约而同的想到……加洛斯城，怕是要变天了……

Moreover, the leaders of these forces were not fools. After the initial sense of absurdity had passed, they quickly came to realize that the Mannes Family would not be doing a losing business for no reason. After taking out the 100 sets of excellent equipment, they would surely form a series of collaboration with the Guild of Magic. Everyone had the same idea in mind as they thought of the collaboration of these two giants... There was going to be a change of weather in Jarrosus City...
况且这几种药剂，也不是什么等闲之辈，虽然不如短暂神格这个大变态，但也绝对是小变态中的翘楚了。尤其是其中的无限法能，真是要多妖娆就有多妖娆，三个瞬发的传奇法术，足以让一个魔法学徒轻易干掉一个传奇法师。

Besides, these potions were not your average kind. They might not be as freaky as the Ephemeral Divinity Potion, but they were definitely almost there. In particular, the Infinite Magical Ability Potion was as enchanting as one wanted it to be. These three instantaneous phenomenal spells were enough for a mage apprentice to defeat a legendary mage.
况且那可是药剂大师，不可能只会几瓶奥法药剂，只要能跟葛瑞安搭上关系，也就等于拥有了源源不断的药剂……
Moreover, that was a potion master. It was impossible to have only a few bottles of Arcane Magic Potion. As long as they befriended Gerian, they'd have a steady supply of potions...
况且，五千金币，只不过是起步价而已。
Moreover, 5,000 gold coins was merely a starting price.
况且，还有一百套魔法装备呢……
Moreover, there was the 100 sets of excellent magic equipment...
冷静！冷静！
Calm down! Calm down!
净化药剂分量掌握有些麻烦，林立也不敢丝毫大意，仔细计算好银须草和太阳草的分量之后，又将两枚泰罗果拿在手里掂了掂，凭着千万次配药锻炼出的手感，两枚泰罗果一入手，林立就知道分量过多，于是他又从口袋里摸出一把银质小刀，小心的将其中一枚切下小半。

The control of dosage for the Purifying Potion was somewhat troublesome, hence Lin Li dared not allow himself even the slightest negligence. After a meticulous calculation of the amount of silver hairgrass and sungrass to be used, he took two terocones and twisted them in his hands. With tens of thousands of concoctions done in the past, Lin Li had developed a sensitive feel in his hands. With the two terocones in hand, Lin Li knew at once that the amount was too much. So he took out a silver knife from his pockets and gingerly cut one of the terocones in half.
几乎所有翡翠高塔的魔法师都无法理解，葛瑞安为什么要做出这个决定，在他们看来，这简直就是在开玩笑，即便是加洛斯公会的骄傲，传奇法师安度因，在翡翠高塔都还没享受过如此优厚的待遇，这个刚刚才加入公会几天的年轻魔法师有什么资格，值得葛瑞安为他开出如此优厚的条件？

Almost all of the mages in the Emerald Tower couldn't understand why Gerian made such a decision. To them, it was a joke. Even the pride of Jarrosus Guild, legendary mage Andoine, had never enjoyed such generous treatment before. What right did this young mage, who had just joined the guild for a mere few days, have to deserve such favorable terms from Gerian?
几家势力首脑在那畏畏缩缩，想过来却又被城主大人的两名随从拦住，只得用可怜巴巴的眼神向葛瑞安求助。
The leaders of the several forces cowered at a side. They wanted to come over but were stopped by the two attendants of the castellan and could only turn to Gerian for help with their piteous eyes.
几片黑莲花花瓣被轻轻的放进了无尽风暴之戒内，整个过程林立的手一直很小心，生怕一不小心把这宝贝给碰着磕着了。
The black lotus petals were gently kept into the Ring of Endless Storm. Lin Li was mindful of his hands for the whole time, as if he was afraid he'd bruise the treasure by accident.
凭着这一发风刃，将那条阴险的藤条切断，同时一个羽落术加在自己身上，林立总算是险险的逃出了陷阱，只是随之而来的，却又是一阵如*般的椰子袭击。

He had managed to cut off the insidious rattan with the wind blade spell. At the same time, he cast another Feather Fall Spell on himself, and with that, Lin Li escaped from the trap at last. But what followed was another round of coconut volley.
凭着这一记仿佛神来之笔的光亮术，刚刚接触魔法一个多月的林立，与五级魔兽之间的距离被无限拉近。
With the delicate touch of the Illuminating Spell, it had brought the distance between Lin Li—who was just exposed to magic for barely more than a month—and the level-five beast infinitely close.
凯文与林立年纪相差不大，又是他在翡翠高塔最早认识的几个人之一，打过几次交道之后，也算是相当熟悉了，走在街道之上，两人也是有一搭没一搭的闲聊着，同为八级魔法师，闲聊的话题，自然也离不开魔法。

Kevin was not much older than Lin Li, and was one of the first few people he knew in the Emerald Tower. After being in contact for a while, they had became pretty familiar with each other. The two had a chat as they walked along the street. As they were both level-eight mages, the topic of their conversation would naturally be about magic.
凯文充满煽动性的话，就仿佛在湖水中投下一块巨石，刹时间就在大厅内引起了一阵骚动。
Kevin's rousing words were like a boulder dropped in the lake, causing a commotion in the hall at once.
凯文先是脸色一红，跟着又露出了惊喜的神色，至于他身后的魔法师们，更是忽然间爆发出一阵欢呼！
Kevin blushed, then showed a look of surprise on his face. As for the mages behind him, all of them let out a burst of cheers!
凯文光顾着跟林立闲扯，却不防被克伦威尔给侯了个正着。
Kevin was so engrossed in the chit-chat with Lin Li that he was caught unwittingly by Cromwell.
凯文又将声音提高了一些，还伸手指了指前面：“我说！再往前面挤挤！”
Kevin raised his voice higher and pointed his finger to the front. "I said! Squeeze! Forward!"
凯文只知道从会客室出来之后，葛瑞安笑得一脸满意，并且当场宣布，从今天开始，翡翠高塔内的一切，都将无条件向费雷开放，他可以自由出入任何地方，随意查阅任何资料。

Kevin only knew that Gerian was beaming with satisfaction as he emerged from the reception room and announced on the spot that from today onwards everything within the Emerald Tower would be open to Felic unconditionally. He was free to go anywhere and look up anything he wanted.
凯文吓得一头冷汗，赶紧连连答应下来。
Kevin hurriedly agreed. He was so scared that he broke out in cold sweat.
凯文手上拿着的，是一根古朴的法杖，杖身一道魔纹精致而又细腻，顶端镶嵌着一枚红**晶，从魔晶上透出的灼热气息判断，这应该是一根增幅火系法术的法杖。

Kevin held a staff of primitive simplicity in his hands. The body of the staff was covered in fine and delicate mageweath, and a red crystal was embedded at the top. Judging from the scorching aura of the magical crystal, this should be a staff for amplifying fire spells.
凯文接过信后，只是看了一眼上面的署名，连信都没拆开就随手丢进了包里，反倒是事情的经过听得他满头大汗，心头更是把那胖子骂了一遍又一遍，还事成之后必有重酬，还凯文魔法师的助手，亏他想得出来，让这种妖孽给我当助手……

After Kevin took the letter, he merely glanced at the signature on it and threw it into his bag without opening it. Instead, he broke out in sweat hearing what had happened, and in his heart he had cursed the lanky man [Note: in the raw text it was written as "fatty", but after revising the author was talking about the lanky middle-aged man who had approached Lin Li for a favor in the previous chapter] over and over. Reward handsomely after it's done? Mage Kevin's assistant? Kudos to him for coming up with that. Letting this kind of demon become my assistant…
凯文有些心虚的看了林立一眼，心想去年突破八级就把你吓到了？你要是知道这位才接触魔法三个多月就突破八级，你非当场吓成神经病不可？别说是你，就算是你爹看见了那枚亮了二十八分钟的水晶，估计也得当场吓成神经病……

Kevin glanced guiltily at Lin Li and thought, Surpassing level-eight surprises you? If you knew someone who had just been exposed to magic for three months surpassing level-eight, wouldn't you be scared crazy right on the spot? Not to mention you, your father would probably be driven crazy too if he saw the crystal ball glowing for twenty-eight minutes...
凯文正在那喘着粗气，刚一抬头就看见双方冲突，再想要开口阻止已经有些来不及了，见那大汉动手，年轻魔法师不得不遗憾的叹了口气。

Kevin was gasping for breath at a side when he looked up and witnessed the conflict between both sides. Just as he was about to open his mouth to stop the conflict, it was already too late. The burly man attacked and the young mage sighed regretfully.
凯文看见他的时候，林立眼中已经布满了血丝，整个人看上去憔悴得可怕，但在这么一个虚弱而憔悴的人身上，凯文却只感觉到“强大”二字。
When Kevin saw him, his eyes were bloodshot and his whole body looked terribly gaunt. But from such a weak and gaunt person, Kevin could only feel the word "powerful" coming from him.
凯文真是怎么也想不明白，这么多高品质魔晶，怎么就落到了林立一个人手上……
Kevin couldn't comprehend just how so many high-quality magical crystals came to fall into the hands of Lin Li.
凯文脸上露出一丝苦笑：“因为你不在……”
A bitter smile came across Kevin's face. "Because you weren't here..."
凯文虽然为人老实低调，但毕竟是葛瑞安的侄子，再加上从小就是加洛斯城内有名的魔法天才，在场宾客中不乏眼尖之人，才没走出几步，就被不少人给认了出来。

Although Kevin was honest and low-profile, he was Gerian's nephew after all. Moreover, he was also famous for being the magic genius of Jarrosus City since young. There were some sharp-eyed ones among the guests present, and both of them had barely taken a few steps when they were recognized by these people.
凯文被折磨了一个下午，终于等到了这句话……
At last. Kevin had waited for this sentence after being tortured for the whole afternoon...
凯文追上来，露出一脸的苦笑：“加洛斯交易所是会员制的，我都还没来得及掏会员卡，你就把人给揍了，这手动得也太快了……”

Kevin caught up from behind, a bitter smile across his face. "The Exchange goes by a membership system. I had yet to pull out my membership card when you already knocked them out. You're quick to take action..."
凯文锤子刚刚落下，竞价声已是此起彼伏，价格一个比一个高，转眼间就将三瓶奥法药剂抬到了十万的高价。

Kevin's gavel had just come down when the bidding calls rang out continuously, each price higher than the other. In a moment's time, the price for the three bottles of Arcane Magic Potion was raised to a high of 100,000.
出乎江逸的意料之外，那荣管事很是大度的摆手道：“没事，这两天记得送过来就行，江逸你快去吧，省的柳长老等着。在炼丹房好好做事，千万记住别惹柳长老不高兴了！“

Beyond Jiang Yi's expectations, Chief Rong waved his hands with magnanimity and replied, "No problem. Just remember to send it over within the next two days. Jiang Yi, leave quickly and don't keep Elder Liu waiting. Do a good job at the alchemy lab, and remember to not make Elder Liu upset!"
刘管事一张脸如死了亲爹般，等马飞伤势暂时压制了，立即拔腿就要往外跑，刚出门却听到一道冰冷到了极点的声音：“等等！”

Housekeeper Liu's expression was as grim as if his own father had expired. He waited until Ma Fei's injuries were under control before scrambling out the door. Yet just as he was stepping outside, an extremely cold voice was heard: "Wait!"
刘管事一直退了七八步才站稳身子，看到江逸一拳带着无可抵挡之威朝马飞脑袋砸去被吓坏了，元力疯狂运转朝江逸再次爆射而去，大吼起来：“江家小儿，你敢伤我家公子，今日你必死无疑。”

Housekeeper Liu was forced seven or eight steps back before he could steady himself. Upon seeing Jiang Yi's fist, which carried an irresistible strength, about to hit Ma Fei in the head, he was scared out of his wits. Circulating his essence force in a frenzy, Housekeeper Liu shot towards Jiang Yi with a roar, "Brat Jiang, you would certainly die here today if you dare harm my Young Master!"
刘管事却是知道江逸的厉害，那日他只是铸鼎境一重都把一名铸鼎境三重的护卫给伤了，虽然不知道江逸是怎么隐藏实力的，但他很谨慎的朝四周的护卫打了个眼色，身子朝马家公子靠近两步。

Housekeeper Liu however was aware of how strong Jiang Yi was. Jiang Yi, despite only having power level at first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, was able to defeat a guard that day who was at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Although Housekeeper Liu did not know how Jiang Yi managed to conceal his true strength, he cautiously signaled with his eyes for the surrounding guards, while moving two steps closer to the Ma Family young master.
刘管事和几名护卫惊恐的大叫起来，却只能眼睁睁的看着那把青色短剑没入了马飞的小腹内，然后所有人宛如听到一个皮球破裂漏气的声音……

Housekeeper Liu and several guards cried out frantically, but they were unable to do anything except watch the teal-colored short sword being plunged into Ma Fei's stomach. It was then that everyone heard a hissing noise, as if air was leaking from a ball...
刘管事咬牙沉喝一声开始缓缓后退，其余护卫也脸色阴沉的不断退后，还好此刻姑娘们还在楼上，风月楼也没开张，否则一定会引起一片骚乱的。

Gritting his teeth, Housekeeper Liu issued the order and began moving back slowly. The other guards too shuffled backwards sullenly. It was fortunate that Fengyue Brothel had not yet opened for business and the ladies were still upstairs. Otherwise, it would have caused quite a commotion.
刘管事沉喝一声，双手结了一个古怪的手印，双掌外突兀凝聚出一个五角星模样的元力护罩，他双掌朝前方连续拍出，将他前方的空间全部笼罩进去。

Housekeeper Liu shouted in a booming voice. He formed a strange hand-seal with his hands, both palms facing outwards and producing a pentagram-shaped essence force shield. He repeatedly shoved his palms forward, enshrouding the space in front of him with the force shield.
刘管事沉声应道，心里却是松了一口气，这事既然马飞不想让家族知道，他们几人至少不会被家族重罚了。查江逸的资料？这虽然有些麻烦，但江家如此多下人，他们找人画出江逸和江小奴的画像，大把银子撒出去还是能打探到的。

Housekeeper Liu answered in the affirmative in a low voice, feeling relieved internally. Since Ma Fei preferred not to inform the family clan, that meant the lot of them would not be punished by the family clan. As for digging for information on Jiang Yi? Granted, it could be somewhat troublesome, but once they had the paintings of Jiang Yi and Jiang Xiaonu, and with so many servants in the Jiang Clan, they could still obtain the information if hey offered taels of silver pieces in exchange.
刘管事浑身瘫软下来，身子一晃险些摔倒在地，他万万没想到这江家少年竟然如此狠，马飞这丹田一被废，这辈子注定是个废物，而他和在场所有护卫下场也绝不会太美妙！

All the strength had left Housekeeper Liu; his body swayed and almost dropped to the floor. He absolutely failed to consider how this youth of the Jiang Clan could be so ruthless. With his dantian ruined, Ma Fei was doomed to be useless for the rest of his life, and the fate awaiting for the rest of them would in no way be good!
刘管事满眸的凶厉之光，盯着江逸爆吼起来：“江家小贼，立刻放了我家少爷，否则今日你必死无疑！”
Housekeeper Liu had a ferocious glint in his eyes. He roared at Jiang Yi, "Jiang Clan scoundrel, release my young master right now, or you would certainly die today!"
刘管事的身体已经距离江逸两尺距离了，旁边两边护卫也即将击中江逸，但此刻所有人立刻顿住身子，还快速的后退一步。这马飞在马家地位尊荣，马飞一死，他们全部人都要死，他们自然不敢赌。

Housekeeper Liu was just two-third of a meter away from Jiang Yi, while the guards from both sides were similarly about to strike Jiang Yi. At that moment however, all of them stopped their movements at once and even hastily took a step back. Considering Ma Fei's high standing in the Ma Family, all of them would be sentenced to death if Ma Fei were to die here. Naturally, they could not afford to take that risk.
刘管事立即屁颠屁颠的朝马家公子走去，附耳把那日的事情解释了一遍，最后还低声说道：“马飞少爷，那天我们的人也没怎么伤着，我想着是江家的人，我们这是做生意的就没大闹，也没上报家族……”

Housekeeper Liu went to the Ma Family young master promptly and eagerly, recounting the events occurred on that day in an undertone and ending his story with a deliberate remark: "Young Master Ma Fei, our men weren't hurt too badly that day, and since it was the Jiang Clan, we businessmen did not want to make a scene, so we did not report the incident to the family clan either... "
刘管事被江逸一喝更慌了，连忙从怀中取出江逸给他的金叶子丢了过去，江逸单手快速抓住收入怀中，这才挟持着马飞一步步朝大门外走去，在大门口才一脚将马飞踹了进去，拿着马飞的宝器短剑大步朝远处狂奔而去。

Jiang Yi's pronouncement made Housekeeper Liu even more frantic. He hurriedly took out from the chest pocket the gold leaf Jiang Yi gave to him and threw it over. Jiang Yi caught it with one hand and swiftly put it away in his own chest pocket, before moving towards the gates step by step with Ma Fei in tow. When he went out of the gates, he kicked Ma Fei back in and bolted far away with Ma Fei's Treasured Artifact, the short sword, still in his possession.
刘管事面色一僵，做生意的确讲究个信誉，他作为风月楼的管事，也算是有头有脸的人物，被传出去为难一个少年总是不好的。只是这位马飞少爷可是直系少爷，他父亲在马家权势极大，他也不敢冒然开口得罪，只能沉默。

Housekeeper Liu's expression turned rigid. Indeed, in doing businesses, credibility was of paramount importance. As the housekeeper of Fengyue Brothel, he was considered to be someone of reputable standing. It would do him no good if word got out that he had bullied a youth. However, Young Master Ma Fei was a direct bloodline descendant and his father held a great deal of power in the Ma Family, therefore making him someone Housekeeper Liu could not afford to offend. As it was, Housekeeper Liu could only remain silent.
刘管事面色一变，慌忙护着那公子朝后面退去，那两名护卫也立即退后。其余方向的护卫则爆射而来，甚至还有两名护卫取出一把黑色匕首，准备给江逸放血了。

Housekeeper Liu's facial expression changed; he hastily shielded his young master and moved him backwards. The two guards too retreated at once, while guards from the other directions swarmed forth. There were even two of them who took out a black dagger, ready to shed Jiang Yi's blood.
刘管事面色为难起来，摇头道：“公子，实在抱歉！小姐前天去了武殿修炼了。你要是有要紧的事，要不……我请示一下大总管？”
