Housekeeper Liu's face betrayed a mixture of embarrassment and awkwardness.
"My deepest apologies, Young Master!" he said, shaking his head. "Young Mistress left for the Martial Arts Hall on the day before yesterday. If you have an urgent matter to discuss, perhaps... I can speak with the chief supervisor?"
刚一走进大厅，林立就被那琳琅满目的魔法装备给弄花了眼，不愧是法兰王国最大的魔法商店，那一件件法师袍一根根魔法杖，就算以林立的眼光看来，也不得不说声不错。

As soon as he walked into the hall, Lin Li was blinded by the dazzling array of magical equipment. It was indeed the largest magic store in the Felan Kingdom. From what Lin Li saw, every mage robe and magic staff here was decent stuff in his eyes.
刚刚修炼了一个时辰，江逸却惊醒了过来，他是被一道轻微的脚步声惊醒的。
Jiang Yi practiced for around two hours when he was roused awake suddenly. He was awoken by the soft sound of footsteps.
刚刚将地图放进背包的麦格雷尼，在完全没有任何征兆的情况下，就这么突然倒了下来。
McGrenn, who had just put the map into his backpack, suddenly collapsed without any warning.
刚刚朝楼上走去的马家少爷突然脚步一顿，目光如电般扫了过来，看到一名护卫拿着的一块令牌上有一个龙飞凤舞的“江”字，立即沉喝道：“等等！”

The Ma Family young master, who only a second ago was making his way up, paused his steps. His gaze swept over lightning-fast, and spotted a single character, written in exquisite calligraphy on the command token: "Jiang". "Halt!" He bellowed immediately.
刚刚自己也不知道吃错了什么药，以为有霍伦导师撑腰，就什么都不用怕了，居然傻乎乎的跑出来帮马迪亚斯出头，现在出出麻烦来了吧……人家也有靠山，而且这还是一座传奇级别的靠山！

They were not sure what medicine they had mistakenly taken. They thought that as long as they had the support of Master Hoeren, they had no need to fear. They actually foolishly came out to help Mathias! Now that trouble had occurred... their opponent also had their own support, and it was a legendary level of support!
刚刚转身，他却被两个少年武者的谈话吸引了。
just as he was turning around to leave, his attention was attracted by the conversation between two young martial artists.
刚刚还一片安静的大厅里，仿佛也多出了一丝烟火味。
There seemed to be a hint of smoke in the quiet hall.
刚到加洛斯城的那样，这位热心魔法师似乎曾经提到过相同的名字，如果林立没记错的话，他的原话应该是——“如果有什么要帮忙的话尽管开口，我们梅林家族在加洛斯魔法公会还算是能说上话。”

When they had first reached Jarrosus City, the zealous mage had mentioned the very same name. If Lin Li had remembered correctly, his exact words were... "If you need help, do feel free to ask me, the Merlin Family does have a say in the Jarrosus' Guild of Magic."
刚才上传的时候走神，一不小心把前面的章节内容给复制进来了，现在已经修改，起点的显示是有延迟的，可能还要过一会才能正确显示，不好意思，下次一定注意上传时不走神……
刚才他真是被吓坏了，看着林立被火龙击中的瞬间，凯文真是整个人都呆住了，如今的林立对魔法公会来说，几乎就意味着一切，他的价值甚至已经超过了葛瑞安，如果林立死在那数十条火龙之下，凯文真不知道该怎么办才好了，如今的魔法公会，绝对经不起这样的损失。

He was utterly frightened just now. Watching the moment when Lin Li was hit by the fire dragons, Kevin was stupefied. Lin Li meant almost everything to the Guild of Magic at present; his value even surpassed that of Gerian. Kevin would not know what to do if Lin Li had died under that dozen fire dragons. The Guild of Magic today definitely couldn't afford such a loss.
刚才修炼时江逸储存了两缕黑色元力备用，此刻能支持一小会时间，正好试试和强者之间的差距。

Whilst cultivating power just now, Jiang Yi had been able to store two wisps of black essence force for future use. At the moment, he could potentially withstand attacks for a short amount of time, just enough distance and duration to test the use of the black essence force on a much-more powerful martial artist.
刚才江如鹰偷偷溜了他看在眼里，他最后一个动江如虎，就是为了等此人来！当着他的面断江如虎的腿，也是……为了激怒他！

When Jiang Ruying slipped out earlier, he had already noticed it and decided to save Jiang Ruhu for the last just for Jiang Rulong! It was to allow Jiang Rulong to witness him breaking the leg of Jiang Ruhu and to... Enrage him!
刚才江逸看到的是漫天拳影，此刻一扫却能轻松锁定两只真实的拳头，他脚步一滑，运转江家的迷幻步朝旁边退去。

What Jiang Yi had seen just now were the silhouettes of fists in the Vast Sky Fists technique; yet at the moment what he managed to easily lock his gaze on were two real fists. His feet slipped as he circulated the Jiang Clan Psychedelic Steps and retreated to the side.
刚才自己只是隐隐约约提了一下，当初葛瑞安还只是一个小法师的时候，父亲就曾经跟他见过一面，想不到这老家伙两眼一翻，立刻就将关系升级到世交的程度，连自称都变成了葛瑞安叔叔……

He had vaguely mentioned that his father had met Gerian when the latter was still a young mage and to his surprise, the old fellow had brought their relationship up another level with a turn of his eyes, and now they had become old family friends, the latter even claiming to be Uncle Gerian...
刚才那一幕，恐怕连瞎子都看得出来。
Even the blind could see something unusual from what had happened just now.
刚才险些被江逸刺死马飞被吓到了，此刻醒悟过来立即满脸羞怒的大吼道，在一群下人面前被挟持，马飞心里别说有多暴怒了。

Having been scared senseless earlier by the fact that he was almost killed by Jiang Yi, Ma Fei had just recovered and immediately roared in equal measures of rage and embarrassment. Being held hostage in front of a bunch of servants - to say Ma Fei was inwardly fuming would be an understatement.
刚走进翡翠高塔，克伦威尔就发现，事情跟自己想象中完全不一样，那些平日里见到自己客客气气的魔法师们，今天竟把自己当成了空气一般，最热情的也只不过点头打个招呼，克伦威尔先还以为是自己认错了人，可一连几次都是这样，克伦威尔心里终于有点慌了……

As soon as he walked into the Emerald Tower, Cromwell found that things were quite different from what he had imagined. The mages, who were nothing but polite when they saw him on other days, had regarded him as air today. Even the most enthusiastic ones had merely nodded to say hello. Cromwell thought he was mistaken, but it had happened several times until at last he began to panic...
初次参加这样的宴会，林立多少有些不太适应。况且他在宴会里也没什么熟人，神色拘谨的跟城主大人谈了几句，也大多是谈些无关紧要的事。

Lin Li was somewhat unaccustomed to it, attending a banquet like this for the first time. Besides, he had no acquaintances at the banquet. He talked to the Castellan with a prudent look on his face, but it was mostly about unimportant matters.
利维坦猩猩可是真正的八级魔兽，这一颗椰子从它手上砸下来，连罗麦格雷尼这个战士都当场被砸得晕了过去，更何况是身体并不强壮的林立。
The Leviathan Gorilla was a real level-eight magical beast. A smash of coconut from its hand had knocked out even a warrior like McGrenn, not to mention Lin Li who was in no sense strong.
利维坦猩猩对那张巨网的控制，简直就象是手臂一般灵活，翻来覆去的扭动当中，竟是挡下了绝大多数的法术。
The Leviathan Gorilla controlled the giant net like it was a flexible arm. Most of the spells were actually blocked in the midst of twists and turns.
别说只是一个克伦威尔，就算是克伦威尔他老爸，那个据说魔法造诣丝毫不比葛瑞安逊色的老梅林，惹上了这个年轻法师也绝对是死路一条。

Even Cromwell's father, Old Merlin, who was said to be on par with Gerian in terms of magic attainments, would have no other way out except to die if he messed with the young mage, let alone someone like Cromwell.
别说是你霍伦了，就算是你老子奥德文，都不一定敢跟他正面冲突，妈的也不想想，这老家伙是干什么的，这老瘟神的学生你也敢动，简直就是活得不耐烦了。

Even if you were Odwin, you wouldn't dare to fight him head-on. Hell, did you even think who this old man was? If you even dared to touch the student of this pestilence, you were just asking for death.
别说葛瑞安，就连林立都听人说过好几次了。
Not to mention Gerian, even Lin Li had heard it several times.
到了最后，利维坦猩猩已是完全放弃了八级魔兽的尊严，惨叫声中充满了求饶的意味，在地上又是打躬又是作揖，只差没跪下去给林立磕上几个响头了。

Finally, the Leviathan Gorilla had given up all its dignity as a level-eight magical beast. Its cries were full of pleas for mercy, and it hunched and bowed with hands folded in front, all but kneeling on the ground giving kowtows to Lin Li.
到周三的时候，林立才拖着疲惫的身体从药剂室出来。
It was Wednesday when Lin Li dragged his tired body out of the potion lab.
刹时间一股雾气升腾，融合了恶魔之泪汁液的药剂，顿时在药剂室里弥漫起一股醉人的香气，那是一种相当独特的味道，就好象陈年佳酿一般，浓得化也化不开，充满了一种致命的诱惑气息。

A plume of mist rose up instantly. The potion fused with the succus of the devil's tears immediately filled the potion lab with an intoxicating fragrance. It was a rather unique aroma, like one of a vintage wine that was too thick to diffuse and full of deadly allure.
刹时间翡翠高塔外的魔法元素疯狂的涌动着，一次次的绚丽魔法碰撞，激荡起无比华丽的光芒，就在老梅林浮空飞起之时，两人已进行了近十次交锋，那一次次的攻击，无不是威力绝伦的高级魔法。

The magical elements outside the Emerald Tower swarmed madly. Each time the grandiose magic collided, it'd spark off resplendent rays of brilliance. As Old Merlin levitated into the air, both had exchanged almost ten strikes. Each attack was no less an extremely powerful top-level magic.
前两天他才打了江豹，此刻又打了江松，怕是江如虎知道后肯定会恨得牙直痒痒吧？
Two days ago, he had just beaten up Jiang Bao; at that moment, he just struck Jiang Song. Surely, should Jiang Ruhu find out, wouldn't he feel so much hatred that he would be itching to fight?
前方不远的地方，正是林立曾经来过的冒险者公会。
Not far ahead was the Adventurers Guild Lin Li had once visited.
前方似乎越来越宽敞，刚进来时还只是一座小小的山洞，等到林立越走越深，那山洞也仿佛变成了一座迷宫。
The route ahead seemed to be getting wider; it was only a small cave when he just came in. As the forest grew deeper, the cave seemed to have turned into a maze.
前方树木渐渐稀疏，树林间再不是暗无天日，温暖的阳光从树丛缝隙间透入，照得人身上只觉一阵暖洋洋的，而与这温暖的阳光一般开朗的，还有林立的心情，终于能离开这见鬼的落日山脉了。

The trees ahead were gradually thinning, and the woods were no longer dark. Warm sun rays penetrated the gaps in the trees and landed on their bodies. Warming up with the sun rays was Lin Li's mood as he was finally able to leave the cursed Sunset Mountains.
前方的江如虎本想躲开，继续招呼人围攻，摸清楚江逸的真实实力再做打算，此刻却顿住身子哈哈大笑起来，眼中凶光暴涨，身上元力倾泻而出，两个拳头如铁锤般朝飞来的江逸砸去。

Jiang Ruhu, standing in the frontal direction of Jiang Yi's movement, had initially thought of avoiding the incoming attack while continuing to direct his cronies to attack from all sides, such that he could clearly grasp Jiang Yi's actual level of power before deciding on his next plan of action. At that moment however, he suddenly stopped his bodily movements and began to burst into loud laughter. With his eyes filled sharply with a strong ominous glint, the essence forces poured out in torrential waves from his body as his two fists smashed forward like metal hammers in the direction of the incoming Jiang Yi.
前院一道沉喝声，将江逸的思绪拉了回来，他一听声音暗道不妙，荣管事终于找上门来了。他身子一缩，立即躲进了后院的茅草堆中，大气不敢吐出。

a deep, loud voice rung from the front courtyard, rousing Jiang Yi from his thoughts.
Upon hearing the voice, he thought to himself that trouble had finally caught up to him. Chief Rong had come. Curling his body into a ball, he quickly hid in the pile of weeds in the backyard. He dared not breathe or release any air.
加洛斯交易所内空荡荡的，除了一个正靠在柜台上打盹的老头之外，连个鬼影子都看不到，林立进去一连敲了几十下柜台，那老头才带着一脸惺忪的睡意张开眼来，一边打着呵欠，还一边小声抱怨着：“现在的年轻人可真缺德，连老人家偶尔偷懒睡个觉都要吵醒，哎……年纪这么大了，也不知道还能好好的睡上几次觉……”

It was empty inside the Jarrosus Exchange; not a ghost could be seen except for an old man who was dozing off at the counter. Lin Li went in and knocked on the counter dozens of times before the old man opened his eyes with a sleepy face. He yawned as he grumbled in a quiet voice, "Young people nowadays are really mean, waking up an old man taking an occasional nap. Aye, I'm already this old, wonder how many more good naps I can take..."
加洛斯的法师们都不记得，自己有多少年没听过“奥法药剂”这个名字了，特别是属于魔法家族的那些。
The mages in Jarrosus could not even remember how many years it had been since they heard of "Arcane Magic Potion", especially those who came from the mage families.
加洛斯首富走了没多久，葛瑞安就一脸猥琐的凑了过来。
Not long after the richest man in Jarrosus left, Gerian came over with a creepy look on his face.
加洛斯魔法公会一直人才凋零，几个至少九级以上的魔法师退出，简直就是一场毁灭性的灾难，几乎所有人都认为，葛瑞安一定会妥协，否则不用等到三个月之后的最高议会评估，加洛斯魔公会就会彻底从安瑞尔消失。

Jarrosus' Guild of Magic had been lacking in talent, and the withdrawal of a few mages who were of at least level-nine would be a devastating disaster. Almost everyone thought Gerian would compromise—otherwise, the Jarrosus Guild of Magic would completely disappear from Anril before the Supreme Council's assessment in three months' time.
加洛斯魔法公会这几年虽然落魄，但因为黑暗年代时的协议，他们多多少少还能从药剂师公会搞到一些援助，虽然这种援助，通常都是用葛瑞安那张老脸去换来的，但比起魔法家族来，他们仍然是幸福的。

Although the Jarrosus Guild of Magic had been down and out in recent years, due to the agreement made during the Dark Ages, they could more or less get some aid from the Pharmacists Guild. Although the aid was paid for with Gerian's old face, they were still happier than the mage families.
包括凯文在内，所有人都已经绝望了，在一个完全恢复魔力的大魔导士面前，一切都只是浮云，翡翠高塔这边虽然人多势众，却没有一个人能救得了葛瑞安……
Everyone was in despair, including Kevin. All was naught in the face of a mage with a fully restored mana. Though they had plenty of people in the Emerald Tower, none could help Gerian...
包括格林－伯恩塞德在内，几乎所有的药剂师，都是严格按照配方操作，他们从来不会去思考，为什么要这样，又为什么不能那样，被束缚了想象力，不敢打破固有规则的他们，也许有机会凭借自己的努力达到宗师境界，但却永远也不可能接触到神匠领域。

Almost all the pharmacists, including Grimm Burnside, followed strictly in accordance with the formulas. They had never considered the reasons why they had to do this or why they could not do that. They were bound by their imagination and dared not break the inherent rules. They might have the chance to reach the realm of a guru by their own efforts, but they would never be able to reach the realm of a Divine Smith.
包括艾萨克在内，这位加洛斯城主望着那一点点溅起的火花，目光中已是充满了绝望，伸出手来指了指巴瑟罗尔，想要开口骂他几句，却又发现自己根本说不出话来，只是神色复杂的叹了口气，慢慢将伸出的手放了下来。

...Including Isaac—the Castellan of Jarrosus City watched the spattering sparks, his eyes full of despair. He held out his hand and pointed at Bathrilor, wanting to scold him, but found himself speechless. With a complex expression, he sighed and slowly lowered his outstretched hand.
匆匆一眼，给林立的感觉却只能用惊艳来形容……
Lin Li had glanced in a hurry, but he could only describe it as amazing...
匆匆将麦德林打发走，安度因又走到林立面前，一张老脸之上，带着几分急切的神色：“费雷，快来帮我看看，这瓶蛮牛之力配得怎么样……”
Andoine hurriedly sent Medellin away and walked to Lin Li. He had an anxious expression on his aged face. "Felic, hurry and help me see how the Bull's Strength Potion is doing..."
十一魔法家族，六大地下势力，加洛斯城主府，加洛斯魔法公会，再加上十几支弱小势力，以及几十上百个乱七八糟的野人，这座城市里有资格竞争奥法药剂的人，几乎都坐在了公会大厅里，一时间这空旷的公会大厅，竟显得有些拥挤起来。

11 mage families, six underground forces, castellan of Jarrosus, Jarrosus Guild of Magic, plus a few dozen weaker forces, and a few hundred wild men from all over the place. Everyone qualified to compete for the Arcane Magic Potion in Jarrosus was sitting in the guild's hall. For a moment, the spacious guild hall looked crowded.
十七级大魔导士所拥有的，简直就是非人的力量，仅仅是外放的魔力，就足以在树林中引发一阵可怕的元素风暴，狂风卷起了漫天的落叶，沙尘泥土混做一片，打在人脸上就好象刀割一样，身处这元素风暴的中心，霍伦那张方方正正的脸上，更是充满了复仇的快意。

The power that a level-seventeen archmage had was simply superhuman. Even only the radiation of magic could bring about a terrifying elemental storm in the forest. The fierce winds swirled up a whole sky of fallen leaves. The dust, sand and soil became one, and if it hit one's face, it felt like a cut from a knife. At the heart of this elemental storm, Hoeren's face was filled with the pleasure of revenge.
十三个魔力节点激活的瞬间，那块纯净的红宝石，也散发出了耀眼的光芒，林立将点金棒往前一伸，落到了一枚五级魔晶上，刹时间就只见一片光芒升腾而起，魔晶瞬间被分解成最纯粹的魔法精华，只留下一片晶莹的光晕附在点金棒上。

At the instant the 13 magic nodes were activated, the pure ruby gave off a dazzling light as well. Lin Li extended the gold rod forward and it landed on a level-five magical crystal. In an instant, a ray of light rose from it as the magical crystal was dissolved into the purest essence of magic, leaving only a glittering halo on the gold rod.
十二年前，当年仅三岁的江逸被大长老抱回江家，成为江家实力最强大的外门供奉，大长老的干孙子时，他的地位尊荣，是名正言顺的旁系少爷。

Twelve years prior, a three-year-old Jiang Yi was brought back to the family by the Grand Elder and consecrated as the Grand Elder’s god-grandson. It was then that Jiang Yi acquired his respectable standing—by being made a legitimate descendant of the Jiang Clan, despite not having the Jiang Clan’s blood flowing through his veins.
十二年前，当朦胧记忆中他的娘亲病逝时，他被大长老用右手抱到了这座天羽城，而当时大长老左手抱着的另一个小孩，就是小奴。他和小奴在天羽城除了江家的族人外，根本就不认识其他人，又是哪里冒出来的亲戚？

Jiang Yi probed the murky depths of his memory with a thoughtful expression. Roughly twelve years ago, after his mother died from an illness, Jiang Yi was carried to Skyplume City in the Grand Elder’s right arm. At the time, there was another kid carried in the Grand Elder’s left arm: Xiaonu. Xiaonu and Jiang Yi both did not know anyone else in Skyplume City besides the members of the Jiang Clan, so where on earth could she have magically found some relatives?
十二点还有一章，顺便满地打滚求推荐票！
十五分钟的时候，葛瑞安的瞳孔也渐渐放大……
At fifteen minutes, Gerian's pupils began to dilate...
十几息时间后，正当他莫名惊诧的四方扫视时，突然感觉左眼看到的物体一下子变得模糊了起来。再眨依然如此，视力已经回复了正常。这回墙角那只蜘蛛虽然还能看到，但怎么都看不清他腿上有没有毛了……

About half a minute later, after sweeping the surrounding with a baffled glance, he suddenly realized that his left eye viewed things in a blur. It was the same when he blinked. His vision had returned to normal—this time he could still see the spider on the wall but could not make out whether there were hairs on its legs…
十几息时间后，黑色元力消耗完，江逸只能停下运转江水决，调集一丝黑色元力继续增幅药力。如此周而复始，在十缕黑色元力消耗完毕后，他才停下了修炼。

Some twenty or thirty seconds later, the black essence force had be completely consumed. Jiang Yi had no choice but to stop circulating the Jiang Water Art technique, and instead assemble a wisp of black essence force to continue increasing the medical efficacy. In such an established cycle, only when he had consumed all ten wisps of black essence force, did he reach his "ending point" and thus stop his power cultivation.
十几枚魔晶放在桌上，林立手里拿着点金棒，在那稍稍犹豫了一下，还是把怒焰之袍给脱了下来。
More than a dozen magical crystals lay on the table. Lin Li held the gold rod in his hand. After a slight hesitation, he removed the Robe of Wrath he was wearing.
十分钟的时候，凯文的额头上开始冒起汗来……
At ten minutes, sweat began to break out on Kevin's forehead...
十四万金币其实已经超过了罗林家族的底线，可安东尼－罗林还是不得不死死的顶着。
140,000 gold coins had already exceeded the Rolin Family's budget, but Anthony Rolin had no choice but to hang tough.
十枚灵神丹用了九枚，而他……也终于修炼到了铸鼎境二重！内视到丹田内多了一倍，颜色也更深了一分的蓝色元力，江逸恨不得仰天一声长啸，释放内心的快意。

Out of the ten Spirit Pills, he had consumed nine of them, and he... had also finally cultivated his power up to the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm! He used his inner vision to see that, within his dantian, he acquired twice the amount of blue essence force as before, with its colour being darker by a grade. Jiang Yi could not help but release a loud holler towards the sky, releasing the happiness in his heart.
半个时辰之后便抵达了西山。
He reached the Western Hills in an hour.
半个时辰之后，江逸的身子被重重的拍飞出去，翊龙宇也累得气喘吁吁，江逸呲牙咧嘴的爬了起来，拱手道：“翊公子实力强大，在下甘拜下风。”

An hour later, Jiang Yi took a heavy hit as his body was tossed to the side. At this point, Jiang Longyu was already panting with exhaustion. Jiang Yi grimaced and climbed to his feet, cupping his hands in salutation, "Young Master Yi was indeed strong, yours truly humbly admit defeat."
半夜时分，等他提炼满了十缕黑色元力立即运转去丹田外，轻松的消融了十枚龙形封印上的红色符文。让他惊喜的是，随着符文不断的消失，他修炼江水决的速度再次增快，达到了原先的三倍。

At midnight, once he had refined ten full strands of black essence force, he immediately transferred them to the exterior of his dantian and smoothly removed ten runic characters off the dragon-shaped seal. What made him pleasantly surprised was that, as the characters continued to vanish, the speed which he refined essence force using the Jiang Water Art increased further, reaching speeds three times the original level.
半柱香时间后，他无奈的睁开眼睛，却很快满脸惊异起来。因为他发现这个世界还是那么的清晰，这都半柱香时间了，这黑色元力竟还没消耗完？

Two and a half minutes later, he helplessly opened his eyes. Yet his facial expression very quickly changed to one of amazement. This was because he realised that, seen through his eyes, the world around him was still so clear. It had already been two and a half minutes, yet how could it be that the black essence force had not been consumed fully?
占了人家炼丹房弟子的位置，虽然并不是他有意的，江逸还是有些尴尬的饶头道：“柳长老不在，嗯……昨日你走了之后，我正想跟着离开，却被柳长老叫住了，让我以后留在这帮忙了。”

Taking over someone else's position as the assistant in the alchemy lab... even though it was not his intention to do so, he felt awkward.
"Elder Liu is not here," Jiang Yi replied. "Erm... yesterday, after you left, I was just thinking of leaving with you, but I was called back by Elder Liu, and he let me stay here to help him out in the future."
危难关头，他脑海似乎也运转得特别快了，突然他灵机一动，好像……下午研究时，黑色元力运转到眼睛时，时间流转慢了一丝？

His mind seemed to move particularly quickly during such a greatly dangerous moment. An idea came to him suddenly. It seemed as though... during his research that afternoon, when some black essence force was transferred to his eyes, time had slowed down by a smidgen.
即使是计算错误，也不过是用八十万金币买了十瓶奥法药剂而已，价格虽然贵了点，却也同样可以赢得魔法公会的好感，再蠢的人都不会去拒绝一个慷慨的买家，精明如葛瑞安自然更加不会。

Even if he had miscalculated, he only had to buy that ten bottles of Arcane Magic Potion with 800,000 gold coins. It might be a little expensive, but he could still win the favor of the Guild of Magic nonetheless. The most foolish of person would not reject a generous buyer, much less a shrewd person like Gerian.
即便在场众人已经了解了一些内幕，此时再听到凯文亲口承认时，也是很难掩饰心头的震撼，药剂大师是什么概念？那是早已超脱凡俗的人物，几瓶小小的药水，就足以让一支势力从衰落到兴起，也足以让一个庞大家族瞬间分崩离析。

Even if the people present already knew something, they could not hide the shock hearing Kevin admitting it. What was the concept of a potion master? It was someone who was long out of the ordinary; a few small bottles of potions would be enough to make a power rise from decline and a huge family to fall apart in an instant.
即便小江逸将那数十部秘笈，每一种系别的心法全都试验了一遍，耗时接近一年，却依旧没有出现奇迹——他提炼一个月元力积攒出来的成果，甚至比不上某些天才子弟修炼一天来得多！

The young Jiang Yi spent almost an entire year trying out every single technique of mental cultivation available in the stacks of secret tomes. Despite this, he did not experience any miracle at all. The amount of essence force collected over a month of cultivation remained less than what some genius disciples extracted in a single day.
即便是以老格林的淡泊名利，此时听见林立的悄悄话，一张老脸也是不由涨成了猪肝色……
Even with Old Grimm's indifference to fame and fortune, his face turned liver-colored when he heard Lin Li's whispers...
即便是刚刚突破十三级的林立，在这股压力之下，也有一种喘不过气来的感觉，这是最纯粹的力量压制，霍伦没有吟唱任何咒语，也没有施展任何法术，仅凭着魔力的外放，就足以压制这三个实力不弱的年轻魔法师。

Even for Lin Li, who had just surpassed level-thirteen, he felt breathless at such pressure. This was the purest form of strength suppression. Hoeren had not chanted any spells nor performed any spells. He only relied on the radiation of magic, which was enough to suppress three rather powerful young magi.
却偏偏没有什么办法，林立所能够做的，只能是更加勤奋的练习，更加拼命的阅读各种魔法书籍，希望能用勤奋去弥补这一切。
But there was no other way. What Lin Li could do was to practice and read all kinds of magic books more diligently, hoping to make up for all this with diligence.
却没想到让他去一次加洛斯，竟然会断了两根手指回来，如果不是父亲奥德文拦着，霍伦早就亲自去加洛斯找那个叫费雷的凶手了。

But he never thought that once he allowed Bathrilor to go to Jarrosus, he had returned with two broken fingers. If it were not for his father Odwin holding him back, Hoeren would have already gone to Jarrosus himself to find the assailant called Felic.
原本他还看中了一条项链，打算让那制服小妹妹拿下来给他看看，可是一摸口袋，却忽然发现这么一个尴尬的事实，林立脸上的笑容顿时僵住了，憋了半天不得不讪讪笑道：“我先看看……等下再说……”

He had his eyes on a necklace and was about to ask the uniformed lady to show it to him when he had discovered this embarrassing fact upon touching his pockets. The smile on Lin Li's face froze and after a long while he chuckled lamely, "I'll have a look... We'll see how later..."
原本只存在于传闻当中的人物，终于在凯文口中变成了事实，一时间公会大厅里乱得有些不可开交，所有人都在窃窃私语，所有人都在四处张望，那一刹那间的骚乱，几乎将整个公会大厅淹没。

A character that only existed in hearsay had finally become a fact in Kevin's words, and all at once the guild's hall was thrown into a pandemonium. Everyone was whispering and looking about. The moment of ferment almost drowned out the guild's hall.
原本只是作为照明之用的低级魔法，在这幽暗潮湿的洞穴中，威力竟是大得出奇，只听一声惨叫传来，那猛扑而来的怪物已是受了重创。
What was originally a low-grade magic spell used for lighting had released an extraordinary power in this dark and damp cave. A cry of horror ensued and the savage beast was badly wounded.
原本只有一百二十斤力气的江逸仓促运转江水决元力，竟然在融合了无名口诀修炼出来的那一丝黑色元力之后，一招便将江豹反推出去四五丈远？

when Jiang Yi hurriedly circulated the Jiang Water Art essence force which only had about 72 kilograms of force, it unexpectedly fused with a cloud of black essence force from the nameless formula. One blow was enough to sent Jiang Bao tumbling back fifty feet away.
原本异常臃肿的身体，此时竟是如山岳般凝重。
His body, originally overstuffed, was as imposing as a mountain in that instant.
原本葛瑞安就有点奇怪，安度因虽然是加洛斯魔法公会成员之一，可这老家伙一向沉迷于药剂学，在公会几十年就没干过一件正事，偶尔露一次面，也大多是要材料要配方，今天这是吹的什么风，这老家伙居然给人写起介绍信来了……

Gerian had found it odd from the start. Although Andoine was a member of the Jarrosus Guild of Magic, he had been immersed in pharmaceutics and had not done anything serious in the guild for decades. He'd occasionally show his face once in a while, but only when he needed ingredients for his recipes. Had the directions of the wind changed for the old chap to write someone a letter of recommendation…?
原本蹲着一个马步的江如鹰眼中寒光一闪，双腿一曲身子突兀朝前方跃去，右腿上黄色元力环绕带着赫赫风声如一把锋利斧头般，对着跪着的江逸后背狠狠劈下。

A glimmer of coldness flashed past Jiang Ruying's eyes. Originally squatting in a horse stance, both of his legs bent downwards as his body suddenly leaped forward. The yellow essence force revolving around his right leg produced a brilliant windy sound as the leg cut down ruthlessly onto a kneeling Jiang Yi's back like a sharp axe.
原本迷宫一般的森林，仿佛忽然之间就开朗起来。
The forest that was initially like a labyrinth seemed more pleasant all of a sudden.
去办手续的路上，两人不时聊上几句，渐渐的也有些熟了。
On the way down, the two of them chatted from time to time and gradually became familiar with each other.
参与竞争的是一名中年人，葛瑞安看了他一眼，就低声向林立说道：“这个是亚伦－马齐斯，血色兄弟会的首领，加洛斯六大地下势力之一，主要控制着赌场生意，这家伙不是个简单的人物，老奥丁跟他争过几次赌场控制权，可一次也没争过，你看着吧，那小个子要有麻烦了……”

It was a middle-aged man who participated in the competition. Gerian took a look at him and whispered to Lin Li, "This is Aaron Matsis, the leader of the Blood Brotherhood, one of the six underground forces in Jarrosus mainly in control of the casinos. This fellow is not simple; Old Odin has fought for the control of the casino rights with him but not once did he succeed. Just look, that shorty is in trouble..."
参加宴会的多是加洛斯名流，除了十七支势力的人外，还有不少富商名人之流，此时男男女女一个个打扮得衣冠楚楚光彩照人，在宴会大厅中如穿花蝴蝶般左右逢迎，看上去倒也热闹非凡。

The majority of the guests were distinguished personages of Jarrosus. Apart from the 17 forces, there were many rich businessmen and celebrities. The men and women were all dressed to the nines, fluttering about in the banquet hall like butterflies. It looked like an extremely lively scene.
参加拍卖会的各大势力首脑，肯定是要好好招待一番的，他们送来的金币，自然也需要有人去清点，还有曼尼斯家族送来的那一百套精良装备，也应该开放给公会魔法师申请，乱七八糟的一堆事摆在那里，光是想想都让人觉得头大。

The leaders of the major forces who had attended the auction had to be well-served. The gold coins they sent would need someone to count of course; and the 100 sets of excellent magic equipment sent by the Mannes Family should be open to the guild mages to apply for. All the matters were in a mess, and just thinking about them would make anyone's head ache.
又听那声音发了好一阵脾气，就在林立打算捂起耳朵继续睡觉时，那虚掩的房门却忽然打开了。
Another fit of temper from the owner of the voice. Lin Li was just about to cover his ears and go back to sleep when the door that was unlatched swung open.
又是一段火焰之手的咒语响起，林立很小心的控制着魔力，让那跳动的火苗轻轻燎着烧杯底部，烧杯中的巨龙之血渐渐开始沸腾，空气中弥漫起了一股奇异的味道，那是血腥味经过加热蒸发，又混合着星辰沙清新的味道，闻起来有些古怪有些刺鼻。

Another spell recitation for the Flaming Hands sounded. Lin Li carefully controlled the mana, letting the flickering flame stroke the bottom of the beaker gently. The dragon's blood began to boil and a peculiar smell permeated the air. It was the smell of heated and evaporated blood mixed with the freshness of the star sand—a smell that was strange and pungent.
又是上百万金币的药草砸下去，药剂学也顺利升到了大师级别。
Again, another million gold coins worth of herbs smashed and an advancement to the Master of Pharmaceutics.
又比如什么费雷魔法师这么年轻，怎么就有这么高深的药剂造诣，直弄得林立是头大如斗，偏偏还不能告诉他，老子无数金币外加一张愿望卷轴，活活砸出来的五系宗师，靠的就是金钱开路，你要有钱你也可以……

Or that Mage Felic was so young but his attainments in pharmaceutics were so advanced, making Lin Li's head turn big as a bucket. But he could not tell Isaac that he had smashed in countless gold coins and a Scroll of Wishes to attain his status as a guru of all five series. It was money that paved the way. You could do it as well if you had the money...
又贫瘠又分散的矿脉，可以说是最安全的了，所以林立一点也不着急，就算有人过去了又怎么样？还不是只能干看着，没有大师级别的矿物知识，他们就算上采半个月都不一定能采干净。

A mineral vein both barren and dispersed could be said to be the safest. Thus, Lin Li did not bother to worry at all. So what if other people reached there before him? Without Master-level mineral knowledge, they could only stare-whether they would be able to mine out all minerals in half a month's time remained questionable at the very least.
双方同时耗尽魔力，敌人却在最关键的时候，拥有了完全恢复魔力的机会，这世上恐怕再也没有比这更加无奈的事了……

Both had exhausted all their mana, but the enemy had possessed the opportunity to restore all his mana at the most critical time. There was probably nothing else in this world that could feel more helpless than this...
双方有着近十级的差距，最后竟要以这样的方式来决定胜负。
There was a difference of ten levels between both sides, and in the end this would be the way to decide the winner in this battle.
双足飞龙的悲鸣声中充满了绝望，这种情绪一直伴随着它咽下最后一口气。
The wail of the Wyvern was filled with despair, and such emotions accompanied it till it breathed its last.
反倒是长时间的咒语吟唱，更容易让他陷入危险当中，既然无法在短时间内解决咒语吟唱速度的问题，林立干脆专门选些简单的魔法来学，反正魔力不会枯竭，一个不行就多用几个，几十个魔法砸下来，还有什么东西是砸不倒的？

Instead, the prolonged recitation of spells might put him in more danger. Since he couldn't solve the problem of his recitation speed in a short time, Lin Li simply chose the easier magic to learn. His powers wouldn't be exhausted anyway; if one didn't work, he'd use several more. With dozens of magical powers blasting down, what wouldn't be knocked down?
反正人证物证都在，就算想抵赖也抵赖不了。
The witnesses and evidence were all present; there was no use denying even if he wanted to.
反正以葛瑞安如今的地位，认他这么个便宜叔叔，倒也不算太过吃亏……
In any case, it was not too bad to acknowledge Gerian as an uncle given his current position...
发了发了发了发了……这次是真发了！
J... J... Jackpot... We had hit the jackpot this time!
发财大计眼看泡汤了，肚子又饿得贴后背，江逸内心沮丧了到了极点。
Seeing the grand scheme to get rich go down the drain, while at the same time feeling so ravenous that he could eat a horse, the frustration in his heart reached close to breaking point.
受伤的中年男人名叫麦格雷尼，加洛斯城众多冒险者之一，这一次进入落日山脉，是接受了冒险者公会的一个任务，目的是为了取得一只狮蝎的尾刺，而那个有着一头金色长发的美女，则是他的女儿，名叫伊娜，她同样是一位冒险者。

The injured middle-aged man was called McGrenn, one of the many Adventurers in Jarrosus City. He had entered the Sunset Mountains after accepting a quest from the Adventurers Guild to obtain a Manticore's tail. The beautiful lady with the long blond hair was his daughter Ina, she was an adventurer just like him.
另外一个大概也是四十多岁，胡子拉碴看上去有些不修边幅，身后斜斜背着一把阔剑，一股灼热的气息从剑身上透出，凭林立的眼光，只是匆匆一瞟便已看出，这绝对是一把优秀的火属性魔法武器。

The other, probably also in his forties, had a shabby beard and a broad sword leaning on his back, giving off a scorching aura. Lin Li could see that it was definitely an excellent weapon of fire attribute with just a glance.
只不过……林立不急，安度因却急了。
However... Andoine could not wait.
只不过这一次，老格林再也不敢将他当成一个需要指点的后辈，而是当成了一个有资格与自己共同研究的药剂大师。
However, this time, Old Grimm did not dare to treat him as a junior who needed advice, but a potion master who was qualified for a discussion together.
只可惜……安度因却忘了告诉他，眼前这个家伙根本就是个二手魔法师，别说你格林－伯恩塞德，就算是法师之神格雷斯科站在他面前，他估计都会懵懵懂懂的问上一句：“格雷斯科是什么人？”

Unfortunately... Andoine had completely forgotten to tell him that the little fellow before him was a half-baked mage; not to mention Grimm Burnside, even if the God of Mages, Geresco, was standing in front of him, he would be ignorant of it and ask, "Who is Geresco?"
只可惜城主大人透出的消息太少，这青年又对自己的来历讳莫如深，以至于到目前为止，安东尼也仅仅是知道他叫巴瑟罗尔，来自法兰王都奥兰纳。

It was a pity that the Castellan had divulged too little information, and the young man was so secretive about his origins that, so far, Anthony only knew his name was Bathrilor, from the capital city Alanna of the Felan Kingdom.
只可惜眼前的形势，实在很难让一个魔法师发挥作用，在剧烈的奔跑当中，身体孱弱的魔法师甚至已经成了累赘，于是大多数时候，都是那位有着一头金色长发的美女在照顾两人，这姑娘长得本就漂亮，又穿着一件紧身的红色软甲，在快速的奔跑当中，更是勾勒出无限美好的曲线，左手扶着伤者，右手倒提着一把短剑，顾盼之间流露出的气质，连藏身林间的林立都忍不住多看了她几眼。

Unfortunately, it was difficult for a mage to play a role in the current situation. The weak mage had became a burden with the vigorous running, hence it was the beautiful girl with the long blond hair looking after the two men most of the time. The girl, who was pretty to begin with, wore a tight red vest, which had outlined an infinite lovely curve in the high-speed running. She held onto the wounded man with her left hand and carried a dagger in her right hand. The temperament she displayed as she scanned her surroundings was such that Lin Li could not help but take a few more looks at her.
只可惜这把双手巨剑，实在不怎么适合希恩，因为淬火不够，严重影响锋利度不说，重量还稍稍轻了一点，对希恩这种蛮不讲理，只会大劈大砍的家伙的来说，一把武器最重要的地方就是重量，不管带不带魔法属性，也不管锋不锋利，只要重量够了，就能够在他手上发挥出庞大的威力。

However, it was a pity that this sword was really not quite suitable for Sheehan. Due to insufficient quenching, not only was the sharpness of its blade greatly compromised, its weight was also too light. For a savage like Sheehan, who only knew how to slash and hack, weight was the most crucial aspect of a weapon for him, regardless of its magical attributes and sharpness. As long as it had enough weight, it could unleash immense power in Sheehan's hands.
只可惜院门口有个大煞风景的华袍中年人正负着手，背对大门而立。当他听到江逸的脚步声时也不回头，反而重重的冷哼一声。

Unfortunately, Jiang Yi’s spirits were dampened by a middle-aged man in Chinese robes standing at the doorway to the courtyard, his back facing the door and arms folded. Upon hearing Jiang Yi’s footsteps coming from behind him, not only did the man refuse to turn around, he released a cold snort.
只可惜，现在时间太早。
Unfortunately, it was still too early.
只可惜，笑得再矜持，想得再完美，也得有机会实施才行。
Except, no matter how reserved his smile was or how perfect his plan was, there had to be a chance for him to carry it out.
只损失了大量的野钢花，这确实是不幸中的大幸，比起智慧之树树叶来，野钢花实在太常见了，它们生长的唯一条件就是阴凉，越是阴暗潮湿的地方越利于它们生长，这种环境随处可见，光是这落日山脉上就有不知道多少。

Only a large number of wild steelbloom were lost, that was indeed a stroke of good luck in the midst of bad. Compared to the leaves of the Wisdom Tree, wild steelbloom were much more common. The only condition for their growth was shade. The darker and damper the place was, the more they thrived. This environment could be found anywhere, and there were countless such places just in the Sunset Mountains alone.
只是……
It was just that…
只是一眨眼之间，凯文就被一众宾客围住。
In the blink of an eye, Kevin was surrounded by a crowd of guests.
只是一眼望去，大厅里却是空荡荡的，连一个人也看不见。
At a glance, the hall was empty, and not a single person was in sight.
只是不等他迟疑，门口的一名黑甲护卫立即抓住他的手臂，热情的带着他朝里面走去，一边走还一边宽慰道：“别担心，武殿是绝对不允许打死人的，就算你陪练时不小心受伤了，武殿内也会有疗伤药奉上……”

However, not allowing him to hesitate any further, one of the guards wearing black armor at the door immediately grabbed his arm and enthusiastically brought him into the interior.
As they walked, the guard consoled him by saying, "Don't worry; the Martial Arts Hall would never allow anyone to beat others to death. Even if you accidentally get injured during sparring practice, the Martial Arts Hall will offer some medicine for your wound recovery..."
只是半个时辰之后，他的修炼又被打断了，江家大院内响起一阵沉闷的钟声，竟是家族大人物去世才会响起的丧钟。

It was only after an hour that his practices were interrupted once again. A low, loud bell-ring came from within the central courtyard. It was the ringing sound for sad events, released only when important persons in the family clan passed away.
只是对方既然找上门来了，他也不能不打，好在随着他境界的提升，黑色元力再次被凝练了，颜色也变浅了一些。虽然上限还是十缕，但每一缕能让视力增强时间又变长了，此刻都能达到一炷香时间了，他对战起来也轻松无比。

Now that someone came to him, Jiang Yi did not have it in him to refuse. Fortunately, as he elevated through the stages in the Cast Tripod Realm, the black essence force became more condensed as well. Its color turned a shade lighter. Even though he could still cultivate ten wisps at most, the duration that each wisp could strengthen the vision became longer, reaching as long as five minutes. Thanks to this, he could fend for himself in a fight without breaking into a sweat.
只是片刻，江逸的身子再次一震，眼睛猛然睁开，这次他没有流泪而是站起了身子，仰天一声长啸，长啸声洪亮激昂，里面都是快意和兴奋！

It was only seconds before Jiang Yi's body shuddered. Abruptly opening his eyes, he did not shed more tears, but rather stood up and whistled loudly towards the sky. The long whistle was loud, clear, and impassioned. It was full of elation and excitement!
只是现在，说什么都已经晚了。
But now, it was too late to say anything.
只是眨眼之间，两道魔纹已是初具雏形。
In the blink of an eye, the two mageweaths had taken shape.
只是等他调集一缕黑色元力去伤口附近准备和药力融合时，却发现经过三个多时辰后，那药力已经全部消耗掉了，这黄参丹不愧是最低级的丹药，药力弱得可怜……

It was just that when he had collated a strand of black essence force and moved it near the wound area and prepared to merge with the medicinal power, he discovered that, when more than six hours had passed, the medical efficacy had been completely consumed. This Yellow Ginseng Elixir had proven itself to be the lowest-grade elixir with a pitifully weak medical efficacy...
只是这么将手一抬，就轻易放出了冲击水幕，这是真正的瞬发！
It was merely a lift of the hand, and the Waterfall Strike was unleashed. This was a genuine instantaneous burst of power!
只是这原本有些无奈的笑容，落入克伦威尔眼中，却显得说不出的讽刺，刚刚因凯文拒绝而堵在胸口的一口气，忽然之间就找到了宣泄的出口……

The smile that was meant to be a sign of resignation was deemed as an ineffable sarcasm in Cromwell's eyes. Kevin's refusal had his breath stuck in his chest, and he'd suddenly found an outlet to vent it out...
只是，她刚刚追出来，就看到江逸的身影已经消失前数十丈之外，拐进一条弯道内消失不见了。
However, just moments after chasing after him, she saw Jiang Yi disappear tens of feet away around the corner.
只有一阵剧烈的魔法波动，以及“轰”的一声闷响。
There was only an intense magical wave and a muffled thud.
只有他才明白柳长老为何猝死，这柳长老是个典型的偏执狂，炼丹狂人！肯定是因为探查不出那枚地阶丹药内莫名多出来的成分，这几天没日没夜的研究，走火入魔而死……

Only he knew why Elder Liu had suddenly died. This Elder Liu was the textbook example for a paranoiac and a person crazy for refining elixirs.
It was definitely the case that as he could not identify the additional ingredients mysteriously included in that earth-grade elixir pill, he had spent several days researching non-stop without any rest and, as a result, died from over-exertion...
只有几个小势力头头还围在凯文身旁，拼命的献着殷勤攀着交情，只可怜凯文冒充了一上午拍卖师，如今早已经是累得手脚发软了，偏偏还被几个势力头头堵在那里，弄得他走也不是不走也不是……

Only a few leaders of the smaller forces still crowded around Kevin, desperately trying to pull friendship with him. Poor Kevin had been acting as an auctioneer for the whole morning and was so tired that his limbs were weak and yet he was blocked by these leaders. This made it impossible for him to leave nor stay...
只见前方树丛中一阵叶浪涌动，三名受伤的人类拼命的逃出树林，其中那名手握长剑的中年男人似乎受了相当重的伤，一道长长的伤口从胸口延伸到腰腹，滚烫的鲜血从伤口中喷涌而出，在铺满落叶的地面上拉出一条长长的血痕。

The leaves of the bush ahead stirred and three wounded people could be seen fleeing from the forest. Among them, a middle-aged man seemed to have been seriously injured. A long wound extended from his chest to his waist; warm blood gushed out from the fresh wound, leaving a long blood trail on the ground covered with decaying leaves.
只见炼金台上一片火花四溅，炫目的魔法符文来回激荡，华丽得就如同夜空的烟火，在林立娴熟的技艺之下，一根由深渊秘银锻造的点金棒，很快在炼金台上露出了雏形。

Sparks flew on the forging platform; the dazzling magical runes swung back and forth, magnificent like fireworks in the night sky. Under Lin Li's consummate skills, the gold rod forged with the abyss mithril begun to take its form on the forging platform.
叫了半天没人出声，胖老头的火气也上来了，只听“砰”的一声闷响，那紧闭的房们当场就被踹成了两半，林立在一旁看得是眼睛都直了，老家伙力气怎么这么大，这到底是魔法师还是魔兽？

A long silence. The fat old man got angry and the tightly shut door was kicked and split in half with a thud. Lin Li stood at a side, stunned by what he just saw. How was the old fellow so strong? Was he a mage or a beast?
叫出这个价格的，是一名大概二三十岁的小个子青年，穿着件做工不错的法师袍，葛瑞安看了他几眼都叫不出名字，估计是某支小势力的头头，这家伙大概也跟林立一样，没见过太多金币，喊出五千这个价格之后，就以为胜券在握了，坐在人群中笑得一脸得意，大有这瓶奥法药剂非我莫属的意思。

It was a short young man in his twenties or thirties who had called out the price. He wore a mage robe with fine craftsmanship. Gerian couldn't remember his name even after taking a few looks at him, hence he was most likely a leader of some smaller force. This guy was probably just like Lin Li, not having seen too many gold coins. After he had called out 5,000 gold coins, he thought that victory was in hands and was smiling smugly as he sat among the crowd, a smile that said the bottle of Arcane Magic Potion was his to claim.
可一老一少两个甩手掌柜，却是直接将事情丢给了凯文，以有要事商议为理由，堂而皇之的躲进了会客室。
However, the old and the yound took their hands off all of it and dumped the matters to Kevin. They openly hid into the reception room on the grounds of having something important to discuss.
可他这一心急，却忘了树上的是一头八级魔兽。
He was so anxious he had forgotten there was a level-eight magical beast on the tree.
可如今才过了四天，凯文就感觉到，林立在魔法方面，已经远远的把自己甩在了身后。
But only four days had passed and Kevin could feel that Lin Li had already left him far behind in magic.
可如果自己不是在做梦的话……
But if it wasn’t a dream…
可就在这个时候意外发生了。
But it was at this moment when the accident happened.
可怜两人不过是地痞流氓，在这里看门也大多只是欺负欺负落魄冒险者，又几时撞上过真正的魔法师，那两记奥术飞弹虽是低级魔法，可这么结结实实的轰在胸口，身体再强壮也得被轰去半条命，此时见了林立，就好象是见了鬼一样，惊惶之下连连点头：“可以可以……”

The two poor men were nothing but rogue gatekeepers. They mostly bullied derelict adventurers as they watched the gates, and had never met a real mage before. Those two Arcane Missiles were a low-level spell, but as they landed solidly on the chests, even the strongest in body could be half-killed. At this time, they looked at Lin Li as if they had seen a ghost, and hurriedly nodded in trepidation. "Yes, yes..."
可惜……
Unfortunately...
可惜……在目前看来，他的实验是失败的。
Unfortunately... At present, his experiments were a failure.
可惜……昨天那一脚，却把什么都出卖了。
It was a pity that yesterday's affairs exposed everything.
可惜……最近两年他越来越不受江家待见，不仅月例一扣再扣，就连丹药也变成最低级的人阶下品“元力丹”和“黄参丹”，数量还都变成了一枚。

Unfortunately, as he had been increasingly disfavoured by the Jiang Clan over the past two years, not only had his monthly salary been cut again time and time again, even the elixirs had been replaced with the lowest of grades—the human-grade inferior-grade "essence force elixir" and "yellow ginseng elixir". Worse still, the quantity had even been reduced to just one pill.
可惜不管他多不想看见，城主大人反正是带着她过来了。
Unfortunately, regardless how much he was reluctant to see her, the Castellan had brought her to him.
可惜如今的葛瑞安，也是眼睛朝天看了。
It was a pity now that Gerian had his eyes for bigger things.
可惜林立根本不给他们这个机会，正沉浸在想象当中的魔法师们，很快就看见林立的手又伸进了口袋里，这一次他拿出来的，仍然是一只天蓝色的玻璃瓶，同样璀璨夺目的光晕，同样纯净的魔法气息。

Unfortunately, Lin Li did not give them any chance at all. The mages, immersed in their imagination, soon saw Lin Li‘s hand reaching into his pocket again. This time, what he took out was yet another sky-blue glass bottle, with the likewise dazzling halo and the pure magical aura.
可惜葛瑞安根本不给他们这个机会，你们喜欢玩谦让是吧？那就干脆再推你们一把好了，梅林家族刚刚拿了三瓶，肯定是不会满足的，谁都知道他们家族四级学徒最多，另外两家一瓶没拿，更不可能放弃了，这可是奥法药剂，错过这次机会，下一次还不知道要等到哪年。

Too bad Gerian would not give them the opportunity. You liked to play modestly? Then I'd simply give you a push. The Merlin Family had taken three bottles just now and would surely not be satisfied. Everyone knew they had the most level-four apprentices. The other two families had not taken any bottle and would be even less likely to give up. This was the Arcane Magic Potion: if the opportunity was missed, who knew when the next one would come.
可惜见都已经见了，正病急乱投医的克伦威尔，又哪管他愿不愿意，扑上来就拼命的跟凯文握手：“好久不见好久不见……”

It was a pity they'd already seen each other. Cromwell, who was like a drowning man clutching at any straw that could save his life, rushed up and shook Kevin's hands, whether the latter wanted it or not. "Long time no see, long time no see..."
可惜除了事后骂两句娘，并在心里默默增加一次秋后算账的誓言外，他又能如何呢……
Unfortunately, besides cursing them under his breath, and once again vowing to take revenge in his mind, what else could he do?
可惜！
Too bad!
可是她却从未听过所谓的黄昏诅咒，更没想过这黄昏诅咒竟能在睡梦中杀人。
But she had never heard of the so-called Twilight Curse, nor had she thought that this Twilight Curse could kill people in their sleep.
可是接管这份工作才几天的江逸并不知道其中内幕，遇到时便忍不住劝了一句，没想到竟然被对方几人给狠狠围殴，一直昏迷到现在才苏醒过来。

However, Jiang Yi, inexperienced as he was, knew nothing of such clandestine “management practices”. As such, he could not help but berate them for their actions. Unexpectedly, the group responded by joining forces and thrashing him. They had left him knocked out cold—until now, that was.
可是现在，自己在这样一个低级魔法师面前，竟是如此的不堪一击。
But now, he had crumbled with a bang before such a low-level mage.
可是看着看着，胖法师脸色就变了，原本笑得眯起的眼睛睁得有牛眼那么大，一边看着手上的信，还一边抬起头来看林立两眼，到了最后连拿信的手都仿佛在抖。

But as he read on, the expression on the plump mage's face changed. His eyes, narrow as he smiled, were as wide as those of a bull. He raised his head a couple of time to look at Lin Li as he was reading the letter. Finally, his hands that were holding on to the letter seemed to be trembling as well.
可是话到嘴边，却又边成了一声苦笑，算了，全凭运气吧……
But when he tried speaking, it became a bitter laugh. Whatever, time to bet everything on luck...
可眼下林立却是很头疼，因为他根本就不知道该怎么回答伊娜的问题。
However, the situation was giving Lin Li a headache, for he had no idea how to answer Ina's questions.
可自从药剂大师的消息传出之后，魔法公会却是一朝野鸡变凤凰，转眼就成了加洛斯最炙手可热的势力，谁不想多巴结巴结葛瑞安？那可是跟着药剂大师混的人物，只要能跟这老家伙搞好关系，别的就不说了，光是这次拍卖会给自己行个方面，就至少值十万金币！

But since news of the potion master were out, the Guild of Magic had transformed from a pheasant into a phoenix. It had become the most sought-after force in Jarrosus Guild in an instant, and who wouldn't want to butter up to Gerian now? This was a guy who hung out with the potion master, and if they could make good of their relationship with this old fellow, not to mention other things, just the auction alone would be worth at least 100,000 gold coins to make things convenient for themselves!
可葛瑞安现在又哪有心思管他们死活？任那几家势力首脑在旁边站了半天，也没能让葛瑞安的眼睛多眨一下，他现在正忙着跟城主大人谈心呢。

But Gerian had no time to care if they were dead or alive. The leaders stood there for a long time but Gerian did not even blink an eye. He was busy having a heart-to-heart talk with the castellan now.
可还没等他坐稳，就又有人报出了新的价格。
But before he could sit tight, someone had offered a new price.
可还没等胖老头高兴完，一段字句却又跳入了眼中。
Before the old man's joy could subside, another paragraph had caught his attention.
可这世界上的事，往往就是这样，你越不想它发生的，它就越是会发生。
But this was often the case in the world. The more you didn't want it to happen, the more it would happen.
可这番举动落入利维坦猩猩眼中，却是以为他要换根藤条再来，刚挨了一顿胖揍的它，顿时吓得魂飞魄散，也顾不得再继续装死了，赶紧从地上蹦了起来，一边“呜呜呜呜”的求情，一边指着远处的一棵巨树。

But the action fell into the eyes of the Leviathan Gorilla, who thought he was going to come back with a different cane. After that fat beating it went through, the gorilla was scared out of its wits. No longer caring about feigning its death, it hastily bounced from the ground and sobbed while begging for forgiveness, at the same time pointing to a giant tree in the distance.
可鲁本－萨鲁曼是什么人物，那可是亲爹亲弟弟说杀就杀的人，眼皮都没抬一下，就又生生把价格抬了十万：“六十五万！”

But what kind of a character was Reuben Saruman? He was someone who said he'd kill his father and brother and really did it without even batting his eyelids. He raised the price by another 100,000 once more. "650,000!"
吃一堑，长一智！
One became wiser after learning from one’s past mistakes!
吃过早饭，林立仍然象往常一样，开始练习元素排列。
Like any other days after breakfast, Lin Li resumed his training on elemental sequencing.
同一时间！
At the same time!
同一时间，那座雄奇天庭建筑上雕刻的千万花草虫鱼、飞禽走兽们竟然也仿若活了过来，各种游动、伸展，散发出生命的气息，一股股朝天庭之上汇聚而去，在那些建筑符文光芒的映照下，于半空中凝聚成一个光芒四溢的护罩，将整座天庭都笼盖了进去。

At the same time, thousands of carvings of flowers, grasses, fish, insects, avians, and land creatures from the Heavenly Court's complex came alive. As they moved around and extended themselves, they released a vigorous aura which converged towards the Heavenly Court. Under the illumination from the glowing runes, a dazzling dome formed in midair, encompassing the entirety of the Heavenly Court.
同时江云山秘密派人购买奇珍异宝，准备在镇西军军官来到天羽城之后好好拉拢一番，这样能多安排几个子弟进镇西军中。也只有江家能和镇西军军官攀上交情，因为神武国镇西军的统帅镇西王也姓江，江家勉强能算是镇西王家族的偏支，大长老江云海年轻时候还在镇西王府当做下人，也算是有些渊源。

In the meantime, Jiang Yunshan privately instructed his men to buy in as much rare treasures and artifacts as possible, in preparation of bribing the Western Garrison Army officers when they came to Skyplume City. He had hoped that with the bribery, more descendants of the Jiang Clan would be allowed enrollment in the army. Indeed, of all the families, the Jiang Clan was most entitled to pull strings with the Western Garrison Army officers, because the commander of the Western Garrison Army, the Western Garrison Liege Lord, also held the surname of 'Jiang'. By this logic, the Jiang Clan was, in very loose terms, a side branch of the liege lord's family clan. In addition, in the early years of his life, Grand Elder Jiang Yunhai used to work in the household of the Western Garrison Liege Lord as a servant, which served as another layer of association.
同样的绚丽而又迷离，同样的透出纯净的魔法气息。
It was likewise gorgeous yet blurry, emitting the same pure magical aura.
同样的，青石板裂开，江逸半条腿都踩穿了青石板，没入到下面的土里——这一腿的威力似乎比拳头还要大上一分！
The limestone slab split like before. Jiang Yi's legs went through the slab but did not reach the ground; the strength of his kick seemed to exceed that of his fist!
后院很宽敞，也有几个老妈子正对着木盆洗着衣物，却没有小奴的身影。不过他看到那几个老妈子神色明显不对，脸上有些畏惧之色，目光正不断的对着后院角落内的一个屋子内扫去。

The backyard was spacious. A few old chambermaids were washing clothes with wooden basins in front of them, but there was no sign of Xiaonu. But he sensed things were not right from the expressions on the old chambermaids' faces. There was fear written on their faces and they kept glancing towards a building in the corner of the backyard.
后院角落内屋子内传来一道隐隐的哭泣和求饶声，江逸浑身一震，顿时大叫起来：“是小奴！”

A sobbing plea for mercy sounded from the building by the corner of the yard.
Jiang Yi shuddered and immediately shouted, "Xiaonu!"
向荣管事复命后，江逸匆忙的回到自己的院子。院内依旧冷清，看样子小奴还没回来。不过江逸也管不上那么多了，一头钻进屋子跳上床，盘坐入定起来。

After reporting to Chief Rong, Jiang Yi hurried to his compound. The yard was as quiet and deserted as ever. From the looks of it Xiaonu was not back yet. However, Jiang Yi couldn't be bothered. He jumped onto his bed and sat down cross legged to meditate.
听到安瑞尔大陆这个陌生的地名，林立就知道这一把玩大了，除了穿越之外，再没有任何解释，只不过就连林立自己都觉得有些奇怪，莫名其妙的成了穿越者，自己居然有一种如释重负的感觉，而脑子冒出的第一个念头竟然是：“穿越就穿越吧，总比当网络怨魂强……”

Lin Li knew it was a big deal when he heard the unfamiliar name of the Anril Continent. Other than time travelling, he had no other explanation for it. However, even Lin Li himself felt a little strange. For no reason at all he had became a time traveler, and yet he felt relieved. The first thing on his mind was, surprisingly, "Time travel it is, better than becoming a resentful soul on the internet..."
听到情况并不象想象中那么恶劣，罗麦格雷尼由微微松了口气。
McGrenn was slightly relieved to hear that the situation was not as bad as he had imagined.
听到江逸的脚步声，旁边一个房间内钻出一个小脑袋，发黄的头发蓬松松的，一双睡眼朦胧的大眼睛下隐隐还有泪痕，看到江逸一大早就要出去，小脸上很是不安。

Upon hearing Jiang Yi's footsteps, a small head emerged from the next room. With yellowing fluffy loose hair and a pair of puffy big eyes that still had some tear stains hidden underneath, the face showed a look of unease as she saw Jiang Yi heading out early in the morning.
听到这个数字的时候，安东尼－罗林忽然就只觉得眼前一黑……
Anthony Rolin almost blacked out when he heard the figure.
听到这熟悉的声音，正陷入恐惧当中的克伦威尔，就仿佛溺水的人抓到了一根救命稻草：“父亲！”
Upon hearing the familiar voice, Cromwell, who was just sinking into fear, was like a drowning man clutching at a life-saving straw. "Father!"
听到这里，林立也不由有些感慨：“难怪魔法公会穷成这样……”
At this point, Lin Li couldn't help but sigh. "No wonder the Guild of Magic is so poor..."
听到这里，林立有些明白，葛瑞安到底想说什么了，巫师之眼突然被全部破坏，阴影之巢的人又掌握了绕过岗哨的路线，几乎所有的迹象，都指向了魔法公会内部。

At this point, Lin Li sort of understood what Gerian was trying to say. The Warlock's Eyes were destroyed all of a sudden and the people from the Shadow's Nest had gotten ahold of the way to bypass the sentry posts. Almost all the signs were pointing to within the Guild of Magic.
听到附近围观众人议论话语，倒是解开了江逸心里的一个疑惑——几个月之后，据说一个大学院要来天羽城招生，所以城内的顶级公子小姐们才全部进了武殿闭关修炼，想在招生比赛中取得好名次进入那个学院。如此多顶级公子小姐进入武殿修炼，里面的陪练自然短缺了……

After listening to the chatter and discussions from the throngs of people nearby, Jiang Yi did indeed have one doubt in his heart resolved, though. It was said that a few months later, a famous martial arts training college would be making a journey to Skyplume City to recruit new students.
As such, the best and brightest upper-class children in the city had all entered the Martial Arts Hall and gone into seclusion to train, in the hopes of acquiring a high ranking during the recruitment competition and enrolling themselves in the college.
With so many strong upper-class children entering the Martial Arts Hall for cultivation training, there was naturally a shortage of sparring partners...
听到麦格雷尼的呼吸声渐渐平稳，林立终于是长长的出了口气。
Hearing McGrenn's breathing gradually stabilized, Lin Li finally breathed out a long sigh of relief.
听力和嗅觉增强，这两项能力并没有太大的作用，而且黑色元力运转到耳朵，他耳边立即闹哄哄的，一阵轰鸣让他异常不舒服。还有嗅觉一变强，不远处茅房内的臭味都能清楚闻到，让他很是恶心，所以也就在意这两项新的能力。

Both his hearing and sense of smell had gotten stronger, but these two senses were not of much use; on top of that, when the black essence force was circulated to his ear, the side of his ear immediately became uncomfortably noisy, as a loud booming noise left him abnormally unwell.
Additionally, once his sense of smell became stronger, he was able to smell even the foul stench coming from the lavatory nearby, leaving him feeling nauseous. As such, he wasn't exactly overjoyed with these two new abilities.
听听那老家伙都说了些什么——足以媲美法师之神格雷斯科的魔法天赋！
Look at what the old chap had said—a magic gift that was comparable to Geresco, the God of Mages!
听完马飞放出的狠话，江逸不仅没有半丝害怕，反而长长一叹，看着马飞的目光就像看着一头蠢猪般，他摇头轻叹道：“你们这些纨绔少爷脑子内都是屎吗？到了如此地步还不忘威胁我？都被挟持了竟还敢出言不逊？好吧……既然你迟早要废了我，那我不如先废了你！至少以后被你废了，小爷不吃亏是不是？”

Ma Fei's harsh words did not unnerve Jiang Yi even a little. Rather, he breathed out a long sigh and regarded Ma Fei the same way one would an unintelligent swine. Shaking his head, he exhaled softly, "Are the brains of you wastrel descendants made up of sh*t, trying to intimidate me even now? You are bold enough to utter such impertinent words even when you are being held hostage? Fine then... Since you are going render me useless sooner or later, I might as well do it to you first! If you ever do make me useless in the end, at least this young master would not get the short end of the stick, am I right?"
听着克伦威尔那恶毒的叫骂声，凯文真是连死的心都有了，他真想跳起来给这蠢货两巴掌，问问他到底只不知道自己在骂的人是谁，那可是魔法公会最大的特权者，连葛瑞安见了他都要赔着笑脸，现在居然被人指鼻子让他滚开，凯文觉得自己真是要疯了……

Kevin wanted to die after hearing the malicious bawl coming from Cromwell. He wanted to slap that fool across the face and ask him whether he knew whom he was swearing at. That person was the most privileged in the Guild of Magic, and even Gerian had to welcome him with a smiling face. But now he was being pointed at and asked to get out. Kevin felt himself turning crazy...
听着少女如黄鹂鸣唱般的声音，江逸心神一荡，脑海却一转，强装镇定的说道：“姬小姐好，在下易剑。”

The young lady's voice was as sweet-sounding as the singing of a yellow oriole. Jiang Yi's spirit was distracted, but his mind shifted quickly. He put on a calm voice and said, "Pleasure to meet you, Miss Ji. My name is Yi Jian."
听葛瑞安在那滔滔不绝的说着，艾萨克城主只觉哭笑不得……
Isaac found it both amusing and ridiculous listening to Gerian’s endless talk...
听见中年男人道谢，林立这才想起正事来。
Hearing the middle-aged man's expression of gratitude, Lin Li was reminded of the proper business at hand.
听见伊娜的哭喊声，两人赶紧跑上前去。
The two men rushed forward upon hearing Ina's cries.
听见这句话，坐在后排的一老一少都是不由得笑了，这个六亲不认的家伙，的确如葛瑞安所说一般擅长隐忍。

On hearing these words, the old and the young sitting at the last row couldn't help but laugh. This fellow, who did not even recognize his own kin, was indeed good at forbearing, just like Gerian said.
听见这话，葛瑞安用古怪的眼光看了克伦威尔一眼，忽然哈哈大笑起来：“这就是你所谓的尊严？你该不会是没睡醒吧，你以为你家这小兔崽子，有机会击败费雷魔法师？”

Upon hearing these words, Gerian shot Cromwell a peculiar glance and burst out laughing. "This is your so-called dignity? Is it possible you're still half-awake. thinking that the little rascal from your family would have the chance to defeat Mage Felic?"
听闻这个消息，江逸整个人都懵了，脸上都是内疚和慌乱。
Upon hearing of this information, Jiang Yi was in a complete state of shock and loss, his face filled with remorse and anxiety.
听马森这么一说，林立也一下想起来了，眼前这个中年人，正是昨天在公会大厅里，为众人分配试炼导师的那一位，当时林立就觉得他有些眼熟，只是始终没想起，这家伙究竟是什么来路。

After hearing what Marson had to say, Lin Li recalled who the middle-aged man in front of him was. He was allocating trial teachers to everyone yesterday in the guild hall. At that time Lin Li felt that he was somewhat familiar, but never did recall where he actually came from.
周日的明月城总是特别热闹，川流不息的玩家比起往常多了不止一倍，就连收费昂贵的私人仓库里，此时也是被挤了个水泄不通。

Bright Moon City was particularly busy on Sundays. The continuous stream of players was more than double in number when compared to other days and it was overcrowded even in the private warehouse where the fees were more expensive.
哪怕只是慢上一秒，也足以让人陷入万劫不复之地。
Even if it was only a second slower, it'd be enough to send people to an eternal doom.
哪怕是刚刚入门的魔法学徒都知道，限制魔法师战斗力的，不是精神力也不是魔力，而是魔法的准备时间，复杂的手势冗长的咒文，让战斗中的魔法师永远象是走钢丝一般危险，这世上绝大部分魔法师都在研究同一个课题——怎么才能最快的放出魔法。

Even a mage apprentice knew that it was not the mental strength or the mana that limited a mage's ability to fight—it was the time taken to prepare. Complex hand gestures and lengthy spells kept the mage in a battle on the tightrope. Most of the mages in the world were studying the same question—how to unleash magic in the quickest way.
哪知那柳长老沉喝一声，目光一下锁定了江逸，江逸只能苦着脸停下脚步：“长老还有什么吩咐？”
Who knew that Elder Liu would call him loudly in a low voice, his vision locked on to Jiang Yi? Jiang Yi could only bitterly stop and ask, "Elder, do you have any more instructions?"
哭声是从一片密林中传来的，远远望去，那片密林里的树木似乎特别的高大，树叶也似乎特别的茂盛，而在那一棵棵高大的树木之间，却布满了坚韧的藤条，这一根根藤条连在一起，就仿佛一张巨网一般。

The cries came from a dense forest. From afar, the trees in the dense forest seemed to be particularly tall and the leaves seemed to be of utmost luxuriance. Between the tall trees were bestrewn tenacious rattans, joined together to form what looked like a giant net.
唤醒药剂刚一入口，葛瑞安就知道大局已定了。
As soon as he gulped down the Awakening Potion, Gerian knew what the outcome would be.
唤醒药剂带来的魔力恢复速度，远远超过了老梅林手中的强能水晶，几乎只是一瞬间，那枯竭的魔力就回到了颠峰时期。

The speed of mana restoration brought on by the Awakening Potion far exceeded that of the Strong Energy Crystal Old Merlin held in his hands. Almost instantly, the exhausted mana was restored to its peak.
唯一的不和谐音，大概也只有那几个被赶出公会的魔法师了。
The only issue was probably the mages who were kicked out of the guild.
唯一让老梅林觉得欣慰的是，这场悬殊而又可笑的较量，总算是快要结束了……
The only thing that pleased Old Merlin was that this unequal yet ridiculous battle was at last coming to an end...
喝完恢复药剂，林立恶狠狠的望着头上那张巨网：“死猩猩你有种！”
After he had finished the Recovery Potion, Lin Li glared menacingly at the giant net above him. "Darned gorilla, you've got guts!"
嘴里恶狠狠地嘟囔了几句，江逸想要站起来，却没等站稳身形又痛得一个趔趄，差点再次摔倒。他身上大大小小布满了伤口，抽搐得让他那张清秀的小脸几乎都变了形，脑袋至今也是昏昏沉沉的。

Yet, before he could stand firmly on his own two feet, a searing pain made him stumble and almost fall back onto the ground again. Large and small wounds littered his body, leaving him in constant physical agony. His thoughts were muddled by the pain, and his delicate face was twisted in a constant, involuntary wince.
四周所有冥将悉数下跪称是，其中一名数百丈巨大的骸骨将领率先站起，他那白骨上的符文暗灰色符文闪耀，整具身体激发出一道冲天暗芒，从其颅腔内传出一声惊天怒吼：“全力进攻！”

All the surrounding Netherworld generals knelt and replied in the affirmative. One of the skeleton generals who was thousands of feet tall stood up first. His skeletal body shimmered with greyish glowing runes as his entire body emitted a dark glow that shot towards the sky. From his cranial cavity came a sky-shattering roar, "All forces, attack!"
四周的众人也反应过来，所有人疯狂的朝这边冲来，眼中都是凶光，老大被偷袭了，他们岂敢坐视不理？要是事后被江如虎知道了，可没好果子吃。

The surrounding crowd of people had also started responding - every single person frantically raced towards that side, their eyes filled with an ominous glint. Their boss had been ambushed in a sneak attack, how could they dare to gawk and remain indifferent? Should Jiang Ruhu find out after the incident that happened that day, they would have to suffer some severe consequences.
四周立即响起一片哄笑声，全部兴奋的望着江逸，等着看江逸承受胯下之辱的好戏。

The sounds of mockery and laughter immediately rang from all four corners. All were observing Jiang Yi with much excitement as they waited to see the entertaining sight of Jiang Yi bearing the humiliation of crawling underneath people's groins.
四周魔法元素疯狂扭曲，林立双手之上正燃起熊熊烈火。
The magical elements around distorted madly. A flame was blazing atop Lin Li's hands.
四种草药相辅相成，又相互克制，一般水准的药剂师，通常都不太敢配净化药剂，就是因为草药用量必须精确把握，一旦出现一点小小的失误，就可能让饮用者受到伤害。

The four herbs complemented yet restrained each other. An ordinary pharmacist usually would not dare to concoct the Purifying Potion because the dosage of herbs had to be accurately controlled. A small mistake could hurt the drinker.
四面八方数道身影已经冲来，凌冽的杀机锁定了他，江逸却面不改色，眸子死死盯着马飞，嘴角都是残笑，他大笑说道：“一百两紫金小爷没有，只有贱命一条。不过要想拿走小爷的命，就拿……你们公子的命换吧！”

Multiple enemies were charging towards him from all directions, locking in on him with chilling intent to kill. Yet, Jiang Yi's face betrayed nothing. His gaze never wavered away from Ma Fei and the corners of his mouth were lifted up in the remnants of a smile. Laughing loudly, he said, "This young master does not have a hundred taels of purple gold, he has nothing except for this humble life. However, if you want it, you can... exchange for it with your Young Master's life!"
回到大殿内盘坐下来，江逸很快又暗暗兴奋起来，卖身五年至少短时间他的危机解除了，十天之后在这预支十两紫金，去风月楼赎回令牌就万事大吉了。至于江如龙？江逸已经不放在心上了，此刻有武殿提供丹药，他有强大信心，在短时间内将境界不断提升，只要达到铸鼎境四重，江如龙不足为惧。

Returning to the Great Hall, Jiang Yi had very quickly felt silently excited in his heart as he sat down cross-legged. The five-year sale of his person has at least relieved him of his crisis in the short term. With the advance of ten taels of purple gold coming after ten days, which he could bring to the Fengyue Brothel and redeem his command token, all will be well at long last. As for Jiang Rulong? Jiang Yi no longer took him to heart. With the Martial Arts Hall presently providing him with elixirs, he had great confidence; furthermore, with his power-level stages of the Cast Tripod Realm continuously increasingly in the immediate short term, so long as his power level reached the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, he would have no need to fear Jiang Rulong.
回到江家南院炼丹房内，江逸还感觉在做梦般，他一下偷偷取出怀中的紫色金叶子看上几眼，细细摸几把，一下又藏进怀中，整个人都沉寂在喜悦当中。

Jiang Yi returned to the alchemy lab in the Jiang Residence Southern Court, still feeling as though he was dreaming. He secretly retrieved the purple gold leaf kept in his robes to look at it and gently touch it several times, before storing it back in his robes again. He was completely lost in euphoria.
回到江家西院，已经是黄昏时分了。此刻西院很是热闹，这里住着的是江家的家将和仆人，天黑都各自回家了。一路上两人遇到很多家将仆人，不过没有人理会她们，最多只是看上两眼，甚至还有人露出嘲弄的笑意……

By the time they returned to the western court of the Jiang Residence, it was already evening. The western courtyard was crowded and full of noise, as the Jiang Clan servants who lived there were just returning home as the sky turned dark. However, no one bothered them—at most taking a quick glance or so, some even giving a look of mockery and laughter...
回到翡翠高塔之后，两人就一直试图联系葛瑞安，但是那水晶球上，却始终没有出现屠魔山谷的一草一木，翡翠高塔的水晶球，是由葛瑞安亲自放置的，通过上百枚巫师之言连接屠魔山谷，但凡还有一枚巫师之眼在，都不会出现眼下这种情况。

After returning to the Emerald Tower, both of them had been trying to contact Gerian. But on the crystal ball, there was not a single tree or stone of the Demon Fall Valley. The crystal ball in the Emerald Tower was placed by Gerian personally. It was connected to the Demon Fall Valley through a hundred Warlock's Eyes spells. Such situation would not be happening as long as there was one Warlock's Eyes.
回复了荣管事之后，江逸回到了自家小院，让江小奴去找春芽打探消息。半个时辰之后江小奴就回来了，得到了江如虎等人的消息。

After returning to report to Chief Rong, Jiang Yi returned to the small courtyard of his own home and sent Jiang Xiaonu out to find Chunya and gather some news. An hour later, Jiang Xiaonu returned home, having gathered information about Jiang Ruhu and his gang of cronies.
回应江逸的话是四名爆射而来的身影，还有几个破空而来的拳头。
What he got in response was the shadows of the four guards that darted towards him. A few fists came tearing through the air as well.
回来的路上，江逸检查了小奴的伤势并不算太严重，此刻也就不去管她了，望着摇曳的烛火，心里犯愁起来……

On the route home, Jiang Yi observed that Xiaonu's injuries were not that serious. As such, he chose not to be too concerned for her, instead staring at the flickering candlelight flame. It was then that he became increasingly anxious and worried...
回答两人的是一道清脆的骨头碎裂声，还有江松惨绝伦寰的尖叫。江逸似乎没有听到两人的喝声，砸断江松一条腿后，大腿高高抬起对着江松的另外一条腿狠狠跺了几脚，将他另外一条腿废掉，才面无表情的转头过来望着江顾水说道：“江家有一条隐藏的族规，叫祸不及家人是吧？江如虎他们和我有仇，要打要杀我认！但为何要欺负我那没有半点武力的小侍女？今日别说你们，就算天王老子来了，我也要废了这三人。”

The reply to both their statements was the crisp and clear sound of bone cracking, followed by the miserable scream from Jiang Song. Seemingly deaf to the shouts from Jiang Gushui and Jiang Rulang, Jiang Yi raised his leg again, this time targeting Jiang Song's other leg. After trampling on Jiang Song's other leg and crippling it too, Jiang Yi then turned around and spoke to Jiang Gushui indifferently, "The Jiang Family has an unspoken rule. That is to not get the other family members involved in one's own conflicts right? If Jiang Ruhu and his group has any vengeance against me. I will make no complains if they come for me! But why do they need to bring this onto my servant girl who doesn't know an ounce of martial arts? Today, don't even mention the two of you, even if God is here, I will still cripple the three of them."
回答众人的是——江如虎的身子又被高高抡起，然后重重朝地面砸下，江逸嘴角都是残笑，似乎豁出去，冷然道：“退不退？”

What responded the group's threats was -- the scene of Jiang Ruhu's body being once again swung a high distance upwards, before subsequently being smashed downwards into the ground. A cruel smile formed on the corner of Jiang Yi's mouth, as though he were pressing his luck. He shouted coldly, "Are you going to retreat or not?"
回过头去一看，居然是两天没见的希恩。
When he turned, unexpectedly, it was Sheehan who had not shown up for two days.
因为他在药剂室里发现了一些有趣的东西。
He had found something interesting in the potion lab.
因为他很清楚，狮蝎身上最可怕的不是爪子，而是那条带着倒勾的尾巴。
Because he knew very well that the most terrifying thing about the Manticore were not its claws, but the inverted hook at the end of its tail.
因为他的丹田被封印了，他修炼的速度一直慢如蜗牛。虽然他有黑色元力使用丹药辅助修炼，能在短时间内让修炼提速，但越修炼到后面境界需要的元力越来越多，除非天天没事把圣品丹药当糖嗑，否则江逸这辈子注定成就有限！

As his dantian was sealed, his refinement speed had always been as slow as a snail. He had black essence force that could be used with elixirs to facilitate his refining practice, which could in turn speed up his refining. However, as the amount of essence force needed to refine higher realm levels increased, unless he ate saint-grade elixirs daily like candy, Jiang Yi would forever be limited in what he could do!
因为他看见，老梅林从口袋里拿出了一件东西。
For he saw Old Merlin pulling something out of his pockets.
因为他确实有跟自己探讨的资格，人家根本就没想过要拜什么师，更没有想过要请自己指点什么，人家只是单纯的把自己当成一个可供讨论的同行。

Because he was really qualified to do so with Old Grimm himself. Lin Li had no intention to be an apprentice, nor had he thought of asking for advice. He had simply considered Old Grimm as a peer for discussion.
因为他还记得，有另一种草药，与野钢花是同样的习性，那就是幽灵草，同样的喜欢阴暗潮湿，同样的多在洞穴种生长，只是比起野钢花来，幽灵草埋得更深也更隐蔽。

For he remembered that there was another herb which had the same habitual nature as the wild steelbloom, and that was the ghostskin. It preferred dark and damp environment, and mostly grew in caves. However, the ghostskins were buried deeper and better hidden than the wild steelbloom.
因为屠魔山谷内有大量稀有矿脉，不少势力都觊觎着这片富饶的土地，其中阴影之巢最为直接，他们已数次要求魔法公会让出屠魔山谷，甚至还刺杀了几名公会魔法师进行威胁。

Because there were many rare mineral veins in the Demon Fall Valley, many forces were coveting this fertile land. Among them, the Shadow's Nest was the most direct; they had asked the Guild of Magic several times to leave the Demon Fall Valley and even assassinated several guild mages as a threat.
因为拍卖会的缘故，所有魔法师都挤到公会大厅去了，林立走进炼金室的时候，里面还静悄悄的一个人都没有。
All the mages were gathered in the guild hall for the auction. When Lin Li entered the alchemy lab, it was quiet with no one in sight.
因为有一件事，是连葛瑞安都没有猜到的，屠魔山谷的防御布置，他并没有卖给阴影之巢，而是卖给了其他人，那人曾经向他保证过，不用担心魔法公会的报复，因为用不了多久，魔法公会就会被他连根拔起。

Because there was one thing that even Gerian would not have guessed. He did not sell the defense arrangement of the Demon Fall Valley to Shadow's Nest; instead, he sold it to someone else, and that someone else had promised he could not to worry about the guild's revenge, because soon the Guild of Magic would be uprooted by him.
因为林立分明已经感觉到，那个巨大的旋涡，正在以更加疯狂的速度旋转……
For Lin Li could clearly feel the giant vortex spinning at a crazier speed...
因为这一刻，他骤然发现自己的脑海里竟多了几十个黑色的小篆字符！？
At that moment, he found his mind suddenly filled with countless tiny black symbols and words.
在一众铁匠吐血的表情中，林立又忙碌开了，一块接着一块，足足花了大半个小时，才将上百块秘银彻底报废，而锻造技能自然也是一路突飞猛进。

Lin Li began busying himself again in the midst of those blacksmiths looking as if they were going to cough up blood. He took the mithril pieces one after another, and after using up almost half an hour, finally managed to scrap all hundred of them. Of course, his forging skills had improved significantly.
在一开始就营造出咄咄逼人的气势，最后更是疯狂到十万一加的地步，逼得小梅林根本喘不过气来，但他自己却在拼命的计算，计算小梅林最后的底限究竟是多少，最后他用一个八十万的报价，成功的将小梅林逼得孤注一掷。

He had created an aggressive momentum at the beginning, and at the end he had crazily got to an increment of 100,000, forcing the breath out of Little Merlin. But he was desperately calculating all along, figuring what was the exact bottomline for Little Merlin. Finally he succeeded in pushing Little Merlin to stake all he had with a bid of 800,000.
在一开始的失神之后，翡翠高塔的魔法师们，也仿佛在忽然之间意识到了，这一枚强能水晶究竟意味着什么，这意味着老梅林将随时可以杀死葛瑞安，并让魔法公会从此陷入万劫不复之境。

After the initial stupor, the mages in the Emerald Tower seemed to have realized all of a sudden what the Strong Energy Crystal meant. It meant that Old Merlin could kill Gerian anytime now, and send the Guild of Magic into a depths of despair once and for all.
在一片椰子雨中，林立终于找出了一个空当，只见他纵身一跃，险之又险的躲进了几棵巨树之后，这里一片巨树相连，正好形成了一处绝佳的隐蔽地带，至少在短时间内，利维坦猩猩的椰子还砸不到这里。

Lin Li finally found an empty space amidst the coconut shower. He took a leap to the side and managed to hide behind a few giant trees. The trees here were lined together, forming an excellent area for concealment. At least for the time being, the Leviathan Gorilla's coconuts would not reach here.
在两个倒霉鬼痛苦的呻吟声中，林立神清气爽的走进了交易所。
Lin Li walked into the exchange with high spirits amidst the groans of the two unlucky morons.
在他丢进三枚丹药，注入一缕黑色元力时，丹炉内再一次传来一阵沉闷的爆炸声，而在他将炉盖揭开的时候，却发现里面的三枚丹药又全炸了……

When he threw in three elixir pills and injected a wisp of black essence force, a deep explosive sound rang out from within the cauldron. When he lifted the cauldron lid and revealed its contents, he discovered the three elixir pills in the cauldron had once again completely exploded...
在他们这个等级的战斗中，最基础的东西，反倒成了最能决定胜负的关键。
In a battle of their level, the most fundamental thing had become the most decisive key to victory.
在他刚想询问几句陪练的规矩，后面走廊内传来一道脚步声，那管事立即撇下他笑着迎了上去。

Just as he thought of inquring a few queries regarding the rules of sparring partnerships, the sound of footsteps rang from the corridor behind him. That manager immediately cast him away by sending him off with a smile.
在他开口的那一瞬间，数十条火龙已是撞上了元素护盾。
At the moment he opened his mouth, dozens of fire dragons crashed into the elemental shield.
在他想来，自己只要把这几条咒语往葛瑞安面前一递，这老家伙绝对会乐得眉开眼笑，到时候再跟他拉拉交情，谈谈魔法公会与梅林家族悠久而深厚的友谊，等到气氛融洽的时候，自己再代表梅林家族，婉转而又诚恳的跟他求购那三十瓶奥法药剂……

In his mind, he had imagined Gerian being overjoyed when he presented him with the spells. Then he'd start pulling strings, talking about the deep and long-standing friendship the Guild of Magic and Merlin Family shared. And when the atmosphere became harmonious, he would represent the Merlin Family and with a tactful and sincere tone ask to purchase the thirty bottles of Arcane Magic Potion.
在他花费了大半个时辰提炼出两缕黑色元力，准备去增幅药力时，却发现笼罩在丹田外的绿色药力已经消耗干净了。

after he spent two whole hours refining two strands of black essence force and was prepared to increase the medical power, he realized the green medicinal power wrapped around the exterior of his dantian had already been fully consumed.
在克伦威尔想来，如今葛瑞安病重，魔法公会当家的自然就是他的亲侄子凯文，放着这位魔法公会当家人不去拉拢，难道还吃饱了撑的去跟个落魄魔法师聊天？再说了，以自己梅林家族继承人的身份，却主动去跟一个低级魔法师打招呼，克伦威尔实在丢不起这个人。

Cromwell had thought that now that Gerian was down with a serious illness, the person who should oversee the Guild of Magic would naturally be his nephew, Kevin. What reasons were there not to cozy up to the guild's in-charge and instead engage in a chat with a mage in dire straits? Besides, as the heir to the Merlin Family, Cromwell could not afford to lower himself and initiate a greeting with a low-level mage.
在克伦威尔想来，就算是父亲亲自出手，恐怕也很难做得比他更好了。
In Cromwell's opinion, it would have been difficult even for his father to do it better than him.
在克伦威尔的叫嚣声中，魔法公会大厅好象忽然就安静了下来，所有人都停下了自己手上的事，目光不约而同的落到了克伦威尔身上。
Amidst Cromwell's outcry, the guild hall seemed to have fallen into silence in an instant. Everyone stopped what they were doing and turned their attention to Cromwell.
在克伦威尔被扫出翡翠高塔的一瞬间，老梅林就知道完了，一切都完了，梅林家族彻底失去了竞争奥法药剂的关系，也彻底堵死了与魔法公会修复关系的道路。

At the instant Cromwell was swept out of the Emerald Tower, Old Merlin knew everything was over. The Merlin Family had lost all in the competition for the Arcane Magic Potion, and it had also completely blocked the path to restoring its friendship with the Guild of Magic.
在凯文即将敲下第三次的时侯，安东尼罗林忽然从人群中走了出来：“等一等凯文魔法师！”
Just as Kevin was about to hit the gavel for the third time, Anthony Rolin suddenly emerged from the crowd. "Hold on, Mage Kevin!"
在凯文结帐的时候，林立忽然觉得，自己好象也应该赚点钱了。
As Kevin was checking out, Lin Li suddenly felt that he should make some money too.
在利维坦猩猩抓走伊娜的那一刻，他已经完全傻住了，八级魔兽是如此的强大，光是站在它面前，克伦威尔就忍不住浑身发抖，他想追上去救伊娜，可是脚却不听使唤，往日的自信完全消失了，剩下的只有无穷无尽的恐惧。

He was completely stunned the moment the Leviathan Gorilla took Ina away. A level-eight magical beast was so powerful that Cromwell could not help but shiver just standing in front of it. He tried to run after Ina, but his legs wouldn't budge. The confidence from the past had vanished and all that remained was endless fear.
在加洛斯城年轻人中，凯文也算是首屈一指的天才了，从一懂事起就接触魔法，一直到二十五岁成为八级魔法师，这种速度连骄傲的克伦威尔都不得不说个服字，可一到了林立这妖孽面前，自己的天才就忽然变得什么都不是了，从一无所知到八级魔法师，再从八级突破到九级之上，前前后后满打满算，也不过三个多月时间，这样的人与禽兽有什么区别？

Kevin was among the top talents among the young people in Jarrosus City. He had been exposed to magic since he was sensible, all the way until he had became a level-eight mage at the age of 25. Even the proud Cromwell had to admire him given his speed in advancing. But in front of a demon like Lin Li, his genius had suddenly come to nothing. From ignorance to a level-eight mage, and then another breakthrough from level-eight to level-nine and above, it took him only a mere three months. How was he any different from a beast?
在加洛斯城里，你可以不知道六大地下势力，也可以不知道十一魔法家族，甚至可以不知道魔法公会，不知道传奇法师安度因，但却绝不能没听过格林－伯恩塞德的传说……

In Jarrosus City, one could not know the six underground forces or the 11 mage families, or even the Guild of Magic and the legendary mage Andoine, but they could never not hear of the legend of Grimm Burnside...
在加洛斯城，至少有一半以上的魔法商店叫镀金玫瑰，据凯文介绍，它们都属于一个叫做曼尼斯的魔法家族，这个家族与梅林家族一样，是法兰王国最显赫的家族之一，只不过一个从政一个从商。

At least half of the magic stores in Jarrosus City were called Gilded Rose. According to Kevin, they all belonged to a mage family called Mannes. Like the Merlin Family, this family was one of the most prominent families in the Felan Kingdom, only that one had entered politics, while the other did business.
在又一记迟缓术之后，林立突然停下了脚步，他再没有象先前一般，放出迟缓术转身就跑，这一次他牢牢的站在那里，大段大段的咒文从口中倾泻而出，就仿佛完全没有看见迎面扑来的狮蝎一般。

After unleashing another Delaying Spell, Lin Li suddenly broke his stride. He did not turn and run after unleashing the Delaying Spell like how he did before. This time, he stood rooted to the spot, and large verses of spells poured out of his mouth as if he had not noticed the advancing Manticore right in front of him.
在场众人中不乏锻造专业的玩家，神之金属的价值他们是再清楚不过了。
There was no lack of professional blacksmiths in the crowd. No one knew the value of the divinity metals better than them.
在场众人至少都是五级以上的魔法师，除了林立这种半吊子之外，又有谁没听过强能水晶的大名，那几乎是每一个魔法师都梦寐以求的东西，强大的镇定心神效果，几乎完全避免了施法时的魔力反噬，对于一个魔法师来说，魔力反噬比敌人更加可怕，更何况强能水晶还能增幅冥想效果，只要放在身边，冥想效果就能提升到恐怖的程度。

The people present were mages of at least level-five and above. Other than a dabbler like Lin Li, who had never heard the great name of the Strong Energy Crystal, it was something that almost every mage yearned for. Its powerful calming effect prevented the counter-reaction of mana during the unleash of spells. To a mage, the counter-reaction of the mana was much more fearful than the opponent. In addition, the Strong Energy Crystal could amplify the effects of meditation. As long as one had the crystal by their side, the meditation effects could be raised to a terrifying level.
在场众人非富即贵，都是加洛斯有头有脸的人物，其中最差也至少是某支势力首脑的亲信，他们又如何听不出，刚才老格林－伯恩塞德话中的意思？

All the people present were either wealthy or respectable, and they were all prominent figures in Jarrosus. Even the lowest among them were the cronies of the leaders of a certain force. How could they not hear the meaning behind Old Grimm Burnside's words?
在场所有人中，大概也只有克伦威尔还没明白过来。
Among all those present, perhaps it was only Cromwell who did not understand.
在场所有人都可以很清楚的感觉到，老梅林的魔力正以极快的速度恢复着，先前那一战带来的消耗，瞬间就会被强能水晶填满，用不了几秒钟的时间，这个看似有些虚弱的老人，就又会变成那个加洛斯最强大的魔法师。

Everyone could clearly feel that Old Merlin was recovering his mana at lightning speed. The depletion brought about by the earlier battle was quickly brought to the full by the Strong Energy Crystal. In just a few seconds, the seemingly frail old man would become the most powerful mage in Jarrosus.
在场的人每人都欺负过人，都打过家族的低级子弟，他们打人的时候也很凶残，但此刻却都被江逸的手段吓到了，脑海内浮现的唯一念头就是，以后千万不能招惹此人……

Everyone here had once bullied someone, or beaten the lower classed clansmen. They were also extremely ruthless when they were beating people up, but right now they were all shocked by the measures of Jiang Yi. There was only one thought in their minds, that was to never incite the wrath of this man in the future...
在天星大陆，人人都能借助金木水火土等等最基本的天地元气来提炼元力，因为只有体内拥有浑厚的元力，才能施展出各种威力强大的武学神通，开山裂石，飞天遁地都不在话下。但要是没有元力，哪怕武技神通比划得再精妙，哪怕掌握了几万种武技的口诀，你也施展不出来，只能做个废物！

The inhabitants of the Stellarsky continent regularly borrowed the powers of the basic elements—metal, wood, water, fire, and earth—to cultivate and expand their essence force, as only those with a great amount of essence force could put various techniques of great might to use.
Even splitting entire mountains, flying freely in the sky, and becoming virtually invincible was possible with enough essence force. However, without any essence force, no matter how skilled one was in martial arts and regardless of how many techniques one had mastered, it would all be rendered useless. Without essence force, one couldn’t execute even the most basic martial art!
在天羽城内，姬家就是土皇帝，没有家族敢招惹姬家。姬家子弟倒是也很自律，很少欺压各家族子弟。其余家族则不同了，为了各家族的利益经常明争暗斗，数百年下来四大家族积怨颇深，家族子弟在天羽城内斗殴那更是家常便饭。

Within Skyplume City, the Ji Family was akin to a royal family. No other family clan dared to provoke the Ji Family. For their part, Ji Family descendants were themselves very disciplined and rarely bullied or oppressed the descendants of other family clans. The other remaining family clans acted differently. The clans regularly fought with each other openly and maneuvered against one another covertly to attain advantages in their own interest. The four great families had deep grudges for each other, developed over centuries of conflict, and fights between descendants of each family clan were truly commonplace and not out of the ordinary.
在太阳快要下山的时候，凯文终于是守得云开见月明，生生等到克伦威尔问起葛瑞安来。
Kevin finally saw a silver lining when the sun was about to set, he had waited long for Cromwell to ask about Gerian.
在太阳落山之前，众人又走进了一片密林，照罗麦格雷尼说，只要出了这片密林，再往前走不了多久，就能够看见加洛斯城了。
They had walked into another dense woods before the sun set. According to McGrenn, as long as they passed through this forest and walked a little farther, they would be able to see Jarrosus City.
在奥法药剂出来之前，这一个个的，又有谁真把魔法公会放在眼里过？包括与自己交情不错的老奥丁，如果不是因为自己坐在会长的位置上，这个控制着加落斯城所有杀手的老家伙，又岂会给魔法公会半点面子？

Before the emergence of the Arcane Magic Potion, who truly had regards for the Guild of Magic? Same goes for Old Odin, whom he shared a friendly relation with. If he had not been the President, that old chap who controlled all the assassins in Jarrosus would not have given the Guild of Magic any respect.
在宁神花里发现几片黑莲花花瓣，这种运气要是传了出去，非吓出一堆神经病不可……
If news of his luck coming upon a few black lotus petals among the peacebloom went out, it would have scared some people out of their wits...
在座一老一少，也算是药剂学顶峰的人物，一个大师一个宗师，可两人在那谈了半天，也没能研究出个所以然来，倒是一番讨论让老格林学了不少东西，以前没听过的没想过的，一下全冒了出来，各种闻所未闻的新奇理论，更是让老格林大开眼界。

The old and the young in the seats were considered the top figures in pharmaceutics—one was a master and the other a guru. But they had talked for a long time and yet still failed to figure out any solution. Instead, Old Grimm had learnt a lot from the discussion. What he had never heard nor thought about before came up in his head all at once, and all kinds of novel theories that were unheard of had been an eye-opener for Old Grimm.
在无尽世界当中，深邃之银是真正的可遇而不可求。
In the Endless World, the deep silver could only be found by luck but not by searching.
在昨夜突破了铸鼎境二重之后，江逸心里不仅不再畏惧江如虎，反而大摇大摆的上山，希望江如虎会来堵他，他好狠狠出一口恶气。

After making a breakthrough and reaching the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm the night before, not only did Jiang Yi not have any fear nor dread for Jiang Ruhu in his heart; he instead swaggered up the mountain, hoping that Jiang Ruhu would stop him. He hoped to take the opportunity to ruthlessly get his revenge.
在杨管事请示了费老后，武殿做了一个决定，将江逸命名为最顶级的紫金陪练，同时通告整个武殿，苍狼陪练每天只陪练三场，每一场陪练需要——百两紫金。

After Manager Yang asked Elder Fei for instructions, the Martial Arts Hall made a decision to designate Jiang Yi as the highest-level purple gold token-grade sparring partner.
