At the same time, they announced throughout the entire Martial Arts Hall that the sparring partner "Lone Wolf" would only spar in three matches every single day, and each sparring match would require - one hundred taels of purple gold.
在林立看来，胖老头那愤怒的神态，无非只是一种态度，一种支持自己的态度。
From what Lin Li saw, the fat old man's rage was merely just an attitude, an attitude of support for himself.
在格林－伯恩塞德漫长的生命当中，早已经习惯了成为众人的焦点，在一众宾客的包围之下，他那张布满皱纹的脸上依旧带着温和的微笑，甚至还冲几个相熟的家族首脑点了点头，算是打过了招呼。

In Grimm Burnside's long life, he had long gotten used to being the center of attention. Surrounded by the crowd of guests, his wrinkled face still wore a gentle smile, and he even nodded at several familiar family leaders in a greeting.
在武殿内闭关第十三天，江逸照例和翊凌雪对战了半个时辰，这次翊凌雪却没有匆忙离去换衣裳，反而好奇的询问起来。

On the 13th day of seclusion at the Martial Arts Hall, Jiang Yi finished his customary sparring practice with Yi Lingxue. Afterwards however, instead of hurriedly leaving to change like she usually did, Yi Lingxue stayed behind and questioned Jiang Yi curiously.
在气爆术的力量挤压下，两枚泰罗果开始慢慢变形，随着林立释放出的魔力慢慢加大，两枚圆圆的泰罗果最终变成了薄薄的两片。

Under the compression of the Gas Blast Spell, the two terocones began to deform slowly. As the mana released by Lin Li slowly increased, the two round terocones eventually turned into two thin pieces.
在江家，江逸小时候因为自身体质以及大长老的关系，尝试过不少心法，也见识过很多种颜色的元力。除了水系功法大多是蓝色，火系功法大多是红色外，比如木系功法多数绿色，土系功法多数黄色……但他从没见到过能练出黑色元力的功法！

In the Jiang Clan, due to his relationship with the Grand Elder as well as his personal physical condition, Jiang Yi had been trying many methods of spirit training and had similarly witnessed essence force of numerous colors. Water-element techniques usually produced blue essence force, and fire-element techniques usually produced red. There were also wood-element techniques, which produced green and earth-element techniques which produced yellow. Yet he had never observed a technique that could produce black-colored essence force!
在江豹的两条腿被江逸活生生的踩断，他目光锁定江如虎后，江顾水两人终于忍不住了，身上元力疯狂运转，气势腾起，江顾水爆喝起来：“江逸，最后给你一次机会，现在罢手，等候刑堂处理，否则别怪我们两人不客气！”

Once Jiang Bao's legs were forcibly broken by Jiang Yi's trample, his sights were locked on Jiang Ruhu. Jiang Gushui and Jiang Rulang couldn't hold back any longer and began circulating their essence force. Putting on an imposing aura, Jiang Gushui roared, "Jiang Yi, this is your last chance. Stop right now and wait for the Disciplinary Court to serve your punishment. If not, do not blame us for being impolite!"
在江逸离开之后，那满头灰白头发的柳长老却突然走出偏厅进了丹房内查看了一遍，出来后很是满意的点了点头呢喃一声，再次走进了偏厅研究他“意外炼制”出来的地阶丹药……

After Jiang Yi left, Elder Liu, the man with a head full of grayish white hair, suddenly walked out of the side room and entered the Elixir Room to check. When he left, he nodded his head with satisfaction and, muttering to himself, once again entered the side room to research on his "accidentally refined" Earth-tier elixir...
在江逸踢出第六腿的时候，江松的右腿小腿终于传来一道骨头碎裂声，江松也跟着惨叫起来，再也无法支撑身体重心，一下摔倒在地，抱着右腿痛嚎起来。

On the sixth attack that Jiang Yi released, Jiang Song's right leg finally released the sounds of bones being broken. Jiang Song's agonized screams followed suit. No longer able to hold up his body weight, Jiang Yi's body crashed to the floor. He held his right leg and cried in bitter pain.
在没有元力的情况，武者对战只能完全依靠战斗本能和反应速度，以及武技了。这样对练起来能大大的增强武者反应速度，和武技的熟练度。

In a circumstance where there was no available essence force to use, martial artists seeking combat could only rely completely on the combat instincts and response speed, as well as their skills in martial arts. In this way, during sparring training, a martial artist's reaction speed and level of proficiency could be greatly increased.
在泰罗果汁液开始沸腾之后，林立又小心的抓起银须草和太阳花，两中草药几乎同时投进烧杯当中，紧跟着就是一片白色雾气升腾而起，一股浓郁的药味在房间中弥漫开来，其中所蕴涵的神圣力量，就连身为战士的伊娜和红发美女，也是不由得为之动容。

After the terocone succus began to boil, Lin Li carefully grabbed the silver hairgrass and sungrass. The two herbs were added into the beaker almost simultaneously, which was followed by a white mist rising into the air and a strong medicinal smell permeating the room. Even warriors like Ina and the redheaded beauty were deeply moved by the divine power contained in it.
在滚动的巨龙之血中，一条条蓝丝正慢慢溶解。
Threads of blue were slowly dissolving in the boiling dragon's blood.
在看清楚花从中的点点灰色时，林立觉得自己真是连心都快跳出来了。
Lin Li felt his heart leap upon seeing the little gray dots among the flowers.
在研究过地图之后，麦格雷尼告诉林立：“大概还需要一天的时间，我们才能走出落日山脉。”
After studying the map, McGrenn told Lin Li, “It would probably take another day to get out of the Sunset Mountains.”
在确定江逸不能修炼后，收养他的大长老瞬间便苍老了十岁有多，他从此整日闭门不出，翻阅各种符箓古籍，四处寻访符文高手，希望有朝一日能够破解封印。

When he confirmed that the Jiang Yi could no longer cultivate essence force, the Grand Elder spent entire days indoors, reading all kinds of ancient texts and old talisman books in an attempt to find a solution to his god-grandson’s problem. He went to the edges of the world in order to seek the assistance of linguists and masters in talisman magic, all in the hopes of being able to break the seal one day. The poor Grand Elder... in mere months, he looked as if he had aged ten years!
在离两人不远的地方，还有几家势力的首脑在那张望，都想凑过来跟葛瑞安套套交情。
Not far from the two men, the leaders from several forces were looking around, trying to join in and form a friendship with Gerian.
在第一魔法师的绝对力量面前，那些一直蠢蠢欲动的魔法家族，想必会安分一段时间才对。
Before the absolute power of the number one mage, the mage families who had been waiting for their chances would most likely remain well-behaved for a period of time.
在管事房被荣管事骂了个狗血喷头，江逸快步走出西门上了西山清点药草，好在这次还是在西山药田做杂物，荣管事没有提及令牌的事情。而且上西山时，山下的家族护卫都认识他，倒是没有要他出示令牌。

After being viciously scolded by Chief Rong at the Housekeeping Chamber, Jiang Yi walked out of the Western Door in a quick pace and headed up the Western Hills to take stock of the medicinal plants there. Thankfully, this time he was once again tasked with doing odd jobs around the medicinal plantations of the Western Hills, and Chief Rong had not mentioned anything about the command token. Additionally, while he was heading up the Western Hills, as the clan guardsmen at the foot of the hills recognised him, they did not require him to reveal his command token.
在老格林想来，如今反正要指点林立，不如让这个小姑娘也在一旁听听，说不定能让她学到一些东西，不过尽管心里这么想着，老格林还是很礼貌的征询了一下林立的意见：“小伙子，你没意见吧？”

In Old Grimm's mind, he was about to advise Lin Li anyway. It might be better to have the little girl sit in and listen as well, and perhaps she could learn something. Despite his intentions, Old Grimm still asked Lin Li politely for his opinion. "Kid, is it okay with you?"
在老格林的追问之下，罗琳无奈将那天的事说了一遍，老格林听着听着，眉头就不由皱起来了，等到罗琳把事情讲完，老人也不由长长的叹了口气：“难怪我刚才就觉得，你们两个小家伙好象有些别扭，原来是这么回事……不过小罗琳，这次的事情，可真是你不对了，身为一个医生，是不能太任性的，特别是在关系到病人生死的情况下。”

Pressed by Old Grimm, Rowling had no choice but to recount what had happened that day. Old Grimm's brows furrowed as he listened on, and when Rowling had finished her story, Old Grimm let out a long sigh. "No wonder I felt you two kids were behaving awkwardly just now, so that's what happened... But little Rowling, for this matter, it was really you who's in the wrong. As a doctor, you can't be wilful, especially in a situation concerning the life and death of a patient."
在老梅林与葛瑞安一战之后，梅林家族仿佛忽然之间就沉寂了下来，而与梅林家族一起沉寂的，还有魔法公会的药剂师。

After the battle between Old Merlin and Gerian, the Merlin Family seemed to have quieted down all of a sudden. And together with the Merlin Family, the pharmacist from the Guild of Magic had also stayed quiet.
在老梅林看来，这将是整件事最好的结果。
For Old Merlin, this would be the best outcome for this whole event.
在老法师眼中，魔力永远是最珍贵的东西，哪怕是一丁点魔力，也可能让你放出最后一个保命的法术，象林立这样只是为了衣服的整洁，就毫不吝啬的浪费魔力，在安度因看来简直就是在犯罪！

In the eyes of the old mage, magical power would always be the most precious of things. Even the smallest of power could let you unleash the last spell—enough to save your life. What Lin Li had done was a crime in Andoine's eyes, wasting his power just for the sake of keeping his clothes clean!
在落日山脉上的每次露宿，都等于是将生命置入险境。
Every night spent out in the open in the Sunset Mountains was equal to putting life in danger.
在葛瑞安与老梅林的战斗中，林立学到了太多的东西。
Lin Li had learnt too much from the battle between Gerian and Old Merlin.
在葛瑞安的强硬手段下，小小的骚动就这么被压下去，但谁都知道，这些被压下去的声音，其实从未真正消失，他们只是在耐心观望。
Under Gerian's tough approach, the small ruckus was crushed. But everyone knew that in fact, these suppressed voices never really disappeared. They were merely waiting patiently.
在解释什么叫等级认证的时候，葛瑞安脸上虽然一直带着可鞠的笑容，可其实心里却是说不出的紧张，这关系到一个足以媲美格雷斯科的魔法天才，更关系到一个不满二十岁的药剂大师，葛瑞安甚至觉得，自己现在的心情，比当年晋阶大魔导士时更加紧张。

Gerian kept a smile on his face when he was explaining what the level certification was, but in his heart, he felt an indescribable nervousness. This was about a magical genius who could rival Geresco, and it was even more about a Master of Potion under the age of twenty. Gerian had even felt he was more nervous now than he had been when he had advanced to an Archmage.
在这一刻，安东尼－罗林甚至想过，要扑上把这个疯女人活活掐死。
At this moment, Anthony Rolin even thought of jumping on this woman to strangle her to death.
在这一刻，就连欧灵脸上，都多多少少露出了几分激动的神色，法兰王国的魔法师中，又有谁没听过安度因的大名？
Now, even Orrin's face expressed some form of excitement. Among the magi in Felan Kingdom, who had not heard of the great name of Andoine?
在这一瞬间，所有人都呆住了。
In that instant, everyone was dumbfounded.
在这个世界上，恐怕没人能够理解林立现在的心情，就算与他最为亲近的安度因也同样不能。
No one in this world could ever understand how Lin Li felt at the moment, not even Andoine who was the closest to him.
在这个时候，他其实更关心大厅里的拍卖。
At this time, he was actually more concerned about the auction going on in the hall.
在这个时候，大概也只有林立这个半吊子还搞不清楚状况，他正很奇怪的望着老梅林，心想这老家伙怎么笑得这么下流，莫非掌握了什么秘密武器不成？不懂就问是个好习惯，于是林立用手肘碰了碰身旁的凯文，很虚心的向他请教道：“那老家伙手里拿的，究竟是什么东西？”

Perhaps it was only a dabbler like Lin Li who had not gotten a hold of the situation. He stared puzzled at Old Merlin, thinking about how despicable that old fellow's smile was. Could it be that he had a secret weapon with him? It was a good habit to ask when one doesn't know, hence he nudged Kevin with his elbow and asked in a humble way, "What is that thing that the old fellow has in his hands?"
在这位面前夸我是魔法天才，你这不是把人往火坑里推吗！
Lauding me as a magic genius in front of this someone, isn’t he trying to push me into a pit of fire!?
在这护卫看来，绝对的力量可以碾压一切武技，更别说江逸这实力根本不能发挥武技的威力，就如刚才江逸使出“摔碑手”一样被他轻松荡开般。

As that guard saw it, his absolute power could crush all martial arts techniques—let alone Jiang Yi's abilities which could not even manifest the innate power of any martial arts techniques. As an example, the Wrestling Hand technique that Jiang Yi used earlier was easily deflected by him.
在这武殿内修炼速度果然快了两倍，达到铸鼎境二重黑色元力凝练了，增幅药力的时间也增长到大半柱香时间，感受到丹田内井水般喷出的蓝色元力，江逸整个人都兴奋的不得了。

The power cultivation speed in this Martial Arts Hall was indeed faster by two times. Having reached a power-level at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm and producing condensed black essence force, with the time that the elixir medical efficacy lasted also having extended up to more than two and half minutes of time, as well as sensing that blue essence forces were splurting out of his dantian like a well of water, Jiang Yi felt completely and uncontrollably excited.
在这狂风骤雨般的攻势中，林立依旧疲于奔命。
Lin Li was constantly struggling to keep up among the relentless attacks.
在这种要命的时候，葛瑞安绝不想跟梅林家族开战。
At this critical point, Gerian would definitely hate to battle out with the Merlin Family.
在这要命的时候，谁还有空跟他研究什么红牛饮料，几乎是林立话音刚落，葛瑞安就已经拔开了瓶塞，仰头将一整瓶唤醒药剂倒入口中，一边感受着其中蕴涵的纯净魔力，一边还砸巴着嘴回味那酸酸甜甜的味道。

Who had the time to study about the Red Bull's drink with him at this critical time? Before Lin Li's voice faded, Gerian had already removed the bottle cap and poured the Awakening Potion into his mouth. He took in the pure mana contained in it while savoring the sweet yet sour aftertaste in his mouth.
在这近乎变态的生长条件下，黑莲花的出现，早就被公认为不可能的事，当初林立为了在药剂学上有所突破，曾经高价求购黑莲花的消息，可是数十万金币的悬赏挂出去，却连个泡都没能冒起来。

Under such perverted conditions, the emergence of the black lotus was universally acknowledged as impossible. Lin Li had put out a high price for news on the black lotus in order to achieve a breakthrough in pharmaceutics. But not even the slightest simmer of bubbles could be seen even after putting out a reward of hundreds of thousands of gold coins.
在那一刻，欧灵简直不敢相信自己的眼睛，那种感觉，完全就好象是在做梦一样，一位精通药剂学的传奇法师，竟然会拿着一瓶药剂向人请教，而且请教的还是自己的室友……

At that moment, Orrin could hardly believe his own eyes, feeling as if he was in a dream-a legendary mage, proficient in pharmaceutics, was actually approaching another person for advice about a bottle of potion, and the latter was his very own roommate...
在那一场战斗中，林立实在收获了太多太多的东西。
Lin Li had gained so much from the battle.
在那些巍峨的城墙宫壁上，在那些华丽的宫殿阁楼内，在天庭的地面、街角，突兀地浮现出谁也数不清的七彩符文。
The towering palace walls, the insides of the majestic palace lofts, and the surface and road corners of the Heavenly Court all lit up, and countless multi-colored runic patterns suddenly appeared.
在那剧烈的魔法波动席卷下，翡翠高塔外就仿佛刮起了一阵狂风，地面的纸屑尘土打着旋的被卷起，在天空中漫天飞舞着。
The violent magic wave seemed to bring along a gust of strong wind outside the Emerald Tower. Dust and scraps of paper on the ground were picked up and swirled like little dancers in the sky.
在那漫天的火光当中，两道人影正缓缓落下，那是魔力耗尽的征兆。
Among the blazing light, two silhouettes descended slowly, a sign of mana exhaustion.
在魔法常识上，林立完全无法与凯文相提并论，所以这种交谈，大多数时候都是林立提出一些常识性问题，而凯文则负责解答。
Lin Li could not be compared to Kevin on general magic knowledge. So, most of the conversation was Lin Li asking common sense questions and Kevin answering them.
在龙血墨水干涸的同时，林立也划下了最后一根线条。
Lin Li drew the last line at the same time the dragon's blood ink dried up.
地上十四五岁的小丫头也惊醒过来，看到暴怒冲来的江逸，一张小脸完全吓坏了，拼命的大喊起来：“少爷你不是他的对手，别管我，快走！”

The fourteen-year-old girl on the ground snapped to her senses. When she saw the wrathful Jiang Yi rushing over, she was scared out her wits.
"Young Master,” she screamed with all her might, “you are not his match! Ignore me! Leave quickly!"
地面一震，坚硬的青石板瞬间裂成两瓣，他的左拳深深的砸了进去，整个拳头都没入到石板下面的土里。
The ground shook. His left fist smashed right into the limestone slab and split it into two halves. His fist did not even hit the ground below the slab.
场面有些失去控制，凯文却丝毫不显惊慌，只是面带笑容望着会场，耐心的等他们安静下来。
The scene was out of control, but Kevin was not in the least alarmed. He merely looked on with a smile on his face and waited patiently for them to quiet down.
城主大人一句话出口，却隐隐发现气氛有些压抑，以他的心思，自是很快反应过来，自己正要介绍的这两个人，恐怕早就已经见过面了，不过艾萨克手腕圆滑，反应过来之后，脸上仍是丝毫不露，轻轻拍了拍红发美女挽着自己的小手：“来，罗琳，爸爸给你介绍一下，这位就是大名鼎鼎的费雷魔法师。”

The Castellan spoke but found the atmosphere rather oppressive. With his acumen, he naturally caught on quickly that the people he was about to introduce to each other had already met previously. However, Isaac was tactful in his approach. After he had grasped the situation, he did not reveal it on his face. He gently patted the redheaded beauty's hands that were holding him. "Come, Rowling. Let Father introduce you to the famous Mage Felic.
城主府为了这次宴会，显然是花费了极大的心思。
The Castellan Mansion had evidently put in a great deal of effort for this banquet.
城池北方的虚空之上异常诡异地裂开了一道裂缝，一双数丈长的白骨大手无声无息地自裂缝中伸出并把住裂缝的两边，将裂缝进一步撕开。
out of the the void in the north of the city, a strange crack appeared. From the crack a pair of long, skeletal hands stretched out and pushed the crack wider.
堂堂八级魔兽，竟是被逼得满地打滚，再看上去又哪还有先前嚣张的气焰？
A mighty level-eight magical beast beaten to the ground, where did its previous arrogance go?
填完表格之后，凯文又带着林立上了三楼，在穿过几条走廊之后，两人看见了已经在那等了很久的葛瑞安。
After filling out the form, Kevin brought Lin Li up to the third floor. They passed through a few corridors and finally saw Gerian who had long been waiting for them.
声音传来的方向，正是罗麦格雷尼前所说的水源附近。
The voice came from the direction of the water source McGrenn had mentioned before.
处理房产的事已经办砸，如果再连这件事也办不好，自己在家族的地位怕是很难保住了。
He had already messed up in his handling of the estates. If he couldn't even get this done well, it would be hard to keep his position in the family.
夕阳余辉之下，天蓝色的玻璃瓶透射出比强能水晶更加璀璨的光晕。
Under the deepening eventide, the sky-blue bottled flared an even dazzling glow than the Strong Energy Crystal.
外药，也就是上药和服药，内调则是通过运转体内元力，对伤处进行气血疏通和修补调节。所以江逸在上好药后，还要通过修炼江水诀，运转体内铸鼎境一重的元力，来帮助伤口更快复原。

In other words, one had to consume or apply any necessary medicine and direct the essence force in the body towards the wound. This would ensure the smooth circulation of blood and life force around the body to aid in regeneration. Thus, after applying medicine, Jiang Yi still had to practice the Jiang Water Art to circulate the essence force from the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm and help his wounds heal faster.
外面出来一阵沉重的脚步声，将众人的思绪拉了回来，江顾水等人很快醒悟过来。
A sounds of heavy footsteps could be heard from the outside which brought everyone by to their senses. Jiang Gushui and the others came to realization quickly.
外面的两位龟公正在拉客没注意江逸，让他一下冲进了内堂，里面一位半老徐娘老鸨倒是看到有客上门，扭着蛇腰，媚笑迎了上来：“哟，这位小哥那么猴急干什么？我家的姑娘……”

The two pimps were busy hustling customers and did not notice Jiang Yi, allowing him to dash into the inner hall. Inside, a middle-aged mamasan gyrated her hips and greeted him with a smile. "Oh my! Young man, why are you so impatient? Our ladies…"
夜色如浓稠的墨汁，深沉的化不开，一丝光都没有，四野寂静的令人可怕、心慌。
The night was as dark as thick black ink, without even a ray of light. The surroundings were eerily quiet and nerve wracking.
大厅中于是一片鸦雀无声……
So, the hall fell into dead silence...
大厅里安静得有些吓人，这大概是拍卖会上最荒谬的一幕了，整个交易甚至都没经过凯文落锤确认，但在场所有人都没怀疑过交易的有效性，让他们感到荒谬的是曼尼斯家族，整整一百套精品装备，就为了换取十瓶奥法药剂，他们甚至在想，这个年轻的族长是不是已经疯了……

The hall was frighteningly quiet. This had to be the most absurd scene of the auction. The whole deal was not even validated by Kevin's gavel, but not one present doubted the validity of the deal. What struck them as absurd was the Mannes Family using 100 set of excellent equipment just to exchange for ten bottles of Arcane Magic Potion. They had even wondered if the young patriarch had gone mad...
大厅里异常安静，所有人的目光都落到了谜蓝宝石上面，就连那个正跟他竞争奥法药剂的美貌少妇，美目中也是不由透出几分惊艳。
The hall was exceptionally quiet. All eyes fell onto the Enigma Sapphire, even the attractive young woman who was contending with him couldn't stop the amazement from showing in her beautiful eyes.
大厅里忽然安静了下来，在场几十个魔法师，包括凯文在内，在魔法上钻研的时间都至少超过二十年，以他们的眼光，又如何看不出林立刚才使用的，正是二级魔法冲击水幕。

The hall hushed all of a sudden. The dozens of mages present, including Kevin, had been studying magic for at least 20 years. They could easily see that the magic Lin Li used was a level-two Waterfall Strike.
大厅里忽然安静了下来，所有人的目光都落到了伊瑟拉－曼尼斯身上，这句话甚至比萨鲁曼家族的报价更加惊人，谁也没有想到，除了安东尼－罗林之外，第二个承认自己现金不够的，居然会是伊瑟拉－曼尼斯——加洛斯城的首富！

The hall fell silent all of a sudden, and all eyes were on Ysera Mannes. This sentence was much more shocking than the Saruman Family's bid. No one had thought that apart from Anthony Rolin, the second one who admitted that he did not have enough cash would be Ysera Mannes—the wealthiest man in Jarrosus City!
大厅里的气氛，一时间变得有些压抑，就好象暴风雨来临之前，那种让人心慌胸闷的感觉。
The atmosphere in the hall became a little stifling at once, like the panic-stricken feeling one would get before the storm struck.
大厅里静得吓人，只能听见两人急促的呼吸声，水晶球正散发出炽烈的光芒，将整个大厅照得纤毫毕现，葛瑞安与凯文的表情完全呆滞，在这恐怖的表演前，他们只能傻傻的望着水晶球，甚至忘了去记录林立的数据。

The hall was eerily quiet, and only the sound of Gerian and Kevin's breathing could be heard. The crystal ball was giving off a dazzling glow, lighting the whole hall into brilliance. Both Gerian and Kevin were astounded. Before this horrifying performance, they could only stare at the crystal ball, and the thought of recording Lin Li's data slipped right out of their minds.
大厅里静得惊人，只有锤子落在台上的声音。
The hall was shockingly silent. There was only the sound of the gavel landing on the table.
大厅里静得有些吓人，所有人的目光都落到了林立脸上，他们都很想要看看，在这从天而降的机遇面前，这个年轻魔法师是否还能继续保持冷静。

The silence in the hall was frightening. Everyone's eyes fell on Lin Li's face. They would like to see whether the young mage would be able to continue keeping his calm in front of a godsent opportunity like this.
大家族之间都有潜规则，家族子弟之间冲突，可以伤，可以废，但不得出人命，各家族最重要的天才子弟也绝对不能废！否则将会引起两大家族撕破脸皮火拼。所以江逸明知如果今日杀了马飞，刘管事和那几名护卫绝对会被处死，但他还是不敢动手。

There were unwritten rules among the great families: the descendants could hurt and render one another useless in a conflict, but they must not take lives; in addition, the genius descendants, who were most important to the families, must never be rendered useless. To do so otherwise would trigger a duel between families that would throw all pretenses of cordiality into the wind. Jiang Yi hence knew that if he had killed Ma Fei, Housekeeper Liu and the guards would definitely be sentenced to death, yet he did not dare to make the move.
大师级技能最多只能制作传说物品，而且一千次里还不一定能成功一次，而宗师级技能不但可以随意的制作传说物品，还能够轻易的制作出史诗物品，虽然仍然有一定的失败几率，但是比起大师级来，简直不可同日而语。

The mastery level would only allow you to create legendary items, and there might only be one success in a thousand tries. But at the guru level, you could create legendary items at will. You could even create epic items, though there would still be a certain rate of failure. However, a guru could not be mentioned in the same breath as a master.
大概也只有梅林家族这种庞然大物，才有那么一点点机会获得大师级药剂，不过也仅仅是一点点而已……
Perhaps only a giant like the Merlin Family had a little chance of getting a master potion, but that was only a little...
大概也只有象凯文这样，从小受传统魔法教育长大的人才知道，有多少魔法师一生都在做着魔导士的梦，又有多少魔法师一生都无法实现这个梦想，若是让他们知道，有一个年轻人接触魔法才三个月，就已经接近了魔导士境界，真不知道他们会不会羞愤得一头撞死……

Perhaps only someone like Kevin, who grew up with traditional magic education, knew how many mages had been dreaming of being an archmage all their lives, and how many had never been able to achieve that. dream. If they knew that a young man who had only been exposed to magic for three months had come so close to being an archmage, who knew if they would be so very ashamed and resentful that they'd kill themselves over it...
大概也正是因为这样，一路上从未与林立说过话的克伦威尔，此时竟是破天荒的主动开口问道：“费雷法师等下是不是要去魔法公会报道？如果有什么要帮忙的话尽管开口，我们梅林家族在加洛斯魔法公会还算是能说上话。”

It was probably the reason why Cromwell, who had not spoken a word to Lin Li along the way, took the initiative to ask him, "Mage Felic, are you going to report at the Guild of Magic? If you need help, do feel free to ask me, the Merlin Family does have a say in the Jarrosus' Guild of Magic."
大概是因为经历不同的关系，林立一直觉得，这世界上没有什么东西比生命更加珍贵，任何一条生命都应该得到足够的尊重，特别是身为一名医生，更是应该绝对尊重病人的生命。

Perhaps it was because his experiences were different. Lin Li had always felt that there was nothing more precious than life in this world. All lives should be respected; and especially as a doctor, one should absolutely respect the patient's life.
大殿三面都有数条走廊，黑甲护卫带着江逸走到左边的走廊，交代道：“你顺着这走廊朝里面走就是了，去找杨管事，他会安排好你的。”

Three sides of the central hall had multiple corridors.
The guard clad in black armor brought Jiang Yi into a corridor on the left-hand side. "All you need to do is to follow this corridor and walk into the building. Go and find Manager Yang; he will properly arrange your position."
大量的草药被分门别类的放好，原本空荡荡的药剂室里，又飘荡起了草药的清香，按照林立的计划，这第一批草药，将会尽可能的用在低级药剂上，毕竟这只是一个开始，还远没到拿出全部本事的地步。

A large amount of herbs was placed into their different categories, and the empty pharmacy was once more filled with the fragrance of herbs. According to Lin Li's plan, the first batch of herbs would be used in low-level potions as much as possible. After all, this was just a beginning; it was far from the point of showing off all of his skills.
大量瞬发的低级魔法，确实可以取到出其不意的作用，但是在绝对的力量面前，低级魔法就成了一个笑话，不说老梅林的火雨自己用什么去挡，光是葛瑞安撑起的那一面水蓝色光幕，自己若是用风刃去射的话，还真不知道要射到哪年哪月去。

Instantaneous outbursts of numerous low-level magic could indeed take on an unexpected effect. But in the face of absolute power, a low-level magic would be rendered as a joke. Not to mention how he'd go about blocking Old Merlin's fire rain, if he were to throw wind blades at the blue water curtain Gerian had drawn up, it would probably take years for him to break it down.
大长老烦恼之余，终于想到用元力检查江逸的身体，这才发现一个惊天秘密——在江逸丹田的外围，竟然包裹着一层封印，如同一张纹路精致的薄膜一般，完美裹住了江逸的整个丹田空间，过滤内外，大大降低了他体内元力进出丹田的速度！

With mounting frustration, the Grand Elder finally thought to use essence force to check Jiang Yi’s physical body. It was then that he made a shocking discovery—surrounding Jiang Yi’s dantian was a layer of seals, thinner than a sheet of paper. This layer completely covered Jiang Yi’s entire dantian. It was akin to a filter blocking an entrance and exit alike, greatly reducing the speed at which essence force could enter his naval area!
大长老随后通过内视画出了那道封印的图案，竟似一幅神秘古怪的龙形符文组合，只是所有人都看不懂那符文组合到底是什么东西，就更别说破解了……

Following this revelation, the Grand Elder used his inner vision abilities to draw out the image on the seal, revealing a mysterious dragon-shaped talisman. The problem was that no one could read and understand the words that formed the talisman image, let alone break the seal…
大魔导士欺负魔法师，那绝对是不折不扣的碾压……
An archmage oppressing a mage was an absolute crush...
天下做父母的，又有谁不希望自己的子女成材？
Which parent in the world would not want their children to be successful?
天底下为何会有这样两种极端并存的情况呢？
How on earth could there possibly exist such a condition of two polar opposites?
天庭再度恢复了寂静，依旧漆黑。
The Heavenly Court returned to its calm and quiet state, still as dark as before.
天庭南天门前的石梯上，再无一丝九阳天帝存在过的痕迹。
On the stone stairs on the south gates of the Heavenly Court, there was no longer any sign of the Nine-Yang Celestial Thearch's existence.
天庭整个又恢复了原先的黯淡安然，唯一的不同，就是在那天庭的南天城门前，不知什么时候出现了一个人。
The Heavenly Court was restored to its original dim and dark state. The only difference was that in the southern city entrance to the Heavenly Court, a figure had appeared undetected.
天星大陆几乎人人练武，武学体系有着泾渭分明的森严等级，根据武学特征的不同并按照从低到高排列的话，依次是铸鼎境、紫府境、神游境等等……这其中，每个境界又根据元力分为九重，不同境界的力量标准也是截然不同的。

In the Stellarsky Continent, almost everyone practiced martial arts, and the school of martial arts had a well-distinguished hierarchical system. From the lowest level to the highest, it went like this: the Cast Tripod Realm, Purple Mansion Realm, then Soul Travel Realm. Among all these, each realm was split into nine stages according to the essence force accumulated. The strength standards of each realm were also very different.
天星大陆好武，各家族子弟在族中斗殴都不管，更别说在外面斗殴了，只要不出人命，一律无视，在外面打赢了还会受到嘉奖。

Martial arts was popular in Stellarsky Continent. Few cared about their familial descandants fighting amongst each other within their clans, to say nothing of inter-clan fighting outside. So long as no one was killed, all fights were disregarded - and better still, if one won an inter-clan fight outside, he might even be granted a commendation or award.
天星大陆，武学体系发达，丹药、兵器、功法、武技都有着泾渭分明的等阶，全部从弱到强都按人阶，地阶，天阶区分，每一等阶又分为上中下三品。

Systems related to martial arts research and development were advanced on Stellarsky Continent. Elixirs, weaponry, cultivation techniques, and martial arts techniques all had distinct grading levels. All of them were divided from weak to strong and classified as Man-tier, Earth-tier, or Heaven-tier, with each grade being further divided into three sub-grades of superior, medial, and inferior.
天星大陆，武者因为修炼功法的不同，会产生各种颜色的元力，这些元力的颜色一般和功法的种类有着最直接的关系。

The martial artists of Stellarsky Continent practiced different cultivation techniques, with each technique producing essence force of different colors. The colors of the essence force was usually directly connected with the elements channeled by the cultivation style.
天星大陆，神武国，天羽城。
The Continent of Stellarsky, Kingdom of Divine Martial, Skyplume City.
天界，天庭。
Heavenly Realm, Heavenly Court.
天羽城姬家为首，之下就是柳家，马家，江家，冷家四大家族。其余倒是有些小家族，比如翊凌雪所在的翊家，杨家等等，不过和五大家族完全不能比。

In Skyplume City, the Ji Family was positioned at the top; below them were the four great family clans the Liu Family, the Ma Family, the Jiang Clan and the Leng Family. The remaining were smaller family clans, such as the Yi Family, from which Yi Lingxue hailed from, and the Yang Family; however, none of these smaller family clans could compare with the five great family clans at all.
天羽城姬家之下，原本是江家排名第一的，马家第二，不过在大长老江云海失踪后，江家失去了一名紫府境巅峰强者，声势立即大弱。而在三年前马家一位小姐嫁给了姬家大少爷姬怒剑后，马家立即声势大盛，这两年来隐隐有压江家一头的趋势。

In Skyplume City, the Jiang Clan supposedly ranked right below the Ji Family, but above the Ma Family. However, with the disappearance of Grand Elder Jiang Yunhai, the Jiang Clan lost one of their most formidable martial artists who attained the top level of the Purple Mansion Realm, depriving them of significant prestige and power. The status of the Ma Family on the other hand skyrocketed three years ago, when Ji Nujian, the Great Young Master of the Ji Family, married one of the young ladies in the Ma Family. Over the last two years, the Ma Family seemed to be growing into a force that might surpass the Jiang Clan.
天色已经大亮，早晨的空气很清新，江逸感觉经过一夜的打坐疗伤，伤势恢复了不少，连带着精神也足了几分。

By then, the sky was already brightly lit. The morning air was crisp and fresh; Jiang Yi could feel that, after a long night of meditation, his wounds had healed greatly. His vitality also seemed to have improved a few notches.
天色已近黄昏，江逸却全然忘记了时间，全神贯注的开始提炼黑色元力，此刻他恨不得直接修炼出一万八千缕黑色元力，把这鬼封印全破开，再看看他的修炼速度是否如原先这般废材？

The sky was turning orange as the evening hours drew near. However, Jiang Yi completely forgot about the time as he had completely focused his attention on refining black essence force. At that moment, he wished he could directly refine eighteen thousand strands of black essence force at once to break his seal completely. Then he would see if his refining speed was as terrible as it originally had been.
天色还早，江逸准备修炼两个时辰江水决补充下蓝色元力，恢复回炉所消耗的元力。本身他修炼就慢，回炉吸收了他太多的元力，如果不及时补充怕是持续半个月下去，他积累了那么多年的元力都会消耗完……
The day was still young. Jiang Yi was ready to spend four hours practicing the Jiang Water Art to refine his blue essence force and replenish the essence force consumed by the cauldron.
失去了巨网的掩护，又没有椰子在手，一时间那利维坦猩猩竟比拔了牙的老虎还不如。
Without the giant net as a shield and a coconut in hand, the Leviathan Gorilla was no better than a toothless tiger.
奥法药剂一拿就是三十瓶的人，就绝不会在乎多拿三十瓶出来，在这致命的诱惑下，不知道多少杀手刺客在排着队等你，你还在那喋喋不休的叫嚣，真是不知道死字怎么写……

Someone who could bring out 30 bottles of Arcane Magic Potion at once would not mind having another 30 bottles out. Under this fatal temptation, who knew how many assassins would be out there waiting for Cromwell? Yet he was still clamoring endlessly, not knowing how the word "death" was spelled.
奥法药剂引起的轰动，林立多多少少也已经知道了一些，若是换个时间的话，他可能还会稍稍陶醉一下，可是现在却完全没了这个心思。
Lin Li knew about the stir created by the Arcane Magic Potion. If it happened in a different period of time, he would have taken pleasure in receiving the attention. But he had no mood for it now.
她内心的傲气被激起了，双腿一点，速度加快几分，再次运转幻灵手朝江逸点去。

The pride in her heart was greatly aroused. With a leap of both her legs, she increased her movement speed by several notches before once again circulating her Fantasy Spirit Hands technique and attacking in the direction of Jiang Yi.
她有一双漂亮的丹凤眼，黑如珍珠的眸子内闪耀着能洞悉一切的光芒，她发现有人匆匆走上来，柳眉微微一簇，放下书望了过来，浅浅一笑道：“鹤爷爷，您走得如此匆忙，难道出了什么事？”

She had a pair of pretty red phoenix eyes, with pearl-black pupils that sparkled and gave a penetrating stare. Realsiing that someone was hurrying towards her, she raised her long shapely eyebrows slightly and set her book down. Looking over, she gave a light smile and asked, "Grandfather He, you're walking ever so hurriedly, could it be that something went wrong?"
她本就只懂得一些药剂皮毛，而坐在她面前的，却是一个大师一个宗师，他们谈的东西，早就已经超出了罗琳的理解范围，以至于到了最后，她根本就听不清两人在说些什么，只是神色复杂的望着林立，几次欲言又止……

She only had a superficial knowledge of potions anyway, and sitting in front of her were a master and a guru in pharmaceutics. What they were discussing was already beyond Rowling's understanding, so at the end, she simply couldn't hear what the two men were talking about. She merely sat there, looking at Lin Li with a complicated expression, many times about to speak but saying nothing in the end...
她气鼓鼓的朝大门走去，伸手在门边上一个突出的石砖拍下，练功房内顿时光芒一闪，大门打开了。

Fuming, she walked towards the door. She extended out her hand and punched the stone slab protruding out of the wall next to the door. The technique-practicing room was suddenly filled with the flash of bright light as the door opened up.
她甚至连黄昏诅咒是什么都没搞清楚，就更不用说想出解决办法了，而病床上的麦格雷尼，却很可能连一天都等不下去……
She didn't even know what the Twilight Curse was, much less coming up with a way to break it. And McGrenn, who was lying on the sickbed, most likely couldn't even wait another day...
好一会他才平复内心的冲动，咬牙抬头道：“你想怎么样？”
It was several minutes before he could quell the urge burning within. Biting his teeth hard, he asked, "What is it that you want?"
好在多年来的压抑生活，造就了他远非同龄人的心理承受能力。他强迫自己冷静下来，冷眼一扫，目光锁定那管事，咬牙爆喝道：“等等！我无心在风月楼闹事，你们不毒打我侍女，我也不会动手的！这事就算闹到城主府，我也不怕！要动手你们尽管放手过来，看我是否会惧怕？”

Years of oppressive living had conditioned his mind. His mental resilience far exceeded that of his peers. He forced himself to calm down. He swept those gathered with a cold glare before locking onto the the housekeeper.
"Wait, wait!” he said, clenching his teeth. “I have no intention to cause trouble in Fengyue Brothel! If you had not beaten my maidservant, I wouldn't have attacked either! I won't be afraid even if this matter is brought up to the city lord! If you want to fight, go on! Let's see if I'm afraid!"
好在灵兽山学院招生在即，加上这次恰好碰到镇西军也准备来天羽城招人，所以各家族没在意马家的异常举动，都各自在培养家族的子弟，争取让他们成为灵兽山学院的特招生，再不济也要被镇西军军官看重，加入军中。

It was fortunate that the Mt. Spirit Beast College would be starting its recruitment of students soon; in addition, it coincided with the recruitment of the Western Garrison Army. With these two events around the corner, the odd behaviors of the Ma Family largely went under the radar of the other families, which were all busy grooming their descendants in hopes of having them either enroll into Mt. Spirit Beast College as special students, or at the very least win the favor of the Western Garrison Army commanders and being taken in by the army.
好在黄裳少女身后的鹤大师跟着走进来，惊醒了江逸，他连忙假装咳嗽低下头不敢多看。他是来卖药的，这黄裳少女明显非富即贵，这样冒然盯着人家说不定会触怒对方。

Thankfully Master He walked into the booth, following behind the young lady in yellow robes, which startled Jiang Yi. He hastily pretended to cough and lowered his head down, not daring to stare any further. He was there to sell his medical elixirs, whereas this young lady in yellow robes was evidently wealthy and respectable. It was likely that taking the liberty to stare at his counterpart would end up infuriating her.
如今奥法药剂已经卖到最后十瓶，三大家族中却还有两家虎视耽耽。
There were only ten Arcane Magic Potion left now, but out of the three families, two still had their eyes on it.
如今想起其中的惊险，林立也忍不住有些暗暗庆幸。
Now that Lin Lin Li thought back on the perils in it, he couldn't help but feel fortunate.
如今林立手上有了深邃之银，可供选择的金属可就实在太多了。
Now that Lin Li had the deep silver in his hands, the metals that he could choose were just too many.
如今的魔法公会可不比当初了，林立来之前，谁愿意跟魔法公会套什么交情？要钱没钱要人没人，顶着加洛斯第一势力的名头，日子却过得比谁都拮据，别说十一魔法家族，六大地下势力这些人，就连一些弱小势力，恐怕都不太有兴趣跟魔法公会打交道。

The Guild of Magic today was not the same as it was at the beginning. Before Lin Li had joined, who would be willing to have any dealings with the Guild of Magic? They had no money nor talent; they had the title of the number one force of Jarrosus but they had led a poorer life than anyone else. Not to mention the 11 mage families, the people from the six underground forces, and even the weaker forces, were most likely not interested in having dealings with the Guild of Magic.
如今的魔法公会在加洛斯城，已是可以用如日中天来形容，他们拥有加洛斯最强的魔法师之一，还拥有一个真正的药剂师，在这样恐怖的实力基础上，曼尼斯家族竟又为他们送上了一百套强力魔法装备……

The Guild of Magic today could be described as the sun at high noon. They had one of the most powerful mages in Jarrosus City and a real pharmacist. On top of this terrifying power, the Mannes Family had gifted them a hundred sets of powerful magic equipment...
如今的魔法公会，远不到高枕无忧的时候。
The Guild of Magic today was far from being able to rest easy.
如今魔法公会一统加洛斯城，连城主大人都要主动上门攀交情，公会里的魔法师随便走到什么地方，所受的待遇那绝对是最优厚的，就算是走进了镀金玫瑰，买魔法装备都至少要打七折。

Right now, the Guild of Magic had dominated Jarrosus City, and even the Castellan had to offer his friendship. Wherever the guild's mages went, they'd receive the most generous treatment; even in the Gilded Rose, the equipment they bought would be given at least a 30 percent discount.
如今魔法公会如日中天，加洛斯城又有谁不想跟他们攀上关系？此时一看葛瑞安的亲侄子光临，一群宾客又哪还按捺得住。

The Guild of Magic was at the peak of its power now, and who in Jarrosus City wouldn't want to claim a relationship with them? At this moment, Gerian's nephew had graced the event, so how could the guests hold back?
如果……他在这干活，那不是可以偷偷的炼丹？借助黑色元力炼制出高级的丹药，再人不知鬼不觉拿出去卖！

If... he started working here, did that mean he could secretly refine elixirs? He could borrow the power of the black essence force to refine and produce high-grade elixirs, before selling them outside without anyone knowing!
如果不是因为克伦威尔太不争气，自己又怎么会在没有必胜把握的时候，挑战同为大魔导士的葛瑞安？
If it hadn’t been because Cromwell had failed him, he wouldn't have challenged Gerian who was an archmage just like him when he had no assurance of winning.
如果不是林立的出现，挽救他们父女的应该是自己才对。
If it had not been for Lin Li’s appearance, he would have been the one to save the father and daughter.
如果他真象安度因所说的那样优秀，老格林觉得自己可以稍稍指点他一下，甚至将他发展进药剂师公会。
If he was really as good as what Andoine said, Old Grimm thought that he could give him a little guidance and even lead him into the Pharmacists Guild.
如果早知道那个药剂师就是他的话，刚才就应该痛下杀手，管他什么葛瑞安出手相助，只要杀死这个药剂师，梅林家族在加洛斯城将再无对手，就算自己跟葛瑞安两败俱伤又怎么样？难道今时今日的梅林家族，还斗不过一个失去葛瑞安的魔法公会？

If he had known that he was the pharmacist, he would have killed him earlier on. He'd not have cared if Gerian had stepped in to help. As long as he killed the pharmacist, the Merlin Family would not have any more rivals in Jarrosus City. Who would care if he hurt himself along with Gerian in that battle? Surely the Merlin Family of today could defeat the Guild of Magic that had lost Gerian.
如果是其他魔兽，伊娜现在可能已经凶多吉少了，也只有遇上利维坦猩猩，才暂时没有什么生命危险，比起其他凶残魔兽来，利维坦猩猩并不太热中于杀戮，就如同安度因所说，它们只是一群喜欢捣乱的小痞子。

If it were other magical beasts, Ina would probably be dead by now. It was only when encountering the Leviathan Gorilla that her life was not in danger for the time being. The Leviathan Gorilla were not so keen on killing like other savage magical beasts. Just as Andoine had said, they were just a bunch of troublemakers.
如果是刚才，或许对方手掌一扫，他双手肯定会被荡开还会被震伤，因为对方境界高两重，速度太快了，根本看不清他的手掌扫来的轨迹！

If it happened much earlier, or if the opponent moved his palms in a sweeping motion, his own hands would have been deflected away and injured by the shockwave of that sweep. As the opponent's realm level was two times greater than Jiang Yi's, his speed was too fast, leaving Jiang Yi completely unable to clearly see the trajectory of the sweeping motion of his palms.
如果是别人这么说，葛瑞安一定会以为这是一个笑话，可是偏偏他心里很清楚，安度因的性格向来是说一是一说二是二，活了一百多岁，从来就没说过一句大话。

Gerian would definitely regard it as a joke if it came from the mouth of someone else. But he knew deep down in his heart that Andoine was a man of his words. He had never exaggerated anything once in the hundred of years he had lived.
如果有了这源源不断的药剂，整个加洛斯城除了魔法公会之外，又有谁能抗衡自己？
If there was a constant supply of potions, who else could compete against them in the whole of Jarrosus City besides the Guild of Magic?
如果此刻和他谈交易的不是武殿管事，江逸绝对会扭头就走，认为对方是个疯子。问题就在这里，武殿作为大陆商号中的无冕之王，数十万年来从没传出过丑闻，更从没有听说过武殿有过恶行。况且……他只是一个小人物，武殿又怎么会处心积虑对付他？

If the person discussing this business deal with him at the moment was not been a manager for the Martial Arts Hall, Jiang Yi would have definitely turned around and left, thinking that the other party was a madman. This was where the question lay - the Martial Arts Hall was the uncrowned king amongst the major mercantile businesses on the continent and had never experienced a single scandals in over tens of thousands of years, to say nothing of getting any hearsay of corrupt deeds conducted by the Martial Arts Hall. Besides... he was only a small character, why would the Martial Arts Hall deliberately scheme and plot against him?
如果没猜到霍伦的身份，林立可能还会跟他回去接受调查，可如今明知道他是巴瑟罗尔的父亲，林立又怎么可能允许自己落在他的手里？就算奥德文站在自己这边又怎么样，一旦落进霍伦的手里，他有一万种办法瞒着奥德文干掉自己，这太简单了……

If he had not guessed Hoeren's identity, he might have followed him back to undergo interrogation. But now that he knew Hoeren was Bathrilor's father, how could Lin Li allow himself to fall into his trap? It wouldn't matter even if Odwin was standing in his position. Once you fell into Hoeren's trap, he would have ten thousand ways to hide the truth from Odwin and get rid of him. It was simply too easy...
如果自己不断提炼，当黑色元力越积越多，他的实力会不会越来越强大？
Would his strength be boosted even further if he continued to accumulate more of the black essence force by continuing to cultivate the nameless formula?
如果自己没猜错的话，那条项链使用的金属，绝对是深邃之银！
If his guess was correct, the metal used for the necklace was definitely the deep silver!
如果说先前那些，还只是让老法师觉得陌生的话。
Mentioning the inexperienced Lin Li slightly a month back would only make Andoine feel strange and distance.
如果说先前那瓶唤醒药剂给他带来的是失望的话，那么现在这瓶则毫无疑问的让他陷入了绝望。
If the previous Awakening Potion had brought Old Merlin disappointment, then this bottle had no doubt left him in despair.
如果说在场众人中，谁从这场战斗中获益最大的话，那毫无疑问只有林立了。
If there was anyone who benefited most from the battle, it would undoubtedly be Lin Li.
如果说现在的魔法公会里，有谁是绝对不能招惹的话，那毫无疑问，就是眼前这个穿着旧法袍的年轻法师了。
If there was anyone in the Guild of Magic that could never be messed with now, it would undoubtedly be the young mage wearing a worn mage robe standing in front of them.
如果非要在加洛斯魔法公会里找出一个最安全的地方，那无疑就是这间公会会客室里，门外七枚巫师之眼，全方位的监视着周围一举一动，紧闭的房门背后，一道魔法探测立场魔纹，正散发出淡淡的魔法波动，在这道魔纹的影响下，任何魔法窥视都瞒不过葛瑞安的耳目。

If one were to ask where the safest place in the whole of Jarrosus Guild of Magic was, it would undoubtedly be the reception room. There were seven Warlock's Eyes at the door, providing an all-dimensional surveillance of each and every action in the surrounding. Behind the tightly shut door was a magic probing mageweath, emitting a faint wave of magic. Under the influence of the mageweath, any magical spying activities would never go unnoticed by Gerian.
如此大的力量，结局不言而喻，江如龙的脑袋一下头破血流，鲜血染红了半面墙壁。
With such forces, the results needed no description. Jiang Rulong's head was bleeding profusely and painted half the wall in fresh blood.
如此好的机会，江逸还不知道痛打落水狗，他就是白痴了。他右手早早松开对方的手臂，目光朝地下的小奴一扫，大喝起来：“小奴！”

With such a good opportunity placed before him, Jiang Yi would be an utter idiot if he did not know to take the chance to completely pulverize his opponent. With his right hand having already released his opponent's arm earlier on, he glanced down to see Xiao Nu who was lying on the ground and shouted loudly, "Xiaonu!"
如此盛大的拍卖会，后续工作自然不能马虎。
The follow-up work could not be sloppy for such a grand auction like this.
如此诡异的情况，除了黑色元力和蓝色的水系江水诀元力完美融合并让后者威力增大，从而导致力量暴增外，根本就无从解释！
The only explanation for this bizarre situation was that the two essence force had fused perfectly, greatly increasing his strength. Other then that there was no other reasonable explanation!
姬听雨不再多问，转头和刘管事交代起来：“你去取一两紫金，这三枚丹药我们聚珍阁收了。”
Ji Tingyu did not ask any further. Instead, turning to Chief Liu, she instructed, "You go fetch one tael of purple gold, the Pearl Gathering Pavilion will accept these three pills."
姬听雨也不矫情了，单腿一点，如一只花蝴蝶般飘了过来，一双手如在空中拨弄琴弦般舞动起来，幻化出道道残影，让人一阵眼花缭乱，银铃般的声音响起：“易公子小心哦，这是我们姬家的人阶上品武技幻灵手。”

Ji Tingyu decided not to be affectionate any longer. Skipping a beat with one of her legs, she fluttered over like a flowery butterfly. Her hands danced about in the air, as though they were fiddling with the strings of a guqin, producing multiple images of figures made from the traces of her hand gestures, the figures of which left one bedazzled and confused. In the midst of doing these actions, like a silver bell her voice rang out, saying, "Watch out, Young Master Yi, this martial arts technique is from our Ji Family - it's the Man-tier superior-grade technique Fantasy Spirit Hands."
姬听雨也是微微一怔，不过很快浅浅的笑了起来，微微颔首道：“丹药自然是收的，易公子，你准备卖多少钱一枚呢？”

Ji Tingyu was slightly stunned for a moment, but she quickly gave a faint smile. Nodding her head slightly, she responded, "We will naturally accept the elixirs. Young Master Yi, what is the price you are prepared to see one pill for?"
姬听雨再次一怔，江逸这点实力竟还准备和她打一场，尽管两人元力被封，但是差距还是太大了吧？难不成她站着不动给江逸攻击？给他做陪练？

Ji Tingyu was once again stumped for words. Jiang Yi, with such a tiny amount of power, was actually ready to spar with her in a match. Even though both their essence forces had been sealed off from use, surely the difference between their power was too wide? Was it possible for her to just stand her ground, not move and allow Jiang Yi to attack? Did this mean allowing him to be her sparring partner?
姬听雨再次出关了，而出关之后却径直来到练功房，点名要江逸陪练对战。
Ji Tingyu had once again left for seclusion, and the first thing she did was making her way directly to the Technique Practising Room, deliberately ordering Jiang Yi for a sparring match.
姬听雨和鹤大师对视了一眼，两人眼中都闪过一丝愕然，炼出丹纹的丹药竟然卖二十两银子一枚？能炼制出这样丹药的炼丹师会在意这点小钱？难道这少年是偷了别人的丹药？

Ji Tingyu and Master He exchange a look, both of their eyes flashing a thread of amazement. Was an elixir pill with vein patterns refined onto it actually being sold for only two taels of silver each? Did the alchemist who could produce such kinds of elixirs care for only so little money? Could it be possible that this young man stole the elixir from someone else?
姬听雨在聚珍阁地位显然非常高，她沉吟起来，别人也不敢开口，片刻之后她再次问道：“易公子，听雨想冒然问问，这炼制丹药的大师……知道你出来卖丹药吗？”

It was evident that Ji Tingyu's status in Pearl Gathering Pavilion was exceptionally high, no one would raise any objection even if she muttered anything. After a brief moment, she once again asked, "Young Master Yi, I would like to take the liberty to ask - the alchemist who refined this pill... Does he know that you brought it out to sell?"
姬听雨如花的脸庞顿时变色，目光灼灼的盯着江逸，沉声问道：“易公子，此话当真？”
Ji Tingyu's beautiful face instantly lost its color. She fixed keen eyes upon Jiang Yi and asked somberly, "Young Master Yi, do you speak of the truth?"
姬听雨心里暗叹一声可惜，江逸如此年纪了才是铸鼎境二重，除非超级大家族用大量资源培育，否则这辈子成就有限。武者越修炼到后面越困难，凭借丹药不可能铸就一名强者，一般家族也消耗不起，至少天羽城内的家族没这个能力。

In her heart, Ji Tingyu sighed silently about how, unfortunately for Jiang Yi, he was already so old, yet his power level was only at a measly second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Unless greatly large powerful family clans invested a great amount of resources on training him, otherwise his accomplishments would forever remain severely limited. The higher a martial artist cultivated his power level up to, the more difficult it got to increase his power level further. Relying on elixirs alone also could not instantly produce a powerful martial artist. The resources needed were something ordinary families could not afford to spend and consume on - at least, the family clans within Skyplume City did not have such an ability.
姬听雨打开房门走了出去，江逸却满眸迷茫，让他跟着炼丹师学习炼丹术？跟哪个炼丹师？难道是柳长老？可他已经死了啊，而且他只是一品炼丹师能强大到哪去呢？

一品Ji Tingyu opened the room door and walked out, leaving Jiang Yi whose pupils were revealing a look of perplexed bewilderment. He wondered to himself about her suggestion to continue following "that alchemist" to learn the art of alchemy. With which alchemist? Could she be talking about Elder Liu? What could he do, considering that he's already dead? Besides, how great a life could he have by being just a first-rate alchemist?
姬听雨摇了摇头道：“谁生下来就注定是王侯将相？我们的出身谁也无法决定，但我们的命运可以自己去主宰。我尊称你一声公子，并不是因为你的出身，天羽城青年俊彦多如牛毛，一般人我都懒得他们说话，你能懂我的意思吗？”

Ji Tingyu shook her head and replied, "Which person, upon birth, is immediately destined to be a great person? No one can ever determine one's own family background, but we can dictate and control our own destinies. I call you 'young master' with respect, not because of your birth or background. The number of youth in Skyplume City that are handsome and talented is virtually countless, yet I'm usually too lazy to even speak to most of them. Do you get what I mean?"
姬听雨暗暗惊疑，再也不保存实力了，双腿连连点在地面，速度如一阵狂风般朝江逸掠去，双手十指如在虚空弹琴，幻出一片残影，将江逸全身都笼罩进去。

Ji Tingyu was silently bewildered by what she had just witnessed. Deciding not to reduce and conserve her power any longer, she tip-toped and continuously stepped point by point on the ground as she moved in a sweeping motion towards Jiang Yi at a high speed, akin to a strong gale. The ten fingers on both her hands gestured like they were playing a magic guqin in mid-air, conjuring up an image figure of made from her hand gestures within which she entangled Jiang Yi's whole body.
姬听雨本怕一招就把江逸击飞了，所以没敢动用全力，还只是用了人阶的武技，那料到江逸竟轻松躲避开去？动作如行云流水，轻松自如。

Ji Tingyu was originally afraid that she would send Jiang Yi flying with just one move and, as such, did not dare to apply her full force in this initial attack. She had even used a Man-tier martial arts technique. Who could expect Jiang Yi to actually avoid the attack with such easy. His movements were relaxed and smooth, natural like moving clouds and flowing water.
姬听雨淡然一笑，解释道：“在外面你看了我一眼，立即潜藏身形，我只是有些惊疑。进来之后看你这体型又让我觉得隐约有些熟悉，最后看到你的鞋子，我才猜到的。”

Ji Tingyu calmly laughed and explained, "I was just somewhat startled how you took a look at me outside this room and immediately tried to hide your body. After we entered the room, upon seeing your build, I couldn't help but feel you seemed somewhat vaguely familiar. Finally I was able to guess after taking a look at your shoes.
姬听雨盈盈一笑，美得让人炫目，她美眸中光波流转，望着鹤大师笑道：“鹤爷爷，偌大的天羽城，炼丹没人比得上你，但论做生意……却没人比得过我。就凭这丹纹，要不是怕吓到这少年，我都会出十两紫金收购。如果用一点小钱，就能交好一位可能成为……丹王丹圣的炼丹师，这生意就太划算了。对了！鹤爷爷你千万不要派人去跟踪，否则激怒了那位神秘的炼丹师就得不偿失了。放心吧，这位少年很快又会上门的……”

丹王Ji Tingyu was full of laughter, her giggles making her beauty ever more dazzling. Moving the pupils of her heautiful eyes around to look at Master he, she smiled, saying, "Grandfather He, in a place as vast as Skyplume City, there is no alchemist on par with you, but when it comes to doing business... no one is on par wth me. Just based on this elixir vein pattern alone, if not for the fear I have of scaring away the young man, I would even be willing to purchase the elixirs from him for ten taels of purple gold. If I only have to use a little amount of money, and in turn receive someone who might become... an alchemist worthy of being an alchemist master or alchemist saint, such an exchange is truly value-for-money. Oh, right! Grandfather He, no matter what, do not send someone to follow him, otherwise, should we infuriate that mysterious alchemist, we would never be able to replace that potential loss. Don't worry, that young man would certainly return soon enough..."
姬听雨眼中带着淡淡的笑意，好奇的盯着江逸看，直到看得江逸忍不住了，才开口道：“易公子，好久不见！”

Ji Tingyu's eyes revealed a faint expression of happiness. She stared at Jiang Yi with much curiosity until she could hold it in no longer - it was only then that she opened her mouth to say, "Young Master Yi, long time no see!"

姬听雨眼中闪过一丝失望，沉默一阵才轻声说道：“我这次出关，听说你还在这当陪练所以过来看看。和你明说了吧，易公子，你上次送来的丹药很了不起，那位炼丹师以后会非常强大，所以希望你一心一意去追随那个炼丹师，不要在这浪费时间，在武殿内虽然修炼速度能加快一些，但你已经过了修炼的黄金年龄了，这辈子不可能有大成就。当然，我也想通过你认识那位炼丹师，从而建立某种交情，如果你能帮我，什么条件都好说。嗯……或许我的话有些直，希望易公子不要介意。”

Disappointment flashed in Ji Tingyu's eyes. She was quiet for a moment before speaking softly, "I came out of seclusion and heard that your are still here as a sparring partner, so I decided to drop by to pay you a visit. To be frank with you, Young Master Yi, the elixirs you delivered the last time were amazing. The alchemist who made them would become very powerful in time to come. It is my wish for you to commit yourself to the alchemist, rather than wasting your time here. The cultivation speed is indeed faster in the Martial Arts Hall, but you are already past the ideal age for cultivation, which means you may never amount to anything great in this lifetime. Of course, I would also like to acquaint myself to the alchemist through you, and establish some relations with him. If you could help me with that, any request you have could be easily arranged. Ah... perhaps my words are too candid, I hope Young Master Yi would not mind."
姬听雨走进了练功房，看到江逸还没进来，淡淡回头问了一句，目光在马黑旗和柳河脸上扫过，如画的眉头微微蹙了起来。

Ji Tingyu went into the Technique Practising Room; when she saw that Jiang Yi did not follow suit, she turned and asked in a dispassionate tone. With a glance at Ma Heiqi and Liu He, her eyebrows, as pretty as a painting, furrowed lightly.
姬听雨起身朝外面走去，走到门口时，才转身说道：“公子，我还是觉得你还是跟着那名炼丹师学炼丹术的好，那炼丹师……很强大，以后前途也无量，你跟着他这辈子荣华富贵无忧……”

Ji Tingyu stood up and walked towards the exterior of the room. She only turned her body around once she reached the door to say, "Young master, I still think it's best for you to continue learning alchemy from that alchemist. That alchemist... is very knowledgable and powerful, with an immesurable great future prospect. If you continue following him, you'll be prosperous and without worry for the rest of your life..."
姬听雨轻笑摇头，不予置否，她目光透过雅阁的窗口缝隙，望向远方的天空，微微一叹喃喃道：“神武国第一大商号有什么意思？我姬听雨将来可是要成为帝后的女人，怎么会一直行这充满铜臭的商贾之事？”

Ji Tingyu smiled faintly and shook her head, unwilling to comment any further. Through the small gap in the window in the elegant booth, her gaze turned to look at the faraway sky. She sighed slightly and muttered, "What's the point of being the number one merchanthouse in all of Divine Martial Kingdom? I, Ji Tingyu, am going to become the future wife of the king. How can I continue doing this greedy money-grubbing business of mercantile trading?"
姬听雨轻笑摇头，美眸内异彩涟涟，真诚赞道：“易公子才给了听雨一个惊喜呢，听雨刚才可是全力攻击的，别说你就算这里的金牌陪练怕是也挡不住吧？唉……可惜公子境界太低了，否则一定有一番大作为的。当然，公子也别泄气，这个世界不乏大器晚成之辈。“

Ji Tingyu smiled faintly and shook her head, her pretty eyes revealing a look of extraordinary splendor. She praised him with much earnestness, saying, "It was Young Master Yi who gave Tingyu a big surprise! I had after all just attacked with full force just now; to say nothing of you, even the gold token-grade sparring partners would be unable to block off my attacks, no? Sigh... unfortunately, Young master, your Cast Tripod Realm stage power-levels are too low, otherwise our match would definitely provide much assistance to my training. Of course, you don't have to feel discouraged or dejected, Young Master, there are many late-bloomers in the world who still end up accomplishing great things.
娴熟精确的魔力控制，惊人的元素排列速度，放出的虽然只是风刃冰锥，但在格林－伯恩塞德看来，却绝对比一个十级魔法更加意外，魔力控制与元素排列，是任何一个魔法师都需要学习的基础技巧。

Skillful and precise mana control, amazing elemental sequencing speed—although it was just a wind blade and icicle, from what Grimm Burnside saw, it was definitely more surprising than a level-ten magic. Mana control and elemental sequencing were the fundamental skills that every mage was required to learn.
存放丹药的丹房很宽敞，里面有两个三层大柜台，全部摆满了瓶瓶罐罐，都是丹药。
The storeroom where the elixirs were kept was very wide, containing two large three-tiered counters inside. The counters were filled to the brim with bottles and containers, all holding elixirs.
学习新的武技，并不能隐瞒他的身份太久，但此刻他只能拖一时是一时了。只要再给他一些时间，等他修炼到铸鼎境四重，就算马家要找他麻烦，他也有一些自保之力了。

Learning new martial arts techniques would not hide his identity for too long, but at that moment he could only try his best to drag out what amount of time he could lay his hands on. So long he could be given some more time, once he cultivated his power level up to the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, even if the Ma Family wanted to give him trouble, he would at least have some ability to defend himself.
宁神花加到第七瓣的时候，烧杯中的梦魇草汁液开始变得浑浊，林立知道宁神花的分量已经足够了，于是他又从口袋中摸出一枚恶魔之泪来。

When the seventh peacebloom petal was added, the nightmare seed succus in the beaker began to turn turbid. Lin Li knew that it was a sufficient dosage of the peacebloom, so he picked up a devil's tears from his pocket.
安东尼－罗林犹豫了许久，终于将一只手伸进了上衣口袋。
Anthony Rolin hesitated for long before he finally put a hand into his pocket.
安东尼－罗林鼻血都快被气出来了，他怎么也没有想到，自己最担心的几个大家族没出手，倒是把这疯女人给惹出来了，他更没想到的是，这疯女人下手居然这么狠，都已经把价格抬到十四万了还不肯松口，再这么继续抬下去，自己恐怕真要顶不住了。

Anthony Rolin was about to bleed from his nose out of anger. He had not expected that rather than the big families he was most worried about, he would have roused this mad woman instead. What was more surprising to him was that this mad woman could be so merciless; she had raised the price to 140,000 and was refusing to let up. If this continued, he was afraid he wouldn't be able to hold out for long.
安度因也知道，水晶球里这小子，不是一般的魔法师，他是一个天生的变态，一个精神力超级畸形的变态。
Andoine knew too that the kid in the crystal ball was not an ordinary mage. He was a born psychopath, a psychopath with a super-deformity of the mind.
安度因从口袋里掏出来的，是一枚天蓝色的水晶，看上去大约有拳头大小，当林立将它拿在手中的时候，只觉得一股清澈的凉意从水晶中散发出来，顺着掌心流遍全身，让人感觉一阵清凉舒爽。

Andoine had taken out a sky blue crystal from his pocket. It was as big as a fist, and when Lin Li held it in his hand, it felt like the crystal radiated a clear chill that flowed from his palm to his whole body, making him feel cool and refreshed.
安度因可以当它们是小痞子，林立可没那口气，八级魔兽可不是开玩笑的，就算是在这落日山脉当中，也绝对算得上是食物链中层的生物了。
Andoine could have seen them as little ruffians, but not Lin Li. Level-eight magical beast was no joking matter. Even in the Sunset Mountains, it was definitely in the middle of the food chain.
安度因天赋之差，已到令人叹为观止的程度，连林立这样的药剂学专家面对他时，心里都有一种深深的挫败感，再加上他倔强的脾气，简直就成了一场灾难，想想吧，一个活了一百多岁，却连最基本公式都搞不清楚的倔老头，手上却偏偏掌握着高级药剂配方，动不动就是蛮牛之力这样的高难度尝试，这么多年来的实验事故都没把他炸死，不得不说是一个天大的奇迹……

Andoine's poor talent had reached such an astonishing level that even a pharmaceutics expert like Lin Li had developed a deep sense of hopelessness when faced with him. Moreover, his obstinacy was simply a disaster. Just think, a stubborn old man who had lived for over a hundred years couldn't even get the most basic of equations right, but in his hands he possessed the formulas for high-level potions, attempting highly difficult concoctions such as the Bull's Strength Potion as and when he liked. It was an absolute miracle that all those lab accidents over the years hadn't been able to kill him...
安度因狐疑的看了他一眼：“你这蠢货居然是费雷的试炼导师？”
Andoine looked at him in suspicion. "You idiot, you're actually Felic's trial teacher?"
安度因现在，哪有空理睬他们，他一双眼睛正死死盯着霍伦。
Andoine now had no time to pay attention to them. His eyes stared dead straight at Hoeren.
安度因离开之后不到一天，林立就收拾好了自己的行装，可到现在已经十几天过去了，这家伙却连落日山脉的东南西北都还没搞清楚。
Andoine was not to be blamed for his negligence. Who would have expected that a magic genius skilled in pharmaceutics could have such weak sense of direction?
安度因答得轻描淡写：“五级魔兽而已，没必要特别提醒。”
Andoine’s reply was simple. "It's just a level-five demon, there's no need for a special reminder."
安度因絮絮叨叨的交代似乎还在耳边，林立却不得不独自一人，在一片茂密的森林里艰难摸索着，一路摸索就一路在心里嘀咕：“老家伙有没有搞错，连假身份证都帮我准备了，怎么就忘了准备地图？”

With Andoine's long-winded instructions still ringing in his ears, Lin Li had to feel his way through the dense forest alone. As he fumbled along the way, he whined, “Did the old man make a mistake? He knew how to prepare a new identity for me but forgot to prepare a map?"
安度因脸上的神色，他实在是太熟悉不过了，当初巴瑟罗尔从加洛斯回来的时候，自己脸上露出的，就正是同样的神色，霍伦心里很清楚，这种程度的愤怒，只有亲人被伤害的时候才会出现，难道这个费雷跟安度因……

Andoine's expression was something he was extremely familiar with. Back then when Bathrilor had returned from Jarrosus, the expression on his face was exactly the same as the one now. Hoeren was very clear that this degree of anger only surfaced when one's family was injured. It couldn't be that Felic and Andoine were...
安度因这个老家伙，居然正拿着一瓶药剂，在向费雷请教！
Andoine, this old man, was actually holding a bottle of potion and learning from Felic!
安度因这老家伙，也是你可以惹的？
Was an old man like Andoine someone you could provoke?
完了完了……这回死定了。
It's over... We're done for.
完全恢复魔力的葛瑞安就够麻烦的了，如今又有一瓶唤醒药剂在手，这让老梅林还怎么打？
A fully-recovered Gerian was enough trouble; now that he had another Awakening Potion in his hands, how could Old Merlin fight him?
完全没有任何控制，也没有任何反控制。
There was no control at all, and no counter-control as well.
完成一百瓶清醒药剂之后，林立就一直在想，有没有办法延长它的持续时间。
After completing 100 bottles of Sobriety Potion, Lin Li had been wondering whether there was a way to prolong its effects.
宗师级铁匠完全是妖孽一般的存在，只是眨眼之间，一支点金棒就已大致完成，整个过程快得令人难以置信，一直到林立放下铁锤的时候，炼金台上都还是一片火花四溅的景象。

A blacksmith guru was totally a demonic existence. In the blink of an eye, a gold rod was almost completed. The whole process was incredibly fast; there were still sparks dancing on the forging platform by the time Lin Li put the hammer down.
实力最低都是铸鼎境二重，江豹江松等人赫然在列，如此多人就算他拥有铸鼎境四重的实力，怕是也很难安然无恙的走下西山。更别说他刚刚突破铸鼎境二重，丹田内的黑色元力只有六缕……

The weakest of the bunch had a power level at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, with others like Jiang Bao and Jiang Song at ever-increasingly impressive power levels. With so many people there and then, even if he did have a power level in the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, he would still have much difficulty leaving the Western Hills completely safe and sound. Not to mention that he had only just made a breakthrough in achieving the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, and that he only had six wisps of black essence force available within his dantian...
实在受不了这个只会“呜呜”乱叫的家伙，林立干脆由它领着到巨树下去看上一眼。
Lin Li couldn't stand this gorilla who only knew how to whine, so he followed its lead to the giant tree for a look.
实在是太粗暴了，一只接一只的椰子砸下，直压得林立连头都抬不起来。
It was just too rough. The coconuts smashed down one after another, such that Lin Li could not even hold his head up.
宴会大厅中静得惊人，除了那一声声闷响之外，竟再听不到一丝声音。
The banquet hall was alarmingly quiet. Other than the bursts of muffled explosions, there was no other sound at all.
宽敞的宴会大厅里，被十二盏吊顶水晶灯映得如同白昼，地上铺着厚厚的红地毯，在水晶灯光下更是显得异常华丽，林立走进大厅之中，只觉四周金碧辉煌，充满了奢华的气息，不时有年轻英俊的侍者托着酒盘在大厅中走过，美貌侍女如蝴蝶般翩然穿梭席间。

The spacious banquet hall was bright as day, illuminated by 12 crystal chandeliers. The floor was covered with a thick red carpet, and looked especially gorgeous under the crystal chandeliers. Lin Li entered the hall and felt as if the surroundings basked in magnificence and were filled with a luxurious aura. From time to time, handsome young waiters carrying trays of wine ambled through the hall, and beautiful waitress fluttered between the tables like butterflies.
富贵险中求！
Riches comes from danger, after all!
寒冬法杖被拿在手上，那种熟悉的魔法波动流遍林立全身，低沉而又冗长的咒文吟唱声在树林间响起，随着这玄奥难明的咒文吟唱，四周的空气仿佛在刹那之间降到了冰点，感受着这强大的魔法力量，伊娜停止了哭泣，只是怔怔的望着树下的林立，就连巨网中的利维坦猩猩，也仿佛忘记了怪笑，高阶魔兽与生俱来的天性告诉它，自己已经陷入了危险当中。

Holding the Winter Staff in his hand, Lin Li felt a familiar rush of magical wave all over his body. A low yet lengthy recitation of spell sounded among the trees. The surrounding air seemed to drop to freezing point in an instant with the abstruse and mysterious recitation. Ina stopped her crying and stared down blankly at Lin Li as she took in the powerful magical force. Even the Leviathan Gorilla, which was in the giant net, had forgotten its weird cackles. The inborn instinct of a high-level magical beast had told that it was in danger.
寒流所过之处，只见白茫茫的一片，在霜结术带起的严寒之下，范围所及的每一根藤条都被凝成了冰块。范围并不太广，大概只有十几米的地方，但这对林立来说，却已经足够了。

Wherever the cold current passed, a vast expanse of white could be seen. Under the frigid cold brought on by the Frost Spell, every rattan in the range was chilled to ice. The range wasn't wide, perhaps only a few dozen meters, but it was enough for Lin Li.
对于一个魔法师来说，大概再也没有比魔力更加珍贵的东西了。
For a mage, nothing was much more valuable than the mana.
对于柳长老，江逸并没有感情，不过人不是他杀的，却因他而死，他这几日时间很是不安和内疚。还半夜去了柳长老的坟墓前磕了几个头，洒了两杯黄酒。

Towards Elder Liu, Jiang Yi had no feelings at all. However, even though he did not directly murder the man, he had spent the past few days feeling uneasy and guilty. He had even gone to Elder Liu's grave in the middle of the night and kowtowed several times as well as poured two cups of yellow wine in front of the grave.
对于身家百万金币的林立来说，一件皮甲一把武器又算得了什么，简简单单几句话，就把这事情给定了下来。
A leather armor and a weapon were nothing to the millionaire Lin Li. With only a few words, the plan was settled.
对于这个封印他是熟悉得不能再熟了，自从达到铸鼎境一重能内视后，他最少内视了这个龙形封印几万遍，他清清楚楚记得这龙形封印一共由一万零八千枚符文组成，而此刻少了一枚……

He was very familiar was this seal. Ever since he'd reached the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm and could observe his inner conditions, he had observed this dragon-shaped seal for at least several tens of thousands of times. He remembered clearly that this dragon-shaped seal was made of a total of eighteen thousand runic patterns. At that moment, one of them was missing...
对于这件事，林立倒是一点也不着急。
For that, Lin Li had more than enough patience.
对于高级附魔师来说，稳定性永远排在第一位。
For a high-level magical enchanter, stability would always be the first priority.
对山洞里那只狮蝎，林立依旧耿耿于怀。
Lin Li was still brooding over the encounter with the Manticore in the cave.
对方吃痛，倒吸一口冷气，满脸惊愕，下意识的想缩回手掌，但江逸那容他这么轻松退走，右手立即化手刀为爪，运转“缠丝手”抓住他的手臂，身子也粘了上去，大喊一声：“双龙夺珠”左手两指如箭般朝对方双眼刺去！

His opponent endured his pain, taking in a mouthful of cold air. With a face filled with shock and horror, he instinctively tried to withdraw his palms—yet Jiang Yi would not let him retreat so easily. Creating another knife-hand strike pose with his right hand and using them like claws, he circulated his Silk Hands technique and grabbed his opponent's arm.
Pulling his entire body forward, he shouted, "Twin-Dragon Stealing Pearl!"
Two fingers stabbed forward towards his opponent's eyes like arrows.
对方注意力被江逸左手双指吸引，此刻内心暴怒，心思絮乱，哪料到江逸真正的杀招是膝盖？直到下身被猛然一顶，一股撕心裂肺的剧痛传来才幡然醒悟。

Jiang Yi’s opponent was distracted by the two fingers on Jiang Yi's left hand and had much intense fury in his heart and confusion in his mind. How could he have possibly predicted that the true killer move would actually come from Jiang Yi’s knees? It was only until his lower body was suddenly struck, and when he felt an intensely acute pain radiate through his body that he suddenly realized what had happened.
对方被他的大喊声吸引了注意力，没有再去理会江小奴，冷笑一声，手掌一荡，朝他双手扫来！
His opponent was indeed distracted by his loud shout and no longer had his attention on Xiao Nu. Instead, he scoffed coldly before swinging his palms in a sweeping movement towards Jiang Yi's hands!
对方铁拳破空而来，缺乏心理准备的江逸只顾着躲避，却没留神地面沟壑不平，于是在急退过程中一下踩空失去身形，待到回过神来时，对方的拳头已经近在眼前。

Jiang Bao’s iron fist flew through the air. Jiang Yi, unprepared to defend against such an attack, was focused entirely on avoiding the incoming attack. As a result, he was not attentive enough to see the uneven ditch in front of him and, in his haste to avoid the attack, he lost his balance stepping into the little hole in the ground and fell down. By the time he regained his senses, the fists of his opponent had already closed in on him.
对热心魔法师来说，林立就是一切罪恶的根源，只要除掉他，自己就能顺利的和伊娜在一起。
For the zealous mage, Lin Li was the root of all evil. As long as he got rid of him, he could be together with Ina.
对这三十瓶奥法药剂势在必得的梅林家族，甚至不惜处理了几处位于加洛斯城中心的房产，为的就是能在竞争中多一点筹码，毕竟葛瑞安那老家伙已经说了，这一次加洛斯魔法公会只认钱，谁出的价格最高，谁就最有机会，交情什么的，等把东西卖完了再谈！

The Merlin Family, who was determined to acquire these 30 bottles of Arcane Magic Potion, even disposed of several properties in the heart of Jarrosus City in order to gain more bargaining chips in the competition. After all, old Gerian had said that this time, the Guild of Magic would only recognize money. Whoever gave the highest price would have the best opportunity, and friendship or whatnot would have to wait after the items were sold!
对这两个贱人来说，分赃过程无疑是充满乐趣的。
To these jerks, the dividing process was undoubtedly filled with joy and pleasure.
对这么个惫赖家伙，林立还真不好把它怎么样。
Lin Li was rendered powerless facing a rascal like this.
对面站立的翊小姐可不管那么多，双腿一个箭步朝江逸冲来，两个拳头如暴风雨般砸来。

Young Mistress Yi, who was standing opposite him, did not care as much, as she rushed towards Jiang Yi with both her legs moving as fast as arrows and both her fists smashing forward with a momentum like a sudden thunderstorm.
对魔法元素的微妙控制，对魔力的精确分配，各种魔法的灵活运用，种种种种，让林立大开眼界之余，更是让他接触到了一个以前从未想象过的世界。

The subtle control of magical elements, the precise distribution of mana, and the flexible use of various kinds of magic spells, et cetera, et cetera, not only opened Lin Li's eyes, but also exposed him to a world he had never imagined before.
封印仅仅刚开始破解，江水决的修炼速度竟提升了两倍，尽管还是很慢很慢，但他已经看到了一缕曙光，一道希望之门……

Even though he had only just started breaking the seal, his refining speed with the Jiang Water Art had actually increased by two times. Even though it was still much too slow, he was now able to see a thread of light through a door of hope...
将东西塞到林立手上，伊娜已是羞得耳根通红，不等林立发问，这位长腿美女就象一只受惊的小白兔般逃回了冒险者公会。

After passing the item to Lin Li, Ina’s ears had turned red with embarrassment. Without waiting for Lin Li to respond, the long-legged beauty fled back into the Adventurers Guild like a frightened white rabbit.
将安眠水晶还给安度因之后，林立也隐隐有些心动：“这东西，是在什么地方找到的？”
After returning the Hypnotic Crystal to Andoine, Lin Li had a secret motive. "Where di you find this?"
将所有材料收进背包，林立正打算下线换号，用猎人来跟围观群众好好谈谈时，一阵尖锐的警报声却忽然响起。
After putting all the materials in his bag, Lin Li had planned to switch to his hunter account for a good talk with the onlookers when all of a sudden a sharp siren sounded.
将珍贵程度丝毫不比强能水晶逊色的唤醒药剂随手塞进葛瑞安手中也就罢了，这葛瑞安一瓶才刚刚喝完，人家马上又塞了一瓶过去，理由竟是“看你打得精彩”……珍贵无比的唤醒药水到了他嘴里，就好象塞过去的是一根胡萝卜一样……

It was enough to stuff the Awakening Potion which was no less precious than the Strong Energy Crystal into the hands of Gerian. But Gerian had just finished a bottle, and he immediately stuffed him another one based "on account of how exciting you fought"... The most precious Awakening Potion, when came out of his mouth, was like a carrot that was being stuffed into the hands...
小半个时辰之后，他安全抵达了武殿，在半路他运转了一丝元力在耳朵内，一路也都走小巷，确定没人跟踪他。

He reached the Martial Arts Hall safely in under an hour, with the help of the wisp of black essence force he transferred to his ears halfway; in addition, he had deliberately picked the small alleyways on his way here, to ensure there was no one tailing him.
小半个时辰后……
One short hour later…
小半个时辰后。
Nearly an hour later.
小半柱香时间之后，翊小姐气喘吁吁的停了下来，浑身大汗淋漓，本来就紧身的红色武士袍更是完全贴住她的玲珑娇躯上，将她完美的曲线展露得淋漓尽致。

After approximately three minutes, Young Mistress Yi stopped attacking as she panted breathlessly. With her body sweating profusely, the red-colored martial artist robes, already body-hugging to begin with, stuck even more to her delicate and exquisite figure, revealing her perfect bodily curves in vivid detail and brilliance.
小半瓶毁灭之龙血液倒进烧杯，刹时间便和星辰沙融合到了一起，若是看得仔细一些的话，甚至还能看见一道道细细的蓝丝在深红之间挣扎游动。
Half a vial of the dragon's blood was poured into the beaker. It instantly merged with the star sand. If looked at from up close, one could even see thin blue threads swimming in between the crimson.
小奴傻兮兮的，就算被人卖了还要给人数钱，江逸从小就聪颖，自然一琢磨就明白了。他长长的吐出一口气，脸色变得狰狞起来，咬牙切齿的沉吼道：“好，好你个风月楼，竟敢如此坑害小奴？迟早有一天，小爷会把你们风月楼全部砸得稀巴烂的……”

count his profit. Jiang Yi was intelligent and alert since young—as such he clearly understood the whole incident after mulling over it for just a short moment.
He released a long sigh and gave a malevolent look. Gritting his teeth, he swore in a low voice, "Alright, you're so great, people of Fengyue Brothel. How dare you try to trick and harm Xiaonu to that extent? One of these days, this master will destroy you and your building and turn you into shreds..."
小奴正在院子内洗衣物，听到脚步声回头一望，两个大眼睛立即笑成了月牙儿，起身朝江逸走来。
Xiaonu was washing laundry in the yard when she heard footsteps and turned her head. She beamed immediately, her large eyes forming lovely crescents as she smiled and got up to greet Jiang Yi.
小奴，全名叫江小奴。
Her full name was Jiang Xiaonu.
小小的一个缺口，在林立不断射出的风刃中，正变得越来越大。
The tiny hole grew in size as Lin Li continued to deliver the wind blades.
小心的将点金棒放进无尽风暴之戒，林立已开始憧憬起其他高级附魔来，一个低级抗魔属性就这么变态，那巨龙之力永恒智慧之流，还不得翻上天去？

Lin Li meticulously put away the gold rod into the Ring of Endless Storm and began to envision other high-level magical enchantment. A low-level magic resistance attribute could be this sick; then wouldn't the Dragon's Clout and Flow of Eternal Wisdom send people to heaven?
小梅林只觉得心在流血，他手上一共就八十几万金币，若是照鲁本这疯子的抬价速度，怕是只要两轮，自己就会被彻底踢出奥法药剂的竞争。

Little Merlin felt his heart bleeding. He only had 800,000 gold coins with him. If he went with that lunatic Reuben's increment speed, it would only take two rounds for him to be kicked out of the contest for the Arcane Magic Potion.
小江逸的武学悟性和身体资质居然一个在天，一个在地？这让当时江家所有人都大跌眼镜！
How could little Jiang Yi’s raw talent in martial arts and actual prowess be worlds apart? Everyone in the Jiang Clan was completely shocked.
少女目光在江逸等人身上扫过，有些不满的说道：“杨管事，怎么没有银牌陪练？全都是铜牌的？”

The teenage girl swept a glance across Jiang Yi and the other persons around. Somewhat disgruntled, she said, "Manager Yang, why are there no silver-token-grade sparring partners? Why are they all bronze-token-grade ones?"
就仿佛，这个谁也不知道姓名的人从来就没有出现在这天地间一般。
It was as if the nameless one had never stepped forth into this universe.
就凭着那半瓶双足飞龙的血液，谈话内容就被这家伙扯得离题万里，他甚至都没有主动提起那半瓶双足飞龙血液，只是随便提了提七级魔兽的强大，充满求知***的金发美女就很自然的接了上去，跟着一双天蓝色的大眼睛扑闪扑闪的，带着好奇的目光望着林立问，最后为什么要去接双足飞龙的血液。

The fellow had led the conversation completely out of point with that half bottle of Wyvern's blood. He did not even mention that half bottle of Wyvern's blood first, but only casually spoke of the strength of a level-seven magical beast. The blond beauty, full of curiosity, naturally picked up the topic. A pair of sky-blue eyes blinked inquisitively at Lin Li as she asked why he had collected the Wyvern's blood at the end.
就在两人说话的时候，又有三瓶奥法药剂成交，其中最低的价格也在三万以上，最高的甚至已经达到了六万金币。
As they spoke, three more bottles of Arcane Magic Potion were off the shelf. Among them, the lowest price was above 30,000, and the highest price had even reached 60,000 gold coins.
就在他心头转过这个念头的时候，达芙妮又出价了：“二十万金币！”
As he turned the idea in his mind, Daphne called out another bid once more. "200,000 gold coins!"
就在众人心思各异的时候，年轻首富却又说出句话来。
Everyone was in their own state of mind when the young rich man spoke again.
就在众人心思各异的时候，那无数火龙带起的滔天烈焰，也终于是慢慢的散尽。
Just as everyone was in their own thoughts, the monstrous flame brought on by the countless fire dragons dissipated at last.
就在利爪落下的瞬间，一记风刃撕开了空气，同时也撕开了狮蝎那柔软的腹部，狮蝎的惨叫声充满了绝望，那锋利的爪子只差一点点，就差那么一点点，就可以撕开眼前人类的身体，可就是这么一点点距离，却成了一道永远也无法跨越的鸿沟……

Just as the claws fell, a wave of wind blade tore the air apart. Then, it tore apart the soft abdomen of the Manticore as well. The cries of the Manticore were filled with despair, and the sharp claws were so close, so very close to tearing the body of the human in front of it apart. But it was this mere distance that had became a gap never to be crossed...

就在愿望许下的瞬间，天空中的彩虹也随之化做无数光亮，只见那星星点点的光亮从天空中缓缓落下，就仿佛一条七色丝带般将林立包裹在内，林立可以清晰的感受到，随着自己的每一次呼吸，都仿佛有无数光亮融入体内，当最后一丝光亮也被彻底吸收之时，脑海内却随之涌出无穷无尽的知识，有锻造学的，有炼金学的，有药剂学的，也有附魔和铭文的，甚至还包括了药物知识，矿物知识等等杂学，这些知识就仿佛与生俱来就拥有一般，刚一涌出，就与原有记忆融合到了一起，林立只需要信手拈来就能轻易运用。

The instant the wish was made, the rainbow transformed into numerous beams, scattering gradually from the sky like a seven-colored ribbon wrapping Lin Li up. Lin Li could vividly feel that with every breath he took, it was as if there were countless beams infused into his body. As the last beam was absorbed, limitless knowledge gushed from his brain. Forging, alchemy, pharmaceutics, magical enchantment and inscription, and even general knowledge in medicinal, mineral and other categories. These seemed to be with him from birth, integrated with the existing memories he had, and he had them at his fingertips.
就在所有人都为那三十瓶奥法药剂疯狂的时候，林立却一个人躲在药剂室里，一坐就是一上午的时间。
Just as everyone was going crazy over the thirty bottles of Arcane Magic Potion, Lin Li was hiding in the potion lab alone, sitting in for the whole morning.
就在所有人都以为，翡翠高塔的失败已成定局时，林立却有些无奈的摇了摇头：“看来真是把脑子给打坏了……”
Just when everyone thought that the defeat of the Emerald Tower was a foregone conclusion, Lin Li shook his head helplessly. "Looks like his brain was really damaged..."
就在林立回头之时，那暗红色的影子已是带起一股腥风，如狼似虎的扑了过来。
Just as Lin Li turned around, the dark-red shadow sprung on him along with a gush of foul wind like a horde of ferocious wolves.
就在林立大伤脑筋的时候，凯文却宣布了拍卖会的高潮来临。
While Lin Li was racking his brains, Kevin announced the climax of the auction.
就在林立耐心等待拍卖开始的时候，葛瑞安哎声叹气的回来了……
Just as Lin Li was patiently waiting for the auction to start, he saw Gerian return sighing in despair.
就在林立自己都以为，会被那巨大的旋涡所吞没时，一个熟悉的声音却从翡翠高塔内中传来：“马修斯，我看你真是越混越回去了。”
Just as Lin Li thought he would be swallowed by the giant vortex, a familiar voice rang from within the Emerald Tower. "Matthew, I see you're really getting out of it."
就在此刻，侧门外突然响起一道冷哼声，一道魁梧如巨人般的高大身影大步冲了进来，看到江逸的拳头已经贴近了江如虎的后背，立即大怒道：“小杂碎，敢伤我弟弟？你今日必死无疑。”

Right at this crucial moment was a cold voice from the side door. A gigantic and stalwart figure dashed in and saw Jiang Yi's fist approaching Jiang Ruhu's back, he shouted furiously, "You brat! How dare you hurt my younger brother? You shall die today for sure."
就在这个时候，楼下却传来了一阵敲门声。
Just then, there was a knock on the door downstairs.
就在这时，异变突生！
Just at that moment, an unexpected change suddenly happened!
就在这炼丹师将丹药准备丢进瓷瓶时，他浑浊的眸子突然射出两道精芒，脸色也变得郑重起来，眼睛瞪得大大的，再次仔细观看起丹药来。

Just when the alchemist was about to throw the pill back into the porcelain bottle, his cloudy eyes suddenly lit up with two bright sparks. His facial expressions also became more solemn. With his eyes opened widely, he once again carefully inspected the elixirs.
就在那一朵朵红莲即将炸开之时，葛瑞安手中法杖一横，也是一阵短暂而急促的吟唱，紧接着翡翠高塔大门外就陡的竖起了一片水蓝色的屏障，那一朵朵红莲落在水幕之上，竟象是石子落入水中一般，只是泛起了一圈圈的涟漪。

Just as the stalks of red lotus were about to erupt, Gerian held up the staff in his hand, which was followed by a likewise short and rapid recitation of the spell. Almost immediately a water-blue barrier was erected outside the gates of Emerald Tower. The stalks of red lotus fell into the water curtain like stones falling into the water asf ripples appeared on the surface.
就在黑色元力注入丹炉内的那一刻，整个丹炉传来一阵沉闷的炸响，丹炉剧烈摇晃起来，差点翻到在地。、
At the moment when the black essence force was injected into the cauldron, the entire cauldron released a muffled explosion sound as it shook violently, almost overturning and falling to the ground.
就好象如今的老格林与安度因，大家同样是传奇魔法师，但如果真正打一场的话，老格林却是连一点信心都没有，他毕竟花了太多时间在药剂学上，而安度因虽然也同样沉迷，但他花在魔法技巧上的时间，却远远胜过自己。

It was like Old Grimm and Andoine at present; they were both legendary mages, but if they were to battle it out, Old Grimm had no confidence at all. After all, he had spent too much time on pharmaceutics. Though Andoine was equally immersed in it, he spent far more time on magic skills compared to Grimm.
就如同大多数野钢花的生长地点一样，洞**阴暗而潮湿，四周的石壁滑得有些腻人，用手摸上去感觉就象在摸一条巨大的蟒蛇，前方一片漆黑，没有一丝光亮透出，林立不得不点起一支火把，凭借着这唯一的光亮往深处摸索着。

As in most places where the wild steelbloom grew, the cave entrance was dark and damp, the surrounding stone walls so slippery it almost felt like touching a giant python. There was no light in the darkness ahead. Lin Li had no choice but to light a torch and explore the depths of the cave with that single source of light.
就如同眼前的两位大魔导士对决，同为加洛斯城最强大的魔法师，同样是耗尽了最后一丝魔力，甚至老梅林的情况还要比葛瑞安严重一些，他甚至连站都快站不稳了，可在这要命的时候，他却偏偏拿出了一枚强能水晶……

For example the battle between two archmages right before their eyes. Being the most powerful mages of Jarrosus City, and having exhausted the last of their mana, with Old Merlin's condition worse than Gerian's as he could not even steady himself, it seemed to be over. But right at this crucial point, Old Merlin had taken out the Strong Energy Crystal...
就如麦格雷尼所料一般，任务进行得相当顺利。
As McGrenn had expected, the quest went smoothly.
就看见双足飞龙俯冲而下，飞溅的酸液洒在树丛当中，刹时间一片青烟直冒，紧接着就是一阵“滋滋滋”的声响此起彼伏，还没等那青烟散尽，郁郁葱葱的树木已是一片枝黄叶落的景象。

He saw the Wyvern took a dive, splashing acid on the bushes. In an instant, a cloud of green smoke emerged, and a burst of fizzing sounds followed. Before the green smoke could disperse, the scene of lush green trees was transformed into one of fallen branches and yellow leaves.
就算偶尔有那么一两个法术，侥幸穿过巨网拦截，射到了利维坦猩猩身上，也很难造成什么实质性的伤害。
Even if there were one or two spells that had gotten through the giant web and hit the Leviathan Gorilla, it was difficult to do any real damage to it.
就算是强大的八级魔兽，在这可怕的风刃群面前，也是有些招架不住，一记两记还可以靠着坚韧的皮肤硬抗，可当空中飞舞的风刃达到数十枚之多，量变引起的质变时，利维坦猩猩那坚韧的皮肤就成了一个笑话。

Even a powerful level-eight magical beast could not withstand the terrifying cluster of wind blades. It could rely on its tough skin to resist a couple of shots, but with dozens of wind blades flying in the air, the quantitative change had led to a qualitative change, and in this case, the Leviathan Gorilla's tough skin had became a joke.
就算是药剂大师林立，在面对这么多草药时，也是忍不住一阵头疼。
Even Lin Li, a potion master, could not help but have a headache when faced with so many herbs.
就算林立眼睛再瞎，此时恐怕也已经看明白了，这就是安度因曾经提到过的，五级魔兽狮蝎！
Even if Lin Li was blind, at this moment, it would still have been clear to him as day. It was the Manticore, a level-five demonic beast that Andoine had mentioned!
就算自己不打断马迪亚斯的四肢，他同样可以找其他借口帮儿子报仇，说到底……这里是奥兰纳魔法公会，是奥德文的势力范围，会长大人的儿子想找自己麻烦，实在有太多太多的办法，躲是躲不过去的。

Even if he had not broken Mathias' arms and legs, he could have similarly found other excuses to help his son take revenge. In the end, this was Alanna Guild of Magic, Odwin's sphere of influence. If the President's son wanted to ask for trouble, there were simply too many ways. He couldn't hide even if he wanted to.
就算这个黄昏诅咒有假，但一旦涉及到了细微之处，却绝骗不过真正的内行，这个年轻法师所说的一些东西，跟当初指点自己的那位药剂师所说一般无二，甚至在某些地方，还比药剂师讲得更加详细，更加清晰名了。

Even if the Twilight Curse was fake, when it came to the details, he would never deceive a real expert. Some of the things mentioned by this young mage were no different from those mentioned by the pharmacist who had instructed her. It was even more detailed and clearly explained than the pharmacist at some points.
就这么把它放了，林立自然是不甘心的，可顺手杀掉，却又好想有点没意思，想来想去竟弄得林立有些头大，恼火之下怒气自然又撒到了利维坦猩猩头上，这一次也不用什么风刃了，只见这家伙随手扯了一根藤条就开抽，一边抽还一边骂：“让你绑票勒索！让你拿椰子砸老子！让你朝着老子怪笑……对了，刚才老子骂倒哪了？算了，重新骂过……让你绑架勒索……”
