Lin Li was naturally unwilling to let it off this easily. But it'd be meaningless to kill it as well. Lin Li racked his brains over and over, and felt as if his head was about to explode. The anger that stemmed from his frustration was instinctively released on the gorilla, and this time the guy did it without the wind blade. He pulled out a cane and began lashing, cursing as he did it. "This one's for the kidnapping and blackmailing! This one's for smashing me with the coconut! This one's for the queer laughter directed at me! Right... Where was I? Forget it, let's start all over... This one's for the kidnapping and blackmailing...
就这么走了十几分钟，街道上才渐渐热闹起来。
After walking for over ten minutes, the streets gradually became more lively.
就连宗师药剂师的配方里，也找不到短暂神格药剂的存在，也许神匠级别还有些机会……
Even in the formulas of pharmacist gurus no traces of the Ephemeral Divinity Potion could be found. Perhaps only someone at the level of a Divine Smith would have it...
就连林立自己，也不由有些惊讶。这股魔法抗性的强大，完全超过了他的估计，通常情况下，要达到如此强大的效果，至少也需要萃取一枚十五级魔晶精华。

Even Lin Li felt surprised at it. The power of this magic resistance was totally beyond his estimation. Usually, at least a level-fifteen magical crystal essence was needed in order to achieve such a powerful effect.
尸兽们也进攻了，或爬或飞或扑，如蝗虫般密密麻麻朝天庭汹涌而去，疯狂地要摧毁一切，吞噬一切！
The zombie-beasts attacked—they crawled, flew, or pounced like countless locusts surging forward. They wildly swallowed and destroyed everything in their path!
尽管一夜没睡，但江逸还是精神奕奕，花费了半个时辰他将整本《药草简录》全都背了下来，还对着里面的画像，把药房内的草药都辨认了一遍。

Even though he had not slept for an entire night, Jiang Yi was still full of energy. He spent an hour memorizing all the information in the "Record on Medicinal Herbs," even identifying the medicinal herbs in the medicine room using the images depicted in the book.
尽管不知道怎么赔？拿什么赔，江逸还是咬牙问道：“怎么个赔法？”
Even though he had no idea how to repay, or even what to pay with, Jiang Yi nonetheless gritted his teeth and asked, "How do you want me to pay it back?"
尽管从某种意义上说他也顶着一个旁系少爷的名头，但他的实际地位并不比最普通的底层子弟高上多少。尤其是最近几年，因为有名无实的少爷身份，他经常被族内纨绔各种欺辱，每次都受轻重不一的伤。比如这次吧，他就被打得昏迷了整整一个上午。

if one were to judge solely by his descent, he would be ranked foremost among the branch members. But despite this title, his actual position in the Jiang Clan was not much higher than that of the lowest ranking members of the family.
This had rung especially true in the past few years. For him, being “a young master of the Jiang Clan” in name only ensured that he was constantly bullied by other, higher-ranking members of the family. Such torment left him with severe injuries—in this case, for one, he was beaten up so badly that he had spent the entire morning unconscious.
尽管他已是五系宗师，尽管他已经达到了职业的顶峰，但林立心里很清楚，在这顶峰之上，还有虚无缥缈的神匠领域。
Although he was already a guru of all five series and had already reached the peak of his profession, Lin Li knew very well that there was still the illusory Divine Smith beyond this peak.
尽管他知道姬听雨找他并不是看上他了，尽管马黑旗和柳河也知道姬听雨不会看上他，但他还是感觉事情有些棘手了，红颜祸水！漂亮的女人一些无心之举很容易让爱慕他的男子做出一些冲动的事情。

Despite knowing that Ji Tingyu's order was by no means out of adoration towards him, and that both Ma Heiqi and Liu He were well aware that she would never fancy him, Jiang Yi nevertheless foresaw trouble. What a femme fatale! The actions of a beautiful woman, however unintentional, would easily send the men who adored her into doing reckless, foolhardy things.
尽管先前已经做好了心理准备，可看到那水晶球散发出的光芒时，凯文还是有些无奈的叹了口气，这实在是太变态了，一个还不满二十岁的年轻人，却拥有了九级颠峰的魔法等级，只需要再往前踏出一步，他就可以达到所有魔法师梦寐以求的魔导士境界！

Even though he was prepared, Kevin sighed a little helplessly when he saw the light from the crystal ball. This was too freaky. 尽管内心暴怒不已，但江逸还是强迫自己语气尽量心平气和些：“这位公子，那日我已经和这位管事说好了，现在你们钱也收了，风月楼如此大一家青楼总不会言而无信吧？这传出去可是有损声誉的。”

Despite fuming internally, Jiang Yi forced himself to keep an even tone, "Young Sir, the housekeeper and I had already made a deal on that day. You have your money now. 尽管武殿的事情已经确定了，但江逸生性稳重，十两紫金没到手，没赎回令牌他依旧没和江小奴透露在武殿内的具体情况。只是告诉小奴他现在在武殿内做事，让她不要担心，也不要出去做工。

Even though Jiang Yi had confirmed his employment matters with the Martial Arts Hall, he had a steady natural disposition. Without the ten taels of purple gold in his hands and not having redeemed the command token back, he once again did not reveal to Jiang Xiaonu the details of the experiences he faced in the Martial Arts Hall. He only told Xiaonu that, since he was now working for the Martial Arts Hall, she had nothing to worry about, and also instructed her not to head out of the house for any kind of work.
尽管江逸以最快速度反应过来，扭转身子朝旁边躲避，同时架起“摔碑手”朝对方手掌推去，企图抵消一些力道。但让他无奈的是，那人的手掌只是被阻拦了一下就摧古拉朽的将他双手荡开，重重的拍在他的胸口上。

Jiang Yi reacted as quickly as possible by dodging to the side and struck out with his Wrestling Hand towards his opponent's palm in an attempt to offset some of the force. But what left Jiang Yi resigned was that the guard's palm had only been obstructed for a moment before he easily brushed away his strike, and smacked his palm heavily onto Jiang Yi’s chest.
尽管演武殿内的子弟天资都不算顶级，但身份地位任何一位都比江逸高。尤其是两名长得和江恨水有些像，同样英俊无比的子弟，这两人其中一人是江恨水的亲弟弟江顾水，另外一人则是刑堂副长老江云石的儿子江如狼。

Even though the descendants that were within the Martial Arts Demonstration Hall weren't of elite level, all of their status were superior than Jiang Yi's. Especially the two individuals who resembled Jiang Henshui's dashing facial features. One of them was Jiang Henshui's younger blood brother—Jiang Gushui. The other was Jiang Rulang, the son of Disciplinary Court's Deputy Elder—Jiang Yunshi.
尽管相差一个级别，但江顾水还是一个照面就被江逸踢飞出去，好在江逸似乎没有动用全力，否则他两条腿怕是要被伤了。

Even with the difference in cultivation of one stage, Jiang Gushui still got sent flying by the kicks of Jiang Yi. Luckily Jiang Yi didn't exert his full force, if not both his legs would have been injured too.
尽管老梅林在开口之前，就已经做好了心理准备，可此时听见葛瑞安的话，还是不禁有吐血的冲动，这老胖子到底知不知道什么叫要脸？
Old Merlin had been mentally prepared before he had opened his mouth, but now that he had heard what Gerian said, he had had the urge to cough up blood. Did this old fatty know what was shame?
尽管走起路来还是一瘸一拐的，不过明显没有昨日那般疼痛了，江逸的心情也因此变好了不少。
Even though he was still limping, Jiang Yi was clearly not in as much agony as he was in yesterday, and this certainly improved his mood by much.
尽管跟安度因交情深厚，但格林还是对这段怀持着怀疑态度。
Despite his friendship with Andoine, Grimm was still skeptical about it.
尽管这翊小姐拳头内没有元力灌注，但里面的力道却是十足，江逸此刻更加确定此人绝对是铸鼎境四重，多年来元力的温养滋润让她肉体的力量达到一马之力以上，攻击速度也快得可比铸鼎境二重武者，他没有元力那下场绝对很惨。

Even though this Young Mistress Yi did not inject any essence force into her fists, the strength in her fist attacks was very powerful. It was at that moment that Jiang Yi received even more confirmation that that person indeed had a power level up to the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
Many years of using essence force allowed the strength of her physical body to reach up to one horsepower or more; her combat speed was also much faster than any martial artist with at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Without any essence force, his end condition would definitely be tragic.
尽管这速度比起家族的优秀子弟还相差甚远，他原先修炼一个月才能比人家一天，修炼速度比江家优秀子弟整整相差三十倍。但他坚信只要他不断的破解封印上的符文，他的修炼速度迟早会追上家族大部分子弟，甚至……远远超过。

Even though this speed was much slower compared to that of the outstanding members of the family clan, the amount he could originally refine in a month was equivalent to the amount others could produce in a day.
This meant his essence force refining speed was an entire thirty times slower than that of the outstanding members of the Jiang Clan. He steadfastly believed that, so long as he continuously removed more runic patterns from his seal, his refining speed would sooner or later catch up with the average clan members. Eventually he would... far surpass them.
屋子里收拾得很干净也很整洁，但家具却稍稍显得有些简陋，盖在麦格雷尼身上的毛毯甚至还打着几个补丁。
The room was clean and tidy, though the furniture was slightly shabby, and even the blankets that had been draped over McGrenn had several patches.
山洞并不太深，只是用火把一照，整个山洞便一览无遗，四周石壁也是异常干爽，地面上甚至还能找到篝火的痕迹，想来在这山洞中过夜的，并不仅仅是罗麦格雷尼人。

The cave was not too deep. It took just a torch to illuminate the whole of it. The stone walls were exceptionally dry, and traces of bonfire could be found on the ground. It seemed that it was not just McGrenn who’d ever wanted to spend the night in this cave.
左肩膀传来的一丝隐痛，让沉思中的江逸清醒过来，他只能强迫自己暂时不去多想，还是先将伤口疗养好了再说。

The slight sensation of pain coming from his left shoulder jolted Jiang Yi, who was deep in thought, back to his senses. He could only force himself not to think too much for the moment and focus on getting his injury healed first.
左边冲来的是一名铸鼎境三重的子弟，他万万没想到，江逸不从其余两名铸鼎境二重武者那边突围，竟主动朝他冲来？联想到刚才江如鹰被他一拳轰飞，他内心有些打鼓，下意识的脚步一顿。

The descendant rushing from the left had a power level in the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. He absolutely failed to consider how, rather than trying to break through their attacks through the other two martial artists with power levels in the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, Jiang Yi actually rushed towards him directly instead. Connecting the dots and remembering how Jiang Ruying was sent flying with one of Jiang Yi's punches, his heart started throbbing somewhat strongly and rapidly. He made the decision in his mind to stop himself in his tracks.
巨下下堆满了厚厚的一层落叶，只是比起密林中那些已经腐败的落叶来，这里的落叶显得异常干爽，其中一些甚至还带着一抹绿色，很明显是刚被人从树上扯下来的。

A thick layer of leaves lay under the giant tree, and unlike the rotten leaves in the dense forest, the leaves here were unusually dry and crisp. Some even carried a tinge of green—apparently someone had just plucked them from the tree.
巨大的旋涡疯狂旋转，精神冲击更是一浪高过一浪。
The giant vortex spun insanely, and the waves of mental strikes were each one wave higher than another.
巨大的骸骨巨人大步朝天庭内踏去，它们那庞大如小山般的身躯，每奔走一步都能踏出虚空震波，荡出一道道涟漪，传出一阵阵沉闷如击打战鼓的响声。

The skeleton giants took wide steps toward the Heavenly Court, their massive bodies as huge as a hill. Ripples vibrated across the vast expanse with every step they took, transmitting deep sounds akin to that of war drums.
巴瑟罗尔出身显赫背景深厚，以艾萨克城主之尊都不得不有些忌惮，若是真让他死在自己的宴会上，艾萨克就真是不敢想象会有什么样的后果。

Bathrilor was born into an illustrious family and even Isaac, with his status as a Castellan, had to fear it. If Bathrilor really died at his banquet, Isaac couldn't even imagine what the consequences would be.
巴瑟罗尔刚刚摆脱精神压制，却又忽然感觉到手上一麻。
Bathrilor had just been released from the mental suppression when he suddenly a tingle in his hand.
巴瑟罗尔双手鲜血直流，目光冲却充满了恐惧与绝望，他从来也没有想过，自己有一天竟会死在加洛斯这样的小地方，他更没想过，眼前这个穿得异常落魄的年轻魔法师，竟是如此的可怕，完全不给自己一丝反悔的机会，一动手就有了致自己于死地的打算……

Bathrilor's hands were bleeding profusely but his eyes were filled with fear and despair. He had never expected he'd die in a small place like Jarrosus. He did not even expect the abject-looking young mage to be so terrifying, not giving him a chance to repent at all and intending to kill him once he started his attacks.
巴瑟罗尔右手猛的一抬，镶嵌在戒指上的红宝石隐隐红光闪动。
Bathrilor raised his right hand forcefully and the ruby inlaid on the ring gleamed with red light.
巴瑟罗尔完全无法理解，这人究竟是怎么活过来的，可惜已经没时间给他思考了，林立右手一抬，一发风刃已是从他手上斜斜掠过，只听“嗤啦”一声轻响，巴瑟罗尔顿时只觉手上一麻。

Bathrilor could not understand at all how this person came to still be alive. Unfortunately, there wasn't time for him to ponder. Lin Li lifted his right hand and the wind blade raked over his hand. A "tchh" sound was heard and Bathrilor felt his hand tingle at once.
巴瑟罗尔的惨叫声在宴会大厅中久久回荡，那声音听上去就仿佛一头受伤的野兽，充满了暴戾与绝望。
Bathrilor's shrieks echoed in the banquet hall for a long time. The voice sounded like a wounded beast, full of violence and despair.
希恩那张黝黑的脸上，却是露出了几分茫然：“我也不知道那是什么地方，是一位魔法师先生带我过去的……”
A hint of bewilderment came across Sheehan's tanned face, "I have no idea where that place is. A mage brought me there..."
干完这一切之后，林立又一次打开了无尽风暴之戒。
After Lin Li was done, he opened up the Ring of Endless Storm once again.
干完这一切之后，林立手上忽然多出了一只烧杯来，不管是伊娜还是红发美女，都没看清楚那烧杯究竟是怎么来的，整个过程就好象是变戏法一般。

After finishing up all these, a beaker suddenly appeared in Lin Li's hand. Neither Ina nor the redheaded beauty could tell exactly how the beaker came to be there; the whole process seemed like a magic trick.
干完这一切，又从口袋里掏出了深邃之银项链。
After he was done with all these, he took out the deep silver necklace from his pockets.
干完这一切，林立终于是可以睡个好觉了。
Lin Li could finally get a good sleep after finishing up all these.
年纪和江逸差不多，体型却比江逸胖上几圈的江如虎一怔，面色尴尬起来，他很清楚柳长老的脾气，他要是敢私自去拿丹药，柳长老发飙了，他父亲都顶不住的……

At a similar age as Jiang Yi, yet with a figure several times fatter than Jiang Yi, Jiang Ruhu was instantly stumped and his face gave a look of awkwardness. He was very aware of Elder Liu's temper. If he dared to retrieve the elixirs by himself, Elder Liu would surely fly into a great rage. Even his father couldn't protect him from Elder Liu's anger...
年轻族长吩咐了两句，身旁的随从很快拿来了一套装备。
The young patriarch gave a quick order and his attendants quickly brought in a set of equipment.
年轻的英俊公子感受到江逸复杂的目光，在江逸脸上扫了两遍，他有些迟疑的问道：“你是……江逸？”
The young suave man felt Jiang Yi's complicated stare. Sweeping a glance across Jiang Yi's face, he hesitatingly asked, "You're... Jiang Yi?"
幸亏……
Luckily...
幸亏怒焰之袍附上了抗魔属性，否则那一两道火龙虽不足以致命，却也有很大可能让他受到伤害。
Luckily, he had enchanted the Robe of Wrath with the magical resistance attribute. Otherwise, even though the one or two fire dragons would not be fatal, they were also likely to injure him.
幻影拳！
"Phantom Punch!"
幻觉！这一定是幻觉！麦德林拼命的揉着眼睛，最后却不得不悲哀的承认，这一切都是真的……
A hallucination! This must be a hallucination! Medellin desperately rubbed this eyes, but in the end confessed with grief that this was all real...
序章
Chapter 0: Prologue
序章 天帝崩 神兵裂！
Chapter 0: Prologue - Fall of the Celestial Thearch. Shattering of the Divine Armament!
店老板是一个胖胖的中年人，一看紫金一张脸立即笑得谄媚起来，一边笑着一边伸手朝柜台上的金叶子抓来：“嘿嘿……这位客官，一枚灵神丹十两银子，总计一两紫金。”

The store owner was a chubby middle-aged man. Upon seeing the purple gold, his face immediately lit up with a wide smile and a charming expression.
As he smiled, he reached his hand out and tried to grab the gold leaf on the counter-top. "Hehe... my dear customer, a Spirit Pill costs ten taels of silver. The total cost of your order is a tael of purple gold."
废丹药效不明，万一服用出了问题，那可就是一名炼丹师一辈子的污点。
If the efficacy of an useless elixir was questionable and should problems surface after consumption, it would become a stain forever tarnishing an alchemist's reputation.
废丹，顾名思义那就是炼废的丹药。
Useless elixir - as the name implies, they were elixirs that were refined and deemed to not be suitable for use.
开玩笑！
What a joke!
强化元素属性效果太过单一，魔法驱散效果也只是一定几率，经过一番权衡之后，林立最后还是选择了深渊秘银，比起强化元素属性来，魔法抗性的运用范围更加宽广，而且每次都能够附上，不象魔法驱散效果一样全靠运气。

The effect of strengthening element attributes was too singular, and the magic dispelling effect could only activate with a certain probability. After weighing the gains and losses, Lin Li chose the abyss mithril at last. Compared with strengthening of the element attributes, the application scope of magical resistance was much wider and could work every time unlike the magic dispelling effect which could only depend on luck.
强大而又神秘的魔法师，谈吐幽默风趣，却偏又知识渊博，对于怀春少女来说，简直就是杀器中的杀器。
A mage who was powerful yet mysterious, humorous and witty yet possessed extensive knowledge, was a total lady-killer in front of a young girl who was just beginning to think of love.
强忍着内心的暴怒和左胸撕裂般的痛楚，江逸大喊一声欲吸引对方的注意力，同时双手如两根海藤般朝对方的手掌缠去。

Holding back the violent rage in his heart and the searing agony he felt ripping through his left chest, Jiang Yi shouted aloud to draw his opponent's attention while using both his hands to entangle his opponent's hands like two sea vines.
强忍着内心的贪念，江逸老老实实的取了一枚最低级的元力丹，还有三枚最低级疗伤用的黄参丹就匆匆离开炼丹房，朝荣管事所在的管事房走去。

Resisting with great difficulty the greediness in his heart, Jiang Yi with great humility retrieved a Essence Force Elixir, the lowest-quality pill, as well as three pills of Yellow Ginseng Elixir, the pill with the lowest medicinal healing power, before hastily leaving the alchemy lab and walked in the direction of the Housekeeping Chamber where Chief Rong was located.
强能水晶可遇而不可求，以梅林家族的权势财富，这么多年下来也只不过找到了一枚，可到了魔法公会倒好，看看这个叫费雷的年轻法师都干了些什么……

The Strong Energy Crystal was hard to come by. Even with the power and wealth of the Merlin Family, only one had been found for so many years. But when it came to the Guild of Magic, just look at what this young mage Felic had done...
当下他什么也不顾了，立即盘坐打坐运转无名功法提炼黑色元力。这黑色元力消耗太快太快了，关键的时候总是不够用。这次他准备多存点，一次提炼四五个时辰，不睡觉直接修炼到天亮，尽可能的提炼多一些，好明早一次性把伤势彻底恢复。

At the moment he did not care about anything else, and immediately sat cross-legged to meditate and circulate the nameless cultivation technique to extract more black essence force. The consumption of this black essence force was way too fast, and there was never enough to use during critical moments.
This time he prepared to store extra—by not sleeping and instead extracting for eight to ten hours until the sky turned bright. He aimed to extract as much as possible so that he could once and for all get his wounds fully recovered the next morning.
当下他全力朝江逸攻击，拳拳用尽全力，眼中都是凶光，显然不把江逸揍趴下绝不罢休。

Yi Longyu's attacks were now at full throttle, each fist thrown held his full power and there was a nasty look in his eyes. It was obvious that he would not rest until he had Jiang Yi beaten into the ground.
当下他立即变招，拳头在空中一幻，化作三道拳影朝马飞砸去。
Jiang Yi promptly changed his technique, transforming his fist into three fist silhouettes which flew at Ma Fei.
当他刚将元力朝脑袋输送上去时，准备玩个新花样，那股融合元力从左眼角的攒竹穴经过时，他的左眼突然黑光一闪，他下意识的眨下眼睛，突然发现整个世界都变样了！

just when he wanted to transfer the essence force to his head, the merged essence force passed through the Zanzhu acupuncture point at the corner of his left eye. Suddenly, a black light flashed across his left eye. When he subconsciously blinked his eyes, he discovered the entire world in front of him had changed completely!
当他睁开眼的时候，小奴正在做饭，她那背对着他正在洗菜的身子看上去好生瘦弱。
When he opened his eyes, he saw Xiaonu preparing a meal. Her back was facing him as she washed some vegetables, and he could not help but notice her skinny, delicate figure.
当价值不下百万的矿石敲成废铁之后，那悦耳的系统提示音终于传来：“恭喜您晋阶锻造大师！”

After the million gold coins’ worth of minerals was hammered into scraps, the system prompt tone that was ever so pleasing to the ears rang out. "Congratulations! You have advanced to the Master of Forging!"
当初他可绝没有想到，自己有一天真能弄到深邃之银。
He had never imagined that he could get the deep silver one day.
当初在木屋里住着的时候，安度因就曾经给他介绍过落日山脉上的各种魔兽，提到七级魔兽双足飞龙时，安度因很欢乐的说了一句：“双足飞龙的血液用来做狂暴药剂不错。”

Andoine had introduced all kinds of magical beasts in the Sunset Mountains back when he was living in his log cabin. At the mention of the Wyvern, Andoine had added gleefully, "The Wyvern's blood makes a good Rampage Potion."
当初林立研究草药知识的时候，也顺便看过一些诅咒的资料，其中就有黄昏诅咒。
Lin Li had taken a look at some of the curses when he was studying herb knowledge, and among them was the Twilight Curse.
当天下午，林立扫荡了二十几间药草商店，当他雇马车将草药带回翡翠高塔的时候，葛瑞安激动得眼泪都流出来了。
That afternoon, Lin Li raided over 20 herb stores. When he had hired a horse wagon to bring the herbs back to the Emerald Tower, Gerian almost cried in excitement.
当天蓝色的强能水晶被拿出来的时侯，葛瑞安的脸色一下就变了，原本就有些苍白的胖脸，此时更是一片可怕的青白之色，那是一种近乎绝望的表情，无论是谁面对这种情况，恐怕心中也只有深深的绝望。

Gerian's expression changed when the sky-blue crystal was taken out. His pale chubby face had turned to a terrible color of bluish-white. It was an expression of nearly despair. It did not matter who, there would only be profound anguish for anyone in this situation.
当战斗进入高潮之时，林立甚至忘记了自己的存在，他完全投入了这场魔法碰撞当中，每一丝心神都随着战况跌宕起伏，每一根神经都随着魔法元素而剧烈颤动。

When the battle had reached its climax, Lin Li had even forgotten his existence. He had totally immersed himself in the magical collision. His heart and soul all fluctuated with the battle, and his nerves trembled with the magical elements.
当拍卖进行到这个时候，六大地下势力八大魔法家族这些人，都已经失去了竞争的机会，无论是财富还是权势，他们都跟三大魔法家族相去甚远。其实就算有机会，他们也不敢凑上前去，在整个加洛斯城里，除了魔法公会之外，还有谁敢正面挑衅这三个庞然大物？

By this point of time, the six underground forces and the eight mage families had lost all the chance to contend in the auction. Their wealth and power were a far cry from the three big mage families’. In fact, even if they had had the chance, they would not have dared to step forward. In the entire Jarrosus City, who would dare to challenge the three giants head on besides the Guild of Magic?
当时伊娜整个人都吓傻了……
Ina was scared stiff at the time...
当时麦格雷尼很高兴，在地图上标下城堡的位置之后，就打算回加洛斯城。
McGrenn was overjoyed at the time, and after marking the location of the castle on the map, he planned to return to Jarrosus City.
当林立说他“正尝试提高清醒药剂浓度”的时候，老格林其实是很想劝劝他的，同样的尝试，药剂师公会一样做过，可至今都还没人取得什么成果。

When Lin Li said that he was "trying to increase the concentration of the Sobriety Potion", Old Grimm had wanted to talk him out of it. The same attempt had been made by the Pharmacists Guild, but no one had achieved anything so far.
当江逸发泄完最后一腿时，江豹惨叫连连地朝远处滚了足足一丈远才停下。后者强忍着左手和身上的痛楚，手忙脚乱呲牙咧嘴地爬起来，一边喊：“江逸，你给我等着！”一边拔腿朝山下逃。

After Jiang Yi vented with his final kick, Jiang Bao cried out in agony as he rolled a full ten feet away before stopping. He bit his lips to suppress the searing pain and scrambled to his feet.
"Jiang Yi, just you wait!" Jiang Bao shouted as he ran down the mountain.
当然——这个东西，只是一个传说。
Granted—this thing was just a legend.
当然以林立的性格，就算是被逼做好事，也一定会先保证自己不吃亏。
Granted, given Lin Li's character, he would have made sure not to suffer any loss when he was compelled to perform a good deed...
当然相应的，宗师与大师相比，也是一个天上一个地下。
Of course, the difference between a guru and a master was leaps and bounds apart.
当然这种话也只有安度因敢说，对于一般冒险者来说，七级魔兽绝对拥有瞬间将三个活人变成死人的能力。
Of course, only Andoine would dare to say such things. For an ordinary adventurer, a level-seven magical beast would definitely have the power to turn three living people into deadmen in a flash.
当然，严格说起来，其中一种是比较无聊的，用火焰净化诅咒者的骸骨，以破除诅咒的力量来源。
Of course, strictly speaking, one of the ways was slightly boring—using a flame to purify the bones of the cursed person in order to break the power source of the curse.
当然，严格说起来，这还真算不上什么出卖，被葛瑞安赶走之后，他们就已经跟魔法公会脱离了关系，把秘密卖给阴影之巢，顶多也只能算是报复魔法公会。

Granted—strictly speaking, this would indeed not be considered a betrayal. After being kicked out by Gerian, they had no more connections with the Guild of Magic. Selling the secrets to the Shadow's Nest would only count as revenge on the Guild of Magic at most.
当然，以他的性格，自然不会象马森一样，冒冒失失的跑去问人来历。
Of course, his personality would never allow him to ask about people's background so inconsiderately like Marson.
当然，其中也不乏心思敏锐之人，从无限接近魔导士的实力，以及不满二十岁的年纪，联想到了最近加洛斯城风行的那个传闻……

Of course, there were those with a keen mind. From a strength that was infinitely close to that of a magic shooter and an age below 20, they associated it with the rumor that was recently raging in Jarrosus City...
当然，凯文这个八级魔法师，可跟林立的八级不一样。
Of course, Kevin's level-eight was different from Lin Li's level-eight.
当然，或许也是因为姬听雨今日的看轻，激起了他心底的傲骨，他也想证明给这个绝色倾城的女子看一看。
Of course, maybe it was also because of Ji Tingyu's belittlement today, that awakened the proud rebel in him. He wanted to prove himself to this woman whose beauty could cause cities to fall.
当然，拥有如此恐怖力量的药剂，所需要的材料也不是一般二般。
Of course, to possess potions with such horrifying powers, the materials needed were not at all ordinary.
当然，真正让林立扼腕的，还是毁灭巨龙阿扎达斯……
Of course, what really strangled Lin Li was the Dragon of Destruction, Azardas.
当然，这些清醒药剂给一般魔法师使用倒是够了，特别是加洛斯魔法公会这一群人，那可是十几年都不一定能闻到清醒药剂味道的，有机会尝尝已经算是不错的了，又哪会去嫌持续时间太短。

Of course, these Sobriety Potions were enough for ordinary mages, especially the ones in the Jarrosus Guild of Magic. That was the smell of Sobriety Potion that they might never get a whiff of in a decade. It was a good thing that they got to have a taste of it; how would they still complain that the effect’s duration was too short?
当然，这对林立来说，不是什么太大的问题，况且配制的过程也很简单，只是一些简单的萃取混合，连辅助工具都很难用到。
Of course, to Lin Li this was not a big problem. Besides, the preparation process was very easy. It only involved a simple extraction and blending, and it did not even require assistive tools.
当然，这并不是说瞬发魔法不好，只是有时候，瞬发并不是一切。
Of course, it was not to say that instantaneous outbursts of magic were inferior. But sometimes, instantaneous outbursts were not everything.
当然，这话可没人敢当着葛瑞安的面说，见了这胖瘟神出门，一个个躲都来不及，谁还有胆子当面招惹他去？
Of course, no one dared to say it in front of Gerian. Every one of them were scrambling to hide from the fat pestilence when they saw him come out; who still had the guts to provoke him in his face?
当然，这骂声中，多多少少也有些无奈。
Though, of course, there was more or less some helplessness in his scolding.
当艾萨克的目光落到林立身上时，眉头却微微皱了一下，怒焰之袍实在是太旧了，艾萨克眉头这么一皱，倒不是觉得林立有些寒酸，而是他觉得这个年轻魔法师，似乎有些不太尊重自己，这毕竟是加洛斯城主的晚宴，赴宴的人再怎么也应该将自己打扮得体面一些，想这个年轻魔法师一样，穿着件旧法师袍就来赴宴，这好象也太随便了一点……

When Isaac's eyes fell on Lin Li, his brows were slightly furrowed. The Robe of Wrath was simply too old. Isaac furrowed his brows not because he thought Lin Li’s appearance was shabby, but because he thought the young man seemed to have little respect for him. After all, this was a banquet hosted by the Castellan of Jarrosus City. People who attended the party should dress themselves decently. It seemed a little too casual coming to a dinner in an old mage robe like what the young mage was wearing.
当融合元力从左胸口附近经脉路过的时候，江逸下意识的停了下来，内视了一下伤口处。
When the merged essence force passed through the meridians near his left chest area, Jiang Yi subconsciously stopped and used his inner vision to observe his wounds.
当这样一段只能仰望的传说，活生生站在所有人面前时，他们心中有的只能是“震撼”二字。
When such a legend which could only be looked up to stood living in front of everyone else, there was only one word in their hearts—awe.
当那一点光晕从林立手中透出时，对林立怒目而视的几人，几乎在同一时间呆住了。
When the beam of halo penetrated from Lin Li's hands, the few people who were glaring at Lin Li were dumbfounded almost at the same time.
当那一点黑色与药液接触的瞬间，顿时就听见“滋”的一声轻响，烧杯中的药液剧烈翻腾，一片蒙蒙白雾升腾而起，原本弥漫在药剂室内的酸涩味道，仿佛在忽然之间就被一扫而空，取而代之的是一股令人神清气爽的清香。

When that speck of black came into contact with the potion, a fizzing pop could be heard. The liquid in the beaker churned violently and white mist arose from it. The acidic smell that had permeated the potion lab seemed to be swept away in an instant, and replacing it was a rush of refreshing fragrance.
当金光从出现到消失的半柱香过后，让全部冥军瞠目结舌的是，方圆数百里的偌大天庭竟然消失不见了，地面只留下一个无比巨大丑陋的深坑。

From the appearance of the golden light till it vanished, it took the time for half an incense to burn. What left the Netherworld army flabbergasted was that the massive Heavenly Court, which spanned hundreds of kilometers, had actually disappeared, leaving only a huge, ugly abyss.
当黑红长袍老者出现的那一刻，虚空上方那些数不清的阴兵，骸骨巨人，尸人和尸兽全部单膝下跪，发出一道整齐却沉闷的呼喊。
When the red-robed elder appeared, the yin soldiers, skeleton giants, zombies, and beasts all genuflected and bowed while shouting out in unison.
影象中的葛瑞安看上去异常憔悴，往常红润的胖脸此时苍白得吓人，呼吸也显得有些急促，这是精神力过度消耗的结果，老家伙先是拿掉几根沾在头发上的青草，又很勉强的冲两人挤出一个笑容，这才有气无力的说了一句：“早上好……”

Gerian looked exceptionally haggard in the image within the crystal ball. His usually rosy face was now frighteningly pale and he looked short of breath. This was the result of an overexertion of the mental strength. The old fellow took some off grass on his hair and forced a smile at the two of them. Only then did he say in a weak voice, "Good morning..."
往常洗好的衣物，本是风月楼的人带进内堂的，但今日风月楼的人却没有出现，一名老妈子“主动”叫江小奴和她一起把衣物送进内堂。

Normally, the clothes that have been washed would be brought into the inner court by servants from Fengyue Brothel. Today, however, no one from Fengyue Brothel appeared; instead, an old chambermaid took the initiative to order Jiang Xiaonu to help her bring the clothes into the inner court together.
往往只是几个银币的差价，就让一群人争得面红耳赤唾沫横飞。
It was often a price difference of a few silver coins that made a group of people contend in furor.
很多人纷纷对视一眼，露出错愕之色，在场的二十人有大半都欺负过江逸。把江逸打一顿那是轻的，有几次都打得吐血了，但他们从没有见过江逸求饶，更别说……主动认怂要从他们胯下爬过了。

One after another, many people took a glance at each other's faces, giving an expression of astonishment. Out of the twenty people at the scene, over half of them had bullied Jiang Yi before. Beating up Jiang Yi was a small affair with a light sentence, and he had been beaten up to the point of vomiting blood several times before. However, none of them had ever seen Jiang Yi beg for forgiveness, to say nothing of... directly admitting defeat and agreeing to crawl between their legs.
很多次江逸也想出去做工，赚些银钱补贴家用，但都被小奴坚决阻止了。说族里规定的事务也就罢了，他可是江家的少爷呀，少爷将来终究是要做大事的人，怎能到外面去做这种下贱的杂活呢？

There were many moments when Jiang Yi had wanted to head out to work, to make some money and supplement their daily expenses. But these overtures were all strongly rejected by Xiaonu. Jiang Yi was a scion of the Jiang Clan, a person destined to do great things! To say nothing of the work demanded by the family, how could a scion like himself head out to do this kind of lowly menial work?
很快一道消息传遍了整个江家大院，家族十大长老之一，江家唯一的炼丹师柳长老，就在刚才不知什么原因突然猝死在自家院子内。

News spread quickly throughout the Jiang Residence that one of the top ten elders of the family clan, Elder Liu, the only elixir-refining specialist of the Jiang Clan, had suddenly passed away in his own home for unknown reasons.
很快他就理清了思路，对方被他击伤两人，还认出了江家的武技显然有所顾忌，否则这管事怎么不出手？反而喝止护卫住手。既然对方暂时不敢打，要谈？那是好办了，只要能保住他和江小奴的性命，其他倒是好说了。

He quickly cleared his thoughts. He had, after all, already injured two of his opponent's men; additionally, his opponent recognized the martial arts techniques of the Jiang Clan and had evidently become apprehensive. Why else would that housekeeper not retaliate against him, but rather call for his guards to stand down? Since the opponent temporarily did not dare to fight any longer and asked to negotiate, why not? It would probably be easier to deal with—so long as he could protect Jiang Xiaonu's life as well as that of his own, anything else would be secondary.
很快动静便大了起来，只见这座雄城上方的虚空中接连不断地裂开裂缝，一个个周身浸染着血肉的人类尸体和巨兽尸体纷纷钻出，它们的周身俱缭绕着诡异的暗灰色符文。还有无数全身笼罩在符文黑甲内，只能看见一双红眸的阴兵不断涌出，在很短的时间里就把天庭附近的虚空给全部遮住，占据。

Soon, the commotion grew in intensity. The rift at the top of this huge city continued to widen and out came hordes of the walking dead—skeletal bodies of human and beasts, all covered in blood and festering flesh. They were enveloped by some strange greyish glowing symbols. Besides that, there were numerous red-eyed, black-armored runic yin soldiers pouring out. They quickly blocked off and occupied the void surrounding the Heavenly Court.
很快她就发现了一丝不对，从容淡然的小脸上出现一丝惊疑和动容，她的那双丹凤眼也亮了起来，樱桃小嘴发出一丝惊呓：“咦？这丹药外面的纹路有古怪，难道，这是传说中……”

It was not long before she discovered that something was not right. A look of shocking confusion and strong emotions appeared on her small tranquil and calm face. Her red phoenix eyes also lit up as her cherry-like mouth released sounds of uncontrollable surprise, saying, "Huh? The vein lines on the exterior of this pill is strange. Don't tell me, is this the legendary..."
很快所有人却是一怔，因为江逸从怀中掏出的是一个用纸包裹的黑乎乎东西，根本不是紫金，那刘管事立即醒悟过来，沉喝道：“飞少小心。”

Soon however, everyone became slightly stunned when Jiang Yi took out something that was definitely not purple gold, but a black substance wrapped up in paper. Housekeeper Liu realized immediately and yelled, "Young Master Fei, look out."
很快江小奴取来肉干，两人对着清水就干嚼起来，江逸这才有时间问道：“小奴，今天是怎么回事？我总感觉这事不正常，是不是风月楼故意设计坑你？”

A few moments later, Jiang Xiaonu retrieved the jerky, which the two gulped down drily with just plain water. Jiang Yi finally had the time to inquire, "Xiaonu, what happened today? I keep feeling something is not right with this entire incident. Did the people at Fengyue Brothel scam you intentionally?"
很快江逸又想起一件事，内心更加的茫然不安起来，柳长老死了，以后再也没有废丹了，他拿什么炼丹？怎么赚钱还债？

Jiang Yi quickly thought of another thing that left him increasingly uneasy and at a loss. With Elder Liu's death, he would no longer have any more rejected pills. What would he use to refine more pills? How could he earn money to repay his debts?
很快，江逸冷得让江如虎浑身一颤的声音响起：“江如虎，你中计了！今天不打断你四条腿，我江逸名字也倒过来写……”

It was not long before Jiang Yi's voice, so cold that it sent a shiver down Jiang Ruhu's spine, rang out saying, "Jiang Ruhu, you fell for my trick! If I don;t break your four limbs today, I too will write my name 'Jiang Yi' in reverse..."
很无奈也很憋屈……
He was helpless and aggrieved...
很明显这管事见小奴虽然瘦瘦弱弱，面黄肌瘦的，但五官长得很是精致，准备培养几年用来接客，所以故意设了陷阱想让她卖身青楼，几年后替他们赚取脏银。

Evidently, the housekeeper must have seen Xiaonu and thought that, though she was skinny, weak and pale-faced, she still had exquisite and pretty facial features; as such, he was ready to groom her for a few years before using her to receive guests. Thus, he deliberately set up a trap to make her sell herself to this brothel, and in turn, help them earn dirty money after a few years.
心里虽然有些哭笑不得，面上却是丝毫不露端倪，干脆来了个顺水推车，闭着眼睛认了葛瑞安这个便宜叔叔。
Although he felt somewhat amused and annoyed, he showed no signs of it on his face. He simply made use of the opportunity and acknowledged Gerian as an uncle.
快没力气打字了，各位恩公给点票吧！
快速吃完早饭，江逸查看了一下小奴的伤势，发现上了药后好了很多，也就不去管她了。回到自己房间内，取出在炼丹房内拿的黄参丹吞服下去，等药力发作了再运转黑色元力辅助疗伤。

After gobbling down his breakfast, Jiang Yi checked on Xiaonu's wounds. On finding that her wounds had healed well after applying medicine, he decided to no longer feel too much concern. Returning to his own room, he retrieved the Yellow Ginseng Elixir he had taken from the alchemy lab and swallowed it. He decided to wait for the medicinal power of the elixir to take effect before circulating black essence force to facilitate the healing process.
快速而准确地清点着草参，江逸只花了大半个时辰就将四号田清点完毕。随后他快步朝山下冲去，虽然身上的伤势还没全好，但却行走如风，整个人都变得精神奕奕了起来。

With speed and accuracy, it took him almost an hour to finish counting the herbs in Plantation Four. Although he had not fully recovered from his injuries, he dashed down the mountain like a breeze, feeling full of drive and spirit.
快速走出西院，江逸朝丹药房所在的南院走去。已是清晨江家开始热闹起来，不过倒是无人在意江逸这个落魄的旁系少爷。

At a fast speed he left the Western Court, Jiang Yi walked in the direction of the South Court, where the Elixir Room was located. As it was already daybreak, the Jiang Residence was getting lively and bustling, but no one concerned themselves with the down-and-out disfavored collateral descendant Jiang Yi.
怒焰之袍最厉害的地方，就是可以携带三十张卷轴，并且可以通过魔力在瞬间激活，对于一般魔法师来说，这绝对是梦寐以求的珍品，可落在林立这么个魔力无限的变态手里，简直就是明珠暗投，这就好象是给了太监一本chun宫画，他看到是能看，可又哪来机会用……

The terrific thing about the Robe of Wrath was that it could carry 30 scrolls and could be activated in an instant. For the ordinary mages, this was definitely a treasure they'd dream about. But to make it fall into the hands of a freak like Lin Li whose mana was infinite was like casting pearls before a swine. It was like giving an eunuch an erotic painting—he could see it, but there was no way he could use it...
总之不管安度因怎么想，林立安然无恙的带着一堆野钢花回来了。
Regardless of how Andoine thought, Lin Li came back safe and sound with a pile of wild steelbloom.
总之不管怎么样，林立是捡了一片在手里。
Anyway, Lin Li had picked up one petal in his hand.
总管一双阴鸷的眸子眯了起来，很快就摇头道：“空口无凭，你们要是跑了怎么办？要么留下东西抵押，要么把这丫头留下吧。”

The malicious eyes of the Chief Supervisor squinted before quickly shaking his head, replying, "Words mean nothing - what if you guys were to run away? Either you leave something behind as collateral, or you leave this servant girl behind."
恐怕也只有林立自己才知道，他为什么会拥有这种近乎妖孽般的魔法天赋，这多半跟法师小号精神智力双满的属性脱不了干系，大概也只有这样妖孽的属性，才能让他轻易理解那些复杂无比的咒语，毫不费力的将魔法元素进行组合排列，这种能力就仿佛是与生俱来的一般，任何复杂的咒语只要听过一遍，林立就可以轻轻松松的背诵下来，不管多么艰难的魔法元素排序，林立都能在最短的时间内学会。

Only Lin Li would know how he came to possess such near-demonic gift in magic. It probably had something to do with the attributes of the mage smurf—having high levels of mental and intellectual abilities. It was all thanks to these demonic attributes that he could easily understand highly complex spells and arrange magic elements without effort as if he was born knowing it. He could recite any complex spell with ease just by hearing it once and learn the order of magic elements in the shortest time no matter how difficult they were.
恐怕也只有那几个被赶出公会的魔导士，才会落魄到出卖魔鬼公会机密的地步。
Perhaps only the few Magic Shooters who were kicked out of the guild would be that down-and-out to the point of betraying the secrets of the Guild of Magic.
恐怖的表演一直持续了近三十分钟，林立才长长的吁出口气，停止了往水晶球中输入魔力。
The horrifying performance went on for almost thirty minutes before Lin Li finally let out a long sigh and stopped the transmittance of power into the crystal ball.
恢复魔力……林立摸了摸鼻子，他很想问葛瑞安：“你想恢复几次？”
Restore mana... Lin Li touched his nose. He felt like asking Gerian, "How many times do you wish to recover?"
恩……事实上是九级。
Mmm... In actual fact it was level-nine.
恶魔之泪是一种黑色的果实，约莫尾指头大小，味道又苦又涩，直接食用的话，会产生各种恐怖幻境，除非服用镇定心神的药物，否则陷入这种幻境当中，将永无摆脱之日，直到最后被幻境折磨得彻底崩溃。

The devil's tears was a kind of black fruit about the size of the pinky. It tasted bitter and astringent, and if consumed directly, it would create all sorts of horrifying illusions. Unless a tranquilizing drug was taken, one would never be able to get out of this illusion and would continue to be tormented until he finally broke down.
悄然吞服了一枚灵神丹，江逸立即盘坐起来打坐修炼，反正杨管事说了这几天不会让他上场，他也不怕黑色元力消耗。

Quietly consuming a Spirit Pill, Jiang Yi immediately sat cross-legged and started meditating for power cultivation. Besides, as Manager Yang said that he would not be letting him fight in sparring matches over the next few days, he need not feel scared that his black essence force would be fully consumed.
悬赏挂了几个月之后，林立对这只存在于传说中的黑莲花，也渐渐是死了心，他可没想到，又过了几个月，自己莫名其妙的来到另一个世界之后，却意外的发现了黑莲花的踪影。

The reward had been out for a few months, and Lin Li had gradually began to give up on the black lotus, which only existed in the legends. He had not expected that, a few months later, he'd arrive in another world and discover the trail of the black lotus by chance.
惊喜之余，林立也没空去处理利维坦猩猩了，赶忙弯下腰去，在树洞中一番挑选。
Lin Li had no time to deal with the Leviathan Gorilla amidst the surprise. He bent over in a hurry and began choosing his pick in the tree hole.
想不到今天在伊娜的家里，这个年轻法师却张口就抛出了庸医二字，再想起他先前那种小人得志的神态，红发美女再也压抑不住心中的愤怒。

Never had she imagined that, today at Ina's house, this young mage would have thrown out that word so easily. Recalling his cocky manner earlier on, the redheaded beauty could no longer contain her anger anymore.
想不到时隔两天之后，却又在父亲的宴会上，看到了那个年轻的药剂师。
To think that she would see the young pharmacist again at her father's banquet two days later.
想不到穿越之后，却在一个月之内接连遇上。
To think he had encountered them a month after having time-travelled.
想了一阵，江逸想不通索性不再多想，和杨管事说了一声走出武殿回到了江家。

After thinking some time, Jiang Yi could not come up with any suitable ideas and as such simply decided not over-think any longer. After informing Manager Yang, he walked out of the Martial Arts Hall and returned to the Jiang Residence.
想到他可以在炼丹房用黑色元力偷偷炼制上品丹药，再拿出去卖钱偿还风月楼的债务，他心情顿时好了几分。只要能快速赚钱，他还可以去外面购买一切非常高级的丹药辅助修炼，尽快将他境界提升到铸鼎境二重，那样就不惧江如虎等人了！

He planned to use his black essence force to secretly produce some superior-grade elixirs at the alchemy lab and sell them to make money. With this money, he could pay off his debts to the Fengyue Brothel.
Jiang Yi's mood immediately improved significantly when he realized this. So long as he could quickly earn money, he could even head out to purchase all sorts of superior-grade elixirs to facilitate his training, which would in turn help him elevate him to the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. That way, he would no longer have to fear Jiang Ruhu and his cronies!
想到以后再也没有机会弄丹药，没零花钱了，想到回去他父亲听到这个消息肯定会暴怒无比，他不死也会脱成皮，江松整个人都颤抖起来，一时之间心慌气怒不知该如何是好了。

Thinking that he never had any more opportunities to produce elixirs, and by extension, no more allowance. Worse still, when he thought of his father's rage upon hearing this news... It was clear that he was doomed to suffer. Jiang Song's entire body started shuddering and shaking. He was unsure if, at the moment, he should be anxious or furious.
想到以后炼制大量的丹药卖给聚珍阁，轻易获取大量的银钱，江逸整个人都战栗起来。就算他是个修炼废物，他也可以凭借这黑色元力成为富家翁，再不济能和小奴安逸的活一辈子。

Thinking about the large number of elixirs he could manufacture and sell to the Pearl Gathering Pavilion in the future, Jiang Yi's entire body shuddered. Even if he was useless at refining elixirs, he could rely on the power of the black essence force to become a rich person—one who no longer would remain in poverty and live comfortably with Xiaonu for a lifetime.
想到双方实力上的巨大差距，他几乎就要迫不及待的答应下来了，只是突然记起林立并不是一般的魔法公会成员，这才忍着没有立刻表态，只是低声向林立问道：“你怎么看？”

Considering the disparity in strength between the two sides, he had agreed almost readily when he suddenly recalled that Lin Li was not an ordinary member of the Guild of Magic. He did not express his stance immediately, and instead turned to ask Lin Li, "What do you think?"
想到封印江逸就一阵咬牙切齿，按照大长老的估计，江逸的天资不说可比神武国的顶级天才，至少比江家第一天才江恨水还要强上一丝。虽然不知道大长老为何对他如此有信心，但江逸每想到这里，都会郁闷得吐血。

Thinking about the seal, Jiang Yi fumed with rage and gritted his teeth. According to Grand Elder's estimates, Jiang Yi might not be Divine Martial Kingdom's greatest genius, but nonetheless he was more powerful than Jiang Henshui, the top genius of the Jiang Clan, by at least a sliver. Even though he had no idea why Grand Elder had so much confidence in him, every time Jiang Yi had that thought, he would become depressed to the point of vomiting blood in anger.
想到就干！
If one thought of doing something, he would definitely do it!
想到年轻法师的另一个身份，罗琳那秀丽的眉毛又皱了起来……
The alternate identity of the young mage came to her mind, and Rowling's fine eyebrows were knitted once more...
想到怀中的三枚丹药，江逸咧嘴笑了，扒饭的速度更快了几分。他风卷残云的吃完饭菜，又交代了江小奴几句就走出了院子。

Thinking about the three elixir pills in his chest pocket, Jiang Yi grinned widely, with the speed he was gobbling down his food increasing by several times. Like a whirlwind that sweeps away scattered clouds, he finished his food before giving Jiang Xiaonu a short briefing and subsequently leaving his house courtyard.
想到这一点的时候，克伦威尔那阴郁的脸上，总算是有了一丝笑容。
At this thought, there was finally a smile on Cromwell's gloomy face.
想到这里林立就知道，那座黑色城堡，恐怕也不象是任务里说的那么简单……
At the thought of this, Lin Li knew that the black castle was not that simple as mentioned in the quest...
想到这里，他更是内心愧疚不已，当下也不绕路转去后院，身子如一阵风般冲进了风月楼内，准备直接穿越内堂，进入后院。
He was full of remorse as he realized this. He did not divert his way to the backyard, he swept into Fengyue Brothel like wind, preparing to enter through the inner hall to the back.
想到这里，林立不由多看了那胖胖的身影一眼。
At this thought, Lin Li was unable to restrain himself from taking another look at the plump figure.
想到这里，江逸一愣，下意思停下无名决运转起江水决，他想证实一件事，这封印既然开始慢慢破解了，那么他的修炼速度是否能有所增幅？

Thinking up to that point, Jiang Yi got distracted as he changed his mind, stopping the practice of the nameless technique and shifting instead to the Jiang Water Art. He wished to confirm something: since the seal was gradually being broken, would his refining speed actually increase?
想到这里，江逸嘴角抽了抽，一个月时间他去哪弄那么多钱？还有早上他打了江豹，怕是他老大江如虎很快会找上门吧？

Thinking to that stage, the corners of Jiang Yi’s mouth twitched. Where could he go to earn so much money within a month? Further, he had beaten up Jiang Bao in the morning—surely his boss Jiang Ruhu would be coming to get revenge soon enough?
想到那怪物的可怕，顿时就记起了自己先前的表现，记起了自己丢下伊娜，一个人逃回来的狼狈。
Thinking back to the terrifying monster, he was reminded of his earlier actions—he had fled in panic and left Ina to fend for herself.
想到黑色元力可以快速破解封印上的符文，提升修炼速度，江逸双眼一亮，休息片刻快速下山了。

Thinking about how his black essence force could remove the runic patterns and rapidly break his seal, while at the same time increasing his power cultivation speed, Jiang Yi's eyes lit up. He restedfor a short moment before leaving the mountain at a quick speed.
想想以前的魔法公会，都已经落魄到那种程度了，就因为黑暗年代时的一纸协议，每年可以从药剂公会弄到一批药剂，就奠定了他们加洛斯第一势力的地位。

Thinking back to the past, the Guild of Magic had already come down in the world, but because of the agreement made during the Dark Ages, they could get a batch of potions from the Pharmacists Guild every year, and this had established their position as the number one force in Jarrosus.
想想反正也不需要什么辅助工具，林立干脆也就不打算再会魔法公会了，只是从口袋里掏出四只玻璃瓶子摆在桌上。
Considering that he didn't even need any tools to aid him, Lin Li decided not to return to the Guild of Magic. He took out four glass bottles from his pocket and set them on the table.
想想吧……那可是药剂师公会最重要的人物之一，只要有这样的明师指点，将来就算是进入药剂师公会，也绝非不可能的事情。
Just think... He was one of the most important figures in the Pharmacists Guild. With the guidance of a master like him, it was not impossible to join the Pharmacists Guild in the future.
想想老梅林又觉得有些悲哀，堂堂大魔导士，竟会因为好不容易战胜了一个魔法师而沾沾自喜。
Thinking it over, Old Merlin felt pathetic. He was an archmage, yet he was taking pride in defeating a mage.
想想镀上深邃之银的点金棒，林立已是笑得合不拢嘴。
Lin Li was grinning from ear to ear just thinking about the gold rod coated with deep silver.
想想麦格雷尼父女，在落日山脉中出生入死，杀死一头狮蝎，所获得的报酬也不过五十金币而已，象这样一根法杖，他们必须杀死近十头狮蝎才能换到……

He thought of McGrenn and his daughter, who had risked their lives in the Sunset Mountains to kill a Manticore for a reward of mere fifty gold coins. For a staff like this, they'd have to kill almost ten Manticores before they could afford it...
想通其中关键之后，林立更是全神贯注的看着这场战斗，整个过程连眼都没眨一下，两人的每一个手势每一次吟唱，都被他牢牢的刻在了脑海里，随着那一次次激烈的魔法碰撞，林立渐渐想通了很多以前想不通的问题，同时心里也多了很多以前从未思考过的疑问。

After figuring out the crux of the matter, Lin Li was even more absorbed in the battle, not batting his eyelids once. Every gesture and recitation were etched in his mind. With every fierce collision, Lin Li gradually figured out answers to questions he had before, and at the same time, questions he had never thought of before arose in his mind.
想通这一切之后，即便是已经活了一百多岁的老格林，也是不禁觉得一张老脸微微有些发烫……感觉就好象兴冲冲的凑上前去，却忽然挨了一耳光似的，尴尬与失落混在一起，让老格林脸上的神色无比复杂。

After he had straightened out the matters, Old Grimm could not help feeling his face burn despite having lived for over a hundred years... It felt as if he had rushed forward with excitement but was suddenly slapped in the face. The embarrassment mingled with a sense of loss, so the look on Old Grimm's face was extremely complicated.
意外的弄到了一件魔法装备，林立一时间心情大好，也没兴趣再为难利维坦猩猩，只是在它屁股上踹了一脚：“滚吧！”

Lin Li's mood was lifted with the acquisition of a magical equipment by chance. He had no further interest in making things difficult on the Leviathan Gorilla, so with a kick on its butt, he said, "Scram!"
感到不可思议的，不仅仅是马森，同样也包括了欧灵。
Not only Marson, Orrin felt unbelievable as well.
感受到一股热流从胸口快速朝丹田处涌去，江逸暗暗感慨，有丹药辅助修炼就是好啊，江如虎天资如此差也能修炼到铸鼎境四重，不就是经常把灵神丹当饭吃吗？

天资Sensing a wave of heat flow from his chest and surge at quick speed towards his dantian area, Jiang Yi silently sighed with sorrow about how good it must be to have enough elixirs to facilitate power cultivation. If Jiang Ruhu with his innately poor talent could refine his power up to the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, would it not be the case that he had been consuming Spirit Pills like how one ate rice at meals?
感受到江逸内心的沉重，江小奴笑容凝固了，慌忙跟着江逸朝里屋走去，给江逸到了一杯水，这才睁着大眼睛问道：“少爷，发生了什么事情？”

As if sensing the heaviness residing in Jiang Yi's heart, Xiaonu's smile froze on her face. She hurriedly followed Jiang Yi into the house, not forgetting to pour a glass of water for him before asking, wide-eyed, "Young Master, what happened?"
感受到葛瑞安身上传来的魔法波动，翡翠高塔外的人群，又传出一阵欢呼。
Feeling the magical wave coming from Gerian, another cheer broke out from the crowd outside of the Emerald Tower.
感受着丹田内的蓝色元力如井喷般冒出，江逸兴奋无比，这丹药配合黑色元力至少让他修炼速度比原先快了数十倍……

Sensing the blue essence force inside his dantian spewing out like an oil well blowout, Jiang Yi was uncontrollably excited. Combined with black essence force, this elixir could allow his cultivation speed to increase by at least ten times the original rate...
感受着葛瑞安身上传来的强大气息，老梅林微微叹了口气，松开了手中的强能水晶，一切已经没有意义了，就算自己能够尽数吸收强能水晶中的魔力，也不过是跟颠峰时期的葛瑞安不相上下。

Feeling the powerful aura coming from Gerian, Old Merlin let out a slight sigh and released his grip on the Strong Energy Crystal. All was meaningless. Even if he could absorb as much mana as he could from the Strong Energy Crystal, he would be almost on par with Gerian at his peak.
感受着裂开的骨头快速的愈合，江逸内心狂喜不已，等黑色元力消耗干净之后，又继续调集黑色元力，让疗伤速度加快。

Feeling the broken bones speedily mending together, Jiang Yi felt much euphoria. He waited for the black essence force to be used up completely before once again continuing to summon more black essence force to speed-up the wound-healing process.
感受着这股气息中蕴涵的力量，林立才知道自己先前有多么幸运，如果老梅林不用精神力进行压迫，而是一上来就直接动手的话，林立根本就不可能等到葛瑞安来解围，现在恐怕已经躺在台阶上多时了。

Only then did Lin Li know how lucky he was as he felt the power that was contained in the aura. If Old Merlin had not suppressed him with his mental strength and had attacked directly instead, Lin Li would probably have ended up lying flat on the step long before Gerian came to his rescue.
感受着那恐怖的魔力流动，林立一颗心已是渐渐的沉了下去，这至少是十五级以上的魔法，以自己十三级的实力，不要说妄想抵抗，就连用魔力反馈终止它的资格都不具备。

Feeling the terrifying power of the magic flowing, Lin Li's heart slowly sank. This was at least level-fifteen magic; with his level-thirteen power, he did not even possess the ability to use magic successively to backfeed and end it, let alone think of resisting.
感应到两种不同属性的元力如同孪生兄弟般快速融合着，江逸脸上露出狂喜之色，身子立即从床上跃起，对着床边的青石板重重砸下。

When he felt the effect of the combined forces of two different attributes fusing together like twin brothers, Jiang Yi was elated. He jumped up and smashed heavily down onto the limestone slab beside the bed.
感觉到双手被震得发麻，左胸传来一阵撕裂般的阵痛，看着对方的手掌再次化作一道残影拍来，江逸苦涩的在心里喃喃起来：“完了，怕是今日和小奴，两人都走不出这风月楼了……”

Jiang Yi felt his arm turn numb from the clash. A searing pain tore through his left chest. Looking at the opponent's palm turning into a phantom shadow once again, Jiang Yi mumbled bitterly, "It's over. Xiaonu and I won't be able to escape this brothel today…"
感觉到那座大山正在一点一点的松动，林立整个人都陷入了兴奋状态中。
Feeling that the mountain was loosening up bit by bit, Lin Li plunged into a state of excitement.
愿望术卷轴是个好东西，利用它获得一笔数千万的财富，或者是杀死某个神话级生物，甚至是建立自己的王国，这无疑是一个不错的选择，但林立始终觉得，利用它成为一名全职业宗师，这才是最明智的选择。

The scroll of Wishes was a good item. It could be used to attain millions of wealth, kill a legendary creature, or even build your own kingdom. Each was no doubt a fine choice. But Lin Li constantly felt that using it to become a professional guru was the wisest choice of all.
慌乱中，江逸双手快速运转全部元力，交叉上架格挡，却忘了昨日尝试无名口诀时提炼出来的那一丝黑色元力还储藏在左臂的某条小经脉处，忘了排出体外。当他全力运转江水诀元力的时候，竟把那丝黑色元力也一并运转了起来。

Frantically, Jiang Yi transferred out all the essence force as quick as he could and crossed his arms to protect his upper frame. However, he forgot that the little sliver of black essence force he had cultivated using the nameless chant last night was still hidden in a small vein on his left arm and that he had forgotten to force it out of his body. When he spent all his energy to transfer the essence force using the Jiang Water Art, he had accidentally transferred the black essence force together with the other forces as well.
我错了……
战士开了口，身后那几名玩家也相继表达了自己的不满：“这小号有毛病是吧，没事跑到私人仓库来挤什么挤？”
After the warrior had spoken, the rest of the players expressed their discontent one after another. "Something's wrong with this low-level, coming here and taking up a space for nothing."
战斗了一炷香时间，翊凌雪浑身大汗淋漓，完美曲线再次暴露无遗，她却浑然不觉，娇喝一声，双拳如暴雨般呼啸而来，刹那间漫天都是拳影，足足有十个之多。

After fighting for five minutes, Yi Lingxue's entire body was covered in sweat, allowing her perfect bodily figure to come to light. However, she remained totally unaware of this. Instead, with a delicate shout, she sent both her fists flying like a thunderstorm, leaving the air filled with the silhouettes of fists, numbering ten of such figures, within a split second.
房门关闭，姬听雨看到江逸眼中的无奈，浅浅一笑道：“易公子不用担忧，有听雨在，马公子和柳公子不会为难你的。”

Shutting the doors, Ji Tingyu saw the exasperation in Jiang Yi's eyes and smiled lightly, "Young Master Yi need not worry. Tingyu will not let Young Master Ma and Young Master Liu make things difficult for you."
房门轰然关上，三位公子站了一会全部转身快步离开，这姬小姐三人追求了几年了总是不温不火，三人早就习惯了，也不敢过多的纠缠。

The door to the room slammed shut. All three gentlemen stood at the same spot for a while, before simultaneously turning around and leaving at a quick pace. This Young Mistress Yi had never been receptive to the three men's attempts at courtship over the past few years, after all. This circumstance was something they were already used to and as such, they did not dare to entangle themselves too much in her affairs.
房间不大，里面有一个壮汉正对着一名瘦弱的小丫头拳打脚踢，那小丫头整个人蜷缩在地，全身都在颤抖，不停的哭喊恳求，但那壮汉却依旧不断拳打脚踢。

The room was not big, but in it a stout man was kicking and punching a weak, delicate girl. She was curled on the ground, trembling while constantly crying and begging. However, the man continued to rain down attacks upon her.
房间里一片冷清，没有熟悉的昏暗烛火，也没有那个熟悉的柔弱身影，伏在桌上喘息了好一会，江逸才哆嗦着手点燃烛火，却看到桌上压着一张字条。

The air in the room was stale and cold. It lacked the familiar, warm glow of a candle and that delicate, weak figure. Jiang Yi leaned over on the table-top to catch his breath. After a few minutes of hoarse panting, he finally sat up and lit the candle with a shaking hand. It was then that he spotted a brief message left on the table.
所为的除了那三十瓶奥法药剂之外，其实更多的还是想跟魔法公会修复关系。
Apart from that 30 bottles of Arcane Magic Potion, what he had wanted to do more was to repair the relationship with the Guild of Magic.
所以一开始他佯装妥协，让大部分人放松警惕，然后凭借黑色元力增幅的强大力量，一拳把江如鹰轰飞，此刻再趁着众人震愕之中，准备一举拿下江如虎。

As such, he posed being pro-compromise right from the start, ensuring a large portion of his opponents would let their guard down. Subsequently, he would rely on his great power, expanded in strength by black essence force, and send Jiang Ruying flying with one punch. At that moment, he would take advantage of all his opponents being in a state of shock, and was ready to take Jiang Ruhu down in a single move.
所以他一点也没有犹豫，顺手就把那张脏兮兮的画布揣进了怀里。
So, without any hesitation, he tucked the dirty canvas into his arms.
所以他一直没有回头。
So he never looked back.
所以他放出魔法之后，连看都没多看巴瑟罗尔一眼，就将目光挪到了宴会大厅之中，那层魔力太诡异太强大，他对放出这层魔力防护的人，兴趣甚至比对杀死巴瑟罗尔还大。

So, after he had unleashed the spell, he did not even look at Bathrilor but shifted his eyes to the banquet hall. That layer of magic was too peculiar and powerful; he was much more interested in the person who had cast the magical shield rather than killing Bathrilor.
所以他没怎么犹豫，就从无尽空间之戒中摸出了一把匕首，很小心很小心的，将那一截倒勾从尾巴上切了下来，然后又更加小心的将它放回了无尽空间之戒内。

So, without much hesitation, he pulled a dagger out of the Ring of Endless Space and very carefully nicked the inverted hook off the tail. Then, as gingerly as ever, he put it back into the Ring of Endless Space.
所以他还是倔强的站在原地，一言不发。
Thus he still stubbornly stood his ground, not uttering a single word.
所以他顿了一下，不等对方开口就说道：“姬小姐，你们这丹药是收还是不收？不收在下告辞了！”

As such, he paused for a moment. Not waiting for the other person involved to open her mouth, he just said, "Miss Ji, my elixirs - are you going to accept them, or not? If not, I'm going to take my leave!"
所以听到小奴出事后，江逸立即暴怒起来，满脸狰狞的冲到前院，那如野兽般凶厉的气息把前来报信的少女吓了一跳。
So when he heard that Xiaonu was in trouble, Jiang Yi exploded with anger. Rushing to the front yard, face brimmed with fury. His ferocious manner gave the messenger girl a huge fright.
所以听说江如虎是被马家的人打了，江家便不予理会了，大总管江云蛇倒是怒气十足，尽管江如虎被打得他都认不出来了，依旧狠狠怒骂了一顿，并下令让江家旁系子弟全部紧闭在家，敢再出去丢人现眼，一律重罚。

As such, upon hearing that members of the Ma Family had beaten up Jiang Ruhu, the Jiang Clan paid little heed to that piece of information. Contrary to the rest, the Chief Supervisor Jiang Yunshe was filled with rage. Even though Jiang Ruhu had been so brutally injured and mutilated from the fight that his face seemed unrecognisable, Jiang Yunshe still adamantly scolded Jiang Ruhu with much ferocity and even ordered all the collateral descendants to go into seclusion at home. He even set a penalty - should anyone head out of the Residence again and be a disgrace to the Family, there would be a severe punishment.
所以当他听说魔法工会即将拍卖奥法药剂的时候，他真的是高兴坏了，立刻就筹集大笔资金，甚至不惜低价处理了几处赚钱的产业，为的就是让三个儿子顺利成为魔法师。但罗林家族不是梅林家族，他能够调集的资金，总共也只有二十来万，若是这疯女人再继续顶下去，安东尼－罗林真是有些不敢想象……

So when he heard that he Guild of Magic was going to auction the Arcane Magic Potion, he was utterly thrilled and immediately started to raise money. He had even disposed of several profitable industries at a low price in order to make his three sons into mages successfully. But the Rolin Family was not the Merlin Family. The total amount of money he could gather was only about 200,000. If this mad woman continued to push on, Anthony Rolin dared not imagine what would happen next...
所以林立什么也不说，就等着葛瑞安开口。
So, Lin Li did not utter a word, and waited for Gerian to speak.
所以此刻江如龙如一头疯牛般冲来，他脸上神情没有半点变幻，而是快速弯身，提起江如虎的另外一条腿，当做武器在半空中抡起，对着江如龙狠狠砸去。
Which was why Jiang Rulong just charging him like a frenzied bull. Jiang Yi remained calm and quickly bent over to pick up Jiang Ruhu by his other leg to use him as a weapon to smash at Jiang Rulong.
所以此刻江逸心情很是沉重，风月楼竟是马家的产业？今日可别出乱子啊……
Ergo, Jiang Yi was feeling pretty heavyhearted right now: who knew that Fengyue Brothel was the property of the Ma Family? He could only hope that nothing would go wrong today...
所以此刻江逸没有选择去武殿，而是回了江家！这段时间内，他要是还敢在江家和武殿中来回行走，他相信自己绝对活不过十天。

Therefore, Jiang Yi chose to return to the Jiang Clan, instead of the Martial Arts Hall. He was certain that he would not be able to survive past ten days, if he dared commute back and forth between the Jiang Clan and the Martial Arts Hall during this period.
所以葛瑞安才想不明白，自己这么大的优势，老梅林干嘛还笑得一脸胜券在握？
Hence, Gerian could not figure out just why Old Merlin was all smiles in victory when he had such a huge advantage over him.
所以，当老格林打开瓶盖的时候，他就已经完全呆住了，仅仅是这一瓶清醒药剂，就足以颠覆大多数药剂师的常识。
So, Old Grimm was completely stunned when he opened the bottle cap. Just this bottle of Sobriety Potion was enough to subvert the knowledge of most pharmacists.
所有人不忍的别开眼睛，听着耳边传来的清脆骨头断裂声，他们心头一震，回头看着江逸的目光都充满了畏惧。
Everyone couldn't help but close their eyes, but the sound of bones cracking could be heard clearly. Their minds shuddered as they looked at Jiang Yi with fear.
所有人心里都充满了劫后余生的庆幸，如果不是这一瓶唤醒药剂，以后的加洛斯恐怕就再没有什么魔法公会了，人生大起大落，果然是太刺激了，先前还将心揪紧的魔法师们，此时却已经有了期待胜利的资格。

Everyone's heart was filled with the joy of having survived a disaster. If it hadn't been for the bottle of Awakening Potion, there would probably not be any Guild of Magic in Jarrosus in the future. The ups and downs of life were indeed exhilarating. The mages who were clutching their hearts a moment ago could now await the chance for victory.
所有人懵了，只有江豹眼中露出一丝惊恐，他那日的情况和江如鹰一模一样，也是一拳被江逸轰飞……

Everyone was left dumbstruck. Only Jiang Bao alone had a look of shock and fright revealed through his eyes. His experiences that day were completely similar to what just happened to Jiang Ruying, in that he was also sent flying by a punch from Jiang Yi...
所有人望向他的目光，都好象是在看一个白痴，很多人都已经在心里骂开了，魔法公会怎么出了这么个白痴？这么好的机会不赶紧扑上去拜师，还真要跟格林大师探讨，探讨你妈个大西瓜……

Everyone looked at him as if they were looking at an idiot. Many had begun cursing in their hearts, How did such an idiot come out from the Guild of Magic? It was such a good opportunity to become Master Grimm's apprentice and he literally wanted to discuss with the master? Damn your stupid discussion...<segm
所有人的目光都落到了亚伦－马齐斯身上，就连几支魔法家族的首脑，都不由有些暗暗吃惊，血色兄弟会一直行事低调，声名远不如老奥丁等人响亮，想不到竟然也有如此的财力与魄力。

All eyes fell onto Aaron Matsis. Even the leaders of several mage families were surprised; the Blood Brotherhood had always kept a low profile, and its reputation was far less impressive than that of Old Odin... To think that they had such wealth and guts.
所有人的目光都落到了那一点光晕之上，有迷茫有震惊有贪婪有疑惑，各种各样的情绪交织在一起，在翡翠高塔下营造出一幕诡异的气氛。
Everyone's attention fell upon the halo, and all kinds of emotions intertwined—confusion, shock, greed, and uncertainty—creating a strange atmosphere within the Emerald Tower.
所有人的目光，都落到了声音传来的方向。
All eyes turned to the direction of the sound.
所有人被江逸的凶厉吓到了，也怕江逸发疯之下，真的把江如虎给活活砸死。那样江逸难逃一死，他们也会被家族重罚的。有一人开始退，其余人也慌忙跟着退后，全部惊恐的望着满脸狰狞的江逸，心里都浮现一个念头，这人还是那个老实巴交的废物江逸吗？怎么发狠起来如此可怕？

Everyone had been shocked and frightened by Jiang Yi's severe viciousness and ferocity; they were also scared that, in a fit of mad rage, Jiang Yi would really smash Jiang Ruhu on the ground to his death. In that way, Jiang Yi's death penalty would be unavoidable, but they too would have to suffer the consequences of being punished by the Family clan. As one person started to retreated, the rest followed suit in hurriedly falling back. All of them stared in horror at the malevolent expression on Jiang Yi's face, as a single thought appeared in their minds - was this person still that docile good-for-nothing Jiang Yi? How could he become so scary when he showed his ferocity?
所有人都倒吸了一口凉气，宴会大厅中一片此起彼伏的惊呼声，格林－伯恩塞德这个名字，对加洛斯城人来说就是一段活着的传说。
Everyone drew in a cold breath; the banquet hall was filled with surprised gasps. The name—Grimm Burnside—was a living legend to the people of Jarrosus City.
所谓的要事，其实就是分脏。
The important thing they meant was to divide the spoils.
所谓陪练，自然是陪着别人练武，帮助对方提高实战经验。换句话说，别人可以随便打你，你也可以还手，但却不能伤了对方，这就是主动挨揍的活儿。

As a martial arts sparring partner, one naturally had to accompany others in their practice of martial arts and help the other party increase their actual combat experience.
In other words, other people could beat you up as they fancied. You could always launch a counter-attack, but you were not allowed to injure the other party: this was the responsibility of actively taking beatings.
手上掌握着深邃之银，他已经有些迫不及待了，他很想知道，镀上了深邃之银的点金棒，将会拥有何种神奇的力量……
He couldn't wait any longer now that he had the deep silver in his hands. He really wanted to know the kind of magical power a gold bar coated with deep silver would possess...
才刚刚穿过一片密林，林立就忽然看见，前方树丛中一阵叶浪翻腾，三条人影正在那一片叶浪当中飞速移动。
Lin Li had just passed through the dense woods when, all of a sudden, he saw the leaves billow in the bushes ahead—three figures were hurtling through the sea of leaves.
托大家的福，上周弄了不少点击收藏推荐，估计下周的精华不会太少，为了避免浪费，一会12点过后，我打算弄几栋楼给大家加加精，顺便再多更一章酬谢大家这一周来的支持，希望到时候大家多多捧场！
扫了一眼，江逸很快就意味索然了，这武殿是在招收陪练武者。待遇倒是很诱人，铜牌陪练一天一两银子，银牌陪练一天十两，金牌陪练甚至达到了一两紫金一天。

After scanning through the notice, Jiang Yi very quickly lost his interest. The Martial Arts Hall was calling for applicants for martial arts sparring partners. Frankly, the remuneration was very attractive: a bronze-token-grade sparring partner would earn a tael of silver a day, one with a silver token would earn ten taels of silver a day, and one with a gold token could even earn up to a tael of purple gold a day.
扶着中年男人一路奔逃的是一对年轻男女，那男的身上穿着一件做工精细的魔法长袍，看上去应该是出身不错的魔法师才对，特别是手上那根法杖，就算是以林立的眼光看来，也不得不说声不错。

A young man and a woman held onto the middle-aged man as they fled. The young man was wearing a mage robe made with fine craftsmanship, he seemed to be a mage from a good family background. In particular, the staff he held in his hand was a rather decent one even with Lin Li's eyes.
找到了麦格雷尼沉睡的原因，林立也稍稍松了口气，黄昏诅咒虽然厉害，却并不是完全无解，至少他就知道两种解决的方法。

Lin Li heaved a sigh of relief as he found the cause of McGrenn's deep slumber. Although the Twilight Curse was formidable, it was not entirely unbreakable—at least he knew of two ways that could resolve it.
抄录魔法是件很麻烦的事，特别是象林立这种半吊子，语言基础太差，除了通用语之外，其他语言对他来说就是标准的天书，于是他不得不一边翻看各种语言入门，一边将那一条条咒语抄进魔法书里。

Copying the spells was a burdensome thing to do, particularly for a dabbler like Lin Li who had a poor foundation in the local language. Other than the lingua franca, all other languages were Greek to him. So, he had to go through different language guides as he wrote the spells down into the magic book.
把一瓶魔力药水倒进安眠水晶瓶里，等了几个月之后拿出来一喝，这一瓶魔力药水的效果，竟堪堪达到了唤醒药剂的效果！
If you pour a bottle of magic potion into the Hypnotic Crystal bottle and drink it after a few months, the effects were that of an Awakening Potion!
把所有药草准备好，江逸擦了擦额头上的汗水，站起身朝外走去，却看到一个披头散发的老头正站在他身后盯着他看，这种感觉就像酣睡中发现厉鬼在侧般恐怖……

After preparing all the medicinal herbs, Jiang Yi wiped off the sweat on his forehead, stood up and walked outside. However, he saw an old man with disheveled hair standing behind him and staring at him. The horrible feeling he got was akin to discovering a scary ghost on one's side while one was in deep slumber...
报信的少女，江逸认识，是住旁边的一名江家老奴的女儿，平时和小奴走得近，也经常一起偷偷出去做工。

Jiang Yi recognized the young girl bearing the news, it was the daughter of an elderly Jiang Clan chambermaid staying next door. She and Xiaonu were good friends and sometimes would sneak out together for work.
抱着这样的想法，林立的眼光自然也不象平时那么挑剔了，转过两个街角之后，很快就看到了一间尚未关门的装备店。
With this thought in mind, Lin Li was less picky than usual. After turning around two corners, a gear shop which was still open soon came into sight.
拍卖会终于落下了帷幕，一老一少拿出了三十三瓶奥法药剂，收获的却是一百多万金币，一百套精良的魔法装备，外加一个如日中天的魔法公会。

The auction finally came to an end. The old and the young had brought out 33 bottles of Arcane Magic Potion and harvested over a million gold coins, 100 sets of excellent magic equipment, and a Guild of Magic at the peak of its power.
拒绝一个小小的红发美女，林立干起来还是没什么心理负担的……
Rejecting a little redhead beauty was not so much of a psychological burden to Lin Li at all...
拥有了药剂大师之后，魔法公会已经有了崛起的机会，只要借着拍卖三十瓶奥法药剂的东风，魔法公会将会在短时间内发展到一个可观的程度，到了那个时候，什么十一魔法家族，什么六大地下势力，统统都要看魔法公会的脸色行事。

After having the potion master, the Guild of Magic already had the opportunity to rise. So long as they auctioned off the 30 bottles of Arcane Magic Potion, the Guild of Magic would be able to grow to a considerable degree in a short time. By that time, the 11 mage families and six underground forces would all have to adjust their behavior toward the guild's expressions.
拿了戒指正准备闪人，却忽然看见那张被涂得五颜六色的画布。
Lin Li was about to leave after getting the ring when the colorful canvas caught his eyes.
拿起那几片花瓣，完全是下意识的，就好象你把手伸到美女胸口，总会很自然的捏上一捏，这真的不是耍流氓，只是一种很自然的反应……

Picking up that few petals was an instinctual reaction. Just like how one would naturally grasp a woman's breasts when he had his arms stretched in front of her chest. It was not a hooligan's behaviour, but an extremely natural reaction...
挨了一脚，利维坦猩猩却是如蒙大赦，吭哧吭哧的就钻入了树林深处。
The Leviathan Gorilla seemed to have received an amnesty from being kicked, and with a puff it dived into the depths of the forest.
换了大多数魔法师来，恐怕都要对这两个标准嗤之以鼻。
Most mages would have scoffed at these criteria.
据伊娜所说，今天早晨她来的时候，麦格雷尼已经瘦得不成样子了。
According to Ina, McGrenn had been worn down to a shadow when she came this morning.
据大长老说，是他娘亲在他一岁时购买的弃婴，给他做侍女的。尽管名分上是侍女，但江逸和江小奴一同长大，情同兄妹，在大长老失踪后两人更是相依为命。这些年来如果不是江小奴一直为他鼓气加油，他也不知道能不能坚持下来！

According to the Grand Elder, his mother bought Xiaonu as a maid to serve him when he was one years old. Although her status was just a maid in the household, Xiaonu was never treated like one—she grew up together with Jiang Yi like a sibling. After the disappearance of the Grand Elder, each depended on the other for survival. If not for Xiaonu's constant encouragement, it would have been hard for Jiang Yi to endure the difficult times.
据说就连老奥丁找上门去，葛瑞安都给他碰了个钉子，整个加洛斯城谁不知道，这两个老家伙是穿一条裤子的？听说连老奥丁都碰了钉子，梅林家族刚要伸出去示好的手，顿时又收了回来……

It was said that even when Old Odin came calling, Gerian had given him a flat refusal. Everyone in Jarrosus City knew that both of them wore the same pair of pants growing up. The Merlin Family was just about to extend a friendly hand but immediately pulled it back after hearing that even Old Odin had been turned away...
据说无尽世界里，就有人做过实验。
Legend says that one had done an experiment in the Endless World.
接待他的还是上次的刘管事，刘管事客气的将江逸带进雅阁内，招来侍女奉上香茗后，才微笑问道：“公子，您这次是又准备出售丹药吗？难道有好货色？”

The person who greeted him was Housekeeper Liu, who he had met before. Housekeeper Liu courteously brought Jiang Yi into an elegant booth.
After instructing his maidservant to serve some aromatic tea, he gave a small smile. "Young Master, are you ready to sell more elixirs during this visit? Do you perhaps have some high-quality products?"
接着就听见一阵“哗啦哗啦”的声响，数十枚魔晶骨碌骨碌的就滚到了柜台上。
What followed were the clattering sounds of dozens of magical crystals rolling out onto the counter desk.
接着那管事就出现了，狠狠扇了江小奴一巴掌，让护卫把小奴带到了后院，让她要么赔钱，要么签卖身契……

Following that, that housekeeper appeared and viciously gave Jiang Xiaonu a slap and allowed the guard to bring Xiaonu to the backyard, demanding that she pay up for the damages or otherwise sign a contract and sell herself to the household...
揉了揉酸疼的手臂，林立回头望了一眼满面呆滞的围观群众，这才收拾起工具，转身往药剂店方向走去。
Lin Li massaged his aching shoulder. He took a look back at the stupefied onlookers before packing his tools and turning into the direction of the pharmacy.
搞了4个小时，总算把第二章给补上了，现在去睡觉，争取把睡眠时间调整回来，今天对不起大家，我也没什么脸打滚了……(未完待续，如欲知后事如何，请登陆www.qidian.com，章节更多，支持作者，支持正版阅读！)
摇了摇头，江逸强迫自己不去多想，开始数起数来。荣管事只给了他两个时辰，要是不能及时清点完毕，回去挨骂事小，要被扣掉月例那就太严重了。

Shaking his head, Jiang Yi forced himself not to overthink and to instead start counting the plants. Chief Rong had only given him four hours to finish this task, after all. If he was unable to finish this work in time, he have to endure yet another scolding and something worse: a salary cut. If his monthly salary was cut, he would be thrown into a truly terrible situation.
摇晃了一下脑袋，江逸重新盘坐起来，暗暗沉吟起来：“嗯……先修炼江水决，这段时间小心些，别被江如虎等人截了。等攒够足够的银钱，我再出去外面购买高级丹药，加快修炼！哼哼，只要我有铸鼎境二重配合黑色元力，江如虎你们敢来找麻烦，看我不把你们一个个打成血猪头？”

Shaking his head, he returned to his cross-legged sitting posture, quietly muttering, "Hmph... I should first practice the Jiang Water Art. I should be more careful during this period of time and not get caught by Jiang Ruhu and gang.
"Once I have acquired enough money, I can head out to purchase high-quality elixirs and speed up my training in refinement! Heh heh! Once I reach the second level of the Cast Tripod Realm and combine that power with black essence force, should Jiang Ruhu dare to come to find trouble... see if I tear you guys up to shreds?"
擒贼先擒王！
To catch bandits, one must first capture the bandit leader!
放下这枚十五级魔晶之后，林立又拿出一红一绿两块宝石。
After putting down the level-fifteen magical crystal, Lin Li took out another two gemstones—a ruby and an emerald.
敢来风月楼闹事，他可不管这少年是谁先打了再说，铸鼎境一重在铸鼎境二重的他看来……屁都不是。

Since the youth dared to barge into Fengyue Brothel to stir trouble, he did not care who he was. A beating was in order. To him, the first or second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm was… nothing to him.
散发出强大压力的同时，老梅林的精神力更是如同海浪一般汹涌澎湃，一波又一波的冲击着旋涡中心的林立。
At the same time, Old Merlin's mental strength was surging like the torrential tides, dealing an impact with every wave to the center of the vortex where Lin Li stood.
数不清的骸骨巨人、尸人、尸兽和阴兵铺满虚空，密密麻麻，遮天蔽月，它们身上或身周隐隐发亮的暗灰色符文流转不停，光影迷离，规模宏大，似乎把那座原本宏伟神圣，在今夜却显得漆黑寂静的天庭巨城也给比了下去。

Countless skeleton giants, zombies, zombie-beasts, and yin soldiers crowded the space, blotting out the sky and moon. Grey runic patterns sparkled continuously from their bodies—light and shadows blurred. The spectacle was so grand and divine that even the Heavenly Court city, dark and silent that night, paled in comparison.
数十记风刃，数十根冰锥，若是换个其他魔法师来，恐怕早已耗尽了所有的魔力，也只有林立这种精神力严重畸形的变态，才能继续在椰子雨中坚持下去。

That numerous shots of wind blades and icicles would probably exhaust the mana of another mage. Only a freak with a serious abnormality of mental strength like Lin Li could persist under the rain of coconuts.
数千金币的草药，搞了差不多足有一周。
It took him almost a week to use up over thousand gold coins worth of herbs.
敲废几块秘银算得了什么，只要技能点数涨上去就行了。
What was the big deal about scraping a few pieces of mithril as long as the skill points increased.
整个世界再次变得清晰，时间的流动似乎也凝滞了起来……
The whole world turned distinct again, and time also seemed to pass sluggishly.
整个丹炉一颤，江逸被一股反震之力推到在地，他眼中都是喜色，昨日不就是炸丹才练出两枚地阶丹药吗？

The entire cauldron trembled as Jiang Yi was pushed to the ground by the force of a large reverberating shockwave. His eyes were filled with glee. Was it not the case the day before that the two Earth-tier elixirs were refined only after the original pills exploded?
整个丹炉又一次剧烈摇晃，等他打开一看整张脸都黑了，里面的三枚丹药加上原先的两枚全炸了，变成了残渣，一枚不剩……

Once again the entire cauldron trembled violently. When he lifted the lid and took a look, he facial expressions turned to one of angry dismay. The three elixir pills inside, in addition to the two original pills, had exploded completely and turned to smithereens, with not a single pill left...
整个加洛斯城都疯了，但凡有资格竞争的势力，都在拼命的往翡翠高塔挤。
The whole Jarrosus City had become crazy. All the powers qualified for the competition were fighting to force their way into the Emerald Tower.
整天跟林立这种妖孽在一起，凯文没法不觉得失落。
Kevin could not help but feel dejected hanging out with a freak like Lin Li every day.
整整一个上午，江逸都在柳长老的指挥下忙进忙出，还被骂了整整一个早上。这柳长老明显一夜未睡觉，但炼丹起来却如走火入魔般，眼看到了午后时分了，江逸都饿得肚子哇哇叫还没有停下的意思。

For an entire morning, Jiang Yi had been hustling and bustling under Elder Liu's orders and was scolded the entire time in the process. It was clear that Elder Liu had not slept an entire night, but when it came to refining elixirs it was as if he had been possessed by the devil. Jiang Yi saw that it was already noon and his stomach was rumbling loudly with hunger, yet Elder Liu did not seem to have any intention to stop.
整整一天，他都没有出门，在家疗伤同时研究黑色元力，结果让他有些郁闷。尽管黑色元力再次出现两种新的能力——能让听力和嗅觉增强，但研究了一天，无论他怎么想办法，这黑色元力提炼的上限只有十缕！

He did not leave his room for the entire day. While he was at home, he tended to his injuries and studied the black essence force. The result, however, left him somewhat depressed. Two new abilities of the black essence force were revealed: his hearing and sense of smell could both be made sharper.
Despite this, after researching for a single day, no matter what ideas he could come up with, the upper limit of the black essence force he could refine was only ten strands!
整整半柱香时间，撕裂般的痛楚才缓缓消失。江逸全身冷汗淋漓，汗毛倒立，好半天才艰难的坐了起来。

It took half the time needed for an incense stick to burn out completely before the skin-splitting pain finally dissipated. Jiang Yi’s body was covered in cold sweat, and goosebumps rose to full attention on his arms and back. It took a very long time before he finally managed to lift himself into a seated position.
文字内容林立看不明白，但他至少知道，只要跟高等精灵扯上关系的，就绝不会是一般的东西。
Lin Li could not understand the texts, but he knew at least that anything that had to do with the High Elves was definitely not something that was ordinary.
旁边偏厅内，立即传来一道暴怒的大吼：“混账东西！这炉丹药可是人阶上品的灵神丹，老夫撕了你……”
From the side room immediately came a furious roar: "Damn it! This cauldron contained Man-tier superior-grade Spirit Pills! I’m going to kill you, Jiang Yi!"
无名轻叹一声，道：“如果真要打，老不死你至少要耗掉整个冥界的五成兵力，才能攻破这座天庭的三重防护大阵，那得熬到什么时候？十天还是半个月？更关键的是就算你最终攻破了这里，也最终成功送走了我，可接下来为恢复你的实力以及兵力，你还要在各界制造多少血腥杀戮？我烦恼的其实是这个啊……”

Wu Ming sighed. "If you want to fight, Old Fart Undying, you will need to expend half of all the Netherworld's military might before you can take down the three-layered protective array of the Heavenly Court.
“How long can you withstand the array? Ten days? Half a month? Even if you finally succeed in overrunning the area, you will only succeed in getting rid of me. After that, how much blood do you need to shed in order to recover your strength and military might. I am actually vexed over that…"
无尽世界中的一切，竟然会在现实中出现！
The entirety of the Endless World actually appeared in reality!
无尽世界的经验，在安瑞尔世界同样适用。
His experience in the Endless World could be adapted in the world of Anril.
无数威力绝伦的魔法，终于耗尽了两人最后一丝魔力。
Countless powerful magic had at last exhausted every mana of both parties.
无数风刃反复切割，再坚韧的皮肤也不可能经受得住。
Even the toughest of skin could not withstand the repeated cuts of countless wind blades.
无比锋利的爪子，迅捷如风的飞行速度，再加上腐蚀能力极强的酸液喷吐，让双足飞龙拥有了在落日山脉边缘生存下去的资本，等闲魔兽如狮蝎雷兽之流，根本就不敢招惹它们，一头暴怒的双足飞龙，从天空中倾泻下无穷无尽的酸液，这对谁来说恐怕都是一场噩梦。

Razor-sharp talons, flying at the speed of wind, and extremely corrosive acidic spout—these allowed the Wyvern to have what it took to survive on the edge of the Sunset Mountains. Ordinary magical beasts like the Manticores dared not provoke them. A raging Wyvern spewing endless acid from the sky was probably a nightmare for anyone.
无穷的恐惧从心底涌起，仿佛在忽然之间，克伦威尔又回到了落日山脉，又面对着那可怕的雷霆猩猩，下意识的，他又往后缩了缩……
Endless fear welled up from the bottom of his heart, as if in an instant he was back in the Sunset Mountains, faced with the terrifying Thunder Gorilla. He shrank back involuntarily once more.
无视冥皇的威胁，无名依旧坐在那里喋喋不休，只是……从他的身体内部，不知何时冒出了一股股熊熊烈火。
Ignoring the Netherworld King's menacing stare, Wu Ming continued to sit there blabbering away. However… it was unknown when wisps of raging flames emerged out of his body.
无视又惨叫起来的江如虎，江逸目光锁定围过来的众人，他嘴角此刻还有淤血，配合他那冷漠的神情，看起来别有一番摄人之威。

Disregarding Jiang Ruhu, who had started screaming in agony once again, Jiang Yi's gaze was locked onto the corwd of opponents surrounding him. There was still some clotted blood on the corner of his mouth at that moment. Coupled with his stone-cold facial expression, he looked as though he had some sort of special power to enchant others.
无论是魔法还是药剂学，都需要大量时间进行研究，特别是药剂学，老格林本人身为药剂学大师，对其中的艰辛自是最清楚不过，永远也无法完全掌握的配方，天文数字一般的药剂公式，一次次的实验，一次次的失败，哪怕是一丁点的进步，也需要用大量时间去堆积。

Both magic and pharmaceutics required a lot of time to study, especially pharmaceutics. Old Grimm himself was a master pharmacist, hence he was most aware of the hardships within. Formulas that could never be mastered, equations involving astronomical figures, all the experiments and failures—even a little progress would need a lot of time to accumulate.
既新奇又紧张的林立，自然不会去注意，他前脚才刚出小木屋，安度因就念了一段咒语，随着这段咒语念完，他身前的水晶球上，开始慢慢浮现出林立的身影……

Being both curious and nervous, Lin Li naturally could not have noticed that Andoine had recited a spell the moment he stepped out of the cabin. Following the completion of the spell, a figure of Lin Li began to emerge on the crystal ball in front of him...
既然已经砸破江如龙的脑袋，江逸也无所顾忌了，索性继续抡着江如龙在演武殿内狂舞，不过这次他控制了一些力道，不敢将他活活砸死，否则他也怕只有死路一条了。

Since he already smashed up the head of Jiang Rulong, Jiang Yi didn't have any scruple any longer. He simply continued to whirl Jiang Rulong around in the Martial Arts Demonstration Hall like he was performing a mad dance. But this time, he controlled his strength as he didn't dare to smash Jiang Rulong to his death. If he did, he would be immediately put to death.
既然有人点将，江逸只能苦笑出战了，跟随翊凌雪走了一个练功房内，很快房门就关闭了，房间墙壁上光芒闪耀，两人的元力都被封印。

Since there was someone deliberately ordered him, Jiang Yi could only smile bitterly and head out for combat. Following Yi Lingxue, he walked into one of the technique practising rooms. It was not long before the door to the room sealed shut and the walls of the room shone brightly as both persons' essence forces were sealed off from use.
既然来到奥兰纳，就不要想活着回去……
Now that he had come to Alanna, don't think of making it back alive...
既然猜出了江如虎的如意算盘，江逸怎么能让他得逞？这几日他虽然一直在修炼，但大部分时间都在提炼黑色元力消融封印上的符文，并没有过多的去修炼江水决，实力还停在铸鼎境一重，此刻和江如虎对上，那肯定只有挨揍的份。

Since Jiang Yi guessed Jiang Ruhu's wishful thinking, how could he allow him to prevail? The past few days, while he had always been practicing refining, he had spent most of his time refining black essence force to remove the runic characters on his seal and had barely practiced the Jiang Water Art.
With his strength still stuck at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, should he fight with Jiang Ruhu at that present moment, he would suffer a beating.
既然魔法公会的崛起已是势不可挡，那在这之前先向他们伸出友谊之手，在老梅林看来也不失为一个明智的选择。
Since the rise of the Guild of Magic was something that couldn't be stopped, Old Merlin thought it wise to extend a friendly hand to them before it happened.
日上三竿，柳长老却没有出现，江逸也不管了，一个人又兴奋的开始提炼黑色元力，破解封印上的符文。

It was already late in the morning, yet Elder Liu had not shown up. Jiang Yi chose not to care; instead, he decided to start refining black essence force on his own to continue breaking the runic patterns on his seal.
早在伊娜家中时，她就知道林立是一个药剂师，但那时的罗琳可绝没有想到，他竟然有资格跟格林爷爷探讨药剂知识，甚至在这种探讨当中，还占据了某种程度的主导地位！

She knew Lin Li was a pharmacist back at Ina's place. But Rowling had not imagined that he would be qualified to discuss pharmaceutical knowledge with Grandpa Grimm, and even dominating the discussion to some degree!
早在离开落日山脉的时候，林立就隐隐约约觉得，自己在魔法进展上，似乎遇到了某种阻碍。
After he had left the Sunset Mountains, Lin Li vaguely felt that he had encountered some sort of hindrance in the progress of his magic.
早晨码到6点睡觉,结果一觉睡到下午3点才起……
时间一点一滴地过去，江逸浑身绷紧，背后已经开始冒冷汗了，江小奴一双漂亮的大眼睛也都是忐忑和紧张，今日两人能否平安走出这风月楼，就在这管事的一念之间了。

Time passed by slowly, second by second. Jiang Yi's body tensed up as cold sweat dripped down his back. Jiang Xiaonu's pair of pretty ears also revealed her nervousness and anxiety. The ability of the two people to safely leave Fengyue Brothel hinged entirely on a single thought made by this very housekeeper.
时间如流水，当江逸九岁时，大长老又一次留信离开了江家。他这次离开，便是整整六年，期间音信全无，宛如人间蒸发。

When Jiang Yi was nine, the Grand Elder once again left a letter to his family to announce his departure. Yet, this time his departure lasted a full six years! With the family not even once receiving any news or message from him throughout this period, it was as though he had vanished from the face of the earth.
明亮火红的碎片无视并穿透了整个冥界大军，瞬间便消失在天际。
Bright red metal shards shot through the Netherworld Realm's forces without any regard, eliminating them in an instant.
明亮的火焰很快便将无名的身体整个包裹，包括他手上拄着的那把剑。
The burning flames quickly engulfed Wu Ming, including the sword he held.
明天如果还码到6点的话，我就6点更新了，不好意思大家，一会修改一下放下一章
明明每天都在勤奋的练习，也知道自己拥有卓越的天赋，可那道坎就是迈不过去。
He had been training diligently every day, and he also knew that he had an exceptional talent. But he couldn't seem to overcome that ridge.
昏暗的夜色中，江逸看到一道瘦弱的身影在前方茫然寻觅呼喊，心里顿时都是内疚和心疼，脚下元力运转朝江小奴狂奔而去。

In the darkness of night, Jiang Yi spotted a weak skinny figure in front of him shouting and searching for him. His heart suddenly filled with guilt and heartache, he applied some essence force towards the bottom of his feet and raced towards Jiang Xiaonu.
星辰沙一流进烧杯，林立就飞快的从无尽风暴之戒中拿出一只瓶子。
