Once the star sand was poured into the beaker, Lin Li speedily took out a bottle from the Ring of Endless Storm.
春芽一怔，连忙带着哭腔解说起来：“江逸少爷，小奴在风月楼被打了，那管事说是小奴弄坏了一副名画，要小奴赔钱，否则就要活活打死她，你快找人去营救她……”

A stupefied Chunya answered with tears brimming in her eyes. "Young Master Jiang Yi, Xiaonu is being beaten up at Fengyue Brothel. The manager says Xiaonu damaged a painting and wants her to pay, or else she will be beaten to death. Quick, get some people to save her..."
春芽揉了揉眼睛，满脸惊疑的呢喃起来：“咦？江逸少爷的速度怎么那么快了？他不是铸鼎境一重吗？这速度最少有铸鼎境两三重吧？”

Chunya rubbed her eyes.
"Huh?” she murmured in a surprised voice. “How is Young Master Jiang Yi so fast? Ain't he at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm? This speed is at least the second or third stage."
春芽看到江逸如一阵风的冲出去，浑身杀气腾腾的，连忙害怕的追着喊了几声：“江逸少爷，你可千万别冲动，风月楼里面的护卫实力很多很强大的……”

Seeing Jiang Yi dashing off like the wind and seething with murderous intent, an alarmed Chunya shouted after him, "Young Master Jiang Yi, please don't do anything rash; there are many guards at Fengyue Brothel—all strong and numerous in number…"
昨夜研究了一夜，他都没有探查出那丹药内莫名出现的成分是什么，所以今日尝试添加了各种药剂，希望和昨天一样炼制出一枚地阶丹药。

After researching for an entire night the night before, he was unable to find out what the identity the component that had mysteriously appeared in that elixir was. Thus, he was trying to add in all types of medicinal ingredients today, hoping to refine a pill of Earth-tier elixir just like he did the day before.
昨天他被江如虎等人打伤，昏死了一上午，回家睡了一觉脑海内莫名出现了一部无名口诀，接着他按无名口诀上修炼出一丝神奇的黑色元力，凭借这黑色元力，他早上将江豹狠狠的揍了一顿，又去风月楼将小奴救了出来，不过却欠下十两紫金的巨额债务……

Yesterday he had just been beaten up by Jiang Ruhu and his lackeys and fallen into a coma for an entire morning; upon returning home a nameless formulation mysteriously appeared in his mind. Subsequently, he refined a sliver of mysterious black essence force through this nameless formulation; borrowing the strength of this black essence force, he had viciously beat up Jiang Bao, and had even gone to rescue Xiaonu from Fengyue Brothel. Yet he now owed an enormous debt worth ten taels of purple gold...
昨天状态实在太差，挤了两章死活挤不出来，不过大家放心，昨天欠的字，我会在今天这两章里补上。
是巧合？还是这小子在扮猪吃虎？他本身其实是一个强大的武者？来这冒充陪练？无意间引导帮助翊小姐武技大成了？

Was this all a coincidence? Or was this kid simply trying to play dumb and weak? Was his identity, in truth, that of a powerful martial artist? Was he here to pass himself off as a sparring partner? Did he inadvertently guide and assist Young Mistress Yi to attain the Phenomenal Stage in her martial arts skills
更何况在过去的二十多年里，老梅林一直很做得很不错，从未跟魔法公会有过纠纷，甚至还一意促成了一些生意上的合作，老梅林相信只要自己拿出足够的诚意，以葛瑞安的为人，想必也会做出同样明智的选择。

Besides, Old Merlin had been doing it well for the past 20 years. He had not had any conflict with the Guild of Magic, and had even materialized some business dealings with them. Old Merlin believed that as long as he was sincere, Gerian, judging by his character, would have made the same wise choice as he did.
更何况老家伙最后那段既象劝告又象威胁的话，听起来虽然有些不太中听，但其中的意思林立却是明白，这落日山脉肯定不是什么太平地方，如今自己连东西南北都分不清楚，就这么傻呼呼的走出去，搞不好还真被弄出个好歹来。

Moreover, what the old man said at the end sounded like an admonition and a threat. It didn't sound too good, but Lin Li understood the meaning behind it. The Sunset Mountains were definitely not a peaceful place. Now that he couldn't even tell the directions here, mishaps could happen if he just walked out of the place foolishly.
更何况还有葛瑞安那老家伙，这厮经常打着关心的名目，跑药剂室跑得比谁都勤快，特别是在看着那一瓶瓶已经完成的药剂时，这家伙流着口水的样子，更是让林立忍不住想把他赶出药剂室去。

Moreover, there was that old fellow Gerian, who ran to the potion lab more diligently than anyone in the name of concern. In particular, the way he drooled when he looked at the bottles of finished potions made Lin Li want to drive him out of the potion lab.
更何况，刚才欧灵可是明明白白的看见，安度因大师从口袋里掏出一瓶药剂，很小心很谨慎的向自己那位室友请教。
Moreover, just a while ago, Master Andoine had taken out a bottle of potion and, very carefully and gingerly, asked his roommate for advice. Orrin had witnessed that clearly with his own eyes.
更要命的是，林立在一记记风刃当中，还不时补上迟缓术，在迟缓术的牵制之下，利维坦猩猩简直苦不堪言，想跑跑不了，想追追不上，原地不动吧，又被那风刃切得遍体鳞伤。

What made matters worse was that in the midst of those wind blades, Lin Li also used the Delaying Spell from time to time. Under the constraint of the Delaying Spell, the Leviathan Gorilla was utterly tormented. It could not flee nor catch up with him, and if it stayed grounded, it'd be ripped by the wind blades.
曼尼斯家族确实是加洛斯首富，林立也相信他们家族内的收藏非常丰厚，但是选三件装备这种事，对林立来说其实真没什么意义，以他五系宗师的身份，只要手上材料足够，又有什么装备是他搞不到的？

The Mannes Family was indeed the richest in Jarrosus. Lin Li had no doubt they had an abundant collection in the family. But choosing three pieces of equipment had no meaning for Lin Li. He was a guru well-versed in five series; as long as the ingredients on hand were enough, was there any equipment he couldn't get?
最可怕的是，经过长达二十八分钟的魔力输出之后，林立仍然没露出丝毫疲态，这小子甚至还兴致勃勃的凑过来问道：“怎么样，我成绩如何？”

What was the scariest of all was that even after twenty-eight minutes of continuous magic output, Lin Li had shown no signs of fatigue at all. The kid had even approached them in great spirits and asked, "How was it? How did I do?"
最可怕的是，麦格雷尼身上没有任何伤口，也不象是被精神魔法攻击过，一切都好象没有什么不同，唯一不同的只是麦格雷尼睡着了，根据伊娜的描述，麦格雷尼现在的情况，只能用睡着了来形容，甚至在回到加洛斯城之后，还偶尔能听见他发出轻微的鼾声。

What was the scariest was that there was no wound on McGrenn's body, and it didn't look like he was attacked by any mental spells. Everything seemed the same, except that McGrenn was asleep. According to Ina's description, McGrenn's current situation could only be described as being asleep. Even after returning to Jarrosus City, he could occasionally be heard snoring softly.
最后一炉丹药出炉，柳长老取出来一枚看了看，脸上顿时都是失望和疲惫之色，他骂骂咧咧几句大步朝炼丹房外走去，走到门口才醒悟过来，回头扫了江逸一眼，交代道：“江……什么？你把这些废丹全丢了，先回去吃饭，下午认真把那本药草简介看几遍，别下次找药草又找半天……还有，有人来领丹药，一律不给……他娘亲的，到底哪出了问题？”

The last cauldron of elixirs was freshly done. Elder Liu retrieved a pill and took a look, his face instantly revealing a look of disappointment and fatigue. He swore several times as he walked with big steps towards the door of the alchemy lab.
He only remembered Jiang Yi when he reached the main door. Turning around and taking a glance at Jiang Yi, he instructed, "Jiang...what? You go throw away all those useless elixirs. After that, go back and have a meal first. Take the afternoon to carefully read through that compendium of medicinal herbs several times, so you don't take so long to find the medicinal herbs next time... Additionally, if anyone comes to retrieve elixirs, do not give it to them... My god, where on earth did it go wrong?"
最后在江如虎耳边说的一段话，果然起效了！
The last statement he made at the side of Jiang Ruhu's ear had indeed been effective!
最后小梅林赢得了奥法药剂，而他却赢得了魔法公会的好感。
Little Merlin had won the Arcane Magic Potion at last, but Reuben Saruman had won the favor of the Guild of Magic.
最后恐惧战胜了理智，克伦威尔选择了逃避。
At last, fear had triumphed over reason, and Cromwell chose to escape.
最后想了想，还是从口袋里摸出了一只玻璃烧杯充数。
Finally, he thought it over and pulled out a glass beaker from his pocket instead.
最后想想这么极品的小号可不能浪费，于是林立干脆让小号练起各种生活职业来，这家伙也是狠人一个，不练就不练，一练就全练，只要能够学习的生活技能，他是一样也没落下，如今一个一级小号，却已经将锻造，炼金，药剂，附魔，铭文五大技能练到了高级，就连药物知识，矿物知识，烹饪手艺，卷轴制作等等一系列杂学，也统统升到了高级以上。

Finally, he thought he couldn't let such an outstanding smurf go to waste, hence he began training the smurf in various kinds of professions. The fellow was one of a hardy character. It was either no training at all, or all training at once. As long as it was a life skill to be learnt, he'd learn them all. Now, a level one mage like him had mastered all five basic skills—forging, alchemy, pharmaceutics, magical enchantment, and inscription—to the highest level. In addition to these, his knowledge on medicine, minerals, cooking, scroll making, and other general skills had also increased beyond the highest level.
最后是铭文……
...and finally inscription...
最后林立只能愤而分尸，一番变态蹂躏之后，生生将大名鼎鼎的毁灭巨龙抽筋剥皮，统统丢进了无尽风暴之戒内。

In the end, Lin Li could only dismember its body in anger. After a round of sick ravage, the famous Dragon of Destruction was skinned to the bones and all its remains thrown into the Ring of Endless Storm.
最后还是那受伤的中年男人胆子大一点，战战兢兢的走了过去：“尊敬的魔法师先生，感谢您的慷慨援助……”
At last, it was the wounded middle-aged man who plucked up his courage and approached him with caution. "Mr Mage, thanks for your generous help..."
最让克伦威尔无法忍受的是，这个突然出现的魔法师，似乎正对自己构成某种威胁。
What irked Cromwell the most was that the sudden appearance of this mage seemed to have posed some kind of threat to him.
最近灵兽山和镇西军招生在即，江云山亲自下令让勉强上得了台面的子弟全部闭关，要么修炼元力，要么磨练武技，此刻在演武殿内的子弟明显都天资不高，短时间内境界突破不了，只能磨练武技了。

The recruitment of the Mt. Spirit Beast College and West Garrison Army was to be hosted soon. Jiang Yunshan personally gave out the orders to allow all descendants that had certain levels of ability, to go into seclusion for cultivation of essence force or practice of martial arts. It was obvious that all the descendants in the Martial Arts Demonstration Hall did not have sufficient talents, and would be unable make a breakthrough within a short moment; which was why they could only hone their martial arts.
最近这几个家伙总是凑在一起，也不知道在商量些什么。
These guys had been coming together lately, but no one knew what exactly they were discussing.
有了那半瓶双足飞龙的血液开头，可供选择的话题就实在是太多了，早在整天对着安度因那张老脸的时候，不知听老家伙讲过多少奇闻逸事，此时随手捻来，骗骗小姑娘那实在是太轻松了。

With the half-bottled Wyvern’s blood as a conversation starter, there were just too many topics to choose and continue from. He had heard many anecdotes from Andoine back when he had to face him all day long. Now it was easy using them to lead young girls on.
有了麦格雷尼带路，这一路上林立总算是轻松了许多，毕竟这是一个有着近三十年狩猎经验的资深冒险者，用麦格雷尼的话来说，这三十年来他待在落日山脉的时间，甚至比在自己家里还多。

Lin Li felt a lot more relaxed with McGrenn leading the way. After all, he was a veteran adventurer with nearly 30 years of hunting experience. To quote McGrenn, in this 30 years he had spent more time in the Sunset Mountains than in his own home.
有些惊讶，也有些失落……
He was somewhat surprised, and somewhat dismayed...
有免费的灵神丹无限供应，加上武殿内浓郁的天地灵气，还有黑色元力辅助，江逸的修炼一日千里，快得让他暗暗咋舌。

天地灵气With free Spirit Pills being limitlessly provided to him, plus the thick heavenly and earthly spiritual aura in the Martial Arts Hall, in addition to the stimulus provided by the black essence force, Jiang Yi's power cultivation achieved rapid progress, so fast that it left him speechless in his heart.
有时候环境真是可怕，两天下来就连凯文这么老实的人，也是被毒害得谎话张口就来，说起传染病时神色焦急表情沉痛，就好象葛瑞安不是生病，而是被瘟疫感染了一样。

Sometimes the circumstance is a scary thing. Just after two days, someone as honest as Kevin was poisoned into lying every time he opened his mouth. He spoke of the infection with an anxious expression of pain, as if Gerian had not been ill but had been infected by a plague instead.
有毒的东西，林立总是很喜欢的，因为这意味着巨大的杀伤力。
Lin Li had always liked stuff that carried poison because it meant a deadly force.
有资格竞争的势力，都在争先恐后的捞钱。
Competent forces were scrambling to make money.
望着一步步逼近的安度因，霍伦只觉得一股恐惧从心头涌起。
As he saw Andoine drawing near, Hoeren only felt a wave of fear arising.
望着不留痕迹将金叶子收入袖中的荣管事，江逸内心闪过一丝厌恶，他沉声说道：“管事，这是孝敬您的！这次我是跟几个冒险者去山上采药，如果这次能弄到好东西，回来后还有孝敬，家族这边您……打点下。”

Jiang Yi watched Chief Rong slyly putting away the gold leaf, a silver of disgust wormed into his heart. He pitched his voice low, "Chief, this is my tributary offer to you! I'm leaving this time to go harvest herbs in the mountain with a few landlopers. If I happened to find anything good, there would be more tributes for you when I'm back. Please help to... deal with the family in the meantime."
望着丹炉内的几枚白黄色丹药，江逸眼眸陡然一亮，目前的他的确不能炼制丹药，但眼前不就是现成的丹药吗？虽然废了，但他回炉一下再注入黑色元力，说不定就能把这废丹变成好丹了……

Looking at the few white and yellow pills, Jiang Yi's eyes suddenly lit up. At the moment, it was true that he could not develop any elixirs by himself, but did he not have any ready-made elixirs in front of his eyes? Although they were deemed useless, if he reheated and injected some black essence force, surely he could turn these useless elixirs into good, useful elixirs...
望着堆满整个房间的药草，江逸无奈的退了出来，走进偏厅内想询问一下柳长老怎么区分药草，却看到柳长老正全神贯注的配置药粉，他进来站了好一会都没看他一眼……

Looking at the room full of medicinal herbs, Jiang Yi helplessly retreated. He walked into the side room, wishing to ask Elder Liu how one could differentiate between the various medicinal herbs. However, he saw Elder Liu deeply engrossed in configuring the medicinal ingredients, to the point that he did not even notice Jiang Yi despite having entered and stood there for quite a long time...
望着如一条爬虫般瘫软在地的江如虎，江逸眼中闪过一丝快意，在江家被这群人欺辱了这么多年，今日终于算是拿回来一些利息了。

Observing Jiang Ruhu, who was lying limply on the ground like a crawling insect, a sensed of elation flashed in Jiang Yi's eyes. Having been bullied by this bunch of people from the Jiang Clan for so many years, he could finally claim to have earned some interest back that day.
望着林立远去的背影，罗琳轻咬红唇，美目中透出复杂的情绪。
Looking at Lin Li's receding figure, Rowling bit her lips lightly. Her eyes revealed a complicated emotion.
望着正虚心听讲的老人，罗琳心里有些疑惑，这真是格林爷爷？
Looking at the old man who was listening modestly at the moment, Rowling had some doubts in her mind. Is this really Grandpa Grimm?
望着满脸从容，悠然转身朝丹房内走去的江逸，江如虎满眸迷茫起来。这还是以前那个经常被他们打得和狗一样的废物吗？怎么刚才那一瞬间给他感觉，江逸的气度比起江恨水还要有过之而无不及？

Seeing Jiang Yi's face filled with calm as he unhurriedly turned around to walk back in the direction of the alchemy lab, Jiang Ruhu was completely bewildered.
Was this the good-for-nothing that they usually beat up like a dog in the past? How could it be possible that that passing moment gave him a feeling that Jiang Yi's presence felt bigger than even that of Jiang Henshui?
望着眼前堆积如山的魔法书，林立才真正明白，为什么安度因那老家伙总是说，魔法的世界没有尽头的……这么多书，光是看目录就够看好几年的了，更别说研究上面记载的法术。

Looking at the mountainous pile of magic books in front of him, Lin Li finally understood why that old fellow Andoine always said that there was no end to the world of magic. With so many books, it would take him a few years just to read the table of contents, not to mention studying the spells that were recorded in them.
望着那个正一脸笑容的年轻魔法师，老梅林心中忽然充满了懊悔。
Looking at the young mage who was all smiles, Old Merlin was filled with regret.
望着那翩然离去的背影，林不由得呆住了，在街上站了很久，才想起看看手上的东西。
Lin Li was stunned as he stared at the figure that had just left. He stood at the street for a long time until he finally remembered the item in his hands.
本来这告示一出来，绝对会有很多人找江逸对练的，但江逸既然开口了，杨管事还指望他赚钱，也不好拂他的面子，从怀中取出一块令牌递给江逸道：“在武殿内学习武技本是要紫金的，不过你现在是紫金陪练，我可以给你个特权，你去藏书阁找白管事，任意学习三种人阶武技，这是我的令牌。给你五天假期，五天之后你必须上场陪练。”

Originally, with the release of this announcement, there would definitely be a lot of people who would seek Jiang Yi for sparring practice. However, since Jiang Yi had opened his mouth, while Manager Yang still counted on him to make money and knew that it was not good to brush him aside or make him lose face, Manager Yangdecided to retrieve a token from his breast-pocket and passed it to Jiang Yi. Manager Yang said, "To train one's martial arts techniques in the Martial Arts Hall, one should start off with paying purple gold. However, since you're a purple gold token-grade sparring partner now, I can grant you a certain special privilege. You can go to the Book Storage Pavilion and search for Manager Bai, and learn any three human-grade martial arts techniques, chosen at your own will. This is my command token. I'll let you take five days of leave, but after five days, you must go into the combat training field and conduct sparring practice."
杀死双足飞龙只不过是运气，那一支冰锥恰好扎进了双足飞龙的伤口，若不是因为这样，他早就被双足飞龙撕成碎片了。
It was only luck that he managed to kill the Wyvern with that shot of icicle piercing right into the Wyvern’s wound. If not for that, he'd long be torn to pieces by the Wyvern.
来之前就想好了说辞，却生生在肚子里憋了一个上午，克伦威尔就差没被憋出内伤来了，现在好不容易把凯文给逮住了，又哪还肯给他反抗的机会，自从双手抓住凯文之后，这家伙就再没松过手，从两人小时候的交情谈起，一直谈到梅林家与魔法公会悠久而深厚的友谊。

Cromwell had thought of his plea before he came, but because he had to hold it back for the whole morning, he had almost gotten sick from keeping it in for too long. Now that he finally caught up with Kevin, he'd never give him a chance to resist. He had not let up ever since he had a grab of Kevin's hands. He began with the friendship they had shared since childhood, and then went on to talk about the deep and long-standing friendship between the Merlin Family and the Guild of Magic.
来人是一个穿着火红色武士袍的少女，一脸扯高气昂，姿色算是中等，比起姬听雨还差一个档次，不过因为穿着紧身武士袍，将凹凸有致的身材完全显露出来，很是惹火。

Just as he thought of posing a few queries regarding the rules, the sound of footsteps rang from the corridor behind him. The manager immediately cast him away and sent him off with a smile.
The person who arrived was a teenage girl dressed in fiery-red martial artist robes. With an arrogant look on her face and moderately good looks, she was a level lower compared to Ji Tingyu. However, as she wearing body-hugging martial artist robes that made the shapely contours of her figure visible, she was attractive.
来到武殿已经整整一个月了，江逸除了修炼外都是破解封印符文。封印符文破解的速度很快，修炼的进展也很快，按他估计差不多还要一个半月，他就能达到铸鼎境四重了。

It had been a month since Jiang Yi came to the Martial Arts Hall. Besides cultivating, he spent all his energy on breaking the runic patterns on the seal. The progress for both was fast. By his estimation, it would only take approximately another month and half for him to reach the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
来到这个陌生的世界一个多月，林立心里第一次有了温暖的感觉，他恭恭敬敬的对安度因鞠了个躬：“谢谢。”
After more than a month in this unfamiliar world, Lin Li felt warmth for the first time. He bowed to Andoine respectfully and said, "Thank you."
杨管事一张老脸上都是不解和困惑，他看了画面很久还是惊疑不定，最终朝白发老者拱手道：“费老，您怎么看？”

Manager Yang's elderly face revealed a look of non-comprehension and confusion. He stared at the images for a very long time, but remained completely bewildered. Finally, he raised his hands in surrender towards the elderly man with white hair and said, "Elder Fei, what do you make of this?"
杨管事一挥手让护卫下去，这才笑容可掬的和江逸说道：“苍狼，我也不瞒你，开门见山的说了，我代表武殿想和你做一笔交易。”

Manager Yang waved his hands to send away the guard. It was only then that, beaming from ear to ear, he addressed Jiang Yi by saying, "Lone Wolf, I don't want to beat around the bush, so I will say this to you directly that, on behalf of the Martial Arts Hall, I would like to make a deal with you."
杨管事也是一愣，三位公子看到江逸带着铜牌面具更是满眸错愕，姬小姐铸鼎境八重和一个小小的铜牌陪练对战什么？一根手指头怕是就能戳死江逸吧？

Manager Yang similarly stared at her blankly, while the three gentlemen stared at Jiang Yi, who was wearing a bronze mask, with much astonishment in their eyes. How could Young Mistress Ji, with a power level at the eighth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, possibly choose to fight with a little bronze token-grade sparring partner? Would her finger alone not be able to stab Jiang Yi to death?
杨管事傻眼了，看着江逸也一副见鬼了的表情。这铸鼎境一重武者怎么可能是金牌陪练？要是人人都是金牌陪练，武殿也不用如此急迫的招人了……

Manager Yang was flabbergasted. He looked at Jiang Yi as though he had seen a ghost. How could this martial artist at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm be a gold-token-grade sparring partner? If everyone was a gold-token-grade sparring partner, then the Martial Arts Hall would not be so desperately hiring new staff...
杨管事哑然失笑，解释道：“苍狼，你只是受聘于武殿，你并不是武殿的人，换句话说你是在做工，我们付工钱。武殿内其余的几名金牌陪练也和我们有交易的，苍狼啊……你别把事情想得那么复杂，实话和你说吧，我就看重你变态的战斗本能，反应速度，准备培养你一番，让你成为顶级的金牌陪练，这样你能替武殿赚钱，就这么简单！”

Manager Yang laughed involuntarily and explained, "Lone Wolf, you're only being hired by the Martial Arts Hall. You're not one of the men of the Martial Arts Hall. In other words, you have a paid job, and we provide you the salary. The few other gold token-grade sparring partners in the Martial Arts Hall have also signed contractual deals with us. Lone Wolf... don't think about things in such a complicated manner. To tell you the truth, I take great interest and importance in your obscenely powerful natural ability in combat and reaction speed, and am ready to invest resources and nurture your skills, so that you can become a top-quality golden token-grade sparring partner. In this way, you can help the Martial Arts Hall make money. It's just that simple a situation!"
杨管事在听说江逸准备在武殿内闭关三月哪也不去，不仅没有半点不满，反而大方的免了江逸的食宿费。江逸能在这全力修炼，尽早提升到铸鼎境四重，武殿内就能快速增加一位金牌陪练，也能为他们赚取更多的银钱。要知道在这武殿内和陪练对战，金牌陪练那可是按每场收费的……

Manager Yang was not displeased at Jiang Yi's intention to go into seclusion at the Martial Arts Hall for three months. Rather, he generously waived Jiang Yi's boarding expenses. Jiang Yi was able to concentrate all his energy into cultivation to elevate his powers to the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. In doing so, the Martial Arts Hall would then acquire a gold token-grade sparring partner, who charged by each match...
杨管事坐了一小会，和门口的一名护卫吩咐道。护卫匆忙朝练功房方向走去，很快就把满眸疑惑的江逸带了进来。

Chief Yang sat down for a short while as he instructed a guard standing at the door. That guard hastily walked in the direction of the Technique Practising Room and very quickly brought Jiang Yi, with his eyes revealing emotions of confusion and doubt, into the room.
杨管事大笑，傲然说道：“不需要那东西，武殿不会违约，也从不怕……别人违约！行了，这瓶丹药你先拿着，你去大殿内修炼吧。这几天不到万不得已的情况，我不会让你上场的，你现在主要的任务就是修炼，尽快提升到铸鼎境四重。”

Manager Yang laughed loudly and proudly replied, "There's no need for that kind of thing. The Martial Arts Hall will never breach a contract, and has never been afraid... that someone else would breach a contract either! That's settled then. You hold on to this elixir bottle first. Head over to the interior of the Great Hall and cultivate your power. For these next few days, unless as an absolute last resort, I will not send you out for a sparring match. Your main task right now would be to cultivate your power and increase its level to the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm as soon as possible."
杨管事头疼的望着一群全部伤痕累累的陪练，又四处一扫其余练功房，看到没有一名白银陪练走出，只能无奈指着江逸道：“苍狼，出战。”

Nursing a headache, Manager Yang looked at the group of sparring partners, all of them riddled with injuries, before giving the rest of the technique-practicing rooms a sweeping glance. Seeing as none of the silver-token-grade sparring partners had left their rooms, he could only helplessly point at Jiang Yi and order, "Lone Wolf, you're up for combat."
杨管事急了，这好不容易招到一个好陪练，他怎么能眼睁睁看着江逸走？这几日他可是被这群公子小姐催得头顶冒烟了。连忙凑过来和江逸笑眯眯的说道：“苍狼，你是不是嫌弃钱少了？这样……你继续在这呆着，我给你按银牌陪练的钱算？十两银子一天，如何？”

Manager Yang was flustered. He had finally managed to hire a good sparring partner after so much difficulty. How could he allow himself to look on helplessly and allow Jiang Yi to leave willy-nilly? After all, he had been so hard-pressed by the demands of that group of young masters and young mistresses over the past few days that he was frustrated and fuming with rage. Hurriedly moving closer to Jiang Yi and beaming at him, Manager Yang said, "Lone Wolf, is it just that you simply dislike how low the pay is? In that case... you continue staying here, and I'll pay you the rate for a silver token-grade sparring partner? Ten taels of silver a day, how about that?
杨管事想不通，不过他知道如果下次江逸还来陪练，一定得想方设法留住他。如果他的确能帮助武殿内的公子小姐们武技快速大成，那么他的价值就不可估量了……

Manager Yang could not understand any of it. However, he knew that the next time Jiang Yi should ever return as a sparring partner, he had to find some way to make him stay. If he could indeed help the young masters and young mistresses in the Martial Arts Hall achieving phenomenal success in speeding up the improvements of their martial arts skills proficiency, then his value would be virtuely incalculable...
杨管事敞开来说了，江逸反而内心安定，他沉思了一会，最终眼中露出一丝狠色，咬牙道：“在这干五年可以，不过我有两个要求。”

With Manager Yang's full disclosure of his intentions, Jiang Yi on the other hand became more calm in his heart. He thought deeply for a while, before finally revealing a look of ruthlessness in his eyes. He gritted his teeth and responded, "I don't have a problem with working here for five years, but I have two requests."
杨管事淡淡一笑道：“很简单，你这算违约，按规矩要赔付百倍财物，我算了下差不多你要赔偿武殿一万两紫金，当然……如果你死了，这合约就自动解除。”

With faint smile, Manager Yang replied, "Very simple - this is considered a breach of contract. According to the rules stipulated, you would have to repay a hundred times worth in valuables. According to my calculation, you would owe the Martial Arts Hall almost ten thousand taels of purple gold. Of course... if you die, this contract will automatically be cancelled."
杨管事疑惑地眨了眨眼睛，询问道：“怎么了？翊小姐，那个陪练有问题？”
Puzzled, Manager Yang blinked his eyes and inquired, "What's the matter? Young Mistress Yi, was there a problem with that sparring partner?"
杨管事的确不在练功房，而是在附近的一个小房间内，他不是一个人，小房间内还有一个衣袍华贵的白发老者，两人正聚精会神的观看着墙壁上的一幅画面。

Manager Yang was indeed not in the Technique Practising Room, but rather in a small room nearby. He was not alone - there was an elderly man with white hair and elegant robes in the small room as well. The two men were attentively observing a painting on the wall.
杨管事笑着起身，点头道：“没问题，不过你必须在这干满十天之后，我才能给你预支，另外还有问题吗？没有的话，祝我们合作愉快！”

Manager Yang smiled as he stood up, before nodding and responding, "No problem, but you must work for ten full days here. Only then will I give you an advance on your pay. Are there any other questions? If not, I hope we have a good working partnership and business collaboration!"
杨管事脸色顿时变了，满眸都是悔意。这练功房对练，主要目的就是训练反应速度，战斗本能，还有磨砺武技。这三项都很难提升，需要长时间的对战和磨练，这也是练功房内封印元力的原因。

Manager Yang's facial expression suddenly changed, as his pupils became filled with remorse. The main purpose of conducting sparring practice at this Technique Practising Room was to facilitate the training of a person's reaction speed and combat instincts as well as improve a person's martial arts skills. It was very difficult to improve these three aspects, requiring a long time of combat practice and honing of skills. This was also the reason why the Technique Practising Room sealed off the use of essence force.
杨管事连忙把江逸原先戴的苍狼面具给江逸，朝旁边的一个下人打了个眼色，那人立即匆匆离去。
Manager Yang hurriedly passed to Jiang Yi the wolf mask he was originally wearing, before giving a visual signal to a servant standing next to him. That servant immediately left in a hurry.
杨管事连忙拱手俯身，等费老离去后，他才快步走到墙壁边上，一只手元力环绕按在一块石砖上，那墙壁上的画面神奇的消失了，又变成一面雪白的石墙。

Manager Yang promptly cupped his hands in greeting and bowed in sending Elder Fei off. It was only once Elder Fei had left that he walked with a quick pace to one of the walls. Using one of his hands, which had essence force revolving around it, to press on a stone brick, the image being broadcast on the wall magically vanished, becoming a snow-white stone wall face once again.
杨管事随意一摆手道：“你说吧，只要不过分都好说。”
Manager Yang nonchalantly waved his hands and replied, "Say it, it's all negotiable so long as it isn't too excessive or demanding."
杨管事颔首道：“没错，武殿会在两个月内全力培养你达到铸鼎境四重，你则必须在这当陪练五年，当然……武殿会根据你的实力，给予相对应的薪水，比如你实力是银牌陪练时，一天十两银子，实力达到金牌陪练时，一天一两紫金。”

Manager Yang nodded his head and replied, "That's right. The Martial Arts Hall will spare no expense in nurturing you over the next two months such that your power level reaches the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. In exchange, you must be a sparring partner here for five years. Of course... The Martial Arts Hall will, based on your power, give you the corresponding salary. For instance, when your power is on par with that of a silver token-grade sparring partner, the rate is ten taels of silver per day; when your power is on par with that of a gold token-grade sparring partner, the rate will be a tael of purple gold per day."
林立一句话出口，宾客众当场晕了三四个。
As soon as Lin Li uttered the words, a few guests had fainted right on the spot.
林立一只手捏着袋口，很小心很小心的抖了一抖，让少许星辰沙流入烧杯。
With one hand grasping the opening of the pouch, Lin Li shook it carefully, letting a little star sand into the beaker.
林立一手握紧点金棒，精确操纵着先前融入的那一丝精神力，在这一丝精神力的催动之下，尾端的魔力源泉开始运转，一股魔力从魔晶中缓缓放出，顺着那复杂的魔力回路流转，最后一一激活十三个魔力节点。

Lin Li tightened his grip on the gold rod with one hand and controlled with precision the mental strength he had previously imbibed. With the stimulation of the mental strength, the source of mana at the end of the gold rod began to run. A wave of mana was slowly released from the magical crystal and flowed through the complex magic circuit, at last activating the 13 magic nodes.
林立一直在想，这么炸来炸去，这倔老头会不会真有一天被炸出个好歹来……
Lin Li had been wondering whether the stubborn old man would be blown up one day.
林立一看葛瑞安如此郑重，也知道肯定不是小事，拉了张椅子过来坐下，静静等他开口。
Lin Li knew it wasn't a trivial matter seeing how serious Gerian was. He pulled a chair and took a seat, quietly waiting for Gerian to start.
林立一看葛瑞安那表情，就知道这老家伙肯定又弄了什么好处：“什么生意？说来听听……”
Lin Li knew the old fellow had to have gotten something good judging by the look on his face. "What business deal? Tell me..."
林立一看这丝黑线，心头就有了不祥的预感。
Lin Li had a foreboding feeling in his heart as soon as he saw the black line.
林立一记怒焰风暴出手，就感觉出了其中的异样，那剧烈而又沉闷的爆炸声，完全是两股魔法元素对冲造成的，若是直接击中巴瑟罗尔，根本就不会制造出如此浩大的声势，只需要一股烈焰就能将他瞬间吞没。

At the moment Lin Li unleashed the Flaming Storm, he sensed there was something different. The violent and muffled explosion was caused by the collision of two magical elements. If it had hit Bathrilor directly, it wouldn't have made such a great noise. It would only take a flame to engulf him in an instant.
林立一边往烧杯中添加宁神花汁液，一边细心计算着三种药水的比重，这中间他只是偶尔抬手擦去额头上的汗水，很快又埋下头去继续忙碌。

Lin Li added nectar from the peacebloom into the beaker as he meticulously calculated the ratio of the three potions. He had only raised his hand to wipe the sweat off his forehead occasionally, and then quickly buried his head back to work.
林立不是不知感恩的人，魔法公会上上下下对他怎么样，他心里比谁都清楚，特别是葛瑞安，更是几乎将公会未来都赌到了他身上，在这个时候，林立觉得自己有义务为公会出一份力。

Lin Li was not an ungrateful man. He knew most clearly how everyone in the Guild of Magic had treated him. Gerian, in particular, had even bet the guild's future on him. At that point, Lin Li felt obligated to contribute to the guild.
林立与凯文下了马车，很快就有仆人上前迎接，神色恭敬的从两人手中接过请柬，又殷勤的将两人迎进府内。
Lin Li and Kevin got out of the carriage, and soon a servant came up to meet them. He took the invitation card from them with great respect and politely escorted them into the mansion.
林立与葛瑞安面面相觑，这场拍卖已经远远超出了两人的估计，数十万金币，外加一百套精良的魔法装备，如果这最后十瓶再拍出天价的话，两人怕是真要沦落到用钱砸人玩的地步了……

Lin Li and Gerian looked at each other. The auction had far exceeded their estimates—hundreds of thousands of gold coins, and 100 sets of excellent magic equipment; if the last ten bottles were sold for a sky-high price, the two men would probably be reduced to the point of smashing people with money.
林立之所以会记得这个诅咒的名字，还是因为一种叫做死亡之心的草药。
The reason why Lin Li remembered the name of this curse was because of a herb called Heart of Death.
林立也是不敢怠慢，赶紧为自己施加了一个迅捷术，紧随中年冒险者身后跑了出去。
Lin Li did not tarry, either. He cast the Hastening Spell and followed after the middle-aged adventurer.
林立什么也没说，只是笑咪咪的望着葛瑞安。
Lin Li did not say anything. He watched Gerian with a grin on his face.
林立什么眼色，克伦威尔那表情落入眼里，又哪会不知道他在想些什么……
Lin Li was good at taking hints. As Cromwell's expressions fell into his eyes, he knew exactly what was going on in his mind...
林立从无尽风暴之戒中，又摸出了那把银质小刀，轻轻割开恶魔之泪的表皮，看到一滴汁液将要溢出之时，迅速将它丢进烧杯当中。
Lin Li pulled out the silver knife from the Ring of Endless Storm and gently cut off the skin of the devil's tears. When he saw a drop of succus about to spill, he quickly dropped it into the beaker.
林立从来就不是一个能闲住的人，手上掌握着这么个大杀器，又哪有不拿出来用用的道理？
Lin Li was not someone who could keep still. With such a deadly weapon in his hands, was there any reason not to use it?
林立仔细想了想，发现自己还真没什么事情可做，图书馆的咒语已经抄得差不多了，加入魔法公会的手续也已经办完，再加上凯文这几天跑上跑下，确实帮了自己不少的忙，要是连这点要求都拒绝，好象真不怎么厚道。

Lin Li thought over it carefully and realized he had nothing to do indeed. He had taken down the spells from the library, and the procedures for joining the Guild of Magic had been completed. Moreover, Kevin had been running around these days and had given him much help. It didn't seem kind of him to reject such a small request.
林立伸了个长长的懒腰，将桌上的书本一一放回原位，正打算离开图书馆的时候，却看见凯文走了进来。
Lin Li did a long stretch and returned the books to their original position. He was about to leave the library when he saw Kevin walking in.
林立俯身望着克伦威尔，脸上仍然带着笑容，只是眼中透出的凶光，却让克伦威尔毫不怀疑，他会在一抬手间杀死自己。
Lin Li bent over Cromwell, the smile never leaving his face. Only his eyes revealed a menacing light, such that Cromwell never doubted he'd kill him with a lift of his hand.
林立倒是老实，很干脆的就认了下来。
Lin Li remained honest and admitted frankly.
林立做梦也没有想到，在一堆宁神花药渣中，竟然能发现几片黑莲花的花瓣。
Lin Li could never dream that he'd discover the petals of a black lotus among the peacebloom dregs.
林立停下了魔力输出，将配好的龙血墨水放到一旁。
Lin Li stopped the output of his mana and placed the completed Dragon's Blood Ink at a side.
林立出了图书馆之后，很快就在一楼大厅找到了葛瑞安。
Lin Li left the library and very soon found Gerian in the hall on the ground floor.
林立刚一抬头，就看见一脸焦急的凯文往这边走来，也不知道是遇上什么事了，此时的凯文看上去神色焦急脚步匆忙，一张白皙的脸上，更是堆满了焦虑的表情。

Lin Li lifted his head and saw Kevin walking towards them with an anxious expression on his face. Something must have happened—Kevin looked tense and his footsteps were hurried; worry was written all over his fair face.
林立刚往前走出六七步远，就忽然察觉到四周魔法元素剧烈扭曲，他几乎是下意识的感觉不对，想要反应却已是有些来不及了，只好勉强撑起一面元素护盾。

Lin Li had just taken six or seven steps when he suddenly felt a violent distortion of the magical elements around him. Almost subconsciously, he felt something was wrong. But it was too late to react so he had barely managed to put up an elemental shield.
林立刚看见那一头如火的长发，两只眼睛就顿时睁圆了，他怎么也没有想到，居然会在城主府宴会上看见这个女人。
Lin Li's eyes widened as soon as he saw the fiery-red long hair. He never thought that he would see this woman at the banquet in the Castellan Mansion.
林立又将椅子挪了挪，给罗琳腾出位置，三人围着桌子重新坐下，老格林这才冲林立点了点头，示意他可以提出疑问了。
Lin Li shifted his chair to make room for Rowling. The three of them sat down again around the table. Old Grimm then nodded at Lin Li and signalled that he could ask his questions.
林立反应也是极快，人在空中飞速上升，心头却是异常冷静，也不见他如何吟唱咒语，只是一个奇异的手势，一发风刃已经发出了尖锐的破空之声。

But Lin Li reacted fast as well. He was ascending in the air at full speed, yet he was exceptionally calm. There wasn't any recitation of spell, only a peculiar hand gesture and the sound of a wind blade piercing the air was heard.
林立只是看了这些苍蝇一眼，然后又耐着性子挤到索兰面前：“麻烦帮我把昨天邮寄的物品都取出来。”
Lin Li only glanced at these wasps, then once again calmly wedged his way through to reach Suo Lan. "Would you help me get the mail items posted yesterday?"
林立可以容忍很多事，比如罗琳那自以为是的性格。
Lin Li could tolerate a lot of things, for example Rowling's self-righteous character.
林立向来性格谨慎，开始冲击附魔专业的时候，也一直以使用永恒精金棒为目标，甚至为此提前准备了好几块永恒精金锭。

Lin Li had always been cautious. When he had begun to jolt his magical enchantment profession, the use of Eternal Adamantine had always been his aim. He had even prepared several pieces of Eternal Adamantine in advance for this purpose.
林立听到这里就想笑，什么热心的魔法师先生，想泡你女儿才对吧，不然谁吃饱了撑的跑来落日山脉装热心……
Lin Li stifled a laugh at this. A warm-hearted mage? More like he's trying to court your daughter. Who else would be that idle coming to the Sunset Mountains being warm-hearted and all...
林立听着那声响，只觉得一阵头皮发麻。
Lin Li's scalp tingled upon hearing the sound.
林立咬了咬牙，从牙缝中吐出了三个字。
Lin Li clenched his teeth
林立回头望去，正看见一头火红的长发。
Lin Li turned around and saw a head of long, fiery-red hair.
林立在旁边一听，差点没笑出声来，怎么这年月胖子都喜欢当人叔叔？
Lin Li was listening at a side and he nearly burst out laughing. How come the fatties like to claim to be uncles nowadays?
林立在柜台前看了一会，很快就有一名身穿制服的女店员过来招呼。
Lin Li was browsing before the counter for a while before a female attendant in uniform came to greet him.
林立在炼金室里找了一圈，却始终找不到紫水晶容器，不由暗骂一声穷鬼魔法公会。
Lin Li looked around the alchemy lab but couldn't find the amethyst vessel. He couldn't resist cursing the poor, wretched Guild of Magic.
林立在药剂室里忙碌，本该过来制止的老法师，却怔怔的望着门外发呆。
While Lin Li was busy in the pharmacy lab, the old mage would usually come in to check instead of staring distracted out at the window.
林立在路上问了几个路人，很快就找到了翡翠之塔的方向。
Lin Li had asked several passers-by on the way and very soon found the direction to the Emerald Tower.
林立在进行枯燥的练习，安度因却并没有象往常一样，吃完饭就一头扎进药剂室里忙碌，今天的老法师似乎有些反常，吃完饭后就一直留在房内，不声不响的看着林立练习，这种被人窥视的感觉让林立有些不太舒服，于是他不得不中断练习，抬起头来盯着老法师问道：“前几天教你的清晰药剂配方学会了？”

On other days, Andoine would keep himself busy in the pharmaceutical lab after breakfast. However, he stayed in his room that day and quietly watched Lin Li train. It made the latter uncomfortable to know that someone was watching him, so he stopped and looked at the old mage as he asked, “Have you learned the formula of the Clarity Potion I taught you a few days ago?”
林立在迷宫中绕了很久，穿过了一条又一条的通道，才猛的觉得前方豁然开朗。
Lin Li circled the maze for a long time and went through one passage after another, when he suddenly saw light ahead.
林立在那强大的斗气压迫下，却是丝毫不为所动，口中说出的话更是一点也不客气：“怎么，说不过就想动手？你连麦格雷尼先生的病因都查不出来，还敢大言不惭负责治疗，你以为这是什么？这不是阿猫阿狗，这是一条活生生的人命！你到底想没想过，如果我今天被你赶走了，你又治不好麦格雷尼先生的病该怎么办？真不知道你老师怎么教你的，拿人命来开玩笑，你不是庸医是什么？”

Lin Li did not budge under the oppression of such strong anger, and the words he uttered were not at all polite. "Why? Starting a fight because you can't outspeak me? You couldn't even find out the cause of Mr McGrenn's illness yet you had the audacity to say you'll be responsible for his treatment. What do you think this is? This is not just any beast, it's a human's life! Have you ever thought what will you do if I was chased out by you and you couldn't cure Mr McGrenn? I really don't know how your teacher has taught you, treating someone's life as a joke. How are you not a quack?"
林立好说歹说，最后还是弄了一瓶，总算把这老怨妇给打发走了。
Lin Li tried every possible way to persuade him, but at last he got him a bottle and sent the aggrieved hag away.
林立完全没费什么力气，就将谈话节奏纳入了自己的掌握当中。
It took Lin Li absolutely no effort to bring the rhythm of the conversation under his control.
林立对这条协议还是比较满意的，身为一名穿越者，他比其他人更清楚宣传的力量，特别是在一个剑与魔法的世界里，身后如果站着加洛斯魔法公会这样的庞然大物，就算是买药也能比别人卖得欢快一些。

Lin Li was satisfied with the agreement. Being a time traveller, he knew the power of publicity more than anyone else. Especially in a world of swords and magic, if you had a giant like the Jarrosus Guild of Magic standing behind you, you could sell the medicine more readily than others.
林立将在加洛斯魔法公会拥有仅次于会长的特权，而与之相应的，他所生产出来的药剂，公会将会拥有优先购买的权利，这才是胖老头天天跑来药剂室关心的目的。

Lin Li would have the next highest privilege second to the President in the Jarrosus Guild of Magic. Correspondingly, the guild would have the priority rights to purchase the potions he produced. That was the reason behind the fat old man running to the potion lab everyday.
林立将大半烧杯净化药剂喂进了麦格雷尼口中，又细心的给他按摩了一阵，以便让药剂尽早发挥作用。
Lin Li fed half a beaker of Purifying Potion into McGrenn's mouth and massaged him for a while to make the potion work as soon as possible.
林立将点金棒放在台上，终于是长长的吁了口气。
Lin Li placed the gold rod on the platform and finally heaved a long sigh of relief.
林立已经在图书馆里坐了两天了，魔法书上记录的咒语大概有二三十条，这都是他认为有用的魔法。
Lin Li had been sitting in the library for two days. There were about twenty or thirty spells recorded in the magic book, all of which he thought were useful.
林立已经在这片森林里转了三天了，自从三天前踏进这片森林，林立的心情就再没好起来过，这见鬼的森林就仿佛一座庞大的迷宫，不管林立从哪里出发，也不管他在森林里怎么摸索，等到他精疲力尽想坐下来休息的时候，似乎都总会发现，眼前的树木看上去竟是如此的眼熟……

Lin Li had been walking around in this forest for three days. Ever since he stepped into this forest three days ago, Lin Li's spirits were permanently dampened. This cursed forest was like a huge labyrinth. Regardless where he had started out from and how hard he had fumbled to find his way out, each time he felt exhausted and sat down to rest, he'd find the trees in front of him ever so familiar...
林立干完这一切，正要退出山洞的时候，却忽然闻到一股腥臭。
Lin Li was about to leave the cave after finishing his chore when he inhaled a foul stench.
林立弯腰捡起水袋，放在耳边摇了一下，发现里面的清水还有半袋之多。
Lin Li bent down and picked up the water bag. He put it by his ear and gave it a shake, realizing it was still half-full.
林立强忍着香气的诱惑，将这小半烧杯药剂，倒进早已准备好的玻璃瓶中，然后用力将瓶口塞紧。
Bearing the temptation of the fragrance, Lin Li poured the contents of less than half of the beaker into the glass bottle he had prepared and then secured the bottle opening tightly.
林立很小心的拿起一片黑色花瓣，慢慢将它浸入烧杯当中。
Lin Li gingerly picked up a petal and slowly immersed it in the beaker.
林立心头一暖，脸上也露出了几分笑容：“没什么，就是被吓着了……”
Lin Li's heart warmed and he broke into a small smile: "It's nothing, only that I was slightly frightened..."
林立心头有些焦急，也没来得及跟葛瑞安打招呼，只是找到凯文说了一下：“朋友出了点事，我得过去看看究竟是什么情况，你一会帮我跟葛瑞安交代一声。”
Lin Li was rather anxious and did not have the time to inform Gerian. He found Kevin and told him, "My friend's in trouble and I have to go take a look, help me inform Gerian later."
林立心里很清楚，凯文既然这么说，那肯定是真的出事了……
Lin Li knew very well that since Kevin had said so, something had to have happened...
林立忽然想起，中年人先前喊的那个名字，似乎正是安度因要自己来找的人。
Lin Li suddenly recalled—the name that the middle-aged man had called out seemed to be the one of the very person that Andoine had told him to look for.
林立想谦虚两句，却又发现气氛有些不对，于是干脆闭上嘴巴，老老实实的听安度因说下去。

Lin Li wanted to humbly say a few words of consolation, however, he realized that the atmosphere was not right. He thought to himself, Might as well keep my mouth shut and listen conscientiously to what Andoine has to say.
林立想都没想，就给出了答复：“没兴趣！”
Lin Li replied without even thinking about it, "Not interested!"
林立手上稍稍一用力，将项链上坠着的谜蓝宝石扯了下来，然后看也不看，随手就抛给了葛瑞安，魔力储存虽然强大，但对林立来说，其实真没什么太大的用处，真要连他那近乎无限的魔力都给耗尽了，多一块谜蓝宝石估计也没什么区别……

With a slight use of strength Lin Li pulled the Enigma Sapphire from the necklace. He tossed it to Gerian without even taking a look at it. Although storing mana was a powerful ability, to Lin Li, it was not really of much use. If his almost-infinite mana was exhausted, one more piece of Enigma Sapphire would probably make no difference...
林立手腕一抖，泰罗果就落进了烧杯里，跟着又念了一个气爆术的咒语，只是林立控制得很小心，魔力一点一点的释放出来，让一个充满攻击性的气爆术变成了缓慢的挤压，这一幕若是落入葛瑞安眼中，多半又要让胖老头吃上一惊，如此微妙的魔力控制，一般魔法师至少要十年才能锻炼出来。

With a twitch of his wrist, the terocone fell into the beaker, followed by a Gas Blast Spell. But Lin Li had controlled it carefully, releasing his mana bit by bit, turning an aggressive Gas Blast Spell into a slow compress. If Gerian had seen this scene it would probably surprise him again. Such a subtle mana control would probably take at least a decade for an average mage to achieve.
林立执意要走，伊娜也留他不住，只能将他送出门口。
Lin Li had insisted on leaving, so Ina could not make him stay and had to see him out of the door.
林立抢先一步将伊娜接住，回身却又是一记迟缓术落到利维坦猩猩身上。
Lin Li caught Ina before she hit the ground before turning around to cast a Delaying Spell on the Leviathan Gorilla.
林立抬头在宴会厅中望了一眼，却发现刚才自己跟巴瑟罗尔互相偷袭，竟把好好的一个宴会大厅高得乱七八糟，此时放眼望去，竟是找不到一处又僻静又干净的地方……

Lin Li lifted his head and glanced around the banquet hall, only to find the place a mess due to the sneak attacks he and Bathrilor made on each other. At the moment, there was not a clean and secluded place in sight...
林立抬头望去，正看见凯文一脸愁苦。
Lin Li looked up to see Kevin with a face full of sorrow.
林立抬眼望去，正看见葛瑞安那个便宜侄子走进花园，在他身后跟着的，仍然是那两个强者随从。
Lin Li looked up and saw Gerian's convenient nephew walked into the garden, still followed by the two powerful attendants.
林立抬起头来一看，这幢看起来随时可能倒下的小屋外立着一块牌子，牌子上龙飞凤舞的写着几个大字——“加洛斯交易所”
Lin Li looked up. There was a sign outside the hut that looked like it was ready to fall off anytime. A few big words were written on the sign in dexterous calligraphy—Jarrosus Exchange.
林立拿起已经冷却的点金棒，然后手上稍稍一用力，就将魔晶镶在了点金棒尾端，之后是一红一绿两块宝石，分别被林立镶在了点金棒两侧。

Lin Li picked up the cooled gold rod, and with a slight exertion of strength in his hands, he set the magical crystal onto the tip of the gold rod, followed by the ruby and emerald which were set at either side of the rod.
林立拿起手边的点金棒，蘸满龙血墨水的水晶笔飞快跳跃，在点金棒上勾勒出一根根线条，自从看见深邃之银，这一根根线条，已在林立脑海中回放过不知几千几百次，此时的每一笔每一画，都经过了无数次的构思，哪里该布下魔力节点，哪里该构筑魔力回路，完全无需犹豫，只要笔尖轻轻划过，一根根线条已仿佛浑然天成。

Lin Li picked up the gold rod at hand. The crystal pen dipped in the dragon's blood ink leaped swiftly, sketching lines on the gold rod. Since seeing the deep silver, these lines had been played back in Lin Li's mind hundreds and thousands of times. Every line and stroke had been conceived countless times. There was no need to hesitate where to set the magic nodes and where to construct the magic circuits. With merely a gentle brush of the nib, the lines were there as if undesigned.
林立探出头去望了一眼，却发现这位镀金玫瑰的主人，似乎年轻得有些过分了，看上去不过二十多岁，还不到三十岁的样子，容貌俊秀，白净斯文，身上带着浓浓的书卷气，让人一见之下不由大生好感。

Lin Li looked up and cast a glance, only to find that the owner of the Gilded Rose seemed a little too young. He looked to be in his twenties and not quite 30. He was handsome, fair, and refined, exuding a scholarly aura that would leave a good impression on people.
林立无奈的走了上去，打算劝安度因两句。
Lin Li couldn't help but walk up to Andoine, planning to warn him.
林立是在一间木屋里醒来的，大概是因为仓促搭建的关系，木屋看上去有些简陋，一张椅子一张床，就是房间里所有的家具，房门是虚掩着的，一股刺鼻的药味从缝隙间透入，熏得林力半天睁不开眼来。

Lin Li woke up in a log cabin. Probably due to the hasty construction, the cabin looked a tad shabby. There was no furniture except for a chair and a bed in the room. The door was unlatched and a pungent odor of medicine wafted through the cracks, so Lin Li could not open his eyes for a long time.
林立曾经听安度因讲过，这是利维坦猩猩特有的建筑方式，它们用藤条编织成一张巨网，领地扩张到什么地方，巨网就覆盖到什么地方，对于利维坦猩猩来说，这张巨网既是它的巢穴，也是它最有力的武器，凭借着这一张巨网，利维坦猩猩能够办到许多连高级魔兽都无法办到的事。

Lin Li had heard Andoine mention that this was the unique way of construction for the Leviathan Gorilla. They used the rattans to weave a giant net, which would cover wherever their territory expanded. To the Leviathan Gorilla, this giant net was both its nest and its most powerful weapon. With this giant net, the Leviathan Gorilla could do many things that other high-level magical beasts could not.
林立有些奇怪，顺手把画布捡了起来。
Feeling somewhat puzzled, Lin Li picked up the canvas.
林立有些奇怪：“介绍给我干什么？”
Lin Li was slightly puzzled. "Introduce to me for what?"
林立有些好奇：“咦……那几个家伙怎么舍得放你走的？”
Lin Li was a little puzzled. "Eh... How were those fellows willing to let you go?"
林立望了一眼天空中消散的彩虹，慢慢将锻炼技能所余下的材料收进背包，亲眼目睹了神迹之后，那数十名围观玩家早就没有了杀人越货的念头，满面呆滞的看着林立收拾材料，却是谁也不敢动上一动。

Lin Li took a look at the fading rainbow. Slowly, he picked up the remaining materials for training and kept them in his bag. After witnessing a miracle, the players no longer had the thoughts of banditry in their minds. They watched dumbstruck as Lin Li packed the materials, but no one dared to move an inch.
林立望着天空中的彩虹，微微犹豫了一下，这才深深的吸了口气：“我的愿望是提升我所有的生活技能水平！”
Lin Li gazed at the rainbow. He hesitated slightly before taking a deep breath, then said, "My wish is to increase the levels of all my life skills!
林立望着憔悴的麦格雷尼，有些不知该如何是好。
Lin Li looked at the gaunt McGrenn, unsure what to do.
林立查看了一下自己的技能状态，四种主要技能果然已经达到宗师级别，而各种杂学也多在大师级别以上，想想无尽世界开放一年多来，别说一个五系宗师，就连找一个单系大师恐怕都很难。

Lin Li checked his skill form. Four of the main skills had indeed reached the level of a guru, and most of the general skills were also beyond the level of a master. Thinking back to the year since the opening of the Endless World, there had never been a guru well-versed in all five series; even a master in one series was hard to find.
林立正在那等人把深邃之银项链送来，谁知冷不丁一声“葛瑞安叔叔”落入耳中，吓得他差点没把自己的舌头给咬断。
Lin Li was waiting for someone to deliver the deep silver necklace to him when he heard "Uncle Gerian" all of a sudden and almost bit his tongue off out of shock.
林立正站在门口发愣，却忽然听到一阵争吵声从楼上传来。
Lin Li stood at the door, bewildered. Just then, he heard a commotion coming from the upper story.
林立正要开口，却忽然听见一阵风声从头上传来。
Just as Lin Li was about to speak, he suddenly heard the sound of wind above his head.
林立没再继续追问，只是在心头暗想，看来安瑞尔世界，比自己想象中还要复杂一些。
Lin Li did not question further. In his mind, he thought, Anril World is much more complicated than I expected it to be.
林立沿着运河一路往贸易区走去，身后却多了数十条各怀鬼胎的尾巴。
As Lin Li walked along the canal towards the trade zone, there were dozens of men with devil tails trailing behind him.
林立注意到，克伦威尔追出去的时候，中年冒险者的脸色好象不怎么好，当然，这种事他自然是不会去问，只是笑了笑，便又烤起火来。

Lin Li noted that the expression of the middle-aged adventurer did not seem too good after Cromwell had chased out of the cave. Of course, he would not ask about this sort of thing; instead, he smiled and went back to warm himself by the fire.
林立渐渐感到，自己的一缕意识正轻飘飘的往上浮去，他甚至可以看到另一个自己正软软的躺在椅子上，惊骇之下林立猛的抬起头来，头顶竟是漆黑一片，那是真正的黑暗，没有任何一丝杂质搀杂其中，哪怕是一丝光亮投去，也会一点不深的被吸引那无尽的黑暗当中……

Lin Li gradually felt his stream of consciousness floating away. He could even see another image of him lying sluggishly on the chair. Lin Li jerked his head up in horror. It was pitch-black above him—real darkness, without a hint of foreign matter. Even if there was a sliver of light shining into it, it would be devoured by the endless darkness, with nothing left behind.
林立点了点头，将手按到了水晶球上。
Lin Li nodded and placed his hands on the crystal ball.
林立现在要做的，就是在这数十中金属中，选出点金棒的材料。
What Lin Li had to do now was to select the materials for the gold rod from the dozens of metals.
林立甚至已经感觉到了，那利爪上带着的森森寒气……
Lin Li could even sense the chill of the claws...
林立用这么一句话，做出了最后的结论。
Lin Li concluded with the sentence.
林立的施法速度实在太快，众人还没来得及反应过来，巴瑟罗尔就又是发出一声惨叫，两根细长的冰锥锋利无比，生生将巴瑟罗尔两只手掌穿透，一时间只见鲜血淋漓，溅在厚厚的地毯上殷红一片……

The speed of Lin Li casting a spell was too fast. Before the crowd could react, Bathrilor let out another scream yet again. The two slender, razor-sharp icicles pierced through Bathrilor's palms, and in an instant, fresh blood poured out and drenched the thick carpet red.
林立的表现远远超出了他意料之外，冷静而又高效，哪怕是狮蝎尾巴已经刺到眼前的时候，他也没有停止过迟缓术的吟唱，紧接着放出的一个光亮术，更是仿佛神来之笔，就连安度因自己都没有想到，光亮术居然还能有这样的用处。

Lin Li's performance was far beyond his expectations. He was calm yet efficient. Even when the Manticore's tail was right in front of him, he never stopped reciting of the Delaying Spell. The Illuminating Spell that followed right after was even more so a stroke of genius. Even Andoine himself had not thought that the Illuminating Spell could be put to such use.
林立的进步实在是太快了，快得连老法师都没法适应。
Lin Li’s improvement was indeed so quick that it was unbelievable for an old mage like Andoine.
林立皱了皱眉头，放出了一个侦测法术。
Lin Li frowned and cast a Detection Spell.
林立皱着眉头听伊娜说完，却始终想不起，有什么魔法能造成这样的效果，想了想还是决定先去看看再说。
Lin Li frowned as he listened to Ina, but he could not recall what kind of magic could have done that, so he decided to have a look after much thought.
林立盯着那张胖脸看了许久，终于确定葛瑞安不是在开玩笑：“你是认真的？”
Lin Li stared at the chubby face for a long time and finally confirmed that Gerian wasn't joking. "You're serious?"
林立看见这一幕，不由暗自摇了摇头。
Lin Li could not help but shake his head seeing this.
林立硬着头皮点了点头，正打算问他收不收的时候，老头却已经是一拍桌子：“一共八千金币，卖不卖？”
Lin Li nodded reluctantly. He was about to ask the old man if he would take them when the old man pounded the desk. "8000 gold coins for all, will you sell?"
林立确实没有猜错，第二轮拍卖开始的时候，又是达芙妮第一个报出了价格。
Lin Li was indeed correct. When the second round of auction began, Daphne was once again the first person to offer a bid.
林立确实没有猜错，还在很远的地方，两人就听见了伊娜的哭声。
Lin Li had guessed it right. Still far away, the two men heard Ina crying.
林立笑了笑刚要转身，却忽觉一阵香风袭来，刚刚还俏脸通红的伊娜，终于鼓起了勇气，将一件东西塞到了林立手心：“这个送给你！”

Lin Li smiled and was about to turn around when he suddenly felt a gush of sweet wind. Ina, who was blushing just a moment ago, finally summoned up her courage and stuffed an item into the palm of his hand. "This is for you!"
林立笑得一脸随和，暗中却已凝聚起了一枚风刃。
Lin Li smiled agreeably but he had already assembled a wind blade in secret.
林立第一眼看见戒指，就被上面的钻石吸引住了。
Lin Li was instantly attracted to the diamond when he first laid eyes on the ring.
林立等了很久，才终于是等到了这个机会的出现。
Lin Li waited for long before he finally got his chance.
林立脑子里忽然一个念头闪过，他觉得自己好象抓住了点什么。
Suddenly, an idea flashed across his mind, and he felt as if he had grasped something.
林立脸上仍带着笑容，甚至在走近克伦威尔身前的时候，还礼貌的跟他打了声招呼：“好久不见，克伦威尔魔法师。”
Lin Li had kept the smile on his face. He had even greeted Cromwell politely as he approached. "Long time no see, Mage Cromwell."
林立花了差不多一个小时，才将地下荒原上的幽灵草采完，即便是以林立的身家，也不舍得放过其中一根，比起野钢花来，幽灵草的用处实在是太多了，除了精练智慧药剂之外，迅捷药水，石化药水，这些实用性相当广泛的药水中，也同样少不了幽灵草的存在。

It took Lin Li almost an hour to gather all the ghostskins from the underground wild land. Even with his assets, he was not willing to let go of any of it. Compared with the wild steelbloom, ghostskin had too many uses. Besides refining the Wisdom Potion, it could also be found in potions that had broader applications, like the Hastening Potion and Petrifying Potion.
林立药剂师的身份，随着加洛斯最强法师之战不径而走，现在大半个加洛斯城都知道了，魔法公会有一个年轻的药剂师叫费雷，他今年甚至还不满二十岁，大概是因为药剂师的光环太过耀眼的缘故，以至于很多人都忽略了，他其实还是一名八级魔法师。

The revelation that Lin Li was that pharmacist spread like wildfire following the battle between the most powerful mages in Jarrosus. Now, more than half of Jarrosus City knew about the young pharmacist named Felic in the Guild of Magic and that he was not even 20 years of age. Perhaps due to the overwhelming glory of being the pharmacist, many people actually overlooked the fact that he was also a level-eight mage.
林立被他哭得心情更加烦躁，干脆放下酒杯站起身来：“你不走是吧？那我走！”
Lin Li was made even more frustrated by her crying. He placed his wine glass down and stood up. "You're not leaving? Then I'll leave!"
林立被推得连连后退：“有话好好说，别推行不行？”
Lin Li stumbled a few steps back. "Can we talk nicely without any pushing?"
林立觉得自己挺冤枉，就好象莫名其妙的被一条疯狗咬了似的，从头到尾他都没对伊娜起过什么心思，结果还是被克伦威尔这条疯狗给盯上了。

Lin Li felt quite wronged, it was as if he had been bitten by a mad dog for no particular reason. He hadn't had cared much for Ina from the beginning, but he was still targeted by the mad dog Cromwell.
林立话说了半截，却并不揭晓答案，只是笑眯眯的坐在床头，望着红发美女的目光中充满了戏谑，那神情就好象是在说，想知道？可我就不告诉你……
Lin Li stopped mid-sentence and did not reveal the answer. He sat grinning on the bed, looking at the redheaded beauty teasingly. The expression seemed to say: want to know? But I won't tell you...
林立费了很大力气，才听清她在说些什么，一时间不由有些好笑：“你故意支开城主敌人，就是为了要跟我说这些？”
Lin Li spared a great deal of effort before finally making out what she had said, and felt it amusing in that moment. "You sent the Castellan away on purpose just to tell me this?"
林立走进会客室，正看见葛瑞安那张胖脸。
Gerian's chubby face came into sight as soon as Lin Li stepped into the reception room.
林立赶紧打开无尽风暴之戒，从里面摸出了一红一蓝两瓶药水，按照三比一的比例，小心的倒进一只烧杯当中，两中药水一经混合，立刻在药剂室里弥漫起一阵酸涩的气味。

Lin Li quickly opened up the Ring of Endless Storm and took out two bottles of potion—a blue one and a red one. Sticking to the ratio of three to one, he carefully poured them into a beaker. Once the two potions were mixed, it immediately gave off an acidic smell in the potion lab.
林立跟着那苍老的声音望去，正看见一名身穿灰色法师袍的老人。
Lin Li's eyes followed the source of the aged voice and saw an old man wearing a gray mage robe.
林立这一生最恨的就是庸医误人，当初若不是那个该死的庸医，父亲又怎么会落下终身残疾，虽然如今已是两世为人，但深深刻在心底的伤痛与厌恶，却是无论如何也无法抹去，在质问红发美女的时候，林立已是不知不觉的将她当成了那个该死的庸医。

What Lin Li hated most in his life was quack doctors ruining the life of someone. If it hadn't been for the darned quack, his father would not have been left with a lifelong disability. Although his father had escaped death, but pain and disgust for quacks were deeply engraved in Lin Li's heart and could not be erased no matter what. When he was questioning the redheaded beauty, Lin Li had unconsciously taken her as the darned quack.
林立这大半天都被椰子雨砸得苦不堪言，这时候占了上风哪还会跟利维坦猩猩客气，“嗖嗖嗖”一连十几记风刃射出去，直射得那死猩猩连头都抬不起来，风刃本身只是低级法术，但在彻底摆脱咒文束缚之后，却成了最直接有效的攻击手段，再加上林立有变态精神力的支持，一时间风刃简直是有如那啥江水连绵不绝……

For most of the day, Lin Li had to suffer from the shower of coconuts. Now that he had gained the upper hand he was done being polite with the Leviathan Gorilla. Dozens of wind blades were shot out with a swoosh, such that the darned gorilla couldn't even lift its head. The Wind Blade Spell was a low-level spell, but after breaking away from the restraint of the chant, it had became the most direct and effective mean of attack. Along with the support of an abnormal mental strength, the wind blades were like a river flowing unceasingly...
林立这才露出满意的笑容，往前走出几步，又有些不太放心的问了一句：“不会被赶出来吧？”
Lin Li smiled with satisfaction. He took a few steps forward and asked doubtfully, "I won't get chased out?"
林立这边才刚喘了口气，巨网上的利维坦猩猩却又“嘎嘎嘎”的怪笑起来，林立抬眼望去，正看见这厮不知从哪里又弄了一大堆的椰子回来，一看这副景象，林立真是觉得头都大了，要是不把那巨网给解决掉，自己今天跑真要被椰子活活砸死了。

Lin Li had just caught his breath when the Leviathan Gorilla on the giant net began to cackle again. Lin Li looked up just in time to see another pile of coconuts this fiend had brought back. Lin Li was distressed at the sight. If he did not get rid of the giant net, he would really be killed by those coconuts today.
林立远远望着老梅林，从他身上只看到了两个字，那就是——“差距”
Lin Li stood watching Old Merlin from afar. He could only see one word from him: difference.
林立远远看了一眼，发现这个萨鲁曼家族族长，身上的气息似乎有些怪异，那是一种很纯粹的感觉，与实力强弱无关，也与魔法波动无关，只是纯粹的感觉这人有些怪异，就好象死气沉沉的，不管怎么看，都总会给人一种不舒服的感觉。

Lin Li took a glance from a distance and found the aura coming out from the leader of the Saruman Family a little peculiar. It was pure feeling, not about strength nor magical wave. It was just sheer sense that this person was weird, as if he was dead. And however you looked at it, it'd always give you an uncomfortable feeling.
林立远远站在塔下，看着两个大魔导士间的对决，他忽然发现自己以前的战斗方式其实并不那么完美。
Lin Li stood at the bottom of the tower a distance away. He'd realized his previous battling styles were in no sense perfect after watching the battle of the two archmages.
林立郁闷的摸了摸鼻子，这老家伙简直比葛瑞安还能扯……
Lin Li touched his nose sullenly. This old fellow could talk more crap than Gerian...
林立长长的吁出口气，再看看手上的深渊秘银点金棒，已是在无先前粗糙的影子，光泽幽暗深邃，花纹精致细腻，两枚纯净闪亮的宝石点缀之下，更是透出一股神秘而华丽的气息。

Lin Li let out a long sigh and looked at the abyss mithril gold rod on his hand. It had no trace of the previous coarseness. The luster was dark and abysmal, the patterns exquisite and delicate. Under the embellishment of the two sparkling pure gemstones, a mysterious yet resplendent aura was revealed.
林立闻了闻药味，知道这老家伙又放了智慧之树树叶。
Lin Li took a smell of the medicine and knew the old man had added leaves from the Wisdom Tree once again..
林间道路本就狭窄，两人并排而行，自是难免靠得近了一些，闻着伊娜身上传来的淡淡清香，林立忽然觉得有些头疼，这一路上也不知道怎么回事，金发美女似乎总喜欢问自己一些问题。

The forest paths were narrow and it was hard to avoid being close when two people walked side-by-side. Breathing in the faint scent coming from Ina's body, Lin Li suddenly felt his head hurting. He wasn't sure what happened on the way, but the blond beauty seemed to like asking him questions.
果然……
True enough...
果然！
Sure enough!
枯燥的练习最容易让人失去兴趣，但林立却丝毫没有不耐烦的意思，因为他心里很清楚，老安度因虽然是个糟糕的药剂师，但在魔法领域里，这个脾气暴躁的糟老头子却是不折不扣的权威，他的意见虽不能说绝对正确，却也远远好过自己一个外行独自摸索。

Though tedious training made one lose interest quickly, Lin Li showed no signs of annoyance. He knew very well that despite being a terrible pharmacist with a nasty temper, old Andoine was undoubtedly an authoritative figure in the field of magic. His opinions might not be precise, but it was far better than having himself, an amateur, fumbling about on his own.
查探到丹田内储存下来的十缕黑色元力只剩下一缕了，江逸摇头叹气起来，这陪练活儿看来不适合他啊。要是那翊小姐再坚持一会，等他黑色元力消耗干净，他就原形毕露等着挨揍了……

Checking the ten wisps of black essence force in his dantian and realizing that he only had one wisp left, Jiang Yi shook his head and sighed. It seemed like this sparring partner job was not suited for him. If that Young Mistress Yi persevered for a little longer, and if his black essence force was fully consumed, his original condition would be fully revealed and he would have to endure getting beaten up...
柳河长相比起黑旗要差上一些，不过肩宽腰细，体态完美，他也不是傻子，淡然一笑道：“听雨小姐，明天见！”

Liu He was slightly inferior to Heiqi in terms of looks. However, with broad shoulders and a slim waist, his figure was the epitome of perfection. He was no fool either, and bid his goodbye with a light smile, "Young Mistress Tingyu, I'll see you tomorrow!"
柳长老一看之下，脸色更加暴怒了几分，目光如刀子般在江逸脸上扫过，手上红色元力滚滚而出，就要一掌朝江逸拍下。

Upon looking into the cauldron, Elder Liu's wrath grew further. His gaze cut across Jiang Yi's face like a knife as the red essence force on his hand rolled. He was getting ready to hit Jiang Yi with one slap.
柳长老不炼丹了，他可就没废丹了，也就不能炼制丹药卖钱了，凭他自己要想炼制丹药，那根本是不可能的事。

If Elder Liu stopped refining elixirs, he would not have any more rejected elixirs. This meant that he would no longer have any more refined elixirs to sell. It was an impossibility to even think of relying on himself alone to produce elixirs.
柳长老不知道昨日那两枚地阶丹药是江逸注入了两缕黑色元力，以为是不小心添加了其他的药剂，让原本的丹方改变，错打错着炼出了地阶丹药。

Elder Liu did not know that the two Earth-tier elixir pills he got yesterday were created when Jiang Yi injected two wisps of essence force. Instead, he assumed that he had accidentally added other medicinal ingredients and changed the original elixir formula, wrongly and unintentionally refining an Earth-tier elixir.
柳长老也被江逸惊醒，目光一扫，微微颔首道：“不错，比江松那个废物勤奋多了，对了……你叫什么来着？”

Elder Liu was similarly surprised by Jiang Yi. He glanced around the room before slightly nodding and saying, "Not bad, you're much more hardworking than that useless good-for-nothing Jiang Song. Right... What did you say your name was?"
柳长老今天炼制的丹药还是昨日的灵神丹配方，不过每次都加了一种药剂，结果不用说——自然所有丹都废掉了，完全不是人阶上品修炼所用的灵神丹，更不可能是地阶丹药。

The elixir Elder Liu was refining today was based on the formula for Spirit Pills used the day before. However, every time he refined he added in a different additional medicinal ingredient. The conclusions need not be stated in deep detail - naturally, all the elixirs turned out to be useless, not at all the Man-tier superior-grade spirit pills that were supposed to be refined, to say nothing of them possibly being Earth-tier elixirs.
柳长老刚才无视江逸，此刻等他一走倒是扭头过来，暗暗点头喃喃一句，继续配置药粉。
Elder Liu had ignored Jiang Yi earlier, but once Jiang Yi had left, he turned his head and silently nodded, before continuing to configure his elixir formula.
柳长老完全无视江逸了，他一双牛眼瞪得滚圆，抓起丹炉内的两枚黑色丹药，满脸都是惊疑：“灵神丹不是白色的吗？这两枚怎么变成黑色的了？好像……药力增强了？”

Elder Liu completely ignored Jiang Yi. His eyes were wide as a full moon as he grabbed the two black pills from the cauldron, his face filled with shock and confusion as he said, "Isn't the Spirit Pill white in color? How did these two become black? And it seems like... their medicinal efficacy has increased in power!"
柳长老已经死去了三天了，江逸每天都躲在自家后院修炼，让江小奴在前院守着。他内心有种深深的担忧，现在不在炼丹房做事了，家族很有可能会安排新的杂活给他，而荣管事也很有可能上门，取回西山药田令牌。

Elder Liu had been dead for three days. For all of the three days, Jiang Yi hid at home and cultivated his power in his backyard while letting Jiang Xiaonu keep watch in the front courtyard.
He had a sense of concern deep in his heart. Now that he no longer worked at the alchemy lab, the family clan would very likely arrange odd jobs for him to work on; and Chief Rong would very likely come to his house and retrieve the command token for the Western Hills herb plantation.
柳长老怒了，横眉竖眼骂道：“混账东西，这有什么难的，这炉丹药已经差不多好了，你只需朝这里注入元力，等丹药凝固成型就行，快滚过来！这事干不好，以后你别想在老夫这领一枚丹药，哼哼！”

Angered, Elder Liu scowled fiercely and reprimanded, "Damn it, this is not difficult at all—this cauldron is almost done anyway! All you need to do is to apply essence force towards this spot; it'll be done once the elixir solidifies and takes shape! Hurry up and get yourself over here! If you screw this up, don't ever think of collecting even a single elixir pill from here ever again! Hmph!"
柳长老捧着剩下的那枚黑色丹药，摇头晃脑的走了，江逸却愁眉苦脸的差点要哭了。
Holding the remaining black elixir pill, Elder Liu left shaking his head. However, Jiang Yi remained looking miserable and was on the verge of crying.
柳长老的古怪的脾气在江家是出了名的，所以江逸等江家子弟领丹药的时候，都喜欢避开他直接找江松领取，避免得罪了这个在家族地位举足轻重的怪老头。

Elder Liu was famous in the Jiang Clan for his weird temper, thus Jiang Yi and other Jiang Clan descendants preferred to avoid him and instead find Jiang Song when they came to collect elixirs, to avoid insulting or angering this weird old man that had an influential position in the family.
柳长老的死因很快查出来了，让江逸没那么内疚的是，柳长老一直就有固疾，这几年前就曾犯病三次险些死去，这几天因没日没夜的钻研才提前归西了……

Elder Liu's cause of death was quickly revealed. What left Jiang Yi feeling less guilty was that Elder Liu was already suffering from an incurable disease. Over the past few years, he had three previous experiences where he had fallen ill but managed to avoid death. However, the non-stop study into the elixir over the past few days and nights had resulted in his early demise...
柳长老的脸色却一下变了，一巴掌扫去，将进来的少年直接扫出大门外，这才冷哼道：“江松，你现在可以滚了，以后这炼丹房你不用来了，混账东西，天天就知道偷懒！”

Elder Liu's look transformed instantly and sent a slap at him, sending the youth entering the room flying out of the main doors.
He then snorted coldly. "Jiang Song, you can get out of my sight now! You no longer need to return to this elixir-refining room. Damned thing, all you do is laze around!"
柳长老终于醒悟过来，瞥了江逸一眼，不耐烦的说道：“去另外一边的丹房内自己拿吧，爱拿多少拿多少，别来烦老夫……咦？这灵神丹内还是原先的成分啊，并没有其余的成分啊？怎么会突然变成地阶了？奇怪，奇怪……”

Elder Liu finally came to his senses. Glancing at Jiang Yi with one look, he responded impatiently, "Go to the Elixir Room on the other side and take them yourself. Take as much as you want, and don't disturb me... Eh? This Spirit Pill still contains the original ingredients, and does not contain any extra components? How did it suddenly become Earth-tier? Strange, strange..."
柳长老翻脸比翻书还快，又横眉竖眼怒道：“老夫要个人，别说那什么荣管事，就算内务堂大总管江云蛇都不敢说个不字。你去和你们管事说说，他敢不同意老夫撕了他。至于不懂炼丹，这慢慢学就是了，不过你可不能学江松那个废物偷懒，否则老夫饶不了你……就这么说定了，你先回去明早来这干活，老夫得去好好研究这丹药，哈哈哈，地阶丹药……”

Elder Liu's emotions changed faster than pages of a book being turned. He scowled fiercely and said angrily, "When I want someone, to say nothing of that Chief Rong, even the Internal Affairs Chief Supervisor Jiang Yunshe doesn't dare to say a word.
“You go and tell your chief; if he doesn't agree, I will rip him to shreds. As for not knowing how to refine elixirs, this you can learn slowly. However, you cannot learn to be lazy like that good-for-nothing Jiang Song, or I will never let you off... That’s settled then. You can go back first, and come back here and work tomorrow morning. I have to go carefully research this elixir. Hahaha... Earth-tier elixir..."
柳长老脸上突然露出笑容，走过来几步，大手在他右肩膀上拍了一下，咧嘴笑道：“你小子不错，是老夫的福将啊！嗯……江松那个废物我不要了，暂时也没人手帮忙，你以后就在这帮老夫炼丹吧。”

Elder Liu suddenly revealed a smile on his face. He walked forward by a few steps and slapped Jiang Yi's right shoulder with his large hand. Grinning widely, he said, "You're not bad, kid! You're my lucky charm! Hmmm... That useless good-for-nothing, Jiang Song—I don't want him anymore! Since I temporarily don't have any more people to help me, why don't you stay here and help me refine elixirs from now on?"
柳长老脸色一沉，吹胡子瞪眼道：“你们这些废物子弟，天天不务正业，领丹药时就贼勤快，丹药？没有！”

Elder Liu's face turned dark, blew his beard and stared at Jiang Yi as he replied, "You useless sons, all of you never ever attend to your daily duties, yet during medicine collection time you guys become so efficiently quick! Elixirs? None!"
柳长老越看眼睛越亮，神神叨叨说个不停：“这色泽，这药力，像，很像！老夫炼丹一辈子，难道……终于炼出两枚地阶的丹药了？”

Elder Liu's eyes brightened the more he looked. With much liveliness, he chattered non-stop. "This hue, this medical healing power... similar, very similar! I have refined elixirs all my life... could it be... finally two Earth-tier elixirs have been refined?"
柳长老这几天肯定还会继续试验炼丹，只要不注入黑色元力，他就永远炼不出地阶丹药，那么就会有很多很多的废丹……

Elder Liu would definitely continue to experiment with elixir-refining for the next few days. So long as black essence force was not injected, he would always be unable to refine Earth-level elixirs—and that would mean there would be a lot of useless elixir pills...
树林里幽暗阴森，地上铺满了腐败的落叶，每一脚踩下去，都好象踩在淤泥上一般不断往下陷去，那恶心的腐臭气息，更是熏得林立连眼都没法张开，黑暗中时而闪过几点幽幽的绿光，此起彼伏的狼嚎更是听得林立心惊胆战。

The woods were dark and gloomy, and the ground was covered with decaying leaves. His feet sank with every step he took, as if he was walking on mud. The rancid smell was so disgusting that Lin Li had trouble keeping his eyes open. Specks of faint green light flitted in the dark, and the incessant howls from the wolves struck fear into Lin Li's heart.
根据这几名护卫的速度，江逸大概判断出四人的实力，内心也是一阵慌乱，如此多护卫他怎么应对？尤其是还有一人是铸鼎境三重。

From the speed of the few guards, Jiang Yi made a general judgment of four guards' strength. A wave of anxiety swept across his mind. How was he to handle that many guards? One of them was even at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm...
梦魇草的汁液，正在烧杯中沸腾，林立手上拿着一朵宁神花，一瓣一瓣的小心撕着，这是一个很关键的过程，宁神花过多，会严重降低恐惧药剂的效果，而宁神花过少，却又无法达到镇定心神的目的，所以林立每撕下一瓣，都会轻轻摇动烧杯，等待宁神花完全融入药剂，才会根据颜色判断分量是否足够。

The succus from the nightmare seed was boiling in the beaker. Lin Li held a peacebloom in his hand, gingerly plucking the petals one by one. This was a very crucial process. The excessive use of peacebloom would seriously reduce the effect of the Fear Potion; and if there were too little peacebloom, it could not achieve the purpose of calming the mind. So, every time Lin Li tore a petal off, he would gently shake the beaker and wait for the petal to dissolve fully in the potion before judging whether the dose was enough according to the color.
欢呼声将所有人都惊动了，包括老梅林与克伦威尔，他们纷纷投来各种各样的目光，有疑惑有惊喜也有怀疑。
The cheering alarmed everyone, including Old Merlin and Cromwell. All kinds of looks were shot in their direction, there were looks of doubt, surprise, and suspicion.
欧灵没有说话，只是默默的望前走了一步，而这一步，也正好让他用身体将室友牢牢护住。
Orrin said nothing, but he quietly stepped forward, allowing him to use his body to safely protect his roommate.
正在江逸沉吟时，柳长老突然抓起一枚黑色丹药吞了下去，然后就地闭目盘坐起来。只是片刻他就睁开了眼睛，一双牛眼内都是激动和狂喜：“哈哈哈，这的确是地阶下品丹药，三十年了！老夫终于炼出了地阶丹药啊，老夫终于不再是一品炼丹师了……”

Right as Jiang Yi was muttering to myself, Elder Liu suddenly grabbed one of the black elixir pills and swallowed it, before sitting cross-legged with his eyes closed. He opened his eyes almost instantly, his eyes filled with excitement and ecstasy.
"Hahaha! This is indeed an Earth-tier inferior-grade elixir! It's been thirty years! I finally refined an Earth-tier elixir! I am no longer a first-rate elixir-refiner..."
正在江逸迷茫之时，翊凌雪却郑重的从怀中取出一块令牌，说道：“我，翊凌雪代表翊家正式邀请你加入翊家，职位是武堂副长老，俸禄和待遇……”

While Jiang Yi was still in a daze, Yi Lingxue solemnly retrieved a command token from her chest pocket and said, "On behalf of the Yi Family, I, Yi Lingxue, formally invite you to join our family under the position of Deputy Elder of the family's martial arts training court. The remuneration will be.
正在药剂室忙碌的林立，可一点也不知道葛瑞安如何恐吓那个倒霉的魔导士。
Lin Li, who was busy in the potion lab, had no idea how Gerian was intimidating the unlucky Magic Shooter.
正在那僻静角落中，哭得梨花带雨的罗琳，也同样目睹了这惊心动魄的一幕，在那飞溅的火光映照下，罗琳泪痕未干的俏脸上，充满了惊骇欲绝的神色，红润的嘴唇微微张开，却又感觉心里有什么东西堵着，在这一瞬间，她竟是替那个年轻魔法师担心起来……

Rowling, who was weeping like a pear blossom bathed in rain in the secluded corner, had also witnessed the gripping scene. In the light of the spattering blaze, Rowling's tear-streaked pretty face was filled with horror and despair. Her ruddy lips slightly opened, but she felt something being blocked in her heart. At this moment, she was actually worried about the young mage...
正在那犯难的时候，老格林却伸手指了指他身后：“就去那里坐坐吧。”
Just as he was at a loss, Old Grimm stretched out his hand and pointed in a direction behind him. "Let's sit there."
正在那觉得委屈的时候，却听见身后一阵脚步声传来。
Just as he was feeling aggrieved, he heard footsteps shuffling from behind.
正埋头想着心事，一行人却已走到了冒险者公会门外。
Just as he was absorbed in his thoughts, the party had reached the doorstep of the Adventurers Guild.
正愉快交谈着的两人，谁也没有注意到，另一位魔法师的脸色有些发白。
Both of them were chatting merrily and had not noticed the other mage turning pale.
正拼命逃跑的三人虽未被酸液溅到，却也因为躲避酸液而稍稍停住了脚步，这一停在平时可能没什么问题，但如今却正好让他们落入了双足飞龙的利爪之下，三人刚一抬头，就看见一片阴影在视线中飞快放大，锐利的爪子在黑暗中闪动着摄人的光亮。

The trio who were trying hard to escape were spared from the acid, but they had to stop in their tracks briefly to avoid it. Normally, it might not have been a problem, but at present, they happened to be under the talons of the Wyvern. As the trio looked up, they saw a shadow zooming in on them, sharp talons glimmering in the dark.
正是因为这份野心，林立才从未停止过前进的脚步。
It was because of this ambition that Lin Li had never stopped moving forward.
正有些疑惑之间，却忽然看见艾萨克带着红发美女，似乎正往自己坐的地方走来。
As he was still puzzling over it, he suddenly saw Isaac along with the redheaded beauty coming in the direction of where he was sitting.
正有些疑惑的时候，林立忽然想起一个人来。
Lin Li was still in a daze when he suddenly recalled someone.
正要开始萃取汁液的时候，却听见楼梯上又传来了一阵脚步声。
Just as he was beginning to extract the succus, he heard footsteps coming from the stairs.
正要转身离去，却忽然感觉到，那一堆乱七八糟的东西当中，竟透出一股微弱的魔法波动。这种感觉对林立来说，实在是太熟悉了，不管是手上的无尽风暴之戒，还是身上的怒焰法袍，都总是在不经意间透出这种淡淡的魔法波动。

He was about to turn and leave when he suddenly felt a faint spell of magic in that mess. This feeling was too familiar to Lin Li. Whether it was the Ring of Endless Storm in his hand, or the Robe of Wrath on his body, they were constantly transmitting a slight wave of magic inadvertently.
此刻他可不敢用真名，他很清楚这丹药既然惊动了姬家的小姐，肯定是对方察觉了黑色元力的特殊，匹夫无罪，怀璧其罪的道理他还是懂的。

He did not dare to use his real name at that moment. He was well aware that, being the case that the elixir had startled the young mistress of the Ji Family, the other party must have found out the special abilities of the black essence force. A man's wealth is his own ruin, for it encourages greed in others - he certainly understood this concept.
此刻在武殿内闭关的公子小姐最少有二三十人，每天这群人中大半部分都会来这打上一两场，所以武殿内的陪练才会如此短缺。当然，根据江逸的猜测武殿内的陪练应该不止这么多，估计很多陪练都是被人打得重伤回去疗伤了，这群公子小姐可从不把陪练当人看的，出手没个轻重……

At present there were at least twenty or thirty young masters and mistresses in seclusion within the Martial Arts Hall. Every single day, more than half of this group of people would go up there to fight one or two matches. That was why there was such a severe shortage of sparring partners in the Martial Arts Hall. Of course, according to Jiang Yi's estimate, there should not be only so many sparring partners in the Martial Arts Hall. He guessed that many of the sparring partners had been beaten up severely and had left to recuperate from their injuries. This bunch of young masters and mistresses had after all never treated their sparring partners as fellow human beings, their attacks always being very heavy-handed and full of force...
此刻外面剩下那个护卫本想跟着冲进来，却看到一道身影被踹飞出来，顿时吓得头一缩不敢冲了。如此短的时间内，江逸连续击伤两人，其中一人还是他们中最强的铸鼎境三重武者？试问这护卫怎么还敢冲进来主动挨打？

At this moment, the last remaining guard outside had thought of following his comrade and rushing in. However, seeing a figure be sent flying out by a single kick left him instantly shocked to the point that he withdrew his head and refused to rush in. In such a short period of time, Jiang Yi was able to consecutively attack and injure two people—and was one of the two not the strongest amongst them, a warrior at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm? How could this guard possibly dare to rush in now and end up getting thrashed?
此刻江如虎来了，但他内心却没有一丝兴奋，反而满脸的苦涩，暗道自己太大意了。

At that moment, Jiang Ruhu had indeed arrived, but he did not have a shred of excitement deep in his heart. Rather, his face filled with bitterness and agony. He muttered to himself that he was too careless.
此时一眼看见林立从炼金室出来，凯文就仿佛是见了救星一样，匆匆跟那几个头头交代了一声，赶紧落荒而逃。
He seemed to have found a savior when he saw Lin Li coming out from the alchemy lab. He excused himself from the leaders in a hurry and quickly fled away.
此时众人望向林立的目光中，已经多多少少带着点别的意思了。
At this time, the looks cast on Lin Li had a certain degree of other meanings to it.
此时的安度因看上去竟是有些苍老，只见他扶着椅子慢慢坐下，将从不离身的水晶球放在身旁，做完这一切之后，却没有回答林立的问题，反倒是忽然问了一句：“你在这里住了有三个月了吧？”

At this time, Andoine begun to look pale. He held onto the chair, slowly sat down and placed the crystal ball—which he had never allowed to be out of his sight—aside. Thereafter, he did not answered Lin Li’s question. Instead, he asked, “Have you been staying here for three months?”
此时的江逸已经完全没了睡意，他朝窗外望了眼，然后点燃油灯，强忍住疼痛把全身上下二三十处伤口上了些药，然后盘腿坐回到床上。

At that moment, Jiang Yi had lost all his drowsiness. He quickly looked out the window, before lighting his candle. After enduring the bodily agony from applying medicine on some twenty or thirty wounds throughout his body, he sat cross-legged on his bed.
此时的老梅林，就好象是一个已经掌握了游戏规则的老手，在欺负一个刚刚踏进游戏圈子的新人。
At this moment, Old Merlin seemed like the veteran who had mastered the rules of the game bullying a newcomer who had just entered the gaming circle.
武堂长老面色更加阴沉了，一只大手元力环绕，大步朝江逸走去，阴冷的声音响彻整个演武殿：“你这畜生伤了人还如此张狂？莫非你以为本座真的不敢杀人？”

The Martial Court Elder's expression was now even more severe. Circulating the essence force around one of his hands, he took a big step towards Jiang Yi and spoke in a gloomy and cold voice that echoed throughout the entire Martial Arts Demonstration Hall, "How dare you this little bastard be this presumptuous even after injuring all these people? Do you really think I dare not kill you?"
武技按照掌握程度分为入门，精通，大成三个阶段，这翊小姐的暴雨拳三年都没有大成，现在和江逸对战一场就直接大成了？

The mastery of martial arts techniques were divided into three different levels - namely the Entry, Proficient and Phenomenal stages. How could it be that this Young Mistress Yi's skills in the Thunderstorm Fist technique had not reached the Phenomenal stage in three years worth of training, yet in one practice match against Jiang Yi, she immediately attained "Phenomenal" success?
武殿只为武者服务，每一座武殿内都有聚灵阵，在里面修炼能加速，这里有海量的各阶武技，神兵，丹药，等宝物。这里有重力房，有陪练，机关房等等各种辅助武者提升实力的好地方，只要有紫金，这里就是武者的天堂。

聚灵阵The Martial Arts Hall only worked in the service of martial artists. The interior of every Martial Arts Hall contained a spirit concentration spell, allowing anyone cultivating spiritual power inside to increase in speed. There was a huge volume of martial arts techniques, spiritual warriors, elixir pills and a wide variety of other treasures. There were good facilities inside including a Heavy Strengthening Room, provision of sparring partners and a Mechanism Training Room - all sorts of facilities that could help martial artists increase their power. So long as one had purple gold to spend, this place was effectively a heaven for any martial artist.
武殿可不是江家的武堂，那是天羽城内一个很神秘的地方，据说在里面打坐闭关修炼速度能快上两倍，而且里面还有重力室，练功房，专业陪练之类的，是武者修炼的天堂。江逸很早就听说过这武殿，却只能远远的看一眼，因为要想进入武殿修炼，入门费用都需要一两紫金……、

The martial arts hall was not the main training court of the Jiang Yi, but rather a mysterious location within Skyplume City.
According to legend, anyone who meditated there in seclusion could increase their essence force refining speed by up to two times.
Additionally, there were many other facilities inside like a strength room, a technique-practicing room, and professional trainers who could facilitate and follow in one's training.
In short, it was a martial artists' paradise. Jiang Yi had heard about this martial arts hall ages ago, but he could only eye it from afar, as the entrance fee for even entering the martial arts hall cost a tael of purple gold...
武殿外还在招陪练，不过围观的人少了，江逸刚刚靠近侧门，那高大黑甲护卫立即热情的招呼他道：“嘿，小哥，你可来了，杨管事可是问了你几次啊。”

The personnel at the Martial Arts Hall were still publicising their call for more sparring partners outside the building, but the surrounding spectators have become fewer in number. Jiang Yi had just walked close to the side door when that big tall guard clad in black armour immediately called out to him and said warmly, "Hey, little man, you're finally here! Manager Yang had asked for you several times."
武殿大门紧闭，侧门倒是打开的，不过有两名黑甲护卫守卫，江逸目光顺着众人定格在武殿外的一张告示上。

The main doors of the Martial Arts Hall were sealed shut. The side door was indeed open, but there were two guards clad in black armor protecting the entrance.
Jiang Yi's gaze followed the crowd and eventually fixed itself on a notice placed outside the Martial Arts Hall.
武殿并不是一股势力，也从不参与大陆纷争，严格来说它应该是天星大陆最大的商号！不过它服务的对象是高级武者和富贵人家的少爷小姐，没有紫府境的实力要想进入武殿，入门必须交纳一两紫金。

The Martial Arts Hall was not an organized faction. It had no power concentrated in it; neither did it ever get involved in continent-wide conflicts.
Strictly speaking, it was the largest business establishment in all of Stellarsky! However, its target customers were highly skilled martial artists and children from rich and powerful families.
If one wished to enter the Martial Arts Hall without a level of power in the Purple Mansion Realm, he or she had to pay an entrance fee of a tael of purple gold.
武殿是个很神奇的存在，没有人知道是谁建立的，什么时候建立的，武殿的人也一直很低调，只要不招惹武殿他们从不主动找事，更不参与六国纷争。

The Martial Arts Hall had a very mysterious existence - no one knew who built it, nor when it was built. The people of the Martial Arts Hall had also always been maintaining a low-profile. So long as no one triggered the ire of the Martial Arts Hall, its people would never actively cause trouble, nor would they ever get involved in six-nation world conflicts.
武殿殿主来转了一圈，算是彻底断绝了杨管事和费老想培养江逸的心思，不过倒是确定江逸的确有一种神奇的能力，能帮武者快速提升武技熟练度。

The Master of the Martial Arts Hall's supervisory walkabout could be considered to have completely severed Manager Yang and Elder Fei's hopes of grooming and training Jiang Yi. However, he actually confirmed that Jiang Yi did indeed possess a mysterious power, capable of helping martial artists rapidly increase their proficiency level in martial arts techniques.
武殿练功房一个小房间内，江逸结束了一轮修炼，睁开眼睛满脸复杂的感慨道。封印有一万八千枚，现在仅仅才消融四百枚，修炼速度就增幅如此之大，他都不敢想象等封印全部破解会何等的逆天。

Jiang Yi opened his eyes and mused after a round of cultivation in his tiny room in the Technique Practising Room. There were altogether eighteen thousand runic patterns on the seal, and his cultivation speed had already increased so drastically with just four hundred of them broken. He could hardly wrap his mind around how unnaturally powerful he would be when all of the runic patterns were broken.
武殿虽然不属于城主府管，但姬家在天羽城是土皇帝，杨管事自然不敢得罪姬听雨，江逸也只能苦笑着快步跟随姬听雨进了一个练功房内。

Although the Martial Arts Hall was not under the administrative purview of the city administration, as the Ji Family was effectively the local lords of the land, Manager Yang naturally did not dare to offend Ji Tingyu. As such, Jiang Yi could only smile bitterly as he followed Ji Tingyu at a quick pace into one of the Technique Practising Rooms.
武殿！
The Martial Arts Hall!
