Jiang Yi tactfully declined Yi Lingxue's offer, not only because of the five-year agreement he had with the Martial Arts Hall, but also because he was a descendant of the Jiang Clan. As such, it was impossible for him to join the Yi Family, and he did not intend to marry into the family and take the Yi family name either.
江逸实力不高，就算想进去挨揍，怕是最多也是铜牌陪练，一天一两银子对于欠下十两紫金巨额债务的他来说于事无补，他自然懒得进去浪费时间。

Jiang Yi's power was not great. Even if he wanted to apply to be beaten up by others, he would probably be a bronze-token-grade sparring partner at best. To someone like him with the enormous debt of ten taels of purple silver, the rate of one tael of silver a day was not attractive nor useful and, naturally, he was too lazy to bother going in to waste his time.
江逸对翊凌雪倒是没想法，他很清楚自己和这个翊家的二小姐身份相差天地，而且他也明白这位小姐对他没想法，不过是喜欢和他对练罢了。至于……姬听雨，江逸更是想都不敢多想。

However, Jiang Yi himself had no intentions aimed towards Ji Tingyu. He was well aware that he was totally different from the second young mistress of the Yu Family in terms of class and social status. Besides, he was also aware that this young mistress had no romantic intentions towards him, and merely enjoyed sparring practice with him. As for... Ji Tingyu, Jiang Yi did not even dare to consider the possibility.
江逸将剩下的一缕黑色元力，又调集去眼睛内，这次视力变强的时间依旧增长了很久，差不多能坚持大半柱香时间。

Jiang Yi once again assembled the final remaining wisp of black essence forces into his eye. This time, the duration of the strengthening of his vision was increased for a long time as before, almost being able to maintain increased for more than two and a half minutes.
江逸就住在练功房大殿内的一个小房间内，每日除了陪翊凌雪对战一场外，其余时间他都在自己房间内闭关修炼，杨管事甚至都不让他去大殿内坐着，生怕别的公子小姐找江逸陪练，耽误他修炼的时间。

Jiang Yi stayed a tiny room within the grand hall of the Technique Practising Room. Besides the one sparring practise he had every day with Yi Lingxue, he spent the rest of the time holed up in his room cultivating in seclusion. Manager Yang even kept him out of the grand hall for fear that young masters and ladies alike would call for him as their sparring partner, thereby interfering with his cultivation time.
江逸就如一个发现了新颖玩具的孩子，整个人都兴奋的不得了。他将目光一遍遍在房间内扫来扫去，朝窗子望去，感受着这个和原本迥然不同的新世界，一边终于抑制不住地狂笑了起来。

Jiang Yi was overjoyed like a child who had just discovered a new toy. He swept his gaze left and right across the room, and towards the window and beyond. He took in the new world which was completely different from before while he gave out a hysterical laugh, finally failing to contain himself.
江逸尴尬的起身，主子不在，这些下人怎么敢做主擅自借钱？要是请示了大总管，对方不借那他不尴尬得要死？

Jiang Yi stood up awkwardly. With the owner not available, how could the servants dare to take charge on their own and loan him the money?
Should they seek counsel from the chief supervisor, and should he refuse to loan the money, would Jiang Yi not be embarrassed to death?
江逸屏住呼吸，暗暗祈祷希望里面的丹药别炸太多，否则这柳长老要是暴怒下来，就算打死他，家族也不会说什么的……

Jiang Yi held his breath, secretly praying that not too many elixirs in the cauldron had been destroyed in the explosion. Otherwise, should Elder Liu become violent with rage, even if he was beaten to death, the Jiang Clan would say nothing...
江逸幡然醒悟，即刻感应那丝黑色元力，发现果然已经消耗不见，眼睛附近经脉内的剩下来的元力全部是蓝色的。

Jiang Yi snapped out of his daze. He immediately tried to sense the sliver of black-colored essence force, and indeed, it had already dissipated. The essence force left at the meridian near his eye was blue in color.
江逸干巴巴的应了一声，看到翊飞儿又攻击而来，他只好运转了一丝黑色元力去了眼睛，站在原地不闪避了，双手如海藻般朝翊飞儿缠去。

Jiang Yi replied dryly. As Yi Fei-er started attacking again, he transferred a wisp of black essence force to his eyes and stood still, hands wrapping themselves around Yi Fei-er's hands like threads of seaweed.
江逸彻底懵了，他一个十六岁未满的少年竟然去翊家做长老？是这翊凌雪没事在逗他玩，还是翊家家主脑子坏了？他愣了一挥，才惊疑问道：“翊小姐，你不是在开玩笑吧？”

Jiang Yi was completely stupefied. He, a barely 16-year-old youth, the Second Elder of the Yi Family's martial arts training court? Was Yi Lingxue messing with him, or had the Yi Family Clan Head gone crazy? Jiang Yi was briefly stunned speechless, before asking incredulously, "Young Mistress Yi, surely you are just joking?"
江逸很小的时候就听说过，这武殿内简直是修炼的天堂，里面有强大的聚灵大阵，在里面修炼能加快两倍，里面还有各种辅助修炼的好东西，能让武者实力突飞猛进。不过这武殿对于连吃饭都困难的他来说，太过于遥远，他也就没有刻意去打听了。

Jiang Yi had heard about this place when he was very young. This Martial Arts Hall was practically a paradise for cultivation.
There was a massive spiritual concentration inside, allowing one's cultivation practice to increase and speed up by two times. There were also all sorts of good supplements that could facilitate cultivation, allowing the power of any martial artist to improve by leaps and bounds instantly.
However, for someone like him who faced difficulty in even getting food to eat, it was way beyond his means even enter the Martial Arts Hall. As such, he had never deliberately gone to find out more about it.
江逸很幸运，提早出了江家，否则这几个月时间怕是江家大门都出不了，武殿那边肯定无法交差，这段时间他也不可能修炼速度那么快，在前两天就突破了铸鼎境三重。

Jiang Yi was lucky: he got out of the Jiang Clan early, or he would have been confined within its gates for several months. Not only would he be unable to report back to the Martial Arts Hall, he would not have advanced so quickly in his cultivation and made a breakthrough two days ago to the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
江逸很快就醒悟过来了，好像他是陪练？怎么能自己出手，只能干笑道：“小姐请出手，在下全力以赴好了。”

Jiang Yi very quickly came to realise something - was he not the one who was the sparring partner? How could he be the one to start attacking? As such, he could only smile drily and say, "Young Mistress, please start your move. This partner will make an all-out effort to correspond to your moves.
江逸很快抬起了头，却是一脸的平静，他望着马公子深深的呼了一口气道：“马公子，能不能少点？五十两紫金如何？我只有五十两了，你要同意我就双手奉上……”

Jiang Yi raised his head soon enough, his demeanor unexpectedly calm. He fixed his gaze on Young Master Ma and breathed out deeply, "Young Master Ma, is it possible for the amount to be less? How about fifty taels of purple gold? Fifty taels are all I have; if you are agreeable, I would proffer them to you... "
江逸很认真的点头，他炼制的那丹药是用柳长老的废丹回炉而成，而他本身不会炼丹，所以他这样说也不算错。
Jiang Yi nodded seriously. Technically, he was not lying: the elixirs were made by melting down the useless elixirs from Elder Liu, whereas Jiang Yi himself knew nothing of elixir refinement.
江逸微微宽心，江家很重规矩，祸不及家人这一条尤为重要，江如虎就算要找他麻烦也不会为难江小奴的，否则被家族知道，那事情就严重了。

Jiang Yi was somewhat relieved at Xiaonu's promise. The Jiang Clan took its laws very seriously, especially the one about not implicating one's family members in a conflict. Hence, Jiang Ruhu's grudge should lie with him alone and would probably not make things difficult for Xiaonu, lest the family clan got wind of it and there would be consequences.
江逸心神一动，如果双方不动用元力，只凭借反应速度和武技的话。他可以凭借黑色元力增幅视力，能让反应速度提高数倍，说不定能在里面混个金牌陪练玩玩？

With that thought, Jiang Yi realized something: if both parties could not use any essence force, and only relied on their reaction speed and martial arts skills... perhaps he could rely on his black essence force to improve his sight and allow his reaction speed to increase by several times.
Perhaps he could even get in, pass off as a gold-token-grade sparring partner and earn some money!
江逸心神一动，既然……黑色元力可以让视力增强，那是否也同样能让听力增强呢？对了还有鼻子，说不定嗅觉也能增强。

With that thought, since… the black essence force could improve one's sight, could the same strengthening happen for one's sense of hearing? Right, and the nose. Who knew if one's sense of smell could be strengthened, too?
江逸心神一荡，他想起昨夜他疗伤时，那黑色元力能诡异地增幅黄参丹药力四五倍？加上刚才的情况，他心里有很大把握确定，这炉丹药炸丹，还有这两枚丹药变成地阶，绝对是因为黑色元力的缘故……

Jiang Yi's mind was shaken. He remembered that last night when he was healing his injuries, the black essence force was strangely able to increase the medical healing power of the Yellow Ginseng Elixir by four to five times. Adding the circumstances that just happened, he had much certainty in his heart that the explosion of the elixirs in this cauldron, as well as the change of these two elixir pills to Earth-tier quality, was definitely caused by the black essence force...
江逸心跳加速，全神贯注的内视伤口。可惜十几息时间后，黑色元力就消耗干净，疗伤的速度一下慢了下来，尽管附近有蓝色元力，但增幅效果微乎其微。

Jiang Yi's heartbeat increased as he focused all his attention on observing his wound. Unfortunately, in some twenty or thirty seconds, the black essence force was completely used up and the wound-healing speed likewise slowed down. Even with blue essence force nearby, the increase in healing speed was minimal.
江逸心里其实很清楚，这几年自己愈发的不受家族待见，江家给他的月例银钱也一减再减。如果不是小奴出去做工，且不说辅助修行所需的基本丹药，只怕是连补充身体日常锻炼消耗所需的肉食都成问题……

Jiang Yi knew the truth deep in his heart. These few years, as his favorability in the family decreased even further, the monthly stipend given to him by the family clan had been reduced continuously. If not for Xiaonu heading out to do work, to say nothing of the basic medicine required to sustain his cultivation, even the acquisition of basic food supplies needed for daily consumption would have become a severe problem…
江逸心里冷笑也不还手，甚至都不动用黑色元力，脚踩迷幻步在练功房内转圈起来。
Jiang Yi scoffed internally, but did not fight back. He did not even activate the black essence force and merely circled the room with Psychedelic Step.
江逸心里暗暗想到，苦笑摇头道：“我也不知道怎么就被柳长老看上了。”
Jiang Yi secretly thought to himself, as he smiled bitterly and shook his head saying, "I do not how I got favored by Elder Liu either."
江逸快速的后退，又气又怒，没想到这江豹话没说两句就又开始动手，而且出手就是大招！他身上的伤还复原，今日只怕要雪上加霜了。

Irritated, Jiang Yi hastily retreated backwards. He could not believe that not only did Jiang Bao not give much warning before starting his attacks, he even started with a powerful move straight away! The wounds on his body had not fully recovered yet.
It looks like this fight will only worsen them…
江逸快速的收回令牌，继续勒住马飞的脖子，这才冷笑道：“马少爷，你爹没告诉过你辱人者人恒辱之吗？乖乖的别动，否则我手一颤，你就得去见冥帝了。”

Jiang Yi quickly caught the command token and put it away, before resuming his hold on Ma Fei's neck. Only then did he smile mirthlessly, "Young Master Ma, did your father not tell you that those who humiliate others would often be humiliated in return? Be good and stay put, lest an involuntary shake of my hand send you straight to meet the Netherworld Emperor."
江逸怦然心动，猛然站起朝武殿望去。他想起一件事，他实力达到铸鼎境二重了，黑色元力也凝练了许多，十缕黑色元力如果运转到眼中可以支持一个时辰，他在武殿内做陪练，又不是时刻上场，如果一天只是几场对练，黑色元力绰绰有余了。

Jiang Yi felt a rush of excitement and suddenly stood up to look in the direction of the Martial Arts Hall. He thought of one thing - now that his power level had reached the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm and his black essence forces were more condensed, and if the ten strands of black essence force that he usually circulated into his eye could last for two hours, and given that while he was being a sparring partner he need not head out for combat all the time, if he only had a few sparring matches per day, he would have enough or possibly even spare black essence forces to last an entire day.
江逸怦然心动，连忙取了一个空的小瓷瓶装了起来，将炼丹房整理了一下，关上了门朝自己小院走去。

Jiang Yi felt a rush of excitement as he hurriedly retrieved a small empty porcelain bottle and stored the pills inside. After cleaning up the alchemy lab, he closed the door to the alchemy lab and walked in the direction of the small courtyard of his own house.
江逸恍然大悟，找到那本药草简录匆忙去药草房内寻找地黄粉，很快他在一个瓷罐内找到了地黄粉，再次开始回炉。

Jiang Yi suddenly realised what he should do. He found the book "Record on Medicinal Herbs" before hurriedly heading into the medicinal ingredient room in search of the rehmannia powder. Very quickly he found some rehmannia powder in a porcelain pot. Subsequently, he started to reheat the cauldron once again.
江逸恼了，将剩下的七枚废丹全丢了进去，又取来一些地黄粉，最后一次回炉再造，而且这次他把丹田内剩下的三缕黑色元力全部注入了进去。

Feeling irritated, Jiang Yi threw the seven remaining useless pills into the cauldron, before retrieving some rehmannia powder and conducted the reheating and refining process for one last time. On top of that, this time around, he injected all three wisps of black essence force remaining within his dantian into the cauldron.
江逸悄然擦拭了一下额头上的冷汗，发现又能调集丹田内的蓝色元力，不禁暗暗惊奇。黑色元力难道不是元力吗？为何刚才蓝色元力不能调动，这黑色元力却可以调动？

Jiang Yi quietly wiped off the cold sweat on his forehead. He realized he could once again summon and muster the blue essence force in his dantian, which he could not help but feel silently amazed by. Could the black essence force perhaps not be essence force at all? Why was it that the blue essence force could not be maneuvered just now, yet this black essence force could be maneuvered?
江逸悟性惊人，这幻影拳早就大成了，此刻用蓝色元力融合黑色元力运转出来，威力自然惊人，那刘管事境界和马飞一样都是铸鼎境四重，根本判断不出真实拳影。

With Jiang Yi's astonishingly high talent, he had long attained Phenomenal Stage for the Phantom Punch technique. Naturally, the power it produced was astounding, especially when he executed the technique combining the blue and black essence forces. Both Housekeeper Liu and Ma Fei were at the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, hence they were absolutely stupefied and unable to differentiate the real fists from fist silhouettes.
江逸想起昨日荣管事的交代，不敢多耽搁时间，伤势不恢复，他就算有黑色元力战力也会大打折扣的。

Jiang Yi remembered the briefing by Chief Rong the day before and did not dare to delay any further. If he did not fix his injuries, even with the black essence force, his fighting abilities would still be greatly reduced.
江逸想起那神秘的黑色元力，心神再次激荡起来，连忙把剩下的肉干快速啃了起来，准备吃完就立即疗伤，再细细研究一下那黑色元力。他有种感觉，或许这神秘的黑色元力，能让他的生活……发生天翻地覆的变化。

Upon thinking about that mysterious black essence force, Jiang Yi's spirit rose and became agitated again. He promptly finished the remaining meat jerky in a few rapid bites. He was ready to start healing once he was done eating, and later he would carefully study that black essence force. He had the intuition that perhaps this mysterious black essence force would... turn his life completely on its head!
江逸愕然，这一两紫金可是一百银啊，这姬小姐不仅没压他的价，反而涨了？
Jiang Yi was stunned. One tael of purple gold was equivalent to one hundred silver! Not only did Young Mistress Ji not reduce his price, she had instead increased it.
江逸愣了一下，背后的江如虎却再次叫嚣起来，今日他跟随江恨水前来，本就是想找机会收拾江逸一顿。刚才江逸怂了，让他没办法发飙，此刻自然想再一次激怒江逸。

Jiang Yi was only distracted for a moment before the Jiang Ruhu standing behind Jiang Henshui's back clamored yet again. In following Jiang Henshui that day to the alchemy lab, he had originally aimed to find an opportunity to teach Jiang Yi a lesson. Yet as Jiang Yi surrendered to his incitement, Jiang Ruhu had no chance to fly into a rage. Naturally, at the moment he desired to incite Jiang Yi into a rage once again.
江逸愣住了，他没想到这个和他差不多大的漂亮小姐竟有如此人生感悟，他双眼迷茫起来，沉默不语。
Jiang Yi was floored. He did not expect that this beautiful young mistress, who was as young as he was, would have such profound thoughts about life. Eyes in a daze, he fell silent.
江逸懒得再想，那缕被排出丹田的黑色元力也懒得管了，随便输送到不影响他吐纳江水诀的左臂某条小经脉内，准备明天再逼出体外。

Jiang Yi was too lazy to think or care about the black essence force that had been distilled through his dantian. He decided instead to transfer the essence force to a small meridian on his left arm, somewhere which would not affect his abilities in practicing the Jiang Water Art. He also resolved to prepare to force this essence out of his body tomorrow.
江逸戴上斗篷苦笑道：“管事，我突然想起还有一件急事，回头再来好了。”
Jiang Yi put on his cloak and smiled bitterly, replying, "Manager, I suddenly remembered that I have something urgent to attend to. I'll be back soon."
江逸所在的江家，作为天羽城五大家族之一，族内子弟众多，等阶极为森严。
Jiang Yi’s family was one of the five great family clans of Skyplume City. The Jiang Clan had many descendants, with each member being placed in a strict, hierarchical system.
江逸手中的短剑狠狠的扬起，然后猛然朝马飞的小腹刺去，目标赫然是他的丹田位置……
Jiang Yi viciously raised the short sword and abruptly drove it down at Ma Fei's stomach, aiming directly where his dantian was...
江逸扒完最后一口饭，舒服的打了个饱嗝，转身捏了捏江小奴的鼻子笑道：“傻丫头，以后我们会有更多的紫金，等少爷实力强大了，再也不会有人欺负我们了。”

Jiang Yi swallowed the last mouthful of rice and burped with satisfaction.
He turned around to pinch Jiang Xiaonu's nose, giggling as he said, "Silly girl, next time we're going to get even more purple gold. Once your young master's power gets even stronger, no one would dare to bully us again."
江逸找到杨管事，杨管事也没有隐瞒，明言告诉他是地之灵体，能快速帮人武技大成，他听到这个消息后，却没有欣喜反而很是怀疑。

武技大成Jiang Yi found Manager Yang. Manager Yang had not secretly hidden anything from him, and instead told him clearly that he had an earth-powered soul and could help others rapidly achieve phenomenal success in their martial arts abilities. Upon hearing this piece of news, not only was he not feeling a sense of elation, but rather he found it being very suspicious.
江逸抓了抓脑袋，暗道这身材火爆的妞喜欢被虐啊，那日攻击他那么久，可是连他一片衣角都没碰到，这样陪练真的有意思？

Jiang Yi scratched his head while muttering to himself in wonderment over whether this girl with a hot body enjoyed being abused like that. That day, she had attacked him for so long, yet she did not even manage to touch the corner of his clothes - was being a sparring partner like that meaningful?
江逸抓着江如虎的手突然一松，似乎抡得太猛一时没抓住，他脸上也露出惊慌之色，因为江如虎身子直直飞了出去，脑袋笔直朝墙壁上撞去，这要是撞上了怕是脑瓜子……真的要和西瓜般爆裂了。

The hand that Jiang Yi used to grab onto Jiang Ruhu slipped. It seemed as though he whirled too vigorously and didn't grab on properly. His face let out an expression of fear because Jiang Ruhu's body was flying head first towards the wall. If Jiang Ruhu were to crash in head first... That brain of his was bound to burst apart like a watermelon.
江逸抬头看了一眼门口一块巨大的牌匾上，三个龙飞凤舞的金色大字，抿了抿嘴唇，咬牙抬腿朝里面走去。

Jiang Yi lifted his head to glance at the huge plaque, with its three bold cursive golden characters, hanging above the main door. Pursing his lips and gritting his teeth, he raised his feet and walked into the Pavilion.
江逸抽出手臂，兴奋的在房间里走来走去，突然脚步一顿，又想到一件事情：“这黑色元力既然能让拳头力量增大，用腿应该也可以吧？”
Jiang Yi removed his arm and paced happily around the room. A thought surfaced suddenly. The black essence force increases my fist strength greatly. It could work for my legs, too, I suppose...
江逸抽出手臂，尽管衣袍被刮得破烂，手臂也被拉出几道血痕，但他已经全然不在乎了，身体兴奋得不住颤抖。
Jiang Yi pulled his arm out, not bothering with his torn sleeves and the few scratches on his arm. He was trembling with joy.
江逸抿了抿嘴，勉强笑了笑，道：“也没什么大事，武殿派我执行一个秘密任务，我可能要离开三个月，我有些是担心你一个人在家。”

Jiang Yi pursed his lips and forced out a smile, "It's nothing major, just that I was assigned a secret mission by the Martial Arts Hall, so I may have to be away for three months. I'm a little worried to leave you here all by yourself."
江逸抿了抿嘴，眼睛闪过一丝希翼之色。这黑色元力如此神奇，如果细细研究一番，还能发现新的神奇能力的话，或许他就能从这困境中走出来……

Jiang Yi pursed his lips as a ray of hope flashed past his eyes. This black essence force was so mysterious and powerful. If he studied it carefully, perhaps he would discover a new, previously hidden power which would enable him to escape his terrible circumstances...
江逸拔腿就往外走去，走到门口才突然想起此行的目的，想到这柳长老似乎对他另眼相看？他迟疑了一阵，朝偏厅缓步走去。

Jiang Yi broke into a brisk walk heading out of the room. He abruptly remembered the purpose of his visit when he reached the door. He thought that it seemed as though Elder Liu viewed him in a new light. He hesitated for a moment, before slowly making his way to the side room.
江逸拱手拜谢径直出了练功房，在护卫指引下从另外一条走廊内进了一个偏殿，来武殿这么久了，他还是第一次走入其余的偏殿。

Jiang Yi cupped his hands and bowed in a show of his gratitude, before directly making his way out of the Technique Practising Room. With directions given by a guard, he walked down another corridor and entered a side hall. He had been in the Martial Arts Hall for such a long time, yet this was his first time walking into the other side halls of the building complex.
江逸拳头没有一丝停留，如三个流星般朝前方破空而去，不过在挨近马飞的手掌时，他的三个拳头突然消失了，一只手如软绵绵的海藻般朝马飞缠去。

Jiang Yi's fists did not hesitate even for a second and tore through the air like meteorites. However, as they approached Ma Fei's palm, the fists disappeared all of a sudden. In their stead was a hand bonelessly entangling Ma Fei akin to a kelp.
江逸挣扎着站了起来，和江小奴两人搀扶着走进屋子内。进了江逸的房间内，江小奴扶着他在床上坐下，擦干眼泪点燃烛火，慌忙去取来药膏，要给他敷上疗伤。

Jiang Yi struggled to stand up and, supporting each other by the arm, he walked into the house with Jiang Xiaonu. Upon entering the interior of Jiang Yi's room, Jiang Xiaonu supported him to the bed, dried her tears, and lit a candle. After that, she quickly passed him some ointment to apply on his wounds.
江逸推开一个房门目光一扫，看到里面都是药草，应该是西山药田内收集后送过来的。他不敢多看退了出来，走进另外一个房间，刚打开门一股扑鼻的药香就弥漫而来。

Jiang Yi pushed one of the doors open and took a glance. He saw the interior of the room filled with medicinal herbs, which he guessed were sent there after being collected from the medicinal plantations of the Western Hills. He did not dare to see further and thus retreated backward, before heading into the next room. Just as he opened the door, a puff of medicinal scent permeated out and entered his nose.
江逸推算了一下时间又是一喜，虽然高手过招，很快就能分出输赢，但如果遭遇群战，他视力增强的时间变长还是很有作用的。

Jiang Yi estimated the time and was happy once again. Although it would be quick to derive who was the winner and loser in a fight against a martial arts expert; in the event of a long drawn-out group battle, his increase in duration during which his vision expanded in power would still be very useful.
江逸揉了揉眼睛，稚嫩的脸上满是狂喜之色，他立马盘坐下，这次他准备修炼更久，提炼出更多的黑色元力，研究更多功能。

Jiang Yi rubbed his eyes, his slightly tender face filled with ecstasy. He immediately sat cross-legged. He planned to cultivate even longer, extracting more of the black essence force and research more of its functions.
江逸摆了摆手，嘴角勉强露出一丝笑容，伸手摸了摸小奴的头说道：“小奴，不哭，我没事的，你家少爷……没这么容易倒下的。”

Jiang Yi waved his hands dismissively and forced a smile. He reached out to touch Xiaonu's head and consoled her by saying, "Xiaonu, don't cry, I'm fine. Your Young Master... isn’t someone who will go down that easily."
江逸摇了摇头，大长老失踪后，江家没人待见他，谁会帮他？再说了如此丢人现眼的事情被家族知道了，怕是小奴不被风月楼的人打死，也要被刑堂活活打死……

Jiang Yi shook his head; after Grand Elder's disappearance, no one in the Jiang Clan valued him, so who would help him? Besides, if the family clan learned of such a embarrassing matter, even if Xiaonu was not beaten to death by the people from Fengyue Brothel, she would no doubt be brought to the disciplinary court and be severely punished…
江逸摇了摇头，对面人这么多，他没有黑色元力了，要是硬来怕是两人都得留下。
Jiang Yi shook his head. There were many people outside and, having no more black essence force left, if he took the hard way, both people might end up having to stay behind.
江逸摇了摇脑袋，强迫自己不要笑，闭目就地认认真真地盘坐着修炼起来，这次他足足修炼了两个时辰才停下。
Jiang Yi shook his head and forced himself not to laugh. Closing his eyes, he sat down cross-legged and seriously started to cultivate. This time he cultivated for four hours before stopping.
江逸摇头否决道：“家里不是还有肉干吗？随便吃点，我再疗伤好了。”
Jiang Yi shook his head and asked, "Is there any more jerky in the house? I'll eat something simple first, then I'll heal my wounds."
江逸摇头苦笑，他从没有宏图大志，也不想去做大事，只想带着小奴平平安安过着小日子，怎奈何命运总是捉弄他？此刻他是内忧外患，家族内和家族外都有人想弄死他，为了过上安稳幸福的日子，他唯有努力修炼，奋力拼搏……

Shaking his head, Jiang Yi smiled bitterly. He had never had any ambition or aspiration, nor did he wish to achieve great things. All he ever wanted was to live a peaceful life with Xiaonu, yet why must fate mess with him so? Troubles were plaguing him from both within and without; there were enemies both in and out of the family clan trying to kill him. The only way for him to secure a stable and happy life, was endeavoring to cultivate and striving hard to succeed...
江逸摸了摸小奴的小脑袋，点头道：“小奴，你进来一下，和你说个正事。”
Jiang Yi stroked Xiaonu's head and nodded, "Xiaonu, come in for a moment. I have something important to tell you."
江逸摸了摸鼻子，点头道：“好！”
Jiang Yi scratched his nose and nodded, replying, "Sure!"
江逸摸了摸鼻子，讪讪说道：“荣管事，不是我不想去清点，是柳长老交代让我去他那帮忙……”

Jiang Yi scratched his nose and responded with some embarrassment. "Chief Rong, it's not that I don't want to go do my accounting, it's just that Elder Liu informed me to go over to his place to help him..."
江逸撇了撇嘴，暗暗想到又不是你炼出来的……
Jiang Yi twitched his lips, silently thinking to himself that it was not he himself who refined it anyway...
江逸收回紫金也不多解释，江小奴不懂修炼这些事和她说了也不懂，摸了摸傻笑不停地江小奴的脑袋，起身朝房间内走去，直接盘坐入定了。

Jiang Yi kept the purple gold without further explanation. After all, Jiang Xiaonu didn't know how to refine essence force. She probably would not understand even if he explained things to her. Smiling foolishly as he rubbed Jiang Xiaonu's head, he stood up and walked into his room, before directly sitting cross-legged to meditate.
江逸放下筷子，摸了摸小奴的脑袋，笑道：“小奴，别担心，相信少爷，我们很快就会有钱了！”
Jiang Yi put down his chopsticks and stroked Xiaonu's head. Smiling, he replied, "Xiaonu, don't worry, believe in your Young Master! We will have the money soon enough!"
江逸整个人都激动了起来，似乎这不是一缕比发丝还细的元力，而是能将他从绝境中拽出来的救命草绳！
Jiang Yi was thrilled. To him, this essence force wasn’t some random thing thinner than a strand of hair, but a life-saving straw that could pull him out of his predicament!
江逸无奈一叹，也不解释，直接问道：“你把事情经过详细说说吧。”
Jiang Yi helplessly sighed and, without even explaining himself, asked directly, "Why don't you tell me in detail what happened?"
江逸无视江顾水两人的威胁快速追上江豹，也不动用武技单拳猛然砸去，对于江豹这种铸鼎境二重的武者，他要灭杀太轻松了。

Jiang Yi ignored the threats of Jiang Gushui and Jiang Rulang and swiftly chased after Jiang Bao. He didn't used any martial arts and just forcefully sent a fist. It was too simple to deal with Jiang Bao who was only of second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
江逸无语了，这江松自己偷懒，不受柳长老待见，关他屁事啊。这个炼丹房弟子的位置就算不是他江逸顶上，也会有别人顶上，他也懒得和这江松争辩了，转身朝里面走去，冷声说道：“江松，你回去吧，我不想和你争，如果你认为是我背后阴人，你尽可去刑堂告我。”

Jiang Yi was speechless. Jiang Song was himself a lazy person and was no longer favored by Elder Liu. This clearly had nothing to do with him! Even if the position as assistant in the alchemy lab was not taken over by Jiang Yi himself, there would be countless others who could easily take up the position.
He was too lazy to argue with Jiang Song on the matter. Turning around and walking to the interior of the room, he replied coldly, "Jiang Song, you can go back. I don't want to have a fight with you. If you think I was indeed being treacherous behind your back, you can just head over to the disciplinary court to complain about me."
江逸无需掐大腿也能判断自己眼下并非在梦中，因为从各处伤口传来的阵阵痛感清晰无比。而且……天依旧黑着，大长老并没有回来，小奴也还在外面做工，桌子上当然就更不可能堆放着像山一样高的秘笈了。

Jiang Yi did not need to pinch his legs to know that he was no longer dreaming, as the painful sensations resonating from his multiple wounds felt believably clear. Besides, the sky was still pitch black and neither had the Grand Elder not returned home, nor had Xiaonu finished with her work shift outside—not to mention the impossibility of a mountain-like stack of secret manuals piled atop the table.
江逸早就断定江如龙会来，他很清楚如果不是江如龙跟随江恨水回到江家，江如虎也没有胆子动江小奴。正因为江如龙回来了，江如虎急着想找他报仇，这才殴打江小奴的。

Jiang Yi had already expected Jiang Rulong to appear here. He knew clearly that had it not been because Jiang Rulong who followed Jiang Henshui back to the Jiang residence, Jiang Ruhu wouldn't dare to touch Jiang Xiaonu. Precisely because Jiang Rulong came back, Jiang Ruhu got anxious to seek his revenge on Jiang Yi and instead used Jiang Xiaonu as a substitute.
江逸暗喝一声，左眼黑光一闪，眼前的一双快速晃动的手速度立即慢了下来，他脚上踏起迷幻步，身形快速朝旁边躲避开去。

Jiang Yi shouted to himself in his mind, as a black flash sparked in his left eye. The speed of the originally rapid-moving hand gestures before his eyes immediately slowed down. His legs applied the Psychedelic Step technique, allowing him to quickly move to the side and dodge the incoming attack.
江逸暗暗兴奋起来，宽慰了小奴几句，并告诉他现在他不用上西山了，去炼丹房做事了。这几天只要不出江家大院，江如虎等人倒是没办法截他。江家纵容子弟们彼此“切磋”，但他现在在炼丹房做事，江如虎多少也会有些顾忌，不敢在江家大院明着找他麻烦吧？

Jiang Yi silently felt exhilarated. He consoled Xiaonu with several words and informed her that he did not need to go up the Western Hills any longer as he was presently working at the alchemy lab.
So long as he did not leave the central courtyard over the next few days, Jiang Ruhu and his cronies would have no way to intercept and catch him. The Jiang Clan condoned their sons to "learn from one another," but now that he was working for the alchemy lab, surely Jiang Ruhu would more or less have some misgivings and not dare to give him trouble in the courtyard...
江逸暗暗叫苦，他万万没想到江如虎铸鼎境四重的实力，竟还如此小心谨慎？想到他父亲江云蛇年轻时候就有“竹叶青”的外号，阴险狡诈在天羽城是出了名的，他也就暗暗释然了。当下也没有别的办法，运转一缕黑色元力在眼中，咬牙朝前方冲去。

Jiang Yi cried to himself bitterly. He absolutely failed to consider how, in addition to his fourth-stage power level in the Cast Tripod Realm, Jiang Ruhu would actually be so careful and cautious. Thinking about how Jiang Ruhu's father Jiang Yunshe had the nickname "green bamboo snake" since youth and was infamous throughout Skyplume City for being treacherous and deceiful, Jiang Yi felt silently relieved. Jiang Yi also had no other choice but to circulate a wisp of black essence force into his eye and grit his teeth as he rushed forward.
江逸暗暗叫苦，却只能凭借视力变强带来的超强反应速度，见招拆招，艰难躲避。
Jiang Yi groaned inwardly, there was little he could do except trying to block and dodge each attack as and when it came, with the help of superior reaction brought about by his enhanced-vision.
江逸暗暗叹道，却突然听到背后一片唰唰声，他回头一看发现剩下的陪练全部朝后面退了数丈，明显不想上场找虐……

Jiang Yi silently sighed to himself. However, he suddenly heard a swishing sound behind him. He turned his head around to see all the remaining sparring partners had retreated backward by several tens of feet. It was evident that they did not want to enter combat and receive abuse...
江逸暗暗喃喃一句，有气无力的开始把刚才炼废的丹药收集起来，准备拿出去丢掉。

Jiang Yi mumbled to himself.
He listlessly started to collect all the discarded useless elixirs refined moments before, ready to take them out and throw them away.
江逸暗暗心惊，内心却很是失望和不解起来，怎么黑色元力没有增幅药效吗？看来这丹药不值几个钱了，或许对方都不会要了……

Jiang Yi was silently in fearful shock, yet deep in his heart he felt a sense of disappointment and puzzledness. How could it be that the black essence force did not increase the medical efficacy of the elixir? As it seemed like these elixir pills were not worth much, perhaps the buying party might not even want them...
江逸暗暗心惊，这种宝物他见过一次，江恨水在两年前家族大比显露过。他也看过一些书，知道这个世界的武器宝物从低到高分为利器，宝器，灵器，圣器四阶。也只有宝器级别以上神兵才能灌注元力，而一旦宝器灌注了元力将会削铁如泥，锋利无比！他这一拳要是敢砸下，整个拳头绝对会变成碎肉……

Jiang Yi was in silent shock. He had only seen such a treasure once before in his life, in the hands of Jiang Henshui at the family clan's Grand Tournament two years ago; in addition, he had read several books on the subject, so he knew that all weapons in this world were graded into four ranks, in order from low to high: Keen Artifact, Treasured Artifact, Numinous Artifact, and Sacred Artifact. Only weapons that belonged to the rank of Treasured Artifact and above could be infused with essence force. Once this was done, the treasured artifact would become so powerful and sharp-edged that it could slice through metal like it was mud! If Jiang Yi dared to land his fist, it would surely become minced meat...
江逸暗暗惊叹，看来这练功房内有某种奇异的阵法，能禁锢里面所有武者的元力。

Jiang Yi silently sighed to himself in surprise. Looks like there was some sort of mysterious magical spell at work in that technique practicing room that could prohibit the use of essence forces by all martial artists inside.
江逸暗暗惊疑，那少爷却一言不发进了练功房，江逸只好跟了进去。
Jiang Yi was in silent bewilderment. The young master in the meantime had gone into the Technique Practising Room without another word. Jiang Yi had no choice but to follow him in.
江逸暗暗想到，目光偷偷的朝姬听雨看去，想看看她有什么反应？
Jiang Yi silently wondered, if he stole a glance in the direction of Ji Tingyu, what reaction would she give him?
江逸暗暗感慨一声，不过拳影多少对于他完全无效，因为他能清楚的看到对方的真实拳身，就算对方幻出一百个拳影也是一样的。

Jiang Yi quietly sighed to himself sorrowfully. However, the fist silhouettes were completely ineffective against him, as he could see clearly his opponent's real fists - it would be the same result, even if his opponent produced the images of one hundred fist silhouettes.
江逸暗暗感慨一声，脸上并不慌乱，他的视力极其恐怖，江如龙的攻击轨迹他预算得清清楚楚，身子继续朝前方冲去，不过半个身子后仰轻松躲过江如龙的鞭腿，一双手运转缠丝手闪电般的缠住江如龙的另外一条腿，猛然用力抡了起来。

Jiang Yi sighed in silent but didn't panic. He had terrific visions and could clearly predict Jiang Rulong's attack trajectories. He continued to dash towards the front but took half a step back to easily dodge Jiang Rulong's leg whip. He then used the Silk Hands to wrap around Jiang Rulong's other leg and began to whirl vigorously.
江逸暗暗打定主意，无所事事取来扫帚打扫起来，刚刚把整个炼丹房内外都打扫完毕，就看到一个高大身影快步冲进来，一头灰白色的头发如杂草般散乱，一双鼓起来的牛眼更是满是血丝，他一边走还一边神神叨叨的喃喃道：“没道理，没道理啊，这地阶丹药里面的那种莫名成分到底是什么？到底是什么？难道是白芷粉？或者是姜黄……”

After silently making up his mind on the matter, with nothing better to do he picked up a broom and started sweeping the floor. Just as he completed cleaning up the entire alchemy lab from inside and out, he saw a giant figure rush in with quick steps. The figure had a head of grey-white hair that was messy like weeds and a pair of bulging, bloodshot eyes.
"This doesn't make sense," the figure muttered. "It doesn't make sense at all! What is the mysterious unknown ingredient that is in this earth-level elixir? What on earth could it be? Perhaps it is angelica dahurica powder? Or could it be tumeric..."
江逸暗暗抱怨起来，转念想到，好像自己身上还有一枚最低级的元力丹？他不是有黑色元力吗？他完全可以增幅这元力丹的药效啊？那样不就可以快速修炼吗？

Just then he remembered that it seemed like there was still lowest-grade essence force pill. And did he not have black essence force? Surely, he could increase the medicinal efficacy of the essence force pill. In that way, could he not speedily practice and refine?
江逸暗暗沉吟，一名黑袍管事模样老头走了过来，扫了他一眼，递给他一块青铜打制的狼头面具，漠然说道：“带上面具，你的代号是苍狼，等下我会叫你上场。你是铜牌陪练，陪练到天黑算一天，一两银子，中途退出，没钱。”

As Jiang Yi was pondering on his situation, an old man wearing a black robe and giving off the appearance of a manager walked over to him.
Giving him a glance, he passed to Jiang Yi a wolf-head mask made of bronze before coldly saying, "Put on the mask. Your code name is 'Lone Wolf'. Later I will call on you to take the field.
"You are a bronze-token-grade sparring partner. The workday of a sparring partner is counted if he works from dawn to dusk, while the daily rate is a tael of silver. If you quit in the middle of the day, you get no money."
江逸暗暗点头，他外面买的黑袍也是便宜货，这管事没有让人把他赶出去，还如此礼貌，天羽城第一大商号果然不凡。

Jiang Yi nodded silently. The black robes he bought outside was considered cheap-quality goods, yet not only did this housekeeper not chase him out, he had even remained ever-so courteous. The number one merchant-house of Skyplume City was indeed special.
江逸暗暗狂喜，压在心头的一块大石头，终于放下来一半。本来非常不想在这柳长老手下干活，此刻倒是一百个乐意了。

Jiang Yi was secretly in ecstasy, finally being able to put down some of the stress applying pressure on his heart like a rock. Initially, he was very unwilling to work under Elder Liu; at this moment he was more than happy to do so.
江逸暗暗着急，时间已经不早了，他如果耽误药田清点，怕是又要被荣管事责骂了。问题是伤势没好，他根本不敢上药山，怕被江如虎等人给堵了。

Jiang Yi was inwardly anxious. It was no longer early—should he delay taking stock in the herb fields, he might get scolded by Chief Rong again. The problem was that, with his unhealed wounds, he did not dare to go to the fields at all, for he was scared of being harassed by Jiang Ruhu and his gang.
江逸暗道不妙，他黑色元力全部用完，恰好眼中也黑光一闪逐渐的模糊起来，显然眼睛附近的黑色元力已消耗干净了。没有黑色元力，他就是实实在在的铸鼎境一重武者，哪是这铸鼎境二重护卫的对手？

Jiang Yi sensed that he was in trouble. He had already used up all his black essence force, while coincidentally the dark spark in his eye was also gradually becoming increasingly blurry. It was evident that the black essence force near his eyes had been completely consumed.
Without black essence force, he was in reality just a martial artist at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. How could he be any match for this guard at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm?
江逸暗道不妙，却是不敢冒然动手抢夺令牌，因为那护卫被这马家公子一喝立即收回了令牌，他出手的话没把握夺下令牌，只能冷着脸朝马家公子望去。

Jiang Yi could sense that the situation was heading downhill, but he dared not risk taking the command token by force. With the guard withdrawing the command token to himself the moment he heard the Ma Family young master's shout, there was no guarantee that Jiang Yi could succeed in forcibly taking it. All he could do was looking coldly at the Ma Family young master.
江逸暗道不妙，此刻武殿内到底有多少公子小姐进来闭关修炼了？该有多么缺陪练啊？竟如此饥不择食，他一个铸鼎境一重的陪练，对方还生怕他不干了。

Jiang Yi thought to himself that something was amiss. How many young masters and young mistresses were there in the Martial Arts Hall? Should there be that bad of a shortage of sparring partners?
It was unbelievable that the adage "beggars cannot be choosers" could apply to them now, and that even Jiang Yi with his power level at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm could apply to be a sparring partner; better yet, the other people involved were even scared that he would decide to quit.
江逸有些可怜的望着这位被打成猪头的仁兄，这人只是铸鼎境二重，那翊小姐实力明显最少都是铸鼎境四重，就算双方元力封印了，也完全不是一个级别的。

Jiang Yi looked sympathetically at his dear comrade-in-arms who had just been beaten to a pulp. This man was only at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, whereas that Young Mistress Yi evidently had a power level minimally at the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Even if the essence force of the two sparring parties were sealed, the two were completely not a match for each other.
江逸有些无语，江家姓柳的长老可就只有一个……
Jiang Yi was somewhat speechless—there was only one elder with the surname Liu in the Jiang Clan after all...
江逸本想把江如虎等人偷药更殴打他的事情说出来，但才开口就忍住了。因为他刚想起那江如虎的父亲好像就是家族的大管事，更是眼前这位荣管事的顶头上司。这事要是爆出来，只怕这荣管事不仅不会帮他，反而会指黑为白，重重责罚他吧？

Jiang Yi was about to relate the incident of Jiang Ruhu and his cronies stealing medicine and beating him up, but he stopped himself just as he opened his mouth to speak. He had remembered that not only was Jiang Ruhu’s father the family’s chief supervisor, he was also Chief Rong’s head honcho. Should this incident be revealed by Jiang Yi… not only would Chief Rong not help him at all, Chief Rong may even invert right and wrong and punish him instead!
江逸欣喜若狂，取出丹炉内三枚黑色丹药，闻着里面的淡淡清香，他激动的身子都颤抖不停，看着手心的三枚丹药就像看着三个脱光衣服的美女般诱人。

Jiang Yi was wild with joy. Retrieving the three black elixir pills from within the cauldron, and smelling the faint fragrant odor emitting from the cauldron, he was so excited that his body was uncontrollably shaking. He stared intently at the three pills in his palm, the pills being alluring like three naked beautiful ladies.
江逸正低头打扫，猛然抬头一看，被这人吓了一跳，定睛一看才连忙拱手行礼：“柳长老好。”

Jiang Yi was sweeping the floor with his head lowered. When he suddenly raised his head to take a look, he got a shock from the appearance of this person. Getting a good look, he hastily cupped his heads, bowed, and greeted, "Greetings, Elder Liu."
江逸正瞅得有趣，哪知下一瞬间，异变再生！
Just as Jiang Yi’s interest reached a peak, the words experienced a complete transformation!
江逸此时的心跳有点加快，一种说不清道不明的兴奋感洋溢在心头。无意中捡到一种增强实力的办法，即便依旧没有改变他修炼元力缓慢的体质，但至少能让他将江豹给轻松击败，让他胸中这股压抑多年的闷气终于痛快的发泄了出来。

Jiang Yi's heartbeat quickened as an unexplainable excitement washed over him. Having unwittingly picked up a method that could increase his strength, he could, at least, defeat Jiang Bao easily. This was despite not being able to change his body, which accumulated essence force at a snail’s pace. He would finally be released from his suffering.
江逸死里逃生，连忙擦了擦冷汗，紧张地注视着柳长老的一举一动。
Jiang Yi had just escaped from death. Hurriedly wiping off his cold sweat, he nervously observed Elder Liu's every little move.
江逸每天大部分时间都在闭关修炼，每天只睡两三个时辰，每每想到江小奴一个人孤苦伶仃的在家，也不知道会不会出事，他的心就急如火焚，恨不得立即修炼到铸鼎境四重，好回家看看。

Jiang Yi was in seclusion most of the time, sleeping only four to six hours every day. Whenever he thought of Jiang Xiaonu alone and hapless at home, with no way of knowing if she was all right, his heart became aflame with anxiety and worry, and he would fervently wish that he could the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm right here, right now, so he could go back home.
江逸气炸了，这可不单单是一块令牌，而是小奴的命啊！他咬牙低头下去，不断在内心默念要冷静要冷静，今日不能出手，否则事情闹大了对小奴没好处。

Jiang Yi was almost bursting at the seams with rage: this was not just some command token, Xiaonu's life depended on it! With his teeth clenched and head bowed, he silently told himself over and over to remain calm. He would not lash out today - to do otherwise would do Xiaonu no good.
江逸沉吟了一阵，便不再多想，开始快速的提炼黑色元力，破解封印。他现在每天能破解十枚封印符文左右，其余时间都用来修炼，修炼速度也在逐步提升，此刻都达到了原先的七八倍左右了，尽管这速度相对而言依旧很慢，但江逸已经非常满足了。

Jiang Yi muttered to himself for a moment, before deciding not to overthink and instead starting to quickly refine more black essence force to break his seal. At the present moment, he could remove approxmiately ten of the runic patterns on the seal daily. The remaining time was spent on power cultivation. His cultivation speed was also gradually increasing, presently reaching up to seven or eight times of his original speed. Even though comparatively speaking this speed was still very slow, Jiang Yi was already very satisfied with such results.
江逸沉吟起来：“看来还是黑色元力太少的缘故，我昨天尝试修炼那无名口诀半个时辰后，就因为效果不佳终止了修炼，所以只修炼出来一丝黑色元力储存在左臂里。在刚才使出摔碑手的时候，这丝黑色元力大概就已经消耗完了吧，所以后面蛇鞭腿的威力才又恢复了正常。”

"From the looks of it,” Jiang Yi muttered pensively, ”it has to be because there's insufficient black essence force. I only tried practicing the nameless formula for one hour yesterday and stopped when the results were not ideal.”
“The sliver of black essence force I cultivated only accumulated in my left arm. The power of the Wrestling Hand exceeded the norm as it drained the sliver of black essence force. The force behind the Snake Whip Leg was average as it only used my regular essence force.”
江逸沉思一阵，将丹田内的一缕黑色元力调集出来，运转到眼角的经脉内，却发现和原先并没有不同，视力虽然一样变得恐怖但却并没有进一步的增幅。

Jiang Yi contemplated deeply for a moment, before summoning a wisp of black essence force out from within his dantian and circulating it to the meridians at the corner of his eye. However, he discovered that there was no difference from before - while his sight had changed an obscene amount as before, yet this change was not greater than before.
江逸沉默的走进去，等门一关那翊飞儿立即脸色一沉，双腿一点，双拳化作漫天的拳影就朝江逸砸来，力道十足。

Jiang Yi wordlessly went in. The moment the doors were shut, Yi Fei-er's expression darkened; her legs pushed off the ground, fists transforming into fist silhouettes the filled the air, hurtling towards Jinag Yi with sheer power.
江逸没有去武殿，而是一路狂奔回到了江家，走进江家大院后他绷紧的心才放松了下来。
Jiang Yi did not head to the Martial Arts Hall; rather, he darted all the way home. It was only until he stepped into the Jiang Clan backyard that his frayed nerves relaxed.
江逸没有去追，反而有些诧异的望着自己的双腿，他刚才那几腿几乎是全力施展，却只能将江豹踢飞一丈远？力量明显比刚才少了很多，很明显又恢复了正常水平……

Jiang Yi did not chase after him. His attention was focused on his legs. Earlier, he had exerted all his strength in the kicks he threw, but they only managed to send Jiang Bao flying ten feet back. Its power was definitely lacking compared to his earlier strikes. It was on par with his original strength.
江逸没有理会马飞，勒住马飞的那只手快速一闪，化作掌刀在马飞一只手掌一切，马飞手掌吃痛手中握住的一块令牌被江逸抓住。
Jiang Yi ignored Ma Fei; the hand that was on Ma Fei's neck moved rapidly and cut down on Ma Fei's palm in a chopping movement, causing him to jerk in pain and release the command token in his hand.
江逸没有说话，继续沉默，在江如虎不耐烦准备一挥手让人攻击时，他却突然开口道：“好！我爬，只希望……虎哥你说话算数。”

Jiang Yi did not utter a word, instead remaining completely silent. It was only when Jiang Ruhu, in his impatience, was ready to wave his hand and allow his men to launch their attack, that Jiang Yi suddenly opened his mouth and responded, "Very well! I'll crawl. I just hope that... Brother Hu, you will keep your promise."
江逸没有那么蠢，本想朝江如龙一脚踩下的腿立即收了回来，满脸正色的望着锦袍众人拱手行礼道。

Jiang Yi wasn't stupid, the leg that was originally about to trample on Jiang Rulong, was withdrawn immediately. He looked at the robed individuals with an unflinching expression while bowing with respect.
江逸没说话，眸子内却要喷火了，按江小奴说的结合他看到的场景，他可以百分百确定，今天这事是风月楼那个管事搞的鬼。

Jiang Yi said nothing, but his pupils appeared to be spouting fire. Based on what Xiaonu said, combined with the context he had witnessed, he could confirm with one hundred percent accuracy that the events that happened today was caused by that housekeeper from Fengyue Brothel.
江逸浑身一颤，立即头摇得拨浪鼓般，果断拒绝道：“不行啊，柳长老，我不懂炼丹，我什么也不会，而且……我现在还在药田内做事，我要是在您这帮忙，荣管事那边没办法交代啊。”

Jiang Yi shuddered and immediately shook his head like a rattle drum, resolutely rejecting the offer. "No way, Elder Liu. I don't know how to refine elixirs—for the matter I don't know anything. On top of that... I'm right now still working in the herb plantations. If I were to work for you here, I don't know how I’d account to Chief Rong."
江逸淡淡一笑，淡淡瞥了江如虎一眼，看着他那张肥嘟嘟的胖脸，内心一阵厌恶，他飒然一笑道：“柳长老前两日交代了，任何人来取丹药都不给，江如虎你想拿丹药，自己取吧，我可不敢帮你们拿。”

Jiang Yi smiled faintly and slightly shot Jiang Ruhu a glance. Seeing his round chubby cheeks, he left a sense of disgust and hatred in his heart.
Yet he smiled sweetly and replied, "Elder Liu gave the instruction two days ago that no one is allowed to retrieve any elixirs. Jiang Ruhu, if you want to take elixirs, go ahead and take them yourself. I do not dare to help you two take any."
江逸淡淡一笑，轻描淡写的回了一句：“十日之后，午时三刻，我会出江家西门，那附近有一条小巷，我在那等着你，希望你别迟到了。”

Jiang Yi laughed faintly. "In ten days' time, at the forty-fifth minute after noon, I will leave the western door of the Jiang Residence. There is a small alleyway near that door. I'll be there waiting for you, so I hope you won't be late."
江逸满眸愕然，他陪人对练还能让对方武技快速大成？这个世界有如此邪门的事情？不过……好像这翊小姐最近武技进步的速度的确有些夸张吧？难道真是因为他？

Jiang Yi's eyes were filled with surprise. He could help someone's martial art technique to achieve phenomenal success through sparring? Could there be such a bizarre thing in this world? Although... Young Mistress Yi's progress did seem unnaturally fast recently, was it really because of him?
江逸满脸尴尬，进也不是，退也不是，愣在原地。
Jiang Yi's face showed his awkwardness—standing his ground on the original spot where he was at, neither entering nor leaving.
江逸满脸的震愕，原本他还想着等以后黑色元力多了，尝试运转黑色元力全力攻击，看看威力是否巨大？如果确定威力增幅很大，那么就算这黑色元力修炼的速度比原本蓝色元力还要慢上很多，他也要慢慢改练这无名功法了。

Jiang Yi's face was full of shock. Originally he had thought that when he had increased his black essence force in the future, he could try to work the essence force in a full-powered attack and see if the power was enormous. If he could confirm that his power had increased greatly, he wanted to slowly change and practice this nameless cultivation technique instead, even if the speed of cultivating black essence force was much slower than that of the original blue essence force.
江逸点了点头，如果不是因为这一点，他怎么舍得把两枚金叶子送给这荣管事？江家族规森严，未经家族允许擅自离开本族的按叛族罪处理，如果江逸死在外面倒是好说，如果定罪了被江家子弟看到，那是有权当场格杀的。

Jiang Yi nodded: he would not have willingly given Chief Rong the two pieces of gold leaf were he not intending to prevent exactly that from happening. The Jiang Clan had strict family laws: any member who left the family clan without permission would be pronounced as a renegade. Should such a fate befall on Jiang Yi, the easier alternative would be if he were already dead, as compared to being found by any of the Jiang Clan descendants, who would have unopposed authority to kill on sight.
江逸点了点头，快速道来：“第一，我不能一整天在武殿，当然如果有时间我会尽量来武殿，第二我需要……预支薪水。”

Jiang Yi nodded his head and speedily replied, "Firstly, I cannot be in the Martial Arts Hall for the entire day. Of course, if I have the time, I will try my best to be in the Martial Arts Hall. Secondly, I need... an advance on my pay."
江逸点了点头，既来之则安之，平时没机会进这种富贵子弟玩的高端地方，现在来见见世面也是好的。

Jiang Yi nodded his head. Since he was already there, he should make the best of it. After all, he normally did not have the opportunity to enter such a high-end place, where children of rich and powerful families came to play. It was also good to be able to see the world.
江逸点了点头，转身离开准备回家疗伤，不料那荣管事突然开口道：“对了，江逸，你既然去炼丹房做事了，我给你的令牌交上来吧，以后也不要没事上西山了。”

Jiang Yi nodded his head and turned around to return home, ready to heal his wounds. Unexpectedly, Chief Rong suddenly opened his mouth and said, "Right, Jiang Yi, since you're headed to work at the alchemy lab, return me the command token I gave you. Don't head up to the Western Hills if you have no business there either."
江逸狐疑的眨了眨眼，问道：“没问题了，只是我们不需要缔结契约之类的吗？”
Still filled with doubt, Jiang Yi blinked his eyes and asked, "I don't have any other questions, just that... Don't we need to sign a contract of mutual agreement or something like that?"
江逸玩得不亦乐乎，只要融合了一丝黑色元力，那么操作江水诀元力配合武技击出的威力，就会比原先增大两到三倍。
Jiang Yi had a great time. All he needed was to fuse the two essence force, and his strength would increase threefold.
江逸琢磨了一下，果断放弃疗伤，开始转练无名功法，提炼黑色元力。
Jiang Yi pondered for a while and gave up on healing his injuries. He started practicing the nameless cultivation technique instead, to extract some black essence force.
江逸生生的承受那一个铸鼎境三重武者一拳，只为更快速的接近江如虎，只为此刻喷他一脸血。他这是一场豪赌，毕竟铸鼎境三重的武者力量已经达到三马之力，他那一拳不是关键时提速一分，抵消了一些力量，此刻江逸后背骨头都断了。还有他人在半空，假如江如虎不冒然冲上来，还是继续躲避，他就前功尽弃了。

Jiang Yi had rawly bore the brunt of a single punch from that martial artist whose power level was in the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm - if only to much quickly get closer to Jiang Ruhu and spit blood into his face at that precise moment. That one action was a big gamble for him. After all, that martial artist, whose power level was in the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, had three horsepower worth of strength. If he had not chosen to increase the speed of his single punch by a notch and neutralised some of the power in his fist in the process, Jiang Yi's spine bone would have been completely broken right now. Additionally, with Jiang Yi in mid-air, if Jiang Ruhu had not rashly rushed forward and instead chosen to continue avoiding any incoming attacks, Jiang Yi would have wasted all his efforts.
江逸略微失望地睁开双眼，这无名口诀的确能修炼，也真能练出一缕元力，可惜提炼天地元气的速度比他现在修炼的江水决还要慢了不少……

Jiang Yi opened both his eyes with some disappointment. This nameless chant could indeed help him cultivate his essence force, and the method did indeed produce some results—it was just unfortunate that the speed at which he was cultivating heaven-and-earth essence force through this style was much too slow compared to the Jiang Water Art he practiced regularly.
江逸百分百的确定，造成这封印变幻的原因绝对是黑色元力！这元力丹他以前吞服过很多，但从没有出现这样的异变。唯一的解释那就是——黑色元力能让封印的符文变少，能帮他破解封印。

Jiang Yi was a hundred percent confident that the reason for the change on the seal was most definitely the black essence force! In the past, he had consumed many essence force elixirs, yet such a mysterious change had never manifested before. The only possible explanation was that the black essence force could reduce the number of runic patterns in that seal, and in turn help him completely break that seal.
江逸的丹田内不出意外的再次提炼出一缕黑色元力。
As expected, he managed to extract a wisp of black essence force from his dantian.
江逸的丹田谁也不知道是好是坏！
Everyone knew the quality of Jiang Yi's dantian.
江逸的双腿如一条毒蛇般附上江如虎身体，暴风雨般连续不断踢下，而且踢的地方全是江如虎的四肢，每一脚尽管没有运转黑色元力，但也力道十足，伴随着一阵骨头碎裂声，江如虎的两只手一条腿瞬间被踢断，痛得在地上翻滚惨嚎起来。

Both of Jiang Yi's legs attached themselves to Jiang Ruhu's body like a poisonous snake, and continuously kicked downwards like a torrential downpour. On top of that, the locations where he kicked into were all four of Jiang Ruhu's limbs. Even though he did not circulate any black essence force into each foot, each kick was nontheless done with ample strength. The kicks were swiftly followed by the sound of bones cracking, as two of Jiang Ruhu's hands and one of his legs were broken instantly. This left Jiang Ruhu rolling on the ground, as he started howled miserably due to his acute pain.
江逸的右腿早早的甩了出去，如一条毒蛇般朝江松的顶来的小腿部扫去。
Jiang Yi's right leg had been released much earlier, flying towards and blocking Jiang Song's lower leg like a poisonous snake.
江逸的头深深的低下，袖子内的拳头紧紧握住，条条青筋暴起，身子微微颤抖，一股戾气缓缓释放出来，就像是一只被激怒竖起鬃毛的狮子。

Jiang Yi bent down his head deeply; his fists in the sleeves were clenching so tightly that veins were popping up through skin. Jiang Yi's body shook with light tremors, slowly emitting an aura of hostility and viciousness. He was like an angered lion with bristling manes.
江逸的左眼很快黑光一闪，他眼前的世界再次改变，江松本来速度还算不错的双掌，也变得缓慢起来。
Jiang Yi's left eye flashed bright black. The world before his eyes changed once again. Jiang Song's twin palms, normally moving at a pretty fast speed, also seemed to slow down somewhat.
江逸的心神完全被手心的一片紫色金叶子吸引了，他这辈子可是从没见过紫金。他呼吸都变得急促起来，完全没有在意这小姐的话，随意摆手道：“行，以后有这样的丹药，一定卖给你们聚珍阁，在下还有事就先告辞了……”

Jiang Yi's attention was completely drawn to the piece of purple gold leaf in his palm. He had never seen purple gold before in his life. His breathing had even become hurried and brief. Without caring at all the words of the young mistress, he casually waved his hands and said, "Very well. The next time I have such elixir pills, I will definitely sell them to you at the Pearl Gathering Pavilion. I have other things to attend to, so I will take my leave now..."
江逸的目的其实很明确，既然逃无可逃，那只有战了！而今日要想安然脱身，那唯有……拿下江如虎。

Jiang Yi's aim was actually very clear-cut - since he had no way of escape, he had no choice but to fight his way out! On top of that, if he wanted to get away safely, there was no choice but to... take down Jiang Ruhu.
江逸的眼睛一直死死盯着着对方的反应，此刻见对方果然来抓他偷袭的左手顿时大喜，早就准备好的右腿膝盖，猛然对着这护卫的下身顶去。

Jiang Yi's eyes had been consistently fixed on his opponent to catch his every reaction. Jiang Yi was immediately elated upon seeing that his opponent was indeed trying to catch the left hand Jiang Yi used in his sneak attack at that moment. With a right knee that he had prepared in advance, he suddenly kicked upwards, in the direction of the lower half of the guard's body.
江逸的确不想再多管闲事，只是他不清点药田内的草参，就没法回去复命。那点微薄的月例将会全被扣掉，小奴也将会更加辛苦的在外面做工……

Indeed, Jiang Yi did not want to meddle in Jiang Bao’s business. It was just that… if he could not account for the grass ginseng grown in the medicinal plantations, he could not report back to Supervisor Rong. He would end up having his already morsel-sized monthly salary docked fully… and Xiaonu would have to work even harder outside…
江逸的缠丝手还没抓住姬听雨的手掌，却被对方一记掌刀砍中，一阵生疼传来他的双手立即被震退，身子也因一股巨力震得连退三步。而姬听雨的身影早已经站立在原地，含笑盈盈望着他。

Before Jiang Yi's Silk Hand technique could grab hold of Ji Tingyu's palms, his opponent's palms had cut down his hands in a chopping movement. A fresh agonising pain reveberating from his hands forced him to pull back immediately in shock, while a great shockwave caused him to continuously retreat backwards by three steps. As for Ji Tingyu, her figure remained rooted and standing at attention on her original spot, while she herself observed him with a bright smile on her face.
江逸的背微微弓着，如一只野兽般盯着江如虎，余光四处扫视，两耳时刻倾听四周的所有响动声，脑海内疯狂转动，寻找破局之法。

Jiang Yi bent his back slightly and stared at Jiang Ruhu like a wild beast. He gazed his surroundings through his perpheral vision, while both of his ears were constantly and attentively listening to all movements and sounds. His mind was spinning like crazy, as he tried to find a way to break out of his current circumstances.
江逸的蛇鞭腿紧随其后而来，不断踢在刘管事的大腿上，再次把他震退几步，而江逸的身子则借助这几腿之力一跃而上，身子在半空中扭转，单拳对着旁边满眸惊愕的马公子狠狠砸去。

Jiang Yi's Snake Whip Leg followed closely behind, raining hits on Housekeeper Liu's thighs and forcing him back several steps farther. In the same instant, leveraging on the strength of the multiple kicks he delivered, Jiang Yi leaped up into the air. He turned in mid-air to face the stunned Young Master Ma and raised a fist to punch him hard.
江逸的计谋不错，但他算错了一点，江如虎见江逸冲上来，竟然没有大怒迎上去，反而身子快速爆退，同时大喝起来催促众人朝江逸围攻而去。

Jiang Yi's strategy was not bad, but he miscalculated one thing - Jiang Ruhu had seen Jiang Yi rush towards him and, instead of being enraged and meeting him head-on, he instead retreated backwards in explosive haste. At the same time, he started shouting loudly to urge his gangmembers to attack in the direction of Jiang Yi from all sides.
江逸的话刚刚说完，武堂长老的大手就呼啸而去，重重拍在他左肩。江逸的左肩膀瞬间衣袍爆裂，鲜血横飞，整个人重重撞在墙壁上，反弹回来在地面翻滚几圈才挣扎站了起来！

Just as Jiang Yi finished his statement, the Martial Court Elder's hand hurtled over and landed a heavy pat on his left shoulder. Jiang Yi's left shoulder's robe instantly burst apart with fresh blood splattering across as he crashed into the wall. He bounced off the wall and tumbled for a few rounds before struggling to get up!
江逸的话说的很隐晦，但冰雪聪明的姬听雨，又怎么会听不出潜在意思。他不喜欢和她们这群公子小姐有交集，而一旦姬听雨不断找他，麻烦就会随之而来……

Jiang Yi's words were obscure, but to someone as smart as Ji Tingyu, the veiled meaning was crystal clear: he did not like associating with the young masters and mistresses of her kind, and as long as Ji Tingyu interacted with him, trouble would follow...
江逸的身份是旁系少爷，按照江家规矩，他每月本可以领取三枚辅助修炼的人阶中品的“元魂丹”，还有两枚人阶中品的疗伤丹药“黑参丹”，方便修炼时不小心受伤及时疗伤。

As a young master from a branch family, according to Jiang Clan laws, Jiang Yi could redeem three Man-tier medial-grade "Essence Soul Pills", which could help in his refining training; as well as two Man-tier medial-grade "Black Ginseng Elixirs", healing elixirs that could be easily and quickly taken should he injure himself during refining and training.
江逸的身子如风般朝那屋子内冲去，房门关上的，他一脚重重的踹了上去。此刻他脚上元力灌注，这一脚力道十足，房门瞬间四分五裂，轰然倒下。

Jiang Yi swiftly rushed towards the building. He gave the closed door a heavy kick that was infused with essence force. The strength of the kick was sufficient to destroy the door into pieces as it fell.
江逸的速度的确增快了两三倍，情急之下他动用了一丝黑色元力在左腿，速度一下如风驰电击，只是十几个呼吸时间他就从家族西门冲出了外面大街上，幸好路上没遇到江家的族人，否则肯定让人起疑的……

Jiang Yi's speed had indeed increased two to three times. In his anxiety, he had used a sliver of black essence force on his left leg, raising his speed to that of a lightning bolt. In about half a minute, he dashed out of the clan's western gate and onto the streets outside. Luckily, he was not seen by anyone from the Jiang Clan clan, otherwise he would definitely raised some eyebrows…
江逸盘坐在后院，暗暗咬牙，这几天时间他的封印上的符文又破解了数十枚，修炼速度还在逐步的增加，已经达到了原先的是七八倍。

Sitting cross-legged in the backyard, Jiang Yi silently clenched his teeth. Over the past few days, he had removed many runic characters on his seal. His refining speed was also progressively increasing. It had now reached seven or eight times his original speed.
江逸盘坐地上琢磨起来，想了很久却完全不知道怎么办。突然，他眼睛一亮，一拍脑袋站了起来朝偏厅内走去。

Jiang Yi sat cross-legged on the ground and started to reflect on what happened. He pondered for a long time, but he completely had no idea what to do. Suddenly, his eyes lit up. Slapping himself on the forehead, he stood up and walked towards the interior of the side room.
江逸目光一开始就被江恨水吸引了，所以并没有注意跟在他身后的人，此刻听到声音却不用看都知道，后面跟着的人是谁了。

Jiang Yi's attention had just been absorbed by Jiang Henshui, so he did not pay attention to the person behind him. He did not need to see to know the person speaking and following behind Jiang Henshui.
江逸目光死死锁定那两只真实的拳影，脑海内快速预算对方的攻击轨迹和速度，提前判断，先一步躲避退走，让对方再次砸空。

Jiang Yi's eyes were firmly locked on to the figures of her two actual fists, as he calculated at quick speed in his brain the opposing party's attack trajectory and speed.
As he had already predicted the incoming attacks in advance, he had already taken the action to avoid the attack and retreat backward, allowing the opposing party to hit nothing but air once again.
江逸直接打断他的话，沉着脸警告道：“小奴，你记住，从今天开始你再也不许离开江家大院，否则你就不要认我这个少爷了。”

Jiang Yi cut her off immediately and warned her, "Xiaonu, you must remember, from today onwards you will never be allowed to leave the Jiang Residence Central Courtyard. Otherwise, you can forget about ever recognizing me as your Young Master anymore."
江逸看到江松如此，有些愧疚的宽慰道：“江松，对不起，我也不是有意的……”
Seeing Jiang Song's condition, with some regret Jiang Yi tried to console him by saying, "Jiang Song, I'm sorry. I did not mean to do it..."
江逸看到马飞的脸色就知道要坏事了，暗道晦气，今日出门这么没看黄历？恰好遇到了马家的纨绔少爷？这马家和江家是世仇，马家的任何一名纨绔少爷遇到今天这事，肯定都会出手。

One look at Ma Fei's demeanor told Jiang Yi that things would not go well. He silently cursed his bad luck. Why had he not consulted the almanac today before leaving the house? And to have so coincidentally come across such a wastrel playboy of the Ma Family? With the feud between the Ma and Jiang families, any wastrel descendant in the Ma Family would have chosen to take action against him.
江逸看得砰然心动，这柳长老可是说了爱拿多少拿多少，那不是表明他可以多拿几枚丹药，还可以拿人阶中品、上品的丹药？

Jiang Yi felt a rush of excitement the more he looked. Elder Liu did say he could take as much as he wanted, so does that not mean that he could take more elixirs, and even take those elixirs of Man-tier medial or even superior grade?
江逸眨了眨眼睛，暗道侥幸，不过看到对方的拳头近在咫尺，他也顾不上多想，下意识的继续运转元力，身形一扭朝旁边躲避，同时双手也继续朝江豹打出的重拳架去。

Jiang Yi blinked his eyes in disbelief, feeling relieved on the inside. However, seeing the opponent’s fists within mere inches from his face, without thinking too much, he subconsciously continued to circulate his essence force. He moved his body to the side to avoid the attack while shooting both his fists at Jiang Bao.
江逸眸子一下冷了下来，不是因为对方又要他入赘，而是因为这翊龙宇提到了江家。
Jiang Yi's expression turned icy, not at yet another request for him to marry into the Yi Family, but at Yi Longyu's mention of the Jiang Clan.
江逸眸子内冷意一闪，不过他却没有像昨日那般冒然过去查看，不想再惹事端的话，只能佯装没看到，继续清点草参。

A chill went down Jiang Yi’s spine. Unlike the day before, however, he did not rashly rush over to check, but rather decided to ignore the noise and instead pretend to not have heard it. He continued counting the medicinal plants around him, lest he faced new problems.
江逸眸子闪烁，脑海一转，突然有个很胆大的想法：“难道是因为我注入了两缕黑色元力，这才炸丹的？剩下两枚不仅没炸，反而由白色变成了黑色？也是因为这两缕黑色元力的缘故？”

Jiang Yi's eyes flickered as his mind raced, suddenly coming up with a bold idea. What if the exploding elixirs were caused by me inserting two strands of black essence force? Not only did the remaining two pills not explode, their colors changed from white to black? Were these two strands of black essence force also the reason behind it?
江逸眼中恨意一闪，这人他认识，是昨日和江如虎一起偷药，一同殴打他的家族旁系子弟之一，也是江如虎的著名狗腿子。估计这厮以为自己才被打伤，今日应该不会上山，又贪心地跑来多偷点药吧？

Jiang Yi felt a surge of hatred. He knew this boy. He had stolen medicine with Jiang Ruhu yesterday and was one of the many branch members who ganged up to beat up Jiang Yi. In other words, he was one of Jiang Ruhu’s many infamous lackeys. It seemed likely that this idiot had presumed that Jiang Yi was badly injured in the fight and that he was unlikely to go to the Western Hills. Due to this, he had returned to the plantation fields to steal more medicinal plants.
江逸眼中露出一丝狠色，和春芽交代一声，拔腿就往外狂奔而去。时间紧迫，他也没时间去多想了，只能孤身前往，就算被活活打死他也必须救出江小奴。

After that, he took to his heels and dashed out. He did not have the luxury of time to think through the matter. All he could do was head out alone. Even if he was beaten to death, he had to save Jiang Xiaonu.
江逸眼中黑光一闪，第一次动用黑色元力，他冷喝一声身子如一道残影般朝前方冲去，双拳幻化成六道残影，将最前方的江顾水笼罩进去。

Jiang Yi's eyes had a flash of black light. This was his first time utilizing the black essence forces. With a shout, his body was like a phantom dashing forward. His fists produced six phantom afterimages and shrouded Jiang Gushui who was leading the charge.
江逸眼中黑光流转，江如虎的动作一切清晰可见，轻松判断出他攻击的轨迹，融合了一丝黑色元力的拳头长驱直入重重的砸在江如虎的左肩上。

A black flash circulated within Jiang Yi's eyes, allowing him to clearly and distinctly see Jiang Ruhu's every action. As such, he could easily determine Jiang Ruhu's attack trajectory. His fist, which had merged with a wisp of black essence force, drove straight and smashed heavily into Jiang Ruhu's left shoulder.
江逸眼眸一亮，感激的抱拳一揖，内心也被激起豪气冲天，笑道：“他日若是凌云志，一定不忘小姐的教诲。”

Jiang Yi's eyes lit up. He cupped his fists raised them in gratitude. A heroic spirit was also aroused and soared highly in his heart. Smiling, he replied, "In the future, should I achieve greatness, I would definitely not forget Young Mistress's teachings and advice."
江逸眼眸一冷，这风月楼他知道，是江家所在东城最大的青楼。他也跟踪过小奴一次，也知道她出去做工就是在风月楼后院帮他们洗衣物床单，换取微薄的银钱。

Jiang Yi gave a chilly look. He knew about Fengyue Brothel. It was the Jiang Clan's biggest brothel in the East City. He had once followed Xiaonu there and knew that she had been working at the brothel's back kitchen washing their laundry and bedding for a few meager taels of silver.
江逸眼眸一冷，铁拳瞬间收回，却立即变招化作缠丝手抓住江如虎的头发，朝后猛然一拽单腿重重一扫，江如虎肥胖的身躯轰然倒地。
Jiang Yi let out a stare and instantly withdrew his iron fist, then change into Silk Hands to grasp Jiang Ruhu's hair. He then did a vigorous leg sweep to bring Jiang Ruhu's plump body to the ground.
江逸眼眸一缩，下意识的开口问道：“只是做陪练？不需要其他的？”
Jiang Yi squinted his eyes and made himself decide to open his mouth to ask, "Do I do exclusively the work of a sparring partner? Do I not need to do anything else for you?"
江逸眼眸一缩，他在江家月例只有一两碎银子，这一两紫金可是一百两银子啊，就算把他卖了也不值十两紫金，这伙人看来是打定主意要留下江小奴了。

Jiang Yi's pupils contracted. His monthly salary was only worth one tael of tiny silver pieces, but one tael of purple silver was equivalent to one hundred taels of silver! One could not possibly earn ten taels of purple gold even if Jiang Yi was sold off. It was clear that this guy had set his mind on ensuring Jiang Xiaonu stayed behind.
江逸眼眸死死盯着对方的双手，却发现根本无法预算对方的攻击轨迹，因为对方最少可以随意变招三四次。

Jiang Yi locked his gaze on his opponent's hands, but to his dismay, he was unable to predict where the attacks would come from, seeing how Yi Longyu could easily change his technique at least three to four times in an instant.
江逸眼睛看着管事，余光却偷偷观察那马家少爷的反应，漠然说道：“钱我带来了，令牌给我吧。”

Jiang Yi looked at the housekeeper, while out of the peripheral he was furtively gauging the reactions of the Ma Family young master. "I have the money, so why don't you give me the command token," he said nonchalantly.
江逸眼花缭乱地读着那些小篆字符，心里非常惊讶，这些黑色的小篆体文字在整体旋转之余，竟然还以自身为中心上下翻转游动着，就如小蝌蚪一般，充满生命的气息。

Jiang Yi tried to read the tiny, dazzling words, yet could not help but feel shocked and awed by the scene before him. Besides spinning around his body, the tiny script was able to move around freely like little tadpoles filled with the energy of life.
江逸瞬间调集出一丝黑色元力，朝左眼角运转而去，对付江松这种铸鼎界二重的纨绔子弟，他都不屑调集黑色元力增幅攻击力量。当然他也不想让太多人知道，他力量能暴增的事情，比武技？这江松还差远了！

Jiang Yi hastily assembled a strand of black essence force, releasing the power in the direction of where his left eye was looking. To defeat a wastrel descendant at a second level of the Cast Tripod Realm like Jiang Song, he thought it was not worth it to assemble more black essence force and increase his own attack power. Of course, he did not want to let too many people know of his condition that he could greatly increase his power. Comparing martial arts prowess? Jiang Song's level was far worse than his own!
江逸破门而入，自然惊动了房间内的壮汉，那壮汉本能的一惊，不过看到江逸破空而来的拳头却冷笑起来：“铸鼎境一重也敢来这放肆？找死！”

The man was naturally startled when Jiang Yi slammed through the door. Overcoming his initial shock, he sneered when he saw Jiang Yi's punch tearing through the air. "How dare a first-stage Cast Tripod Realm brat be so presumptuous? Are you sick of living!?"
江逸确定对方不再变招后，双手瞬间化掌为爪，轻松提前抓住对方的手腕，脚步朝旁边一滑，双手牵引对方朝另外一边攻去，身体一下转到了翊龙宇身后。

Jiang Yi ascertained that his opponent would not change his technique, before springing into action. Hands posing into claws, he deftly grabbed Yi Longyu's wrists and sidestepped, hands pulling the man in the other direction, dissolving the attack while moving behind Yi Longyu in the same breath.
江逸神情冰冷，脸色没有一丝变化，听到江如虎的话语，他双手将江如虎狠狠抡了一个圈，然后重重的砸在地面……

Jiang Yi's facial expressions remained ice-cold without a shred of change, as he heard Jiang Ruhu's cries of warning. Both his hands ruthlessly swung Jiang Ruhu around in a circle, before heavily smashing him onto the ground...
江逸神色冷峻，双手依旧缠住江松，还微微用力让他完全不能控制身体重心，双腿如电般朝江松的右腿连续抽去，而且还单独对着小腿处穷追猛打……

Jiang Yi's expression turned grave, but his hands still continued to entangle Jiang Song. He had even applied some slight force to make him completely unable to control the center of gravity of his body. His legs continued to hit Jiang Song's right leg non-stop like bolts of electricity. He aimed specifically at his lower leg...
江逸突然再次变招，如此近的距离马飞自然躲避不了，轻松被他抓住手腕。江逸手一用力一扭，马飞的腕骨立即一痛，痛哼一声，再也控制不住那把青色短剑。

Jiang Yi abruptly changed his technique again. At such close proximity, it was impossible for Ma Fei to dodge the attack and his wrist was easily captured. Jiang Yi applied force and twisted hard, causing immediate pain to shoot up Ma Fei's wrist. Grunting in pain, Ma Fei lost control of the teal-colored short sword.
江逸突然想到一件事情，心神一荡，黑色元力增幅药力和可以直接快速疗伤，那可是两回事。如果是后者，那就变态了！他以后受伤了完全都不必借助于疗伤丹药了……

Jiang Yi suddenly thought of something and his heart skipped a beat. It was two separate matters altogether between the black essence force increasing the strength of the medical effects and being able to directly speed up the healing process. If it were the latter, how obscene powerful would that be! In the future, he would no longer have to heal his wounds with the help of healing elixirs...
江逸突然想到一件事，从怀中取出一块令牌递给江小奴道：“小奴，你看这是什么？”
It dawned on Jiang Yi to retrieve the command token from his chest pocket and showed it to her, "Xiaonu, look what I've got?"
江逸突然想到了什么，猛地透过院子朝远处看去，外面的景物同样清晰得吓人，就连数十丈外空中飞过一只蚊子都能看清楚轨迹。

Jiang Yi thought of something suddenly. He looked abruptly into the distance across the yard. Similarly, the scene outside was just shockingly vivid. He could very clearly see the trajectory of a mosquito flying in the distance hundreds of feet away.
江逸突然想起一件事，暗道不妙，他的黑色元力好像也是元力？也在丹田内？既然元力被封印了，这黑色元力自然也会被封印啊？没有黑色元力，他的下场就只能和刚才那两人一样，被活活打得半死踹飞出去……

Jiang Yi suddenly thought of something and muttered to himself that something was amiss. Was his black essence force not a type of black essence force too? Was it not within his dantian? Since essence force was sealed off from use, would his black essence force naturally be sealed off as well?
Without any black essence force, he had no other result beyond ending up in a condition similar to those two persons before him: being simply beaten half to death, and sent flying out with a kick...
江逸立即调集一丝黑色元力，再次运转到伤口附近和药力融合起来，快速治疗伤势。
Jiang Yi immediately summoned a strand of black essence force, before once again sending it near the wound area, to amalgamate with the medicinal power and speed up the wound-healing process.
江逸站了一会，那柳长老还是无视他，只好咬牙拱手道：“我想领一枚黄参丹和元力丹……”

Jiang Yi stood for a while, but Elder Liu continued to ignore him. He had no choice but to grit his teeth, cup his hands and say, "I would like to acquire a pill each of Yellow Ginseng Elixir and Essence Force Elixir..."
江逸站了起来拍了拍衣袍，淡淡一笑道：“小姐很厉害了，如此年纪已经是铸鼎境四重，如果不是元力封印，我一招都会被你打趴下。”

Jiang Yi stood up and patted his robes, before giving a faint smile. He said, "Young Mistress, you are so powerful, your power level is already at the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm even though you're so young. If not for your essence forces being sealed off from use, I would probably have been beaten down by you and lost the match before I can even use a single technique."
江逸站在药田田梗上，望着药田内密密麻麻的绿色草参叶子，脸上一阵苦涩，他昨日就是在这被殴打昏迷，好不容易才挨回家的……

Jiang Yi stood at the boundary of the fields, staring into the verdant green of the grass ginseng. A sense of bitter agony filled his mind—after all, this was the place where he was beaten up and left unconscious. After regaining consciousness he had to endure with much difficulty and agony the journey home.
江逸站起来迎了上去，那江松却做了个嘘声的动作，凑过来有些疑惑低声问道：“江逸，你怎么在炼药房？长老有没有在里面？”

Jiang Yi stood up to greet him, but Jiang Song made a hand gesture asking him to keep quiet, before moving closer to him.
"Jiang Yi," he asked in a low voice, "what are you doing in the alchemy lab? Is the elder inside?"
江逸第一次来这种大地方，有些不知道如何是好。好在他站了一会，一名穿着管事袍子的中年人就走过来询问道：“请问这位客人有什么需要吗？”

This was the first time Jiang Yi had visited such a large place; as such, he did not know what to do. After standing at the same spot for a long while, a middle-aged man wearing a managerial robe walked over to him and inquired, "My dear guest, how may I be of assistance?"
江逸精神一震，连忙说道：“十两紫金。”
Jiang Yi's spirit jolted with excitement as he promptly replied, "Ten taels of purple gold."
江逸纳闷了，闭上眼睛内视丹田，观察剩下的唯一一缕黑色元力，但观察了很久还是一无所获。

Jiang Yi was puzzled. Closing his eyes and using his inner vision to look into his dantian, he observed the one and only wisp of black essence force left in his body. However, he acquired no new knowledge, despite observing it for a very long time.
江逸细细感知了半天，摇了摇，又掐了掐脑袋，在确认黑色小字应该不具备危险性后，终于长吁了一口气，多年来的压抑生活，让他的心理承受能力远超同龄人。

Jiang Yi lay on the bed deep in thought for a while. After a moment, he shook his body, then pinched his head. When he confirmed that those tiny black words were probably not harmful to his well-being, he finally heaved a long sigh of relief. Many years of oppression in a depressive life had conditioned his spirit. His ability to endure more stress was greater than that of most other people of his age.
江逸绷紧的心立即放松了一大半，等一名护卫从房间内取出一枚令牌后，他的心完全放了下来，从怀中取出十片紫金叶子朝管事递过去。

At once, Jiang Yi's highly-strung nerves relaxed almost completely. By the time the guard came in with the retrieved command token, he was entirely at ease and reached into his chest pocket to hand over ten pieces of purple gold leaf to the housekeeper.
江逸缩了缩头，暗道这柳长老果然是个怪人，刚才还满脸狂喜，这说翻脸就翻脸了……
Jiang Yi retracted his head, thinking to himself silently that this Elder Liu was no doubt a weird man—just moments before he was all smiles, yet instantly he could become hostile...
江逸老老实实的拱手道：“回荣管事，还没……”
Jiang Yi sincerely cupped his hands and said, "Chief Rong, not yet—"
江逸耸了耸肩，走出去继续回去修炼，然而……只是半个时辰后他又被杨管事叫了出来，这次还是有人点名要他陪练。
Jiang Yi shrugged and went back to his cultivation. However... he was summoned again by Manager Yang an hour later, as another guest had requested his service.
江逸脚刚刚落地，身子又猛然在地面一踏跃空而起，单腿重重的抬起对着江松一条腿重重劈下。
Just as Jiang Yi landed, his body vigorously jumped into the air again. He raised one of his leg and swung it down at Jiang Song.
江逸脸上一片冷意，身子如猎豹般朝马公子和刘管事冲去，根本不惧漫天的粉末。他哪有什么毒粉？刚才那黑呼呼的东西是江小奴给他准备的干肉……

There was nothing but a look of ruthlessness on Jiang Yi's face. He charged at Young Master Ma and Housekeeper Liu as fast as a cheetah, completely undeterred by the powder filling the air - for how could he possess such a thing as poison powder? The black substance was actually just the jerky that Xiaonu prepared for him...
江逸脸上没有半点慌乱，面对家族的武堂的长老，江家战力排行第三的强者依旧不亢不卑，他沉声拱手说道：“这些人全部是我伤的，去刑堂可以，我也可以认罪。不过我请求家族所有长老在旁边听审，否则……我死也不去刑堂，还请长老亲手杀了江逸吧！”

Jiang Yi's face didn't have an hint of frenetic, even with facing the clan's Martial Court Elder. He spoke with a neither overbearing nor servile to the clan's overall no.3 combatant, "All these people are injured by me. I will go to the Disciplinary Court and I will admit my mistakes too. But I beg for all the clan's Elders to be at the hearing. If not... I would rather die than go to the Disciplinary Court. I beg for Elder to personally execute Jiang Yi!"
江逸脸色一变，荣管事给他的令牌他可是拿给风月楼抵押了，此刻拿什么上交啊？
Jiang Yi's face changed. The command token that Chief Rong gave him was now impawned by the people at the Fengyue Brothel. What could he possibly hand up to Chief Rong at that moment?
江逸脸色一沉，暗道如果自己有铸鼎境二重配合黑色元力的话，绝对要把那群人打得屁滚尿流，可惜这黑色元力有很多神奇功能，就是不能辅助修炼……

Jiang Yi's heart sunk. If only my power level was at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm...
Should he combine that power with black essence force, he could definitely beat that group of people to a pulp. Unfortunately for all the magical powers of this black essence force, it just could not be used to accelerate his essence force refinement...
江逸脸色完全沉了下来，从牙缝内蹦出几个字：“多少？”
Jiang Yi's expression had darkened completely. He forced two words past his teeth: "How much?"
江逸脸色沉了下来，他眸子转动几圈，沉吟片刻咬牙道：“小奴，你乖乖呆在家，我先出去一趟。”

Jiang Yi's face darkened. Rolling his pupils about for several rounds, he sighed deeply for a short moment, gritted his teeth, and said, "Xiaonu, you stay at home obediently. I'll be heading out for a while first."
江逸苍狼面具之下的双眼光芒一闪，沉声问道：“交易？”
Under his wolf mask, Jiang Yi's eyes lit up. He asked in a low voice, "A deal?"
江逸苦恼的抓着脑袋，不过很快就将不知足的烦恼抛在一边，又兴奋的站起来，输送黑色元力到右拳和江水诀蓝色元力融合，右拳对着地面的青石板再次砸去。

Jiang Yi scratched his head, vexed, but he quickly pushed aside his frustrations. He stood up again and transferred the black essence force to his right fist to fuse with the Jiang Water Art's blue essence force once again. He smashed his right fist onto the limestone slab on the floor.
江逸苦涩一笑，想起年少时，两人一起学习武技的情景，那时候江恨水总是对他不服气，经常一起比试，两人关系还算不错。不过后来因为江逸被查出丹田被封印，加上大长老的失踪，两人才越来越疏远，距离上次见面都有两三年了，江恨水一时之间没认出他也正常。

Jiang Yi bitterly smiled as he thought about the time when he was younger and the scenes when the two of them practiced martial arts together. At the time, Jiang Henshui was never satisfied with their difference in skills and thus they regularly sparred against each other.
As such, the relationship between the two boys could be considered to be pretty good. However, with the revelation that Jiang Yi's dantian was sealed, coupled with the disappearance of the Grand Elder, the two of them became increasingly estranged. The last time they met had been two to three years ago. As such, it was not out of the ordinary that Jiang Henshui could not recognize him instantly.
江逸苦涩的笑了笑，那日他在聚珍阁就是化名易剑。不过被认出来了，他心里反而没那么别扭了，目光平静的望着姬听雨问道：“姬小姐，你是怎么认出我来的？那日你并没有看到我的眼睛吧？”

Jiang Yi smiled with some bitter agony. That day, he had used that pseudonym "Yi Jian" at the Pearl Gathering Pavilion. However, after being so easily and quickly recognised, his heart did not feel so wrung and pained as before. Instead, he looked at Ji Tingyu with a tranquil gaze and asked, "Young Mistress Ji, how did you recognise me? You did not see my eyes that day, did you?"
江逸苦笑，他身上倒是有十枚灵神丹，不过才是刚买的……好在整张脸笼罩在斗篷内，刘管事看不到他的神情，他起身拱手道：“刘管事，在下想见一下你们小姐，有一事相求！”

Jiang Yi laughed bitterly. He did actually have ten Spirit Pills on his person, but he'd just purchased them. Thankfully for him, his entire face was shrouded within his cloak and as such, Housekeeper Liu could not see his expression.
He stood up and cupped his hands. "Housekeeper Liu, I would like to meet your young mistress. I have something to ask of her!"
江逸苦笑：“姬小姐，我这个人不喜欢麻烦，喜欢平静一些的生活……”
Jiang Yi smiled bitterly, "Young Mistress Ji, I don't like disturbances. I prefer to a more peaceful life..."
江逸虽然修行效果受到封印限制，效果颇微，但每次修行的时候都是很认真，全神贯注的。但这一次不知为什么明显有些心不在焉，好几次将气血运行错了线路，幸好及时纠正才没走火入魔。然而他脑海中的几十个黑色文字总在他的眼前晃来晃去，让他静不下心来。

Although the effects of the martial arts practice were severely limited by the magical seal, Jiang Yi still took his essence force training very seriously and concentrated all his attention on practicing.
However, preoccupied with other thoughts, he had accidentally transferred his blood down the wrong circulatory route a number of times. He was lucky he was able to rectify the error before he suffered from deviated Qi. Nonetheless, he was distracted by the black script in his mind that kept swaying and moving about in front of his vision. It left him unable to calm down.
江逸虽然元力不足，但对于武技的掌控却是异常纯熟，既然下了决心要收拾对方，怎容江豹躲避？便将蛇鞭腿淋漓尽致地发挥出来，两条长腿便如毒蛇附骨一般，一次次扫在江豹的后背上。

Jiang Yi had little essence force, but he was highly skilled at utilizing various techniques. Since he had already made up his mind to get rid of him, how could he let Jiang Bao escape? Jiang Yi pushed the Snake Whip Leg to its full potential, and his legs shot out like two ferocious snakes, sweeping across Jiang Bao's back, again and again.
江逸被吓到了，连忙站了起来，摇头道：“不是，不是！我只是帮别人来卖丹的…”
Jiang Yi was taken aback. He hurriedly stood up and, shaking his head, he answered, "No, no! I am just selling the elixir on someone else's behalf..."
江逸被震住了，低头沉吟不语，去翊家肯定不可能的，不说他和武殿有协议，就算给江家知道了他也难逃一死，这可是叛族啊。

Jiang Yi was in awe. He mulled with his head lowered. Joining the Yi Family was out of the question; to say nothing of the agreement he had with the Martial Arts Hall, death would be an inevitable end if the Jiang Clan found out, it was an act of treachery against the family clan after all.
江逸要的就是这种效果！
That outcome was exactly what Jiang Yi wanted!
江逸见姬听雨不说话盯着他直看，一双漂亮的丹凤眼内都是迷蒙之色，又尴尬起来随口说道：“姬小姐，既然你找我陪练，那就打一场吧，不过还望手下留情哦。”

Seeing Ji Tingyu continuously stare at him in silence, with her pair of pretty phoenix eyes giving off a misty look, he felt awkward once again and as such quickly opened his mouth to say, "Young Mistress Ji, since you came searching for me for a practice match, how about we spar against each other in a match now? I hope that you please be merciful to me."
江逸讪讪摸了摸头，他要是还手的话，这翊小姐元力被封印怕是一招就要被他撂倒了，不过此刻他能说什么？只能点了点头道：“好！”

Embarrassed, Jiang Yi scratched his head. If he retaliated against her moves, with her essence forces sealed off, he was afraid that with a single move he would knock her down. However, what else could he say at that moment? He had no choice but to nod and reply, "Alright!"
江逸讪讪的摸了摸鼻子，走了出来，一拱手道：“江逸拜见柳长老，我……不是江松，我是来领丹药的。”

Jiang Yi awkwardly scratched his nose, walked out from where he was hiding, and cupped his hands as he greeted, "Greetings, Elder Liu. I... am not Jiang Song. I, Jiang Yi, am here to retrieve elixirs."
江逸讪讪的站立，回了一句：“我不躲避，难道站着给你打？陪练又不是给人出气挨揍的……”
Jiang Yi stood still abashedly and retorted, "Should I not have dodged and let you hit me? Sparring partners are not punching bags for people to vent their anger on..."
江逸讪讪的笑了笑，也不用这黑甲护卫带路了，径直进了武殿朝练功房那边走去。
Jiang Yi smiled, embarrassed. Not needing this guard clad in black armour to lead the way, he directly walked into the Martial Arts Hall and went straight towards the Technique Practising Room.
江逸走后一柱香时间，练功房走廊内一道火红色身影就风风火火冲了过来，一走到大殿内立即在所有陪练脸上的面具上扫了一圈，很是急迫的问道：“杨管事，刚才和我对练的那个金牌陪练呢？”

Five minutes after Jiang Yi left, a fiery-red figure rushed over energetically through the corridor of the technique practising rooms.
