Upon walking into the central hall, the person immediately gazed around at the masks worn by all the sparring partners before, with much urgency, asking, "Manager Yang, where is that gold token-grade sparring partner whom I was practising with just now?"
江逸越想越心动，实在不行也是被人揍一顿而已，沉吟了一阵，他咬牙朝武殿侧门走去，对着两名黑甲护卫拱手道：“我报名陪练！”

The more Jiang Yi thought about it, the more tempted he felt. Even if he could not make it, he was only going there to receive a beating from others.
Sighing deeply, he gritted his teeth and walked in the direction of the side door of the Martial Arts Hall. Cupping his hands in greeting to the two guards clad in black armor, he said, "I am here to register as a sparring partner!"
江逸跟着这管事进了旁边的一个雅阁内，那管事请江逸坐下，这才抬手道：“请出示一下丹药，如果是好丹，我们会给出合理的价格。”

Jiang Yi followed the housekeeper into an elegant booth at the side. The housekeeper offered Jiang Yi a seat before raising his hand as he said, "Please display your elixirs. If they are good-quality elixirs, we will give you a reasonable monetary offer."
江逸身子一缩走了出去，暗道这五年算是卖身给武殿了，拿了武殿的钱不干活？那就等着武殿无穷无尽的追杀，想到大陆上每一个城池都有武殿分部，江逸都有些不寒而栗……

Jiang Yi contracted his body and left the room. He muttered to himself about how he had just basically sold his body and soul to the Martial Arts Hall for five years. How could he take money from the Martial Arts Hall and not work for them? If he did not, he would have to face the endless chase by the Martial Arts Hall to kill him. Thinking about how every city in the continent had a branch of the Martial Arts Hall, Jiang Yi could not help but shudder with some fear...
江逸身子一转，转到马飞身后反手勒住他的脖子，另外一只手握着青色短剑，元力灌注紧紧贴着马飞的胸口，只要微微用力这短剑将会刺入马飞的胸口，他目光冷冷的朝众人一扫，沉喝道：“全部退后十丈！”

Jiang Yi turned to move behind Ma Fei and restrained his neck with a hand. In his other hand was the teal-colored short sword, which was infused with essence force and at the moment being pressed tightly against Ma Fei's chest, ready to penetrate with just the slightest force. Jiang Yi's cold gaze swept across everyone and bellowed, "All of you move back ten feet!"
江逸身子一震，整个人都战栗起来，因为他明显感觉伤口恢复的速度开始加快，而且越来越快，最终治疗的速度达到了原先的五六倍左右，药效都可比人阶上品疗伤丹药了。

Jiang Yi felt his body tremble and he shuddered. Evidently, his healing speed had accelerated, to the point that the healing speed reached approximately five or six times the original speed. The effects were now on par with Man-tier superior-grade healing elixirs.
江逸身子一颤，江小奴没有一点实力，居然妄图蜉蝣撼树？这要是给这护卫踹上一脚，不得活活踹死啊？

Jiang Yi trembled. To think that Jiang Xiaonu would try overestimate her capabilities despite her clear lack of strength! If the guard tried to kick her off, wouldn't she end up being kicked to death?
江逸身子一颤，猛然睁开眼睛，面色瞬间变得狰狞，那样子就像一只被激怒鬃毛竖起的狮子王，他身子从地上一跃而起，疯狂的朝前院飙射而去……

Jiang Yi's body trembled as he opened his eyes suddenly. His face instantly turned grim. He looked like an agitated lion with a bristling mane. Jumping up from the ground, he dashed towards the front yard like a maniac…
江逸身子一颤，还没等他说话，不知什么时候来的柳长老却板着脸说道：“一点药草要取那么久？还不拿出来？哼……废物！”

Jiang Yi shuddered. Without waiting for him to speak, Elder Liu, whom Jiang Yi had no idea when he entered the room, spoke with a stern face, "How long do you want to take to retrieve a few herbs? Hurry up and bring them over here! Hmph... useless good-for-nothing!"
江逸身子不动，冷然望着江松说了一句。结果江松脸色一变，江逸还没开始数数就慌忙扶着墙壁，一蹦一跳的凭借左腿快速朝远处逃去，只是十几息时间就消失不见了……

Jiang Yi remained motionless and stared coldly at Jiang Song. As a result, Jiang Song's face changed color. Before Jiang Yi had even started counting down, he hastily relied on his left leg and the wall to hop away. He vanished from sight in about thirty seconds...
江逸身子也滚落在地，但他却如一只猎豹般立即从地上弹射而起，朝江如虎冲去。
Jiang Yi had also tumbled onto the ground, yet he managed to immediately leap off the ground like a cheetah and once again rush towards Jiang Ruhu.
江逸身子快速在地上转圈起来，用最大的力量，最快的速度将江如龙抡得在半空转圈，等他脑袋差不多晕晕乎乎的时候，再移动脚步猛然朝旁边的墙壁砸去……

Jiang Yi began to quickly turn his body and used all his strength to whirl Jiang Rulong with his top speed. When Jiang Rulong's mind was in a dazed state, Jiang Yi then moved vigorously to smash Jiang Rulong into the wall...
江逸身子飙射而入，目光如刀子般在里面扫去，一看之下他更是差点气疯了。
Jiang Yi tore into the room, his eyes sweeping across the room like daggers. What greeted him nearly blew his top.
江逸身影突然在原地一顿，双手一松，江如龙的身子如炮弹般朝上空飞射而去。同时江逸的双腿一蹬，身子快速的跟上，双手抓做落地的江如龙猛然往下压，单腿膝盖却重重的朝他腰身顶去……

Jiang Yi's body suddenly stayed in place, he then loosened both his hands and launched Jiang Rulong's body high up like a cannonball. At the same time, he catapulted himself with both his legs and swiftly caught up to Jiang Rulong. He used both his hands to grab the falling Jiang Rulong and pressed downwards, using a single knee to position at Jiang Rulong's waist...
江逸转身，痛苦的闭上眼睛，大步朝外面走去，没有再回头看小奴一眼，因为……他生怕多看一眼会不舍得离去。

Jiang Yi turned around and closed his eyes in anguish. He marched out the doors without a backward glance at Xiaonu, for... he was afraid that looking at her any longer would render him incapable of leaving.
江逸轻叹一声，从怀中取出一把青色的短剑，看着上面流转的青光，他眼中流露出深深的担忧之色。马飞应该找了他一个月吧？他找不到自己，会不会想方设法去找江小奴的麻烦？

Jiang Yi heaved a sigh and took out a teal-colored short sword from his chest pocket. Staring at its gyrating teal radiance, a deeply troubled look showed on his face. Ma Fei must have been searching for him for a month. With Jiang Yi missing, would he attempt to give Jiang Xiaonu a hard time instead?
江逸轻松过了两人，却似乎忘记还有一人？那铸鼎境三重的武者被江逸晃了一枪，此刻醒悟过来顿时恼羞成怒，大步朝江逸冲来，扬起拳头狠狠对着他的背后砸去。

Jiang Yi had easily defeated two person, but did it seem as though he forgot one more person? Jiang Yi had flashed past that martial artist with a power level at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. At that moment, he finally came to himself and immediately flew into a rage out of humiliation. He rushed towards Jiang Yi with wide steps and raised up his fists before ferociously smashing downwards onto Jiang Yi's back.
江逸运转一缕黑色元力，在调集一些蓝色元力融合起来，缓缓的控制朝脑袋游走而去。这黑色元力太少太少，不融合蓝色元力怕是不足以完成任何功用。

Jiang Yi circulated a strand of black essence force and combined it together with some assembled blue essence force, before slowly controlling its movement towards his head. This black essence force was lacking in quantity. If it was not combined with the blue one, he feared that on its own the black essence force was not enough to produce any effect.
江逸这一顶，尽管没有黑色元力融合，但也是实实在在的一马之力，当下那铸鼎境三重武者立即惨叫一声，身子本能弓了下来，本去抓江逸左手的手掌也收了回去，捧住下身痛嚎起来。

Even though Jiang Yi's single hit was not combined with the power of the black essence force, the attack was nonetheless had an actual horsepower worth of strength.
At the moment of impact, that martial artist at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm immediately cried out in extreme agony as his body instinctively bent downwards. He had even withdrawn the hand that was supposed to grasp Jiang Yi's left hand, instead using it to cup his crotch as he howled aloud over his searing pain.
江逸这才微微颔首，肉痛的咬牙松开手，眼睁睁的看着才到手几天的紫金进了别人的荷包。

It was with this offer that Jiang Yi finally nodded silently. His heart ached as he gritted his teeth and released his grip, looking on helplessly as he saw the purple gold he got his hands on just a few days ago enter another person's wallet.
江逸这次没有痛打落水狗了，他早早松开江松双手，漠然看着他惨叫不休，内心没有一丝同情之心。今日如果没有他没有黑色元力，此刻倒在地上惨叫的就是他了，这个世界就是那么残酷，没有实力只有被人欺辱！

This time, Jiang Yi did not continue beating up his fallen opponent. Instead, he released Jiang Song's hands. Coldly observing him scream relentlessly, Jiang Yi's heart did not feel any sense of sympathy. If he did not have any black essence force that day, the one lying on the ground crying in agony at the moment would have been him. The world was cruel. Those without any power would only end up being bullied and humiliated!
江逸进来之后如此张狂的话语明显触怒了两人，不过江逸点名找江如虎的麻烦，两人城府极深，也不好喧宾夺主都冷冷一哼没有说话，目光投向江如虎，等着看好戏。

The presumptuous words that Jiang Yi said obviously enraged the two of them. But the one that Jiang Yi called out for, was Jiang Ruhu. They didn't want to claim what wasn't directed at them. They let out cold snorts and casted their sights at Jiang Ruhu, waiting for a good show.
江逸连忙称是，快速离开管事房朝自家小院走去，内心却是暗暗苦恼，要是过两天这荣管事又来问要令牌，或者干脆上他家去要，不得立即暴露啊……

Jiang Yi promptly replied in the affirmative, before hastily leaving the housekeeping chamber and walking towards the direction of the small courtyard of his own home. He was inwardly distressed in his mind, however. Should Chief Rong return to demand the return of the command token over the next two days, or should he directly head to his house to request for it, his secret would immediately be revealed...
江逸连忙起身，胡乱整理了一下破烂的衣袍，朝外面走去。
Jiang Yi hastily rose from the bed, hurriedly straightened out and tidied up his tattered clothes, and rushed out of the house.
江逸迷茫了，他听说过丹药能回炉再造，但具体不知道怎么操作的，只看了一早上炼丹就能回炉再造的话，他就是炼丹天才了……

Jiang Yi was confused. He had heard before that elixirs could be reheated and refined, but he did not know how to perform the specific processes. If all he needed was to observe the refining process for a morning before being able to reheat and refine elixirs, he would probably be a genius in alchemy...
江逸迷迷糊糊的睁开眼睛，感觉全身上下，特别是头部传来阵阵撕裂般的痛楚。他勉强撑起上半身，呲牙咧嘴地朝四处一望，这才发现自己依旧躺在江家西山的药田田埂上。

When Jiang Yi opened his eyes, he was greeted with a blurry world. Not an inch of his body was spared from the searing pain. Worst of all was his head, which throbbed with unbearable intensity. Red-faced and grimacing, Jiang Yi managed to raise his body up with what little strength he had. As he made sense of his immediate surroundings, Jiang Yi quickly realized that he was lying on an embankment in the Western Hills plantation, one of the many holdings owned by the Jiang Clan.
江逸郁闷得要吐血了，睁开眼睛一扫，发现外面已经天亮了，附近的房间传来窸窸窣窣小奴起床的声音。

Jiang Yi was so melancholic that he wanted to vomit blood. When he opened his eyes and used his vision to sweep the room, he realized that the sky outside was already bright and rustling sounds of Xiaonu waking up were coming from the nearby room.
江逸都不用黑色元力加持力量，只是凭借恐怖的视力和大成的武技就能轻松的战胜在场的所有人，铸鼎境五重？在他看来屁都不是。

Jiang Yi didn't even made use of the black essence forces to enhance his strength. He relied on his terrifying vision and Phenomenal Stage martial arts to easily defeat everyone here. Fifth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm? In his eyes, they couldn't defeat a pile of manure.
江逸长长一叹，不再多想，全神贯注开始运转无名决提炼黑色元力。
Jiang Yi gave a long deep sigh. Not wanting to think about this any further, he placed all his attention on practicing the nameless cultivation technique to refine more black essence force.
江逸闭上眼睛长长吐出一口气，他匕首再次对准马飞的胸口，全力勒住他的脖子让他的尖叫声戛然而止，他目光冰冷的望着刘管事，爆喝起来：“我和风月楼的恩怨今日就此了结，日后你们马家要报复我，尽管放手过来！管事……把我的紫金还给我，否则你家少爷就不是个废人，而是个死人了。”

Jiang Yi closed his eyes and gave a long exhale. He aimed the short sword at Ma Fei's chest again and cut him off in mid-scream with a full-force choke of his neck. He looked at Housekeeper Liu frostily and roared, "The scores between Fengyue Brothel and me are settled. If the Ma Family wish to seek revenge on me from now on, feel free to bring it on! Housekeeper... return my purple gold, or your young master would not just be useless, but dead."
江逸闭上眼睛，小心翼翼地将注意力集中到自己脑海，便再一次看到了那几十个匪夷可思的神秘篆文，每一个字都无比清晰，黑色骨感，十足活泼，绝对不是幻觉。

Jiang Yi closed his eyes, carefully focusing his attention on his inner thoughts. Once again, he saw that unimaginably freakish and mysterious script. He could see each character unbelievably clear; they were black, skinny, and moved about energetically. This was definitely no figment of his imagination.
江逸闭上眼睛，探查到眼睛附近的黑色元力果然还有一丝，没有完全消耗干净。再次过了一会，江逸眼中黑光才一闪，视力逐渐模糊起来，黑色元力完全消耗干净了。

Jiang Yi shut his eyes and checked that there was indeed a wisp of black essence force near his eyes, which had not been completely consumed yet. Once again, after a while, a black flash shone through Jiang Yi's eye, as his visison gradually became more blurry. It looked like the black essence force had completely been consumed.
江逸闭上眼睛，细细感受着身体的变化。
Jiang Yi closed his eyes, faintly feeling the changes in his body.
江逸闭目等死，这柳长老虽然是负责炼丹的，但战力在江家也是排前十的，这一掌下来他不得活活被拍死？

Jiang Yi closed his eyes and awaited the incoming slap. Even though Elder Liu was in charge of refining elixirs, he was considered one of the top ten most powerful in the Jiang Clan. Was he not going to be beaten to death with this single slap?
江逸随便交代两句，让她在家呆着别出去，如果有人找上门就躲去后院。他匆匆的朝东院走去，想立即领回丹药，恢复伤势。

Jiang Yi casually briefed her with two instructions, asking her to stay at home and not go out; additionally, should someone come to the door, she had to hide in the backyard. He hastily walked in the direction of the Eastern Court to immediately retrieve an elixir and heal his injuries.
江逸随便解释了一句，这十多天来他没日没夜的修炼，封印内的符文也再次消融了近百多枚，修炼速度也继续增加，加上杨管事无限的提供灵神丹，他的修炼速度能不快吗？按他估计应该最多三五天，就能突破铸鼎境三重了。

Jiang Yi provided some random explanation. In the past ten days, he had been cultivating round the clock and reduced close to a hundred characters of the runic patterns of his seal, which caused his cultivation speed to increase further. Coupled with the incessant supply of Spirit Pills from Manager Yang, how could his cultivation speed not be fast? By his calculations, he would be able to make a breakthrough in achieving the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
江逸青铜面具下的脸有些阴沉，嘴唇也有些干，望着马黑旗和柳河阴冷的目光，他有些不寒而栗。
Jiang Yi's expression, hidden beneath the bronze mask, was gloomy. His lips turned a little dry. The cold and ruthless looks on Ma Heiqi and Liu He made him shudder with unease.
江逸面无表情的一步步朝众人走去，眼中都是冷意，此刻他下半身的黑色长袍被溅满了鲜血，一只手也被染红了，加上他身上凌冽的杀机，别有一番慑人之势。

Jiang Yi walked towards the group with an indifferent expression. With eyes of chill, Jiang Yi's black robes were covered fresh blood, so was one of his hand. In addition to his sharp killing intent, his entire figure was releasing a frightful presence.
江逸面色一冷，只能脚步一滑，身形很飘逸的退入房间之内，将小奴朝地上一放，再次动用一缕黑色元力运转到拳头，对着一名冲进来的铸鼎境二重武者砸去。

Jiang Yi's expression turned cold. He could only slide back into the room. Placing Xiaonu on the ground, he once again transferred a wisp of black essence force to his fist and smashed it at the second-stage Cast Tripod Realm warrior who charged in.
江逸面色一凛，暗到这风月楼果然背后有大势力支持，否则一个小小的管事怎么会认识江家的武技？

Jiang Yi gave the housekeeper a cold stern look. He thought to himself that this Fengyue Brothel did indeed have someone powerful backing them—otherwise, how would a mere housekeeper be able to recognize the martial art techniques of the Jiang Clan?
江逸面色一沉，眼睛一瞪，又训斥道：“小奴，以后不许再说这样的浑话！这个世界少爷只有你这么一个亲人了，任何事情都没有你重要，知道吗？”

Jiang Yi's face darkened and stared intently at her before chiding, "Xiaonu, don't ever say this kind of silly thing again! You only have me, your young master, as your only loved one in this world, okay? Nothing is more important than you!
江逸顿了一下，迟疑问道：“我能随时离开吗？”

Jiang Yi paused for a moment.
Hesitating briefly, he asked, "Can I leave at any time I want?"
江逸飞射而来，拉着江小奴的手满脸都是惭愧，随即想起什么，咧嘴一笑：“小奴，走回家，我给你看好东西，还有一件天大的好事告诉你。”

Jiang Yi flew over and pulled Jiang Xiaonu's hand, his face filled with guilt and regret.
Immediately being reminded of something, he grinned widely as he said, "Xiaonu, let's go home. I have something good to show you, and I have a piece of extremely good news to tell you."
江顾水两人还是没动，江豹这等小角色伤了就伤了，算不得什么。反而这样能增加江逸的罪行，他们出手就更名正言顺了，不过两人的面色却是越来越难看了。

Jiang Gushui and Jiang Rulang maintained their position. It didn't matter if such a minor character like Jiang Bao got injured. It would instead increase the offences that Jiang Yi committed and would justify their interference. But the looks on both their faces were getting increasingly unhappy.
江顾水冷喝几声，大手一挥率先朝江逸冲去。家族三少爷都动手了，其余人自然不敢继续坐视不理，江逸虽然看起来有些恐怖，但他一人能是在场数十人的对手？

After a few shouts, Jiang Gushui gestured with a wave of his hand and was the first to rush at Jiang Yi. Now that the family's Third Young Master was leading the take down, everyone didn't dare to sit on the fence any longer. Jiang Yi may look terrifying but what could one man do against the dozens of people here?
江顾水和江如狼也懵了，他们打过很多架却没见过这么流氓的，两人也看得心惊肉跳，万一江逸一个不小心，江如虎的脑袋砸在地面的青石板上，不得脑浆都得砸出来吗？

Jiang Gushui and Jiang Rulang were both in a state of lost too. They had many fights but nothing as ruffian as this one. Their hearts were thumping as they looked on. What if Jiang Yi accidentally smashed Jiang Ruhu's head onto the limestone flooring? Wouldn't his brain juices be spilled all over?
江顾水和江如狼微微一惊，对于江逸两人有些面生，但小时候江逸悟性惊人，连江恨水都比下去了，作为同辈人终归是有些印象的。两人明明记得江逸丹田被封印了，好像去年还是铸鼎境一重？怎么一下实力暴涨得那么快了？

Jiang Gushui and Jiang Rulang got a slight surprise. They were rather unfamiliar with Jiang Yi, but knew that Jiang Yi had exceptional instincts that was even superior than Jiang Henshui's. Being in the same generation, they would more or less have some impression. They could clearly remember Jiang Yi's dantian being sealed and he was only of first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm last year? How did his strength suddenly skyrocketed?
江顾水和江如狼爆喝起来，江如虎身子却是快速的朝两人身后冲去，江如鹰已经去请他哥哥江如龙了。只要江如龙一来，江逸唯有死路一条。江逸今日恶行累累，就算错手杀了他也不是大罪，顶多责罚一番……

Jiang Gushui and Jiang Rulang bursted out shouting, while Jiang Ruhu swiftly hid behind the two of them. Jiang Ruying had already went seeking for his brother Jiang Rulong. Once Jiang Rulong arrived, Jiang Yi would be left with the path to death. Jiang Yi had sinned gravely today, even if they were to accidentally kill him, it wouldn't be considered a wrongdoing and would at worst receive a scolding...
江顾水幽幽一笑，同样化作六道拳影，对着江逸的六道拳影碰撞而去。在他看来两人相差一个境界，足足一马之力，江逸要是敢和他硬碰硬那是找死。而他攻击速度和反应速度比江逸快多了，就算随便怎么玩，江逸都不是对手！

Jiang Gushui let out a faint smile and produced six fist shadows to clash with Jiang Yi's six fish shadows. From his view, the two of them had a one stage difference and the strength difference of a one full horsepower. If Jiang Yi dared to go head on against himself, it was like courting death. At the same time, his own attack speed and reaction speed was much superior than Jiang Yi; thus no matter how he approached this, Jiang Yi still wasn't his match!
江顾水等人看的面面相觑，不过倒是早早的安排人去叫人了，他们万万没想到这个被封印的废物，这个他们一直敲都不屑瞧一眼的废物竟变得如此生猛了，不仅一人力压数十人，还轻松战胜了家族年轻一辈排名第二的江如龙。

Jiang Gushui and the others looked at each other helplessly, but had long went to seek for help. They never would have though the sealed trash, who they looked with disdain, would become such a ferocious existence that could not only oppress dozens of clansmen but easily defeat the Jiang Rulong who was the no.2 of the clan's younger generation.
沉吟了一阵，他只能硬着头皮说道：“赔钱没问题，但能否宽限一些时日？一个月内十两紫金双手奉上，如果拿不出，我就送一只手过来。”

Silently sighing for some time, all he could do was to summon what courage he had and force himself to say, "Repaying you is not a problem, but can you please extend the deadline by some time? I will hand over to you the ten taels of purple gold within a month's time. If I can't return it, I’ll send a hand of mine over."
沙哑的声音中，带着几分居高临下，听上去就好象是在审问犯人。
His hoarse voice, coupled with a hint of scorn, made it seem as if he was interrogating a criminal.
沙沙沙！
Shh-shh-shh!
没人会选择一个心怀怨恨的盟友，哪怕心怀怨恨的只是盟友的儿子也不行。
No one would choose an ally who harbored resentment, even if it was only the ally's son who harbored the said resentment.
没奈何……
Unfortunately, for the young Jiang Yi…
没想到一过来，却听到这样一个让他绝望的消息，这柳长老既然让江逸留下了，他就再也没机会了……
He never thought that, once he got there, he would hear such despairing information. Since Elder Liu let Jiang Yi stay, he would never have any other opportunity again...
没有任何多余的手势，没有丝毫吟唱的声音。
There was no redundant gesture nor sound of chanting at all.
没有任何意外，这铸鼎境二重的护卫痛哼一声，身子倒飞出去，连带着把背后一名护卫一起撞飞出去。
Everything happened as expected. The second-stage Cast Tripod Realm guard screamed in pain before tumbling back out of the room, along with another guard that was behind him.
没有元力加持，全力使用武技非常消耗体力，翊凌雪一轮暴雨拳砸出，整个人立即累得气喘吁吁，要不是江逸在，她都会一屁股坐在地上了。

Without any essence force as support, a lot of energy was consumed when one put in all his or her might to do combat in martial arts. After Yi Lingxue used a round of her Thunderstorm Fist techniques and smashed forward in her attacks, her entire person became immediately tired, leaving her panting profusely. If Jiang Yi was not there, she would immediately sit her buttocks down on the ground.
没有元力的加持，她刚才打了两场，此刻又连续攻击了那么久，已经算是难能可贵了，每一拳每一招她可是全力使出的，体力消耗太大了。

Without the additional support of essence force, and having just fought two rounds of combat, it was considered remarkable that she could still continuously attack for such a long time. She exerted her full force in every single punch and technique, after all. This consumed way too much of her bodily energy at once.
没有元力的加持，就算那群公子小姐反应速度再快，又能快到哪去？比武技，谁怕谁？

Without essence force, even if the reaction speeds of that group of young masters and young mistresses were fast, how fast could their speed possibly be? In comparing martial arts abilities, what was there to be afraid of?
没有原因，没有理由，就是这么简单而又粗暴的一记冲击水幕，彻底粉碎了克伦威尔二十几年的骄傲。
There were no explanations and no reasons. It was merely a simple yet brutal Waterfall Strike, and it had thoroughly shattered the pride Cromwell held for over 20 years.
没有多余的手势，也没有复杂的咒文。
There were no other gestures, and no complex spells.
没有意外，两人身子一个踉跄扑到在地，而江逸的身子再次爆射而去，朝前方的江如虎冲去，眼中都是冷意大喝起来：“江如虎，可敢一战？”

As expected, the bodies of both his opponents staggered and crashed to the ground one by one. As for Jiang Yi, his body once again shot explosively forward, rushing towards Jiang Ruhu who was in front of him. With his eyes filled with a sense of coldness, he started shouting aloud, "Jiang Ruhu, do you dare to fight?"
没等江逸看够玩够时，黑色元力再次消耗完毕，世界又恢复了原样。
The black essence force again dissipated before Jiang Yi could have his fun, restoring the world to its original state.
没过一会，房间再次打开了，那位带着红色熊首面具武者被一脚踹飞出来，紧接着翊小姐的声音又冷漠传来：“换人！”

It was not a while before the door was opened once again, as the martial artist wearing the red bear mask was kicked and sent flying out. This was followed by Young Mistress Yi's cold voice. "Change my partner!"
洗衣服的老妈子们，全部惊恐的四处乱跑，看向江逸的眼神已经和死人无异，小奴也害怕的身子瑟瑟发抖。
The old chambermaids who were washing laundry scrambled away in fear, looking at Jiang Yi as though he were no different from a dead man. Xiaonu was also trembling with fear.
消息公布的当天，一群上了年纪的魔法师当场激动得老泪纵横，他们都不记得自己有多少年没闻过清醒药剂的味道了，捧着一瓶清醒药剂回去的时候，他们觉得自己简直就象生活在天堂一样。

On the day the news was announced, a group of elderly mages were thrilled to tears on the spot. They could not remember how many years it had been since they had had a whiff of the Sobriety Potion. When they returned with a bottle of Sobriety Potion in their hands, they felt as if they were living in heaven.
淡淡的清香在药剂室里弥漫，烧杯中的药剂正发出“咕隆咕隆”的声响。
A delicate fragrance filled the potion lab while the potion in the beaker gurgled.
清晨上线之后，林立依旧是循例先登入法师小号。

As per usual in the mornings, Lin Li logged on his smurf[1. In online gaming, a smurf is an experienced player who uses a new account to deceive other players into thinking he's a noob (newbie).] account—which was a mage—the first thing after he went online.
清点了一遍丹房内的丹药，确定江恨水只取了一百枚灵神丹，江逸无所事事继续开始修炼。

After accounting for the elixirs in the elixir room, and confirming that Jiang Henshui had only retrieved a hundred Spirit Pills, Jiang Yi had nothing to do and as such continued cultivation practice.
清醒药剂一直为人诟病的，就是它的持续时间实在太短，一瓶清醒药剂仅仅能维持十秒效果，所以就算是药剂师公会内部，也很少有人配制清醒药剂，就算偶尔配上那么一两瓶，也大多是当作施舍丢给各魔法公会。

The Sobriety Potion had been criticized for its short-lived effects; a bottle of Sobriety Potion could only last for ten seconds. Hence, even within the Pharmacists Guild, very few people would make the Sobriety Potion. Even if they occasionally did concoct one or two bottles, they were usually given as alms to the Guild of Magic.
清醒药剂浓度提高，导致服用后精神力混乱，这本身就是一个无比复杂的问题，这中间牵涉到近乎天文数字一般的变化与冲突，除了神匠级别的药剂师之外，恐怕再没有人能掌握药剂中的每一丝变化。

The increased concentration of the Sobriety Potion leading to mental confusion after consumption was a very complicated problem in itself. It involved almost astronomical changes and conflicts. Other than a pharmacist of the Divine Smith level, there was probably no one else who could grasp each and every change in the potion.
满地打滚，被人挤在新人榜外了，我要在脸上刻个惨字！！！
漂亮小姐美眸盯着黑色丹药上流转的几道淡淡纹路再次看了几遍，轻笑摇头道：“鹤爷爷，我不是炼丹师，这丹纹是在几本古典内看到了，据说……能炼制出丹纹的炼丹师非常了不得？这丹纹有什么特殊作用吗？”

The pretty young lady's pretty eyes were transfixed on the few threads of faint vein patterns circulating on the black elixir pill, taking the time to look at them once again several times. Shaking her head, she giggled and said, "Grandfather He, I am no alchemist. I read about the elixir pattern in some ancient texts. 漫天卷起的落叶，轻飘飘的落了下来，树林间又恢复了先前的平静。
The fallen leaves that swirled up and filled the sky slowly floated to the ground. The forest regained its former peace.

Amidst the whirling black powder, Jiang Yi shot forth like an agile wolf. His fists, which were surrounded by essence force, transformed into six fist silhouettes and enveloped Housekeeper Liu and Young Master Ma entirely.
激烈的讨价还价看得林立大开眼界，这要不是亲眼看见，光听两人的声音，多半还以为他们有什么深仇大恨呢。
The fierce bargaining was an eye-opener for Lin Li. Had he not seen it with his own eyes, he'd have thought there was some deep hatred between the two men just listening to their voices.
火焰中的天帝无名静静地凝望着碎片消失的远方，半响，他叹了口气，转头看向冥皇：“老不死，你虽然惊才绝艳，但终究不算神仙，只望你在接下来的日子里悠着点，统治别太过头。须知你我最初皆是大道的一员，从某种意义上说，和众生并无差别。善因多了，说不定会有天道积攒其中，最终帮助你我跳出循环。大概，我今生成仙所差的那一点契机就藏在其中吧……”

As the flame-engulfed Wu Ming silently watched the shards vanish into the distance, he let out a sigh and turned to the Netherworld King. "Old Fart Undying, there’s no doubt of your amazing talent, but ultimately you can't attain immortality. “Though both of us were originally members of the Great Dao, we are undoubtedly no different from all sentient beings. The suffocating cadaveric air inundated the shield, but only served to trigger more sparkling rainbow-colored lights to emit from the countless runes inside the barrier. 炉子有好有坏，人体的资质也良莠不齐，丹田提炼元力的速度自然有慢有快。炼丹师的手法有弱有强，武者修炼的功法也有高级和低级之分，修炼速度自然也有差异，这也是天星大陆把武者第一境命名为铸鼎境的原因。其中鼎最为重要，没有一个好的丹田，武者天资有限，这辈子能取得的成就自然就有限了。

There were good and bad cauldrons; likewise, there were people with high and low physical aptitudes, which meant that there were those with fast and others with slow speeds in using the dantian to refine essence force. There were different essence-refining specialists with strong and weak skills; martial artists' refining techniques could likewise be differentiated between high and low qualities.
Naturally, refining speed had its differentiation. This was thus the reason why the martial art levels of Stellarsky Continent were named Cast Tripod Realms. The "tripod" in the name was the most important. The gold rod was different from weapons and equipment. It didn't mean that the higher the grade of metal, the more powerful it would be. This was more like a trade-off:, using ordinary metals would bring a higher level of stability for magical enchantment and greatly reduce the possibility of enchantment failure. However, using magical metals as material would bring stronger enchantment effect. Different magical metals would also result in different enchantment effect.
点金棒与附魔师之间的关系，全靠最后融入的一丝精神力维系着，附魔师无法为点金棒提供魔力，所以必须在上面镶嵌一枚足够强大的魔晶，而林立这一次选择的，是一枚虚空行者的十五级魔晶，这是他目前能够拿出来的最强魔晶，当初猎人虽然杀戮无数，但魔晶却大多都没来得及转给小号，这件事一直让林立耿耿与怀。

The gold rod had gradually cooled down and was lying quietly on the forging platform, exuding the unique aura of an abyss mithril. It was a dark and abysmal feeling, just like a bottomless pool.

Alchemy was a very rigorous job. The ingredients used in the medicinal formula must be exact - no more, no less. Every medicinal ingredient also had to be precise down to the closest five grams. Even the smelting time, the method to form the elixir and the reheating process all had to be done with precision, otherwise it was very easy to refine and produce a useless elixir.

After the magical crystals on the forging platform were emptied, there was a thick layer of magic essence on the gold rod. The glittering halo also seemed to have become thick and viscous.

There was a small melting furnace in the alchemy lab which was usually used to smelt alchemy materials such as star sand and navy sand. Then, they saw a young man wearing a mage robe walk out from the forest, reciting an unintelligible spell. A shot of icicle tore through the sky and plunged into the wound on the Wyvern's abdomen. 然后他们就看见，一个瘦弱的老人从树丛间走出，看上去六七十岁的年纪，一张老脸上布满了皱纹，身上穿着一件灰白法师长袍，皱巴巴脏兮兮的，就好象几十年都没洗过一样，当他从树林中走出的时候，几乎所有人都闻到了，一股浓浓的药味正从他身上散发开来……

然后这一群围观群众就看见，各种各样的矿锭从私人仓库里被放出来，有常见的秘银瑟银，也有罕见的精金魔铁，魔法金属特有的光泽在私人仓库内闪动着耀眼的光彩，晃花了所有玩家的眼睛，刚刚此起彼伏的声音刹时间静了下来，整个私人仓库里就只听吞口水的声音……

The onlookers watched as various mine ingots were being taken out of the private warehouse. There were the common mithril and thorium, and also rare adamantine and fiend iron. Both father and daughter did not encounter any danger along the way. It took a little over a week to find the ancient castle mentioned in the mission.
爽到极点，确实是要射的，只不过克伦威尔比较倒霉，他是被射，而且还是被射了一脸……

爽！克伦威尔真是很久都没这么爽过了！

Particularly the Saruman Family, which hadn't gotten a bottle at all. Now, the three bottles had completely driven them to the edge of the cliff. It was just as what Old Merlin had said before, 30 level-five mages coming into their own hands would be an icing on the cake, but if it fell into the hands of a rival, it would definitely be a deadly threat.
特别是象清醒药剂这种，从黑暗年代传承下来的药剂配方，更早已在漫长的时间中被证明，无法再有一丝一毫的改变。
In particular, prescriptions like the Sobriety Potion, which had been passed down from the Dark Ages, had long been proven ones that could not be improved.
特别是麦德林，他简直不敢相信自己的眼睛！
Especially Medellin, he could not believe his eyes!
狂喜的是——他刚才内视丹田外的封印时，发现那龙形封印的符文竟少了一枚！
What made his ecstatic was... while he was observing the seal outside his dantian, he discovered that a character was missing from the runic patterns forming the dragon-shaped seal!
狮蝎的嘶吼声中，一股浓浓的血腥味扑面而来。
There was a thick smell of blood in the Manticore's roar.
猛然间高出一倍的价格，显然超出了年轻法师的心理预期，在抬头望去的时候，他脸上明显有着一丝茫然，但他最后还是咬了咬牙，报出了新的价格：“一万二千金币！”

The price was doubled abruptly, and was apparently beyond the young mage's expectations. It was obvious that he was at a loss, but at last, with clenched teeth, he offered a new price. "12,000 gold coins!"
猝然！
Suddenly,
现在他知道，这老家伙不是开玩笑的，他真的会杀了自己……
Now Hoeren knew that he was not kidding. Andoine would really kill him...
现在却不用他考虑了，这黑色元力只有十缕，根本不能完全独立攻击，不融合蓝色元力绝对发挥不出威力。

Now he did not need to consider this, as there were only ten strands of black essence force. This was completely not enough to even use in an independent attack, nor release any power without merging with blue essence force.
现在摆在林立面前的，是三种魔法精神，梦境之铁，深渊秘银，符文精金，这是林立千挑万选才选出来的，其他魔法金属虽然还有很多，但大多有着各种不足，并不适合林立对点金棒的要求。

In front of Lin Li were three magical metals—dream iron, abyss mithril, and rune's adamantine. He had chosen them from the array of metals. Although there were many other magical metals, they were inadequate in various ways and did not fit Lin Li's requirement for the gold rod.
现在林立就站在那巢穴之外，这才不过一年的时间，那巢穴就已经荒芜得不成样子，四周长满了杂草，洞口处一片野花正开得异常鲜艳。
Lin Li stood outside the nest. It had only been a year, but the nest was completely deserted.There were weeds all around, and at the entrance of the cave a bed of wild flowers bloomed in brilliance.
现在的老梅林只有一个选择——击败葛瑞安！
Old Merlin had only one choice at the moment—to defeat Gerian!
理想总是美好的，现实却很残酷！
Their ideal intention notwithstanding, the reality was harsh!
琢磨了一阵，他再次丢进去三枚丹药，又用黑石加温继续注入蓝色元力，结果这次没炸丹，但他揭开炉盖一看，却发现丹药和原先并没有两样。

After mulling over the situation for a while, he once again threw in three elixir pills, before using coal to heat up the cauldron and continue injecting blue essence force. The result this time round was that, while the elixirs did not explode, when he lifted the cauldron lid and took a look, he discovered that the pills inside had not changed from their original state at all.
瓶塞刚一拔开，炼金室内就弥漫起了一股浓浓的血腥味，那是毁灭之龙的血液，龙血墨水最重要的材料。
As soon as the bottle stopper was pulled out, a thick scent of blood filled the alchemy lab. It was the blood of the Dragon of Destruction—the most important ingredient for the Dragon's Blood Ink.
甚至就连梅林家那个小兔崽子，都敢找上门来跟自己提要求了。
Even that little rascal from the Merlin Family had dared to come to his doorsteps to make a demand.
甚至还有人在怀疑，是不是刚才巴瑟罗尔的偷袭把他给打傻了？怎么看起来挺聪明一个小伙子，却会说出这么白痴的话来？
Some were even suspecting that he was deranged after Bathrilor's sneak attack. How could such a clever-looking kid utter such idiotic words?
生活技能可不是个人等级所能比的，个人等级只要你有足够的时间，不断的杀死怪物，不断的完成任务，就可以累积足够的经验升级。但生活技能到了高级之后，想进一步那真的是千难万难，也只有林立这种财大气粗的角色，才想得出用高级材料来砸技能的办法，想想今天五项技能，就花了差不多五百万金币，除了刚刚扫荡过龙穴的林立，又有谁能承受得起？

Life skills were incomparable to individual levels. As long as you put in enough time for individual levels to defeat monsters and complete missions constantly, you could accumulate enough experience points to level up. However, once you had reached the highest level for a life skill, it would be extremely difficult to make any advancement. Only powerful characters like Lin Li would think of smashing top-grade materials to earn skill points. Thinking back, he had spent almost five million gold coins on these five basic skills. Other than Lin Li who had just raided the dragon's lair, who else could afford it?
用一级法术重创五级魔兽，这等战绩就连安度因自己也是从未有过……
Dealing damage to a level-five demon with a level-one spell was a feat that even Andoine himself had not accomplished.
用三五十金币买下法杖之后，凯文又买了一些其他东西，前前后后大概花了有上千金币。
After buying the staff with three hundred and fifty gold coins, Kevin went on to buy other items, spending over a thousand gold coins in all.
用神之金属锻造的装备也许在一开始的时候，属性并不如何突出，但随着使用的时间越长，使用者的等级渐渐提高，神之金属可怕的成长特性就会慢慢展露出来，官方论坛上有很多锻造专业的高手曾经预言过，如果一个玩家从一级就开始使用神之金属锻造的装备，那么等他升到七十级的时候，这件装备就算不是神器，也至少可以达到史诗级别！

The properties of equipment made out of divinity metals might not stand out in the beginning, but the longer you use it and the higher the level you attain, the more its fearful growth characteristics would show—albeit slowly. Many professional blacksmiths had predicted on official forums that if a player began using equipment made out of divinity metals at level one, then when he had reached level 70, the equipment could reach an epic level at the minimum even if it might not be an artifact!
由于是正午时分，风月楼内没有一个客人，江逸走进风月楼倒是看到了那日的管事，除了这管事外他还意外的见到了一个人，一个在武殿内见过两次的大家族公子。

As it was noon, there was not a single customer in the Fengyue Brothel. When Jiang Yi walked into the Fengyue Brothel, he had indeed seen that housekeeper from that day. Besides that housekeeper, he had also unexpectedly seen a man, a young master of a great family clan whom he had seen twice at the Martial Arts Hall.
由于经历的不同，林立可能比这个世界上大多数魔法师，都更加明白金钱的威力。
Because of his different experiences, Lin Li probably understood the power of money better than most mages in this world.
男儿有泪不轻弹！
Men do not cry easily!
画面是流动的，如果江逸和翊凌雪看到画面，肯定会震惊得无与伦比的。因为……墙壁上的画面播放的正是她们两人对战的情景，不过画面有些模糊，似乎是用某种神奇的阵法，将两人对战的经过保留了下来。

The images on the painting could move. If Jiang Yi and Yi Lingxue saw the painting images, they would certainly be incomparably shocked. This was because... the images being broadcast on the wall were the scenes of the two of them fighting. However, the images were somewhat blurry. It appeared that the "painting" used some sort of mysterious magical spell, allowing the processes of the two persons' combat to be preserved in this image-based format.
留下一只手不可能，少一只手就变成真的废物了，放任江小奴不管？这比杀了他还要难。

Leaving behind one hand was impossible—the loss of one hand would make him completely useless. As for the option to leave Xiaonu behind and not care for her anymore? That option would be worse than death.
疑惑之下抬眼望去，正看见麦德林在漂浮术的支持下，正以极快的速度向这边飞来，一边保持着飞行速度，还一边大声喊道：“安度因大爷，给个面子行不行？”

He looked up in doubt and saw that Medellin was flying over at high speed with the help of the Levitation spell. As he maintained his flying speed, he shouted: "Master Andoine, would you give him a break?"
疲惫中林立的目光又落到了炼金台上，看到静静躺在那里的点金棒时，他似乎又觉得一切都是值得的，这是一件足以让任何附魔师为之疯狂的东西，以深渊秘银锻造而成，又用龙血墨水构筑魔纹，以及两块得自毁灭之龙巢穴的宝石，更不用说最后镀上去的那一层深邃之银了……

Weary, Lin Li's eyes fell onto the platform again, and when he saw the gold rod lying quietly there, he seemed to feel that everything was worth it. This was something sufficient to make all the magical enchanters crazy. Forged with the abyss mithril, using the Dragon's Blood Ink to construct the mageweath, and two gemstones from the nest of Dragon of Destruction, and not to mention the last coat of deep silver...
病床上的麦格雷尼面色惨白，身体枯瘦，每一次呼吸都仿佛要用尽全身的力气，看着麦格雷尼这极度虚弱的样子，红发美女第一次失去了信心，她反复的问自己，麦格雷尼真能等到自己想出办法？

Lying on the sickbed, McGrenn's face was ghastly pale and his body gaunt, every breath he took seemed to have exhausted all his strength. Looking at how extremely feeble McGrenn was, the redheaded beauty lost confidence for the first time. She asked herself repeatedly, Can McGrenn really wait till I find a way?
白发老者捋了捋白须，开口道：“不用看了，这小子是铸鼎境二重，不过天赋异禀，反应能力变态。杨管事，好好笼络培养一下他，把他实力提升到铸鼎境三重四重，他绝对能成为一名优秀的金牌陪练，替武殿源源不断的赚取银钱！”

The elderly man with white hair stroked his beard as he opened his mouth to speak, saying, "There is no need to look any further. This kid does indeed have a power level in the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, but he has mysterious heaven-endowed natural talent, which allows him to have obscenely powerful abilities to react to attacks. Manager Yang, ensure that he is well-groomed, well-trained and well-invested in, and help increase his power level up to the third or even fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. He definitely has the potential of becoming an excellent gold token-grade sparring partner, which would no doubt become a endless source of profit for the Martial Arts Hall!"
白发老者的话，让杨管事很是兴奋起来，他没有急着出去，顿了一下又说道：“那费老，要不要把这小子招揽进武殿内？”

The words of the elderly man with white hair caused Manager Yang to become very excited. He did not leave in a hurry, but rather paused for a moment before once again speaking. He asked, "Then, Elder Fei, should we invite or try to attract this youngster into joining the Martial Arts Hall?
盛怒之下一双美目中露出无穷的杀意，强大的气息猛然间散发出来，红色斗气就如一片缭绕的火焰，远远望去，此时的红发美女就如同一只浴火的凤凰。

In her wrath, the pair of beautiful eyes divulged a boundless murderous intent. A strong aura erupted from her, the red anger was like a flame that filled the air. From a distance, the redheaded beauty was as if a phoenix bathing in fire.
目光从安东尼先生身上挪开，却又看见一位熟人走进宴会大厅。
He shifted his gaze away from Mr Anthony and saw someone he knew entering the banquet hall.
目送三人离去之后，葛瑞安脸上的神色有些古怪。
After watching the three men leaving, Gerian's expression was somewhat odd.
目送林立的背影远去，伊娜才带着几分不舍回到楼上，刚一上楼，就听见罗琳带着哭腔的道歉声：“伊娜……对不起。”
After watching Lin Li's figure fade into the distance, Ina returned upstairs with a hint of reluctance. As soon as she went upstairs, she heard Rowling's crying out an apology. "Ina... Sorry."
目送着这位名动天羽城的绝色小姐离开，江逸沉默的转身回自己小房间内修炼了。
Seeing off this heavenly young mistress whose beauty made the entire Skyplume City fall at her feet, Jiang Yi turned away in silence and went back to his room to cultivate.
相同等级的魔法中，咒语越长结构越复杂，威力自然也就越大，既然都消耗相同的魔力，谁不愿意选威力大的？这就跟打麻将一样，一把好牌拿起来，谁不愿意做做清一色什么的？

Among the same level of magic, the longer the spell and the more complex the structure, the greater the power. Since it all consumed the same magical power, who wouldn't choose the one with the greater power? It was just like playing a game of mahjong—with a good set of tiles in hand, who wouldn't want to give pure hands or something a shot?
看了一会，江逸差不多了解了一些情况，这武殿内金牌陪练只有三人，实力差不多都是铸鼎境五六重。银牌陪练有四五个，铸鼎境三四重左右，剩下的八九人全是铜牌陪练。

After observing for a short while, Jiang Yi had more or less understood some of the circumstances around him. This Martial Arts Hall had only three gold token-grade sparring partners, with power levels around the fifth or sixth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. There were also four or five silver token-grade sparring partners, with power levels around the third or fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. The remaining eight or nine persons were all bronze token-grade.
看了一阵，他有些自嘲的喃喃：“姬小姐还是别叫公子了，叫我易剑吧！你见过穿如此破烂草鞋的公子？”

After glancing for a while, in an attempt to mock himself, he muttered, "Young Mistress Ji, I think you shouldn't call me a young master. Why don't you call me Yi Jian! Have you ever seen a gentleman or young master wearing such tattered shoes?"
看了一阵，这老者身子居然微微颤动起来，他目光灼热的扫向江逸，竟突然抱拳拱手道：“这位尊贵的客人，请问这丹药是您炼制出来的吗？”

After looking at the elixirs for a while, the elderly man actually trembled slightly. With a burning gaze he glanced at Jiang Yi and actually with a sudden motion cupped his fists and greeted, "This distinguished and honourable guest, may I ask if you refined this elixir yourself?"
看到外面天已经亮了，江逸不敢多研究了，迟些可是要去荣管事那报道，去西山清点草药，他得提炼一些黑色元力备用，避免被江如虎等人截了。

Seeing that the sky outside was already bright, Jiang Yi did not dare to do any more research. After all, he had to head over and report to to Chief Rong, and go to the Western Hills to take stock of the medicinal plants there. He had to refine some black essence force and keep in reserve for use, in case he was intercepted by Jiang Ruhu and his gang.
看到小奴如此惨样，江逸脑海内爆炸了一般，什么也顾不上直接发狂暴走，身子朝那壮汉飙射而去，元力疯狂的朝拳头涌来，一拳朝那壮汉胸口砸下。
When he saw Xiaonu's tragic state, Jiang Yi felt his mind explode. Without a thought, he shot towards the man, essence force surging straight to his fist, he threw at the man's chest.
看到武殿外围满了人，想到江恨水和姬听雨都进去修炼了，江逸一时有些好奇，就快步朝武殿外走去。

Seeing the exterior of the Martial Arts Hall surrounded by people, and thinking about how Jiang Henshui and Ji Tingyu had both entered the Hall to cultivate their power, Jiang Yi felt a surge of curiosity.
As such, he hastened his steps and walked towards the exterior of the Martial Arts Hall.
看到江松捧着一张红肿的脸，畏惧的快步离开，江逸也不敢多待了，一边拱手低声说道：“柳长老您忙着。”一边快速朝外面退去。

Observing Jiang Song's red and swollen face as he fearfully left with quick steps, Jiang Yi did not dare to stay for any longer.
He cupped his hands and said in a low voice, "Elder Liu, I’ll take my leave," before he hastily made his way outside.
看到江逸的拳头一下变成了三个，马飞有些慌了，但如此关头他还怎么变招？只能咬牙控制那把旋转的青色短剑继续朝江逸胸口刺去，江逸这拳要是敢砸下来，他的胸口肯定也会被绞出一个大洞！

Seeing the singular fist suddenly transforming into three, Ma Fei became somewhat panicked. How could he change his own technique at this juncture? He could only clench his teeth and continue to direct the teal-colored short sword on its path towards Jiang Yi's chest. If Jiang Yi dared to hit him with Phantom Punch, Jiang Yi's chest would then become a mangled mess for sure!
看到江逸竟抡起江如虎一阵狂扫，所有人吓得面色惨白，连忙收回攻击慌忙后退，他们这一攻击怕是江逸还没受伤，江如虎就已经被砸成肉泥了。

The entire group of opponents were so frightened by the sight of Jiang Yi brazenly swinging Jiang Ruhu around in a frenzied sweeping move that their faces turned deathly pale. They promptly withdrew their attacks and retreated backwards in a flurry. They were scared that with their single attack, Jiang Ruhu would beaten to a pulp even before Jiang Yi experienced any injury.
看到江逸脸色大变，江如虎仰天长笑起来：“哈哈，江逸，你不是很狂吗？今日不把你双腿打断，我江如虎的名字倒着写！”

Seeing the colours on Jiang Yi's face change greatly, Jiang Ruhu laughed towards the sky for a long time and announced, "Haha! Jiang Yi, I thought you were very wild? If I don't break both your legs today, I will write my name 'Jiang Ruhu' in reverse!"
看到江逸这副神情，江小奴有些惊慌起来。随即很快醒悟，大眼睛睁得滚圆惊疑问道：“哎呀，不对啊，少爷你的实力怎么那么强大了？刚才你好厉害哦，把那几个坏蛋都给打伤了……”

Looking at Jiang Yi's expression, Jiang Xiaonu felt some fear and concern. Almost immediately realizing what he had done, she asked incredulously, "Oh no, hang on, Young Master, since when did you become so strong? Just now you were so powerful, being able to injure all those bad people..."
看到江逸青铜面具下眼眉中神采飞扬之色，姬听雨怔住了，原本她只是怕江逸尴尬随口说出来的宽慰话语，却没想到江逸居然触动如此之大，还宛如变了一个人般，身上的气势竟让她有一种莫名的熟悉感，就好像……他父亲当年受封天羽城城主那一刻般。

Seeing Jiang Yi's eyes glow with vigor and high spirits from under his bronze mask, Ji Tingyu was stumped for words. Originally, she had just wanted to say some simple words of comfort and consoling, out of fear that Jiang Yi would feel too awkward. However, what she did not expect was that Jiang Yi would become so touched, as though he had changed and become a completely different person. The sense of confidence and gradeur emitting from his body actually gave her a mysterious feeling of familiarity, as though he was like... her father, at the moment when he was given the title of City Lord of Skyplume City.
看到病床前突然多出的陌生人，红发美女秀丽的眉毛微微皱起，神色间有着一丝警惕：“伊娜，他是什么人？”
Seeing a stranger by the sick bed, the redheaded beauty knitted her fine eyebrows slightly with a hint of caution. "Ina, who is he?"
看到这一幕林立就更搞不清楚了。
Seeing the scene had made Lin Li even more confused.
看到这句话的时候，胖老头瞳孔都放大了,从小就听着法师之神的传说长大,那位黑暗年代最伟大的法师曾经干过些什么事,葛瑞安闭着眼睛都能数得出来,唯一能够对抗神祗的凡人,以一人之力歼灭高等精灵魔法军团的传奇，葛瑞安一直觉得，这样的人只应在神话中出现。

The fat old man's pupils dilated when he saw the name. He had grown up listening to the legend of the God of Mages. Gerian could count with his eyes closed exactly what the noblest mage of the Dark Ages did in his time. He was the only mortal that could fight the gods, and there was the legend of him annihilating the Magic Legion of the High Elves with his own power. Gerian had always thought that such a person would only exist in myths.
看到马黑旗和柳河走之前淡淡瞥过的一眼，江逸暗暗苦恼，扭头朝练功房内走去。
Jiang Yi headed to the Technique Practising Room, inwardly vexed by the faint glance Ma Heiqi and Liu He sent his way before they left.
看看人家先前表现出来的实力，二级魔法冲击水幕说瞬发就瞬发，这是五六级魔法师的实力？就算是很多魔导士，大概也就是这样的水准了……

Just look at how he had performed, unleashing a level-two Waterfall Strike in an instant. How was that the strength of a level five or six mage? This was probably the general standard of most Magic Shooters...
看看身上的怒焰之袍，再看看手上的无尽风暴之戒，林立觉得自己已经用不着再打开次元空间了，因为他完全可以肯定，里面装着的必定是上百块龙皮，二十几块神之金属，再加上以前积累下来的无数极品装备和材料……

Looking at the Robe of Wrath he was wearing and the Ring of Endless Storm on his finger, Lin Li felt that he had no need to open the portal to the other dimension again. He was certain that it contained over a hundred pieces of dragon skin and over twenty pieces of divinity metals, along with the numerous top-grade equipment and materials he had accumulated previously.
看看那二三十条咒语都有些什么。
Look at what the twenty or thirty spells were about.
看着伊娜又恢复了生气，林立的心情也相当不错，摸了摸口袋，将几种草药一一掏出摆在桌上。净化药剂需要的材料一共有四种，银须草，太阳草，梦境花，泰罗果，其中的银须草与太阳草，药效是有些雷同的，都带有极强的神圣净化效果，单独拿出一种，便可以配出增幅神圣力量的药剂，两种同时使用，几乎可以净化一切负面效果。

Lin Li was in a pretty good mood seeing Ina had regained her vigor. He fumbled through his pockets and placed the herbs on the table. There were four ingredients required to make the Purifying Potion—silver hairgrass, sungrass, dreampetal, and terocone. Among them, the effects of the silver hairgrass and sungrass were similar; both had strong divine purifying effect. Using one alone would enable you to concoct a potion that could amplify the divine power; using two at the same time would enable you to purify almost every negative effect.
看着凯文一脸捡了便宜的表情，林立不由一阵头皮发麻，三四百金币还不贵。
Watching the expression on Kevin's face like he had snagged a bargain, Lin Li felt his scalp tingle. Three to four hundred gold coins was not considered expensive?
看着林立那副样子，走在最后的克伦威尔就忍不住皱起了眉头，真是个没见过世面的乡巴佬……
Cromwell could not help but frown as he watched Lin Li from behind. What a country bumpkin who had not been exposed to the world...
看着漫天的手影，江逸暗暗感慨。心底却不愿意在一个大美女面前丢脸，他深知自己的速度绝对比不过姬听雨，索性也不躲避了，目光死死锁定姬听雨的双手，脑海快速转动，预算着对方的攻击轨迹，一双手如海藻般朝前方探去。

Seeing the hand silhouettes cover up the surrounding air for as far as his eyes could see, Jiang Yi slightly sighed with regret. Deep down in his heart, he was in truth unwilling to lose face in front of a beautiful lady. He knew deep down that his speed would definitely be unable to beat that of Ji Tingyu. As such, he simply decided to stop trying to avoid incoming attacks any further, and instead use his eyes to firmly lock on to Ji Tingyu's hands. With his mind spinning at a quick speed, he was able to estimate his opponent's attack trajectory and in turn stretch his two hands forward like a strand of seaweed.
看着那一枚枚亮晶的魔晶，一旁的凯文当时就觉得头皮发麻，他甚至不需要仔细看，光凭魔晶上透出的元素波动，也可以感受出它们至少都在五级以上，魔兽可不是谁家里养的奶牛，可以想挤就挤，这么几十枚五级以上的魔晶，就算是出动一支佣兵团队，怕是也要花上十几天的时间。

Kevin's scalp numbed as he saw the shiny magical crystals. He didn't even have to look closely to sense that they were at least level-five by the element waves emanating from the magical crystals. Magical beasts were not cows that one raised at home and could milk them as and when one wanted. It would probably take more than ten days to collect these magical crystals of level-five and above even if a mercenary team was deployed.
看着那琳琅满目的金属锭，就连林立自己都不得不承认，自己确实有些变态的收藏癖，从最廉价的铜锭铁锭，到价格昂贵的精金锭秘银锭，再到平日里难得一见的各种魔法金属，七七八八算下来，竟是有数十种之多……

Looking at the dazzling array of metal ingots, even Lin Li himself had to admit that he was some kind of freak of collectormania. From the cheapest copper and iron ingots to the expensive adamantine and mithril ingots, and then to all kinds of magical metals that were rarely seen in everyday life, there were actually dozens of kinds when counted together...
眼前这个叫费雷的年轻魔法师，根本就不是什么药剂天才，而是一个已经取得巨大成就的药剂大师——他甚至很有机会，在极短时间内超越大师的范畴。
This young mage, Felic, was not a genius at all, but a potion master who had already achieved great success. He even had a good chance to surpass the mastery level in a very short time.
眼前这个年轻魔法师，只不过二十岁不到的年纪，甚至比克伦威尔还要小上一些，但在对力量的控制上，却比从小天赋过人的克伦威尔强了不知多少倍，而且老梅林在刚才的试探中发现，这年轻人的精神力竟是强得可怕，自己用尽全力，也探不出他的极限究竟在哪里。

The young mage before him was no more than 20 years of age, and was much younger than Cromwell. But in the control of power, he was several times stronger than Cromwell, who had displayed an outstanding talent from a young age. Old Merlin had also observed in the probe earlier on how horribly strong this young man's mental strength was. He had given it his all, yet he couldn't figure out where his limit actually was.
眼前魔法师不过二十来岁，看上去脸上甚至还带着一丝稚气，就算他一出生就开始钻研药剂学，也不可能在这个年纪取得巨大突破，更何况他同时还需要大量的时间学习魔法。

The mage in front of him was barely 20 and there was even a look of childishness on his face. Even if he had begun studying pharmaceutics the moment he was born, it would have been impossible to achieve such a huge breakthrough at this age. Moreover, he would need the same huge amount of time to study magic concurrently.
眼看双足飞龙已经死去，那受伤的中年男人扶着四周的树干，挣扎着从树丛中走了出来，他想要上前去感谢自己的救命恩人，可才刚走两步，却看见救命恩人正拿着一只玻璃瓶，拼命的挤压着双足飞龙的尸体。

Upon seeing that the Wyvern was dead, the wounded middle-aged man held onto the surrounding branches and struggled as he walked out of the grove. He had wanted to thank his life savior and had just taken two steps when he saw the latter holding a glass bottle, desperately squeezing the body of the dead Wyvern.
眼看灰袍法师从那僻静的角落里走出，艾萨克一颗心才终于是慢慢放了下来，只要他愿意出手，巴瑟罗尔的小命应该是保住了……
Isaac's heart gradually descended back into its place when the mage in gray robe emerged from the quiet corner. As long as he was willing to interfere, Bathrilor's life should be saved...
睡过头了，更晚了点，不好意思……
研究到半夜，江逸的伤势倒是全好了，确定不能再研究出其余的功能后，他带着深深的遗憾沉沉睡去，昨夜就一宿没睡了，他终于顶不住了。

After studying till midnight, Jiang Yi's injuries had entirely healed. Confirming that he could no longer discover any other abilities, he went to sleep with deep disappointment. He finally could not take it anymore, after having not slept at all last night.
砰！
BANG!
确定镇西军和灵兽山学院一样将会在三个月后来天羽城招生，整个江家都兴奋忙碌起来，江家家主江云山亲自下令，除了部分天才子弟去武殿闭关外，所有家族子弟不得外出全闭关修炼，争取在三个月后的招生大典上好好表现。

At the news that both the Western Garrison Army and Mt. Spirit Beast College would be visiting Skyplume City to recruit newcomers in three months' time, the entire Jiang Clan became enlivened with enthusiastic preparations. The Jiang Clan Clan Head, Jiang Yunshan, had personally issued an order for all descendants to go into seclusion, in order to make the most of the Grand Audition three months later.
确实是怒焰法袍，林立相信自己不可能看错，为了弄到这件拥有三十个卷轴空间的传说法袍，他当初花了差不多三四十万的金币，最后还搭上了一件史诗装备，才算是勉强换到了这件小号法师的极品法袍。

It was indeed the Robe of Wrath. Lin Li was sure he couldn't be wrong. In order to attain this legendary robe with a space to hold thirty scrolls in it, he had spent almost forty thousand gold coins along with a piece of epic equipment and had barely managed to obtain the remarkable magical robe.
神武国以武立国，管理城池的全部都是强大武者，甚至有显著军功的武将还会直接赐予小城作为封地。天羽城城主姬天，就是在十四年前的六国国战中战功彪炳，被赐予羽林偏将，受封天羽城。

The culture and society of Divine Martial Kingdom was built on martial arts. The administrators who run the cities were all powerful martial artists, with military generals wielding significant military prowess even being directly bestowed with entire small cities as vassal territory. The City Lord of Tianyu City Ji Tian had beaten Biao Bing in the Six-Nation War some fourteen years ago and as such was bestowed the title of Yulin Deputy General as well as Skyplume City as his own fiefdom.
神武国首重军功，天羽城城主都是因为军功才被封爵赐城的，能加入神武国三大军团之一的镇西军，那是很荣耀的事情，万一在军中获得军功，封官赐爵，他们家族也能发展壮大，荣耀百年。

Military glory was most valued in Divine Martial Kingdom. The City Lord of Skyplume City was given his lordship as well as command of this city Divine Martial Kingdom precisely because of the military glory he had achieved. Hence, to be able to join the Western Garrison Army, which was one of 's three great armies, was a badge of honor. In the event that a descendant achieved military glory, they would likewise be rewarded with the rank of nobility, and the entire family clan would be able to ride on their coattails of success, sharing the glory for years to come.
种种可怕的下场，听得林立目瞪口呆，这难道就是传说中的天才？仅仅凭着红发美女几滴眼泪，就能揣测出这么多的东西来，还能想象出各种可怕的下场，这需要多强的想象力才能够办到？这人不改行去写骑士小说真是太可惜了……

Lin Li listened agape to all sorts of horrible ends for him. Could this be the legendary genius? He could speculate so many things with only that few drops of tears from the redheaded beauty and even came up with all kinds of horrible repercussions. How strong an imagination was needed for all these? It would be a pity if this man did not change his profession to writing chivalric novels...
秘银之后是瑟银，瑟银之后是魔铁，魔铁之后是精金……
Right after mithril was thorium, and then fiend iron, followed by adamantine...
稍稍休息了一会之后，这家伙又把无尽风暴之戒打开了，看都不看就是一把魔晶抓了出来，放在炼金台上数了数，大概有十几枚之多，这些魔晶大多在四五级左右，其中还夹杂着那么一两枚六七级的。

After a short rest, Lin Li opened up the Ring of Endless Storm again and, without even looking, grabbed a handful of magical crystals and counted them on the forging platform. There were about a dozen or so of these magical crystals, most of which were level-four and five, with one or two level-six and seven ones.
稍稍犹豫之后，他就选择了清醒药剂。
After a slight deliberation, he had chosen the Sobriety Potion.
稍稍犹豫了一下之后，安度因的目光又落到了麦德林身上：“不过，有件事我不太放心，要是我放了他之后，他又去找费雷麻烦怎么办？”
After considering for a moment, Andoine's gaze once again fell on Medellin: "However, there is something I am worried about. If I were to let him go, what do I do if he provokes Felic again?"
空前绝后的魔法天才，大师级别的药剂师，现在怎么又冒出个中级铁匠来？
An unprecedented magic genius, a master of pharmaceutics, and now a mid-level forger?
穿过走廊，江逸很快抵达一个大殿内，这个大殿中央盘坐着七八人，竟都带着青铜野兽的面具，很多人身上手臂上还有很明显的伤势，衣袍也有些破烂。大殿四周还有很多小房间，十几个房间内隐约可以听到打斗的声音。

Passing through the corridor, Jiang Yi quickly arrived in the interior of a large hall. Seven or eight people were seated cross-legged in the center of the big hall.
All of them were wearing masks of bronze-green beasts, with many of them having very obvious injuries on their bodies and arms and some even having tattered clothes. There were also many small rooms surrounding the large hall. One could vaguely hear the sounds of combat coming from more than ten of these rooms.
突然——
Suddenly—
突然，他脑海内闪过一个念头，眸子一下亮若星辰，他的黑色元力可以增强药效？刚才那人阶上品灵神丹，就很有可能是因为黑色元力使得药力增强，变成了地阶丹药的。

Suddenly, a thought flashed past his mind. His eyes shone brightly like stars. Could his black essence force increase medicinal effects? That Man-tier superior-grade Spirit Pills just now had become Earth-tier elixirs, their medical healing power increasing very likely a result of the black essence force.
突然，整个练功房墙壁上光芒一闪，江逸莫名的感觉到一股力量禁锢了他般，他慌忙移动身体却发现没有半点影响，下意识的催动元力才发现不能再调动一丝蓝色元力。

Suddenly, the walls of the entire technique practicing room shone with brilliant rays of light. Jiang Yi felt an indescribable force that seemed to confine him tightly in shackles. He hurriedly tried to move his body but found no physical influence or change whatsoever. It was only when he set his mind to move his essence force that he realized he could not circulate even a sliver of blue essence force.
突然，柳长老眸子内闪过一丝惊疑声，那一掌也收了回来，他目光疑惑的注视着丹炉内唯一剩下的两枚丹药，感觉似乎……和原先炼制的灵神丹有些不同？

Suddenly, Elder Liu paused, bewildered. He retracted his hand in the process. He stared in curiosity and suspicion at the two remaining elixirs left in the cauldron. He felt as though... they were different from the Spirit Pills he was originally refining.
突然，自火焰中传出一声碎响，只见天帝手中的火龙剑忽然碎裂为数块碎片朝四面八方飞射出去。
Suddenly, a loud explosion sounded from the fire as Celestial Thearch's sword broke into tiny shards and shot out in all directions.

第一次和如此级别的武者对战，江逸不敢马虎，第一时间运转了一次黑色元力去了眼睛，背部微微弓起，目光灼灼的盯着对方的一举一动。

Facing off such a strong opponent for the first time, Jiang Yi could not afford to be sloppy. He transferred a wisp of black essence force at once and hunched his back slightly, sharp gaze tracking his opponent's every move.
第一次在冒险者公会看到伊娜的时候，他就迷上了这个有着一双长腿的金发姑娘。
When he had first met Ina at the Adventurers Guild, he was smitten by this blond lady with a pair of slender legs.

第二天中午的时候，一行四人回到了加洛斯城。
The next day, the party of four had arrived at Jarrosus City at noon.
第二天刚到中午，葛瑞安就回到了翡翠高塔。
Gerian returned to the Emerald Tower at noon the next day.
第二天天还没亮，江逸就醒来要上西山清点，江小奴却闹着要出去做工，被他狠狠训斥了一顿不敢多言了。

Before dawn broke the next day, Jiang Yi was already awake, and had to head to the Western Hills to take stock. Jiang Xiaonu, however, once again disturbed him and demanded to head out to work. It was only after he had viciously reprimanded her that she no longer dared to speak another word.
第二天江逸早早的做好了荣管事交代的差事，就又去武殿了。杨管事再次给了三枚灵神丹，一整天除了翊凌雪点名要江逸出战了一场外，杨总管没有叫江逸一次，让他专心修炼。

The next day, after finishing the tasks given by Chief Rong early in the morning, Jiang Yi once again went over to the Martial Arts Hall. Manager Yang once again gave him three Spirit Pills. For the rest of the entire day, besides Yi Lingxue ordering Jiang Yi specifically by name to join her in a practice match as a sparring partner, Manager Yang did not call out Jiang Yi once and instead allowed him to concentrate on cultivating his power.
第二天，江逸还是一个人修炼了整整一天，柳长老还是不见人影，江逸心里有种淡淡的不祥预感，不过他可不敢独自找去柳长老住的院子找他，只能闷闷的回到家中。

The next day, Jiang Yi did refining practice for an entire day on his own, for Elder Liu was still missing. Jiang Yi had a faintly ominous premonition in his heart, but as he did not dare to visit by himself the courtyard where Elder Liu stayed to find the elder, he had no choice but to melancholically make his way home.
第二日天还没亮，江逸就醒来了，打坐了一个时辰江水决，吃完早饭他交代江小奴这几天没事就去春芽家躲躲，避免江如虎找麻烦就匆匆朝炼丹房走去。

The next day, Jiang Yi was already up before daybreak. He meditated for two hours practicing the Jiang Water Art. After breakfast, he instructed Jiang Xiaonu to hide at Chun Ya's house for the next few days if she was not busy, in case Jiang Ruhu came looking for trouble. He then made his way to the alchemy lab.

第十天，杨管事依照约定给江逸预支了十两紫金，江逸拿到紫金之后，一刻也待不住了和杨管事告罪一声，火急火燎的朝风月楼冲去。

On the tenth day, as per their agreement, Manager Yang gave an advance of ten taels of purple gold to Jiang Yi. After Jiang Yi received his purple gold, without wasting a single second, he apologised to Manager Yang and, burning with much anxiety, rushed over to the Fengyue Brothel.
