Chapter 4: The Manticore
等了一会，江逸正准备和杨管事去告别回家，走廊外突然响起一阵脚步声，江逸扫了一眼，连忙身子一缩坐了回去。

After waiting for a while, Jiang Yi was just getting ready to say farewell to Manager Yang and return home, when the sound of footsteps suddenly rang from outside the corridor. Jiang Yi gave a quick glance, before promptly contracting his body and returned back to his sitting position.
等了几十年，终于等到翡翠高塔出了个药剂大师了，他妈的药剂师协会，你们见鬼去吧！
He had waited for decades and at last Emerald Tower had its own potion master. Damn the Pharmacist Association, go to hell!
等他从书堆中抬起头来，已经是第二天傍晚的时候了。
It was already evening the next day when he looked up from the pile of books.
等他回到地下室的时候，正听见葛瑞安在恐吓那倒霉魔导士。
When he returned to the basement, he overheard Gerian intimidating the unlucky Magic Shooter.
等他回过头来时，却发现两人已经傻了。
He found both of them dazed when he turned his head back.
等他干完这一切，从药剂室出来的时候，却正好碰见了一个熟人。
He was finally done with the work and was ready to leave when he met an acquaintance as he walked out of the potion lab.
等他走出小房间后，却看到翊凌雪旁边多了一个白色的身影，也是一个漂亮的小姐，年纪和翊凌雪差不多，身材倒是没有她那么火爆，长相倒是更胜一分。

When he came out of his room, Jiang Yi saw that there was someone dressed in white standing beside Yi Lingxue. She was a lovely young mistress around Yi Lingxue's age, and although her figure was not as curvaceous, she looked even more beautiful than Yi Lingxue.
等众人退后，江逸才松了一口气，今日震慑住所有人，他就安全了，否则他难逃被众人群殴的结局。

It was only when everyone had retreated backward that Jiang Yi breathed a sigh of relief. Having shocked and intimidated every single opponent that day, he would finally be safe; otherwise, he would find difficulty escaping from ending up being atatcked from all sides and beaten up by all his opponents.
等到两人从会客室出来的时候，拍卖会也布置得差不多了，加洛斯城十七支势力无一缺席，就连前几天刚跟葛瑞安干了一架的梅林家族，也厚着脸皮派出了人来。

The preparation for the auction was almost done when they came out of the room. All 17 forces of Jarrosus City were present; even the Merlin Family, who had a fight with Gerian just a few days ago, had shamelessly sent someone to attend the auction.
等到两人商量好细节，从树林里出来的时候，麦德林已经走了，跟他一起离开的，还有身受重伤的霍伦，从老家伙当时的脸色看来，霍伦回去多半是要倒大霉的。

By the time the two had done discussing the details and walked out of the forest, Medellin, together with badly wounded Hoeren, had already left. From the old man's expression then, Hoeren was likely to suffer a great deal after he returned.
等到之后林立将利维坦猩猩抽得满地打滚的时候，麦格雷尼父女已经彻底麻木了，在他们看来，这个少年魔法师简直就是一个怪物……
By the time Lin Li had the Leviathan Gorilla rolling on the floor from all the beatings, McGrenn and Ina had turned completely numb. From what they saw, this young mage was a total monster...
等到他这一觉睡醒的时候，一条消息早在加洛斯城内传得沸沸扬扬。
By the time he woke up, news had spread through Jarrosus City.
等到林立从这一阵椰子雨中缓过气来之时，混身上下早已是青一块紫一块的，就好象是涂上各种颜料在搞行为艺术一样。
By the time Lin Li had recovered his breath from the shower of coconuts, he was already covered in patches of black and blue, like applying various dyestuff on the body as a part of performance art.
等到林立回过头来，却发现马森正一脸呆滞的望着自己，那表情那神色，就好象是在看一个陌生人一样。
When Lin Li turned around, to his surprise, Marson was looking at him, confounded. His expression seemed to suggest that Lin Li was a complete stranger to him.
等到林立将五种技能全部升到大师级别的时候，已经差不多到中午了，一群尾随而来的玩家就这么目瞪口呆的看着他糟蹋材料，刚开始的时候还会替他心疼一下，到了最后简直就彻底麻木了，围观群众们甚至已经开始猜测，这家伙会不会是某个富家公子哥，因为在现实里受了什么刺激，才跑到游戏里来发泄的。

It was already noon when Lin Li finally advanced to the mastery level for all five skills. The group of players who had followed behind watched in shock as they witnessed Lin Li ravaging the materials. They had felt pity for him at the beginning, but were completely numbed by the time he finished. The onlookers even started guessing whether Lin Li came from some rich family and took to gaming to vent his frustrations after encountering some stress at home.
等到林立讲完蛮牛之力药剂的原理，开始给他分析同类药剂的优劣时，老头看他的目光，已经象是在看一头恐龙了。
Until Lin Li had finished explaining the principles of the Bull's Strength potion and began analyzing the pros and cons of similar potions, the old man watched as if Lin Li was a dinosaur.
等到灰袍法师站出来，吐露自己身份的时候，一众宾客更是被彻底震惊了，谁也没有想到，自己竟能亲眼看见这段活着的传说。
When the mage in gray robe came out to reveal his identity, the crowd of guests were thoroughly shocked. No one had expected themselves to be able to see the living legend in person.
等到索兰又从仓库里拿出一张卷轴的时候，众人望过去的目光已经有些呆滞了，一个能随手拿出两件史诗级装备，外加上百块龙皮二十几块神之金属的禽兽，又有什么事情是干不出来的？

But then Suo Lan retrieved a scroll from the warehouse yet again, and all life had escaped from the players' eyes. He was a beast able to produce two pieces of epic equipment at ease, and in addition possessed over a hundred pieces of dragon skin and over twenty pieces of divinity metals. What else could he not do?
等到那又跳又笑的利维坦猩猩察觉到不对的时候，却已经是有些晚了，失去了平衡的巨网正在崩溃，仍它如何跳来跳去，也无法组织整张巨网的破裂。

By the time the hopping, cackling gorilla realized something was wrong, it was already too late. The giant net had lost its balance and was collapsing; no matter how it jumped, it could not prevent the whole net from tearing.
等大门关闭后，那冷冰冰的少爷才开口道：“在下翊龙宇，苍狼，我听雪儿说过很多次你，还请你全力出手和我对战一场。”

The aloof young master waited till the doors were closed before introducing himself, "Yours truly, Yi Longyu. Lone Wolf, I have heard Xue-er mention you many times. Please battle me with everything you've got."
等小奴走后，江逸这才怔怔地坐在床上，整理乱成一团麻的脑海。
Only after Xiaonu left did Jiang Yi sit on his bed in a daze. He took the opportunity to clear his cluttered and messy mind.
等所有人消失在西山，半山腰内才走出一个羸弱的身影，他隐约听到江如鹰的话语，脸上都是轻松之色。

It was only after everyone had disappeared from the Western Hills that a frail figure walked out from the mid-way point on the mountain. He had vaguely heard Jiang Ruying's words and, as such, his face gave off an expression of relief.
等林立穿着附魔完毕的怒焰之袍，从炼金室里走出来的时候，公会大厅里的各势力首脑已经散得差不多了。
By the time Lin Li came out of the alchemy lab wearing the enchanted Robe of Wrath, the leaders of the various forces in the guild hall had almost dispersed.
等江如虎走后，江逸从丹房内走出来，他脸色很是淡然，眸子内都是自信。十天时间他完全可以轻松修炼到铸鼎境二重，到时候江如虎敢来，谁爬回江家大院还不一定呢……

Once Jiang Ruhu was gone, Jiang Yi walked out from inside the Alchemy Lab. His face gave off a look of indifference, while his eyes showed off his self-confidence.
In ten days, he could easily train up to the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. At that moment, should Jiang Ruhu dare to show up, it would be uncertain who would be crawling back to the central court of the Jiang Residence...
等江松彻底消失了，江逸脸色才平和下来，眸子内却闪过一丝忧色。
It was only when Jiang Song had completely disappeared that Jiang Yi calmed down. However, his pupils revealed a flash of worry.
等江逸大步朝走廊内行去，那黑甲护卫才松了一口，如释重负叹道：“总算又招到一个，唉……这灵兽山学院一招生，天羽城的公子小姐都疯了一般，没日没夜的修炼，对练。这就算找一百个陪练也不够他们玩啊，这小子才铸鼎境一重，不知能坚持多久？可别半个时辰不到就爬出来……”

The guard wearing black armor waited for Jiang Yi to walk with big steps through the corridor into the inner bowels of the building before finally heaving a sigh of relief.
As though he was relieved of a heavy burden, he sighed and said, "Finally, I've recruited one person. Once this Spirit Beast College started recruiting students, the young masters and young mistresses in Skyplume City have endlessly trained their cultivation techniques and practiced their martial arts techniques, as though they've all gone mad.
"With this circumstance, even if we manage to find a hundred sparring partners, it will not be enough to fulfill their demands and accompany them in their fun!
"This boy only has his power level at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Who knows how long he can possibly maintain his post? I hope he does not crawl out after less than one hour..."
等江逸愁眉苦脸的回到自家小院，江小奴已经做好了早饭，正坐在台阶上托着下巴等他回来，一张精致的小脸上都是忧色。看到江逸走进来，连忙紧张的说道：“少爷，你去哪了？急死我了，春芽可是听人说了，一大早江如虎带人就去西山截你了，你可前往别上西山啊……”

By the time the miserable Jiang Yi returned to the small courtyard of his own home, Jiang Xiaonu had already finished making breakfast and was sitting on the entrance stairway, propping her chin on her hand and waiting for him to return. Her delicate face was filled with worry.
When she saw Jiang Yi enter, she hurriedly and nervously asked, "Young Master, where have you been? You've worried me sick! Chun Ya heard someone say that Jiang Ruhu had led people to the Western Hills since dawn to intercept you! Don't you think of heading up to the Western Hills..."
等江逸的身影消失在远处的小巷内，江小奴挥手的动作陡然停了下来，脸上的笑容也瞬间凝固，眼中两行清泪无声的留下，她望着江逸离去的方向，轻声的喃喃起来：“少爷，小奴虽然不知道发生了什么事情，但我知道肯定出大事了，否则你不会抛下小奴的！少爷，你别担心我，放手去做你想做的事情，小奴在家等着你回来，如果……你死了，小奴也一定不会独活，去了冥界小奴还做你的侍女。”

It was only until Jiang Yi's figure disappeared in the distant alleyway that Jiang Xiaonu's waving stumbled to a stop and her smile froze instantly. Tears streaming silently down her face, she gazed in the direction Jiang Yi had gone and murmured, "Young Master, Xiaonu doesn't know what has happened, but something must have gone seriously wrong, or you would not have left Xiaonu like this! Young Master, don't you worry about me, be free to do whatever you wish, I will be waiting for you at home. If... you were to die, Xiaonu would not live this life either. Xiaonu would still be your maidservant in the Netherworld Realm."
等江逸走了一会后，鹤大师才挥退了刘管事和侍女，朝姬听雨问道：“小姐，这丹药除了丹纹外全无价值，而且药效不明，卖不出去的，你怎么全收啊？还有……要不要派人跟踪他？”

Master He waited until Jiang Yi had left for some time before dismissing Housekeeper Liu and the maidservant. He turned to Ji Tingyu and asked, "Young Mistress, besides the vein patterns, this pill is completely valueless; its medical effects are also unclear. We can't sell this off at all. How could you have accepted all of them? On top of that... should we send someone to follow him?"
等灵神丹的药力笼罩丹田，江逸立即调集一丝黑色元力融合药力，接着全力运转江水决。

Once the medical efficacy powers of the Spirit Pills had enveloped his dantian, Jiang Yi immediately assembled a wisp of black essence force and combined it with the medical efficacy power, before circulating the Jiang Water Art technique with all my might.
等等……巨网？
Hang on... Giant net?
等等……葛瑞安会长？
Hold on... President Gerian?
等级认证手续比想象中简单，填完一张表格就算是搞定了。
The certification procedure was easier than expected. It was considered done once the form was filled out.
答案对她来说有些残酷——完全不可能。
The answer to her question was cruel—absolutely not.
简简单单的一句话，却比震慑术咒语更加管用，刹时间偌大个大厅安静下来，竟是再听不见一丝声音。
A simple sentence was more effective than a Terror Spell. All of a sudden, the spacious hall fell silent, and not even the slightest sound could be heard.
管事一怔，脸上立即露出灿烂的微笑，招手道：“来人，上好茶！”
The housekeeper was startled for a second but quickly revealed a bright smile on his face. Waving his hand, he ordered, "Someone come over here, and serve some premium tea!"
管事似乎也不想和江逸多说，和一名护卫交代道：“去取令牌来。”
The housekeeper did not have much to say to Jiang Yi either. "Go get the command token," he instructed one of the guards instead.
管事和一名护卫打了个眼色，让他安排马家少爷上楼，这才接过江逸的金叶子，斜着眼睛随口教训道：“小子！下次可别那么冲动，这次算是给你们江家面子了……”

The housekeeper glanced at a guard, signaling him to take the Ma Family young master upstairs. Only then did he deign to take the purple gold leaves from Jiang Yi, all the while looking sideways at him, chiding, "You little brat! You'd better not act so brazenly next time, consider this as me giving face to the Jiang Clan..."
管事嘿嘿一笑道：“那是，那是，不过视察楼子内的姑娘这也是正事啊，您说是不？”
The housekeeper grinned roguishly, "Indeed, indeed. Although wouldn't you say that inspecting the girls in this brothel is in itself a part of business?"
管事很快出去取了一片小小的金叶子递给江逸，姬听雨才微笑说道：“易公子，以后如果有这样的丹药，你尽管来我们聚珍阁，我们全要！而且一律按三枚一两紫金收购，品阶高我们还会出高价，当然……你必须取得炼制这丹药的大师同意。”

The housekeeper hastily went to fetch a piece of tiny gold leaf and passed to Jiang Yi. It was only then that Ji Tingyu smiled faintly and said, "Young Master Yi, if you have any more of such elixirs in the future, please feel free to come to Pearl Gathering Pavilion! We want themn all! On top of that, we will buy all of them based on the rate of one tael of purple gold for three pills; if the grading is higher than this, we will even offer an even higher price. Of course... you would need to get the permission of the alchemist who refined this pill."
管事房内，荣管事听完江逸的话后勃然大怒，一拍桌子站了起来就要训斥，但他话还没出口，却被两片递过来的金叶子吸引了。

In his quarters, Chief Rong flew into a rage upon Jiang Yi's words. Slamming down on the table, he shot up from the chair, ready to give Jiang Yi a dressing-down. Before any reproval could pass his lips however, Chief Rong became distracted by the two pieces of gold leaf that made their way under his nose.
管事点了点头，不冷不热的说道：“那好，请跟我来。”
The housekeeper nodded his head and nonchalantly replied, "Very well then, please follow me."
管事点了点头，又询问道：“请问客人的丹药是什么品阶？如果是人阶下品的话……”
The housekeeper nodded his head and asked, "Can I ask you, dear guest, what is the quality grade of your elixir? If it is just Man-tier inferior-grade..."
管事老头连忙赔笑道：“翊小姐，都在陪练呢，要不你再等等？”
The elderly manager smiled and quickly replied, "Young Mistress Yi, they are all busy sparring with other partners. Why don't you wait just a little longer?"
管事阴鸷的眸子在江逸背后的江小奴身上一扫，冷笑道：“要么赔钱，要么这丫头留下为奴十年，要么……你留下一只手！”

The malicious eyes of the housekeeper glanced at Jiang Xiaonu, who was standing behind Jiang Yi, before coldly laughing and replying, "Either you pay up, this girl stays here as a slave for ten years, or... you leave one hand behind!"
精神力的绝对控制，魔力的精确分配，以及元素结构的完全解析……
Absolute control of the mental strength, accurate allocation of the mana, and the complete breakdown of the elemental structures...
精神控制，巫师之眼，奥术飞弹，虚弱无力，肢体麻痹，魔力防护，魔力增幅，丧心病狂，心志狂乱，石化皮肤……
Mind control, warlock’s eyes, arcane missile, fragility, paralysis, power shield, power amplification, hysteria, delirium, fossilising...
紧接着克伦威尔就感觉，自己好象被人用铁锤砸在脸上似的，在那一刹那，克伦威尔甚至觉得，自己整张脸都好象已经被砸烂了，那是一股无与伦比的力量，在忽然之间就涌到了自己脸上。

Immediately, Cromwell felt as if he had been hit in the face with a hammer. In that moment, Cromwell even felt like his whole face was shattered; it was an incomparable force, bursting on his face all at once.
紧接着林立就觉得身上一轻，那巨大的旋涡，仿佛在忽然之间就失去了踪影，就好象从来也没有过一般，老梅林立仍然远远的站在台阶下，只是目光也从林立身上，挪到了翡翠高塔的深处。

The next moment, Lin Li felt the weight lifted off his body. The giant vortex seemed to vanish without a trace in an instant, as if it had never been here before. Old Merlin still stood at the bottom of the step a distance away, his eyes shifted from Lin Li to the depths of the Emerald Tower.
紧跟着一股锥心的疼痛从左手上传来，低头一看又是一根无名指落到了厚厚的地毯上，再加上先前冰锥留下的伤害，一时间巴瑟罗尔一支左手同样血肉模糊，撕裂般的疼痛一阵接着一阵，当场把巴瑟罗尔痛得晕了过去……

And then a sharp pain shot through his left hand. When he lowered his head, he saw another ring finger landed on the thick carpet. In addition to the damage left by the previous icicle, Bathrilor's left hand was a bloody pile of flesh as well. The tearing pain went on and on, and Bathrilor fainted from the excruciating pain on the spot.
紧跟着就是一片血花溅起，巴瑟罗尔一根无名指，已是生生被风刃切了下来，落到地毯上还骨碌骨碌的滚了几圈，沾上了鲜血的红宝石，在水晶灯下更是亮得有些妖异……

It was followed by a spatter of blood. Bathrilor's ring finger was severed by the blade and landed on the carpet with a few rounds of rolling. The ruby, now stained with blood, emitted an unearthly glow under the crystal chandeliers...
紧跟着就看见红宝石上光芒一闪，一片耀眼的火光猛然间铺开，就仿佛一条条火龙奔腾而去，又如一张火焰巨网从天而降。
Then, he saw a flash of light on the ruby, and dazzling flames spread out like fire dragons rushing forth, or like a giant flaming web descending from the sky.
红发美女出身显赫，又有一位名师指点，年纪轻轻就有了十级以上的实力，医术上造诣之高，更是远远超越旁人，在她十几岁的时候，甚至还曾得到过一位药剂师的指点。

The redheaded beauty was born to an illustrious family and had been instructed by a famous teacher. She had reached a strength of level-ten and above at such a young age. Her high attainments in medical skills far surpassed those of others. As a teenager, she had even received pointers from a pharmacist.
红发美女循声望去，正看见那条细细的黑线，刹时间惊得花容失色：“诅咒？”
The redheaded beauty shifted her attention and turned pale from fear as she saw the thin black line. "Curse?"
红发美女被这个可能给吓住了。
The redheaded beauty was stunned by the possibility.
红发美女身上杀气稍减，一张俏脸却涨得通红，想要辩解两句，却又被林立毫不客气的打断。
The murderous intent coming from the redheaded beauty subsided slightly, but her pretty face was flushed. She wanted to defend herself, but was rudely interrupted by Lin Li.
红宝石用于分解，绿宝石用于融合。
The ruby was used for decomposition, the emerald for fusion.
练功房内，江逸尴尬的望着对面这位美得令人窒息的姬家小姐，目光闪烁都有些不敢直视了，还好他带着面具，姬听雨看不到他发烫的脸。

In the Technique Practising Room, Jiang Yi awkwardly glanced at the alluring and beautiful young lady from the Ji Family standing opposite him. His evasive gaze was ysmbolic of his fear of looking at her directly. Thankfully for him, he was wearing a mask, so Ji Tingyu could not see his blushing-hot face.
终于看见灰袍法师出手，城主大人不由长长的吁出口气。
The Castellan heaved a long sigh of relief having seen the mage in gray robe intervene at last.
终于，那管事抬头望着江逸，点头道：“我给你们江家一个面子，江家子弟想然也会言而有信。当然……如果一个月后你不赔钱，我会拿着这令牌去你们江家刑堂要钱，你们走吧。”

Finally, the housekeeper raised his head to look at Jiang Yi, before nodding his head and replied, "I will give face to the Jiang Clan - after all, the Jiang Clan members are doubtlessly true to their word. Of course... If you fail to repay the money in a month's time, I will take this token to your Jiang Clan’s Disciplinary Court to demand the money. You guys can go now."
经历过匪夷所思的穿越，林立的心智早已成熟，完全过了那种为美色晕头转向的年纪，更何况他天生就不是那种见了美女就走不动路的性格，罗琳在别人眼中可能美艳不可方物，但在林立眼里，她只是一个差点害了自己病人的庸医。

After having experienced this bizarre time-travelling, Lin Li had become more mature, completely over the age of being disoriented at a woman's beauty. Besides, he was not the kind of person who couldn't walk at the sight of a beautiful woman from the start. Rowling might be attractive in other people's eyes, but in Lin Li's eyes, she was merely a quack who almost killed her patient.
经过一上午的观察，江逸倒是大概懂了这炼丹的步骤，炼丹分为熔炼、化丹、回炉三步，让他绝望的是，这炼丹第一步熔炼药材和第三步回炉丹成倒是好办，第二步化丹他却是完全看不懂。

After observing for an entire morning, Jiang Yi could understand more or less the steps involved in refining elixirs. The refinement of elixirs had three steps: smelting, forming, and melting down. What made him despair was that the first step of melting down the ingredients and the third step of reheating the elixirs were easy to do, but he could not understand the second step of forming the elixirs at all.
经过今天这一战，他对魔法已经有了更深刻的认识，绝对的力量远比技巧更加重要，哪怕没有超人的天赋，也可以凭着强横的力量横扫一切，就好象一开始老梅林对自己所做的一样。

After the battle today, he'd had a deeper understanding of magic. Absolute power was definitely more important than skills. Even if one did not have an extraordinary gift, he could rely on brutal power to make a clean sweep off everything, like what Old Merlin had done to him at the beginning.
结果只是片刻时间，练功房的房门就打开了，那陪练的武者跌跌撞撞的走出来，戴着的野猪面具都吊在脖子上，露出一张满是鲜血的脸。那翊小姐的身影出现在门口，对着杨管事冷哼道：“杨管事，这铜牌陪练实力怎么那么差？换一个。”

In the end, it was only a short moment of time before the door to the technique-practicing room opened. "Wild Boar" staggered out. His mask hung from his neck, revealing a face filled with fresh blood. The silhouette of Young Mistress Yi appeared at the door.
She coldly snorted at Manager Yang and said, "Manager Yong, why is the strength of this bronze-token-grade sparring partner so weak? Get me another one."
结果确认后，大长老一怒之下亲自去藏书阁把他权限以内可以挑选的，涵盖不少领域的数十本修炼心法统统取了出来，让江逸一本书一本书地，一个系别一个系别地尝试。因为哪怕江逸适合修炼的是某个系别最低等级的心法，只要能有普通人的速度，以他的武学悟性来说，依然是有望成才的。

When he realized this unusual circumstance, an irritated Grand Elder personally went to his private library. Out of the countless books available, he gathered dozens of different books dedicated to the practice of mental cultivation and gave them to Jiang Yi to practice the proposed methods book by book, style by style.
Regardless of whether Jiang Yi was only suited to practice the lowest level of mental cultivation abilities or not, as long as he learned it at the speed of an average person, with his instincts in martial arts, he would definitely be able to master them and become a powerful martial artist.
结果自然不言而喻，江逸就算不动用黑色元力，经过这段时间不断的对练，反应速度和战斗本能也绝不是这骄傲的翊家小姐可比的。

The result was unsurprising. Even without the black essence force, Jiang Yi's speed of reaction and fighting instincts were continuously enhanced after so many sparring matches. The proud young mistress of the Yi Family was naturally no match against him.
结果足足一整天，柳长老依旧没有出现。江逸纳闷了，按理柳长老应该会继续试验啊，怎么一天都没出现？不过柳长老不在，江逸乐得清闲，修炼了一整天封印上的符文又破解了二十枚，江水决的修炼速度继续提升。

Elder Liu did not show up for the entire day. Jiang Yi was perplexed. In theory, Elder Liu would be rearing to continue his experiments. Why did he not turn up for an entire day? However, with Elder Liu not being around, Jiang Yi was able to enjoy his idle moments. He was able to practice refining the entire day and shaved twenty characters off the runic patterns of his seal. The refining speed of his Jiang Water Art likewise continued to grow.
结果这次丹田内却又开始产生黑色元力了，而等黑色元力积累到十缕之后，又不再增加了……
The result was that his dantian once again started producing black essence force; yet once the ten strands of this essence force had been collated, the numbers did not increase again...
结果，让他很是无语的是，内堂一个穿着褐色长袍，披头散发，如一个疯子般的老头正围着一个丹炉瞪着大眼睛细细查看，而平时在丹药房帮忙的一位江家旁系子弟江松却并没有在丹药房内。

In the end what left him truly speechless was an old man in the inner part of the room, wearing a long brown robe with disheveled hair like a madman, standing around a cauldron and staring into it with his eyes wide open. As for the Jiang Clan collateral descendant who was normally in the Elixir Room helping, Jiang Song, he was not in the Elixir Room.
缭绕的火焰渐渐熄灭，十级强者特有的气息也消弭于无形，此时的红发美女，只是一个做错了事的小姑娘，她紧紧抱着伊娜，声音中带着一丝哭腔：“对不起伊娜……我……我真的只是想帮麦格雷尼叔叔……我没想过……我真的没想过……”

The curling flame was gradually put out and the aura of a level-ten power had also vanished without a trace. The redheaded beauty at the moment was like a little girl who had done something wrong. She pulled Ina into a tight hug and her voice had a tinge of sobbing in it. "Sorry, Ina... I... I really wanted to help Uncle McGrenn... I've never thought... I've really never thought of..."
罗林家族的族长已经完全杀红眼了，跟他竞争的是一名美貌少妇，看起来三十许人，貌美如花身段丰韵，声音又甜又软，举手投足之间带着万种风情，大概也只有葛瑞安这种老油条才认得出来，这美貌少妇其实就是加洛斯六大地下势力之一，暗月的首领克达芙妮，她手上控制着全加洛斯的小偷。

The leader of the Rolin Family had gone completely amok. Competing with him was a good-looking young woman around 30 years of age. She was beautiful and charming, her voice soft and sweet, and her every action was exceedingly fascinating and amorous. Perhaps only a wily old fox like Gerian would recognize her. The attractive young woman was Daphne, the leader of Dark Moon, one of Jarrosus' six underground forces. She controlled all the thieves in Jarrosus.
罗琳一直静静的坐在那里，只是听着安静的听着两人交谈，但她望向林立的目光，却比先前更加复杂了。
Rowling sat there quietly listening to the conversation of the two men, but her gaze resting on Lin Li was more complicated than before.
罗琳俏脸上泪痕已干，在两人愕然的目光中，有些怯生生的喊了一声：“格林爷爷。”
The tears had dried on Rowling's pretty face. Before the startled eyes of both men, she called out timidly, "Grandpa Grimm."
罗琳微微一愕，这才反应过来他是真的要走，也再顾不得什么难以启齿，银牙一咬终于下定了决心：“我……我想跟你学习药剂！”

Rowling was slightly taken aback, and then realized he was indeed leaving. She couldn't care about the embarrassment anymore and, with clenched teeth, she came to a decision. "I... I'd like to learn potion making from you!"
罗琳心中说不出的委屈，晶莹的泪珠在眼眶中打着转，滴答滴答的落在了红色的地毯上。
The aggrievement in Rowling's heart that she could not express turned into glittering tears that swirled in her eyes before falling in drip drops on the red carpet.
罗琳红唇微张，却又是欲言又止，只是神色间的委屈更甚，泪珠已是“滴答滴答”的落到了餐桌上。
Rowling's red lips opened slightly, but she couldn't get the words out. Her expression was even more aggrieved, and tears started dripping on the dining table.
罗琳轻轻咬着嘴唇，过了很久才有些犹豫的问道：“格林爷爷，是不是所有的药剂大师，都不愿意把自己的知识教给别人？”
Rowling bit her lips, and asked hesitantly after some time. "Grandpa Grimm, are all potion masters unwilling to impart their knowledge to others?"
翊凌雪一脸正色，扬了扬手中的令牌道：“这是我父亲的令牌，我也没有开玩笑，苍狼……或许你自己都不知道，你有一种很奇特的能力，能帮助武者武技快速大成，我们翊家也正是看重了这一点才招揽你的。你去翊家不用做什么，只是天天和家族子弟对练，辅助他们武技快速大成即可……”

Yi Lingxue sent him a stern look and waved the command token in her hand, "This is my father's command token, and I was not joking. Lone Wolf... maybe you didn't realize it yet, but you have a very unique capability that can help martial artists attain phenomenal success for their techniques. The Yi Family saw this in you and therefore decided to recruit you. Once you joined our family, you need not do anything else except sparring with the family descendants, helping them to achieve phenomenal success as quick as possible..."
翊凌雪倒是没有勉强，只是让江逸好好考虑一下，之后的每天她照样来找江逸对练，却是没有再提及此事。
Yi Lingxue did not push any further, only asking Jiang Yi to think it over. Following that day, she still went to Jiang Yi for sparring matches, but not once did she bring up the matter again.
翊凌雪展开攻击之后，江逸身形开始飘逸的在练功房内转圈，无论这翊小姐怎么攻击，都碰不到江逸的一片衣角。每次攻击江逸似乎有预感般，翊凌雪还没出招他就已经开始躲避了，两人元力被封印，攻击速度本就差不了多少，试问翊凌雪如何能攻击到江逸？

After Yi Lingxue carried out her attacks, Jiang Yi's body figure started gracefully moving about in circles around the Technique Practising Room. No matter how much this Young Mistress Yi tried to strike at him, she could not even touch the corner of Jiang Yi's clothes. Every time she launched an attacked, it seemed as though Jiang Yi had premonitive abilities, being able to avoid and hide before Yi Lingxue released her combat techniques. With both persons' essence forces being sealed off from use, their combat speeds were more or less the same. Dare one ask, how could it be possible for Yi Lingxue to ever manage to hit Jiang Yi?
翊凌雪整理了一下火红的武士袍，叹道：“太可惜了……你要是早些努力修炼，说不定天羽城十大天才其中就有你了。”

Yi Lingxue straightened her fiery-red martial artist robes, sighing, "It's such a shame... if only you had put in more effort before in cultivating, you might have been one of the top ten geniuses of Skyplume City."
翊凌雪浑身衣袍湿透了，此刻大口大口喘气，微微隆起的胸脯上下起伏，无比诱人。听到江逸的话，她俏脸上露出一抹淡淡红晕，看了一眼江逸笑道：“你很会说话哦，行了！今天打痛快了，明日我再找你，不过……明日你能不能还手？别总是躲避，那样没意思。”

Yi Lingxue's robes were completely wet. At the moment, she was panting and taking in big mouthfuls of air. With her slightly perky breasts moving up and down as she panted, she appeared incomparably alluring. Upon listening to what Jiang Yi said, a faint reddish blush appeared on her delicate face. Looking at Jiang Yi, she smiled and replied, "You sure know how to speak. very well! Today, I've sparred to my heart's content. I'll come and fine you tomorrow, but... can you at least fight back during our match tomorrow? Don't always simply avoid and try to escape, those tactics don't make the match fun at all."
翊凌雪看到江逸走过来，连忙凑过来压低声音说道：“苍狼，这是我堂妹翊飞儿，这段时间我要闭关，以后就让你就和她对练吧！”

Upon seeing Jiang Yi, Yi Lingxue wasted no time in going to him and whispering, "Lone Wolf, this is my cousin Yi Fei-er. I'll be in seclusion for some time, so I'll let you spar with her in the meantime!"
翊凌雪被虐了一场，不仅没有半点气馁反而兴奋无比，约定第二日再战后扭着圆滚的翘臀大步离开了，看得其余陪练一阵眼热，明显很羡慕江逸的艳福。

大步Having been abused in one match, not only did Yi Lingxue not feel a shred of discouragement; rather, she was unbelievably excited. After promising to return the next day for a rematch, she twitched her round buttocks and walked off at a wide pace. Observing her movements, the other sparring partners were all feeling envious. They were all clearly jealous of Jiang Yi's luck with women.
翊凌雪见江逸沉默不说话有些急了，朝前方走了几步，靠近江逸三尺距离，这才轻咬贝唇说道：“苍狼，你要什么待遇尽管提，我都可以转告我父亲。如果你是别的家族子弟这也不是问题，你可以入赘我们翊家，我有一个堂妹，比我还漂亮……”

Yi Lingxue became slightly anxious at Jiang Yi's silence. She took a few steps towards him until she was a meter away, lightly biting her lips, "Lone Wolf, feel free to make whatever demands you see fit, I'll convey them to my father. If you are the descendant of another family, it won't be a problem either. You can marry into the Yi Family; I have a cousin who is even more beautiful than I am..."
翊凌雪这次让江逸出手攻击她，江逸没办法动用了武技，结果……翊凌雪很悲剧，江逸每次都能先发制人，轻松击中她，好在江逸每次都是点到即止，否则怕是翊凌雪娇贵的身子要饱受虐待了。

This time, Yi Lingxue insisted on allowing Jiang Yi to make the first move and attack her. Jiang Yi had no choice but to use his martial arts skills. In the end... it was a sad case for Yi Lingxue. Every single time, Jiang Yi was able to pre-empt her moves and take the initiative to strike first, allowing him to easily strike her. Thankfully for her, every time Jiang Yi did not over-exert his force in his attacks and stopped once he touched her, otherwise Yi Lingxue's elegant and fragile body would have to be subject to much physical abuse.
翊凌雪顿了一下解释起来：“姬家二公子姬长歌，三小姐姬听雨，马家大少马黑旗，江家大少江恨水，江家旁系少爷江如龙，冷家大少冷千军，冷家四小姐冷芊芊，柳家三少柳河，柳家旁系少爷柳战，还有一个杨家大少杨中天。这十人都不满十八岁，实力最低都是铸鼎境七重，被誉为这一代的天羽城十大天才。”

Yi Lingxue paused for a moment before explaining, "Ji Family Second Young Master Ji Changge and Third Young Mistress Ji Tingyu; Ma Family Great Young Master Ma Heiqi; Jiang Clan Great Young Master Jiang Henshui, and Jiang Rulong from the side branch of the Jiang Clan; Leng Family Great Young Master Leng Qianjun and Fourth Young Mistress Leng Qianqian; Liu Family Third Young Master Liu He, and Liu Zhan from the side branch of the Liu family, and last but not least Yang Family Great Young Master Yang Zhongtian. The ten of them are all below the age of 18, yet their power levels are minimally at the seventh stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, hence they are hailed as Skyplume City's top ten geniuses of our generation."
翊小姐一轮暴雨拳竟砸空了？她精致的小脸上都是错愕，随即恼羞成怒再次施展出漫天的拳影将江逸笼罩进去。

Had her Thunderstorm Fists actually hit nothing but mere air? Young Mistress Yi's delicate face revealed a look of astonishment, which immediately turned to frustrated embarrassment and subsequent anger, as she once again demonstrated her Vast Sky Fists technique and enveloped Jiang Yi inside her fist silhouettes.
翊小姐抓狂了，快步朝江逸欺身而来，又换了几种武技，追着江逸穷追猛打。但无论她怎么攻击，江逸都能提前躲避开去，步伐轻松，像在自家后院闲庭信步般从容。

Young Mistress Yi became frantic and, with quick steps, moved closer to Jiang Yi. She tried to use various different martial arts techniques, as she pursued Jiang Yi relentlessly and tried to strike him. However, no matter the method she used to attack, Jiang Yi could avoid the move in advance. His steps were light and gentle, moving unhurriedly as though he were idly strolling in his own backyard.
翊小姐整理了一下衣裳大步走了出去，江逸也跟了出去。坐在了人群中，他四处一扫却没有发现杨管事。索性也不管了，闭关打坐恢复消耗的黑色元力。

Young Mistress Yi straightened out and tidied up her robes before leaving the room at a wide-stepped pace. Jiang Yi followed behind her out of the room as well. Sitting amongst the crowd of sparring partners, he gave a sweeping glance of the room, but could not spot Manager Yang at all. Simply deciding not to concern himself any further, he decided to sit in silence and meditate to restore the black essence forces he had just consumed.
翊小姐气鼓鼓的走了，此刻她一身武士袍都湿透了，曲线尽露，自然不可能在此多停留，否则就白白便宜了众人了。

Young Mistress Yi stormed off, fuming. At the moment, her entire martial arts robes were completely wet, revealing her figure. Naturally, she could not stay there any longer, lest she continue giving everyone a free show.
翊小姐满脸可惜的说道：“下次他要是再来，一定要第一时间让人通知我，那个陪练好厉害，我的暴雨拳修炼了八年，这三年一直卡在精通阶段，和他对练了一场竟大成了……”

With a look of pity on her face, Young Mistress Yi replied, "You must get someone to inform me in the first instance the next time he returns. That sparring partner is really powerful. I have been practising my Thunderstorm Fist for eight years and have been stuck at the 'Proficiency' stage for the past three years. Yet, once I've sparred with him in a single practice match, I actually managed to reach the 'Phenomenal' stage..."
翊飞儿一听脸色更臭了，一跺脚道：“你不会还手啊？这样陪练有什么意思？”
Yi Fei-er scowled harder at this and stomped her foot, "Why don't you fight back then? Where's the fun in sparring when you are like this?"
翊飞儿差点摔倒，一张俏脸上都是恼羞成怒之色，站稳身子之后立即反手又攻击而来，结局很悲剧，她一次次被江逸抓住手，如耍猴般围绕着江逸冲来冲去……

Yi Fei-er almost fell, her face was red with embarrassment and anger. She steadied herself and immediately resumed her attack. Sadly, the result was the same, and she turned out to be the one who was like a monkey that was being provoked by Jiang Yi, dashing around in the room...
翊飞儿战力明显比翊凌雪差远了，江逸轻松从漫天的拳影中抓住一双滑腻的白手，他也不敢用力，抓住她的手后顺势朝旁边轻轻一带，翊飞儿的身躯就朝那边跌跌撞撞而去。

Yi Fei-er's fighting skills were obviously far below that of Yi Lingxue. Effortlessly, Jiang Yi caught a pair of silky smooth hands amid the flying fist silhouettes. He dared not exert too much force and lightly yanked her sideways. That was all it took for Yi Fei-er to stumble over.
翊飞儿攻击了一阵，尤其是每一拳都打在空中，这让她郁闷得吐血。再一次砸空之后，立即横眉竖眼的娇喝道：“你属猴的？怎么就知道闪来闪去？”

Yi Fei-er continued her attacks for a while, every punch hitting nothing but thin air. It made her incredibly sulky. After yet another miss, she scowled and pouted, "Is your zodiac a monkey? Do you only know how to leap and dodge like one?"
翊龙宇冷笑一声，江逸这铸鼎境三重的武者，就算两人元力被封印了，但是肉体力量和他相差太大了，他随便都能震退对方的双手，当下也不不变招了，继续朝江逸的脖子切去。

Yi Longyu smirked. Jiang Yi was, after all, only at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Even if the essence forces of the two sparring parties were sealed from use, Jiang Yi's physical strength was far inferior to his own and he could easily push past Jiang Yi's defenses. With this thought, he maintained the current technique and the knifehand strikes continued their downward trajectory to Jiang Yi's neck.
翊龙宇和江逸一样满头大汗，体力消耗巨大，他脸上没有半点胜利的得意，反而全是是自嘲：“苍狼，你不用装了！刚才你是故意被我拍中的吧？你小子果然和凌雪所说的变态，这反应速度太逆天了，你别说达到铸鼎境六重，就算四重都能轻松击败我！对了……去我家做副长老的事情考虑的怎么样了？如果你答应……江家那边我们来处理，甚至我可以代我父亲做主，把凌雪嫁给你！”

Like Jiang Yi, Yi Longyu was bathed in perspiration and extremely fatigued. His expression was not one of complacency, but of self-mockery, "Long Wolf, you might as well drop the pretense! You deliberately allowed me to hit you just now, didn't you? You little bugger are truly as obscenely strong as what Lingxue said. This kind of reaction speed is just unnatural. Forget about the sixth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, you'd be able to defeat me with ease even if you were just at the fourth stage! Speaking of... have you given thought yet to being the Deputy Elder of my family? If you want to... then let us deal with the Jiang Clan. I can even make the decision on my father's behalf, and have Lingxue marry you!"
翊龙宇实力强大，并没有和翊飞儿般被江逸带着转圈，只是瞬间就稳住了身形。身子一转目光内都是高隆战意，他铸鼎境六重的武者竟伤不了一个铸鼎境三重的武者，这要是传出去他在天羽城还怎么混？他作为翊家年轻一代第一强者，翊家也会颜面大损的。

Yi Longyu's prowess was not to be underestimated; unlike Yi Feier, he did not let Jiang Yi lead him on a wild goose chase and promptly steadied himself. He turned on Jiang Yi again, eyes igniting with fighting spirit. How could he, a martial artist at the sixth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, incapable of inflicting damage on someone at only the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm? If word got out, he would be the laughing stock of Skyplume City. As the strongest martial artist of his generation in the Yi Family, he would disgrace the family too.
翊龙宇笑了笑，也不多说径直朝外面走去，走了几步才转头笑道：“你小子果然邪门，和你对战一场，我的流云散手竟有些进步，说不定再和你对战几场将会大成了。你放心……这个秘密我会帮你保守，不过作为补偿，以后我和我们翊家的子弟会经常找你陪练的，希望你每次都全力以赴。”

Yi Longyue smiled at Jiang Yi's words and headed outside without saying anything more. A few steps later, he turned around and chuckled, "You are definitely a strange brat. My Cloud-Spin Free Hand had actually seen some progress after a battle with you. Perhaps a few more rounds would see it reaching the phenomenal stage. Don't worry... your secret is safe with me, but in return, you will have to spar a lot more frequently with the Yi Family descendants. I hope you can give your all for every battle."
翊龙宇翊凌雪看到这个告示之后顿时满脸失望，他们知道江逸是绝对不可能投靠翊家了，就算不被武殿收买，也会被江家重视了。不过这段时间翊家很多子弟和江逸对练，或多或少都有收获，翊家也算是赚了，下面的每场对战可是要百两紫金了。

Upon seeing that announcement, Yi Longyu and Yi Lingxue immediately revealed looks of disappointment. They knew that it would be absolutely impossible for Jiang Yi to rely on the Yi Family anymore - even if the Martial Arts Hall did not buy his loyalty, he would surely be treated with great importance by the Jiang Clan. However, over this recent period of time, many descendants of the Yi Family were able to have sparring practice with Jiang Yi and had more or less received some benefits. The Yi Family could be considered to have received a cheap advantage - after all, they would have to spend a whopping hundred taels of purple gold for each sparring match in the future.
翊龙宇见江逸准备好了，眸子内闪过一丝傲然，双手做了一种奇怪的手势，化作掌刀朝江逸斜斜切来。
Knowing that Jiang Yi was ready, Yi Longyu attacked with a haughty glint in his eyes. His hands formed a strange hand-seal and transformed into knifehands that came down on Jiang Yi crosswise.
翡翠高塔外的几条街道异常冷清，偶尔走过几名路人，也大多是显得行色匆匆。
The streets outside Emerald Tower were unusually quiet. There were occasionally a few passers-by, but they mostly appeared to be in a hurry.
翡翠高塔外的天空，正被厚厚的乌云所覆盖着……
Outside the Emerald Tower, the sky was covered with layers of thick, dark clouds...
老天有眼……
God is watching...
老头已经完全忘了赶林立走的事了，看看木屋外天色渐晚，老头很殷勤的邀请林立留宿，并给他准备好了丰盛的晚餐。席间在林立旁敲侧击之下，这个陌生的世界也渐渐在林立脑海中有了个大概的轮廓。

The old man had completely forgotten about wanting Lin Li to leave. Looking at the darkening sky outside the log cabin, the old man was eager to invite Lin Li to stay, and even prepared a sumptuous dinner for him. After rounds of beating around the bush during dinner, Lin Li was gradually able to make out a general outline of the unfamiliar world in his mind.
老头正在发火，一边夸张的比着手势，一边骂骂咧咧的说着什么。
The old man was incensed. His hands were making exaggerated gestures as he swore.
老实说林立不是一个吝啬的人，更没有敝帚自珍的习惯，否则早在落日山脉之时，他也不会尽心尽力的指导安度因了，真要严格说起来，安度因在药剂学上真没什么天赋可言，都一百多岁的人了，还连最简单的药剂公式都记不清楚，配起药剂来也是毛手毛脚，动不动就把药剂室炸得乱七八糟。

To be honest, Lin Li was not a stingy person, and he definitely did not have the habit of thinking highly of his own doings. Otherwise, he would not have given Andoine his best guidance back in the Sunset Mountains. Strictly speaking, Andoine really had no talent in pharmaceutics. He was in his hundreds, yet he couldn't even remember the simplest potion formulas, and was brash and clumsy when concocting the potions, blowing up the potion lab on every occasion.
老实说林立也怕，但他更怕在这片见鬼的森林，想要走出这片森林，就不能看着双足飞龙将那三个活人全变成死人，有时侯做好事的理由其实就这么简单。

Lin Li was afraid as well. But he was even more afraid of this cursed forest. If he wished to walk out of this forest, he could not let the Wyvern turn those three into corpses. Sometimes, the reason for doing a good deed was just as simple as this.
老家伙两眼一瞪：“都被老子打成这样你还能笑得出来，你他妈属鸵鸟的？”
The old fellow glared at Old Merlin. "You could still laugh after being beaten by me? Are you a damn ostrich?"
老家伙在林立的介绍之下，匆匆跟马森欧灵打过招呼之后，就急急忙忙的说了一句：“那好，我晚上过来找你。”
Following Lin Li's introduction, the old man hastily greeted Marson and Orrin and hurriedly said, "Alright then, I will come to meet you at night."
老板将两人带到一片武器架前，指着其中一把精铁锻造的双手巨剑问道：“您看这把双手巨剑如何？马拉顿锻造坊出产，奥兰纳冒险者公会的制式装备，价格也不算太贵，就收您一百金币好了。”

The man led them to a row of racks, all loaded with weapons. He pointed to a two-handed giant sword forged by indurium, "How about this one? Crafted by Malaton Forging Workshop, standard equipment at Alanna's Adventurers Guild. Moreover, its price is rather reasonable at only 100 gold coins."
老格林倒是不得不承认，这个叫费雷的年轻人在魔法方面，确实是一个罕见的天才。
Old Grimm had to admit that the young man named Felic was indeed a rare talent in magic.
老格林刚刚开口，却又有一人走进这僻静的角落。
Old Grimm had just begun to speak when someone else walked into the secluded corner.
老格林想了很久，却还是无法理解其中，不得不有些疑惑的问道：“虚空花用于提纯我可以理解，可为什么又要加入龙血草呢？”

Old Grimm thought for a very long time but still could not quite grasp the reason behind it, so he had to ask in puzzlement, "I can understand the netherbloom is used for purification, but why do you add in the dracaena grass?"
老格林有些无奈的摇了摇头，从这个年轻魔法师的反应中，他也算是看出一些东西来了，这家伙根本就不知道自己是谁，更不知道自己在药剂学上的成就。

Old Grimm shook his head resignedly. He could make out something judging from the young mage's reaction. This fellow had no idea who he was at all, not even what his achievements in pharmaceutics were.
老格林此话一出，大厅中更是完全静了下来，所有人都屏住了呼吸，仿佛就连心跳都停止了。
The hall was completely silent at Old Grimm's words. Everyone held their breaths, and it was as if their heartbeat had stopped.
老格林究竟有什么主意，林立可是一点也不知道，他现在正急得不可开交。
Lin Li totally had no idea what Old Grimm had in mind. He was in a hurry now.
老格林聚精会神的听着，那种感觉就象回到了数十年前，自己还只是个学徒的时候，用充满求知欲的目光望着导师，听他为自己讲解一条条神秘而复杂的药剂公式。他已经完全忘记了林立的年纪，只是单纯的沉浸在药剂知识当中。

Old Grimm listened attentively. It felt like he had returned to decades ago when he was still an apprentice, looking at his teacher with eyes full of the thirst for knowledge and listening to him explain mysterious and complex potion formulas to himself. He had completely forgotten Lin Li's age and was simply immersed in the knowledge of potions.
老梅林一想到这个，真是连肺都气炸了。
At the thought of this, Old Merlin was so angry he felt his lungs were about to explode.
老梅林一手将克伦威尔推开，同样是毫不畏惧的迎了上去。
Old Merlin pushed Cromwell aside and met him without fear.
老梅林却根本不去理他，口中依旧快速的吟唱着咒文，杖头魔晶青色火焰熊熊燃烧，又是一片铺天盖地的火雨降下，直打得那一片水蓝色的光幕“滋滋”做响。

Old Merlin paid no heed to his fury; his lips continued their rapid recitation of the spells. The green flame burned fiercely from the magical crystal at the tip of his staff, and another overspread of fire rain came falling down, hitting the blue water curtains with a sizzle.
老梅林在克伦威尔的搀扶下，虽然勉强稳了下来，却仍显得有些虚弱，听到葛瑞安的叫嚣也不去理他，只是捂着胸口爆发出一阵剧烈的咳嗽。此时的老梅林，看上去就象一个风烛残年的老人，苍老而又虚弱，又哪还有一丝大魔导士的风采？

Old Merlin was barely able to steady himself with the help of Cromwell, and he still looked weak. He had heard Gerian's yell but chose to ignore it, clinging onto his chest as he broke out in a violent cough. Old Merlin looked like an old man with one foot in the grave, worn and weak, without the bearing of a great archmage.
老梅林并不比他好上多少，在落地之时，甚至需要靠克伦威尔搀扶才能勉强站稳。
Old Merlin was no better. He had to rely on Cromwell's support in order to stand firm on his feet when he landed.
老梅林心里很清楚，自己之所以能在这场悬殊的较量中占尽优势，所凭借的，只不过是对规则理解更加深刻。
Old Merlin knew very well it was all because of his deeper understanding of the rules that he was able to dominate the battle.
老梅林忽然很想问问，这世界上到底还有没有天理？
Old Merlin had wanted to ask if there was any justice left in this world?
老梅林拥有的只是一枚强能水晶，用过一次之后就再无机会，可魔法公会拥有的，却是一个可以随手送出唤醒药剂的大师，而且还一送就是两瓶。

What Old Merlin had was merely a Strong Energy Crystal, which could only be used once. But what the Guild of Magic had was a potion master who could gift away an Awakening Potion, and he had just gifted two at once.
老梅林拼命的告诉自己，忍！一定要忍！
Old Merlin told himself desperately that he had to bear with it!
老梅林握住强能水晶的右手猛的一紧，顿时只见一丝丝光亮从他手指缝隙中透出，那种纯粹而又干净的魔法气息，正以一种令人难以想象的速度向老梅林体内涌去，随着那股力量的涌动，原本苍白而虚弱的面庞，在忽然之间就变得红润了许多。

Old Merlin squeezed the crystal ball in his right hand, and all at once traces of light escaped from the gaps of his fingers. The pure and clean aura gushed into Old Merlin's body at an unimaginable speed. With that surge of power, color had returned to the pale and frail face.
老梅林昨晚一番训斥，克伦威尔证明自己的心情更加迫切，今天一大早，他就带着几条十四级咒语进了翡翠高塔，连到时候怎么说话，他都已经计划好了。

After being reprimanded by Old Merlin last night, Cromwell was even more anxious to prove himself. Early this morning, he walked into the Emerald Tower carrying a few level-fourteen spells. He had even planned out the plea he would give in his mind.
老梅林的声音远远传开，整个翡翠高塔忽然之间就安静了下来。
The whole Emerald Tower became silent as Old Merlin's voice spread throughout it.
老梅林的脸上，第一次露出了沮丧的表情。
For the first time, a dejected expression came across Old Merlin's face.
老梅林的话，让克伦威尔陷入了沉思，他呆呆的站在那里，细细品位着父亲话里的意思，克伦威尔并不是白痴，片刻之后，他开始渐渐抓住了话中的关键，一时间，克伦威尔只觉手脚一阵冰凉，张口想要说话，却感觉嗓子异常干涩：“您……您是说……梅林家族的地位……将会被……被其他势力取代？”

Old Merlin's words had plunged Cromwell into deep thoughts. He stood there, absorbed in the meaning of his father's words. Cromwell was not an idiot, and after a few moments, he began to grasp the key to his words. Cromwell felt his limbs turn cold at once, and as he opened his mouth to speak, he felt his throat was unusually dry. "You... you mean... Merlin Family... will... will be replaced by other powers?"
老梅林看了看身旁的克伦威尔，又看了看一脸笑容的林立，终于咬着牙，做了一个痛苦的决定。
Old Merlin took a look at Cromwell, who was standing by his side, and then at Lin Li who was smiling away. Finally, he clenched his teeth and came to a painful decision.
老梅林神色坚决，心头却暗自叹了口气。
Old Merlin's expression was firm, but in his heart, he let out a sigh.
老梅林脸上的笑容正在渐渐放大，看上去一切都已经到了不可挽回的地步。
Old Merlin's smile spread across his face. It seemed like the situation was too far gone beyond repair.
老梅林脸色陡然一变，手中法杖猛的往前一伸，正好搭在了克伦威尔肩上，还不等他明白过来是怎么回事时，那法杖顶端的魔晶已经是呈现出一阵奇异的扭曲，就好象在忽然之间就变成了一双大手，紧紧的将克伦威尔抓在手中。

Old Merlin's expression changed and he protracted his staff right onto Cromwell's shoulders. Before the latter could understand what was happening, the magical crystal at the top of the staff had exhibited a peculiar distortion, as if in just an instant it had changed into a pair of giant hands, clutching Cromwell in it.
老梅林这一生从不做没把握的事，他还从来没象现在这样，把一切都交给了运气。
Old Merlin would never do anything uncertain in his life. He had never given everything to luck, like what he was doing now.
老梅林那成竹在胸的笑容，在水晶光晕下显得更加高深莫测。
The confident smile of Old Merlin was even more unfathomable under the gleam of the crystal halo.
老梅林错就错在，他选择了林立最擅长的领域，那是连传奇法师都眼红的变态精神力。
Old Merlin was wrong for choosing a field Lin Li was best at. That was an abnormal mental strength that even a legendary mage would be jealous of.
老法师大概是这个世界上最了解林立的人了，他知道林立的身份有问题，所以为他准备好了新的身份，但他恐怕怎么也想不到，这家伙不是身份有问题，而是根本没有身份，落日山脉绵延数千里，来自另一个世界的林立，又怎么可能在其中找到出路？

Andoine was probably the only person in this world who understood Lin Li best. He knew there was a problem with Lin Li's identity, so he had prepared a new one for him. But perhaps he would never have thought that it was not just a problem of troublesome identity for this fellow—in fact, he had none at all. The Sunset Mountains stretched for thousands of miles. How could Lin Li, who had came from another world, find his way out?
老者走进来，看到江逸整个人都笼罩在斗篷黑袍内更加不爽了，随手拿起桌子上的丹药倒出一枚拿在手里闻了闻，很是不屑的说道：“这是灵神丹炼废了，回炉再造的吧？而且还添加了一些杂七杂八的药粉，药效估计还要打折了，这丹药价值不高，刘管事你看着办吧！”

As the elderly man walked in, the old man became even more displeased seeing Jiang Yi with his entire body concealed in a cloak and black robes. He readily grabbed the elixir bottle lying on the table, pouring a pill out and giving it a sniff. With much disdain he said, "This is a Spirit Pill that was refined to a useless state, then reheated and re-refined, isn't it? On top of that, a few miscellaneous medicinal powders were added in. I estimate that its medicinal efficacy has also been reduced. The value of this elixir is not high. Housekeeper Liu, you take care of it yourself!"
而一旁的麦格雷尼和伊娜则看得是目瞪口呆，这一路走来，他们对林立的实力也算是有些了解，知道这是一个强大的魔法师，可他们却从来没想过，林立的实力竟会强到这种程度，那无限风刃的场景，让他们觉得自己就好象是在做梦一样。

McGrenn and Ina watched, dumbfounded. They had a sense of Lin Li's abilities along the way and knew he was a powerful mage, but they had never imagined him to be this powerful. The scene of the infinite wind blades attacking made them feel as if they were in a dream.
而与他同为传奇法师的格林，却是法兰王国难得一见的药剂天才，二十多岁的时候就已经在药剂学上取得了不俗的成就，他的天才甚至惊动了药剂师公会，在他三十岁成为魔导士那一天，安瑞尔药剂师公会正式宣布，接收格林－伯恩塞德为正式会员。

Grimm, who was also a legendary mage like Andoine, was a rare pharmaceutics genius in Felan Kingdom. He had already made remarkable achievements in his twenties. His geniosity had alarmed the Pharmacists Guild. On the day he'd become a Magic Shooter at age 30, the Anril Pharmacists Guild had officially announced that they had accepted Grimm Burnside as an official member of their guild.
而与此同时，林立也完成了冰甲术的咒文。
At the same time, Lin Li had finished the recitation of the Ice Armor Spell.
而与此同时，葛瑞安的失败，也会让魔法公会沉寂一段时间，他们必须再次积累力量，等待下一个崛起的机会。
At the same time, Gerian's defeat would also silence the Guild of Magic for a long while. They would have to gather their strength again and wait for the next opportunity to rise.
而且……
Moreover...
而且使用这个二级魔法的，还只是一个不满二十岁的年轻法师。
Furthermore, the one who had used this level-two spell was a young mage not over the age of 20.
而且信上还写到，这位年轻的药剂大师实力之强，绝不在药剂师公会任何人之下！
The letter also mentioned how powerful this young potion master was, powerful enough to outdo anyone in the Pharmacists Guild!
而且回炉了多次，他体内的元力也损耗了十分之一，不过他倒是不敢动用黑色元力，生怕被这柳长老看出端倪……

On top of that, having melting down the ingredients multiple times, one-tenth of the essence force in his body had been consumed. However, he did not dare to use his black essence force, lest Elder Liu got a clue of his secret...
而且巫师之眼只是十级法术，以葛瑞安十五级大魔导士的实力，顺手补充一个根本就不费力气。
Moreover, the Warlock's Eyes was a level-ten magic. With Gerian's level-fifteen strength, he could easily restore one with no effort.
而且武者修炼到了后面的境界，丹药对于修炼的增幅也有限了，除非是高级的地品天品丹药，否则也只是能起的效果微乎其微。高级丹药异常昂贵，一枚地品丹药价值百金，小小的天羽城，就算是姬家也不可能长期给家族子弟供应的，至于天品丹药，姬天自己也怕消耗不起吧……

In addition, the elixirs became less effective in strengthening cultivation as martial artists increase their power levels. Unless they were the superior earth-grade and heaven-grade elixirs, the effect would be negligible. However, the superior grade elixirs were extraordinarily expensive. A single earth-grade elixir cost a hundred taels of gold. In a place as small as Skyplume City, even the Ji Family would not be able to supply earth-grade elixirs to its descendants over a long period of time. As for the heaven-grade elixirs, even Ji Tian himself would have trouble affording them...
而且江家只有江恨水和江如龙进了武殿内修炼，他陪练的时候戴着面具，两人不一定能认出他，再说了……两人如此实力，找陪练肯定也找金牌陪练，怎么会找他这种铸鼎境二重的武者？

Additionally, of the Jiang Clan members, only Jiang Henshui and Jiang Rulong had entered the Martial Arts Hall for power cultivation training. Since he was wearing a mask during sparring practice, the two were unlikely to recognise him. Furthermore... considering how the two individuals had such great power, if they wanted to find sparring partners, they would definitely find gold token-grade ones. Why would they ever consider finding a martial artist with a power level at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm like himself?
而且这禽兽还一拿就是二十几块，这还给不给人活路走了？
Was this beast intending to give anyone a way out at all, having over twenty divinity metals out at once?
而且这红发美女看上去，好象还跟城主大人关系不浅，一进大厅就亲热的挽着艾萨克的手臂，神色间带着几分撒娇的意思，而艾萨克似乎也对她相当宠爱，神色间看起来异常慈祥，就好象当初葛瑞安看他的目光一样。

And this redheaded beauty looked as if she was close to the Castellan. Upon entering the hall, she took Isaac's arm affectionately with a coquettish look on her face. Isaac seemed to be very fond of her as well, his expression kind and loving, just like how Gerian had looked at Lin Li in the beginning.
而且这还没完，上百张黑龙皮之下，是二十几块已经冶炼好的神之金属。
And this was not the end. Beneath the stack of black dragon skin were over twenty pieces of smelted divinity metals.
而他示好的方式，简单而又直接，对于这场拍卖会，最大的好处，无疑就是将奥法药剂的价值最大化，以一个惊险的价格，逼出了梅林家族最后的底限，光是这一点，就足以让魔法公会承他的情。

And the way he demonstrated his friendly intentions was simple and straightforward. For this auction, the greatest benefit was undoubtedly to maximize the value of Arcane Magic Potion, forcing out the bottom line of the Merlin Family with an astounding price. This alone was enough for the Guild of Magic to owe him a debt of gratitude.
而传说中的黑莲花则又完全是另一个极端，生长环境之苛刻达到了令人发指的地步，它生长的地方，必须要有浓郁的魔法元素，以及能够融化钢铁的极限温度，最重要的是，还必须要有一条来自地心的熔岩灌溉，但灌溉的熔岩，却又不能直接浇到黑莲花上，只能在离黑莲花大概一米的地方缓缓流淌……

The legendary black lotus, however, was on another end of the scope. Most important of all, it had to be watered with molten lava coming from the core of the earth. The molten lava, however, could not be watered directly on the black lotus, instead it could only be run slowly about a meter away from it...
而几乎与次同时，两根锋利的石刺已是破开大地，从地下猛的刺了出来。

而几乎与此同时，凯文已经丢下了手中的酒杯，疯了一样的向这边扑来。

而反应最大的，还是柜台后的老头。

而另一种方法无疑要现实许多，一瓶净化药剂，就能够完全解决这个麻烦。

而因为柳长老的死去，江逸彻底没有机会炼丹了，整个炼丹房都被封了。家族唯一的炼丹师没了，丹药只能去外面购买，丹房内储存的丹药自然会封存，统一调度。

On top of that, because of Elder Liu's death, Jiang Yi had completely no more opportunities to refine elixirs, as the alchemy lab had been completely sealed off. 而因为老法师的苦恼，林立也难得的休息了几天。
Because of his troubles, Lin Li managed to get a few days of a rare break.
而在上面的楼梯上走下一名黄裳少女后，整个聚珍阁内经过短暂的哗然后，立即安静了下来，落针可闻。很多锦袍公子眼中都露出灼热的光芒，刚想匆匆朝黄裳少女走去，却看到她无视众人直接走进了一间雅阁内。

As a young lady dressed in yellow apparel walked down the stairs from the floor above, the entire Pearl Gathering Pavilion immediately turned silent after some commotion for a brief moment. The atmosphere was so silent one could hear a pin drop. The eyes of many gentlemen in embroided robes revealed looks of burning passion as they sought to hastily rush towards the young lady dressed in yellow. However, they could only observe her ignore the masses around her and walk directly towards the interior of a small elegent booth.
而在他身前不远的地方，一名中年魔法师正噤若寒蝉的听着，脸上的神色又委屈又害怕，一边点头，还一边小心翼翼的往后退，好象生怕老家伙把火发在他头上似的。

Not far in front of him, a middle-aged mage was listening in silence, his expression aggrieved and frightened. He nodded while retreating carefully at the same time, as if afraid that the old man's rage would fall upon him.
而在他身后，是一瓶瓶配好的奥法药剂。
Behind him were bottles of completed Arcane Magic Potions.
而在加洛斯之外，对魔法公会怀有敌意的势力并不在少数，就比如他刚到加洛斯时，所遇到的那个中年人，他就代表着一支叫做阴影之巢的势力。

Outside Jarrosus, there were a handful of forces who were hostile to the Guild of Magic, such as the middle-aged man whom Lin Li had met when he first arrived in Jarrosus. The middle-aged man represented a force called the Shadow's Nest.
而在小木屋内，安度因看着水晶球上的景象，却是脱口赞道：“干得漂亮！”
In the little log cabin, Andoine watched the scene on the crystal ball and blurted his praise. "Nicely done!"
而在等待的过程中，他又将手伸进了无尽风暴之戒。
While he was waiting, he put his hand into the Ring of Endless Storm once more.
而在药剂学这个领域里，两人却又走上了截然不同的道路。
And in the field of pharmaceutics, both had taken completely different paths.
而在这中间他所冒的风险，其实并没有想象中那么大。
And the risk he had undertaken was not that high as he had imagined.
而在配制过程中，林立对清醒药剂的缺陷，也有了最直观的认识。
And in the process of preparation, Lin Li also had the most intuitive understanding of the shortcomings of the Sobriety Potion.
而大师级别更象一道分水岭，当技能达到大师级别之后，就不再是用钱能够解决的问题了，也许一万次成功的锻造，也不会让你的技能提升哪怕一点，而一次失败的锻造，却有可能让你的技能突飞猛进，没人敢说，自己有一天一定会达到宗师级别，哪怕是他离宗师已经只有一步之遥。

The mastery level was more like a division. When one had reached the mastery level, it was not a matter of money anymore. Perhaps even if you had succeeded in forging ten thousand times, there wouldn't be the slightest increase in your skills. But a failure in forging might allow you to obtain a huge improvement in skills. No one would dare say there would be a day where he could reach the level of a guru, even when there was only a small gap to overcome to achieve it.
而如果这个年轻法师真有救人的能力，自己却一再阻拦，甚至想把他赶走，那结果岂不是等于……
If this young mage really had the ability to save people, but was repeatedly stalled and even driven away by her, then wouldn't the result be...
而对“快”的最佳诠释，无疑正是瞬发。
As for the interpretation of "quick", it would no doubt be the instantaneous outburst.
而对方却不出他的意料之外身子如破麻袋般倒飞出去，重重的撞在墙上翻滚下来，抱着一条被砸断骨头的手臂惨叫不停……
But unexpectedly, his opponent flew back, slamming heavily into the wall behind and tumbling to the ground. Cradling his broken arm, he yelled out in excruciating pain…
而就在老梅林踏上台阶之时，塔内的葛瑞安也握紧了手中的法杖。
As Old Merlin walked up the step, Gerian tightened his grip on the staff.
而就在这个时候，利维坦猩猩却又发起了新的一轮攻势，这一次的椰子雨，甚至比先前更加猛烈粗暴，一连几只椰子砸下来，虽然没有砸中林立，却将他身旁的巨树砸得“匡当”直响。

Just then, the Leviathan Gorilla launched a new round of attacks. This time, the coconut shower was more violent and brutal than before. The coconuts fell one after another, and although they did not hit Lin Li, they landed on the giant tree beside him with a loud crash.
而就在这个时候，林立却忽然听见，一个苍老的声音从树林间传来。
It was at this moment that Lin Li suddenly heard an aged voice from the woods.
而惊魂未定的三人却趁机摆脱了双足飞龙，顺势躲入茂密的树丛当中。
The trio, who were still reeling from shock, took the chance to extricate themselves from the Wyvern and went on to hide in the thick grove.
而提高药剂浓度，无疑就是最直接的办法，于是就有了林立那一连串的实验。
Increasing the concentration of the potion was undoubtedly the most direct way, so Lin Li performed a series of experiments.
而最让克伦威尔无法忍受的，还是这些该死魔法师的态度，那种高高在上的轻蔑笑容，几乎当场让克伦威尔疯掉，他完全无法接受，以前拼命巴结自己的人，现在却可以在自己面前笑得如此轻蔑。

What Cromwell could not tolerate was the attitude of these damned mages. Those high and mighty scorns almost drove Cromwell crazy. He could not accept how these people who had tried so hard to butter up to him could now laugh so contemptuously at him.
而来自药剂师公会的老格林，自然就成了最好的探讨对象。
And Old Grimm, who was from the Pharmacists Guild, naturally became the best partner to have a discussion with.
而林立却趁着这个机会，又一连往后退出了十几步，只是一眨眼之间，双方的距离就已经拉到了安全范围。
Lin Li took advantage of this opportunity and retreated another dozen steps. In the blink of an eye, the distance between them had been drawn to a safe one.
而林立要做的，就是把这数千金币的草药变成药剂。
What Lin Li had to do was to turn the thousands of gold coins’ worth of herbs into potions.
而林立踏入加洛斯城，无疑是个绝好的机会。
Lin Li had entered Jarrosus City, and this was undoubtedly the best opportunity.
而现在——
But now—
而现在，这个真正的药剂师，却正向他的学生请教……
And now, this pharmacist was learning from his student...
而真正致命的，却是那根始终卡在伤口中的冰锥，这根冰锥不但刺伤了双足飞龙的内脏，还从根本上阻止了伤口合拢，鲜血就好象打开了闸门的水库，汹涌而欢乐的往外喷溅着。

What was really fatal was that the icicle got stuck in the wound from the start. The icicle not only punctured the viscera of the Wyvern, it also prevented the wound from closing. Blood flowed out gaily like a reservoir with its gates opened.
而眼前这中年人，赫然正是当初被赶出公会的几名魔导士之一，名字好象叫卢克还是什么的。
