而等他仔细内视了片刻之后，却整个身子突然一颤，眼睛猛然睁开，一副活见鬼的表情。
And when he carefully observed for a moment, his body suddenly trembled. Abruptly opening his eyes, he looked as though he had just seen a ghost.
而级魔法冲击水幕并不可怕，可怕的是林立使用它的方式。
A level-two Waterfall Strike wasn't intimidating at all, what was intimidating was the way Lin Li had used it.
而经过最初的懊悔之后，克伦威尔很自然的就将一切都归咎到林立身上，正是因为他的出现，自己才失去了击败双足飞龙，拯救伊娜父女的机会，同样也是因为他的出现，自己才会在利维坦猩猩面前表现得如此不堪。

After the initial remorse, Cromwell naturally pinned all the blame on Lin Li. It was because of his arrival that he had lost the opportunity to fight the Wyvern and save both Ina and her father. It was also because of his presence that he had performed badly in front of the Leviathan Gorilla.
而翡翠高塔，自然是这风暴的中心。
As for the Emerald Tower, it was of course the center of the storm.
而若是运气够好的话，说不定还有机会采出一块魔能水晶来，那可就不得了了，魔能水晶是什么东西，天生的魔力源泉，就算只是拇指大小的一块，它所能提供的魔力，也绝不会比一枚十五级魔晶少。

If one got lucky, he might be able to find a piece of magicka crystal-that would be awfully wonderful. Being the natural source of mana, even a small piece of the size of a thumb would definitely be able to provide mana no less than a level-fifteen magical crystal could ever be.
而被抓走的长腿美女，此时就正被困在那巨网当中。
The long-legged beauty who was caught was currently being trapped in the giant net.
而趁着这个机会，葛瑞安已是一个箭步从塔内窜出，在漂浮术的支持下，他那胖胖的身体一出翡翠高塔就已浮在了空中，同时没有丝毫犹豫，大段大段的咒文从他口中流泻而出，一双胖手不断结起玄奥难明的手势。

Taking advantage of this opportunity, Gerian took a big stride and lunged out of the tower. With the support of the Levitation Spell, his plump body was floating in the air as soon as he came out of the Emerald Tower. There was no hesitation at all, and large verses of spells came streaming out from his mouth, his fat hands constantly making abstruse and incomprehensible gestures.
而身患重病的葛瑞安，此时却笑咪咪的躲在地下室里，一遍又一遍的数着奥法药剂，听着客厅里传来的喧闹声，葛瑞安胖脸上的笑意更浓了。

The seriously ill Gerian, however, was hiding in the basement, grinning. He counted the Arcane Magic Potions again and again, and listened to the noise coming from the hall, the grin on his face growing wider as he did that.
而这一切的来源，只是因为葛瑞安的一句话。
And the source of all these was a word from Gerian.
而这一记风刃术的目标，却不是巨网当中的利维坦猩猩，而是那一片被冻结住的藤条。
The target of this Wind Blade Spell wasn't the Leviathan Gorilla in the giant net, but the rattan that was frozen to ice.
而这个时候，葛瑞安却忽然注意到，他那个便宜侄子正往这边走来。
Just then, Gerian suddenly noticed his convenient nephew coming this way.
而这个时候，葛瑞安却正跟城主艾萨克谈得分外投机。
At the same time, Gerian was having the most congenial talk with castellan Isaac.
而这才刚过不久，又是一百多瓶清醒药剂。
And not long after, it was another 100 bottles of Sobriety Potion.
而通过这个蹩脚的借口，林立也不断的被他丢到各种魔兽面前。
Using this as an excuse, Lin Li was frequently called upon by Andoine to fight different types of magical beasts.
而那位安东尼－罗林先生，似乎也很享受这种感觉，在几名宾客包围下正滔滔不绝高谈阔论，神态间尽是春风得意的表情，林立初看之下还真没把他认出来，这又有哪一点象昨天那个战战兢兢请葛瑞安估价的罗林家族族长？

And that Mr Anthony Rolin seemed to enjoy the feeling. He was talking incessantly and eloquently in front of the guests with a triumphant expression on his face. Lin Li had not recognized him at first glance. There was nothing like the jittery patriarch of the Rolin Family who had asked Gerian for an evaluation yesterday.
而那翊小姐则满脸的不爽，正在教训杨管事：“杨管事，你很不错啊！是不是看我翊凌雪不爽啊？安排一个金牌陪练冒充铜牌陪练……这样戏耍本小姐真的有意思吗？”

As for that Young Mistress Yi... Her face was filled with an expression of discontent.
"Manager Yang, you are truly brazen!" she said with a snort. "Is it just that you're disgruntled with me, Yi Lingxue? You arranged for a gold-token-grade sparring partner to pass off as a bronze-token-grade sparring partner... Is it a lot of fun for you to toy with me this way?"
而那股魔法元素涌起的地方，正是克伦威尔身下的台阶。
And the source of magical elements was right beneath the step where Cromwell lay.
而随着荒谬而来的，是前所未有的危机感。
And with the absurdity came the unprecedented sense of crisis.
而随着魔法等级的提高，一个魔法师真正的实力，往往就要有这些最基本的东西来判断，更精确的魔力控制，更快速的元素排列，可以让魔法变化更多施放速度更快。

As the magic level advanced, a mage's real strength was often judged by these fundamental things. A more precise control of mana and faster elemental sequencing could allow more variations and a quicker conjuration of magic.
而马森跟欧灵，则远远的落在后面，一直到现在，两人都还没从震惊中恢复过来，满脑子想着的，都是自己那个无比神秘的室友。
As for Marson and Orrin, the two were walking far behind. Until then, they were still yet to recover from the shock earlier on, with their brain full of their remarkably mysterious roommate.
而马迪亚斯的那两个室友，则完完全全的被吓傻了……
On the other hand, Mathias' two roommates were completely scared stiff.
聊天这种东西，林立实在是太擅长了，连安度因这种年老成精的人物，都总感觉自己说不过他，更何况是伊娜这样单纯的姑娘。
Lin Li was really good at chatting. Even a seasoned old veteran like Andoine had always felt that he was unable to outspeak him, much less an innocent girl like Ina.
聚珍阁一层一片喧闹，很多大家族公子和小姐都喜欢来这购物，这里是天羽城最大的商号，能经常进出这里本身也是身份的象征。

The atmosphere in the Pearl Gathering Pavilion was noisy. Many sons and daughters from famous and powerful familial clans loved going to the Pavilion to do their shopping. This was after all the biggest merchant-house in all of Skyplume City. To be able to regularly visit the place was a symbol of one's status.
聚珍阁内很宽敞，一眼扫去最少有几十丈宽，里面摆满着各种柜台，每个柜台上都有一名店员站立，无数衣袍华贵的男女在四处乱转，感觉这里面就像是一个小型的坊市。

The interior of the Pearl Gathering Pavilion was wide and spacious. At one glance, one could see ahead for a distance of at least several hundred feet. Various sales counters were spread across the interior of the Pavilion, with a salesperson standing at attention at each counter. Countless numbers of people in luxurious attire were milling and moving about, giving an atmosphere akin to a small market-place.
聚珍阁据说是城主府姬家的产业，里面有无数珍贵的宝物，号称只有你想不到的，没有你买不到的。同时聚珍阁也是成为公认最好出售宝物的地方，童叟无欺。

It was said that the Pearl Gathering Pavilion was the property of the Ji Family, the family that administered the city. The Pavilion held counless precious treasures inside. As one said, anything you could think of, you could buy it there. The Pearl Gathering Pavilion was at the same time the place the public recognised as the best location to sell off their treasures, where they would never cheat anyone.
聚珍阁顶层很宽敞，但这里只有一个小雅阁，其余一大块地方都种满了黄色的不知名的小花，此刻在阳光的照耀下，一片金灿灿的，如梦如幻。

The top floor of the Pearl Gathering Pavilion was very spacious, but there was only a small elegent pavilion there. A large portion of the remaining space was planted fully with small yellow flowers of an unknown name. At that moment, with the flowers illuminated by bright sunlight, the scene was one of bright dazzling gold - akin to a fantastic dream.
胖子继续向凯文介绍女儿，丰胸阿姨继续嗲嗲的说话，市侩的宾客们依旧在拼命钻营，一桩桩交易又接着先前的话头谈起。

The fatty continued to introduce his daughter to Kevin; the aunty with the full bosom continued to speak coquettishly; the mercenary guests were still working hard to secure their personal gains, and deals were picked up where they were left off previously.
胖老头今天心情不错，正在指点两个年轻法师。
The fat old man was in a good mood today, and was instructing two young mages.
胖老头没有说错，这个叫凯文的年轻法师，确实是老好人一个，一路上林立问了一箩筐的问题，换个人来估计早就烦了，也只有象凯文这样的老好人才会一一解答，而且解答时极有耐心，一遍不明白就解释两遍，一直解释到林立明白为止。

The fat old man was right, this young mage Kevin was indeed a nice person. Lin Li had asked a dozen questions along the way; if it was someone else they'd long be annoyed, and only a good-hearted person like Kevin would answer each and every one of them, and without losing patience no less. He would explain twice if Lin Li couldn't comprehend the first time, and only when Lin Li finally understood did he stop the explanations.
胖老头现在奥法药剂在手，全加洛斯城都围着他转，以他老人家那睚眦必报的性格，得罪过他的克伦威尔送上门来绝没有好下场！

The whole Jarrosus City was all about the fat old man now that he had the Arcane Magic Potion in his hands. Given the vindictive nature of the old man, he would never let Cromwell come to a good end for offending him!
胖老头骂骂咧咧的走了，只剩下林立跟凯文在那发愣。
The fat old man went off swearing, leaving Lin Li and Kevin standing there in a daze.
能光明正大的落江家面子，如此好的机会怎么会放过？
How could they give up such a great opportunity to openly and rightly disparage the Jiang Clan?
能够掌握黄昏诅咒的，至少也是二十级以上的强大存在，他们以自身鲜血和力量为引，在临死之前，诅咒一切踏入领域范围的生物，都陷入永恒的安眠当中。

It would take at least a level-twenty powerful existence to master the Twilight Curse.They used their own blood and strength as a guide before they die, cursing all creatures who have stepped into the realm, and making them fall into eternal sleep.
腥臭中带着一股浓浓的血腥味，就仿佛又浓又稠的鲜血。
The stench was thick with blood, like a pool of fresh, viscous blood.
自从利维坦猩猩那件事之后，伊娜就再没给过克伦威尔好脸色看，那时候林立就知道，这位热心魔法师算是白热心了。
Ever since the Leviathan Gorilla's incident, Ina had never given Cromwell any pleasant looks. Lin Li knew then that the warm-hearted mage had been enthusiastic for nothing.
自从成为五系宗师之后，他无时无刻不想更进一步，踏入那虚无缥缈的神匠领域。
Ever since he had become a guru of all five series, he had always wanted to go even further and enter the illusory realm of the Divine Smith.
自从拍卖会之后，好处更是接连不断。
Since the auction, the benefits had never ceased.
自从来到魔法公会之后，林立还很少见到葛瑞安这么失态，不由有些好奇的问道：“这又是什么大人物？”
Lin Li had rarely seen Gerian so without composure since he had joined the Guild of Magic. He couldn't help but ask out of curiosity, "Which big shot is it now?"
自从穿越之后，他还是第一次远离安度因的小木屋。
It was the first time he wandered far from Andoine's cabin since having time travelled here.
自从穿越之后，林立就始终耿耿于怀，当初没能多带一些高级魔晶。
Since the start of his time travel, it had always been weighing heavily over Lin Li's mind that he should have brought more high-level magical crystals.
自从葛瑞安与老梅林一战之后，几乎全加洛斯城就都知道了，魔法公会出了一个药剂大师，这个药剂大师的名字叫做费雷，但知道只是知道，魔法公会从未在任何场合承认过，更从没有公开宣布过，他们拥有一位药剂大师。

Since the battle between Gerian and Old Merlin, almost everyone in Jarrosus City knew that there was a potion master named Felic in the Guild of Magic. But knowing it was one thing. The Guild of Magic had never admitted on any occasion nor had they publicly announced that they had a potion master.
自从葛瑞安放出话来之后，整个加洛斯城就彻底轰动了。
The entire Jarrosus City had been in complete frenzy ever since Gerian released the news.
自从进了魔法公会之后，林立这家伙本就很少在人前露面，再加上此时穿着一件怒焰之袍，又皱又旧，光看看就让人觉得一脸的穷酸落魄，就算跟着凯文进了花园，一众宾客也只是把他看成凯文的跟班，现在巴结主人都来不及，谁还有空去跟一个跟班攀交情？

Since joining the Guild of Magic, Lin Li had rarely showed his face in public. In addition, the Robe of Wrath he was wearing now was crumpled and old, giving people the impression of him being poor and miserable just by looking at it. Even if he had entered the garden with Kevin, the guests only regarded him as Kevin's footman. It was too late to curry favor with the master now, whoever had the time to make friends with a footman?
自从魔法公会崛起之后，罗林家族就有了走下坡路的迹象，眼看着已被挤到了十一魔法家族的外围，在拍卖会上甚至就连小偷头子都敢跟自己竞争奥法药剂，安东尼看在眼里急在心里，这一次来参加宴会，本就有些跟城主大人攀攀交情的意思，再加上听说这青年是来自王都，安东尼言谈举止之间，就更是奉承得异常热情……

Since the rise of the Guild of Magic, the Rolin Family had shown signs of declining. Seeing that he had been pushed to the border of the 11 mage families, and even the thief leader dared to compete with him fo the Arcane Magic Potion at the auction, Anthony had watched with an anxious heart. He had attended the banquet meaning to claim a relationship with the Castellan. In addition, when he heard that the young man had come from the capital, Anthony's speech and manners were all the more flattering and enthusiastic...
自从麦格雷尼陷入沉睡之后，伊娜整个人都慌了，几乎想尽了一切她能够想到的办法，去找林立，也只不过是抱着万一的希望，在她心里，这个年轻魔法师一直是这么可靠，她从双足飞龙爪下救了自己，在利维坦猩猩手上又救了自己一次，也许这一次，他还能再救救父亲，

Ina had been in a panic ever since McGrenn fell into a deep sleep. She had tried everything that she could think of, and looking for Lin Li was only a matter of hope. In her heart, this young mage had always been so reliable. He had saved her from the talons of the Wyvern and then again from the hands of the Leviathan Gorilla. Perhaps this time, he could save her father again.
自己与葛瑞安，一直是加洛斯城里最强大的两个魔法师，只有击败他，自己才能确定加洛斯第一魔法师的身份，也才能让梅林家族安然度过将来的危机。

Gerian and him had always been two of the most powerful mages in Jarrosus City. It was only by defeating him that he could establish himself as the number one mage in Jarrosus, and allow the Merlin Family to tide through future crises peacefully.
自己活了五十多岁，就只有这么一个儿子，平日里看得比自己的性命还重，从小到大没骂过没打过，连重话都舍不得说他一句。

He had lived for over 50 years, yet only had one son. He usually valued his son more than his own life, never scolding nor hitting him since he was young. He did not even dare to speak harsh words to his son.
自己狼狈的逃回山洞，这个落魄的魔法师却把伊娜救了回来，而伊娜对自己的态度，也再没有了平日的客气，有的只是不屑，一种仿佛把自己当成空气一般的不屑，一直到现在，伊娜都再没有正眼看过自己一次。

He had fled in panic back to the cave, but this low-life mage had managed to save Ina. Ina's attitude towards him was not polite as it usually was at all. There was only disdain now, the kind of disdain that she regarded him as air. Until now, Ina had still not looked him in the eye—not even once.
自己这位室友跟安度因大师之间，绝不仅仅是导师与学徒那么简单的关系。
The relationship between his roommate and Master Andoine was definitely not as simple as that between a teacher and his apprentice.
自黑暗年代之后一千三百年，谁见过七十岁以下的药剂大师？葛瑞安悄悄从信纸间露出头来，仔细打量着这个叫费雷的年轻人，一件法师袍看似有些破旧，但上面透出的魔法波动却异常清晰，以葛瑞安的眼光，一眼就看出这绝不是一般的魔法物品，人长得高高瘦瘦，一张脸上还略带着几分稚气，看年纪，只怕还不超过二十岁……

Who had ever seen a Master of Potion under the age of seventy, thirteen hundred years after the Dark Ages? Gerian took a peek from behind the letter and carefully sized up this young man named Felic. The mage robe looked rather worn, but the magical wave coming from it was exceptionally clear. From Gerian's perspective, he could tell that this was not an ordinary magical item just by one look. He was tall and thin, with a face that looked slightly childish. He was probably not any older than 20 years old...
自黑暗年代之后，曼尼斯家族一直经营着魔法生意，一千三百年间，积累下了庞大的财富，镀金玫瑰魔法商店遍布法兰王国每一个角落，哪怕是在最偏僻的乡村，你也能找到镀金玫瑰的招牌。

Since the Dark Ages, the Mannes Family had been running magic business. Over the past 1300 years, a huge amount of wealth was accumulated by them. Gilded Rose Magic Store was located in every corner of the Felan Kingdom; even in the most remote countryside, you could still find the signboard of Gilded Rose.
至于一旁的林立，自然是被自动忽略了。
Lin Li, who was standing at a side, was of course ignored.
至于一旁的罗琳，更是听得仿佛天书。
As for Rowling who was listening at the side, it all sounded Greek to her.
至于他们身后穷追不舍的，却是一头暴怒的双足飞龙，它的怒火来源于腹部的伤口，伤口又深又长，看上去应该是由某件锋利的武器所留下的。
What was chasing them was a raging Wyvern. Its rage had originated from the wound on its abdomen. It was a long and deep wound, apparently left by a sharp weapon.
至于怎么个倒霉法，林立可就没空去关心了。
As for what suffering he would go through, Lin Li had no time for concern at all.
至于林立……不过是个低级魔法师而已。
As for Lin Li... he was nothing but a low-level mage.
至于江逸嘛……
As for Jiang Yi…
至于漫长的咒文吟唱，在这个等级的战斗中更是与找死无异。
As for long recitation of spells, it would be only be a death-seeking move in a battle of this level.
至于神话物品，那已经不是凡人所能想象的了，能够制作神器的人，不管他是什么职业，称号都永远只有一个，那就是——神匠！

As for legendary items, it was not something the mortals could imagine. Someone who was able to create artifacts, no matter what profession he was in, there'd only be one title for him—the Divine Smith!
至于试着拉拢……这种事克伦威尔连想都没想过，只要拿出那几条十四级咒语，就连葛瑞安都不得不对他另眼相看，他有什么必要去拉拢一个落魄的低级法师？

As for trying to woo him... This had never crossed Cromwell's mind at all. As long as he took out those level-fourteen spells, even Gerian had to take him seriously. What was the need for him to woo a down-and-out, low-level mage?
至于躲在一旁看笑话的某人，则直接就被众人无视了。
As for that someone who was hiding at a side watching the comical scene, no one really paid any attention to him.
至于那个看上去家世不错的魔法师，麦格雷尼介绍时却有些语焉不详，只说他叫克伦威尔，是在路上遇到的一位热心魔法师先生。
As for the mage who looked like he came from a good family, McGrenn was vague in his introduction of him. He only mentioned that his name was Cromwell, a warm-hearted mage he had met on the way.
至于那丹药的药力就更别说了，这丹药等级太低了，药力太弱而且挥发的速度太慢太慢，一个时辰了才渗透到血液内，缓缓朝伤口涌去……

This is to say nothing about the efficacy of that elixir. The grade of the elixir was too low, its medical efficacy too weak and the speed of its healing effects slow—it had already been two hours, yet the medicine had only just penetrated into the blood and was just slowly making its way to the wound...
至于那件红色皮甲，应该是由火炎蝾螈皮制成的。
As for the red leather jacket, it was likely to be made from the skin of flaming salamanders.
至少他现在还无法解决，浓度提高后带来的精神力混乱问题。
At least, he couldn't solve the problem of mental confusion caused by the increased concentration.
至少江如龙懵了，他空有一身的本事却没地方使用，江逸抡麻袋般抡着他弟弟朝他砸来，他能怎么办？只能不断的后退，不断的暴怒大吼：“小野种，我要杀了你，杀了你！小野种，你有种放下我弟弟，看老子不撕了你？”

At least now Jiang Rulong was in a state of confusion. He who had a whole array of skills could do anything. Jiang Yi used his younger brother as a sack to smash at him, what could he do? The only thing he could do was to constantly retreat and yelled with warth, "You little bastard, I am going to kill you, kill you! Little bastard, let my brother down if you have the guts. See if I will tear you apart!"
艾萨克匆匆走后，这僻静角落里的气氛，也就变得更加尴尬了。
After Isaac left in a hurry, the atmosphere in the secluded corner became even more awkward.
艾萨克心情激动之下，也顾不得再去应酬花园里的宾客，一边对林立表达着景仰之情，一边热情的招呼两人先进宴会大厅。

Isaac was so excited that he could no longer spare the effort to attend to the other guests. He warmly escorted the two of them into the banquet hall while at the same time expressing his admiration for Lin Li.
艾萨克气得浑身哆嗦：“你知不知道你干了什么？”
Isaac was trembling with rage. "Do you know what you have done?"
艾萨克身为一城之主，想跟他攀上关系的人，丝毫不比巴结魔法公会的少，此时走进花园之内，一群宾客同样是众星拱月般围了上去，但艾萨克却丝毫不显慌乱，脸上带着恰倒好处的微笑，一边跟一众宾客寒暄，一边往宴会大厅里走去，一路之上竟是谁也没有冷落。

As the Castellan of a city, the people who wanted to claim a relationship with Isaac were no less than the admirers of the Guild of Magic. A throng of guests surrounded him like the stars surrounding the moon as he walked into the garden, but Isaac was not at all flustered. He wore an adequate smile on his face, greeting the guests as he walked towards the banquet hall, neglecting no one on the way.
花费了大半个时辰，江逸将七号药田的草药清点完毕，在他正准备下山回家修炼时，却听到左边小树林内响起一阵窸窸窣窣的声音。

After spending an entire hour on his work, Jiang Yi finally completed taking stock of the medicinal plants in Plantation Number Seven. Just as he was ready to head down the hills and return home to cultivate, he heard a rustling noise coming from the small forest to his left.
若是任那两根石刺扎在身上，就算是再有十个克伦威尔也一起完了……
If he were to let those two rock spines stab through his body, even if there were ten Cromwells here, they'd be done for all together...
若是再镀上深邃之银的话，这将是一根近乎完美的点金棒。
It would be an almost perfect gold rod if it was coated with deep silver.
若是换个时候，林立肯定是很乐意的。
If it were on other occasions, Lin Li would definitely be delighted.
若是等级认证大厅内，那两道魔纹的主人还在的话，此时见了林立，多半也不得不赞声厉害，同时构筑两道顶级魔纹，这已经完全超越了铭文技术的范畴，而且这两道魔纹还是相互对立相互排斥，一道是精华萃取力场，一道是精华融合力场，除了林立这种妖孽，一般人想强行构筑这两道魔纹，最好的结果多半也是精神分裂。

If the owner of the mageweaths in the level certification was present, he would have to praise Lin Li once he saw how impressive the latter had been. The construction of two high-level mageweaths at the same time had completely transcended the scope of inscription; moreover, the two mageweaths were mutually opposed and mutually exclusive.
荣管事亲切的拍了拍江逸的肩膀，态度和之前一个天上一个地上。柳长老在江家地位特殊，连带江逸地位也提高了不少，这小小的管事现在可不敢得罪江逸了，否则他在柳长老面前说几句，他这管事的位置就堪忧了……

Chief Rong cordially slapped Jiang Yi's shoulder, his attitude completely different from before. Elder Liu had a special position in the Jiang Clan and had collaterally increased Jiang Yi's position considerably. This tiny housekeeper now no longer dared to insult Jiang Yi—otherwise, should he say something to Elder Liu, his position as housekeeper would be in jeopardy...
荣管事依旧没有回头，只是冷冷地质问道：“昨日不是让你去清点四号药田吗？为何没有上报？这才几天功夫，你就是这样做事的？这事我要是上报刑堂，你本月的月例就一个铜板也别想领到了，哼！”

Chief Rong didn’t even turn around to look at Jiang Yi.
“Didn’t I order you to check on Plantation Four yesterday morning?” he demanded coldly. “Why didn’t you report back to me?! This is a very easy job, you know! Is this how you do things around here?! I’m going to have to report this incident to the Disciplinary Court—forget about even getting a single coin for this month’s salary! Hmph!”
荣管事的脸色一下变了，很快挤出一丝笑容，凑过来问道：“好啊，江逸，你小子倒是很厉害的嘛，竟被柳长老看上了？老实说……你是否有炼丹方面的天赋？这才被柳长老看上的？柳长老可是古板固执的很，江松的父亲求了很久，才把他送进去的。”

Chief Rong's face instantly changed its color as he quickly revealed a thin thread of a smile, before reaching over to ask, "Good, Jiang Yi, a boy like you can sure be incredible—you actually received Elder Liu's favor? Frankly speaking... do you have natural talent in refining elixirs? This was what got you Elder Liu's favor? Elder Liu is very inflexible and stubborn—it took Jiang Song's father much begging for a very long time before he could send him over."
荣管事的面色一下缓和下来，亲切的拍了拍江逸的肩膀道：“行啊，江逸，你小子能耐了啊。年轻人嘛，出去历练下总是好事，不过你得注意安全啊，三个月必须回归家族，否则上面追查起来，要是认定你叛族那可就麻烦了……”

Chief Rong's expression gentled right away. He patted Jiang Yi's shoulder kindly, "Good, Jiang Yi, you little brat has quite the capability. It supposedly can't be a bad thing for a young man like you to venture out for some experience and toughening, but you have to be careful, and return to the family clan in three months, lest things turn complicated if they investigate the matter and deem you a renegade of the family clan..."
荣管事看到江逸走了进来，面色一板冷哼道：“江逸，五号药田内的药草清点完毕了？”
Chief Rong saw Jiang Yi walking over. He glared at him and snorted coldly. "Jiang Yi, are you done accounting for the medicinal herbs in Plantation Number Five?"
荣管事终于转过身狠狠瞪了江逸一眼，训斥道：“还不快去西山清点？要是两个时辰内没有上报准确数量，你就等着挨刑堂的责罚吧！”

Chief Rong finally turned himself around and stared Jiang Yi straight into his eyes with a look of ferocity. “Go to the Western Hills now! If you haven’t reported back in four hours with the right numbers, you’ll be sorry!”
荣管事见江逸没出去，反而狡辩起来顿时怒了，没等江逸说完一拍桌子就站了起来准备训斥几句。不过他突然一怔，眼睛猛然睁大，问道：“你说什么？谁让你去帮忙？柳长老？是炼丹房的柳长老吗？”

Upon seeing Jiang not only not leave, but instead try to defend himself, Chief Rong instantly flew into a rage. Without waiting for Jiang Yi to finish his sentence, he slammed the table and stood up, ready to scold the boy. However, he suddenly appeared startled, his eyes abruptly expanded, as he asked, "What did you say? Who asked for your help? Elder Liu? You mean, the Elder Liu from the alchemy lab?"
荣管事说不定哪天就会来追要令牌了，江逸时间紧迫，也顾不了那么多了，开始在里面转悠寻思炼丹。

There was no way to know what day Chief Rong would suddenly come to demand the command token. Jiang Yi was tight on time. He decided not to worry so much. Instead, he started pondering on how to refine elixirs.
荣管事重重一哼，直接打断他的话：“没清点完毕，你跑这干什么？这里是你能来的地方？还不快滚去西山清点？”

Chief Rong snorted loudly, directly interrupting him. "What are you doing here, since you're not done counting? Is this a place you can even come in? Hurry up and run back to the Western Hills for accounting!"
药剂本身就是无比敏感的东西，各种冲突剧烈的药性，在一瓶小小的药剂中，保持着微妙而又脆弱的平衡。
The potion itself was an extremely sensitive thing. All kinds of conflicting medicinal properties had maintained a delicate and fragile balance in a small bottle of potion.
葛瑞安一听这话，顿时急了：“连你都配不出来？”
Gerian had gotten anxious at his words. "Even you're unable to concoct?"
葛瑞安一愣：“什么什么借口？”
Gerian was taken aback. "What excuse?"
葛瑞安一手扶着水桶般粗细的壮腰，在那拼命的喘着粗气，一身肥肉在剧剧烈的喘息当中起伏不断，一张苍白的胖脸上冷汗直冒，虽然仍色厉内荏的瞪着老梅林，但在场众人又有谁不知道，他现在的状态已是强弩之末……

Gerian held onto his thick bucket waist as he gasped for air. The fat on his body rose and fell with dramatic gasps, and cold sweat broke out on his pale, chubby face. Although he was still staring at Old Merlin fiercely, everyone present knew that he was a spent arrow now.
葛瑞安一旦倒下，魔法公会也就彻底完了……
Once Gerian collapsed, it would be the end of the Guild of Magic...
葛瑞安不干了，事情明摆着的，两人都是大魔导士，两人都耗尽了魔力，现在大家谁也奈何不了对方，你凭什么还能笑得成竹在胸？
Gerian had given up. Things were obvious—both were archmages, and both had exhausted their powers. No one could do anything to each other now, so how could he still smile with such confidence?
葛瑞安丢出消息之后，就窝在塔里装起病来。
After Gerian had tossed the news out, he'd been staying in the Emerald Tower, feigning illness.
葛瑞安也不知道有什么事，一路上都显得很谨慎，为了不被人打扰，还特意带着林立进了公会会客室。
For reasons unknown, Gerian seemed extra cautious along the way. He brought Lin Li to the reception room so that no one could interrupt them.
葛瑞安从塔内走出的样子，还是象以前那般笨拙，圆滚滚的身体与其说是在走，倒不如说是在挪。
Gerian came out of the tower looking as clumsy as ever. His round figure was moving, rather than walking.
葛瑞安听得一愣：“你还会逼供？”
Gerian was surprised. "You know how to extort a confession?"
葛瑞安大笔一挥，在魔法等级上填下了一个“八”字，一份八级魔法师的等级认证书也就算是完成了。
With a stroke of the pen, Gerian filled in an "8" under the column for magic level. With that, a level eight mage certification was considered complete.
葛瑞安就好象是出来散步一样，在加洛斯城里转了一圈之后，又不声不响的把人给带了回去，这简直就是赤裸裸的调戏，十几家势力首脑个个气得破口大骂，葛瑞安这老混蛋真是吃饱了没事干，散个步也带那么多人出来，你还敢不敢再骚包一点？

It was as if Gerian was out for a stroll. After turning a round in Jarrosus City, he quietly brought the men back again. He was simply toying with them. The leaders of the dozens of forces broke out in curses: that old bastard Gerian had nothing to do, bringing so many people with him out for a stroll... could he be any more ostentatious?
葛瑞安已经完全恢复，在他的庇护之下，自己根本没机会动那个药剂师。
Gerian had completely recovered. With his protection, he had no chance to lay his hands on that pharmacist.
葛瑞安彻底斯巴达了，这这这……这简直比魔法天才还可怕呀！
Gerian had gone completely Spartan in his mind. This... was much more terrifying than a genius in magic!
葛瑞安心满意足的走了，只留下城主大人坐在那哭笑不得。
Gerian walked away in contentment, leaving the castellan sitting there, at a loss whether to laugh or cry at the situation.
葛瑞安怔怔站在原地，望向老梅林的目光已是有些呆滞，他从来没象现在这么无力过，明明是势均力敌的敌人，却可能在下一个瞬间将自己捏死，轻松得就好象毫不费力的捏死一只蚂蚁一样。

Gerian stood glued to the ground. The gaze he had on Old Merlin was a lifeless one. He had never felt so powerless before. What had obviously been an evenly matched enemy became one that could throttle him to death in an instant, as effortlessly as crushing an ant.
葛瑞安想了想，仍不死心：“要不我再去问问伊瑟拉，看他手上有没有足够的材料？”
Gerian pondered over it and was unwilling to give up. "If not, I'll go ask Ysera again to see if he has enough ingredients?"
葛瑞安愣了一下，有些奇怪的问：“你怎么知道？”
Gerian was stunned for a moment, and asked surprised, "How do you know?"
葛瑞安执掌加洛斯魔法公会数十年，又岂是一般的人物，要是连个克伦威尔都对付不了，怕是早被人吞得连骨头都不剩了。
Gerian had been in charge of the Guild of Magic for decades and was no ordinary character. He would probably be devoured long time ago if he couldn't even deal with someone like Cromwell.
葛瑞安揉完眼睛，又把信纸捧起来看……
Gerian picked up the letter once again after he was done rubbing his eyes.
葛瑞安是这么跟林立说的：“那女人的样子记住了吗？你要是哪天在街上不见了钱包，找她就准没错，可千万别记错了，她是小偷头子，不是妓院老鸨。”

This was how Gerian told Lin Li, "Memorized the woman's face? If someday you lost your wallet on the streets, you must look for her. But don't get it wrong, she's the leader of the thieves, not a brothel madam."
葛瑞安最后的评价，林立没怎么注意去听，因为他正在想着另一件事。
Lin Li did not pay much attention to Gerian's final comment, for he had another thing on his mind.
葛瑞安正要答话，身旁的凯文却一拍脑门，发出一声惨叫：“糟糕！”
Gerian was about to answer when Kevin, who was standing beside him, slapped his hand against his forehead and let out a cry. "Oh no!"
葛瑞安没说什么，摸了摸鼻子就溜出去了，出门就悄悄嘀咕到，这小子真是安度因的弟子？我怎么不知道安度因还有这些爱好……
Gerian said nothing, touched his nose, and slipped out. Once out, he muttered to himself, “Is the kid really the disciple of Andoine?” He didn't know Andoine had a taste for such things...
葛瑞安盯着那套装备没说话，心里却早已经骂开了，靠你妈的小白脸，闲着没事拿老子寻开心呢？
Gerian stared at the set of equipment without saying a word, but in his heart, he was berating him, Damn you pretty boy, are you trying to make fun of me?
葛瑞安笑咪咪的接过宝石，又凑过去看了一眼，有些好奇的问道：“这项链到底是什么好东西？”
Gerian received the gemstone cheerfully and then leaned in for another look. He asked curiously, "What exactly is this necklace?"
葛瑞安脸上露出一丝苦笑，加洛斯最强魔法师间的对决，决定胜负的竟然只是一枚水晶。
A bitter smile came across Gerian's face. The winner of the battle between the most powerful mages of Jarrosus was actually decided by a crystal.
葛瑞安走了之后，人也差不多到齐了。
After Gerian left, everyone had almost arrived.
葛瑞安越看越是不爽，强撑着虚弱的身体，迈开步子朝老梅林走去，他决定不让公会的魔法师出手，他要亲自压扁老梅林这混蛋。

It made Gerian all the more unhappy to see it. He dragged his weak body and set forth towards Old Merlin. He would not let the mages in the guild lift a finger. He was going to crush that bastard Old Merlin all by himself.
葛瑞安这一手，确实玩得高明。
Gerian had indeed executed a brilliant maneuver this time.
葛瑞安这一次是真怒了，第二天天刚亮，就带着公会所有魔导士出去了。
Gerian was truly furious this time. At dawn the next day, he went out with all the Magic Shooters from the guild.
葛瑞安这话，听上去虽然有些粗暴，但道理还是真的没错。
Gerian's words might sound crude but his reasoning was sound.
葛瑞安那一脚比魔兽还狠，门板后的锁都被他给踹烂了，凯文扶起门板看了半天，发现根本就不可能修复，只能将门板往墙上一靠，带着一脸的苦笑说道：“还是等会长找人来修好了，我先带你去办等级认证手续。”

Gerian's kick was harsher than a beast’s attack. The lock that was behind the door was broken from his kick. Kevin lifted the door up and examined it for a long while, soon realizing that it was impossible to repair it. He could only lean the broken door against the wall, and with a bitter smile, he said, "Let's just wait for the President to call for a repairman, I'll bring you down to process the documents first."
藤条被霜结术冻住之后，也同时被带走了全部的水分，风刃术虽然切不开坚韧的藤条，但用来破开冰块却是绰绰有余。
All the moisture in the rattan was taken away after being frozen by the Frost Spell. Although the Wind Blade Spell couldn't cut through the tough rattan, it was more than enough to break through ice.
虽然挨了一顿痛骂，但在离开老梅林书房的时候，克伦威尔的心情却很愉快，原本只能在暗地里搞搞的小动作，却意外的得到了老梅林的首肯，这对克伦威尔来说，绝对比什么都重要，在梅林家族强大的力量支持下，弄死一个落魄的低级魔法师，简直比捏死一只蚂蚁还轻松。

Although he had been berated, Cromwell was in a good mood when he left Old Merlin's study. What could only have been done in secret was unintentionally approved by Old Merlin. To Cromwell, this was more important than anything else. With the strong support of the Merlin Family, it was easier to kill a derelict mage than to crush an ant.
虽然早在落日山脉的时候，林立就在他眼前杀死了一头双足飞龙。
Lin Li had killed a Wyvern right before his eyes back when they were in the Sunset Mountains.
虽然葛瑞安已经安排了凯文帮他跑腿，但很多事还是必须由他亲自去办，比如去图书馆抄录咒语。
Gerian had arranged Kevin to run his errands, but he still had to do a lot of the work by himself, for example copying spells in the library.
虽然葛瑞安并不惧怕梅林家族，甚至在林立提供的药剂帮助下，还有很大的把握将他们一举消灭，可是这并不符合魔法公会的利益，两支最强势力的争斗，就算胜也只是惨胜，这只会给其他势力留下可趁之机。

Although Gerian was not afraid of the Merlin Family—more so he had the confidence that he could destroy them with the help in pharmaceutics Lin Li had provided—it was not in line with the Guild of Magic's interests. The conflict between the two most powerful forces would just end up as a tragic victory for the winner, and this would leave room for other powers.
虽然这三个大活人很可能马上变成死人，但不管怎么说，至少他们现在还是活的。
Although these three living humans might soon become dead, at least they were alive at present.
虽然这个机会仅仅是针对五级以下的魔法师，但梅林家族最多的，不也正是五级以下的魔法师吗？
Although this opportunity was only for mages below level-five, weren’t they what the Merlin Family had the most?
虽然那只是一个迟缓术，但给安度因带来的震撼，却绝不亚于一个十八级魔法。
Although it was only the Delaying spell, it had brought shock to Andoine as it felt like a spell over level-eighteen.
蛮牛之力不过是高级药剂，以林立药剂宗师的身份，稍稍闻上一闻，自然就能弄清楚失败的原因，但他能够弄清楚，却不代表别人也能弄清楚，还没等他从床上坐起，就听见一阵气急败坏的吼声从门缝间传来。

The concoction was just a high-grade potion. A pharmaceutics guru like Lin Li could easily find out the reasons for failure just by taking a whiff. But it didn't mean anyone else could. He had yet to sit up from the bed when he heard an exasperated grunt through the crack of the door.
融化的深邃之银在棒身上流淌，那一道道魔纹线条，就仿佛一条条沟壑，随着最后一条沟壑被填满，先前神秘华丽的点金棒，此时却仿佛反扑归真一般，看上去浑然一体圆融无缺，只是静静的散发出蒙蒙银光。

The melted deep silver glided over the rod. The mageweaths were like ravines. As the last ravine was filled, the previously mysterious yet gorgeous gold rod seemed to recover its original simplicity. It looked an integral whole, silently emitting a misty silver light.
血液是滚烫的，一般都是碱性的，一旦进入眼睛内会腐蚀眼睛内的神经，让对方暂时失明，甚至眼部受创。

Blood was boiling hot and normally alkaline in nature. Once blood entered the eyes, it would corrode the nerves within the eyes, leaving the opposing party temporarily blind and even causing damage to the eye itself.
被书评区弄得心情有些低落，如果不喜欢看的话，直接关掉网页就是了，没必要在书评区里骂吧……而且还是骂这书太装比……难道作者名还不够明白？那我下次直接叫装逼犯会不会清楚一点……
被人尊重和感激是很愉悦的事情，尤其还是个漂亮小姐。江逸在江家从未受到如此待遇，反而在外面受到了姬家小姐和这位翊小姐的高规格待遇，心情自然大好，摆手道：“小姐客气了，我一定全力以赴。”

To receive respect and gratitutde was a very delightful thing, especially since it came from a pretty young lady. Jiang Yi had never experienced such good treatment at the Jiang Clan; on the other hand, to receive such high-standard treatment outside from the young mistress of the Ji Family and this Young Mistress Yi, his emotions naturally improved greatly. He waved his hands and replied, "Young Mistress, you are too courteous. I will definitely give it my all."
被第二追得满地打滚，冰天雪地求推荐票支援呀……
装饰得富丽堂皇的宴会厅之外，是一片种满奇花异草的花园，此时宴会尚未开始，还有不少宾客在花园里逗留，两人从花园中经过，自是难免引来一阵好奇的目光。

Outside the richly decorated banquet hall was a garden full of exotic flowers and plants. The banquet had not yet started and many guests still remained in the garden. As the two passed through it, they naturally drew curious looks from the other guests.
西院一个破败的小院子内，江逸大口大口的扒着饭，江小奴却蹲坐旁边满脸傻笑，手里拿着一片亮晶晶的紫色金叶子，感觉一切都是那么的不真实。

In a small poorly-maintained courtyard of the Western Court, Jiang Yi swallowed down big gulps of rice as Jiang Xiaonu squatted beside him, her face grinning foolishly. As she held the bright, sparkling piece of purple gold leaf, she felt as though all of it was quite surreal.
要想伤势尽快复原，关键在于外药内调。
The most important factor behind the speedy recovery of any wound was to apply medicine on the exterior and “regulate” from the interior.
要打，他身上没有黑色元力了，不说没受伤的护卫还有两人，这管事明显实力也不低。打下去结局只有一个，他爬着回江家……

If he chose to fight, there was no more black essence force in his body. To say nothing of the two uninjured guardsmen still available, the housekeeper himself evidently had power at a level that was not considered weak. There would only be one outcome should they fight: that of Jiang Yi crawling back to the Jiang Residence...
要是知道事情会发展到这个地步，就该再早一点出手的，刚刚可是一连拍了九瓶出去，只要把那九瓶奥法药剂弄到，又哪会被逼到跟萨鲁曼家族刺刀见红的地步？全加洛斯城都知道，鲁本－萨鲁曼是个疯子，疯子是不会跟你讲道理的，看吧看吧，这贱人上来就爆出五十万的天价，这他妈还给不给人留条路走了？

If he’d known that things were going to get this far, he would have made his move sooner. Nine bottles were sold off consecutively earlier on, and if he had gotten them, he wouldn't have been forced to fight at such a close-range with the Saruman Family. Reuben Saruman was a lunatic, and a lunatic would not reason with you. Just look, this bastard had offered the princely sum of 500,000 at the beginning. Was he going to leave a damn way for others?
要是自己猜得没错的话，眼前这个穿得有些落魄的年轻魔法师，竟是最近一段时间来，加洛斯城内最富传奇色彩的人物——魔法公会复兴的希望，还不满二十岁的药剂大师，一手促成了百万金币拍卖会，那个引发加洛斯最强魔导士之战后，就一直被传闻包围着，却极少在人前露面的魔法师费雷！

If their guesses were correct, the abject-looking young mage in front of them was currently the most legendary figure in Jarrosus City—the hope for revival of the Guild of Magic, the potion master below the age of 20, the one who had single-handedly facilitated the million gold coins auction, and the one who, after having triggered the battle between the most powerful mages, was wrapped up in rumors but rarely appeared in public—Mage Felic!
要知道魔法师是一个等级森严的职业，每一个等级都意味着力量上的飞跃性进展，大魔导士与魔法师之间的鸿沟，比幽暗之海更加遥远，只有在同等级战斗中，比如老梅林与葛瑞安这个层面的战斗，比拼的才是规则。

Mage was a highly hierarchical profession, and each level implied a great progress in power. The gap between an archmage and a mage was vaster than the sea of darkness. It was only in levelled battles, such as those between Old Merlin and Gerian, that competition was the rule.
要让梅林家族度过将来的危机，就必须先除掉这个可怕的年轻魔法师。
In order to let the Merlin Family cruise through future crises, they had to first get rid of this terrifying young mage.
要闹，那更不可能，江家离开这并不远，一旦传回江家此事后果更加严重，那剩下唯有按对方的要求办了。

If he chose to complain further... that option was even more improbable. The Jiang Residence was not far from here. Should this incident get spread to the Jiang Clan, the consequences would be even more severe. That left only one solution, which was to give in to his opponent's requests.
见林立一脸陶醉，红发美女心中的屈辱更甚，暗自骂了一声“小人得志”之后，却又很快被林立的话吸引住了。
Seeing how Lin Li was revelling in self-satisfaction, the redheaded beauty felt even more humiliated. After cursing silently "scoundrel got his way", she was quickly attracted by Lin Li's words.
见林立还要罗嗦，两人顿时就火了，捏起拳头就要动手。
Seeing that Lin Li had wanted to continue his ramble, the two men became enraged and held their fists up.
见葛瑞安还有力气吹牛，在大厅里等了半晚上的两人，终于是稍稍放心些了。
Seeing how Gerian still had the energy for big talk, the two of them who had been waiting in the hall for half the night were relieved at last.
警报一连响了三遍，林立刚要抽身下线，却忽然发现自己的人物已经不受控制。
The siren sounded thrice. Lin Li was about to go offline when he realized he had lost control of his character.
让他庆幸万分的是，这时不远处的那名管事突然大喊一句，喝止了这护卫。
Fortunately for him, at that moment that housekeeper suddenly shouted loudly from a not-too-faraway distance, ordering the guard to stop.
让他很郁闷的是，他的黑色元力太少了，仅仅片刻时间后，修炼出来的六缕黑色元力就全部消耗完了。
What made him dismal was that his black essence force was too little—in only a matter of seconds, the six strands of refined black essence force had been completely consumed.
让他微微心安的是，他跟着这护卫进来后，看到的是一个空旷的大殿，里面一个人也没有，他将斗篷拉低了一些，暗暗祈祷不要遇到江恨水。

What made his heart relax was that after he had followed that guard in, all he saw was a spacious and empty central hall, with not a single person inside. He allowed himself to lower his cloak slightly, while silently praying that he would not meet Jiang Henshui here.
让他百思不得其解的是，当他运转融合元力开始在伤口附近流转辅助伤口愈合时，却发现疗伤速度和原先蓝色元力一模一样，根本不能增幅。

What left him perplexed was that, when he circulated the combined essence force near his wounds to facilitate healing, he found out that the healing speed was exactly the same as that of the original blue essence force. The speed would not increase no matter what.
让刘管事傻眼的是，江逸竟突然失踪了，他买通江家下人去探查江逸的情况，却被告知外出三月……

However, Jiang Yi's sudden disappearance completely derailed Housekeeper Liu, who tried to bribe the servants of the Jiang Clan in an attempt to figure out his whereabouts, but all the information he obtained was that Jiang Yi would be gone for three months...
让她错愕的是，只有铸鼎境二重的江逸竟依旧轻松能躲避开去，这次她还是没有碰触到江逸的半片衣角。

What left her astonished was that Jiang Yi, whose power level was only at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, could actually once again easily avoid her attack. This time she once again failed to touch even the corner of Jiang Yi's robes.
让林立大跌眼镜的是，一向老实的凯文，今天竟然脱下了法师袍，穿上了一件长袖高领的白色衬衣，外面还套着一件黑色马甲，手拿一把小小的木锤站在台上，竟是冒充起临时拍卖师来！

What made Lin Li's jaw drop was that Kevin, who had always been genteel, had taken off his mage robe and put on a white, high-collared long-sleeved blouse today. He wore a black waistcoat and stood on the stage holding a small hammer in his hands, temporarily posing as an auctioneer!
让江逸惊愕的是，他元力刚刚注入丹炉内，那丹炉竟如一块吸水的海绵般，快速的自动吸收他的元力，而且吸收的速度快得吓人，他双手经脉内的元力一下就全被吸收完了。

What befuddled Jiang Yi was that the essence force, which he had just been applied to the cauldron, was being absorbed speedily and automatically by the cauldron like a sponge—with the absorption at a shocking speed, so fast that the essence force in the meridians in his hands was completely absorbed in an instant.
让江逸诧异的是，那身材火辣的翊小姐进来后没有立即出手，反而朝他感激的一笑，抱拳行礼道：“你叫苍狼？多谢你的陪练！希望你今日同样全力以赴。”

What astonished Jiang Yi was that, Young Mistress Yi, who had a hot figure, did not immediately launch an attack upon entry, but rather smiled at him with a look of gratitude. She cupped her fists and bowed, saying, "Is your name 'Lone Wolf'? Thank you very much for your combat practice with me the other time! I hope that, like before, you will give it your all today."
讪讪的走出聚珍阁，江逸茫然的站在广场上，看着车水马龙川流不息，内心苦恼不已。有了灵神丹，他倒是不惧江如虎等人了，问题是炼丹房都被封了，他也没废丹，怎么快速赚钱啊？

Embarrassed, Jiang Yi walked out of the Pearl Gathering Pavilion and blankly stood at the City Plaza. As he observed the unending flow of heavy traffic, his heart felt endlessly distressed.
With the Spirit Pills, he was actually not fearful of Jiang Ruhu and his cronies. The problem was in that situation that with the sealing-up of the alchemy lab, and without any more useless elixirs, how could he rapidly make lots of money?
记得当初林立刚来魔法公会的时候，葛瑞安为了给他开放公会最高特权，还在公会内部引起了一片反对的声音，其中反对得最激烈的是几个魔导士，为了威胁葛瑞安，甚至还不惜以退出公会相逼。

When Lin Li had first arrived at the Guild of Magic, Gerian had caused a lot of opposition within the guild in order to open up the highest privileges for him. Among them, the most vehement opposition came from several Magic Shooters, who even threatened to withdraw from the guild in order to pressure Gerian.
论家世自己出身于法兰王国最显赫的魔法家族，自己的父亲甚至在魔法师公会都算是能说上话的人物，论财富更不用说，黑暗年代之后上千年的积累，自己家族早已是富可敌国，叔叔法里奥更是一直担任着王国财富大臣一职。

He was born into the most prominent mage family in the Felan Kingdom, and his father was someone who had a say in the Guild of Magic. His family was strikingly rich with the accumulation of over thousand years of wealth after the Dark Ages, and his uncle Fario had held the position of the Minister of Wealth in the kingdom all along.
话一出口，江逸就有些后悔了，他忘记了一件事，江恨水好像就在武殿里面？万一和江恨水对上了，他身份不得立即曝光？江家子弟在武殿内当陪练，这可不是光彩的事情……

As the words left his mouth, Jiang Yi instantly felt some regret. He forgot one thing: wasn't Jiang Henshui in the Martial Arts Hall?
If he was paired up with Jiang Henshui, wouldn't his identity immediately be revealed? That a descendant of the Jiang Clan was serving as a sparring partner in the Martial Arts Hall... this was not something honorable at all...
话说到这种程度，马森自然也不好再继续追问，只是望向林立的目光中，却已是充满了不可思议的神色，他无论如何也没有想到，这个自称七级魔法师的室友，怎么会有如此恐怖的来历……

At this point, Marson knew, of course, that it would be improper to question further. But when he looked at Lin Li, his gaze was already filled with incredibility. Never had he expected that his roommate, who claimed to be a level-seven mage himself, could possibly have such a terrifying background.
话还没落下，江逸的腿又高高抬起，对着江如虎的一条腿狠狠踩下……
Before he even finished his sentence, Jiang Yi lifted his leg high and stomped on Jiang Ruhu's leg.
说到最后，红发美女声音中已是带着一丝冷咧，那不经意间散发出来的气势，就连林立也不由暗暗心惊，这至少是十级以上强者的气息。此时的红发美女，就仿佛是一把美伦美焕的利剑，如秋水般流转的眼波中，充满了锋芒毕露的杀意。

By the end, the redheaded beauty's voice was bitterly cold. The imposing manner that was displayed by her inadvertently frightened Lin Li. It was an aura of at least a level-ten player. At this moment, the redheaded beauty was like a magnificent sword, full of murderous intent in her eyes that flowed like the autumn waters.
说到这个翊凌雪满脸兴奋起来，攥着小拳头笑着说道：“苍狼，不瞒你说这些其实是你的功劳，我天资怎么样我自己清楚，感悟武技速度很慢，要不是你……我这十多种武技怎么会那么快达到大成？今日我留下来其实是就是为了这事！”

Yi Lingxue grew excited at Jiang Yi's words and fisted her hands, smiling, "To be honest with you, Lone Wolf, all these achievements were because of you. I'm perfectly aware of the extent of my own abilities. Actually, the reason I'm staying behind today is precisely this!"
说到这里的时候，葛瑞安一张胖脸已经完全苦下来了：“这下麻烦大了，万一城主大人也对那三十瓶奥法药剂感兴趣，其他人谁还敢跟他竞争？”
At this point, Gerian's chubby face was completely sullen. "We're in big trouble. If the Castellan is interested in those 30 bottles of Arcane Magic Potions, who else would dare to compete with him?"
说到这里的时候，葛瑞安稍稍顿了一顿，这才又继续说道：“他回来之后，干的第一件事就是杀人，从他同父异母的弟弟，到他自己的亲生父亲，凡是有资格占据族长位置的人，一夜之间都被他杀了个精光，之后鲁本又用铁血手段，将整个家族牢牢控制在手里，之后的三十年中，他更是将当初那个小小的萨鲁曼家族，一手带到了如今加洛斯三大家族之一的位置！”

At this point, Gerian paused slightly before he continued, "After he returned, the first thing he did was to kill. From his half-brother to his father, those who were qualified for the position of the patriarch were killed off by him in a night. After that, Reuben had the whole family tightly controlled in his hands with his iron fists. In the subsequent 30 years, he had even brought the then-small Saruman Family to one of the three biggest families in Jarrosus today!"
说到这里，老梅林眼中透出一丝杀意：“而且你想过没有，如果让这些奥法药剂落到了别的家族手里，梅林家将会有什么下场？”

Old Merlin had a murderous glint in his eyes at the mention of this. "Also, has it ever crossed your mind, if these Arcane Magic Potions fall into the hands of other families, what will become of our Merlin Family?"
说到魔法……
Speaking of magic...
说完也不管林立有什么反应，一伸手推开虚掩的房门，又埋头在烧杯与试管间忙碌起来。
Not waiting for any reaction from Lin Li after he finished his sentence, he stretched out his hand and pushed the unlatched door open, once again burying himself among his beakers and test tubes.
说完也不跟老头罗嗦，从怀里掏出伊娜送给自己的卷轴袋来。
He had cut the chase with the old geezer after finishing his words and pulled out the scroll pouch Ina had given him from his pockets.
说完又四下张望了一番，确定没人偷听之后，这才盯着凯文威胁道：“除了魔法等级之外，其他记录全部销毁，另外，今天的事不准透露出去，谁问你都不能说，连你爸爸也不例外，要是走漏了风声，你看老子怎么收拾你！”

Then, he took a look around and made sure no one was eavesdropping on them. With a menacing stare directed at Kevin, he threatened, "Destroy all other evidence except the magic level. Also, do not reveal the things that have happened today no matter who asks about it—and that includes your father. If news is leaked, let's see how I'll deal with you!"
说完林立又有些疑惑的望着灰袍法师：“我就是费雷，您是……”
Then, Lin Li looked at the mage in gray robe doubtfully. "I am Felic, you are..."
说完柳长老就钻进了偏厅，江逸却傻眼了，他哪懂什么茯苓？什么是白矾啊？他又不敢多问，只能讪讪的走进了存放药草的房间内。

After instructing Jiang Yi, Elder Liu immediately went into the side room. Yet Jiang Yi stood dumbstruck. How could he possibly know what china root was? And what on earth was alum? However, he did not dare to ask further. He had no choice but to walk into the room where the ingredients were stored.
说完江逸再次抬腿狠狠对着江如虎剩下的一条好腿踩下，又单腿猛然将他的身子重重的踹飞出去，目光才在众人身上扫过，沉喝道：“半个时辰之内，给江如虎治疗，否则他……必死无疑！你们所有人给小爷我记住，以后看到我必须绕道，谁敢再挑衅小爷，江如虎就是你们榜样。”

Finishing what he had to say, Jiang Yi raised his leg once again before viciously stepping down on Jiang Yi's remaining good leg. Suddenly, with one of his legs, he sent Jiang Ruhu's body heavily flying off with another kick. It was only then that he swept a gaze across the bodies of all his remaining opponents before deeply shouting, "Heal Jiang Ruhu within the next hour, otherwise he... would definitely die, no doubt about that! All of you better remember, if you ever see me, your Young Master, in the future, you must make a detour around me. Otherwise, should you dare to provoke me, your Young Master, the fate of Jiang Ruhu today would be happening to you."
说完江逸就不顾这杨管事的挽留，径直朝武殿外走去，在门口那黑甲护卫诧异的目光中，朝城东的江家大院快步走去。

Finishing what he had to say and ignoring Manager Yang's attempt at making him stay, Jiang Yi directly walked out of the Martial Arts Hall. In the incredulous gaze of the guard wearing black armour, he walked in a quick pace towards the Jiang Residence Central Courtyard in the east of the city.
说完江逸收起紫金，很没礼貌的一拱手匆忙朝外面走去。那鹤大师本还想多问几句，却被姬听雨一抬手拦住了下来。

Finishing what he had to say, Jiang Yi kept the purple gold, before impolitely cupping his hands to bid them farewell and hurriedly walked out of the Pavilion building. Master He initially wanted to asked more questions to him, but he was prevented from doing so with a raise of Ji Tingyu's hand.
说完江逸身子就朝西山之下爆射而去，所有江家子弟摄于江逸的威势，竟无人敢拦截，反而很多人看着江逸的背影都露出畏惧之色。

Finishing his statemnet, Jiang Yi rushed off in a burst of quick speed, in the direction of the foot of the Western Hills. Having taken in the supreme might of Jiang Yi's power, out of all the Jiang Clan descendants surrounding him, none of them actually dared to stop him in his tracks. Conversely, many of them looked at the figure of Jiang Yi's back as he raced away, revealing a look of pure horror on their faces.
说完管事放下丹药走了出去，没过一会带着一名白发苍苍的老者走了进来，这老者穿着一身月白色的长袍，满脸的不耐烦神色。

Finishing what he had to say, the housekeeper put down the elixir and walked out of the booth. It was not long before he brought a white-haired old man into the booth. The elderly man was dressed in a moon-white long robe, with his face giving off a sense of much impatience.
说完荣管事便长袖一拂，大步离去。江逸只能讪讪的摸了摸鼻子，回房洗漱了一番，几口喝掉锅里的肉粥，就急急朝西山走去。

Upon finishing, Chief Rong flicked his long sleeves disdainfully and strode away from the courtyard. All Jiang Yi could do was scratch his nose in embarrassment. He headed back home to quickly freshen up and gulp down in a couple of mouthfuls of the meat porridge in the pot, before hastily making his way to the Western Hills.
说完这句话之后，城主大人的眉头又皱了一皱，低声向黑袍法师说道：“安德鲁，你最近如果没什么事的话，也不妨多关注一下魔法公会，我对格林先生要找那人，其实也很有点兴趣。”

After finishing the previous sentence, the castellan's brows were knitted again. He spoke to the mage in black robe in a low voice, "Andrew, if you have nothing much to do lately, you might want to pay more attention to the Guild of Magic. I'm actually also interested in the man Mr Grimm is looking for."
说完，江恨水径直走进丹房取了几大瓶丹药就离开了炼丹房，走出丹房后再也没有看江逸一眼，更别说道别了，宛如两个陌路人。

Finishing his sentence, Jiang Yi walked directly into the elixir room, retrieved several big bottles of elixirs and left the alchemy lab. As he left the alchemy lab, he did not look back and give Jiang Yi a glance, to say nothing of sending him a farewell. It was as though they were two strangers to each other.
说完，江逸目光陡然扫向江豹，身子也闪电般朝江豹冲去，身上杀气十足，双腿和衣袍之上都有江松的鲜血，看起来如一尊杀神般恐怖。

Finishing his declaration, Jiang Yi's sights suddenly turned to look at Jiang Bao; like a lightning, he rushed at Jiang Bao. He looked just like a horrifying killer god that was bursting with killing intent, both his legs and robes were drenched with Jiang Song's blood.
说干就干。
If Jiang Yi said he'd do it, he would definitely do it!
说干就干！
That was how Jiang Yi was: if he said he would do it, he would definitely do it!
说时迟，那时快！
In the blink of an eye!
说来也是有些巧合，两父女刚到任务公告处，就有一批新的任务公告出来。
It was also coincidence that as soon as the father and daughter arrived at the quest notice board, a new batch of quests had just been announced.
说着林立将麦格雷尼的右手抬起：“看看这是什么。”
As Lin Li spoke he lifted McGrenn's right hand. "Look at what this is."
说着林立找了个僻静的角落，悄悄打开无尽风暴之戒，从里面掏出了半截狮蝎尾刺，这是他当初帮安度因采野钢花的时候，从那头狮蝎尸体上切下来的，当初林立只是觉得这东西毒性不错，以后万一想弄点什么武器的话，应该能用得着，不过麦格雷尼父女怎么也算是给自己当了回向导，如今又正是需要的时候，林立也就不好意思再继续藏着了。

He found a quiet corner and silently opened up the Ring of Endless Storm. From inside the ring he took out half of the Manticore's hook which he had nicked off from the dead Manticore he’d encountered when he was out picking wild steelbloom for Andoine.
说着枯瘦的手指从脖子下划过，比了一个干掉的手势。
As he spoke, his gaunt fingers ran across the neck, indicating he was to “eliminate” the issue.
说着江逸匆忙的朝怀中掏去，满脸都是哀求之色，管事和马公子还有那几名护卫眼眸一亮，下意识朝江逸掏钱的左手望去。

As he was speaking, Jiang Yi hurriedly reached into his chest pocket with a pleading look. The eyes of the housekeeper, Young Master Ma, and those guards, lit up. They subconsciously directed their gaze to Jiang Yi's left hand that was in the midst of retrieving the money.
说着，柳长老就大步朝旁边的一个偏厅内走去。江逸踌躇一阵只能咬牙上了，运转蓝色元力双手贴在丹炉侧壁上。

Finishing his scolding, Elder Liu walked with big steps in the direction of a side room. Jiang Yi hesitated for a moment, knowing that he had to grit his teeth and do this task, before sticking both his hands on the cauldron walls and applying blue essence force.
说着，江松就眼露凶光，嘴里大喊“赤练黑砂掌”，双掌掌心呈现一片慑人的黑色，狠狠拍向江逸后背。

Right after speaking, Jiang Song revealed an ominous glint in his eyes as he shouted, "Red-Band Black Sand Palm!"
Both his palms produced terrifying black discs, which he viciously unleashed on Jiang Yi's back.
说着，管事也不再理会江逸，转头谄媚笑着和那马家公子低声说道：“飞少，时间还早，要不让小凤仙伺候下您？这小凤仙最近可是和花姐学了不少新活儿，保证您舒坦。”

Thereafter, he ignored Jiang Yi completely. Turning to the Ma Family young master, he asked with a toadying smile, "Young Master Fei, there's still plenty of time, why don't we summon Little Fengxian over to service you? She has learned many new tricks from Madam Flower recently, guaranteed to bring you great comfort."
说起来也怪不得安度因疏忽，谁又能想象得到，一个精通药剂学的魔法天才，在方向感上却是如此的低能。
Andoine was not to be blamed for his negligence. Who would have expected that a magic genius skilled in pharmaceutics could have such weak sense of direction?
谁也不知道他的名字，早年他的朋友们都叫他无名。
No one knew his name. In the early years, his friends used to call him Wu Ming, the nameless one.
谁也没有想到，鲁本－萨鲁曼会在这个时候放手。
No one had expected Reuben Saruman to let go at this time.
谁料，此刻姬听雨目光正朝他们这群陪练扫来，恰好和江逸对视了一眼，而等在江逸慌忙低头隐藏身形时，那姬小姐却突然伸出一根葱白手指指着江逸，淡淡开口道：“诸位公子好意，听雨心领了，杨管事，给我安排这戴狼首面具的陪练对战一场。”

Who knew that at the moment Ji Tingyu's gaze was sweeping across the room in the direction of the group of sparring partners, and she had coincidentally met Jiang Yi's eyes. As Jiang Yi hurriedly lowered his head to hide his body, that Young Mistress Ji suddenly extended an onion-white finger and pointed towards Jiang Yi. She faintly opened her mouth to say, "Everyone, this young gentleman has good intentions and I, Ji Tingyu, receive and appreciate your kindness. Manager Yang, please arrange for me to have a sparring match with the sparring partner wearing a wolf mask."
谁知江逸的身子一闪，竟在半路转向朝右边掠去，而右边的两人本看着江逸朝左边冲去，身体已经开始转向了，现江逸却笔直朝两人冲来？当下只能慌乱的挥舞拳头，朝江逸砸去。

Who knew that Jiang Yi's figure would duck out of the way and, in the midst of his run, turn to sweep towards the right? How could the two persons on the right predict that, having originally seen Jiang Yi rush towards the left and having started turning their bodies in the same direction, Jiang Yi would actually race straight towards them right now? The two persons could only brandish their fists in a state of confused fury and smash them towards Jiang Yi.
谁知道一句话还没说完，就被人从背后推了一把。
But he was pushed away from the back before he could finish his sentence.
谁知道他才刚侧身躲到树后，就忽然感觉脚下一轻，紧接着整个人都倒了过来。
Just as he was about to lean behind the tree, he suddenly felt himself being lifted off the ground, and the next moment, his whole body was inverted.
谁知道最后弄巧成拙，葛瑞安倔脾气一上来，直接就把他们赶出了公会。
Who knew they would go for wool and come back shorn. Gerian's obstinacy acted up and he drove them out of the guild instead.
谁知，异变突生——
He was unprepared for the unexpected change.
谁都知道这是怎么回事，可是谁也都拿葛瑞安这老胖子没办法，如今是人为刀俎我为鱼肉，人家等的就是在拍卖时狠宰你一刀，于是十家魔法家族的人来了，然后又走了，六支地下势力的人也来了，然后还是走了……

Everyone knew what was going on, but there was nothing they could do about the fat old man Gerian. Everyone was at Gerian's mercy now, and what they were waiting for was to rip him off at the auction. So the members of the ten mage families came and left, and then the members of the six underground forces came and left too...
谢谢大家的支持！我一定努力多码字，多更新来报答各位恩公！
费老漠然起身朝外面走去，在门口才侧脸解释了一句：“十五六岁的才铸鼎境二重，这小子已经过了修炼的黄金时段，这辈子不会有大成就了，尽管反应能力变态，但境界提升不上来，也只能是个废物，武殿……不养废物。”

Elder Fei apathetically stood up and walked in the direction of the exterior of the room. It was only when he reached the door that he turned his head around and explained, "He's fifteen or sixteen years old, yet his power level is only at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. This boy's already missed the golden opportunity to cultivate his power and as such he'll not have any great accomplishments for the rest of his life. Even if he does have an obscenely powerful capability to react to opponents' moves, so long as he can't increase his power-level stages, he's just going to be a good-for-nothing. The Martial Arts Hall... does not waste resources on caring for useless good-for-nothings."
费雷是什么人，他除了安度因的弟子之外，同时还是奥兰纳魔法公会的希望，他锻造的魔法武器，直接就关系到大领主奥斯瑞克的陵墓，就连老子面对这位大爷，都不舍得说一句重话，你霍伦倒好，上来就打算杀人，妈的，你倒是杀杀看，看你杀了费雷之后，你老爸奥德文会不会揍死你……

Felic was not only Andoine's disciple, but also the hope of the Alanna Guild of Magic. The weapons that he had forged were directly connected to Great Leader Aus Rick. Even the Master in front of him did not dare to speak harsh words. Hoeren had the guts to plan to kill him. Hell, you can kill Felic and see whether your father will beat you to death after that.
赤练黑砂掌！
Red-Band Black Sand Palm!
走到半山，江如虎终于缓过来一口气，他艰难的开口道：“江逸……实力进步的那么快……不能……等我哥回来……我要他死……全部人给我记住，今日之事……就说和马家开战……”

Jiang Ruhu finally revived and took in a breath of air, they were mid-way down the mountain. With much difficulty, he opened his mouth and said, "Jiang Yi's... power has improved so quickly... cannot... wait for my brother to return... I want him dead... everyone better remember, whatever happened today... just say that we had to fight with the Ma Family..."
走到半路，他脚步突然一顿，拐进了旁边一个衣袍铺子内，很快就穿着一身黑袍走了出来，还把脑袋全部笼罩在斗篷内。
Along the way, he suddenly froze in his tracks and turned into a nearby garment shop. It was not long before he came out dressed in black from head to toe, and even had his head enveloped in a cloak.
走在幽暗的森林当中，林立心里的感觉有些复杂，一般是新奇一半是紧张。
Walking among the dark forest, Lin Li felt complicated. He was split between curiosity and nervousness.
走在繁华的奥兰纳街头，林立又顺便关心了一下憨厚青年的艰难况：“对了希恩，你这两天到什么地方去了，我怎么一次也没见到过你？”(未完待续，如欲知后事如何，请登陆www.qidian.com，章节更多，支持作者，支持正版阅读！)

As they walked along the bustling Alanna streets, Lin Li had a few casual chats with the young man to catch up with him, "By the way, Sheehan, where on Earth have you been these two days? How come I didn't see you at all?"
走在金碧辉煌的宴会大厅中，林立忽然觉得有些好笑，他完全没想到红发美女会突然跟自己道歉，更没想到她会提出拜师的要求，在林立看来这个要求简直是荒谬到了极点！

Walking in the splendid banquet hall, Lin Li suddenly felt a little amused at the situation. He had never expected the redheaded beauty to apologize to him out of the blue, and even more so to request to become his apprentice. From what Lin Li saw, this request was absolutely ridiculous to the core!
走廊上走来四人，全部衣袍华贵，气态不凡，是三名公子和一名漂亮小姐。小姐一身黄裳长裙，靓丽如一朵盛开的黄玫瑰，正是姬家小姐姬听雨，而旁边的三位公子中江恨水赫然在列。

Four people walked through the corridor, all of them dressed elegently in luxurious clothes with extraordinary atmospheres about them. They consisted of three gentlemen and a beautiful lady. The young lady was dressed in a yellow robe with long dress and was pretty like a yellow rose in full bloom. That was the young mistress of the Ji Family Ji Tingyu, and amongst the three gentlemen beside her included, impressively enough, Jiang Henshui.
走得近些之后，罗琳也看见了角落里的林立，再一想起那天伊娜家的事，一时间俏脸上不由露出几分尴尬。
As she got closer, Rowling saw Lin Li in the corner too. She was again reminded of what happened at Ina's place, and at once embarrassment could be seen on her pretty face.
走近那杂草丛生的洞口，只觉一股阴冷潮湿的气息扑面而来，林立刚一走近，就知道自己没找错地方，这山洞又黑又潮，正是野钢花生长的绝佳地点。

Lin Li could only feel a rush of cold, damp breath on his face as he approached the overgrown cave. As soon as Lin Li came near he knew he had not found the wrong place. The cave was dark and damp, the perfect place for wild steelbloom to grow.
走进公会大厅的葛瑞安一脸杀气，四处找人打听凯文在什么地方，可惜凯文早知道他今天肯定回来，一大早就躲出魔法公会去了，弄得葛瑞安在翡翠高塔找了半天也没找到，最后不得不无奈的敲响了林立的房门。

Gerian walked into the guild's hall with a murderous look on his face, asking people to find out where Kevin was. Unfortunately, Kevin knew he'd return today so he had hidden away from the Guild of Magic early in the morning. Gerian couldn't find him anywhere in the Emerald Tower, and at last he had no choice but to knock on Lin Li's door.
走进武殿，江逸明显感觉一丝不对了，这里的气息比外面清新好闻多了，他不用闭关打坐都知道这里的天地灵气浓郁得吓人，在这里面修炼速度绝对比外面快很多。

Entering the Martial Arts Hall, Jiang Yi evidently felt that something was not right. The atmosphere in the building was a lot more fresh, clean and nicer-smelling than the air outside. He didn't need to go into seclusion and sit in meditation to know that the heavenly and earthly spiritual forces in here were obscenely powerful, allowing anyone's cultivation speed to be much faster in the Hall than outside.
趁真众多宾客围到艾萨克身边时，凯文终于是找了个借口逃出来，一出人群，就看见林立正在那笑得幸灾乐祸，凯文顿时气不打一处来：“费雷，你太不厚道了……”

Jiang Yi knew a bit about this imposing grand hall. In fact, there was truly not a single person in the entire Stellarsky Continent who did not know of the Martial Arts Hall.
This was because a simple and unadorned black grand hall could be found in every city center would have. Additionally, the existence of the Martial Arts Hall in history had been extremely long.
It seemed as though Martial Arts Halls had existed ever since the start of the era of mankind.
这张卷轴的出现，让刚刚安静了几分钟的私人仓库又沸腾了起来。
The private warehouse had just quieted down for a few minutes, but the appearance of the scroll threw the place into a frenzy again.
这怒焰之袍如今看来，真是有些鸡肋的意思。
The Robe of Wrath did indeed look insignificant now.
这总管说得不错，今日就算打死了两人也没大事，江家肯定不会追究的。这管事很是精明，眼睛很毒，从他的穿着和侍女小奴在这做工应该猜出了，他在江家地位很低，也算定了他不敢大闹的。

The chief supervisor was right—it was unimportant if they beat the two of them to death, for the Jiang Clan would definitely not bother to investigate the incident. This chief was shrewd, and eyes shone with malic. From his apparel and the fact that Xiaonu the servant girl was working here, one could guess that his position in the Jiang Clan was very low; one could also estimate that he would not dare to make such a big fuss.
这惊天动地的一击，终于为这场华丽的战斗划上了句号。
The earth-shaking strike had finally brought the magnificent battle to a close.
这意味着什么，这意味着林立在安瑞尔世界，同样是一个全职业大师！
What did this imply? This implied that in the world of Anril, Lin Li was also a master of all professions!
这房子看上去已经有些年月了，走上二楼卧室的时候，林立总感觉脚下的木板在轻轻颤抖。
This house looked like it had been here for ages. As they walked up to the bedroom on the second story, Lin Li could feel the wooden boards tremble under his feet.
这才两天时间，他竟赚了一两紫金，最重要的是那位姬听雨小姐还说了，以后有多少丹药她全收？那他再炼出二十七枚黑色丹药，不就能赚取十两紫金，赎回令牌了吗？

In just two days, he could actually earn a tael of purple gold. Most importantly, Miss Ji Tingyu had even said that she would collect any and all other elixirs he had in the future. If he could refine twenty-seven of them black elixir pills, would he not be able to earn ten taels of purple gold and redeem his command token back?
这才是林立与一般药剂师的区别。
This was the difference between Lin Li and the ordinary pharmacists.
这才是点金棒上最核心的精华，一红一绿两块宝石，都是从毁灭之龙巢穴里搞来的，当初干掉阿扎达斯之后，那堆积如山的财宝，曾给林立留下过深刻的印象，而这一红一绿两块宝石，就点缀在那小山般的财宝顶端，就仿佛生日蛋糕上的樱桃。

This was the core essence of the gold rod. The ruby and the emerald were collected from the nest of the Dragon of Destruction. After killing Azardas, the mountain of treasures had left a deep impression on Lin Li; these two gemstones were embellished on top of the pile of treasure, like cherries on a birthday cake.
这护卫的速度快得江逸根本反应不过来，而且力量也强大了很多，从这掌拍来引起的赫赫风声就可判断出。
The guard's speed was more than Jiang Yi could handle, and his strength was also a lot more potent. He could determine that from the howling wind produced by the palm strike.
这护卫虽然受伤，也被江逸缠住右手，一时有些慌乱，但毕竟是铸鼎境三重武者，反应速度快得惊人，当下另外一只大手化作利爪朝江逸的左手两根指头抓来，欲折断他的两根手指。

The guard panicked for a short moment. Although he was injured and had his right arm entangled by Jiang Yi, he was nonetheless a martial artist at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. As such, his reaction speed was shockingly fast. He immediately formed a claw with his other hand and grasped towards two fingers on Jiang Yi's left hand, in the hopes of breaking the two fingers.
这时丹药房外传来一阵轻微的脚步声，一名少年偷偷的钻了进来，扫了一眼江逸，这才满脸谄媚笑意的朝柳长老走去，一边拱手说道：“恭喜长老，贺喜长老，您老人家终于炼出绝世丹药了……”

At this time, the light sound of footsteps came from the exterior of the Elixir Room. A young man secretly entered, glanced at Jiang Yi with one look, before walking in the direction of Elder Liu while putting on a face filled by a flattering and charming smile and cupping his hands in greeting.
"Congratulations, Elder!” he exclaimed. “Congratulations, Elder! You, dear elder, have refined an exceptional elixir..."
这时候一众宾客才忽然发现，本应必死无疑的巴瑟罗尔，此时竟仍然毫发无伤的站在一片灰烬当中，虽然神色间有些呆滞，手掌上也还流着鲜血，但他依然活着，这一点却是毫无疑问！所有人当中，大概也只有少数几个人才能察觉到，巴瑟罗尔之所以没有死在火龙之下，全凭的是一层魔力防护。

Only then did the crowd of guests discover that Bathrilor, who was supposed to be dead, was still standing unhurt in the ashes. Although his expression was lifeless and his palms were still dripping with blood, he was still alive—there was no doubt about it! Perhaps only a few guests were aware that the reason why Bathrilor could survive the fire dragons was due to a layer of magical shield.
这时候林立才注意到，那涂得乱七八糟的颜料之下，似乎还有些什么东西。
Only then did Lin Li notice that underneath the mess of dyes, there seemed to be something else.
这时候林立才注意到，那身穿灰色法师长袍的身影，看上去已经有些年纪了，长得慈眉善目白白胖胖，就连在发怒的时候，看上去竟也让人觉得他笑容可鞠，林立有点眼晕，这么个象商人多过象法师的胖老头，居然就是加洛斯魔法公会会长，大魔导士葛瑞安！

Only then did Lin Li notice the how old the figure in the gray mage robe looked. He had a kind countenance and was fair and chubby. Even when he was angry, he still looked cheerful. Lin Li felt a little dizzy; a fat old man like him who looked more like a businessman than a mage was actually the President of the Jarrosus Guild of Magic, Archmage Gerian!
这时候老格林才明白，这个叫费雷的年轻魔法师，先前为什么会大言不惭的要跟自己探讨……
It was then that Old Grimm understood why this young mage Felic had been so brazen earlier to want to discuss with him...
这时小奴也递上来一根点燃蜡烛，嘴里说着“少爷加油！”
At this moment, Xiaonu quickly delivered a lit candle and mouthed, “Don't give up, Young Master! You can do it!”
这时，外面传来杨管事的叫声，江逸只能无奈的把那把从马飞那抢来的宝器藏入怀中，带上苍狼面具朝外面走去。
Manager Yang's voice came from the outside. Resigned, Jiang Yi stowed away the treasured artifact he took from Ma Fei back in his chest pocket, and went out wearing the wolf mask.
这时，就在万般疯狂的喧嚣嘶吼声中，一句平静、普通，但却刺透所有声响的话语，在所有人耳边响起。
In the midst of all the commotion, a calm, ordinary sound pierced through all the noises and rang within everyone's ears.
这是一个剑与魔法的世界，而眼前这个叫安度因的老人，职业就是魔法师，而且是一位相当强大的魔法师，虽然安度因没说自己究竟如何强大，但林立从他那充满自信的语气中也能猜出，这个有些不修边幅的老人，绝对比自己想象中更加强大。

This was a world of swords and magic. The old man in front of him whom he had came to know as Andoine was a mage by profession, and he was a powerful one. Although Andoine did not elaborate on how powerful he was, Lin Li could tell from his confident tone that this somewhat unkempt old man was definitely more powerful than he had imagined him to be.
这是一个无比缓慢的过程，每一条蓝丝的溶解，都仿佛会让巨龙之血的颜色深上一分，一直到最后一条蓝丝消失时，那一烧杯深红色的液体，已是隐隐泛起了湛蓝色的光芒。

This was a remarkably slow process. The dissolution of each blue thread seemed to darken the dragon's blood by a fraction. By the time the last strand of blue thread disappeared, a deep blue hue was faintly glowing in the crimson liquid.
这是一场典型的魔法师决斗，他们的战斗方式无疑是最传统的。
This was a typical battle of the mages, so their battling styles were no doubt the most traditional.

这是一幢庞大的建筑物，足足占了大半条街道，装潢上简单朴素，光从门外看上去，你绝想不到这就是安瑞尔最庞大也最富有的机构，从正门进去，是一间宽敞的大厅，据麦格雷尼介绍，这里就是他们平常领取任务的地方，大厅内挤满了各式各眼的冒险者，有些人正在等待新的任务，也有些已经领了任务正准备离去，这些冒险者几乎囊括了林立所知道的所有职业，从魔法师到战士，再从弓箭手到盗贼，他们大多数人身上，都带着一股淡淡的血腥味，林立知道，这是常年与魔兽厮杀所留下的。

It was an enormous building, taking up most of the street. The decor was simple and plain, and if seen from the outside, you'd never expect it to be the largest and richest institution in all of Anril. Through the front door was a spacious hall, and according to McGrenn's introduction, this was where they usually receive their quests. The hall was packed with all kinds of adventurers; some were waiting for new tasks, while others had already collected them and were preparing to leave. These adventurers covered almost every profession Lin Li knew, from mages to warriors and from archers to thieves. Most of them carried a faint smell of blood on them. Lin Li knew that it was the legacy of years of fighting demons.
这是一瓶用幽灵草汁液加智慧之树树叶混合成的清晰药剂，可以大幅度增加施法范围，因为安度因一直反对他过于依赖药剂，所以一共也就弄了三瓶，这喝一瓶少一瓶的东西灌下去，林立只觉得心都痛了……

It was a Clarity Potion made from the succus of ghostskin and leaves from the Wisdom Tree. It could greatly increase the scope of magic cast. Because Andoine had always objected to his excessive reliance on potions, he had only concocted three bottles. Lin Li's heart ached as he downed a bottle, for it meant he had one bottle less...
这是一种仿佛劫后余生的感觉，小梅林一直在其中沉浸了许久许久……
It was as if having survived a disaster, and Little Merlin was immersed in it for a long while...
这是一种近乎入定般的玄妙境界，沉浸在这种境界中的林立，就仿佛是拥有了一个独立的世界，在这个世界里，他正以令人难以置信的速度接近魔法本质。
It was an almost abstruse state, and Lin Li, being immersed in that state, was as if in another world by himself. In this world, he was approaching the nature of magic with an unbelievable speed.
这是安度因为他准备的新身份，一路上林立早已背得滚瓜烂熟，此时随口说来自然而又顺口，就好象他本名就叫费雷似的。
This was the new identity that Andoine had prepared for him. Lin Li had thoroughly memorized it along the way, and he said it so naturally and fluently as though Felic was his real name all along.
这是属于药剂师的奇迹！
This was the miracle of a pharmacist!
这是带有剧毒的征兆。
This was a sign of lethal poison.
这是林立很早以前学会的一个小手段，将恢复药水和清醒药水混合在一起，通过这种结构最简单，属性冲突也最激烈的混合药剂，可以很直观的判断出某种草药的属性。

This was a small trick Lin Li had learnt long ago. Mixing the Recovery Potion together with the Sobriety Potion would produce a cocktail potion with the simplest structure and the most intense of conflicting properties. Through this, the attributes of a certain herb could be perceived directly.
这是梅林家族羡慕不来的事，自从老梅林与葛瑞安一战之后，魔法公会与梅林家族之间，就再无携手的可能，但萨鲁曼家族却可以，曼尼斯家族也同样可以，而这两个家族族长，也都不约而同的选择了一条明智的道路，只是走的方式略有不同罢了……

The Merlin Family could only envy. Since the battle between Old Merlin and Gerian, there was no possibility of any partnership between the Guild of Magic and the Merlin Family. But it was still possible for the Saruman Family and the Mannes Family. And the patriarch of the second family had chosen to take the wise path, though he had taken a slightly different approach...
这是江家的人阶上品武技，这武技不追求幻化出的拳影多少，而是追求每一个拳影的真实度，让一般实力低下的武者根本看不出真实拳影，从而轻松伤敌。

The Phantom Punch was a Man-tier superior-grade technique belonging to the Jiang Clan. This technique was not about the number of fist silhouettes produced, but the degree of realism of each fist silhouette, preventing the average martial artist from ever making out the real fists, thereby wounding the enemy with ease.
这是荣管事给他的令牌，可自由出入西山药田，江家族规甚严，如果被刑堂知道他敢用这令牌抵押，肯定会重重责罚的，但此刻他是黔驴技穷，唯有出此下策。

This command token was given to him by Chief Rong, which allowed him to move in and out of the medicinal plantations in the Western Hills freely. The Jiang Clan’s laws were exceptionally strict—if the Disciplinary Court found out that he brazenly used the command token as collateral, he would certainly be badly punished. However at that moment, his already-limited options had already been exhausted, so he had no choice but to take this move.
这枚戒指实在是太熟悉了，林立不可能记错。
The ring was just too familiar for Lin Li to remember it wrong.
这柳长老脾气如此古怪，在这干活要是哪天得罪了他？被他暴怒之下一掌拍死，那可就是死了也没地方述冤了……

Elder Liu's temper was so bizarre—what if one day he insulted the chief while working here? If he got beaten to death in the elder's rage, Jiang Yi would have nowhere to relate his grievances to in his death...
这次他不是自己醒来的，而是被一道沉闷的撞门声惊醒的。
He was awoken by a dull sound of a door being slammed open, instead of waking up naturally.
这次他没有朝炼丹房走去，而是悄然拐出了西院朝城中快速走去，他要去城内最大的商号，聚珍阁！

This time, he did not walk towards the alchemy lab, but rather quietly turned his way out of the Western Courtyard and walked speedily in the direction of the city. He was going to the biggest merchant-house in the city - the Pearl Gathering Pavilion!
这次轮到杨管事迟疑了，片刻之后他才沉声说道：“第一点可以，不过我会按一天你上场陪练四场算，只有打够四场才会算一天工钱。至于第二点，你需要预支多少薪水？”

This time it was Manager Yang who hesistated. It was only after a short moment of time had passed when he said in a low deep voice, "I have no problem with the first point, but I was pay you the rate of a day's worth in wages if you serve as a sparring partner for four matches. Only after completeing four matches will you earn a day's worth in wages. As for the second point, what is the amount of money you need an advance on?"
这死猩猩实在是太变态了，本身就是八级魔兽，不管是力量还是速度，都达到了一个令人恐怖的高度，偏偏此时还是主场作战，那一张巨网就跟金钟罩似的，锋利无比的风刃射上去，竟是连一根藤条都切不断。

This darned gorilla was an absolute freak. It was a level-eight magical beast, and it had reached a frightening degree in both speed and strength. Moreover, it was fighting on its home ground. The giant net was like an impenetrable defense; even the razor-sharp wind blades couldn't sever any rattan.
这段时间虽然不长，但已经足以让梅林家族准备许多事了……
The time might not be long, but it would be sufficient for the Merlin Family in their preparations...
这毕竟只是第一次配制，不象奥法药剂清醒药剂，仅凭着经验就可以判断出结果。
After all, this was his first concoction unlike the Arcane Magic Potion where the result could be judged by experience alone.
这江逸还能有以后吗？怕是今日过后江逸就会变成彻底的废物了吧？如此丧心病狂的手段，刑堂就算不杀他也会废了他修为，让他一辈子永远变成废人……

Would this Jiang Yi still be able to have a future? He would most probably be turned into a complete cripple today right? To commit such ruthless and mad crimes. Even if the Disciplinary Court didn't kill you, they would cripple his cultivation and turn him into a disabled trash for his life...
这火龙形的浮雕异常传神，栩栩如生，就像一条活的火龙攀附在他丹田上般，整个龙形封印都由火红色的细小符文组成，大长老研究了很久都无从破解，更别说江逸了。

The fire dragon relief was abnormal and vivid-looking, as though it had come to life - a living fire-breathing dragon clinging onto his dantian. The entire dragon-shaped seal was assembled from tiny fire-red script. The Grand Elder had spent ages researching the words, but still could not break the seal—to say nothing of Jiang Yi's potential.
这炼丹师既然是聚珍阁内的，那品阶肯定不会低。柳长老才是一品炼丹师在江家都是长老，可见炼丹师地位之高，他怎么敢承受这一礼？

Since this alchemist was from the Pearl Gathering Pavilion, his abilities were definitely not poor. Elder Liu was a superior-grade alchemist and was of a high Elder status at the Jiang Clan. One could easily tell that the status of alchemists was high. How could he ever dare to accept this one greeting?
这真是要了老命了……
This was really killing him…
这真是让林立很头大，在炼金是里发了足有一个小时的呆，才终于是一咬牙决定了下来。
This was indeed a big dilemma for Lin Li. After spending an hour in the alchemy lab, he finally came to a decision with a clench of his teeth.
这确实比较无聊，临死前下了黄昏诅咒，死后几乎百分之百的会变成亡灵生物，想想吧，一个二十级以上强者变成的亡灵生物，若他生前还是一位魔法师的话，那么恭喜你，你很有可能会遇到一位巫妖，净化他的骸骨？还不如自杀来得干脆……

This was indeed boring. Casting the Twilight Curse before death would almost 100 percent turn someone into an undead creature. Just think about a strong existence above level-twenty turning into an undead; if he was a mage before he died, then congratulations, you might have encountered a Lich. Commiting a suicide would be easier than purifying his bones...
这种情况一直持续了很久，一直到几天前，翡翠高塔外的加洛斯最强法师之战。
This situation lasted for a long time, until a few days ago where the battle between the strongest mages of Jarrosus took place outside the Emerald Tower.
这突如其来的道歉，让林立有些摸不着头脑：“恩？”
The sudden apology confused Lin Li. "Hmm?"
这竟是一个十级以上的战士！林立心头微微有些惊讶，只是脸上却丝毫不露端倪，只是微微笑道：“我要是走了，你能把麦格雷尼先生治好吗？”
This was actually a warrior above level-ten! Lin Li was slightly surprised, but he showed no sign of it on his face and merely laughed gently. "If I leave, will you be able to cure Mr McGrenn?"
这等处境看似有些狼狈，但林立知道，自己需要的只是一个机会，一个让他吟唱咒文的机会。
He seemed a little clumsy with this. But Lin Li knew that all he needed was a chance. A chance for him to recite his spells.
这简直就是一片地下荒原，空旷而又辽阔，大片大片的野钢花在荒原上疯张，而在那一片姹紫嫣红当中，又点缀着点点灰暗色彩，那是幽灵草的颜色。
It was a piece of underground wilderness, empty and vast. Seas of wild steelbloom prospered on the wild land. The blaze of purple and red was interspersed with dots of gray, the color of ghostskin.
这简直就是药剂师梦寐以求的宝贝，特别是象林立这种，本身就已经达到宗师级别，身上又随时带着十七八瓶药剂的家伙，若是有一只安眠水晶瓶在手，那还不得被他玩出花来？

This was simply the stuff of pharmacists' dreams, especially those like Lin Li, who had already reached the level of a guru and carried 17 to 18 bottles of potion with him at all times. If he had got his hands on one of these bottles, wouldn't he want to play with them?
这绝对是魔法师梦寐以求的珍品，储存魔力对一个魔法师来说，实在是太重要了，象这么大一块谜蓝宝石，怕是来个魔导士都不一定能把它填满。
This was definitely a treasure a mage would wish for. Storing mana was too important for a mage. Even an archmage would not be able to fill such a big Enigma Sapphire like this.
这翊凌雪也很是奇怪，每天下午时分都会来到练功房，让杨管事把江逸叫出来对战一场。尽管每次对练都是输，她却乐此不疲，让武殿内的陪练和杨管事都很是怀疑，难道她看上了江逸？

Yi Lingxue was indeed a strange girl - she would come to the Technique Practising Room every afternoon and ask for Jiang Yi for a sparring match, and despite losing every single match, she never seemed to tire of it. This made the other sparring partners at the Martial Arts Hall as well as Manager Yang dubious: could it be that she had taken a fancy to Jiang Yi?
这翊小姐实力只有铸鼎境四重，前天他才铸鼎境一重，凭借黑色元力她都不能碰触到一片衣角，今日他实力大涨，自然不用说了。

The power level of Young Mistress Yi was only at the fourth stafe of the Cast Tripod Realm. The day before, his power level was only at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm and already, when he relied on the power of black essence forces, she was unable to even touch the corner of his robes. Today, with his power having greatly expanded, naturally she would be unable to hit him.
这老人看上去与安度因差不多年纪，同样是白须白发满面皱纹，只是一件灰色法师袍看上去干净而又整洁，比起落日山脉上那个不修边幅的安度因来，俨然是两种截然不同的反面。

This old man looked to be around the same age as Andoine. His hair and beard were white and his face was full of wrinkles too. But his gray mage robe looked clean and tidy, totally opposite in comparison to the scruffy Andoine back in the Sunset Mountains.
