那是一种近乎致命的美感，骄傲而又冷艳，让人不由生出征服的****以林立的心神修养，在回过头去的瞬间，也是禁不住刹那失神。

It was an almost-fatal kind of aesthetic—proud yet cold. A person couldn't help but feel the desire to conquer, and even with Lin Li's mental cultivation, he had gotten momentarily lost the moment he looked back.
那是几片黑色的花瓣，大概是因为前两天累过了头的缘故，今天一早起来，林立迷迷糊糊的就又进了药剂室，等到反应过来想闪人的时候，却忽然在一堆药渣中发现了这几片花瓣。

It was a few black petals. He had most likely been too tired the past two days, and had walked into the potion lab again in a daze this morning when he woke up. He had wanted to leave once he came to realize where he'd gone when he suddenly spotted the flower petals among a pile of potion dregs.
那枚红宝石戒指的威力，竟是出乎他意料的强大，数十条火龙奔腾而来的时候，至少相当于一个八级魔法的威力，林立虽然凭着一面元素护盾抵削弱了大部分的伤害，却还是有那么一两道火龙突破了元素护盾的封锁，直接攻击到了他的身体。

The power of the ruby ring was stronger than he had expected. When the dozens of fire dragons surged forward, it was equivalent to the power of a level-eight magic. Athought Lin Li had weakened most of the damage with the elemental shield, there were still one or two fire dragons that broke through the blockage of the elemental shield, directly attacking his body.
那柳长老瞪了江逸一眼，手中开始亮起红色元力单手附在丹炉侧壁上，不过他眸子一转，突然转头朝江逸招手道：“你，过来！给这炉丹药先回火，老夫去看看丹方。”

Elder Liu stared at Jiang Yi as the single hand he placed on the cauldron walls started glowing with red essence force. However, he shifted his pupils and turned his head towards Jiang Yi as he waved his hand, ordering, "You, get over here! Help me temper the flames of this cauldron of elixirs; I am going to check the elixir formula."
那点金棒实在变态，深渊秘银本身就能强化魔法抗性，再经过深邃之银大幅提升，一个低级抗魔属性，竟也生生被他弄得强悍无比，这一件怒焰之袍穿出去，怕是要让五级以下的魔法师彻底绝望了……

The gold rod was certainly a sick item. The abyss mithril itself could strengthen magic resistance, and after being greatly enhanced by the deep silver, a low-level magic resistance attribute had been made incredibly potent by him. If the Robe of Wrath was worn out, it would probably make mages under level-five utterly depressed...
那炼丹师脸上露出一丝失望之色，再次看了一下丹药，很快转身朝外走去，同时交代管事：“好好招待这位客人，我先去请示一下二小姐。”

That alchemist reveal a sliver of disappointment on his face. Looking at the elixirs once again, he quickly turned his body and walked out of the booth. At the same time, he instructed the manager by saying, "Entertain this customer well, I need to consult with Second Young Mistress for a moment."
那种充满野性的美丽，对出身于魔法世家的克伦威尔来说，有着一种近乎致命的吸引力。
The untamed beauty exuded by Ina had a near-fatal attraction for Cromwell, who was born into a mage family.
那种感觉，就好象一道紧闭的大门，忽然敞开了。
The kind of feeling was like a closed door suddenly opened.
那竟是在伊娜家见过的红发美女！
It was the redheaded beauty he saw at Ina's place!
那管事接过令牌，脸上露出不出意料的神情，不过他并没有立即答应，反而低头沉吟起来。
The housekeeper received the token with a look of astonishment, yet he did not immediately respond; instead, he lowered his head and started muttering to himself.
那管事放声大笑，嘲弄的望着江逸道：“道理？你这侍女在我这做工，我可少了他一分银钱？她不好好做工？竟跑去内堂，毁掉了我们楼主在聚珍阁重金购买的一副名画。还有……你这小子不问青红皂白，冲进来就打伤我们风月楼的护卫！既然你要说道理，那要不我们去你们江家刑堂说去？哼哼……今日不给个说法，这事就算闹到哪去都没完。”

The housekeeper laughed aloud. He stared at Jiang Yi and replied sarcastically, "Justice? Your maidservant works for me. Have I ever not paid her a cent less? She did not do her work properly, you know? Not only did she brazenly run to the inner court, she even destroyed a famous painting that our Fengyue Brothel boss bought at an exorbitant price.
"On top of that... you, little brat, you did not bother finding out what happened, and just rushed in and attacked our guards here at Fengyue Brothel indiscriminately! Since you say you want to serve justice, then should we go over to your Jiang Clan Disciplinary Court to seek that justice? Hmph... if you can't give us an explanation or a solution, we will be at an impasse and the problem will not go away."
那管事满眸都是惊疑走前几步，目光在江逸身上打了几个转，开口问道：“迷幻步？幻影拳？缠丝手？你是江家的子弟？敢问是谁家的公子？江家的几位爷鄙人倒是略有耳闻。”

That housekeeper took several steps forward, his eyes giving a look of bewilderment. Taking several glances at Jiang Yi from top to bottom, he asked, "Psychedelic Step? Phantom Punch? Silk Hand? Are you a member of the Jiang Clan? Dare I ask, are you a young master, and which family do you belong? This humble servant has indeed heard of some of the young masters of the Jiang Clan."
那翊飞儿明显对江逸不感冒，等翊凌雪走了之后，淡淡的看着江逸一眼昂着头走进一个练功房内，在门口才漠然说道：“还不进来？”

Yi Fei-er was apparently uninterested in Jiang Yi. After Yi Lingxue's departure, she looked at Jiang Yi dispassionately and went into the Technique Practising Room with her head held up high. She stopped at the doors and said in an indifferent tone, "You are not coming inside?"
那股力量是如此强大，克伦威尔甚至都还没来得及发出惨叫，就已经被狠狠的击飞出去，整个人就好象是一只断线的风筝，足足飞出了十几米远，最后在众人的目光注视下，重重的落到了门口的台阶上。

The force was extremely powerful. Cromwell hardly had the time to let out a cry before he was being knocked off. He flew a whole dozen meters like a kite with broken strings. At last, he landed heavily on the steps of the door, with all eyes on him.
那边江逸对着书册，仔细辨认，整整找了小半个时辰才找到柳长老所需的八九种药草，用一个小杆秤准确的秤好。

At the other corner of the building, Jiang Yi referenced the book and carefully identified the various medicinal herbs. It took an entire hour before he managed to find all nine medicinal herbs that Elder Liu requested. He used a small scale to accurately measure the right amount of each ingredient.
那铸鼎境界三重旁系子弟江如鹰立即朝前走了两步，蹲了一个马步，满脸嘲弄的伸手指着胯下道：“来吧！钻过去。”

That collateral descendant Jiang Ruying, with a power level at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, immediately took two steps forward and squatted down in a horse stance position. With a look of desire to make fun of Jiang Yi, he pointed towards the bottom of his groin and said, "Come on! Crawl through it!"
那黑色元力竟从蓝色元力内分离出来，突然和附近的丹药药力融合了……
That black essence force actually separated from the blue essence force and suddenly merged with the nearby elixir powers...
重新将怒焰之袍穿在身上，林立可以很清晰的感觉到，自己正被一股强大的魔法抗性包围着。
Putting the Robe of Wrath back on his body, Lin Li could clearly feel that he was surrounded by a powerful wave of magic resistance.
野钢花也顺便采了一些，只是以林立草药大师的身份，对这种廉价草药实在提不起兴趣，随随便便弄了一些，觉得够老家伙挥霍之后，就再不肯浪费力气弯腰。

Wild steelbloom was also picked by him on the way. But a Herb Master like Lin Li would not be interested in that kind of cheap herb. He simply picked some, and thinking it'd be enough for the old fellow to squander away, he refused to waste anymore energy bending over his back.
金发美女仍然穿着那件红色软甲，高挑的身材，修长的双腿，在红色软甲勾勒下，展露出无限美好的曲线，大概是因为赶路太急的关系，白皙的俏脸上泛起一丝红晕，金色长发垂落，在阳光下异常耀眼。

The blond beauty was still wearing the red vest. It revealed a gorgeous curve with her tall figure and slender legs that was outlined by the red vest. Perhaps it was due to the rush of the journey, but a tinge of red glow appeared on her fair face. Her long blond hair hung straight and dazzled in the sun.
金发美女低头走在林间小道上，听着那一段段生动有趣的故事，感受着少年魔法师身上传来的男子气息，不知道为什么，忽然感觉自己脸上有些发烫。

The blond beauty walked with her head down along the forest path, listening to the interesting stories and feeling the manly aura coming from the young mage. For reasons unknown to her, she suddenly felt her face burn.
铁钳夹起通红的深渊秘银，一只手已是从无尽风暴之戒中拿出铁锤。
Lin Li used an iron clamp to pick the red abyss mithril up and, with the other hand, he took out a hammer from the Ring of Endless Storm.
银质小刀轻轻一挑，两片泰罗果皮就被挑了出来，透明的烧杯中，荡漾着浓浓的泰罗果汁液。
With a gentle pick of the silver knife, the two pieces of terocone peel were picked out. The clear beaker was brimming with thick terocone succus.
铸鼎境一二重和铸鼎境三重的武者差距明显很大！
First- and second-stage Cast Tripod Realm warriors were worlds' apart from third-stage Cast Tripod Realm warriors!
铸鼎境三重到铸鼎境四重，需要的元力再次翻倍了，江逸在武殿内修炼有无限的灵神丹，还有黑色元力增幅丹药药力，他现在的修炼速度绝对可比江恨水了。

The essence force needed to elevate from the third to fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm essentially doubled. Fortunately, Jiang Yi had access to an endless supply of Spirit Pills at the Martial Arts Hall, in addition to his black essence force which he used to strengthen the power of the pills. His cultivation speed could definitely match that of Jiang Henshui now.
铸鼎境三重的战力，完全不是目前的他可以对抗的……
The combat strength of a third-stage Cast Tripod Realm was not something he could withstand with his present capabilities…
铸鼎境五重的江如狼很快也被击飞出来，被江逸扫了他一巴掌，白皙的脸上一个掌印清晰无比，火辣辣的疼。
Jiang Rulang who was of fifth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, got sent flying in a short notice. The slap he got from Jiang Yi, left a red burning palm mark on his fair skin.
铸鼎境六重！
The sixth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm!
镀上了深邃之银的点金棒，稳定性已经达到了一个令人发指的程度，他现在要考虑的是，如何才能最大限度的，利用魔法金属带来的附魔效果。
The stability of gold rods coated with deep silver had already reached an appalling level. What he had to consider now was how to maximize the enchantment effect brought on by magical metals.
镀金玫瑰的装潢充满了神秘气息，走进那宽敞的大厅里，林立很容易的就能感觉到，四周魔法波动有些异常，这是大量魔法物品相互排斥相互干扰造成的。

The decoration of Gilded Rose was full of mysterious aura. As he walked into the hall, Lin Li could easily feel the unusual magical wave in the surroundings caused by the large number of magical items that repelled and interfered with each other.
镇西军难得来天羽城招人，这对于江家是个机会，江云山自然想抓住这个机会，只要能安排数十名家族子弟进镇西军中，只要这数十人有一两个能出头，江家就能发展壮大。

It was rare that for the Western Garrison Army to recruit at Skyplume City. Naturally, Jiang Yunshan intended to seize the opportunity for the Jiang Clan. He hoped he could pull enough strings for a few dozens of the Jiang Clan descendants to enroll into the Western Garrison Army; even if just a few of them managed to excel in the army, it would be enough to bring eminence and acclaim to the Jiang Clan.
长发之下，是一张绝美的面容。
Underneath the long hair was a stunningly beautiful face.
长腿美女一出山洞，克伦威尔又哪还坐得住，赶忙站起身来：“我陪你去……”
Cromwell could hardly sit still upon seeing the long-legged beauty go out of the cave. He stood hastily and said, "I'll go with you..."
门口一道身影探头探脑的正朝炼丹房内偷看，看到只有江逸一人后松了一口气，蹑手蹑脚的走了进来。
The figure at the door peeked his head in to secretly observe the interior of the alchemy lab. Spotting only Jiang Yi, the figure heaved a sigh of relief and tiptoed silently into the room.
门后站着一名约莫六七十岁的老人，一眼望去白须白发满面皱纹，只是举手投足之间，却又中气十足丝毫不显老态，老人身上穿着一件白色长袍，大概是因为经常与药水打交道的缘故，长袍上到处都是药水留下的痕迹，青一块紫一块的，看上去多多少少有些脏乱。

An old man in his sixties or seventies stood behind the door. He had white hair and a face full of wrinkles, but his actions were full of vigor, displaying no signs of old age at all. He wore a long white robe dappled with stains, probably due to the frequent use of potions. There were black and blue traces everywhere on his robe, which made it look kind of messy.
门是虚掩的，江逸直接用肩膀撞开，冲入后院目光如刀子般四处扫去。
Using his shoulder, Jiang Yi slammed into the hollow door and smashed into the backyard, his eyes sweeping the area like a blade.
问清楚了野钢花的生长地点，林立没怎么耽搁就出门去了。
After clarifying the location of the place where the wild steelbloom grew, Lin Li went out without much delay.
问题……他穷得连底裤穿了两年都没换新的，他有个屁的钱啊？
The problem was... he was so poor that he had not gotten new underwear for the past two years. What money could he possibly have?
闹了半天，这家伙献宝似的把自己领来，就是为了让自己看这么一堆破东西？林立真是又好气又好笑。
After all the fuss, this rascal had led him here thinking it had some treasure to offer but instead he was showed a pile of junk? Lin Li did not know if he should find it funny or angry.
阴影之巢能给他们什么？无非就是金钱装备，可这些东西，魔法公会根本就不缺，屠魔山谷每年数百万金币收入，装备一发就是一百套，各种药剂更是源源不断的发下来，在这样巨大的幸福当中，又有谁舍得离开？

What could the Shadow's Nest give them? It was nothing but money and equipment. The Guild of Magic had no lack of these. Every year, millions of gold coins were collected from the Demon Fall Valley; and now, 100 sets of equipment were provided at once, and various kinds of potions were distributed continuously. Bathed in such great happiness, who'd be willing to leave?
除了传说中的黑莲花之外，大量的稀有草药同样可遇而不可求，特别是在药剂配成之后，还需要混入永恒之树的汁液，因为只有永恒之树的汁液，才能够为三个传奇魔法提供足够的魔力支持。

Other than the legendary black lotus, a great deal of rare herbs was also hard to find. After the completion of the potion, sap from the Eternity Tree had to be added in. Only the sap from the Eternity Tree would be able to provide magical support to the three legendary magic.
除了奥术飞弹等寥寥几个纯攻击性法术之外，其他无一不是阴险毒辣的控制法术。
Other than a few purely attacking spells like the arcane missiles, everything else was ruthless control spells.
除了林立之外，几乎所有人都傻了。
Almost everyone was dumbfounded except for Lin Li.
除了梅林家族刚才小试牛刀之外，加洛斯三大魔法家族中，曼尼斯家族，萨鲁曼家族，竟是连一次手都没出过，他们不出手的原因其实也不难想象，同为加洛斯三大魔法家族之一，相互间可以说是知根知底，都有了无须说明的默契，谁谁谁该拿多少多少瓶，三大家族心中有数，谁也不会去破坏这份暗中维持的默契。

Among the three major mage families in Jarrosus, except for the Merlin Family who had taken a whirl earlier on, the Mannes Family and the Saruman Family had not even made a move. The reason for their inaction was not hard to imagine—as one of Jarrosus three major mage families, they knew each other through and through and shared an unspoken understanding. The three families knew how many bottles each should take, and no one would undermine this tacit understanding.

There was nothing this kid could not do, besides giving birth...
除了穿越前的那一次疯狂之外，他还从来没象今天这么累过。
Except for the madness before he had time-travelled, he had never been as tired as he was today.
除了老怨妇之外，凯文也过来看了几次。
Other than that hag, Kevin had also dropped by a few times to take a look.
除了这唯一的不和谐音外，一切看上去都跟以前没什么不同。
Everything looked the same except for this.
除了魔纹结构稍有偏差之外，这根法杖也算得上是不错了，林立点了点头：“不错的法杖，就是不知道价格怎么样？”
Apart from a slight deviation in the mageweath structure, this was a good enough staff. Lin Li nodded. "Nice staff, I wonder how much it costs."
除此之外，他再也没有发现黑色元力还有其他的功能，他分析了一下，这黑色元力应该是一种很独特的能量，拥有增幅的功能——能增幅他蓝色元力的威力，增幅他的五官敏锐度，增幅丹药的药力。

Besides those, he failed to discover any other abilities of the black essence force. Upon some analysis, he concluded that this black essence force probably had a very unique capability: that of the power of augmentation. It was capable of intensifying the power of blue essence force, capable of intensifying the sharpness of the five senses, and capable of increasing the efficacy of elixirs.
除此之外，黑莲花还能配出无限法能，奥术领域，等等几种精神强化药剂，虽然不如短暂神格变态，但比起虚无缥缈的神匠级别配方来，这几种药剂可就要现实多了，至少林立在达到药剂宗师级别时，已经掌握了它们的配方。

In addition, the black lotus could also be used to create mental strengthening potions like the Infinite Magical Ability, Arcane Field, and more. Although they were less freaky than the Ephemeral Divinity Potion, these potions were far more realistic than the illusory Divine Smith level formula. At least Lin Li had mastered their formula when he had reached the level of a pharmacist guru.
除非老梅林愿意废掉克伦威尔，另选一个家族继承人。
Unless Old Merlin was willing to disown Cromwell and choose another successor.
陷入阴谋论中的克伦威尔可没空去想，跟八级魔兽沟通是一件多么艰巨的任务。
Cromwell, caught up with his conspiracy theories, had no time to think what a difficult task communicating with a level-eight magical beast was.
随后在无数人期待的目光中，江逸出人意料的苦练了整整一个月，才勉强提炼出几丝微不足道的水系元力——即便是族内资质最差的普通子弟，也只需花上三五天便能达到这一效果。

Unfortunately, contrary to the high expectations of many Jiang Clan members, Jiang Yi cultivated a near-negligible amount of water-element essence force despite training for an entire month. This was shocking, considering how even the most ordinary of descendants only needed up to three to five days to achieve the same result.
随后，整座天庭焕发出亮眼到极致的符文金光……
Moments later, the entire Heavenly Court glowed with extreme radiance amidst the lights of the golden runes…
随着一阵短暂而急促的咒文吟唱声传出，老梅林手上陡然燃起一片红色光焰，只见他手中的法杖猛的一顿，在场众人只觉四周空间一阵扭曲，一朵朵仿佛来自地狱的红莲，在呼啸声中，拖着长长的尾焰轰向翡翠高塔。

With a short and rapid recitation of the spell, a red flame lit up on Old Merlin's hands. With a stamp of the staff in his hand, everyone present seemed to feel a distortion of the space in the surrounding. Stalks of red lotus with their long flaming tails in tow emerged as if from hell and bombarded the Emerald Tower amidst the howl.
随着凯文手中的锤子又一次落下，稍稍中断的拍卖又继续开始了。
With Kevin's gavel hammering down once again, the auction resumed.
随着天帝身体的不断消融，当那烈火的温度达到无限灼热，亮度达到无限夺目的那一刻，天帝和火焰同时消失在了天地之间。

The Celestial Thearch's body melted as he spoke, and when the temperature of the raging fire reached an unimaginable peak, so high that it became blinding, the Celestial Thearch and the flames vanished from the world.
随着最后一句咒文被喝破，一层坚硬无比的冰甲覆盖在中年男人身上，在止住伤口鲜血喷涌的同时，也让双足飞龙势在必得的一击落到了空处，那种感觉就象抓到了钢铁上一般，锥心的疼痛从爪子上传来，让双足飞龙发出一阵阵痛苦而愤怒的嘶吼声。

As the last of the spell broke out, a hard layer of ice armor covered the middle-aged man. While stopping the bleeding of the wound, it also made the Wyvern's strike fall into an empty spot. An excruciating pain shot up from the Wyvern's talons, like having caught onto steel. The Wyvern roared in fury and agony.
随着水晶球上的光芒越来越耀眼，葛瑞安脸上的笑容也越来越浓。
As the light on the crystal ball glowed brighter, so did the smile on Gerian's face.
随着老人一步步走近，林立一双眼睛，也一点点的亮了起来。
As the old man approached them, Lin Li's eyes lit up slightly.
随着老梅林的话音落下，四周的魔法元素忽然呈现出一阵剧烈的波动，就好象一个巨大的旋涡正在扩散，身处旋涡之中，林立更是感受到了一股空前的压力，他必须死死的咬紧牙关，才能保证自己不在这股压力下屈服。

As Old Merlin's voice settled, the magical elements in the surrounding turned into a violent wave, like a giant vortex spreading across. Lin Li felt an unprecedented pressure standing in the center of this vortex. He had to clench his teeth tightly to ensure he wouldn't bend under this immense pressure.
随着葛瑞安话音落下，翡翠高塔外的气氛，顿时变得剑拔弩张，所有人的心都提了起来,这可不象刚才林立与老梅林的争斗，那说到底不过是打了儿子老子出头罢了，现在站在这里的两个人，同样是十五级以上的大魔导士，同样领导着加洛斯最大的两支势力之一。

As Gerian's voice fell, the atmosphere outside Emerald Tower turned intense. All hearts were lifted to their mouths. This was not a battle between Lin Li and Old Merlin like the one before, that was merely a revenge from the father for beating up his son. Now, both men standing were archmages over level-fifteen, and were likewise two of the top powers leading Jarrosus.
随着裂缝的扩大，那双白骨大手硕大的头颅和上半身终于也钻了出来。其头颅处空洞的眼眸内闪耀着诡异的红光，其白色骸骨上不住流转着密密麻麻、隐隐发亮的暗灰色符文，释放出一股令人恐惧窒息的死气，连附近的空气都凝滞了流动。

As the crack widened, the owner of the pair of skeletal hands slowly emerged and stood up. Strange red lights shone from the hollows of its cranial cavities, and its white, bony body, covered in countless greyish runes, glowed steadily. A frightening lifeless aura was released, causing the surrounding air to stagnate.
随着许愿术卷轴被轻轻展开，明月城的上空忽然挂起了一道彩虹，七彩斑斓的光芒柔柔洒下，让整个明月城看上去就仿佛被梦境笼罩一般，庄严神圣的颂唱声中，一阵威严的声音传来，仿佛远在天边，却又仿佛近在身旁。

As the scroll of Wishes gently unfolded, a rainbow appeared suddenly on the skies of Bright Moon City. The colorful rays shone down lightly, and the whole city seemed to be enshrouded in a dream. A majestic voice rang through the solemn and divine choir, a voice that appeared to come from afar yet near at the same time.
随着那一丝精神力的变化，魔力走向又忽然转了个一百八十度的大弯，饶过复杂的魔力回路，瞬间激活了绿宝石周围的十三个魔力节点，紧跟着林立将手一抬，点金棒落到了怒焰之袍之上，刹时间就只见一片符文升腾而起，怒焰之袍上呈现出一阵扭曲的魔法波动，等到这一切渐渐平息之时，林立已经完成了在安瑞尔世界的第一次附魔。

With the change of the mental strength, the mana suddenly took a 180 degree turn, bypassing the complex magic circuit and activating the 13 magic nodes surrounding the emerald. Then, Lin Li lifted his hand and the gold rod landed on the Robe of Wrath. A series of runes arose instantly and there was a distorted magical wave on the Robe of Wrath. By the time all these had subsided, Lin Li had completed his first magical enchantment in Anril.
随着那句说话的结束，只见原本覆盖在天庭外围，整个璀璨夺目的耀眼护罩突然熄灭了下来，防护屏障消失得无影无踪，那原本游走宛如复活生命的草木百兽雕刻悉数停止了动弹，各处建筑内外的七彩符文也不再发光。

Following those words, the resplendent and dazzling barrier that shielded the Heavenly Court's periphery suddenly diminished before disappearing completely. The lively floral and creature carvings stopped moving, and the rainbow-colored runes inside and outside the buildings stopped emitting light.
隐约之中，他听到了江小奴小声的解释声，还有荣管事怒气冲冲的训斥声，直到片刻后江小奴才小跑进了后院：“少爷，荣管事走了，不过他说明天一早让你去找他，去西山药田清点。”

Vaguely, he heard Jiang Xiaonu explaining things in a low volume, as well as Chief Rong's rage-filled shouts of stern rebuke.
After a short period of time, Jiang Xiaonu ran into the backyard. "Young Master, Chief Rong has left. However, he said that he wants you to find him tomorrow morning and account for the medicinal herbs at the Western Hills."
难怪他一眼就能看出麦格雷尼先生的病因，又能够配出如此古怪的药剂，原来他根本就是一位真正的药剂师！
It was no wonder he could see the cause of Mr McGrenn's illness at once and concoct such a peculiar potion. So he turned out to be a real pharmacist!
雅阁内的江逸心情很是忐忑，第一次上这种大地方，此刻还在等待对方定夺，心里不紧张的假的。好在他整张脸都笼罩在斗篷内，多年的压抑生活也让他的性格沉稳了很多。

Jiang Yi, who was inside the booth, was in a nervous mood. This was the first time he had been to such a major location; on top of that, he had to wait for his counterpart to evaulate and make a decision on the offer. He would be lying if he said he was not anxious. Thankfully, his entire face was entirely shroudded by his black cloak, while his steady personality and much calm composure was much developped by many years of oppressive cruel life.
霍伦一句话出口，四周顿时传来几声吸气的声音。
When Hoeren spoke, breathing sounds immediately came from all four sides.
霍伦一句话出口，马森就一下呆住了。
Hoeren's words stunned Marson.
霍伦倒不怎么恼怒，以他今时今日的实力和地位，除了伤害巴瑟罗尔的凶手之外，一般的冒犯还不足以让他生气，他只是点了点头：“既然你们想跟他一起去公会地牢，我可以给你们这个机会。”

Hoeren was not particularly angry. With his current strength and standing, a normal offense was not enough to make him angry, other than injuring Bathrilor's assailant. He simply nodded: "Since you so desire to go to the dungeon with him, I can give you this chance."
霍伦怎么也没想到，这次最高议会的试炼，加洛斯魔法公会派来的，居然就是这个费雷。
Hoeren would never have imagined that the Jarrosus Guild of Magic would actually send Felic to the Supreme Council trial.
霍伦毕竟是奥德文的儿子，真要把他给杀了，搞不好会给安度因带来一些麻烦，反正自己也没什么损失，只是受了些惊吓而已，没必要把事情搞得这么大……

Hoeren was indeed Odwin's son. If Andoine really were to kill him and things didn't go well, it would spell trouble for Andoine. Lin Li did not suffer any losses anyway, only that he was somewhat frightened. There was no need for the situation to escalate to such an extent...
霍伦沙哑的声音刚刚落下，三人就忽然感觉到一股庞大的压力传来，而压力的来源，正是那个身穿黑袍的中年人，此时的霍伦，与先前比起已是截然不同，浑身上下都散发出强大的气息。

The moment Hoeren finished speaking, the three suddenly felt a large burst of pressure. The source of the pressure was that middle-aged man clad in a black robe. The Hoeren now was completely different from just now: his whole body radiated a powerful aura from head to toe.
霍伦甚至都已经想好了，只要将他关进地牢，就立刻动用各种关系，务必让他在最短的时间里，受尽最痛苦的折磨而死。

Hoeren had even planned that as long as he locked Felic in the dungeon, he would use his various connections to ensure that Felic would suffer the the worst torture in the shortest amount of time, and die as a result.
霍伦的右手上，一枚镶嵌着红宝石的戒指，正透出淡淡的魔法波动。
On Hoeren's right hand, his ring finger that was embedded with a ruby started to give off a faint spell of magic.
霍伦紧紧握住手中法杖，漫长而又复杂的咒语吟唱声，在树林间久久回荡……
Hoeren tighly gripped the staff in his hand. The chant of a long and complex spell resounded in the forest...
霎时间天地为之呼号，风云为之变色，虚空为之震荡！
Instantly, the heaven and earth cried out, the winds and clouds changed color, and the space shuddered!
靠！真是药剂大师！
Damn! Really a Master of Potion!
面对会长大人突如其来的怒气，一群魔法师顿时就给吓傻了，一个个战战兢兢的望着葛瑞安，身子拼命的往后缩，生怕老家伙把血溅到他们身上，一时间林立周围空下好大一块地方，就他一个人象没事似的坐在那，还有空伸出手来往葛瑞安头上指了指，很好心的提醒他注意形象。

Faced with the President's sudden rage, the group of mages were scared silly at once. They looked at Gerian with trepidation and desperately shrank back for fear that the old fellow might spill blood on them. For the moment there was a big space around Lin Li, and he sat there by himself as if nothing had happened and still had the time to stretch out his hand and point to Gerian's head, kindly reminding him of his image.
面对如日中天的魔法公会，他很明智的选择了主动示好。
In the face of the Guild of Magic that was at its height of influence, he had wisely chosen to take the initiative to befriend them.
项链握在手中，又是一个火焰之手，庞大的魔力一放即收，等他再将手张开时，细细的深邃之银项链已是被融成了薄薄的一片，整个过程更是快得吓人，一放一收只是眨眼之间，一直到他将深邃之银薄片覆在点金棒上时，才微微感觉到手心有些发烫。

Holding the necklace in the hand, he unleashed the Flaming Hands again, the massive power recalled as soon as it was released. When he opened his hand again, the fine deep silver necklace had been melted into a thin piece. The whole process was tremendously fast, the release and recall of his mana was done in a flash. It was not until he had covered the gold rod with the thin piece of deep silver that he somewhat felt his palms burning.
顺利将五项技能升到大师级别，林立终于是停下来歇了口气，正当所有人都以为他要收手的时候，林立却从背包里拿出了愿望术卷轴。

Lin Li finally stopped to catch his breath after successfully upgrading his skills to the mastery level. Just when everyone thought he'd finally call it a day, he took out the scroll of Wishes from his bag.
风月楼的债务，压得江逸透不过气来，此刻这武殿既然看重他，他自然想在这先弄十两紫金去还债。

The debt problems with the Fengyue Brothel bore down on Jiang Yi so much that he could not breathe. At the moment, since this Martial Arts Hall saw him so highly, he naturally thought of first getting the ten taels of purple gold to pay back his debts.
风月楼的护卫连忙把令牌递给马飞，马飞抓着令牌上的绳索吊在半空在江逸面前晃了晃，戏谑说道：“想要令牌？没门！”

The guard of Fengyue Brothel immediately handed over the command token to Ma Fei, who mockingly dangled it by its strings in mid-air in front of Jiang Yi, "You want the command token? No way in hell!"
风月楼的管事看到江逸上门，和安坐喝茶的马家公子赔笑两句，转头望着江逸戏谑开口道：“哦？一月之期还没到，你就上门了？是否弄够了足够的紫金？”

Upon seeing Jiang Yi at the door, the housekeeper of Fengyue Brothel smiled apologetically at the Ma Family young master casually sipping tea, before turning to Jiang Yi and jeered, "Oh? You are here before the one-month deadline is up? Did you manage to acquire enough purple gold?"
风月楼离开江家不远，但江逸和江小奴却足足走了小半个时辰才回到江家西院。
Fengyue Brothel was not very far from the Jiang Residence, but Jiang Yi and Jiang Xiaonu ended up taking an entire hour to return to the Jiang Residence Western Court.
马修斯－梅林的儿子，却要向这些低级魔法师主动示好，这种事情对骄傲的克伦威尔来说，简直比杀了他还难受。
He was the son of Matthew Merlin, yet he had to lower his head and be the one taking the initiative to befriend these low-level mages. To the arrogant Cromwell, this was worse than killing him.
马家作为天羽城五大家族之一，他们家族的一举一动都被其余家族所关注，不过马飞不想把这事闹得人尽皆知，所以其余家族只是知道马家在找一个人，一个铸鼎境二重，十五六岁的少年。

Being one of the five great families in Skyplume City, every action made by the Ma Family was under the scrutiny of the other families. However, as Ma Fei did not wish to have the incident revealed publicly, the rest of the families only knew that the Ma Family was looking for a someone - a youth aged around 15 or 16 years old, who was at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
马家和江家是世仇，这管事知道他是江家子弟，江逸暗道不妙，却看到那管事已经注意到他了，只能硬着头皮朝里面走去。

The Ma Family and the Jiang Clan were mortal enemies. Additionally, this housekeeper knew that he was a son of the Jiang Clan. Jiang Yi muttered to himself that something was amiss, but seeing as he had already caught the attention of that housekeeper, he could only brace himself and walk further into the building.
马家大少马黑旗，柳家柳河，冷家冷千军，江家江恨水，这四名大家族少爷追求了姬听雨数年，姬听雨一直不冷不热，此刻却连续找一名陪练两次？最重要的是……这陪练还是青铜级别的垃圾武者，这事明显有些诡异。

Ma Family Great Young Master Ma Heiqi, Liu Family Young Master Liu He, Leng Family Young Master Leng Qianjun, and Jiang Clan Jiang Henshui - these four young masters from the four great families had been courting Ji Tingyu for years, whereas she remained ever unreceptive to their attempts. Yet she ordered this sparring partner twice in a row? More importantly... he was just some bronze token-grade, underclass martial artist. It was indeed peculiar...
马家少爷目光在江逸身上一扫，朝管事招手道：“刘管事，什么江家？这令牌是什么回事？”
The Ma Family young master swept a glance across Jiang Yi and motioned for the housekeeper, "Housekeeper Liu, what do you mean by the Jiang Clan? What's this about the command token?"
马家少爷看都没看江逸一眼，一人端着茶杯悠闲地喝着茶，似乎江逸这等小人物和这风月楼的姑娘般，一样的下贱，无足轻重。

The Ma Family young master spared Jiang Yi nary a glance and seemed content with drinking tea in solitude. He acted as if Jiang Yi was a nobody, as if he was like the girls in this Fengyue Brothel - unworthy and low-bred.
马家少爷神色不变，低垂着头悠然喝了一口茶道：“瞧你说的，我过来可是办事的，不知道的人还以为本少爷是过来找乐子的……”

Keeping a neutral expression, the Ma Family young master ducked his head and took a casual sip of tea, "What are you saying. I'm here for business, yet the way you put it would make those who don't know better think I'm here for pleasure..."
马家少爷笑了笑，很满意的拍了拍管事的肩膀，起身就要朝楼上走去。
The Ma Family young master smiled and patted the housekeeper's shoulder in satisfaction, getting up to make his way upstairs.
马家江家子弟常有冲突，去年江如龙把马家两名子弟打得瘫痪，对方都不敢找上门来，最后不了了之。此刻他既然回到了江家大院，那自然也就安全了。

The descendants of the Ma and Jiang families had frequent conflicts. Last year, Jiang Rulong had beaten up two descendants of the Ma Family so badly that they were paralyzed, yet the Ma Family did not come to the Jiang Clan for revenge, and the matter was concluded without being settled. Therefore, Jiang Yi knew he was safe now that he was back in the Jiang Clan courtyard.
马森会不会疯掉，安度因可一点也不关心，他现在正忙着从口袋里掏东西。
Andoine did not care whether or not Marson went crazy. He was busy fishing something out of his pocket.
马森的目光呆滞住了，从小到大，他不知道听过多少，关于这位传奇法师的故事，但他却从来也没有想过，有一天，这样一位充满传奇色彩的人物，会活生生的站在自己面前，而且看上去，竟还跟自己的室友关系不浅……

Marson's gaze was fixed on him. Since he was young, he had heard countless stories about this legendary mage, but had never imagined that one day, such a legendary figure would be standing right in front of his very eyes. And it seemed as if he shared some sort of relationship with his roommates...
马飞一看江逸这样子，不仅不害怕反而大笑起来，在他看来江逸这铸鼎境二重的废物，如果敢动手今日只有爬着回去，不说风月楼内有七八名护卫，就凭铸鼎境四重的他，一招就能废了他……

Seeing Jiang Yi like this only made Ma Fei laugh out loud, without an ounce of fright. To him, Jiang Yi was a useless person who was only at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. If Jiang Yi dared to attack, he would only end up being knocked down and dragged out. To say nothing of the seven or eight guards in Fengyue Brothel, just Ma Fei alone, who was at the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, would be able to cripple him with just one blow...
马飞不再理会刘管事，眼睛怨毒的望着天花板，咬牙切齿的喃喃道：“不将你挫骨扬灰，我马飞誓不为人……”

Ma Fei stopped paying attention to Housekeeper Liu and stared at the ceiling in bitter resentment. "I, Ma Fei, vow to shatter your bones and scatter the ashes into the wind, or I cease to be a man..."
马飞伸手弹了弹衣袍，笑道：“不多，我算了下，你随便给个百两紫金，这事就算我给江恨水面子，不予追究了……”

Ma Fei smoothed out his clothes, brushing off imaginary dust, and said with a smirk, "Not much. I did a rough calculation: why don't you just pay something like a hundred tael of purple gold, and I will give face to Jiang Henshui and consider this case closed..."
马飞冷笑一声，慢悠悠的走了过来，站在江逸面前伸出一只手指，点着他面门道：“你算什么东西？你的侍女在我家楼子内做工，损坏东西不说，你敢出手伤人？这事就算闹到城主府去我们马家也不怕，区区十两紫金也想打发？你以为我们马家是要饭的？令牌拿来！”

Smiling coldly, Ma Fei sauntered over and stood in front of Jiang Yi. He held up a finger and jabbed at Jiang Yi's forehead, "Who do you think you are? Your maidservant worked at my brothel; to say nothing of her damaging our property, you had the audacity to attack our men? The Ma Family would not let this matter go even if the City Lord were to hear of it, yet you presume you can patronize us with a mere ten taels of purple gold? Do you think our family is made up of beggars? Hand me the command token now!"
马飞少爷很快就冷笑起来，盯着江逸看了几眼，突然冷哼道：“毁掉了我们镇楼的名画，打伤了我们的人，就这么轻易的想把事了了？这事就算江恨水在这也说不过去吧？”

A sardonic smile soon appeared on Young Master Ma Fei's face. After staring at Jiang Yi for a few moments, he suddenly gave a derisive snort, "You destroyed the famous painting that was the treasure of our brothel, and attacked our men. Yet you wish to settle things so easily? What you did couldn't be absolved even if Jiang Henshui himself were here, don't you think?"
马飞悠然一笑，淡淡说道：“赔钱！那幅画十两紫金，你已经赔了，你再把打伤我们楼子护卫的药钱，还有毁坏我们风雨楼声誉费赔了，这令牌我利马还你。”

Ma Fei gave a slow smile and said coolly, "Pay up for the damages! You've paid the ten taels of purple gold for the painting, sure. I will return the command token to you immediately, but only if you compensate the medical expenses for beating up our brothel's guards, and recompense for vilifying Fengyue Brothel's reputation."
马飞暴跳如雷，让刘管事不断砸钱找人，就算把天羽城翻一遍也要找到江逸，而且搜索范围还扩大到了方圆百里的小镇上。江逸废了他，毁了他的一辈子，不杀江逸他日不能食，夜不能寐，几乎要入魔了。

Ma Fei was in a thunderous rage. He had Housekeeper Liu to find Jiang Yi regardless the cost, even if it meant turning Skyplume City upside down. The search radius was also expanded to the surrounding towns 50 kilometers away. Jiang Yi had rendered him useless and destroyed his life. He was a man possessed, unable to eat nor sleep, being consumed entirely by the the thought of killing Jiang Yi.
马飞深深地吸了一口气，闭上眼睛休息了一会才开口道：“这事别上报家族，让人偷偷给我父亲带着信，还有……十天之内，我要得到这个杂碎的一切信息，如果查不来你们所有人自裁吧！”

Ma Fei took a deep breath, closing his eyes and resting for a moment before saying, "Do not inform the family clan about this incident. Have someone to pass a message to my father in secret, and... in ten days, I want every bit of information about this rascal delivered to me. If it cannot be done, all of you are to take your own lives!"
马飞看起来年纪比他还要大上两三岁，却还只是铸鼎境四重，天资明显有限。就算被他废了马家也不会大动干戈，最多马飞的老爹暴怒如雷，暗中派人刺杀他。

From appearances, Ma Fei seemed two to three years older, yet he was only at the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm - an indication of his obviously limited talent. Although he was rendered useless, the Ma Family would not make too much of a fuss. At the very most, Ma Fei's father would fly into a thunderous rage and try to have Jiang Yi assassinated.
马飞突然放声大笑起来，艰难的扭转脖子，阴狠的盯着江逸道：“见冥帝？你敢杀本少爷？给你一万个胆子你试试？我父亲是马庸，你敢杀我就算你们江家家主都保住你。小杂碎，我告诉你，你完了！今日之事我发誓必百倍偿还，不将你弄成废人我马飞誓不为人。”

Ma Fei burst out laughing. He turned his neck with difficulty and cast savage eyes upon Jiang Yi, "Meet the Netherworld Emperor? Do you dare to kill this young master? How about you give it a try when you are ten thousand times braver than you are now? My father is Ma Yong; if you have the guts to kill me, even the Jiang Clan Clan Head would not be able to save you. You little rascal, I'll have you know that you are done for! I swear there will be retribution for what you did today, with a hundred-fold interest. I, Ma Fei, vow to render you useless, or I cease to be a man."
骚动持续了大概半个小时，大厅里终于渐渐安静了下来，台上的凯文依旧带着笑容，用手中的锤子在台上一敲：“奥法药剂拍卖，现在正式开始！”

The hubbub continued for about half an hour when at last the hall gradually quiet down. Kevin, standing on the stage, still had the smile on his face as he hit the table with the gavel in his hand. “The auction for the Arcane Magic Potion officially begins now!"
高大的骸骨巨人带着百万钧之力，重重地撞击在由符芒映衬下的气罩上，眨眼便被反震为无数骨屑碎末，护罩没有一丝晃荡。

The huge skeleton giant struck down with the force of a million pounds upon the dome formed by the runic halos. In a blink of an eye, it was reduced to dust from the aftershock, but the shield did not sway a single bit.
高级铁匠用秘银锻造，敲成废铁那是理所当然的事，不过是不是敲成废铁对林立来说其实都没什么区别，他不缺那几百金币，也不缺那几块秘银，事实上在闪光平原千针石林等很多地方，他都拥有自己的私人矿脉，只是没人知道罢了……

Top-class blacksmiths used mithril in their forging, hence it was natural to turn mithril into scrap iron. However, it made no difference to Lin Li whether the mithril was hammered into scrap iron. He was neither short on that few hundred gold coins, nor was he short on these few pieces of mithril. In fact, he had his own private mineral veins in places like the Glistening Plains and Thousand Pinnacles, but no one knew about it...
魔力如潮水一般涌出，水晶球开始渐渐发亮。
The power gushed out like tide water, and the crystal ball began to glitter.
魔晶一抓一大把的人，居然也有脸嚷嚷，我已经这么穷了？
Someone who could grab a handful of magical crystals at once actually had the gall to complain that he's poor?
魔晶上升腾而起的青色火焰熊熊燃烧着，与此同时四周的魔法波动也终于到了极限。
The green flame rising up from the magical crystals raged on, and at the same time the surrounding magical wave had reached its peak.
魔法公会坐落在加洛斯城南端，那是一幢丝毫不逊色于冒险者公会的庞大建筑物，在加洛斯城，魔法公会又被称为翡翠之塔，站在街上远远望去，就能看见那高高的塔尖。

The Guild of Magic was located at the southern end of Jarrosus City. It was a huge building as well, no less so than the Adventurers Guild. The Guild of Magic was also known as the Emerald Tower in Jarrosus City. Standing on the streets, one would be able to see the tall spire of the tower from a distance.
魔法公会跟梅林家族虽然有些摩擦，但大家毕竟是加洛斯城最大的两支势力，一旦克伦威尔在这里出点什么事，凯文真不敢想象加洛斯城会乱成什么样……

Although the Guild of Magic had some frictions with the Merlin Family, they were after all the top influence in Jarrosus City. If anything happened to Cromwell here, it would not be up to Kevin to imagine the chaos that would happen in Jarrosus City.
魔法天赋强得变态不说，还精通锻造和药剂，最要命的是，这小王八蛋的年纪才不过二十岁！
No need to even mention his exceptional talent in magic, he was also skilled in forging and pharmaceutics. What was most appalling was that, this little bastard was not even over twenty!
魔法家族拥有庞大的财富，也拥有令人眼红的权势，可药剂师公会又岂是财富和权势所能打动的？
The mage families had great wealth and enviable power, but the Pharmacists Guild was not as much an object of wealth and power.
魔法师与魔法学徒，一步天堂，一步地狱……
A mage and a mage apprentice. It was one of heaven, and one of hell...
鲁本－萨鲁曼也是狠人一个，否则当年也不会一夜之间杀尽父亲兄弟，黑色法师袍下的枯瘦手臂一抬：“五十五万。”
Reuben Saruman was also a ruthless character; if not, he wouldn't have killed his father and brother in one night. An emaciated arm was raised from under the black mage robe. "550,000."
鲁本－萨鲁曼经过后排的时候，头也不回的丢了一句话给葛瑞安：“你欠我一个人情！”
When Reuben Saruman passed by the last row, he dropped a word to Gerian without a look back. "You owe me a favor!"
鲁本－萨鲁曼这个价格一出，在场所有人都彻底相信了，这家伙真的是个疯子，八十万金币丢出去，竟是连眉头都没皱一下，这绝对是真正的天价！就算这是奥法药剂又怎么样，有了这八十万金币，就算是用钱砸，也能砸出十个五级魔法师来了……

As soon as Reuben Saruman uttered the price, everyone present had fully believed the fellow to be a lunatic. 800,000 gold coins were thrown out without even a wrinkling of his brows. This was an absolute sky-high price! So what if this was the Arcane Magic Potion? With this 800,000 gold coins, you could get ten level-five mages with a just a throw of the money...
鲜血乱喷的双足飞龙本就极端虚弱，此时一记迟缓术上身，更是仿佛拉着破车的老牛，任它如何拼命挣扎，那区区十几步距离，也仿佛成了一道永远无法跨越的鸿沟。

The bloodied Wyvern was already at its weakest. Now that the Delaying Spell was cast, it was like an old bullock pulling a broken cart trundling along. No matter how hard it struggled, it seemed that the distance of a dozen steps was a gap that could never be crossed to it.
鹤大师从楼梯上匆匆走进来，一眼就锁定了坐楼顶雅阁内一个名黄裳少女，眼中立即露出一丝溺爱和尊敬之色。

Master He hurried up the stairs and walked up to the top floor. With one look, his eyes locked on a young lady dressed in yellow apparel sitting in the elegent pavilion on the top floor. Those eyes immediately immediately gave a look of doting love and respect.
鹤大师伸手朝下面一指道：“这是下面一名少年拿来出售的。”
Master He stretched out his hand and pointed a finger downwards, replying, "A young man downstairs was trying to sell this."
鹤大师和刘管事，还有一名俊俏的侍女都露出错愕的表情。她们很清楚自家这位小姐对男子的吸引力，哪家的公子见了她不是和苍蝇般赶都赶不走？这少年明显城府不深，竟有如此定力？

Master He and Housekeeper Liu, as well as an elegant madiservant all revealed expressions of astonishment. They clearly knew the magnetic powers of attraction this Young Mistress from their own familial clan had on men. What young master has not, upon seeing her, become completely enamoured to her and be unable to chase away at all? This young man was clearly a shrewd and sophisticated person - how could he otherwise have that much determination?
鹤大师恍然大悟，捋了捋呼白须，衷心的赞道：“小姐心思敏捷，目光长远，老夫佩服。是啊……偌大的天羽城数百万人，做生意还真没人比得上小姐，否则这聚珍阁怎么短短两年内就成为天羽城第一大商号？对了！小姐接管商号的时候才十四岁吧？如果继续让小姐管理下去，这怕是要不了十年，聚珍阁将会成为我们神武国第一大商号。”

Master He suddenly saw the light. Stroking his white beard, he wholeheartedly praised her by saying, "Young Mistress, you are certainly quick-witted and far-sighted. I admire you. Yes, indeed... there are millions of people in such a big city like Skyplume City, yet there is no one who can do business better than Young Mistress yourself. Otherwise, how could it have been possible for the Pearl Gathering Pavilion to become the number-one merchanthouse in all of Skyplume City within just two years? Right! Young Mistress, you were just fourteen years old when you took over the management of the merchanthouse, right? If we continue allowing you, Young Mistress, to continue running the business, we wouldn't even need ten years before the Pearl Gathering Pavilion becomes the number-one merchanthouse in all of Divine Martial Kingdom."
鹤大师捋了捋白须，很是满意的点头道：“小姐聪慧，说得一点没错，不过你再仔细瞧瞧。”

Master He stroked his white beard and nodded with satisfaction, replying, "Young Mistress is certainly bright and intelligent. You have said nothing wrong - but observe the pill carefully once again.""
鹤大师摇头道：“这少年实力很弱，铸鼎境一重，这绝不是他炼制出来的，要想炼制这样的丹药最少要铸鼎境五重实力。我上来是想请示一下小姐，这事如何定夺？要不派人跟踪一下这少年，找到这炼丹师？”

Master He shook his head and answered, "This gentleman's power is very weak, at only the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. This is definitely not refined by him. To be able to refine an elixir like this requires being power level of at least the fifth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. I came up here to seek your guidance, Young Mistress - how should we deal with this? Should we send someone to tail this young man, and thereby search for this master alchemist?"
鹤大师无比肯定的点头道：“没错，这就是传说中的……丹纹！小姐果然博览群书，聪颖过人，这丹纹就是一般的低级炼丹师都不知道的。”

Master He nodded his head in utter assuredness and said, "You're right, this is the legendary... elixir vein patten! Young Mistress, you have indeed read extensively and your intelligence surpasses all others. This elixir vein pattern is something the average low-grade alchemist would not know about."
鹤大师深深的吸了一口，满脸郑重沉声道：“但天星大陆一万多年历史上出现了一百零七名丹王，九名丹圣，而有共一百零二人炼制的丹药上……有丹纹！”

Master He took a deep breath. With a solemn expression on his face, he said in a deep voice, "However, in the last ten-thousand years of history, there were only one hundred and seven alchemist masters and nine alchemist saints in Stellarsky Continent. And there have only been one hundred and two individuals whose refined elixirs contained... elixir vein patterns!"
鹤大师走进雅阁也不说话，只是把从江逸那带来的一枚黑色丹药递给了漂亮少女。少女伸出起两只如白玉般的手指拿着丹药仔细看了一阵，还凑到鼻子上闻了闻，好看的眉毛却是蹙得更紧了，有些疑惑的问道：“这只是一枚很普通的丹药啊，还是回炉再造的，里面应该掺和了一些杂七杂八的药粉，这丹药最多算是人阶中品吧？”

Master He walked into the elegent pavilion without uttering a single word, only handing the single black elixir pill he took from Jiang Yi over to the beautiful young lady. The lady stretched out two jade-white fingers to receive the pill and carefully scrutinised for some time, even bringing it to her nose and giving it a sniff. However, her nice-looking eyebrows became even more tightly wrinkled as, with some misgivings, she asked, "This is just an ordinary elixir pill, and one that has been reheated and re-refined. It should also contain a random mixture of additional medical ingredients combined into it. This elixir should at most be considered only of Man-tier medial-grade, surely?"
麦德林好说歹说之下，总算劝得安度因暂时放过霍伦。
After a lot of persuasion by Medellin, he managed to convince Andoine to let Hoeren off.
麦德林是真的要疯了，安度因是什么人物，他实在是太清楚不过了，这老家伙虽然没能进入药剂师公会，但有一点却是无庸质疑的，他是一个真正的药剂师！
Medellin was really going crazy. He clearly knew who Andoine was. Although he did not manage to join the Pharmacists Guild, but one thing was clear: he wad a true pharmacist!
麦格雷尼中的诅咒，会不会跟萨鲁曼家族有关系？
Did the curse on McGrenn have something to do with the Saruman Family?
麦格雷尼也算是资深冒险者了，见过的魔法师不少，可他却从来没见过，有哪个魔法师能象林立一样变态，看看先前那一片风刃，简直比利维坦猩猩的椰子还要密集几分。

McGrenn was considered a veteran adventurer and had come across many mages in his adventures, but he had never seen a mage as perverted as Lin Li. Just the wind blade earlier on was definitely denser than the Leviathan Gorilla's coconut barrage.
麦格雷尼摇了摇头：“麻烦倒是没什么，只是一点金钱上的损失而已。”
McGrenn shook his head. "There is no trouble at all, just some loss of money."
麦格雷尼父女可以说是最低级的冒险者，几十个金币的报酬就足以让他们在落日山脉出生入死，而红发美女跟城主大人关系不浅，多半还有些亲属关系，双方身份天差地远，她又怎么会认识麦格雷尼父女的？

McGrenn and his daughter could be said to be the lowest level of adventurers, and a reward of a dozen gold coins was sufficient for them to risk their lives in the Sunset Mountains. The relationship between the redheaded beauty and the Castellan was not at all shallow, and they most likely shared some family relations. Their status were far apart from each other, so how did she know McGrenn and his daughter?
麦格雷尼父女落脚的地方其实不远，从翡翠高塔出来之后，又转过了几条街道，很快就到了一幢老旧的房子前面。
McGrenn and his daughter did not stay far. After coming out of the Emerald Tower, they turned a few streets and soon reached an old house.
麦格雷尼说完正要转身离去，林立却一伸手把他拉了回来：“你们的任务不是失败了吗？”
McGrenn was about to turn and leave when Lin Li stretched out his hand and pulled him back. "Didn't you fail the quest?"
麦格雷尼身上盖着一条厚厚的毛毯，不时发出一阵轻微的鼾声，看上去倒是睡得异常香甜。
McGrenn was covered with a thick blanket and snored slightly from time to time. He seemed to be sound asleep.
麦的林总算松了口气，只要有了这句话，霍伦的小命算是保住了。
Medellin heaved a sigh of relief. With this sentence, Hoeren's life was safe.
麦的林的眼神，就好象看到了一头恐龙。
Medellin looked as if he had seen a dinosaur.
黄裳小姐一张小嘴惊愕的张开，很快又问道：“那少年什么实力？”
The young lady dressed in yellow opened her small mouth in stupefaction. She quickly asked, "What is the power level of that young man?"
黄裳小姐娇躯一颤，花容失色，她美眸顿时亮得吓人，紧张的说道：“鹤爷爷你这丹药从何而来？”

The young lady dressed in yellow shuddered as her beautiful face turned pale and her beautiful eyes lit up shockingly brightly. She asked nervously, "Grandfather He, where did you get this pill from?"
黄裳小姐沉吟下来，脸色很快恢复了冷静，一双黑宝石的眸子内闪耀着莫名的光芒，突然起身朝下面走去：“我亲自去看看。”

The young lady dressed in yellow muttered to herself. Her facial expressions were quickly restored to a look of calmness as her black gemstone-like pupils shone a mysterious ray of light. She suddenly stood up and walked down the stairs, saying, "I will go and see him personally."
黄裳少女绝美的小脸郑重起来，她很清楚自家这个炼丹师脾气有多么的古怪，没事可不会陪她闲聊，她一双丹凤眼眯了起来，将丹药对着阳光细细观看。

The beautiful face of the young lady clad in a yellow attire became more stern. She was aware that the alchemy master working in her Family had a very odd temper and would not chat idly with her without any reason. Squinting her red phoneix eyes, she carefully scrutinised the pill further under sunlight.
黄裳少女走进来后，美眸一转，在江逸不着痕迹的扫了一眼，一抬手阻止了刘管事和侍女的行礼，这才望着江逸道：“小女子姬听雨，敢问公子贵姓？”

After walking in, the young lady in yellow robes moved her pretty eyes to take a seemless glance of the room, ignoring Jiang Yi as a potential visual obstacle. Raising her hand to stop Housekeeper Liu and the maidservant from bowing in greeting, the young lady finally looked towards Jiang Yi and said, "My name is Ji Tingyu. May I ask what is your name, good sir?"
黑甲护卫肯定的回道：“你要走随时可以，不过没陪练到天黑，是不会有钱拿的。”

The guard wearing black armor continued, "You are allowed to leave at any time you want. However, if you do not fulfill your responsibilities as a sparring partner until the sky turns dark, you will not receive any money."
黑色元力刚刚抵达丹田之外，江逸的心神就被丹田外的一个红色龙形封印吸引了。如果说丹田就像一个核桃的话，此刻这个核桃外壳就被雕刻上了一条火龙形的浮雕。

The black essence force had just reached the exterior of the dantian, as Jiang Yi's mind was absorbed by a red dragon-shaped seal on the exterior of his dantian. If one could allude to the dantian being a walnut, at that moment a relief of a fire dragon was engraved onto the outer shell of this "walnut".
黑色元力每次提炼上限只有十缕，但拥有变态的增幅能力，只要他的修炼速度能提升到家族优秀子弟的水平线上，他的战力并不是没有可能短时间内追上他们。

He could only refine a maximum of ten strands of black essence force each time. However, now that he owned the ability to increase his refining speed vastly, so long as his refining speed could be increased to the same level as that of the outstanding family clan members, it was not impossible for his fighting ability to catch up with theirs in a short period of time.
黑色元力消耗的太快了，只是片刻时间，江逸剩下的两缕黑色元力就消耗干净了，修炼速度一下慢了下来。
The black essence force was consumed too quickly. In only seconds, Jiang Yi was just left with two strands of black essence force remaining. His refining speed thus slowed down.
黑色元力能增幅力量两倍之多，他此刻铸鼎境二重的境界，融合了黑色元力之后，力量能达到铸鼎境四重的四马之力。配合视力增强，他综合战力绝对能比普通的铸鼎境四重武者。

Black essence force could increase his power by two times. At the moment, with the boundary of his power-level at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, after merging with some black essence force, his power-level could hit the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, equivalent to four horsepower worth of strength. Besides being compatible with and increasing his ability of sight, his mixed martial arts techniques and strategies certainly allowed him to be on par with any typical martial artists with a power level at the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
黑色的花瓣混在药渣当中，若不是林立眼神不错，还真不一定能把它们分辨出来。
The black petals were mixed in the dregs, and if not for Lin Li's good vision, he'd not have been able to differentiate the petals.
黑莲花常用于精神强化，其中最强大的成品，就是传说中的短暂神格药剂，在那二十秒的短暂神格下，使用者拥有近乎无穷无尽的精神力量，并免疫人间一切法术，那东西绝对是杀器中的杀器，人挡杀人佛挡杀佛，光用眼睛都能把人瞪死。

Black lotus was frequently used in mental strengthening. One of the most powerful end products using it was the legendary Ephemeral Divinity Potion. In that twenty seconds of brief divinity, the user possessed an almost-infinite mental strength and was immune to any mortal spells. This thing was definitely the deadliest of weapons. It could block almost anything from humans to gods, and could kill with just a glare.
龙有逆鳞，触之必死！
Just like how dragons had a reverse scale, which would cause death upon contact, one would definitely get themselves killed if they rubbed somebody the wrong way!

tu.prop: “没有强大的实力！我江逸一辈子都会被江如虎这样的杂碎给踩在脚下，百般凌辱！这不是我想要的生活，绝对不是！”回想着晨时的一幕幕，江逸脸上条条青筋爆起，拳头紧握，连指甲都深深陷入了掌心。

tuv.seg: “实力！”
“Power!”

tu.prop: 江逸的速度的确增快了两三倍，情急之下他动用了一丝黑色元力在左腿，速度一下如风驰电击，只是十几个呼吸时间他就从家族西门冲出了外面大街上，幸好路上没遇到江家的族人，否则肯定让人起疑的……
他再次奔走了数十丈距离，速度一下慢了下来，那黑色元力已经消耗完毕了，他刚想调动一丝黑色元力，继续加快速度却很快醒悟过来。

tuv.seg: 可惜！
Unfortunately,

tu.prop: 那黑色元力竟从蓝色元力内分离出来，突然和附近的丹药药力融合了……
江逸身子一震，整个人都战栗起来，因为他明显感觉伤口恢复的速度开始加快，而且越来越快，最终治疗的速度达到了原先的五六倍左右，药效都可比人阶上品疗伤丹药了。

tuv.seg: "Eh?"

tu.prop: 说着，柳长老就大步朝旁边的一个偏厅内走去。江逸踌躇一阵只能咬牙上了，运转蓝色元力双手贴在丹炉侧壁上。
让江逸惊愕的是，他元力刚刚注入丹炉内，那丹炉竟如一块吸水的海绵般，快速的自动吸收他的元力，而且吸收的速度快得吓人，他双手经脉内的元力一下就全被吸收完了。

tuv.seg: 然而……
Yet…

tu.prop: 当下他什么也不顾了，立即盘坐打坐运转无名功法提炼黑色元力。这黑色元力消耗太快太快了，关键的时候总是不够用。这次他准备多存点，一次提炼四五个时辰，不睡觉直接修炼到天亮，尽可能的提炼多一些，好明早一次性把伤势彻底恢复。
三个半时辰之后，天还没亮，江逸却停止了修炼。他睁开眼睛时，眸子都是不解和郁闷。因为——这黑色元力在修炼出十缕之后，无论他怎么运转无名决，丹田内竟不再产生黑色元力……

tuv.seg: 然而！
Yet...

tu.prop: 结果只是片刻时间，练功房的房门就打开了，那陪练的武者跌跌撞撞的走出来，戴着的野猪面具都吊在脖子上，露出一张满是鲜血的脸。那翊小姐的身影出现在门口，对着杨管事冷哼道：“杨管事，这铜牌陪练实力怎么那么差？换一个。”
江逸有些可怜的望着这位被打成猪头的仁兄，这人只是铸鼎境二重，那翊小姐实力明显最少都是铸鼎境四重，就算双方元力封印了，也完全不是一个级别的。

tuv.seg: Damn...
